In Istanbul,  visitors have much to discover and even more to (Website hidden by Airbnb) apartment is very close to Taksim Square and Istiklal Street 5 minutes by walking. apartment takes 30 minutes to Sultanahmet (Old City) by walking. Also metro, ferry, traim, bus stations & Havas shuttle service to airports are just 5 minute by walking too. Atatürk Airport is 30 minutes, Sabiha Gökçen Airport is 45 minutes takes with Havas Shuttle Service (in every half hour).Apartment is 95 mt2 which is full equipped with 2 bedrooms, a big living room, kitchen and bathroom. I provide wireless internet service. In the living room, our guests can enjoy cable tv and dvd movies. Kitchen, bathroom and living room are in common use. My guests can use kitchen for breakfast.House is very close to all kind of pubs, coffee shops and night clubs. By requests i can provide gu
neighborhood_overview: Perfect location in downtown
access: Kitchen , livingroom , bathroom
interaction: After the booking you can reach me from (Hidden by Airbnb) or whatsaap

host.host_about:
I live alone in Taksim area and i work at bar.
I like meet new friends from all of the world.
I like to Travel a lot ofcourse if i have free time :) East Asia , Sun , Sea , Sand , Movie  :)

reviews.comments:
I greatly appreciated both the location of the place (very central) and the appartment per se (clean and comfortable, with a very cosy room and with Wi-Fi). 

Nihat was perfect host, quite welcoming and helpful about places to go (or avoid) and things to do in town. 

Hosça kal!
Nice room in a flat well located. Nihat is very nce and helpful. Good experience.

We had a fantastic stay in this charming apartment. The location was perfect and Nihat welcomed us even when we made a late reservation and arrived early. He works at a bar no far from there- a great place to have a drink after seeing the sites! I highly recommend this place!

The flat is clean and and very good located, 3 minutes walk to Taksim Square. The bedroom is quiet at night, even though there is a crowded area next to the flat. Nihat was always extremely quick in answering our emails and let us feel comfortable. He is really kind and discrete, we met him few times cause he works in the evening.
Nihat went out of his way to accommodate our very early arrival and some unforeseeable challenges.  A great host!
Nice place and host, very good location :)
Everything was great about the room and the location.

The stay at Nihat's place was really pleasant. The apartment is very clean and confortable, and located in a very vibrant and animated neighborhood with many restaurants, cafes, bars, shops just nearby. Just a 5 min walk to the Taksim Metro station makes it easy to access any other parts of the city pretty quickly. Nihat was also a great and welcoming host. We totally recommend this place for your stay in Istanbul, especially if you want to experience the local life to the fullest !
The host canceled this reservation 30 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

I stayed at Nihat's for a week. It was exactly as the pics, very nice room. A little bit cold but he offers heating and AC. The apt is cozy and central, close to nice restaurants and bars. Have in mind is on the 4th fl no elevator. Nihat is a very easygoing guy who's open to help with any question or tip about the city. Totally recommend! thanks Nihat!
Nihat is a very nice host, he is very helpful and creates an agreeable atmosphere inside the flat. Thank you :)
Nice cozy place very close to Taksim Square. Nihat is helpful and informative.
nice apartment with good location. the room was clean and neat. Nihat was helpful and supportive. totally recommend his accommodation

Nihat is a very friendly host and makes you really feel comfortable. I have had a great stay and recommend it to anyone who wants to stay very central (Cihangir), the hip and modern part of the city with cozy venues and great cafes just a 3min walk. The place is very close to Taksim Square, etc...everything as described in the prior conments. I will definitely come again! Cheers vural

I totally recommend this place. Great experience staying at Nihat’s apartment. To start with, Nihat is a wonderful friendly person who I was happy to meet. He was very friendly at house, and we had the chance to spend time together outside. Staying with him reflects the true meaning of this website, which is living as a local with a local person. Thank you Nihat. 
Regarding the apartment, it is exactly as described. The room is nice and bed is comfortable. It was clean and well prepared for us. 
Regarding the neighborhood, it is very close to Taksim square and Istiklal Street with few minutes walk. As normal as it is in Istanbul, there is a short hill you need to walk to get to the square, which was totally fine with us. 

In general, next time I visit Istanbul I would first check the availability with Nihat before searching others.

Nihat was an amazing host. He picked me up from the bus stop, gave me some great tips on what to do in Istanbul and just an all round great guy. If you're looking for somewhere close to Taksim then Nihat's place is great. Highly recommend him! Thanks Nihat.

Nihat is so hospitable person. Me and My boyfriend stayed 6 days in Nihat's place and everything was perfect. Nihat is so tactful person despite he was working so hard, he all the time asked us 'do we need anything?' he was so clean and his house is exactly same with the pictures.
I'm highly recommend his place! 
thank you Nihat!
Very helping and welcoming host. Perfect location for a few days in Istanbul.

Nihat was very nice, polite and very helpful to us. He let us drop our baggages off in the morning and left them for a little longer when we checked out. The location is great as it is near Taksim Square. There are local grocery shops nearby if you want to buy some food or snacks.

Nihat is very nice host, and came to wait for me in the shuttle bus station near Taksim squre, His house is very convenient for travel. He is very experirenced and warm host, the room super clean and warm, and house has everything, next time i will choose his house again in istanbul. miss you nihat. see you next time.
Was great to stay in Nihat 's place.

这个住宿离Taksim广场和独立大街很近,需要走一小段路就到了｡住址在一片住宅区的三楼,楼下是一个慈善组织为那些流浪汉准备一些吃的东西｡周围的配套也很方便,有超市,小卖部和卖水果的地方,土耳其的水果很便宜,如果到了就多买一点｡住宿是一个两室一厅一卫一厨的套房,这个房间是主卧,然后还有一个小卧室｡Nihat是在附近酒店上班的,他把两间房间都出租出去,如果都住满的话,他就睡在沙发里｡房东英文沟通没问题,和Nihat聊了很多土耳其大选的事情,也很热情,用厨房也OK｡如果你有带地图,并且英文没问题的话,他会介绍你一些旅游的地方｡我们一共住了四晚,对了从IST机场到这里就直接坐地铁到Taksim,如果从亚洲机场的话,也可以坐大巴到Taksim,到了之后,按照 (Hidden by Airbnb) maps走过来就好了｡其实土耳其的住宿很多,酒店非常多,但个人觉得酒店都是千篇一律,高档或是不高档,Airbnb提供的是不那么一次性的旅游体验,酒店没啥温度｡伊斯坦布尔也挺好,建议大家来之前,多看一些当地的历史,拜占庭或者奥斯曼土耳其的书,这样的话,逛到那些教堂和清真寺大概知道咋会事｡购物的话,我推荐个商场,挺大的,当时我们正值里拉贬值和开斋节活动,所以购物还挺便宜的(Istinye Park Shopping Center)｡好像食住行游购娱都说的差不多了｡祝你们土耳其旅游愉快!
Nihat est sympa et serviable

Fabulous! La localización es extraordinaria. Más si estarás pocos días en Estambul. Nihat es un excelente host y me asistió en todo lo que necesité. Amé Estambul y amé mi estadía en su casa. La cama es cómoda, el baño un poco pequeño para gente grande, pero para mi estaba bien. Disfrute muchísimo las conversaciones con Nihat y le deseo todo lo mejor en sus proyectos futuros. El cuarto es fresco y se mantiene así todo el día. Si vuelvo a Estambul me quedaré con Nihat! Gracias mil.

Nihat is a perfect host : he makes you feel comfortable and he thinks about every detail to make you spend a good time.
He is a very nice and open minded person !
The house is cosy and perfectly clean. 
We had a really good time in Istanbul thanks to Nihat. 
We recommend him 300% !
탁심광장에서 걸어서 5~6분정도로 가깝고 방도 정말 깨끗하고 호스트도 정말 친절했습니다

Nihat was great, responding for the messages quick. He helped us to get where we needed, advised us places to go. The apartment was very nice and tidy, room had big wardrobe space, bed was very comfy. It was about 5mins walking distance from taksim square where variety of restaurants and shops were located. Will defenitely advise to stay at his place. Thank you Nihat.
Nihad, friends, family, and his place are super lovely. I felt like I had a big brother in Istanbul. Host highly recommended.

Nihat is a great host. His place is located  at a strategic location where you can walk to every hot spot in Istanbul. Nihat was extremely helpful by giving me direction and insightful tips. Nihat was always there when I asked him to provide electric plugs as most of my chargers are from North America. Will come again, I strongly recommend Nihat’s place.
The location is great. The street is pretty quiet but several minutes walk to Taksim. Nihat is really caring and he helped me call taxi super early in the morning. Thank you Nihat.
Nihat es muy atento, buen consejero, Conoce muy bien la ciudad y te guía bien para cualquier lugar. El alojamiento es ideal para quien desee ahorrar algo de dinero.

name: Apt Quarto e Sala amplo Laranjeiras
summary: Tradicional bairro de Laranjeiras com fácil acesso à todas as praias,  10 min do aterro do Flamengo. 2 min do metro. Transporte fácil para toda a cidade. 5 min da subida para o Cristo. Arejado e com ar-condicionado nos 2 ambientes.
description: Tradicional bairro de Laranjeiras com fácil acesso à todas as praias,  10 min do aterro do Flamengo. 2 min do metro. Transporte fácil para toda a cidade. 5 min da subida para o Cristo. Arejado e com ar-condicionado nos 2 ambientes.

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

name: Serene luxury in Harlem
summary: Lovely 1500sqft gem located in Central Harlem close to Columbia University. Gorgeous Pre-war flat with 6ft ceilings, 2 fireplaces, and laundry in the unit. Located in a safe, friendly building and close to major restaurants and subway lines.
description: Lovely 1500sqft gem located in Central Harlem close to Columbia University. Gorgeous Pre-war flat with 6ft ceilings, 2 fireplaces, and laundry in the unit. Located in a safe, friendly building and close to major restaurants and subway lines. Very short walking distance to restaurants, bars, supermarket, pharmacy, cafes, and movie theaters. Only 10 minute walk to Columbia University. Just a few short blocks to the A-B-C-D-2-3 subway lines. A-D-2-3 are express trains. Lots of bus lines nearby, as well.
neighborhood_overview: Very short walking distance to restaurants, bars, supermarket, pharmacy, cafes, and movie theaters. Only 10 minute walk to Columbia University.
transit: Just a few short blocks to the A-B-C-D-2-3 subway lines. A-D-2-3 are express trains. Lots of bus lines nearby, as well.
house_rules: Quiet time after 10pm and keep common areas tidy.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States

reviews.comments:
Erika was extremely friendly, kind, and caring while I stayed there. She made me feel at home! She knows the area very well and can provide information about things to do and places to eat in the neighborhood.

The area is also quite safe and it is not uncommon to hear kids playing outside at 9 pm or later.

The apartment is a few minutes walk from a good-sized grocery store, numerous restaurants, multiple subway stations, and Central Park, making it an ideal place to stay while visiting.

I stayed with Erica for 2 weeks and it was great! When I arrived at Erica's I was greeted by her delightful son as she was sunning it up on a beautiful beach! I was free to do what I want and when I want. The room was spotless and so comfy - I felt right at home. Amazing stay, I would definitely recommend staying here.

True to the description, Erika's place is an oasis of serenity in the city. Erika was a great host and really extended herself to make sure I was comfortable and felt welcome. Her apartment is absolutely lovely, spacious, very clean and tidy, as is the room. The apartment is just a few steps away from subway stations, restaurants and a great grocery store. Staying with Erika and her son was a wonderful experience; they are both lovely people. I had a great stay and would highly recommend.

Also, Erica makes a mean cup of Italian coffee.  If you stay with her, don't miss it!

Erika is a very good hostess, very friendly and polite.
His house is cozy and clean.
The area is quiet and close to subway.
Definitely the best choice for a nice stay in NY!

I stayed with Erika and Brandon for 5 months and I had the most amazing experience of my life. I would strongly suggest staying with them for long or short visits. The apartment was always clean and larger than the photos made it look. Erika helped me sort any problems that I had throughout my stay and with Brandon there, there was never a dull moment. I have made friends for life and hope to see them again soon.

Erika's stylish and welcoming Harlem home was the perfect place for me while I was transitioning out of New York. Erika is an awesome host (thank you again for the great conversation and the coffee), her house is a 5 minute walk to the ABCD trains, and there are so many great places to visit in her neighborhood. I stayed with Erika for 8 days, and my stay was exactly what I needed: a safe, quiet place to sleep that is not too far away from my job/school and close to public transportation. Thank you again Erika!

Words fail to adequately describe how amazing Erika is. Not only was her apartment and the room amazing, but Erika went above and beyond making me feel at ease and welcomed. She made a nice breakfast and killer coffee, and she even woke up before sunrise just to ensure I didn't sleep through my alarm for an early flight! 

Beyond being a great host,  Erika is one of the most honest and thoughtful people I've ever had the fortune of meeting. I will certainly be visiting, if not staying with, her the next time I'm in NY!

Erika's place is very well located in the vibrant Harlem, close to public transport, nice restaurants and coffee shops.
The house is actually bigger than it look in the pictures and Erika and her son Brandon made everything to make my stay pleasant. I would definitely recommend!
I had a truly wonderful stay! Erika is a great host, she was so kind and gracious and incredibly helpful. I can’t say enough good things about Erika and her home!

I had the privilege to stay with Erika for a whole semester and I can only say that this amazing experience would have never been the same without her. She is the warmest and most understanding person I know She is always there for you and really makes you feel like you're at home.

name: Cozy apartment 3 mins TAIWAI Subway
summary: This cozy apartment is abt 736 sqft, fully furnished, newly renovated and decorated. The apartment is equipped with anything you will need. It has two rooms, two washing rooms, one kitchen and one living (Website hidden by Airbnb) located in Taiwai, just 3 mins walk to Taiwai metro station.
space: Elegant, thoughtful design with modern convenience. Only one stop to Kowloon MTR station.
description: This cozy apartment is abt 736 sqft, fully furnished, newly renovated and decorated. The apartment is equipped with anything you will need. It has two rooms, two washing rooms, one kitchen and one living (Website hidden by Airbnb) located in Taiwai, just 3 mins walk to Taiwai metro station.
neighborhood_overview: This is center of Shatin district. It has everything from supermarket, restaurants, pharmacy, shopping mall, etc all within walking distance. Furthermore, it's surrounded by almost all kinds of local foods.
access: You'll have run of the whole apartment and access to the swimming pool on the ground.
house_rules: Just keep the apartment clean and tidy.

name: Ribeira Smart Flat
summary: Cosy flat in the Historic Center of Porto, very close to the Douro river and 5 minutes walking from Sao Bento station.
space: Cosy and comfortable flat with 3 rooms, kitchen, and a small bathroom with a bathtub, toilet and sink. 1 room with indirect lightning (natural light comes in through two high windows on the walls shared with other rooms). 2 rooms with direct lightning and nice view from the window with balcony. Wi-fi, bathroom, kitchen and living room. Big towels and shower products.  The apartment is on the first floor; the building is almost in front of the Sao Joao Court of Justice. No de Alojamento Local: 23296AL
description: Cosy flat in the Historic Center of Porto, very close to the Douro river and 5 minutes walking from Sao Bento station. Cosy and comfortable flat with 3 rooms, kitchen, and a small bathroom with a bathtub, toilet and sink. 1 room with indirect lightning (natural light comes in through two high windows on the walls shared with other rooms). 2 rooms with direct lightning and nice view from the window with balcony. Wi-fi, bathroom, kitchen and living room. Big towels and shower products.  The apartment is on the first floor; the building is almost in front of the Sao Joao Court of Justice. No de Alojamento Local: 23296AL It is a private apartment. It's all yours! We enjoy sharing tips about interesting activities and events that take place in Porto and show our guests nice and unusual places of this charming city. You will find a guide with a map in the apartment. We have also created a guide on Airbnb: look for the "Guide of Mathieu" on the Airbnb app.  There are amazing place to discover
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located in the heart of Porto's historical center, two minutes walking from the beautiful Douro river. This is a safe and typical neighborhood with all services and equipment, restaurants, bars, stores and more.
transit: We are 5 minutes from Sao Bento station. The apartment is on the 1st floor. By metro: from the airport take the metro until Trindade Station. Then take the yellow line, direction Santo Ovidio and stop at Sao Bento Station. By bus: from the airport, you can take the bus No 602 and stop at the final station, Cordoaria. There is a paying car park at 2 minutes, close to the Douro river. You can always find a spot in the street itself (with a bit of luck), but be careful with prohibited spots. We can always assist you with this!
access: It is a private apartment. It's all yours!
interaction: We enjoy sharing tips about interesting activities and events that take place in Porto and show our guests nice and unusual places of this charming city. You will find a guide with a map in the apartment. We have also created a guide on Airbnb: look for the "Guide of Mathieu" on the Airbnb app.  There are amazing place to discover.
house_rules: En accord avec la réglementation locale, nous vous demanderons de nous envoyer quelques informations d'identifications. Ces informations sont demandées par le Service aux Frontières Portugais. Fumeur: seulement sur le balcon Les animaux ne sont pas autorisés. Frais supplémentaire de 20 eur pour check in après 22h00. PAS DE CHECK IN APRÈS 00H00 Nous demandons aux hôtes de laisser l'appartement propre et de ne pas faire de bruit après 22h par respect pour le voisinage.

host.host_about:
Originally from France, I have always been keen to discover new countries and cultures. I lived 2 years in Australia where I studied at the University of Southern Queensland. After that I headed back to Paris, thinking to settle down there. After some times I decided to change my life and landed in Porto. I have been living here since 2010.
Since then, I did not manage to get back and got in love with Porto. The seagulls, the Douro and the amazing color of the sun set, will without a doubt, make you also fall in love with this beautiful city.
Make sure that you check out the little guide! There is some nice place to visit!

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments:
4 amis et moi avons loué l'appartement de Mathieu et y avons passé de très bons moments. Les chambres étaient propres et agréables. J'avais des doutes sur le bruit, mais la chambre dans laquelle j'étais étais super calme donc j'ai pu bien dormir. Quant à Mathieu, un hôte super sympa avec d'excellentes adresses (Adega Viuva pour un dîner et la capela incomun pour le reste de la soirée, notamment). 
Un grand merci et je n'hésiterai pas à revenir chez toi!
Mathieu has been very welcoming and adviced us about some restaurants around. The flat was perfectly clean and well located. I do recommend Mathieu and his flat.

Conversation with Mathieu was always quick and helpful. We didn't meet him during our stay but his friend Ana more than made up for that. Friendly welcome, lots of useful tips and she even brought us the world's most delicious lemon tart for Easter.
The rooms are small, but cosy and clean. Kitchen supplies are basic, but who wants to cook when there are authentic restaurants just around the corner. Biggest bonus of the flat is its location in the historic center. So close to everything you want to do and see in Porto. With a bit of luck and Ana's guidance we found free parking close by and then just walked every day.
Rainy days in March can be quite cold, so the electric heater in the flat was appreciated.

Nous avons passer un superbe séjour à Porto dans cet appartement très bien situé, parfait pour découvrir la ville à pied sans avoir besoin d'utiliser les transports en commun.
Mathieu nous a très bien accueilli. Il a été très arrangeant et nous a donné de nombreux conseils sur les visites et les restaurants.
A recommander!

L'appartement est bien situé, on peut tout visiter à pied, La rue est calme, les chambres sont claires et propres, la salle de bain est par contre assez petite. merci Mathieu pour les conseils et les adresses!

L'hôte a été très accueillant et très arrangeant.
L'appartement est très bien situé.
Je recommande.

En un mot PARFAIT ! Le logement correspondait aux photos, et à nos attentes : à savoir idéalement situé dans le centre de Porto, avec la possibilité de tout faire à pieds. Et en bonus, les conseils avisés de Mathieu qui ont tous fait mouche ! Merci encore !

Communication with Mathieu was super easy. We met Pierre who gave us the keys and he was incredibly helpful and friendly - he gave us lots of tips! He mentioned that the apartment had a few minor watch-outs: like unlocking the apartment door (however we had no issues at all) and you need to nudge the toilet bowl as it can get stuck (this was not a big deal). The beds were comfortable and the place was clean. The location of the apartment is perfect. The only downside is that there is construction work in front of the house and you can hear the neighbors - however this is not something that the host can fix :-) Thank you for letting us stay!
Very well located apartment in the centre of Porto, with welcoming hosts.

Mathieu's place was in a great location;  quiet street yet near the action.  The beds are very big and comfortable. Lots of rooms, big spaces (unlike the pictures), and still cheap. Great washing machine with balcony clothesline.  The  bathroom has a bathtub and a very nice sink. When we got there a friend of Mathieu's greeted us so don't worry if the profile pic doesn't match. He set us up with a map and local recommendations based on our needs and interests.

Mathieu ist ein sehr herzlicher und netter Gastgeber, auf jede Nachricht wurde sofort reagiert und die Schlüsselübergabe verlief reibungslos. Die Wohnung ist sehr schön und geschmackvoll eingerichtet und liegt direkt im Zentrum der Altstadt, so dass man sich gleich wie zu Hause fühlte. Super gerne wieder! Mathieu is a very nice and friendly host, in case of questions he response very quick and was very flexible and welcoming. His apartment is very nice and cozy and in the centre of the oldtown - it made me feel like home. Thank you again for making the short stay so great! :)

L'appartement est vraiment très bien situé au coeur du centre historique de Porto ce qui permet de presque tout visiter à pied. L'appartement est très joli, bien décoré, dans une rue très typique et charmante. Par contre, il est totalement insonorisé. Durant toute notre semaine de vacances, l'immeuble en face était en travaux. Tous les jours dès 8h du matin, nous avons eu le plaisir de partager le bruit des marteaux piqueurs et des marteaux. Ce fut très ennuyant et surtout très fatiguant. Autre petit bémol, si l'appartement est fait pour recevoir 6 personnes (3 lits 2 places), il est impossible de se réunir à 6 pour manger puisqu'il n'y a pas de table (à part une petite table en plastique pour 2 personnes). L'appartement est sinon bien exposé puisque le soleil donne sur le balcon une bonne partie de la journée.

This was a great place to stay. It's very roomie and comfortable. The apparent in general is great with modern rooms and a very modern kitchen, and the location is optimal for exploring the city with many restaurants and attractions within walking distance. Mathieu is great and was very quick to respond to any messages.
Great stay!

Appartement très bien situé au coeur de Ribeira, proche des principaux centres d'intérêt, des rues piétonnes, des restaurants etc. Il est situé dans une rue calme (malgré quelques travaux en face en ce moment).
L'appartement est conforme aux photos et propre. Nous y avons séjourné à 6 : les chambres et la pièce principale sont bien, cuisine et salle de bains sont un peu justes pour 6 personnes. Notamment, impossible de prendre un repas à 6 sur cette petite table et difficile de cuisiner (équipement minimal). Ceci dit, il est plus sympa de profiter des restaurants du quartier.
Mathieu nous a bien accueillis et nous a aidé à réserver un taxi pour notre départ.
Au final, bon séjour à Porto et bon souvenir de l'appartement.

We really enjoyed our stay in Porto. The apartment is within walking distance of the river , port caves, many restaurants, shops and Sao Bento train station. It is in a narrow cobbled street in the old part of the city where everything is either up or down hill so be prepared to walk everywhere which is the best way to discover all the hide local places. It is a short walk to get the bus # 500 to Matosinhos and the beaches on the Atlantic Ocean and the fresh fish restaurants where it is all cooked outside on the street.
The apartment was clean and comfortable and certainly adequate for our needs.
Nous avons passé un beau séjour à Porto dans l'appartement de Mathieu. Tout s'est déroulé comme prévu

Apartment is very well located in the heart of Porto and was comfortable. Construction outside is annoying, not an issue if you are out sightseeing all day but bring earplugs if you want to sleep in. Mathieu was easy to contact and resolved problems quickly.

Lovely apartment and the bedrooms are spread along a corridor which is nice for a feeling of privacy and space. Mathieu was very efficient and agreed to a late check-in at short notice which was much appreciated.

Logement très agréable, propre et très bien situé.
Matthieu est très sympathique et nous a bien renseignés.
Nous recommandons !

L'appartement est très bien situé, le chantier en face ne nous a pas trop dérrangé durant notre séjour. 
compte tenu des simples vitrages, je le déconseille aux gens trop sensibles au bruit... Personnellement, j'ai bien dormi.
Très bon contact avec Mathieu et appartement bien placé

Appartement bien situe mais avec forte odeur de moisi mobilier vieillot une seule SDB pour 5 minuscule
Literie mediocre et draps et oreillers douteux voir sales
Localização excelente e apartamento ok. Cheiro de cigarro estava forte e o banheiro é um pouco desconfortável. As roupas de cama poderiam ser mais novas.

Nice stay in Porto at this comfy apartment - we were a group of 4 friends and it was just right for our needs. Excellent location in Ribeira, close to some great bars and cafes and within walking distance of most of the old town and port cellars across the bridge in Gaia.
Lovely place!

Mathieu's space was in a lovely part of Porto, with very easy walking access to the city and the metro. We were there in the off season (late November), so things got quite chilly in the non-climate-controlled space, but otherwise we didn't have any complaints.

Very nice property at nice location.
Decent view of the river.
Very clean and spacious.
Host has been very friendly and helpful
Apartments are situated in a perfect location, MAthieu was easy to communicate with. The apartment itself was not very cozy: it was extremely cold, dark and linnen smelled of damp a bit..

Math's place is a nice location with walking access to great spots in Porto, and there is accessible parking just around the corner if needed. The space can be a bit chilly in the off season so make sure to pack plenty of layers. Math was very accommodating and great at communicating.
It was very central located , it was very nice the area , only it can be a little bit cold in winter
Very nice experience. Comfortable bedrooms, close to metro and bus stations. The owner is a very nice guy. Strongly recommend.
Super acceuil à porto grace à l'appartemet de matthieu. Tres bien placé, propre, je vous le recommande vivement.
Estuvimos 4 días en Porto, el alojamiento está genial en una zona super céntrica y pintoresca. El piso es luminoso y se duerme fenomenal. Repetiremos sin duda!

Amazing place and a great location.  A true European feel with wood work built in, bar space and balcony. Mathieu was a great host and provided a map of best restaurants and bars. His taste was on point for a great experience. Do not pass this place up.
Great apartment, very walkable location. Mathieu was kind and available.

This apt is in a great location with good natural light from the front. In between river and upper city - easy walk everywhere. Apt is a shabby chic style. Mathieu was helpful over phone but we did not meet him although he said to call if we needed anything. Would stay again if in Porto.
Bed linens could be of higher quality ( especially compared to a similar Airbnb in Lisbon). 
Kitchen is functional but there were not enough plates, mugs or wine glasses for the 5 of us so some extras would be nice. He left us a supply coffee, sugar, tea which was nice.
Bathroom is functional but tight - great shower and good hot water supply. Bath towels were heavy and fluffy.

We enjoyed our stay in a cozy apartement, really nearby the city life of Porto. Mathieu prepared a map where he marked all interest points of the city. The communication with Mathieu was always just in time and all statements reliable. Thanks!
Tres bon logement
Central apartment, friendly host who offers good tips and great support in case of questions.
Great apartment

Excellent ! Nous étions 4 amis du 20 au 23 mai . Le logement est proche des principales attractions . Matthieu s'est rendu disponible pour nous conseiller ( Merci pour les tripes, excellent conseil pour un végétarien ). Adresse à retenir !

Located in the center of Porto. Great for exploring the city. The apartment had good standard and was equipped with all necessities. 

We had a great stay
Perfekt für 3 Tage Porto! Zentral gelegen, klein aber fein, alles zu Fuss erreichbar. Viele Tips vom Gastgeber erhalten. Wir kommem irgendwann wieder ;-) nur nicht zu viel Portwein trinken...

Excellent location, very central so easy to get to anywhere, especially in Ribeira. Mathieu was a great host, very friendly & informative and gave us some great suggestions for places to go whilst in Porto.
Mathieu's place was a perfect spot in Porto, very cozy and close to everything! Mathieu was a great host. I highly recommend staying here!
Fantastic location in Porto. Very good value
Well located apartment and Mathieu was very helpful especially in recommending places to eat for my vegan daughter

Absolutely loved this apartment. Great size and perfect location. Mathieu was a great host, check in process was easy and he had many good suggestions for places to go etc (also very accommodating when we had to add another person a the last minute. Would recommend this place to anyone travelling to Porto!

Nous avons passé un super séjour dans l'appartement de Mathieu qui est très bien situé en plein centre du vieux Porto tout en étant dans une rue à l'écart de l'agitation et du bruit. Attention cependant à ceux qui aurait le sommeil très léger, l'isolation acoustique reste celle d'un vieil immeuble. Mathieu a été très accueillant et plein de bon conseils ! Nous recommandons !
Located in the very center of Porto, this flat will be perfect for the people who want to explore the city!
Lovely, clean apartment. Mathieu was a great host, providing lots of brilliant tips during our stay in Porto- would recommend staying with him.
By far, Mathieu are one of the best hoster I've ever met. He is so available and helped us beyond the expectations. The place is amazing, it's near of literary everything, for sure we'll be back.

Really enjoyed our stay at Mathieu's apartment in the Ribeira. A beautiful funky apartment full of charm and ideally located for visiting the Palacio da Bolsa and strolling the Ribeira but a quiet spot with a real neighborhood feel. Highly recommended.  Thanks too to Ana and Filippa at Cafe do Comercio.
Mooie ligging van het appartement, geweldige buurt dichtbij de boulevard. Goeie tips gekregen van Mathieu. Heerlijke stad met goed eten

Stayed here with our teenage children. Location is brilliant, close to everything you need including restaurants, shops, sites and transport.  As Central as it is to the key tourist area, it is quiet, and bright, but with the shutters closed nice and dark for sleeping.  Mathieu was easy to get hold of and made suitable recommendations on where to eat and what to do.  We liked it enough that we tried to stay longer, but unfortunately for us it was already booked out.  Would happily recommend to friends.
Great location, clean and spacious. Everything you will need.

The apartment is very nice and the location is perfect, to be in 5 minutes at the harbor or in the city center. We thank Mathieu also a lot for his insider tips to discoverPorto! :) Cheers, Basti and Björn
Great location and very helpful host . Everything was very easy to arrange . The flat was very clean .
Great location

Apartment is in a good location however road is very steep, much like most of Porto. We didn't meet Mathieu however he was accessible by message/phone and responded quickly, even booking a taxi to the airport for us. 
We used 2 of the 3 bedrooms and found the beds comfortable. Only 1 bedroom has external windows. The bathroom floor area is very small although the shower which is over a bath was roomy and had hot powerful water. Kitchen is roomy for cooking and has microwave, stove top and oven however the eating table is small and would struggle to seat more than 2 or 3.
Excellent new washing machine.  
Unfortunately the wooden stairs for entering the building and to the apartments mean it is noisy when people are coming and going and you could hear the people in the apartment above  walking around. Maybe an issue for light sleepers.
The apartments front rooms (lounge and a bedroom) have a bit of a view through to the river and to buildings in the distance which was nice especially at night seeing the lights. Close to Restauarnt Fado, the river and 10 mins walk with bags to Sao Bento train station and metro.
Отличная просторная квартира, 5 минут от центральной набережной, 10 минут от вокзала. Все удобства в наличии, классная гостиная с барной стойкой :) Рекомендую!
The place is exactly as advertised! Mathieu is very helpful. The place is well located, spacious and most importantly very clean. We enjoyed our stay in Porto very much.

L'appartement est idéalement placé pour découvrir à pied porto.
Matthieu est très à l'écoute et disponible

Perfectly located house, close to the river and the city center.

Mathieu is a great host, very easy and fast to communicate with and with great recommendations.

In general, good experience! Great great location, very friendly host, delicious breakfast, just loved the map and tips where to go. Only one problem - the place was inhumanly cold. No central heating, wind blowing through the windows and only tiny mobile heater. This shouldn’t be any problem for guests traveling during summer, but in December this was a big issue. Apart from that, all good!

Super séjour, merci pour l'accueil, le logement était super et Mathieu d'une disponibilité rare :)
Je ne peux que vous conseiller d'y aller

Logement typique, avec du cachet, et très bien placé dans Porto. 
Mathieu est un hôte sympa et attentionné, il nous a bien renseigné sur les divers lieux à visiter à Porto, et c'est montré disponible tout au long du séjour. 
Les chambres sont très bien, la cuisine et le salon aussi, en revanche la salle de bain est très petite pour un logement avec 3 chambres double.
Gran estancia con Mathieu! Sin duda para repetir. La ubicación inmejorable y el piso muy bueno.

Our stay at Mathieu's apartment has been great, specially his attention at every moment. He answered every doubt very quickly and he offered us everything needed. The apartment is very big, spacious and with a lot of daylight, specially the living room. 
Thank you!!

El piso esta muy ubicado. Mathieu fue muy atento con nosotros desde la llegada y nos dió muy buenas recomendaciones de cosas para hacer y lugares para visitar. El departamento es un poco frío aunque las camas tienen varias mantas. Sería bueno mejorar el espacio para comer, ya que es un poco pequeño e incomodo, pero si vas por pocas noches está bien.
Mathieu was a fantastic host and the place was absolutely lovely. I would definitely recommend his place to all who wish to see Porto! Will definitely be staying here next time I come to Porto.
Nice place very close to the city centre and river promenade. Mathieu is easy-going guy who will help you find local specialities and gives you valuable tips. Fully recommended.

Anfitrião muito educado e (Website hidden by Airbnb) boas recomendações de locais para passeios e visitas. Oferece um mapa da cidade no apartamento com um resumo do que podemos aproveitar durante a estadia. Limpeza excelente do apartamento.

Grand appartement très bien situé en plein coeur de la ville. Mathieu est très sympathique et réactif, il vous donnera les bonnes adresses locales!
Les bâtiments étant peu isolés au Portugal, quelques nuisances sonores sont possibles (bien que l'appartement soit dans une rue très calme), et si vous voyagez en hiver prévoyez des vêtements chauds étant donné l'absence de chauffage
Super Lage, super Preis schnelles Antworten:-) Danke Mathieu!
Mathieu was a great host! Super easy check-in, fast answers and last but not least a great appartment! Everything was as descriptet, super clean and in a great area in porto. Thanls for this stay!

Appartement spacieux très bien placé dans une ruelle calme depuis laquelle on aperçoit le Douro. Très propre à notre arrivée. Par contre nous avons récupéré les clés trop tard (18h30) et je déconseille cet appartement en hiver car il est dépourvu de chauffage. Nous avons eu très froid fin février malgré le beau temps.
Idéalement situé.

Appartement très bien situé. On peut faire toute les visites du centre à pied ou prendre les transports a communs pour les sites touristiques plus éloignés.    Mathieu nous a très bien accueillis et bien renseigné à notre arrivée.

The apartment is perfectly located in the heart of Porto and Mathieu is a very nice and helpful host. He answered our questions quick and gave us some interesting background informations about Porto. As we asked for a heater he was very kind and immediately organized one. We definitely recommend this location!
Logement en plein de cœur de Porto, tous les points d'intérêts accessibles à pied depuis l'appartement. Accueil très sympathique de la part de Mathieu !

Logement très bien placé entre le Douro et le centre ville. Confortable et tranquille.
Comme beaucoup d'appartements portugais, pas de chauffage dans le logement, mais un pull supplémentaire suffit pour un mois de mars.
Mathieu a de très bonnes adresses à proposer et a été dispo pour répondre aux questions pendant notre séjour.
Toutes les bonnes conditions étaient réunies pour passer un bon moment.
Merci encore.

In general, We had a great time staying in Mathieus flat. For the price it’s an awesome deal. The location is simply superbe (everything is within 10 minutes walking distance). Also Mathieu was a wonderful host providing us with lots of useful advice and information. The flat is neatly furnished although you have to realize the 4th bed is actually a very old sofa. In addition, the rooms do not have heating so at night it gets quite cold. 
However, if you’re looking for a budget solution in the heart of Porto it’s definitely worth a look.

Mathieu fue un gran anfitrion, la comunicacion fue excelente y el apartamento es tal cual aparece en el anuncio. Nos dejo una guia con lugares locales (bares, restaurantes, visitas, transportes...) con muy buenas recomendaciones. En general la estancia fue genial

We spent a week in lovely city of Porto.
There were totally four of us and the main plan was to attend Oporto Tattoo Festival and explore the city at the same time.

The apartment is located perfectly and it suited our needs as we figured.
Apartment has three bedrooms with double beds, kitchen and living room with a sofa to sleep aswell. 
You can access to balcony from living room and one of the bedrooms. 
Place was nice and tidy and had all the basic needs but no tv or stereo system to listen to music. That didn't bother us cause we spent most of the time outside. Apartment was bit cold but i guess all of the houses in Porto are. So take wool socks with you and you'll do just fine))

Mathieu was very friendly and helpfull fella and gave us tips and directions if we needed.

Overall the apartment is pretty much as descripted in the info.
So if you want to visit Porto at a decent price and excellent location and dont need a Television, this apartment is everything you need.

We really did enjoy our stay!
Nice and cozy apartment, located within walking distance of the historic center of Porto. Mathieu also provides good tips on local restaurants !

This centrally located apartment in the old town is close to the river and within walking distance of Porto’s main attractions. Yes there are hills and steep cobbled streets - that’s Porto. It is an old apartment with high ceilings, clunky windows and older style furniture, but it is clean, spacious and comfortable. 
Mathieu is an excellent host, quick to communicate and respond. He provided lots of local tips and arranged an alternative internet connection for us when there were problems with his internet service provider in the apartment. Very helpful.
We thoroughly enjoyed our stay here in Porto.

Logement très bien situé, conforme à la description.
Ville très agréable, chaleureuse.

We greatly enjoyed our stay at Matthieu's Flat. It is a large flat right located in the centre of Porto, up a very steep cobbled street adding to the historical feel of Porto. The historic part of Porto is made up of a number of steep hills, mainly cobbled. The Douro river is just down the road from the flat, together with the majority of the main attractions in Porto. 
The flat is quite cosy, with antique furniture, adding to the charm of the area. The flat has all the amenities as listed. The only issue for us I would say is that is no TV, but if this is not a necessity, then there is no issue.
Matthieu is super nice, helpful & responsive. He has placed a number of maps and information in the flat to help you get around. Matthieu was always available whenever we called or messaged and was super helpful. All in all, I would say this is a good choice.

I highly recommend staying in Mathieu's place. He went out of his way to accommodate our schedule for check in/out and gave great local recommendations. The place is in a prime location and very close to the train station. The place was clean and very spacious.
Excellent accueil, appartement spacieux et très bien situé ! Je recommande !

Mathieu was a great host - so communicative and quick to respond. The space is beautiful and so close to everything. We had more than enough space. The neighborhood is lovely and the people are so friendly. The packet of local spots to check out was very helpful too. We loved our stay in Porto!

호스트가 친절합니다 깨끗하고 상밴투랑 강가에 가기 좋아요
집이 오르막에 있어요 캐리어 끌기 힘듭니다
워낙 이 동네가 오르막 내리막이 많아서 그 정도는 감안하셔야해요 ㅠㅜ
3박했는데 처음 한 번은 근처 까페에서 무료로 아침을 준비해 줍니다 진짜 맛있어서 이후에도 거기서 사 먹었어요
Remarquablement placé, très bons conseils et accueil,
localisation parfaite ;-) merci mathieu
It is a very large flat with lots of space and the location is excellent! The downside was that the bathroom was quite tight and that two of the bedrooms are not very well ventilated.

Mathieu was very accommodating! We had arrived several hours earlier, and he let us drop off our bags and  stay at the place even though it wasn't ready. He was also very quick to respond to messages. The place itself was very nice and unique. It is near to everything, and there is a market a few blocks away. I highly recommend you stay here! We had a great time. Thanks Mathieu!
Hôte disponible par tel , emplacement calme et très central.

Endroit sympathique et très bien situé pour visiter la plus part des sites touristiques , un très bon accueil et une effective communication me permette sans hésitation de recommander Ribeira Smart Flat.
Amazing flat in a great location in Porto also an amazing host thank you for having us x

An airy, clean, pretty flat - ideal for families or friends - in an excellent location for exploring all that the beautiful  city of Porto has to offer. 
Pop round the corner to Café do Comercio for the best breakfast and start to your day!
Nice apartment in great location.
Mathieu is a great host! He was super helpful with everything we needed during our stay.
Simply great!

Really charming apartment, right in the centre of things. You could hear the gulls calling, and one afternoon, a bunch of guys singing folksongs in the restaurant below! Close walk (up and down hills - it is Porto, after all) to lots of tourist attractions, while retaining a very local, neighbourhood feel. Highly recommended!
Very well located and attractive apartment which was a great base from which to explore Porto. Mathieu is a very attentive host.
Mathieu's place is in a great location, really central to historic part of Porto.  Easy walking distance to the river where music and entertainment is provided daily and nightly.
Excellent accueil, appartement bien placé

The place is well located and had enough space for our group of five people, it wasn‘t loud in the nights and fitted our needs.

Mathieu is a really good host which reacts fast on messages and help you out if you have a question. There is a small city guide which he created with nice places to eat or visit. He will write you also when something interesting is going on in the city. 

Thanks for hosting us! :)

Mathieu”s Place is in a perfect location for exploring Porto which we did mainly by foot. There’s are loads of places to eat and drink nearby and Mathieu was really helpful with regular tips about the best places locally and further afield. The old town where the apartment is , is a great place to explore but it’s really worth venturing elsewhere also and the buses are good and easy to use. We went to the beaches several times using the 500 bus. The flat itself is a perfect size for 6 people and there is a bed settee I believe but we didn’t use it. I think more than 6 would be overcrowded. Every thing we needed was provided. We didn’t need to ask Mathieu for any changes but he was very approachable and friendly and I am certain he would sort any problems out quickly. He sent us regular messages with ideas for things to do and places to go. Although we didn’t do everything he suggested it was really lovely to have the thoughtful messages.
Very central location easy walk to everywhere. Comfy beds, good value
Very nice accommodation in the middle of the center. Just 5 minute to walk to the river.
Very Good Place to stay in the centre of Porto. Mathieu is very helpful and gives good tipps for events and Restaurants in the City
Mathieu was a great host. Very flexible and super helpful!
Central appartment, very good for 2-3 Young people
Very comfortable beds, great location and very efficient and responsive host.

We had such an amazing stay at Mathieu's place in Porto. The location per perfect-- easy walking distance to the river and all other destinations we wanted to hit around the city-- and Mathieu's flat was so clean and comfortable. Check in was very convenient, and Mathieu responded to all of our messages/questions so quickly. Highly recommend staying here!!!

Mathieus apartment was in the most central part of Porto.3 min walk to River area and literally 5 min from a lovely area with restaurants and shops. Mathieu was an amazing host. Super helpful and had great tips for us. His communication was excellent from booking stage throughout stay. He speaks a good English and it helped us a lot. The Apartment was very comfortable and we had everything we needed. We shall certainly recommend Mathieu as a super host!

Lovely flat to stay in and a short walk from the majority of sights to see. Mathieu was an attentive and responsive host, always responding shortly after we asked him a question. He had great recommendations for things to see that are less touristy and even helped me find a store where I could print a boarding pass for my flight home. The apartment itself is cozy and well appointed. The beds are comfortable and all of the amenities worked very well. Definitely recommend staying here if you are looking for a home base while you are visiting Porto.

El piso, salvo el baño, es tal y como aparece en las fotos. Con muchísima personalidad, encanto, muy auténtico. Todo muy limpio, la ropa de cama, toallas.. La situación es perfecta.Ahí un 10. En pleno centro, cerca de todo!! Si tienes suerte puedes aparcar en la misma calle del piso y sin pagar nada, lo que es un punto grande a favor. El anfitrión genial, super amable, disponible para cualquier cosa, te ayuda en lo que necesites, te recomienda buenos lugares para comer... Como puntos negativos a tener en cuenta, porque a mi me hubiera gustado saberlo.El baño es mínimo, muy muy pequeño, uno solo se mueve con dificultad y ahora en otoño invierno hacía frío dentro de él, para (Website hidden by Airbnb) un piso antiguo, que como la mayoría  no cuenta con calefacción, el dueño te proporciona un calefactor portátil de ruedas, pero no es suficiente y nosotras no somos frioleras para nada. Para ir en meses de calor lo recomiendo sin duda, pero ahora mismo, salvo que, al menos cada habitación contase con un calefactor, no lo puedo recomendar. Son pisos que se quedan fríos, no nos hizo nada de sol, que hubiera calentado  la cristalera.. y hacia más calor en la calle que dentro. Te despertabas por la mañana y toda la casa estaba congelada, para desayunar en la sala no era muy confortable... Creo que son puntos a tener en cuenta y que es importante saber.

El apartamento de Mathieu se encuentra en pleno centro de Oporto, es ideal para pasar unos días con la familia o amigos. El anfitrión nos ofreció flexibilidad a la hora de hacer la entrada y salida y mantuvo buena comunicación con nosotros en todos momentos. Sin duda lo recomiendo!
Casa con 3 habitaciones 3 camas dobles, ubicacion perfecta cerca de todo, tambien tiene un "mueble bar" por llamarlo de alguna manera que le da muchisima personalidad a la sala.

Mathieu's place is just as advertised. It's quiet and calm, tucked away on a little street, but with easy walking access to anywhere we wanted to go in Porto from the shops to the riverfront. There weren't too many extra frills in the flat --  it had everything we needed for a weekend -- but the space was fun and a bit quirky, so we really liked hanging out in it, especially when it rained for a good few hours! That wasn't Mathieu's fault, though :) This place is great for friends traveling who want their own bedroom. Check-in was easy, with one of Mathieu's friends, and then we were good to go. Don't hesitate!

Très bien accueillie par Mathieu qui nous a également conseillé quelques adresses! Emplacement ideal dans la ville. proche de la station São Bento et de la zone Ribeira avec beaucoup de restos, bars et caves de Porto le long du Douro.
Really nice apartment in a very good location. Mathieu is a pleasant host. Would definitely book this apartment again.

Appartement agréable au calme et très bien placé, nous avons tout visité à pied et pris le bus pour la digue face à l’océan -:), de nombreux conseil de Mathieu à l’arrivée et de l’aide pour le départ ! merci
Very nice apartment in the centre of Porto. Nearby the river and beautiful bridges. Mathieu was very helpfull. Recommend this place!
Great apartment and location.  Very comfortable beds!  Mathieu was a great host.

The apartment is spacious and in a great location. Matthieu was very helpful - he gave plenty of tips for visiting Porto and was easy to communicate with. The apartment was a little bit cold although the host did make the effort to put a heater in

Great flat, and really good value for the money. Our host was very helpful and responded quickly. The location is very well situated within the city. Everything you want to see is only a short walk away. (I'd reccomend the Hungry Biker for breakfasts!) 
Thanks Mathieu!!

Really nice place! Mathieu is one of the best host who I have ever seen! He has perfect recommendations for travelers! 
We enjoyed our staying there! Thanks a lot!

name: Charming Apartment,perfect Location
summary: Charmoso quarto e sala, privativo, finamente decorado, com uma deliciosa cozinha americana totalmente equipada. Aqui você encontrará tudo para tornar sua estadia mais agradável e divertida.
space: It is a bedroom and living room, charming, private, finely decorated,  with a delightful fully equipped kitchen and a good bathroom. Here you will find everything to make your stay more pleasant and enjoyable. Great location with views over the sea, 200 meters from the beach, 500 meters from the subway and 400 meters South of the River (a major shopping malls in the city). Near tothe building there is a bike lane with a bike hire point, one of the best ways to walk around in the south zone. Local with extensive trade and good transport links in general. Apartment with: * 1 Queen bed box (ultra confortable) * 1 sofa bed  * Bed linen and towels with excellent quality * Air Conditioning at the bedroom * Ceiling Fans * Cabinets * Digital safety box * 2 TVs  * NET (cable TV) * Wireless Internet - 10MB * kitchen stove and oven, refrigerator duplex, microwave...  Values do not include the period of Carnival, New Year, Rock & Rio, World Cup and Olympics among other big events. Diarist and resp
