neighborhood_overview: There are a lot of bars, restaurants, supermarkets, bakery, banks... It´s very near to the Copacabana beach, Sugar loaf, and a good shopping Center too.
notes: 1) Enjoy the apartment 2) Enjoy Rio 3) Come back soon
transit: Buses, taxis, metro and bicicle, that you can rent near to the building
access: The full apartment
interaction: I like to do some programs with my guests. It depends on my time and if you are open for this.
house_rules: 1.O apartamento situa-se em edifício residencial. Não é permitido fazer barulho no apartamento que possa incomodar os vizinhos. (Lei do Silêncio (22:00 Hs)  2.Crianças acima de 5 anos, contam como uma pessoa. Mais de uma criança menor de 5 anos também contam como uma pessoa. 3. Se você tem um visitante, você é responsável por ele. Não é permitido circulação de pessoas com trajes desapropriados no corredor e na portaria do prédio. Quando houver reclamação de um morador, ou o porteiro ver alguma atitude errada, o síndico do edifício pode aplicar uma advertência ou uma multa. O valor da multa pode variar entre U$ 70,00 e U$ 200,00 , e esse valor será pago por você. Caso haja reincidência, você deverá deixar o apartamento sem qualquer tipo de reembolso. 4.Assim que você chegar ao apartamento, deverá preencher um formulário de registro com suas informações. Este formulário é necessário para registrar o nome das pessoas que estarão no apartamento e permitir o acesso ao prédio. Não é permitid

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.host_about:
Olá,

Estou no Airbnb desde 2011 e sou um grande fã da Plataforma. Tudo que conquistei foi graças ao sucesso no Airbnb!

Minha experiência começou quando recebi um flat da minha avó através de herança (em vida!!), investi pesado na reforma do apartamento para poder oferecer o maior conforto possível aos meus hóspedes. Comecei a administrar seu aluguel e o sucesso foi tão grande que mudou a minha vida!

Meus amigos e familiares viram como o meu “negócio” estava dando certo e começaram a pedir para que eu também administrasse o aluguel dos apartamentos deles (nessa época ainda não existia a figura do co-host). 

Topei o desafio e o número de apartamentos foi se multiplicando! O resultado foi ótimo e percebi que me sentia muito realizado com as experiências que estava ganhando como empreendedor e ao conhecer pessoas de tantos lugares do mundo! De tal maneira que decidi largar meu emprego como gestor em marketing para me dedicar exclusivamente a vocês!

Fiz um curso de guia de turismo para ter mais conhecimento sobre a cidade e abri a All in Rio, uma Agência de Turismo que oferece tours culturais, naturais e de aventura, além do aluguel de apartamentos de temporada.

Meu objetivo é oferecer uma estadia segura, confortável e poder fornecer todas as informações necessárias para você desfrutar ao máximo a sua experiência em nossa cidade maravilhosa! 

Obrigado pela atenção!

Fabio

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Hi!

I've been on Airbnb since 2011 and I’m a big fan of the Platform. All I got was thanks to my success on Airbnb!

My experience began when I received a flat from my grandmother through inheritance (in life!!). I invested heavily in the renovation of the apartment to be able to offer the greatest comfort possible to my guests. I started managing the rent and the success was so amazing that it changed my life!

My friends and family noticed how well my "business" was going and started to ask me to manage their apartment’s rent too (at the time, the figure of  the co-host didn’t exist).

I accepted the challenge and the number of apartments was multiplying! The result was great and I realized that I felt very fulfilled with the experiences I was gaining as an entrepreneur and by meeting people from so many places in the world! So I decided to leave my job as a marketing manager to dedicate myself exclusively to you!

I took a tour guide course to gain more knowledge about the city and opened the All in Rio, a Tourism Agency that offers cultural, natural and adventure tours, as well as apartments for seasonal rents.

My goal is to offer you a safe and comfortable stay and to be able to provide all the information necessary so you can enjoy your experience in our wonderful city to the fullest!

Thank you for your time!

Fabio
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Comments from my guests:

“This apartment is in the most amazing location. Leblon is beautiful, safe, and packed with fabulous restaurants. The apartment is just by the ocean - couldn't really be better. Communicating with Fabio was super-easy. He was really responsive and helpful. We are missing it already!” - Ed Pilkington (UK)
“Fabio goes far and beyond the average host, my trip was a day earlier than I booked and I would have been stuck with no place to stay but Fabio personally went out of his way to get the place ready for me, great guy and will always go to him first when traveling to Rio. Thank again Fabio abs!!” - Darren Sanford (USA)
“O apartamento é lindo como nas fotos e a localização é perfeita! O Fábio é super atencioso e respondeu super rápido nossas dúvidas. Recomendo muito!” - Bruna Ferrary Deniz (Brasil)
“The apartment was better than we could have imagined. The photos don't do it justice. The place is huge, in a great location. Fabio was a very accommodating host. I would definitely stay there again.” - Jordan Giordano (USA)
“Our stay at Fabio’s place was fantastic! The apartment is simply beautiful and it made us feel at home. Super stylish and cozy. We are very particular about the properties we stay at, and this one exceeded our expectations The apartment description was very accurate! We loved being so close to the beach and all the great restaurants around. Thank you very much!”- Pablo Perez (Canadá)
“Fabio was a perfect host.  He answered promptly all our questions and is a really nice guy!”- Daniela (Brasil)
 “Fabio is the perfect host. Friendly and extremely helpful”.- Soren (Denmark)
 “It is really difficult for me to put down in words how grateful I am to Fabio! He is a wonderful host and a GREAT person!”- Justine (Dubai)
“Más que anfitriones, hicimos una linda amistad. Gracias por todo... “- Leo y Aura (Colombia)
“Fabio is a very friendly and considerate person and clearly takes great care of the apartment”.- Jonathan (Spain)
“New to Rio? You should definitely speak to these guys.”- Vitaly (Russia)
 “Fabio is an amazing host with a deep concern for his guests' comfort. We feel that we now have a good friend in Rio!”- Ali (Canada)

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments: Binho and Deia are great hosts! The apartment ist perfect - clean, cozy and comfortable. Great location, great people - we are definitely coming back!

My boyfriend and I stayed at Binho's place and we couldn't have asked for a better experience. The apartment is small but comfortable. It is clean, modern and up to date. It is close to EVERYTHING. There are bars, bakeries, restaurants and pharmacies at your doorstep. Binho was an incredible host. Upon arriving, he gave us suggestions and tips about things to do throughout our stay. I can't thank them enough for having made our stay unforgettable. Thank you!

Fabio was a good host, he gave us very useful recommendations for our trip. The apartment was exactly as seen in the photos. Very close to the beach and very easy to get to all the tourist sites. At night it was noisy, a lot of load music from the place across the street. We had no internet in the apartment but Fabio was solving the issue. We had a very god time.
O aparatmento realmente é como está nas fotos.

I'd like to recommend dear Fabio to everyone as a special helpful and absolutely fantastic friendly host! Thank you so much for everything! The apartment in Copacabana is really cozy, full of light, extremely convenient and very good located. If I am back to Rio, it could be the only place I stay. Fabio, thank you very much indeed and thanks a lot to your wife!

The apartment was excellent and Fabio was a wonderful host. It was our first time in Rio so Fabio gave us great advice on what to see and do during our stay. Overall great experience.
Thanks

I had the most amazing time in rio (Website hidden by Airbnb) apartments were fantastic,they were exactly the right spot close to everything and just a small walk to the beach were FIFA fan fest was which was great.fabio and his support crew were there in a blink of eye if I needed them and it surely made my stay  that little bit easier.the neighbour hood was great  safe and  vibrant with the World Cup on the Brazilian  people sure know how to put a party on.lots of fun and an experience I will never forget.thankyou Fabio from Ben de Marco .
This apt was great and Fabio was very organised, professional and friendly. The apt itself is in a great location, very tastefully decorated and I would definitely stay here again when back in Rio.
O apartamento é exatamente como na foto. Super limpo e arejado. Possui todos os utensílios necessários.

Let me start by saying that I loved the apartment. The place is cozy and immaculate. Other than the bed being a bit stiff, I loved being in the apartment. The water was hot, the wi-fi worked perfectly. The only negative that I had about the room was the noise. 

The unit is situated on the 2nd floor of the building right outside a busy street. Every night around midnight, two bars would open up across the and start blaring music. The music would not stop until 8am the next morning. I ended up having to buy a white noise machine just to last through the night.

The only other feedback I had was around Fabio, the host. All of the reviews mentioned how responsive and helpful he was. However that was not the case for me. The day I booked, I couldn't get him to respond to the booking. I even had to have AirBnB call him. And then I asked him about touring the city. Instead of offering, he pointed me to a few self serve options. When I asked again, he said he would plan a trip then never responded. When I responded to him, he said he was too busy and my trip was over. 

Fabio being my tour guide is not a huge requirement, but I had thought he would be more willing (or suggest someone), given the feedback people had for him o this site.

All in all, great place if you don't mind the noise and don't need a helpful host.

Fabio a été adorable.
Il nous a merveilleusement bien accueilli.
Il est très serviable et très gentil.

Fabio is a lovely host and helped point out all the best things to see and do in Rio. This apartment was great, I stayed their on my own and felt very safe. Literally 2 minutes for Copacabana beach. Great flat. A little noisy outside but a very vibrant area.

Thank you Fabio once again! This is the second time that I have rented from Fabio and it has been again a great experience. The apartment is immaculate and in a great location! I look forward to renewing my rentals with Fabio. Communication was very easy and Fabio will make sure you are well accommodated!!

Sem dúvida uma das melhores recepções e serviços que já recebemos!!!!! Primeira vez que usamos o AirBnb. Foi sensacional. O Fábio, que nos recebeu e fez toda parte de receptivo, foi sensacional!!!!!! Nota 10. Super maleável com entrada e saída... Nos ajudou em tudo. Impecável. Mais que recomendo!!!!! Apartamento maravilhoso... Exatamente como nas fotos!!!!! Tudo de primeira. Localização perfeita... Perto de tudo!!!!!!!
Todo excelente! El apartamento es igual a las fotos, todo se encontraba en orden y funcionamiento!

Fabio war wirklich ein sehr aufmerksamer Gastgeber, den man schon im Vorfeld mit allen Fragen zur Wohnung behelligen konnte. Auch einen kostengünstigen Taxi Transfer vom Flughafen zur Wohnung hatte er organisiert. Die Wohnung liegt wirklich sehr zentral in einem sicheren Haus, dessen einem top Zustand, und mitten an der Copacabana gelegen. Für eine Erkundungstour von Rio wirklich eine top Lage. die Wohnung entspricht exakt dem was an Fotos und Beschreibung angegeben wurde. Einziger kleiner kritischer Einwand ist, dass gegenüber der Wohnung eine Disco ist, in der zumindest am  Wochenende die ganze Nacht Betrieb ist, was man in der Wohnung doch sehr hört: Alles in allem aber eine top Unterkunft, und uneingeschränkt weiter zu empfehlen!
O apto é super aconchegante, tudo limpo e de bom gosto. O único problema foi o barulho durante a madrugada.

O Fábio é show. Ótima recepção. O apartamento é ótimo. O prédio é antigo, mas o apartamento é novo, bem decorado, cama ótima, dois televisores com tv a cabo, e banheiro muito bom. O apartamento é nota dez! Bem localizado, pra que vai andar e conhecer Copacabana e o Leme, é tudo perto e bem localizado. O único problema é um bar que fica em frente a janela do quarto. Tem dias, não todo dia, principalmente fim de semana,  que tem barulho e música a noite toda. Mas, creio que no futuro, se for possível colocar uma janela acústica ali, o problema fica resolvido. O apartamento que já é ótimo,  ficará excelente.  Obrigado, por tudo Fábio. Foi top. Abraços.

El departamento es divino! Todo nuevo, muy bien ambientado, cómodo y súper equipado. De verdad lo disfrutamos. La ubicación es muy buena, a 1 cuadra de la playa de Copacabana. Estar cerca el día de año nuevo donde hay tanta gente en copacaba fue importante! La atención de Fabio es súper buena, nos ayudo en todo! Muchas gracias

Fabio was a wonderful host. We arrived much earlier than the check in time so Fabio let us leave our luggage at his home and then brought our bags to the apartment for us when it was ready. He was incredibly helpful and gave us lots of great suggestions about what to do during our stay in Rio. If we had any queries during our stay Fabio was easily contactable. The apartment itself was fantastic. It is bright and modern and has everything you need. The location is perfect, very close to the beach, supermarkets, restaurants etc. Would highly recommend!

Great host who welcomed us and provided us with valuable information on activities and things to see in Rio. The apartment was fantastic which has been recently renovated. It's location is great and within walking distance to the beach. Highly recommend.

El departamento es tal cual la publicación, muy hermoso y en perfectas condiciones! Fabio nos esperó en la puerta y fue muy amable con nosotros. Nos explicó todo lo que podíamos hacer y como movernos por la cuidad. La ubicacion es buena por tener la playa a una cuadra pero tiene dos bares justo enfrente que no son nada lindos y no cerraban hasta las 11 am . El resto todo bien!

Fabio was an amazing host and I would definitely recommend him.  After meeting me at the property, he made sure to answer all of my questions and gave me some tailored suggestions for the rest of my trip.  He was very informative and all of his suggestions were great.   After learning that my flight was late after checkout, he even offered to let me leave my luggage at his office until my flight! The apartment was absolutely perfect; extremely clean, well kept (new everything), cold air conditioner, well stocked, and just as nice as in the pictures.  It was actually well beyond my expectations.  

One thing to note is that there will be a bit of noise, but if you are looking to stay right in the heart of Copacabana this close to the beach, I'm sure this shouldn't be a surprise as this is the most active part of the city.  Also, my stay was right around Carnaval so this might not always be the case.
Fabio's apartment was great! Exactly how it looks in the pictures. It met all of our needs for carnaval, especially being 2 blocks from copa cabana beach. Fabio was a great host, very helpful.

We had a very nice stay in Rio with Fabio. The apartment looks the same as on the pictures, modern and nice, with all the things that we need, even with a washing machine and a dryer. It is a bit noisy, because there are 2 after-party places opposite to the windows, but I could sleep easily. 
The ocean is just a block from the apartment, where you can enjoy the Copacabana beach. There are a lot of restaurants and bars close to the apartment, you can trust in Fabio's recommendation, we liked all the places that he recommended us! 
Fabio is a great host, he arranged us not only private taxis from and to the airport, but also helped us with answering many questions that we had, and find a dentist when we had a tootache issue!
Thank you very much Fabio, and we recommend to everybody to stay in his apartment!

Alles war zu unserer besten Zufriedenheit!
Bei unserem ersten Treffen hat er uns Tipps gegeben, was wir uns unbedingt anschauen sollten und wie wir dort am besten hinkommen.
Es war alles sauber und genau wie auf den Bildern abgebildet.

Sehr gerne wieder!

Nossa estadia no Rio foi muito boa. O apartamento é super bem decorado o banheiro é muito bom e tivemos uma ótima experiência. É bem localizado e super perto da praia com uma boa segurança. A limpeza foi exemplar e o Fábio foi super simpático e atencioso deu muitas dicas boas sobre o RJ e a comunicação foi ótima recomendo e ficaria de novo se voltar ao Rio.

El departamento es espectacular.  Muy bien equipado.  Cama y sillón muy cómodos.  Buena ducha. Buena ubicación cerca del metro y la playa.  Lo único para mencionar es que había un bar en frente con música un poco alta, mas que nada porque tengo una bebé.  Pero Fabio 10 puntos, predispuesto para ayudar, recomendar lugares, trajo mapas y nos mencionó todo lo que hay que hacer en Río. Qué vale la pena y que no. Super recomendable!

Fabio is super nice and helpful host. He spent too much time for us to explore the city and gave very nice tips. 

The place is so clean, very stylish, safe and practical. You have all you need. Like as written, very charming. 

The location is just perfect, literally close to everything.  The only comment about the neighborhood is, there are two bars which are open from midnight to morning, very close to the house. All the voices from the bars are in the house until the morning. 

I would definitely recommend this place.  Thanks again Fabio!

Esta fue nuestra primera experiencia en Airbnb, y estamos muy satisfechos!! la atención de los anfitriones (Marta en representación de Fabio) fue EXCELENTE!!! muy predispuesta y atenta, nos orientó acerca de como movernos en Río y que cosas hacer, respondiendo a nuestras inquietudes. El departamento es tal como en las fotos, agradable, cómodo y muy bien equipado, lo encontramos limpio y en perfecto orden. La ubicación es excelente! Próximo a supermercados, micros y subte a 5 cuadras. El único pequeño inconveniente son los bares de esa calle, ruidosos por la madrugada. Pero sin duda, lo recomendamos!!!

Fabio is a true professional. I arrived 2 hours early and he accommodated me. I'm familiar with Rio but he sent me to a couple of places I had never been before and they were excellent!.. the apartment is great but if you are a light sleeper it might not be for you, but who sleeps in Rio?!...I really enjoyed my stay.. Thank you Fabio

El apartamento está en excelentes condiciones, tal como lo muestra en la foto. La ubicación es muy buena, cerca a todo en Copacabana, y es fácil encontrar el metro o un bus para ir a otros lugares de la ciudad. Fabio fue muy amable a nuestra llegada y nos dio indicaciones muy importantes que nos permitieron conocer lugares excelentes durante nuestra estadía en Rio.

El apartamento es muy bonito y tal como lo ven en las fotos.

La ubicación es perfecta, a sólo una cuadra de la playa!!!

El internet es rápido...lo mejor, la lavadora/secadora!!!

Fabio es un guía que conoce Río y nos dio buenos datos para conocer Río en 3 días. 

En conclusión me gustó mucho mi estadía en el apartamento!!!

Muito obrigado Fabio!!!

Fabio is an excellent host, not only welcoming but full of extremely useful advice for people visiting Rio for the first time. Gave us a proper introduction not only to the apartment, but took the time to explain and give us tips how to get around and what are the must sees in the city.  The apartment was far nicer then the pictures lead on, excellent location & neighborhood which is only a 3-4 minute walk from the beach.

O apartamento é muito legal. Super moderno, limpo e muito bem localizado. Fica apenas 1,5 quarteirões da praia de Copacabana. O Fábio foi extremamente atencioso conosco e nos atendeu prontamente todas as vezes. O único ponto negativo é o barulho que uns barzinhos fazem na rua, mas segundo  o proprietário ele já providenciou janelas anti ruídos para eliminar os  barulhos noturnos. De qualquer forma eu recomendo!!!
Wonderful and cozy apartment! Everything works well. I recommend it.

Fabio and Andrea were great hosts. They gave us many helpful tips where to spend time and where to eat.  The apartment fit the description, great location, safe neighborhood. Apartment was clean and well equipped.

Fabio was extremely welcoming and accommodating! We arrived extremely early in the morning and he still allowed us to check in. He recommended a number of restaurants and things for us to do! He even organised a Favela tour. The apartment is beautiful and in great location! Would definitely go back again

Fabio's apartment was great. Very clean, modern and in an excellent location. It was only a 3 minute walk to the beach and 10-15 minutes to the Subway to get to Centro. Fabio was very helpful with giving us tips about the city and promptly responded to our questions. We will definitely be recommending this place to any of our friends who travel to Rio.

Fabio's apartment is as beautiful and clean as you can see on the pictures. We had a great time there! The location really close to the Copacabana beach and not far from a metro station was very convenient too. 
We did not get to meet Fabio as he was abroad when we got to Rio but we have been welcomed by a very nice and helpful lady who spoke French very well and gave us great tips about the city.
El departamento esta muy bien, las fotos son lo que parecen. Todo funciona perfecto y esta bien ubicado. Fabio es muy amable y dispuesto a colaborar con lo que necesitemos.

Fabio's apartment was just what we were looking for. Great location a few minutes walk from copacabana beach and not far to the metro station to get around. Fabio met us when we arrived and gave us lots of good advice about what to see and when to go to attractions. The apartment itself was very nice, spotless and fully equipped with all you could need.

Fabio greeted us at the apartment and gave us a tour of not only the vicinity but also the neighborhood. I was glad he showed us places to go and see and also how to get there. He also gave great advice on places to stay away from. He also will help arrange transportation to and from the airport.
Very kind and knowledgeable host. Great and clean apartment. Would absolutely recommend this!

A fantastic apartment in central location at Copacabana! Fresh, functional, well equipped and safe. Beach, supermarkets, taxis, and restaurants, all minutes away from the apartment. Fabio is a very helpfull and professional host, assisting with whatever you need for your stay!

Fabio was a great host, he responded to any questions we had promptly. His apartment was in a great neighborhood  close to everything you could want. Bakery open 24/7 down the street with delicious goodies. The apartment itself was very modern and perfect for what we needed to use it for the week. Doormen that manages the flow of people coming in and out of the place so we felt very safe.  Would love to stay here again if we come back to rio!

Fabio fue un excelente host. A pesar de que llegamos a una hora diferente el estuvo ahí para recibirnos y darnos toda la información. El apartamento es exactamente como se ve en las fotos y mejor. El barrio de Copacabana ya es algo antiguo y es un poco comercial pero el apartamento, y su comodidad definitivamente hicieron de nuestra estadía una experiencia inolvidable en Rio. Espero volver pronto. Gracias AirBnB!
Well located and cozy apartment just the pictures!

Fabio estaba esperando en el departamento a la hora acordada, con muchos datos útiles de que hacer y donde ir.  El departamento era muy lindo, tal como se veía en las fotos.  Fabio también ayudó con la movilización al aeropuerto, excelente su disposición. Muy recomendado.

Avenida pra do júnior is a really interesting street! During a week there was live samba and then a small orchestra playing right outside our window.

Very close to several supermarkets, bars and restaurants, bus stops and of course Copacabana beach. 

The apartment was very clean (if a little dark because there's only one window) the mattress was really comfortable, air conditioning worked really well. Fabio was a helpful host with giving suggestions about where to go all around Rio on a map.

Unfortunately we were a little late meeting up with Fabio due to the fact that we asked the information desk at the airport how to find the airport shuttle bus and they dircected us to "a blue bus service" (which turned out to be the local bus and took about 2 and a half hours to get to Copacabana Beach in the traffic).  Fabio was understanding about our delay but we were a bit embarassed that we had kept him waiting.  The apartment was  centrally located (within walking distance to the beach), clean, modern, and compact with 24 hour security.  We don't speak any Portugese but Fabio was able to communicate with us in English and was extremely helpful in providing all relavant information including a map.  He suggested restaurants, how to purchase tickets for tourist attractions and marked most things out on the map.  He also suggested visiting the hippy markets that are open on Sundays - which we really enjoyed.  Fabio was a wonderful, helpful host and it was obvious he wanted us to enjoy his apartment and our trip to Rio.  Only bug bear was spare towels (ie none are provided).  Our bath towels got wet after the 1st day and although we hung them out to dry on the balcony - they didn't really get dry.  I think the problem was a little to do with us - we had just finished a cruise and linen was plentiful so we became a little spoilt - anyway we adjusted our routine (used the hand towels) so it wasn't a major problem.  Rio was fantastic, a really interesting place to visit.  I am sure anyone wishing to go to the Olympics stay at Fabio's - he is very helpful.  He arranged our transport getting back to the airport which worked out perfectly.  Thanks Fabio for the wonderful stay - love love loved it!  Ros & Graeme Ston (Website hidden by Airbnb)

Barbaridade, o apartamento é tao lindo quanto esta nas fotos . Chega a ser muito mais aconchegante do que imaginávamos. Tudo novinho.Localização perfeita. Tudo pertinho. Tem 5 supermercados pertos, e eu digo só atravessar uma rua tu esta em qualquer um dos 5. Farmácias do lado. Padaria.  O fabio foi extremamente atencioso.  Ficou 1:30 conversando e nos explicando as melhores coisas do rio de (Website hidden by Airbnb) a maior paciência. e nem é obrigação, mas ele é guia e aproveitou para fazer esta gentileza.  Nota 1000!!

My friend and I enjoyed our stay at this cute apartment! She slept on a bed, I slept on a sofa bed in the living room very comfortably. Good shower, I made coffee in some mornings (machine and ground coffee provided), there are 2 water jugs in the fridge which made it easy for us to hydrate everyday in hot summer.

I would point out that there is only 1 toilet paper provided- we had to go get some, a drugstore is half a block away on the same side of the street. And as some people have already mentioned there are 2 sets of towels (bath & face) for 2 people, no extras. But there is a washer/ dryer in the kitchen if you need to fresh them up, no problem.

Fabio was very nice and helpful person. Location was safe and convenient, I would stay here again!

We stayed in this apartment for 7 nights over in NYE and loved it. Awesome location a block and a half from Copacabana beach, within walking distance to Galeto Sats (order the garlic bread!) and Cervantes which we ate at a couple of times and highly recommend. Felt safe in this area, the apartment is hated up with a doorman present at all times. The apartment itself is bigger than what the pictures depict. Nice bathroom, spacious shower area with large rainshower, great water pressure, lots of hot water. Lots of plates, cutlery, glasses etc (we ate a lot of takeaway in the apartment). The 2-in-1 washer/dryer was a blessing as we has tons of washing to do after traveling the rest of South America. two TVs with cable channels in English. Finally, Fabio is reliable and super helpful. He orientated us well into the apartment and Rio, drawing points of interests on a map for us which was our bible in Rio. Highly recommended apartment and highly recommended landlord/agent to deal with.

Merci Fabio
Super appartement , bien placé à coté de la plage de copacabana 100 m et bien situé pour faire les différents visites sur Rio.
Appartement trés lumineux , prope, bien agencé .
Option prise en charge a l'aéroport pour le logement super et résonable ainsi que le retour.
Petite critique prévoir de plat style saladier.

Apartamento com ótima localização. Tudo muito perto, praia, farmácia, mercado, metrô, aeroporto, restaurantes, bares, pão de açúcar, van para o cristo, etc. O apartamento é completíssimo, com direito a dois condicionadores de ar, máquina de lavar e secar roupa, TV a cabo, ducha a gás. É realmente o que é apresentado nas fotos. O apartamento é muito silencioso, há isolação acústica nas janelas. 
O Fábio foi muito atencioso e pontual na nossa chegada. Mostrou todo apartamento e indicou os pontos turísticos mais interessantes.
A estadia foi muito agradável.

We stayed about 10 days in Fabio's appartment. The flat itself was really good, the pictures show it perfectly, as it looks the same and was well equipped as well. fabio was a really nice host. He arranged a driver to pick us up from the airport and when we arrived at the flat, he was already waiting for us and gave us an introduction about do's and don'ts in rio. Even afterwards we could always text him and he replied nearly always immediately. We totally recommend this flat.

Tuvimos una muy agradable estadía en el apartamento ya que está muy bien ubicado por la accesibilidad al trasporte público, cercanía a la playa y todos los comercios necesarios. El apartamento estaba muy bien equipado y con una buena atención en la entrada del edificio. Le agradecemos a Fabio que nos recibió muy bien explicándonos todas las posibilidades que tiene Rio, tanto los puntos turísticos clásicos como los "locales".  Muchas gracias por todo! Un placer nuestra experiencia.

Very nice apartment.  The Jacuzzi door keeps the apartment insulated from any noise.  The digital lock is good to secure valuables although a bit small to fit a laptop, however security was never a concern at the apartment.  Fabio was gracious enough to move me to another location on the day of checkout as i had a late flight back to NY and needed a few extra hours to keep my luggage before going to the airport.

Impecable todo!! Fabio es un gran anfitrión! se ocupo de todo, nos dio un mapa para disfrutar de todo lo que tiene Rio. Nos reservo un taxi de regreso al aeropuerto, la verdad sin palabras! MUCHAS GRACIAS!!
El depto es hermoso esta ubicado muy cerca de todo y muy cerca de los medios de transporte.
Volveremos a Rio es una hermosa ciudad, y Fabio hizo que sea mas confortable nuestra estadia!
Our stay in this apartment was great, location perfect and the helpful advice on what to do/where to go was perfect! Apartment was lovely and clean and facilities great! Would stay again!

Nice location, a few blocks from the beach. It's a nice, homey neighborhood with several grocery stores, cafes and enough restaurants that I could always find something interesting for a quick bite. The place itself is really clean, well maintained and very safe with 24hr security at the front gate. The description of features is quite accurate. Fabio was very gracious, giving a good introduction to the place and to the city and gave me some excellent ideas of places to see.

Fábio correu tudo bem com nossa estada! Quero agradecer por ter deixado tudo conforme com nossa expectativa! Na verdade é nossa primeira experiência na locação por este serviço o que posso garantir nos deixou com a melhor das impressões!! Forte abraço e obrigado!
PERFEECT

We loved this apartment! It was clean and had everything we needed. The kitchen was well equipped and the shower was fantastic. 
The location was great, about two blocks away from the beach. The area is safe and has a lot of restaurants and bars around it. Thanks Fabio for making our stay in Rio an unforgettable one!

Fabio's apartment was lovely.
Very well presented in a great location. We spent 5 nights there and had such a great experience. Definitely more then big enough for 2 guests to live comfortably. 
Only a block back from Copacabana beach, with good Metro access. 
We even walked to Sugarloaf from the apartment (20-30minute easy walk).
It's also a block away from the mini-van to Christ Redeemer - such an easy way to visit, and able to go at 8am before the crowds and the heat. 
Would recommend to our friends and family and would definitely stay again if we're ever back in Rio.
Clean, modern and perfectly equipped apartment. Feels like a hotel suite. 5 mins from beach, 15 mins to metro. Host was exceptionally responsive and helpful. Highly recommended.

Très bon accueil de l'hôte ; appartement correspondant parfaitement à la description et aux photographies; Emplacement intéressant proche de la plage et de certain sites à pied (Pain de sucre, morro de Leme) ; d'une station de métro (propre) d'où l'on accède rapidement aux quartiers centraux; situé dans un quartier animé et populaire à la circulation intense. 
Attention aux zoreilles certain soir le klaxon est d'un usage coutumier.

Nuestra experiencia ha sido altamente satisfactoria. El departamento es bellisimo, tal cual lo publicado. La ubicacion muy buena, a metros del mar. Fabio nos ayudo muchisimo con la llegada, puesto que era de noche. Todas las consultas que le hicimos las respondio con muy buena disposicion e informacion. Limpieza , comodidad, buen gusto, todo lo esperado !!!!!!Gracias Fabio !!!!!

We stayed in Fabio's apartment for 19 nights during the Olympics.  The location was excellent and only maybe 200 metres from the beachfront.  The  windows were double glazed which helped the noise levels however you could still hear the street noise to some extent however it didn't distrupt our sleep at all.  The only real problem we had was no gas for the first 6 days due to a fault out on the street.  This affected our entire building and this was was out of Fabio's control.   He  kept in touch with us during this period to let us know what was happening.   We also requested a partial refund for which he was more than happy to provide.    Fabio always communicated extremely well right from the time of our initial booking.   I would recommend this apartment.

A estadia foi ótima. O apartamento foi todo reformado, do jeito como está nas fotos. Chuveiro excelente, cozinha bem equipada e roupa de cama e banho limpa e de boa qualidade. O anfitrião Fábio foi prestativo e respondeu as questões com rapidez. Localizado perto da praia, de mercados, farmácias e restaurantes. O único ponto negativo para mim foi ser andar baixo. Mesmo assim, o som da rua não atrapalha pois o Fábio colocou uma porta de vidro antes da janela que isola o som totalmente.

Fabio greeted me at the apartment as soon as I arrived to Rio de Janeiro. He gave me a tour of the facilities and left valuable information for things to do in Copacabana and Rio in general.

The apartment is extremely clean, safe, and within a great location close to the beach, restaurants and shops. I would definitely stay at this apartment on my next trip to Rio.

Mi primera vez utilizando Airbnb. Muy buena experiencia. El lugar tal como las fotos. Ubicado en un segundo piso con un poco de ruido de la calle pero leve. Me recibió Anderson, un asociado de Fabio, muy amable y hospitalario. Hubo algunos detalles que Fabio se encargó prontamente, con excepción de un problema con el aire acondicionado del living comedor pero que no me afectó la estadía. Definitivamente volvería a quedarme en otra oportunidad.

Fuimos recibidos por Isabel, quien nos dió información detallada sobre las actividades que podiamos realizar, restaurants, entre otras cosas.Fue muy amable y estuvo siempre atenta a los mensajes que le envié.Recomiendo sin dudas el departamento , ya que es tal cual se ve en las fotos, nuevo y bien ubicado.
Would stay again in the future, perfect location and everything as the pictures promised.
Great place! Fabio and Izabel were very helpful and quick to respond to all our questions. Thanks For everything!

Incrível! O apartamento é muito bem decorado e localizado (1 quadra da praia). Toda a decoração é de muito bom gosto! Fábio é um ótimo anfitrião, sempre disponível, nos concedeu muitas dicas de como aproveitar a cidade e se mostrou totalmente pró-ativo em diversas situações. Voltarei mais vezes ao Rio e ficarei hospedado nos aptos do Fabio. Obrigado!
Todo tal cual el anuncio... la calle es un poco ruidosa pero el apartamento tiene buena insonorizacion

amei estar passando meus dias neste local!
VAle a pena pra quem quer conhecer o Rio!!
Muy lindo el depto, completo y muy bien ubicado

Fabio is a great host, very reactive and helpful. The apartment is exactly as described and pictured: well decorated and spacious with italian bathroom. The building is safe as there is a concierge at the gate. You can reach all the attractions easily from the apartment and Fabio provides precious recommandations.

Excelente departamento ubicado en un lugar privilegiado: a una cuadra de la playa de Copacabana, a cinco cuadras del metro, con casa de cambios abajo; farmacia al lado y muy central para ir a Ipanema, Centro, Pan de Azúcar, Urca, etc. Todo impecable, con sábanas y toallas blancas. Como si fuera un muy buen hotel. 
Ojo con las opciones para comer cerca: Lanches Hiper Mate (al frente) para desayunos con jugos y sándwich misto quente; Churrasqueria Palace a cinco cuadras; Cervantes, un clásico, para sándwiches de cerdo y piña; y el mejor dato de todos: GALETO SAT'S a solo dos cuadras, excelente precio/calidad, pollo a la brasa (galeto) insuperable y picanha espectacular. Muy barato, abre todos los días hasta las 5 am.
Sin duda volveré.

El departamento de Fabio esta muy bien ubicado en uno de los mejores sectores de Copacabana. El departamento es exactamente como muestras las fotos y está muy bien equipado. La comunicación con Fabio fue muy rápida y nos dio muchos datos para salir en Rio.

Apartamento muito bem localizado, somente a uma quadra de distância da praia. O entorno do apartamento possui uma excelente estrutura para o viajante (farmácias, supermercado, restaurantes no quarteirão do imóvel). O apartamento é muito bem estruturado no que tange a cozinha, banheiro, armários, tv e internet. Possui lavanderia bem montada para o viajante (máquina de lavar e secar, ferro de passar roupas). O prioritário, Fábio, foi extremamente atencioso conosco. Desde a reserva sempre nos respondeu muito rapidamente as mensagens. Nós recebeu pessoalmente no check in. Nos deu dicas de turismo na cidade e orientações sobre a infraestrutura do bairro. Certamente voltaríamos a nos hospedar no local.
Fabio's place is fabulous. One block away from the beachfront, clean, tidy, and tastefully decorated. Fabio responded rapidly and was willing to accommodate all my needs. Very highly recommended!
Très bien situé et très bien équipé, cette appartement est à 100 m de la plage de Copacabana et à 15 min en Uber de l'aéroport SDU.
Muy lindo departamento. Con acceso a medios de transporte. Fabio un muy buen anfitrión. Disfrutamos nuestra estadía.

Fabio was the perfect air bnb host. He was flexible, accommodating, quick to respond to my messages and had some wonderful recommendations for our time in Rio. The accommodation was as described and in the perfect location, just a short walk to copacobana beach. Thanks for everything Fabio!
A acomodação é excelente, exatamente como nas fotos. Tudo é próximo e a praia fica a poucos passos. Recomendo demais!

Great location just a block from Copacabana near Posto 2. Very nice and elegant apartment with great security. Close to groceries, restaurants etc. Fabio was great at responding to messages. Would certainly recommend.
Apartamento super gostoso e bem localizado. Adorei!
Thanks Fabio! Excellent apartment in excellent location. If we come over again we'll consider your apartment for sure.

Es la primera vez que he usado el servicio de airbnb y la experiencia ha sido muy grata.
El departamento de Fabio es genial. U la ubicacion muy buena. Justo al lado de la playa y cerca de gran cantidad de servicios como restaurantes, tiendas etc...
Todo fue ideal y Fabio siempre estuvo a nuestra disposicion para cualquier duda.
Gracias por todo Fabio. Sin duda volveremos.
Uma ótima experiência! Apartamento funcional e bem localizado. Só deixou um pouco a desejar em alguns critérios da limpeza
Local lindo e bem decorado! Recomendo sem restrições.
Great apartment with a lot of love details! I totally recommend it
Recomendo! Excelente localização e comunicação, apartamento bem cuidado e limpo.

Nice apartment as shown in the picture, although on a busy road it is a surprisingly quiet apartment. Great location 1 block back from Copacabana beach. Bars, restaurants, shops all very near by. 
Next door neighbour was really nice and gave us tips when we chatted to him.
Large fridge and washing machine which was very useful. Would stay at this apartment again.
Aceptable

Great place, one block away from the beach of Copacabana. Fully furnished, well equipped, close to everything you might need - from a fancy restaurant to a pharmacy. The host,  whom we have not met personally, was always available on the airbnb platform. All in all, a great place to stay in Rio de Janeiro.

El departamento es mas lindo y comodo de lo que se aprecia en las fotos, esta en una ubicación excelente, segura, con muchas opciones de comida a metros de su acceso y muy cerca de la playa .
Fabio es muy profesional y estuvo siempre en contacto atendiendo cada consulta que le realizamos, aun cuando no eran vinculadas al alojamiento.
Es muy recomendable
Nice apartment for 2 people! Perfect location in Copacabana with a lot of things to do around and good possibilities to go other locations in Rio!
L’appartement est idéal, à 5 minutes de la plage et des commerces, dans une résidence surveillée.
Great location. Apartment was amazing and Fabio went above and beyond to make sure my stay was great. Would definitely stay here again!

Very good location, 2 min walking to Copacabana. 
Fabio always answered very fast and friendly and the apartment was really nice! Very clean, all you need in the kitchen and a very comfy bed :)
Fabio has a great place. It was clean, comfortable, quiet. Nothing to big to complain about.
L'appartamento gode di un'ottima posizione a pochi passi dalla spiaggia di Copacabana. In zona vi sono numerosi ristoranti, supermercati e bar. Lo spazio di Fabio è ben attrezzato ed elegante.
muy buena ubicación, cerca de todo, muy prolijo y completo, primer piso, fácil de acceder,  lugar muy seguro, cama cómoda y aire acondicionado; súper !
Fabio was more than accommodating and check-in/out was super easy. Great, central location in Copacabana, making it easy to get around Rio. Definitely recommended.
El departamento es muy lindo y comodo. Tal como se ve en las fotos, super cerca de la playa y de varios supermercados y servicios. Fabio respondio a todo rapido y con soluciones inmediatas.

name: GREAT Apartment at Barra da Tijuca
summary: 4 bedroons (2 suites) apartment at Barra da Tijuca. Private condo in front of beach. Security, swinming poll , gym, sauna, kids parking, restaurant and 2 indoors garage. Near mini market, bakers, restaurants, drugstore.. Accomodate 7 persons (8 max).
space: Locate in fornt of the beach. High speed wifii. 15 min from Barra da Tijuca metro, very close to bus, restaurants, banks, drugstore, bakers, coifure.
description: 4 bedroons (2 suites) apartment at Barra da Tijuca. Private condo in front of beach. Security, swinming poll , gym, sauna, kids parking, restaurant and 2 indoors garage. Near mini market, bakers, restaurants, drugstore.. Accomodate 7 persons (8 max). Locate in fornt of the beach. High speed wifii. 15 min from Barra da Tijuca metro, very close to bus, restaurants, banks, drugstore, bakers, coifure. Access to all facilities in condon and appartment. In case of doubts or difficulties, a contact is possible. Barra da Tijuca is a very well area. Big shopping mall are located in this area such as hipermarkets, banks. The subway will be available from July 16 on and also bus conection for other areas and airport. 2 garage parking available. Bus stop for different areas. Public parking in front of condo. Free local calls.  High loud is allowed from 08:00am to 10:00pm from monday to friday. Saturdays from 08:00 to 12:00.
