host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.host_about: Sou de Belo Horizonte moro no Rio desde 1998

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments: Espaço espetacular , hóspedes muito solicitos e claros, 20 metros da praia , infraestrutura próxima muito boa. Vista do apartamento sensacional. Valeu muito a pena , eu e meus amigos voltaremos em breve !!!!
Ótimo lugar, adorei a estadia

O espaço é ótimo , a localização . Adorei a praia em frente e especialmente a comodidade de pedir Refeições pelo Interfone .     Isso foi inigualável !!!!!!    Não precisar sair para restaurantes com filas metas vezes enorme ... Almocei na varanda olhando para o mar . Meu PET adorou passear e deitar na varanda.

Passei o Natal no RJ no espaço do Luiz e foi excelente!
O apartamento tem bastante espaço, totalmente projetado para família com filhos e um condomínio com infraestrutura completa e em frente à praia da Barra.
Isso sem falar na atenção e preocupação do Luiz em saber se estava tudo bem .
Foi ótimo!

El departamento de Luiz es grande, comodo y bonito. Esta muy bien ubicado y dentro de un condominio excelente. La ubicacion es optima. Frente a la playa. Luiz responde siempre rapidisimo y Claudia la persona q nos recibio es muy simpatica. Todo lo q figura en la web es veridico. Super recomiendo este departamento.

Excelente zona. Muy lindos bares.  Excelente condominio. Muy seguro y muy cómodo. Cerca de la playa. Muy linda la pileta y la cancha de tenis. Hermoso el departamento. Muy amplio y muy bien equipado. Todo perfecto
The apartment is great, it has everything you need. It's in a amazing neightboarhood. The facilities are incredible. The a great place for vacation with family.
Excelente atención, excelente el departamento, la playa y la ubicación. Las comodidades sel departamento son insuperables. Es como estar en casa. Recomendable

Una experiencia increíble! Es un departamento inmenso! Muy cómodo, bien decorado, bien calefaccionado, con todo tipo de artefactos de cocina. Claudia nos recibio muy bien al ingresar al lugar. Ella fue muy amorosa. Todo el stand del edificio nos trato muy bien y pudimos hasta ir a la pileta y jugar partidos de tenis sin ningún problema. Queda súper cómodo para ir a la playa ya que queda enfrente. Y hay un mercado a la vuelta de la cuadra. Los precios del bufet del edificio son muy económicos y la comida es riquísima! Muy recomendable! No hubo ninguna queja sobre nada! Luiz Henríque fue en todo momento muy atento al contestar todas nuestras dudas al instante. Muchísimas gracias!

Hermoso departamento tal cual se lo ce en las fotos. Muy buena ubicación y muy seguro. Amplio ,cómodo y muy luminoso. La playa espectacular,mucha seguridad y hermosa zona ,con bares cerca ,minimercado y a pocas cuadras de av de las Américas donde hay de todo.  Volveremos.

Muy buen apartamento y una ubicación genial al frente de la playa.
Luiz se portó excelente!
Estoy seguro que todo aquel que se hospede aquí,verá superada sus expectativas.todo merece 5 estrellas .

Luis y Claudia excelentes personas
La ubicación es inmejorable 
Recomiendo este lugar para familias o grupo de amigos

name: Kadiköy, Moda, close to transports
summary: Just 5 minutes from the metro and ferries to go to European side. The flat is close to everything you need : supermarket, shops, cafés but also restaurants, bars and clubs in Kadiköy. Really close to Moda park, best place on Marmara sea border.
description: Just 5 minutes from the metro and ferries to go to European side. The flat is close to everything you need : supermarket, shops, cafés but also restaurants, bars and clubs in Kadiköy. Really close to Moda park, best place on Marmara sea border.

name: Lovely ap at Leblon beach
summary: Ap amplo, claro e arejado localizado no melhor ponto do Leblon, à 1 quadra da praia, Lagoa, restaurantes, supermercados, farmácias e shopping.  São 3 quartos que acomodam confortavelmente 5 pessoas. Sala de jantar e estar. Cozinha e área de serviço. É possível fazer tudo a pé e desfrutar de toda a beleza do bairro mais charmoso do rio.
space: O apartamento está totalmente reformado. Todos os quartos possuem ventilador. Os banheiros são novos e possuem blindex. A cozinha está equipada com geladeira, micro-ondas e louças.  Temos Wi-fi.
description: Ap amplo, claro e arejado localizado no melhor ponto do Leblon, à 1 quadra da praia, Lagoa, restaurantes, supermercados, farmácias e shopping.  São 3 quartos que acomodam confortavelmente 5 pessoas. Sala de jantar e estar. Cozinha e área de serviço. É possível fazer tudo a pé e desfrutar de toda a beleza do bairro mais charmoso do rio. O apartamento está totalmente reformado. Todos os quartos possuem ventilador. Os banheiros são novos e possuem blindex. A cozinha está equipada com geladeira, micro-ondas e louças.  Temos Wi-fi. Caso necessário, estaremos disponíveis para ajudá-los em horário comercial (9:00 AM TO 6:00 PM). O Leblon é o bairro mais famoso e charmoso do Rio de Janeiro, frequentado e habitado por famosos. Possui um enorme e variado comércio onde é possível fazer tudo a pé, desde uma simples caminhada até compras. A estação do metrô (linha 4) está localizada a apenas duas quadras. Pontos de ônibus com linhas disponíveis para os principais bairros da cidade. Indicamos serviç
neighborhood_overview: O Leblon é o bairro mais famoso e charmoso do Rio de Janeiro, frequentado e habitado por famosos. Possui um enorme e variado comércio onde é possível fazer tudo a pé, desde uma simples caminhada até compras.
notes: O apartamento fica localizado em prédio estritamente residencial e familiar, não possui elevador. São dois lances pequenos de escada para chegar ao apartamento. O prédio possui zelador durante horário comercial e entradas distintas sendo 1 social e a outra de serviço (para banhistas). O prédio possui porteiro eletrônico e sistema de câmeras de segurança.
transit: A estação do metrô (linha 4) está localizada a apenas duas quadras. Pontos de ônibus com linhas disponíveis para os principais bairros da cidade. Indicamos serviço de transfer e transporte.
interaction: Caso necessário, estaremos disponíveis para ajudá-los em horário comercial (9:00 AM TO 6:00 PM).
house_rules: Não aceitamos animais. Não aceitamos hóspedes adicionais. Não é permitida realização de festas e eventos. Após às 22 horas é necessário trancar a portaria com chaves, que serão entregues no ato do check-in. Fazer silêncio após as 22:00 horas. Apagar as luzes e ventiladores ao sair.

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments:
Dona Sonia foi uma excelente anfitriã. O apto estava impecável, sem nada a reclamar. Ela inclusive deixou água e cervejas gelada na geladeira, camas arrumadas, toalhas no banheiro, novos sabonetes e até alguns remédios em caso de emergência. Também se ofereceu  para ajudar várias vezes e se mostrou 100% a disposição. 

O apto é perfeito: amplo, arejado, muiiiito bem localizado. Há 1 quadra da praia, rodeado de bares, bons restaurantes, lanchonetes, healthy foods, hamburguerias, temakerias etc. Garantia de economia de tempo de deslocamentos, porque dá para fazer tudo a pé.

name: Beautiful 1 Bedroom Apartment
summary: This one bedroom apartment in Sheung Wan/Central is the perfect hideaway for a young couple or single person looking to explore everything that Hong Kong has to offer.
space: The apartment itself is cozy and quiet and situated in one of Hong Kong's trendiest streets. Ample natural light enters the apartment throughout the day.
description: This one bedroom apartment in Sheung Wan/Central is the perfect hideaway for a young couple or single person looking to explore everything that Hong Kong has to offer. The apartment itself is cozy and quiet and situated in one of Hong Kong's trendiest streets. Ample natural light enters the apartment throughout the day. The whole apartment. I will most likely be out of town when the flat is available, thus the reason for renting it out. However, I will be available via email or phone to provide you with any assitance you need. I am more than happy to help in any way I can to make your stay as enjoyable as possible. Beautiful cafés, Michelin recommended restaurants, antique shops and designer brands are scattered along this beautiful street. The closest underground station MTR (Mass Transit Railway) is a 5 minute walk from the apartment. Buses and minibuses are just as convenient to use nearby. Central mid levels escalator is a 4 mins walk from the apartment and the Star Ferry is a casu
neighborhood_overview: Beautiful cafés, Michelin recommended restaurants, antique shops and designer brands are scattered along this beautiful street.
notes: This apartment is situated on the 5th floor of a walk-up building. Carrying heavy luggage up the stairs may be strenuous.
transit: The closest underground station MTR (Mass Transit Railway) is a 5 minute walk from the apartment. Buses and minibuses are just as convenient to use nearby. Central mid levels escalator is a 4 mins walk from the apartment and the Star Ferry is a casual 15 minutes walk away.  The street is a very quiet street at night. Taxis run 24 hours from Aberdeen Street (30 sec walk). Taxis will drop you home at the door.
access: The whole apartment.
interaction: I will most likely be out of town when the flat is available, thus the reason for renting it out. However, I will be available via email or phone to provide you with any assitance you need. I am more than happy to help in any way I can to make your stay as enjoyable as possible.
house_rules: Please treat the house and its content as you would expect someone to treat your own.

host.host_about: Hong Kong is a beautiful city, so vibrant and diverse. I have been living in Hong Kong since 2010. I enjoy traveling and use my personal experience to point you to fantastic restaurants, exciting cafes and bars, the best shopping areas and of course to the local grocer and great supermarkets.

address.street: Sheung Wan, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

reviews.comments: The host canceled this reservation 7 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Mai's apartment is really nice. Lovely decor. Nice and bright with lots of natural sunlight.. and the balcony is cool :) The location is great. Very close to both Sheung Wan and Central. Mai responded quickly to all messages. Thank you Mai!

Mai-Britt's flat is so lovely and clean. I can find everything in her flat. I prefer to stay in Mai-Britt's house than hotel. And the bed is so comfortable i can have a deep sleep. I never seen Mai in person but she send message and take some pictures. I can easily connect with her and easily find her place. the flat is located on Gough street. From central about 7mins to walk. close to SheungWan. Everything is perfect. And this nice flat i can't easily find in HK. If i back to HK, i will stay in her flat again. thank you so much!

Clean & still very new! Location is pretty good, it's about 10 mins walk to the MTR, but it's the major Hong Kong & Central stations, from which you can access many lines! Lots of great eateries & convenience stores nearby as well, including the famous Kau Kee Beef Brisket Noodles! Do note the small details like that there is (currently) no wifi & no lift, but we knew about these so we were prepared for it. One small thing, the curtains are quite sheer over the full-length windows which makes the whole place bright & airy, but if you're used to sleeping in darkness then I recommend bringing eyeshades.
Mai was a super friendly host the apt was clean had everything you needed to make for a comfortable stay - can't beat the location close to everything you want to be near in Hong Kong.
The host canceled this reservation 23 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Fantastic location with a couple of renowned local eateries a stone's throw away, Airport Express and Central MTR station within easy walking distance, yet quietly nestled away from the hustle and bustle of the nearby financial district. Apartment itself is spacious enough for one (and I reckon up to two) and has most essentials required - although this being HK, didn't get to spend much time in it. The lack of a lift in this block means legging it up several flights of stairs (as host has made known to her credit) but even that is a perfect antidote to the great food and drink the city has to offer. Mai-Britt was most friendly and welcoming, and the whole experience (as a first-time user) was smoother than I'd expected.

Located in the heart of Hong Kong, this apartment is perfect for a weekend in Hong Kong. Mai-Britt is the perfect host, and her apartment is set up to feel spacious and bright despite the tight space common in Hong Kong.

The spot is close to restaurants, shops and the MTR.

Super stay at Mai-Britt's place. Great and clear communication through out. The tasteful apartment is quiet, yet in the middle of the hippest neighborhood, in the center of everything. 
Thank you for a wonderful stay.
I couldn’t ask for more Perfect location and accommodations for living like a hip local!

name: PORTO DOWNTOWN FLATS-RIBEIRA STUDIO
summary: Porto Downtown Flats RIBEIRA STUDIO is a newly remodelled apartment, located in the most beautiful area of Porto. It is situated in Rua São Joao, in the old Ribeira of Porto, an area classified as World´s heritage. Fully equiped kitchen and wi-fi.
space: Situated in a renovated historic building, Porto Downtown Flats – Ribeira Studio offer luxury accommodation and free Wi-Fi.  Each apartment offers a spacious lounge with flat-screen cable TV and double sofa bed. The kitchen includes a fridge and microwave. Linen and towels are provided. Near the street of the apartment you have Mercado Ferreira Borges, Palácio da Bolsa and a few minutes away you have  Torre dos Clérigos, Sé do Porto, Avenida dos Aliados and much more… In a 500 meter radius you can find public transports with central acess to central Porto (Bus and Subway), several restaurants, with all kind of cuisines, as well as leisure and cultural places. Porto Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport is 21 km away.
description: Porto Downtown Flats RIBEIRA STUDIO is a newly remodelled apartment, located in the most beautiful area of Porto. It is situated in Rua São Joao, in the old Ribeira of Porto, an area classified as World´s heritage. Fully equiped kitchen and wi-fi. Situated in a renovated historic building, Porto Downtown Flats – Ribeira Studio offer luxury accommodation and free Wi-Fi.  Each apartment offers a spacious lounge with flat-screen cable TV and double sofa bed. The kitchen includes a fridge and microwave. Linen and towels are provided. Near the street of the apartment you have Mercado Ferreira Borges, Palácio da Bolsa and a few minutes away you have  Torre dos Clérigos, Sé do Porto, Avenida dos Aliados and much more… In a 500 meter radius you can find public transports with central acess to central Porto (Bus and Subway), several restaurants, with all kind of cuisines, as well as leisure and cultural places. Porto Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport is 21 km away. I´m an easy going person and my g
neighborhood_overview: Foi nesta zona que o Porto nasceu e cresceu, bem junto ao Rio Douro, fazendo com que a  Ribeira seja hoje em dia Património Mundial da Unesco. Aqui vai encontrar o Porto original e mais típico, quer em monumentos quer nas suas gentes. Uma zona repleta de vida, onde não falta todo o tipo de comércio, desde restaurantes a supermercados, entre uma panóplia de lojas que garantem que tenha bem perto o essencial para o dia-a-dia. O ponto de partida ideal para começar a descobrir a imensidão de coisas que o Porto tem para mostrar.
transit: In a 500 meter radius you can find public transports (bus, metro and taxi) with central acess to central Porto. Porto Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport is 21 km away. If you want a taxi transfer from the airport say something. Parque público pago a poucos minutos a pé do apartamento com um custo de 6€ por cada período de 24. Morada: Rua General Torres s/n, Vila Nova de Gaia.  (Mesmo à saída da ponte que atravessa do Porto para Gaia)
interaction: I´m an easy going person and my goal is to make your stay as pleasant as possible.  You´re welcome to ask everything you want at anytime. If you are happy i will be happy!
house_rules: No big rules, just treat the house like it was your home!

host.host_about:
I´M EAGER TO BE YOUR HOST
ANSIOSO POR SER O SEU ANFITRIÃO

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments: Teresa was very welcoming and took time to explain whatever was necessary and answer questions about Porto.  The apartment was very nice - just like the photos.  When I mentioned that the apartment hadn't warmed up as much as I'd hoped, she had an additional heater brought by within hours.  The location was so easy, a block and a half from the waterfront restaurant scene, and almost as close to one of the train stations.  We were really happy with our stay!

Apartamento conforme descrito, muito bom.
Fomos bem recebidos e aconselha-se a quem queira conhecer o Porto

This is a very good location for exploring Porto. The studio is excellent - close to all the important city attractions as well to good restaurants and bars. Teresa is a great host. Although we did not meet her personally she made sure that we have everything we need plus we got excellent advice for what to do and see in Porto.
Very functional studio, great location, warm welcoming from the host.
Très bon accueil, logement agréable et très bien situé dans le centre de porto, à quelques mètres du Douro ! Super appartement pour passer un we prolongé, voir une semaine à deux !

We have had an excellent stay in this apartment. 

It is situated just a few steps from the lively historic heart of the beautiful city of Porto. Most of the things you'd like to do are within walking distance: a lot of cultural highlights, shopping, bus/metro/train and of course many Port-houses.

The apartment sits in a somewhat old building which is a contrast to the apartment itself. It has been nicely renovated and has the comfort you would want. It's spacious for a stay with two people. Most of the interior is new and functions properly. This is complemented by nice (and some antique) decorative details.
A pleasant surprise was the smell of freshly baked bread every morning in the staircase. The downstairs neighbour is a bakery where you can get good and cheap bread and your morning espresso.

We have had contact with Teresa through AirBNB, she has been helpful and kind. Tim welcomed us with a gastronomic surprise and even a list of suggestions for our stay in Porto. They are a very hospitable and helpful couple!

Thank you Teresa and Tim!

Teresa and her friend were very kind and welcomed us with a delicate surprise. They were helpful with telling us the best places to visit. The flat is very nice furnished, well equipped an next to a lively street direct in the city centre. We enjoyed our stay and would like to comeback somewhen.
Great place, so clean, great host, easy to reach and happy to please us !

This place is awesome!!
The location is great. Just a couple of mins walk downhill to Cai da Riberia on the river and all the great restaurants and bars there.
The flat itself was spotless and spacious. Perfect for the 2 of us.
Teresa's partner was there to meet us it 12.30am. Let us in, showed us around and offered us a small glass of port and a pastille de nada as a welcome. Very nice.
The bed is extremely comfortable too. Always a bonus. 
Loved this place!
One small drawback was the noise of passing partygoers in the small hours as the flat is on the a bit of a thoroughfare but seriously not a real problem as the bed was so comfortable we just dozed straight off again.
The owners checked in with us via test several times over our 3 day stay to make sure we had everything we needed and were all ok.
Can't fault it. We had a great time here. Hope to come back and stay here again sometime very soon

El departamento es hermoso, la ubicacion privilegiada y el trato de los anfitriones excelente. No se puede pedir mas cuando alguien contrata este servicio. Si alguien piensa viajar a Oporto no dude en que el departamento de Teresa sea una de las mejores opciones para contratar.

Nous avons été très bien accueilli par Tim, l'ami de Teresa, qui nous avait préparé du Porto et des pasteis de nata! L'appartement est exactement conforme aux photos, très agréable, spacieux et bien décoré (le lit est vraiment très confortable, bravo! ).  L'appartement est idéalement situé à côté de Ribeira et des quais pour les balades nocturnes...Nous reviendrons avec plaisir à Porto, cette ville est magnifique. Merci encore pour tout, Tim et Teresa.

We absolutely loved our stay in Porto. The appartement is very well located and beautifully furnished. Also, it was very (!) clean and tidy and the kitchenette is well equipped. Teresa's friend waited for us in front of the house and it was a warm welcome - they even had prepared a small surprise!
Thank you so much - we would love to visit again!

Receção impecável por parte do anfitrião. Extremamente simpático e prestável, fez-nos sentir em casa! A casa está muito bem localizada, perfeita para quem quer passar um fim-de-semana a passear no Porto

Tim's apartment has everything needed for a comfortable stay. The location is great just a few steps to the river over which life goes on:) Tim  was still available for us. He provided every essentials - for example feeding chair for my lilltle one:) We were greeted with a glass of Porto and delicious sweets which was very nice suprise;)
I can certainly recommend Tim as a hoster!
Kind Regards
Anna

Tim was so kind host.
He showed everything what we need, and he asked our feeling during our trip.
Flat was so close to river, which is so main area in Porto.
Flat was clean and neat. Shortly, perfect flat!

Tim was so kind when he showed us around the apartment.  We loved talking with him about Porto.  The location was perfect, and the views out the windows are spectacular.  We loved our time here.  The apartment had everything we needed, and we hope to be lucky enough to come back one day.

very nice place, in the heart of the old Porto. Tim is really reactive if you have any problem and really nice.
It was sometimes difficult at night because of the noise of nightlife outside especially because we had a baby, but then you are in the center so that's normal.
Appartement parfait, proche des centres d'Interets, confortable et propre. Tim nous laisse un mémo de ce qu'il faut voir et faire à Porto.

A localização é excelente, o apartamento muito aconchegante e agradável, tem todos os utensílios para você preparar sua refeição.
Da janela você tem vista para rio Douro, por lá pode desfrutar
de muitos restaurantes, bares
um lindo por do sol ...
Por fim estamos agradecidos pela recepção e todo o suporte 
oferecidos pelo anfitrião Tim.
Abs.
Sergio

El apartamento era tal cual le esperábamos. Amplio, luminoso y limpio. Tim ha sido un anfitrión genial, nos facilitó todo lo que necesitamos, y eso que viajamos con dos bebés, y tuvimos que solicitarle dos cunas. La zona es totalmente céntrica, a unos pocos metros del Duero y una gran variedad de restauración. Hay supermercado cercano. Si tuviéramos que ponerle una pega, es que al estar en pleno centro, el barrio es un poco ruidoso, pero bastante llevadero.
Tim's place is clean and located in the heart of the town where is very convenient. He was very helpful and nice to greet us on our arrival. The main Bed is quite big which seems unusual for Europe.

Vivre dans une ville comme Porto directement au centre, là où "les choses
se passent" est pour nous un atout primordial. Un appartement situé plus centralement que celui-ci serait difficile à trouver! En plus, l'appartement est pratique, joliment meublé et agréable à vivre.
Tim s'est avéré un hôte parfait, agréable de contact et la communication aussi bien avant que pendant le séjour était parfait.

Great flat, great location and perfect communication! The only thing that could be disturbing at the moment is the renovation of two flats below us, but we managed to slip when it was too loud. Other than that (and for the time the renovation will have ended), we highly recommend the place!
We really enjoyed our stay and highly recommend Tim's place.

Fidèle  aux  reviews précédents, Tim à très  bien  fait son travail ! Présent à 
Mon  arrivée, il  m'a  Briefé sur le logement et  laissé un plan e la ville avec un document d'incontournables (une bonne valeur ajoutée). J'ai trouvé très agréable de trouver un  linge de bain et  divers  échantillons de toilettes (bon pour voyageurs à bagage réduit). Jouant le jeu, j' en ai laissé à mon tour quelques uns. Dans l'entrée de l'immeuble se trouve une boulangerie, ça laisse des odeurs de pain très  agréables le matin.
Great spot! Clean. Perfect location. Great service!

Paixão a primeira vista! Flat com excelente localização. Tim super atencioso, prestativo, pronto para nos ajudar em qualquer momento. Flat organizado, próximo a tudo. Recomendo demais. Obrigada, Bianca.
Lovely apartment and fantastic location. Muito obrigada Tim!

Fantastic location just steps from the riverfront with all the cafes, restaurants and cruises. Very spacious studio with very high ceilings. Very comfortable and a big and comfortable bed as well. Had a small issue with some noise from the street as late night revelers make their way home, and then some in the morning since there's some construction on a building nearby, but that's city life. Tim was fantastic at communicating and left a nice packet of recommendations, and even loaned me a phone charging plug after I left mine in Lisbon. Thanks again Tim!

Merci beaucoup à Tim pour son accueil sympathique et la mise à disposition de son spacieux studio !
Nous ne pouvions pas rêver être mieux ! A 2 pas du Douro, proche des transports, l'appartement est idéalement situé.
Très propre, calme, spacieux, bien décoré et confortable, nous y avons passé un excellent séjour. 
Nous reviendrons sans hésiter ! Merci :)

Appartement parfait, très bien situé, très bien équipé et très lumineux.
Tim était là pour nous accueillir, avec gentillesse et plein de bons conseils pour nos vacances.
Nous avons passé un séjour super! Je recommande cet appartement, ainsi que visiter Porto qui est une fantastique ville.
Good place but can be noisy as it is on a busy street.  Didn't bother me much as I can sleep anywhere.

This place was great. Best part was location! So close to everything. Easily walkable, but expect some hills. Wonderful view of the river, not loud at night, mild construction in the morning but we slept fine and woke up early to explore anyways! Comfortable accommodations and very helpful host. He gave great recommendations. Would stay again no questions asked.

Tim's place is a great location, very close to the river and handy for bars, restaurants and shops.  The pictures are a good representative of the apartment. after we checked out we left some items behind in error and Tim was easy to contact and arrange for us to go back  and pickup.  Nice place to stay.

The proximity to the Praça Ribeira, the Sao Bento train station and the Ponte de Luis pins this studio in the center of Porto. Perfect for young travelers that like to walk the city, and have a cozy place to relax afterwards. I really enjoyed the Nespresso machine with the complimentary cups. Please note that since the studio is located in the heart of a touristic area, nights can get very noisy.
The host canceled this reservation 29 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

El apartamento de Tim es muy bonito y amplio, con todo lo que podíamos necesitar. Además está muy limpio y en un lugar inmejorable. Lo recomiendo 100%, seguro que volveremos. Tim ha sido muy amable. Muchas gracias!!

Tim's place is excellent - the location is perfect to explore Porto - everything is walking distance. Tim put a list of suggested places to visit in Porto including a resturant called Miss Opo - we had the best food and experience there and wouldn't of known about it if it wasn't for Tim. Highly recommend this place!

Tim is very good and kind!! His flat is very clean and has a modern design. This is a really great location!! You are close to the river and the city center! Really good place! 
I recommend Tim and his apartment!
Inmejorable. Trato, situación, limpieza y facilidades. Un 10
Centrico, acradable, como en casa
Great moment in this appartement. Tim is very kind and his flat is PERFECTLY situated! Don't hesitate!

Tim is very nice and answers very quick. It was uncomplicated to leave our luggage at the appartment before check-in (we arrived very early). The appartment is super nice and looks like the pictures. There is everything you need and the location is perfekt!

A estadia na casa foi muito agradável e o Tim um anfitrião muito atencioso. A casa é acolhedora, limpa e tem o essencial para fazer refeições. Muito bem localizada, no entanto, sendo um local de grande movimento a casa ganhava se tivesse mais insonorização. Comércio diverso acessível, cafés, minimercado, restaurantes e lojas de souvenirs. É sem dúvida uma boa escolha para quem queira visitar o centro do Porto e estar junto a tudo.

Great stay! The place is very cozy and modern. It is in the center of the town, walking distances from all important touristic sights. Tim was very nice. He gave us some tips about where to eat and what to see. Highly recommendable!

Tim is a wonderful host. His place is very good. Great location we can reach out to everywhere we wanted. The room is big, clean, and well equipped. Porto is a city we want to visit again. Thank you Tim.

We walked in, and my first thought was that this place was HUGE! Such a difference from the tiny apartment where we stayed in Lisbon. My girlfriend was so happy to be in a spacious, stylish place, I think she'd consider moving in if she had the choice. Tim checked us in efficiently and helped us carry the luggage in. There is an elevator, and while it worked most of the time, I think there were one or two times it didn't. My girlfriend's only other minor complaint was that there wasn't a big bottle of conditioner. I thought the place was great and an ideal location for our short visit in Porto.

Ci siamo trovate molto bene. Ubicazione perfetta a pochi passi dalla stazione e dal centro. Stabile con ascensore (cosa rarissima a porto), finestre doppie che isolano dai rumori e ambiente comodo e spazioso. Lo consigliamo sicuramente !

Reservé este departamento para mis padres. Tim fue muy buen Host. Intentó siempre hacer que su estadía sea lo mejor posible. El departamento es perfeto, comodo y tal como se muestra en las fotos. Muy recomendable. Gracias Tim
Nice place & clean. Perfect place if you want to spend S. João (happens in June). I will be back there for sure!
Apartment is in the best location. Around a lot of good places to eat. Apartment is very cozy with everything you may need inside. We loved it. What is important there is elevator in the building.

Amazing studio appartment in one of the best locations in Porto. Walking distance to everything and Tim was more then happy to help with any questions with even a check in message to make sure everything was going well after the first night. 10/10!!!

Tim's place is in a perfect location from which you can easily access all Porto's sights. Tim was very responsible and accommodating. The place was exactly as described and had all necessary equipment to cook and have a great time. Thanks Tim for you warm welcome and information about Porto.

Great central location, very spacious accommodations and Tim was very helpful providing local tips and suggestions as well as responding quickly through email. Tim was able to suggest alternative options to accommodate our vegan needs. All in all a great base camp to explore Porto! 5 stars all around!!!

Very comfortable and spacious studio in an excellent location - walking distance to major attractions.  Owner very attentive - quick responses to questions and excellent instructions about the place and tips about Porto.

Tim’s spacious apartment in Porto is very well situated in the city for enjoying what Porto has to offer.  The large windows open to a view of Porto’s life, and within very easy walking distance are 3 shops where you can pick up whatever you need for your daily routine.  There’s even a coffee/bake shop below the apartment where you can quickly pick up your morning’s breakfast.

When we arrived in Porto Tim was there to greet us, and was kind enough to take us to a parking facility within short walking distance to the apartment. 

All in all, Tim’s apartment was one of the best ones we stayed in while visiting Portugal for 3 weeks.  And I would have to say it was due to this that Porto was our favourite city!
Tim foi muito gentil durante nossa recepção e estadia. Seu flat é amplo, bem localizado (perto da estação São Bento e de diversos pontos turísticos).  Recomendo!
Cumple las expectativas, bien situado y limpio
Inmejorable situación, muy cómodo, limpio, estiloso como en la foto. Tim muy amable.
Tim is so kind and help me with lots of advices. The studio was confortable and its position is perfect. So close to the river. I loved it!
We loved staying at this lovely place! Comfortable, quiet, modern and just perfect location!!!! Tim’s Hospitality was great letting us check in a bit before. Totally recommend this place!

name: Colonial Mansion in Santa Teresa
summary: A beautiful colonial mansion for office or residential rental/lease/sale - set in a peaceful area of Santa Teresa - perfect for a family/business team coming to Rio for business or pleasure. Ideal center for live-in studio accommodation, with five bedrooms and three bathrooms.
space: Built before the turn of the century, this fully-renovated historical landmark mansion located in the artistic Santa Teresa neighborhood offers a variety of rooms suited for the traveler seeking an authentic Carioca experience! GREAT LOCATION  This colonial mansion is located close to the heart of the city and walking distance to bus lines and the Gloria metro station for convenient access to all the major tourist hotspots of Rio. Public transportation can be accessed nearly 24hrs a day. Ipanema and Copacabana beaches are only 15 minutes away by taxi and can be easily reached via public transportation as well. Lapa, the famous bohemian nightlife scene, is only a 15min walk away. Some of the most famous sights in Rio are only minutes away from the house - the art collector Raimundo Otoni Castro May's Chácara do Céu mansion, Parque das Ruinas, Lapa's nightlife, and Chilean-born artist Jorge Selarón's famous tiled steps. Supermarkets, coffee shops and lounges are all located nearby as wel
description: A beautiful colonial mansion for office or residential rental/lease/sale - set in a peaceful area of Santa Teresa - perfect for a family/business team coming to Rio for business or pleasure. Ideal center for live-in studio accommodation, with five bedrooms and three bathrooms. neighborhood_overview: Set in a peaceful corner of up-and-coming Santa Teresa, close to the tram station, Parque das Ruinas, Seleron's Steps and Chacara do Ceu, this house has stunning views over the bay and Gloria marina. You can watch the Olympic events from the balconies!!
house_rules: We would expect anyone renting the property to treat it as their own, and we can provide the services of a maid and have a handyman on call.

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.host_about:
I am an Englishman who has lived in Rio for 20 years now, and my two sons were born and raised here (they are now at university in England), and I work in the financial market. The Wonderful City of Rio has so much to offer as I have learned from my own experience, from the traditional Samba during Carnival to the less-known Parque das Ruinas in Santa Teresa (all close by the apartment). We never stop living and learning, and whatever you are planning on doing in Rio de Janeiro, you will continue on this path with an open mind in Rio, and add an important chapter to your personal travel memoire, just by absorbing a few of the experiences Rio has on offer. I have travelled most of the world, and still come alive to the sounds of the different rhythms, love the extraordinary food, and the warmth of the local "cariocas". I would say my favorite film so far this year is Intouchables. The apartments that I have to offer are fully equipped, well located, and I will personally make sure you enjoy your stay, without invading your space. I live close by, and can be reached almost any time of day or night.

I look forward to meeting you!

Carpe Diem

Sou Inglês, mais moro no Rio ha 20 anos, tenho dois filhos quem nasceram aqui (agora eles estão estudando fora), e trabalho no mercado financeiro. Acredito nessa cidade maravilhosa e as oportunidades que oferece no futuro - como certamente me passou nas ultimas duas décadas. A gente vive aprendendo, e para qualquer um de vocês planejando visitar Rio de Janeiro, eu diria para ficar com mente aberta, e você vai crescer como uma pessoa, absorvendo só um pouco da experiência Rio tem para lhe provar. Já viajei o mundo, e adoro o som dos ritmos diferentes, comida extraordinária e povo tão caloroso. Meu filme favorito no momento e os Intocáveis. Os apartamentos que tenho para lhe oferecer são bem equipados, localizados, e eu cuido da sua visita pessoalmente, sem invadir seu espaço. Qualquer ajuda, só preciso me ligar - moro bem perto.

Carpe Diem

name: Nani La 'Ao (A Beautiful Day) Upstairs Suite
summary: This is a "stand-alone" accommodation not connected to other units. (Although there is an adjoining guest room with two twin beds,  for an additional fee of $69/nt. but only available for "same party" bookings. This accommodation is perfect for people who love nature, animals and privacy. King bed, kitchen, living area and 3/4 bath and lovely view of garden. Close to volcano, rugged beaches and cliffs, waterfalls and ocean.
space: This upstairs suite is located on a shared three acre property in a beautiful garden setting. Includes mini-kitchenette, living/dining area and indoor bathroom with shower. The accommodation has it's own wifi internet and includes Hawaiian style self-catered continental breakfast is included. Private entrance near parking area. King size real bed two twin beds and a couch. You will be completely surrounded by the beauty of nature! This is located in an actual rainforest with gorgeous trees everywhere. This is also a working organic permaculture farm, so some of the fruits served are grown on the property, nourished by the friendly farm animals (a miniature donkey,  boutique chickens, lop-eared bunnies bunnies, a friendly cat and an adorable little dog!) The sounds of the rainforest can be loud in the evening. We do provide earplugs if you need them!     Prepare yourself for an amazing experience with nature. We are  a short drive to some nice restaurants in Pahoa or Keaau. Be ready for

neighborhood_overview: We have numerous restaurants and shopping options within 5 miles. Close to the shoreline, warm ponds, lava viewing site, waterfalls, the volcano park and beaches, all less than an hour's drive.
transit: Covered parking is right in front of your stairway entrance. We are not walking distance to public transportation, restaurants, shopping or excursions, so it's a good idea to have your own vehicle.
access: You will have access to the entire three acres of this amazing property!
interaction: I am usually around if guests need help with anything.
house_rules: Our guests are lovers of nature and appreciate beauty, peace and harmony. No loud, disruptive or profane language, drugs or indoor smoking. There are no refunds for early departures. There are also no refunds if you are asked to leave early for breaking the rules.

host.host_about: Farmer, artist and massage therapist. Love to keep the property beautiful and enjoy welcoming visitors from around the world who appreciate beauty and know how to be happy.

reviews.comments: I had the greatest time here. First of all, what a cool experience. If you are into lush rainforests, organic fruits/veggies/nuts growing on-site, and stellar landscaping - than this is your place. The room is very very nice and the property is super cool. The donkey, Mocha, is fun to see work his magic and the house puppy is really cute. Meanwhile, Sherry is a great host who gave me a very thorough intro to organic farming and a lot of encouragement to get starred myself. Highly recommend this place. NOTE - be sure to follow Sherry'a directions here and NOT (Hidden by Airbnb) /apple maps. Your tires will thank you!

Wir waren 3 Tage bei Sherri in ihrem schönen, grünen Garten. Das Zimmer ist eigentlich eine kleine Wohnung, man hat genügend Platz für alles. Die Einrichtung ist bunt zusammengewürfelt, man merkt Sherri´s Liebe zum Detail. In der Nacht hört man ein buntes Tierstimmen-Gemisch, das sollte man erlebt haben. (Für den Fall, dass es zu laut ist, hat Sherri Kopfhörer und Ohropax bereitgelegt.) Ansonsten hat man es bei Sherri sehr ruhig, weil ihr Grundstück abseits der Verkehrsrouten liegt.
Das einzige Wermutstropfen ist, dass das Zimmer nicht sauber war- hier wäre ein gründlicher Frühjahrsputz angebracht.

Sherri had a warm Aloha welcome when we arrived!! The property was as described. It's definitely "shabby Chic" but very clean & comfy.
Loved the great bed!!

Sherri's place is very magical & grounding & we enjoyed our several days here. Unfortunately, we were on the run visiting a sick family member & never got to really visit or talk. 
We loved the night time noises, but realize it wouldn't be for everyone. 
The grounds are beautiful, we only wished we had more time to explore! We thought the location was good, in a beautiful neighborhood.

Sherry our host is an amazing person. Her place in the middle of the jungle is a little paradise if you like animals. The place is filled with her art and her heart. It was an amazing stay at her place. We thank her a lot.

pure magic! sherri was a lovely host & we were thrilled upon meeting our welcoming party of ducks, a chicken, & a sweet pup oh & of course the donkey! the cottage was so cozy & had lots of charm & character. an inspiring space & felt like home. sherri stocked us up with a lovely breakfast spread & gave us a tour of the property & we talked story. highly recommended, will love to visit again soon :) aloha

Airbnb is so fabulous!  Instead of staying in a sterile hotel, I was able to meet Sherrie and see what life in the jungle is like and enjoy all of her delightful animals!  If you are an animal lover, this is the place to go.  It's a bit remote (bring a prepared dinner with you because you won't want to leave once you're there), but the upstairs room is so wonderful to be in, three sides with windows that look out into the garden and the palm trees.  It has a real tree house feel to it.  Sherrie showed me how to feed papaya peels to the donkey, and Mr. Chris, the cat, bounded in the door when I opened it and spent the nights with me on the king-size bed, which was a treat for me.  If you are an adventurer and love being in open air, with the sounds of frogs at night, this is a wonderful stop just outside of Hilo and Keaau.

We really had a wonderful time at Sherri's gardens. Her place is so full of life and great energy! Her attention to detail made our stay pleasant and unforgettable. She left fruit and goodies for breakfast which we truly appreciated and really enjoyed. Her place at night is surrounded by the sound of nature and peace. We look forward to coming back!

Beautiful apartment on beautiful land in Keaau (Puna district).    The apartment was spacious, cool, relaxed, and the art was a lovely touch!  The garden was lush and the animals were really cute.  The night sounds were great, although some people may be more sensitive to it (Sherri has provided earplugs if that turns out to be the case).

Sherri is an extremely welcoming host and did everything to make us feel comfortable.  We were welcomed to the place but then left in complete privacy.  When we had a question, she was extremely quick to respond and accommodating in every way.
Animal lovers rejoice! Sherri is very friendly and her place is amazing. We fed the ducks and befriended all her (Website hidden by Airbnb) 2 year old daughter loved it. Thanks Sherri for everything!

Sherri is a fantastic host.  She lives a little off the beaten path so you get a real local feel whole still being close to everything.  Sherri was so sweet and welcoming and really made us feel comfortable. She has a donkey and goat and adorable little critters that you can play with and it was a lovely experience. We unfortunately had a travel issue and had to depart early but in our short stay it was clear Sherri has a little slice of heaven in paradise.  The attached apartment has everything you need and Sherri has put her own artistic touch on the place.  It is spacious for 2 people and just a short ride to downtown Hilo. Would definitely stay again.

Pros:
1) Many animals (donkey, rabbits, ...). Very interesting for someone like me who spends life in offices/apartments.
2) Like your own world. No people around.
3) Beautiful nature. There are many windows in bedroom, it's possible to imagine that you are sleeping in jungle.
4) Close to Hilo, Volcanoes National Park.
Pros/cons: 
1) I like to sleep listening sounds of nature: rain, birds singing and so on. But the second person in our party used earplugs provided by Sherri. So it depends on you if this is pros or cons.

Need to mention: the road is unpaved. We rented SUV, so no problems at all. But I think, that "smaller" cars are suitable as well.

It was very nice staying with Sherri. We loved  the bed in the jungle and the animals, especially the donkey. It  was cozy and relaxing, like being at home. We miss the donkey who greeted us every day and did a summersault for us to get  carrots.
We had a lovely time staying on Sherri's beautiful property. It is a real jungle paradise! The animals were very friendly and great to wake up to.

Truly an "Enchanted Garden".  If you want to get away and into a beautiful garden, this is the place for you.  When you sit on the outside veranda, there is a myriad of color and life that surrounds you.  A little off the beaten path, but well worth it.

If you are looking to see the natural side of Hawaii Island, be in the rainforest, and rest in a safe, clean, beautiful and eco- friendly home-- book with Sherri!!! Sherri is a true artist, her art is everywhere around the property from the floor to the ceilings and outside.  Everything is so pretty and dream-like so "Enchanted gardens" is fitting. Little touches throughout the home really tie everything together. the property is somewhat remote but only a short drive to town, the beach, and Volcano national park. You get the perks of being surrounded in rainforest and privacy but still get convenience, wifi, and hot water. 
Sherri was so helpful with anything we needed; she shared her art supplies with me and loaned us snorkel equipment and pool noodles after telling us the best spots on the island. 
Sherri and the animals were all sweet hearts. My favorite was the lovable pup, the friendly donkey and the happy chickens walking about the yard. She provided fresh fruit daily and offered us any fruit growing on the property. She even gave me a beautiful bouquet to take home with me. It was wonderful! 
My fiancé and I decided to get married on the big island, and we TRULY could not have had a better time or stayed anywhere better. Great for couples who want to adventure but have somewhere beautiful to come home to! Enjoy your trip, book Sherri!!!!

Stayed at this delightful jungle bungalow for five days.  Located in the rain  forest outside of Hilo, it's a bit of a drive to get there but worth it for the quiet and intense green vegetation that surrounds the place.  The rain was constant  - at least during our stay - but it's not cold, just cool.  The house itself is funky and full of Sherri's handicrafts, art and artifacts.  Sherri was a great and understanding host as well.  Would love to come back next time!

Amazing value. Spacious bedroom and living area, beautiful views of the surrounding forest from the second floor.  Very peaceful because the unit doesn't share any walls, ceilings, or floors with anyone else.  We loved falling asleep to the sounds of the forest and the rain. Sherri has created a unique and beautiful paradise here.  All of the animals are charming, especially the donkey.  If you stay on a Wednesday, be sure to visit Uncle Robert's Night Market for live music, food, and a great view of the glow from Kilauea.  Sherri was extremely responsive and accomodating.

space: The space is shared with two girls in their mid-twenties who work and study. They are typically home during evenings on weeknights. reviews.comments: The host canceled this reservation 179 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Malgré l'heure tardive à laquelle on est arrivés, Mickaël nous a très bien accueillis. L'appartement était propre.

name: Relaxing and Roomy in Crown Heights
space: This comfortable and spacious room is the middle room of a beautiful 3 bedroom apartment. With 2 doorway exits (one to the hallway and the other to the living room) the room has a unique setup while maintaining complete privacy. There is a skylight on the ceiling allowing for natural light and a ceiling fan for circulation.   The apartment is on the street side of a tree lined street, where natural light filters in throughout most of the day. I am located on the top (3rd floor, walk-up) of a lovely, family-owned brownstone which is located conveniently near numerous train lines (2,3,4,5,A,C, or Shuttle to the B,Q) - a short 20 minute commute to Manhattan. I have enjoyed this vibrant, lively and fun neighborhood for more than 6 years. On the block you can find unique coffee & tea shops with wireless internet, fresh baked goods, friendly bodegas, a couple of bars and EXCELLENT food (Thai, Mexican, Chinese, etc.) and a laundromat on the corner. Just a couple blocks further in either direc

house_rules: I ask that if you smoke, please smoke outside. I prefer to maintain a clean, peaceful, pet/animal free apartment. I ask that there are no unannounced guests or visitors and that guests are mindful of time in the bathroom since there is only one bathroom to share. Although I wont be changing your sheets everyday while you are here, I will make sure your room is clean, comfortable and fresh when you arrive. Also, please be mindful that since I work from home I may be in my room working and on conference calls so I am not always available to chat but I of course dont mind answering any questions you may have or addressing concerns. I am happy to share common spaces and amentities like the living room, cable tv and kitchen. Please be mindful of the shared spaces and maintaining cleanliness (guests are expected to wash their own dishes and wipe down counters after preparing meals). When using the stove I ask that you stay in the kitchen until you are finished cooking. I also prefer that gue

host.host_about:
As a Social Work Community Organizer, Educator and Activist, I spend most of my time working both locally and in other parts of the country/world.  I love the arts and have a background in theatre and music- and an interest in writing poetry. Although I dont drink or party, I am known to work it out on the dance floor! I talk on the phone a lot and am a morning gym person.

I grew up in the midwest and have lived in NYC for about 13 years. Ive been in my current (3 bedroom) apartment for about 12 years and have been doing airbnb for about half of that time! I am in my mid 30's, I work from home and enjoy a friendly, clean, peaceful environment.

If im home, Im often working in my room/home office. From time to time i host small meetings in my room or living room. Guests are welcome to come and go as they please. Since i have 2 rooms on airbnb i just ask folks to be mindful of other people, shared bathroom and kitchen, etc.  Although i dont normally get to spend a lot of time with guests, I truly enjoy meeting new people and it means so much to me for people to enjoy my home. Given the high rate of gentrification where i live, im also happy to share more about local businesses to support that invest in families who have historically lived in this neighborhood. Feel free to ask!

reviews.comments:
It was great! 
Rachael`s cosy home is in the middle of Brooklyn and Rachael is just brilliant, full of joy and energy. Just around the corner there are many nice bars and delis. It is such a nice place to be. On our first day we go for a "little"walk from R home to and over the Brooklyn Bridge. You can see and look so much on this walk, perfect. We definetely enjoyed our trip to NY and would ever go back to Rachaels home! 
Silvi & Jo

We had 5 wonderful weeks in the cozy brownstone-apartment in Brooklyn. The neighbourhood was amazing, with small cafés etc. with live music and local events on Franklin Ave (Little Zelda's, Cool Pony...), Brooklyn Botanic Garden + Brooklyn Museum + Prospect Park nearby. The apartment had a great kitchen, fully equipped and we sometimes took the dinner with us down to the front stairs on the street. Our room had a small walk-in closet and a bed, we also enjojyed the big living room. Rachael was so sweet. She worked a lot, but we could always ask her about anything. She had a great laughter and we sometimes chit chattet with her in the kitchen. We would definately recommend a stay in this great apartment!

Rachael was so wonderful! She really makes the effort to make her space friendly and lovely. She so obviously loves where she lives and loves her neighborhood and having others to share it with. It was so much fun and relaxing staying with her and talking about all kinds of things. She's the best and I would happily stay with her again!

I couldn't recommend staying in Rachael's house more highly. Rachael was very warm and welcoming and almost always available to ask questions of or even just have a chat with.
The house is in a really great old Brooklyn neighbourhood with plenty of character and some really great cafes, restaurants and vintage stores springing up just around the corner. The 2,3,4,5 trains are only a few minutes walk away so getting into Manhattan is a breeze.
I look forward to staying back with Rachael again whenever I'm next visiting New York.

I really didn't feel that Rachel's room was adequately represented in the listing. It's very much an interior room, not just by a hall and a living room, but also by a staircase, the bathroom and the kitchen. It's in the center of the apartment. The openings are sheet rocked in, so have no insulation. There is no separation from the owner's unit downstairs. What this means is that sound (all sounds, casual sounds, everything)  is completely transparent within the room. I would not recommend for a light sleeper, or for someone who needs to feel a sense of privacy. 
I also wrote up front about what I needed. I didn't feel listened to at all. Then I was blamed being for not being up front (apparently because I didn't emphasize that I seriously needed what I needed), and then was also told when I was angry that my communication style is overwhelming. It actually made me feel pretty "gas lighted."
Finally, the apartment is extremely expensive even by NYC standards. My friends who visited me during my month long stay were aghast. They felt that what I was paying for the room was close to what the rent probably was for the whole apartment.
...On the up-side the place is clean, and the neighborhood is great. The landlord downstairs is very nice too. For a few days of visiting if you're not noise sensitive, the apartment could be quite fine if you don't mind the price.

Rachael is a fabulous host and the apartment is just lovely! First let's talk about the apartment. It's the second and top floor of a brownstone. It's decorated beautifully and she has set aside shelf space in the kitchen and bathroom to allow you to really feel at home. The bedroom is very comfortable, with a large closet and dresser to store your things. The bed is soooooo comfortable! I slept like a rock!

The apartment is half a block away from great restaurants and groceries on Franklin Ave and a super short walk to the 2, 3, 4, 5, and S trains, and an easy walk to the A and C trains at Fulton and the LIRR stop at Nostrand Ave which I walked to every morning while I was here. Ask Rachael for recommendations on food. She knows her stuff!

Speaking of Rachael, she is one of the nicest people you'll meet in New York City. I had a few problems moving in that were entirely my fault, but she was attentive and helpful far exceeding any expectations. She makes you feel welcome and at home from the minute you arrive and she's a joy to chat with when you have a minute.

I would highly recommend this room to anyone coming to Brooklyn!

Staying at Rachael's has been wonderful. The room is spacious, quiet, clean and so comfortable, as is the rest of the house. There is such a relaxing atmosphere here, and i really look forward to coming home at the end of the day. It's just a great place to be. As for Rachael, she is honestly amazing! So warm and funny, and gives you exactly the right amount of space/attention. I highly recommend staying here, and it'll 100 percent be my first choice whenever i return to New York.

Rachel makes her home your home which is very important for a traveler, especially the one who's on business trip as was I. The room was clean, lovely, cosy and even the fact that there's no window there didn't bother me. 
Is you are looking for a short stay in Brooklyn, here it is.

Staying at Rachael's was perfect. I stay at her place two weeks with my brother. She was very nice, kind and always helpful when we needed something. We didn't see each other so often because she worked a lot and we went for trips to the city every morning. But when we did, she was always in a good mood, smiling and always helped us when we needed it and answered our typical tourist questions. The apartment was really nice, cozy and clean. We had everything we needed. Bed was very comfy, we had also plenty of space for our stuff - pretty big closet and chest of drawers. Living room and kitchen were available all the time. Our street and  whole neighborhood were really nice with lots of cafe places, restaurants, grocerys and everything you need. The closest subway station is like 5 minutes walking from home. So you can get to Manhattan very easy (2, 3, 4, 5 trains), there are also machines where you can buy your MetroCard. We really enjoyed our stay at Rachael's, she is great host and I would recommend it to everybody and definitely stay again when I come back to New York some time. :)
Great place and great host ! thank you Rachael.

We had the best experience staying with Rachael. She was a wonderful, friendly, helpful host who made our stay in nyc that much more enjoyable. The room we stayed in was exactly like the photos, nice and clean and a comfy bed. We were very comfortable in the apartment and liked the area. It was very easy to get to manhatten from the subway stop located very close to the apartment. I would definitely recommend this place to anyone and would absolutely stay here again.

Staying at Rachael's place was a pleasure. She was not at home all the time but we spoke a lot before our arrival so this was not a problem. She was very nice ans so was the place ! The neighborhood is quiet and the place is 5-10 minutes walk to the strain station and about 30 minutes train to the core of Manhattan. It was a really great stay !

Rachael was an amazing host, very friendly, kind and helpfull! We stayed 2 weeks in her room and it was a great experience. The room and the hole appartament are very clean and decorated in a cozy way, that makes you feel confortable. The room is just like shown in the pictures. Located in a very nice area, very close to subway stations that offers you lines which gets you to Manhattan in about 15 minutes. Despite there are a lot of small shops (like delis, groceries, cafes, etc.) and good restaurants nearby. We highly recommend stayind there!

Rachel was very accommodating and addressed any questions I had for her. The room is in a good location for those that need to travel frequently to Manhattan. Furthermore, there are some excellent places to eat in the neighborhood and a laundromat nearby. Be aware that the kitchen is a bit small and not optimal for those that like to cook a lot however this was not an issue for me.

Rachael was not in the apt during my stay and had her friend give me access and a tour of the apt. Nevertheless, Rachael checked in with me during my stay to see if I needed anything.  The apt was very clean and had everything I needed (looks like the photos). The neighbors downstairs can be loud occasionally but it didn't disrupt my sleep and was usually only brief bursts. I had no problems and would stay there again if I was in Brooklyn!

This was a wonderful place to stay during our 4-day trip in NYC. Rachael's home was warm, welcoming, and clean and she was very helpful. We weren't around much but felt comfortable coming and going as needed. We would stay here again!

I can really recommend this place, Rachael is a wonderful person who made us feel really at home, her house is very cozy and you she freed up space in case you want to use the kitchen. The neighborhood is also really nice, with lots of bars/restaurants and nice coffee shops. I'd just really like to thank Rachael for her hospitality!

Our first experience with AirBnB was great!

Rachael is an amazing host and we loved her place. She's a very kind roommate with a contagious laugh and wonderful singer! We loved hearing her singing from her bedroom while at home!

Crown Heights is a lively and characteristic neighborhood with lots of nice restaurants and bars.

The house is cozy and very warm (we liked this after walking all day long in a cold January!), we could use the kitchen whenever we wanted and eat in the homey living room.
The bedroom is clean and spacious. We appreciated the walk-in closet and the extras, like scented soaps, candles, shampoos..

Next time we'll be back in NYC, we'll surely book this place again!!
Lovely as always! Very comfortable bed and great location.
Racheal was a great host! Everything went smoothly, the room was very comfortable and had a beautiful atmosphere. Absolutely recommendable!

Rachael was a great host, very friendly and helpfull! We stayed 14 nights in her house and it was a great experience. The room is just like shown in the pictures, very comfortable, quite and cosy, the bed is great, we slept very well! The location is great, with a lot of restaurants, bars and small shops, also very close to some Brooklyn's spots like Botanical Garden, Prospect Park and Brooklyn Museum. The subway is just 5min walking and just 15min to go to Manhattan Downtown. I felt very safe on the neighbourhood, even in late night. 
I really enjoyed my stay at Rachael's and highly recommend to all!

Our stay in Rachel's apartment was really great.
The room was big and comfortable, the apartment was clean and had all what we needed. 
The location was very convenient, near the subway and near different grocerie stores, restaurants, laundromat, bar....
Our mates were really nice.
Rachael is a great host. She is friendly, helpful and cares about her guests and that makes the stay a wonderful one.

La casa se encuentra en un barrio estupendo. Los vecinos son muy agradables y hay muy buen ambiente en el barrio, especialmente por la tarde-noche ya que hay muchos bares donde tomarse algo. 

Rachael es muy simpática y agradable. Te ayuda en todo y trasmite confianza. Te hace sentir como en casa. 

Muchas gracias por todo. Esperamos que tu viaje haya ido muy bien y logréis vuestros objetivos. 

Besos, 

Ana y Viky

Rachael is a wonderful host! She is very kind and helpful person, which made that we felt uninhibited in the apartment. Room was perfect for a couple like us with  enough storage space. Bed was big and comfortable, ideal for relax and rest after whole day of sightseeing. Nice bathroom, very clean like the rest of apartment. 
Neighbourhood is a marvelous cultures mixture with plenty of fantastic places with really great food - from cofee with bagel till best burgers and vietnamese grilled pork. Really close to the trains to Manhattan, Williamsburg and opposite directions like JFK or Coney Island. We highly recommend Rachael and hers place!!

era mi primera vez con airbnb y la verdad que ha sido un éxito. Rachael se ha portado muy bien con nosotros aunque estuvo de viaje casi todo el tiempo que estuvimos en su casa,me sentí como si estuviera en mi propia casa, muy agusto. es una gran ventaja poder tener uso de la cocina. el barrio tenía muchas tiendecitas de comestibles y el metro está muy cerca y está muy bien conectado con Manhattan. me ha encantado en Nueva York y si vuelvo no dudaré en quedarme en casa de Rachael.Gracias de verdad.

Rachel is a very nice host. She really makes you feel at ease.
The place is really clean.
The room and the appartement are the same as in the picture. The bed is a full bed and the mattress is not firm. 
The neighborhood is really nice. Lots of bars and restaurants.

Rachael was very attentive and welcoming. Our communications about arrival arrangements were easy and pleasant. Her home office activity during the day was described accurately and was not a problem. The room and the bed were both very comfortable and the location is excellent. Public transportation options are an easy walk away, as are many choices for dining and coffee shops. I will definitely repeat, if the need arises.

Rachael is THE MOST AMAZING host in the entire world. She is extremely thoughtful and was excellent in making our stay comfortable and convenient. The room is very spacious and has a huge closet! My husband and I stayed here together and there was more than enough room, we never felt cramped whatsoever. Rachael provided a space for us to put our stuff in the bathroom and kitchen, was actually made our visit infinitely easier than other places we've stayed. We would absolutely, very highly suggest this room to anyone we know traveling to New York. We are so grateful for the time we stayed here and can wholeheartedly, completely recommend it! Thank you, again, Rachael for hosting us!!
The host canceled this reservation 51 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Rachael is a fantastic person, very kind, friendly and helpful. She always takes care of her guests.
We recommend her appartament in the hart of Brooklyn, close to the subway! 

She is wonderful guest cos she makes you feel like home.

We hope to come back soon!!

We stayed 4 weeks in Rachael's place. Rachael is a really nice person, helpful and respectful, it was a pleasure to get to know her and share the space. The apartment feels very cozy but there is ample space. It was actually almost like having the place to ourselves, we had continuous access to the living room, and there was enough storage space in the bedroom for two people. The location is lovely, many cool restaurants, coffee shops on Franklin Av and in the neighborhood.
The only thing if I have to mention something negative, would be that at one point we went for about 10 days without cleaning and things started to be not so neat.
Overall great stay, I would recommend Rachael to anyone.

I stayed at Rachel's place for about a month during the summer. As a host, she's really helpful and kind. The room without window is a bit hot during the summer, but Rachel installed an air conditioning some days before I moved out and the temperature became much better... I really like the neighborhood. I would totally recommend Rachel's place.

I had a lovely time at Rachael's place! The neighbourhood is lively but also feels very relaxed. My bed was very comfortable and I could find everything I needed in the kitchen. Rachael was also very accommodating when I had to change my check-in date at short notice

Rachael was an excellent host, very helpful and communication worked well. The apartment is in a nice area in Brooklyn with bars and restaurants close by, five minutes from the subway. 

We were two people. As the room has no window we had to leave one of the doors open (room has two doors..) over night to get in some fresh air but then it worked just fine. Would book it again.

I had a perfect stay at Rachael's! She is one of the sweetest people I have ever met and is an outstanding host. Her place is very cute and very clean - and the neighborhood is great. So many restaurants and very close to a few major trains. Felt more like staying with a friend than with a stranger. 10/10 recommend!!

I stayed at Rachael's place for about a month and a half. Rachael was a fantastic host! She was so friendly and laid back. She would always say hi to me if we saw each other in passing. She also has one of the best laughs! Her place was a home away from home. I especially loved the bed and the fact that the room had a huge closet, for NYC standards, of course. I was also able to use her kitchen, and she left space for me to put some things in the fridge, which was so nice. The location of her place was also great. Crown Heights is an amazing neighborhood, and her place was just a few blocks from the 2/3/4/5 trains. Overall, I loved my stay and highly recommend Rachael's place!

I stayed at Rachael's for six weeks and it was the perfect stay. Rachael is really kind and super helpful! She is the most amazing host!! The apartment is cozy and the neighborhood is great. Highly recommend!!
Great Stay!good location and warm welcome of Rachael with big smile

We had a nice stay. It was a cute place to stay in Brooklyn and It is fairly close to public transportation. I would warn those looking to drive up to prepare to spend time searching for a place to park and move the car on street cleaning days. The bed is soft but firm, we found it to be comfortable.

This airbnb is on a lovely block in a very cool area of Brooklyn. It is a peaceful and quiet place yet close to a subway station so you can easily get to the city. Rachael was a great host, she is very friendly and helpful, and even has communal snacks in the kitchen. The room was clean and spacious with access to a large living room with a/c. I would definitely recommend this place to anyone!
Location was perfect. We visited family in Brooklyn and just used Rachael's place as a crash pad.

I stayed at Rachel’s place for 4 weeks. She is a wonderful host, very friendly and welcoming! The location is great, near several different subway lines and lots of restaurants. The house is older but the bedrooms  and shared spaces are nice. I highly recommend staying here when you visit New York!

My wife and I had a wonderful vacation in New York in mid-October. Apartment Rachael is located in a quiet and green area of Brooklyn, not far from the Brooklyn Botanical Garden. Metro stations with gray, red and green lines are very close (100 and 300 m). It is very convenient to get to Manhattan (15 minutes by subway to Wall Street station). Rachael is a great hostess. She is very positive, sociable and caring. Rachael cooks very tasty. She treated us to a vegetable dish, which we called the Brooklyn delicacy from Rachael. I will recommend Rachael's apartment for visiting New York to all my friends.
Many thanks, Rachael!

I stayed in Rachael's apartment for a weekend while visiting friends in the city. The apartment is perfectly located near great cafes and restaurants and is decently central to a number of subway lines. The proximity to Prospect Park was also great. The photos don't totally do the apartment justice - it's quite cute. Great value for a room in an apartment in Crown Heights.
Hosted my sister and was easy to communicate with before and during the trip. Would 10/10 recommend!

I loved my experience staying with Rachael. I stayed with her for a month and she made my transition so much easier. The apartment is super cute and very cozy. She pays very close attention to detail and had so many things available for me that I had forgotten at home. The location was great. There were a lot of restaurants in the general vicinity and the train was a short walk away. She was extremely accommodating and would always ask me if I needed anything. When I go back to Brooklyn I will definitely be staying with her again! Thank you Rachael for an amazing stay!

name: Asia House, Garden Room, Princevile
summary: Asia House, sits on an ocean bluff in Princeville on the spectacular north shore of Kauai. The ocean or Queen's Bath is right across the street. There are beaches all over Princeville, all within 1-2 miles or less. Princeville Resort is a jewel on Hanalei Bay, known as one of the most beautiful bays and beaches in the world. This location is very quiet. Kauai has it all... spectacular scenery, gracious people, bird-watching, whale watching, snorkeling, diving, golfing, hiking, and more.
space: This private Garden Studio, with separate entrance, is fully furnished and has a Queen bed, cable TV, and WIFI.   There is a small kitchenette with a full refrigerator, microwave, dishes, pots and pans, blender, coffee pot, toaster oven, and more. It also includes linens, beach towels, and beach chairs.   Guests are welcome to use my kitchen for more extensive cooking. LOCATION, LOCATION, LOCATION.  We are within walking distance of two of the highest rated beaches in the world, Hideaways, and also across the street is famous Queen's Bath. It is a natural lava pool.The studio  is also a short distance to many breathtakingly beautiful beaches, 2 world famous golf courses, tennis courts, 2 world class resorts, a shopping center, beautiful walking paths, and many five star restaurants with spectacular views overlooking beautiful Hanalei Bay.   There are gardens, ponds, flowers, fruit trees, and lawn area that you are free to enjoy as well as a small garden patio with table and chairs.  Yo

There are beaches all over Princeville, all within 1-2 miles or less. Princeville Resort is a jewel on Hanalei Bay, known as one of the most beautiful bays and beaches in the world. This location is very quiet. Kauai has it all... spectacular scenery, gracious people, bird-watching, whale watching, snorkeling, diving, golfing, hiking, and more. This private Garden Studio, with separate entrance, is fully furnished and has a Queen bed, cable TV, and WIFI.
