interaction: No puc estar pendent dels hostes Si em necessiten poden enviar un missatge a través d airbnb i els atendre el mes aviat posible
house_rules: CHECK IN BEFORE 23,30 (URL HIDDEN) NO SMOKING ROOM SIILENCE from 22.00 to 8.00  /  SCHEDULE SHOWER 7.00 to 22.00 TAXES 1€ per person per day (when receiving the keys) BATHROOM  Keep the sink clean Keep your towels and utensils in your room Closes the light when not in use

host.host_about:
Mi nombre es Núria, mis amigos me llaman Maminú.
Me encanta tener gente en casa.
Cuando mi hija era pequeña todos sus amigos venian a casa antes de ir al cole, despues se marchaban juntos.
Lo que más me gusta es ir a patinar sobre hielo, cuando me pongo los patines parece que voy a volar.
Me gusta mucho leer
Amo a los animales, soy ecologista y casi vegetariana.

reviews.comments: Nice and cozy place to stay. We couldn't enjoy the terrace much as it was raining but house was warm and Nurnia was lovely. X

Nuria was a nice host, she is very easygoing and kind.  The apartment is very close to the metro and center. The area is quite lively and there are many restaurants and services (via Verdi), at the same time very quiet and we slept really well. One thing which could be improved is the cleaning, as I found the room quite dusty. I had a baby with me and so it was a bit inconvenient. The toilet on the contrary was very clean, but to my perception, the whole apartment needs better maintenance.

We had a great time in Barcelona. Nuria was very friendly. The room and bathroom was clean and also very quiet. The room was near Metro Lesseps (L3) and near Sagrada Familia, Parc Guell and Passeig de Gracia (big shopping street). Thank you!
We had a lovely stay at Nuria's, the location and accessibility was amazing.

Nuria was very kind and accommodating. The room was comfortable for the three of us, and it was very good to be able to enjoy the terrace. The house is a bit cluttered, though. And we could not shower after 10 pm, which was an inconvenience on the day of our arrival.
Apart from that, the place is very well located, on a lively neighbourhood, with plenty of access to buses and subway.

We enjoyed a two-night stay with Nuria in Barcelona.  Her listing is very accurate and we found everything as advertised.  Her apartment is in a good location, only a 10-minute walk from Lesseps Metro Station.  The Gaudi Guell Park is an uphill walk of about 900 meters.  Our room and bathroom were clean and the beds comfortable for our family of three.  The internet worked well and her rooftop terrace was pleasant for afternoon tea and breakfast.  In fact, Nuria offered us tea on the roof upon our arrival.  We enjoyed having use of the kitchen during our stay.  The elevator in her building was nice for carrying luggage up and down.  Our Spanish and Nuria’s English were minimal, but we were able to communicate.  This is certainly not a luxurious place, but good for those traveling within a budget.
Aunque fue una visita relámpago a Barcelona, cumplió todas las expectativas. El piso es bonito y cómodo, ubicación en una zona tranquila y con el metro cerca para todo lo demás.

We was live in Nuria's place for 9 days ! 
The location and room was good for short days to stay .
But! !if you want live more longer like us , you should think about this , because when we live there , the first day , she can speak a little bit English to us . But the rest 8 days , she only spoke Spanish to us .When we couldn't understand what she talk about, and she will spoke more louder voice in Spanish , look like she's angry , let us feel uncomfortable  . 
And the wash machine not for free , need pay 4euro for once !

Nuria was great! The space she had was spacious (even though 3 people were staying in it) and she was kind enough to help us with anything we needed! I loved staying with her and would stay if I ever come back to visit :) The location is great too!

La casa estaba genial,  tiene una terraza increíble y está muy bien situada. 
 Nuria fue muy amable tanto durante nuestra estancia como con pequeños problemillas antes del viaje. Repetiría sin dudarlo!

Well organised and nice place with lovely terrace. Area is also great. 

Host is friendly and helpful.

Nuria collected my parents and I from Barcelona airport for 25€. Our flight was delayed and we didn't arrive until 10pm, but I was able to notify her through (Hidden by Airbnb) just before we took off and she was fine about it. She  has a small VW Pollo which we just managed to fit all 3 of our big bags in to, plus us 3 and Nuria! She pointed out the closest metro station (Lesseps) on the way to her house and made us tea on the Terrace upon arrival to her home. She doesn't speak English so we communicated in Spanish. The room was fine for us, a very narrow apartment, as are most apartments in Barcelona. A small lift was good to take our luggage up as the apartment is the top of 6 or so levels. We had a fan in our room and a big open window which was great as it was hot! Shower is either hot or cold and bathroom shared with another guest room. Towels provided. Showers between 7:00 and 22:00 as bathroom is inbetween the 2 guest rooms and that rule is to help keep noise levels to a minimum for any guests who might prefer to sleep from 10pm. Approx 15 mins walk to Park Guell which was great! And about 25 mins walk to La Sagrada Familia. A really great fruit/vegetable/organic produce with the best of everything just a few streets away. Access to fridge available on request. Access to cutlery, crockery and microwave (not oven or stove). Great strong wifi connection. A few barking dogs in the neighborhood, but otherwise quiet. Nuria kindly offered for us to leave our luggage for the day as we were checking out, but we didn't need to. Nuria seemed to do a bit of work from home, she kept out of our way, but was around if we had needed to ask her anything. Over all our stay was good. Muchas Gracias Nuria!
Everything was so good!) We are very happy that chose Nuria's apartment. Thanks a lot!

Nice room, and she was able to provide an extra mattress to us when we requested. It is situated in a calm area, but close to the metro station Lesseps.
Núria provided towels and sheets and keys to the house.
tot molt bé
agréable séjour chez Nuria qui a été très accueillante

Gracias Nuria para la semana en tu casa.
The room were really  clean and the terrace is very pleasant.
The only thing is the neighborhood's dogs during the night.
So a beautifull travel for us.

la ubicación era inmejorable para el proposito de nuestro viaje, los barrios de alrededor eran una pasada para salir a cenar. La habitacion era comoda y Nuria nos lo puso todo bastante fácil.
Me hubiese gustado saber con antelación que tendría que pagar un extra "turistico" y creo que eso deberia ir incluido en el precio total... pero bueno. fue un placer hospedarnos en su casa.

Todo fue muy bien. Llegamos tarde asi que espero para poder entregarnos la llave. Habitacion comoda, tranquila, todo muy limpio. Cerca a la estacion de metro y un buen barrio. No tuve mucha interaccion con Nuria dado que saliamos temprano y llegabamos tarde. Solo me queda la duda del impuesto de 1€por pax por dia de estadia, no tenia ningun inconveniente en pagarlo pero no aun sigo sin entender el porque.

La habitacion era comoda, tranquila y todo muy limpio. La ubicación del apartamento es super bien, cerca de la estatión del metro y se puede obtener todo muy bien. Nuriá era muy amable, solícita y en total una anfitriona recomendable =)

We travelled to Barcelona for work and stayed at Nuria's for two nights. Even if we arrived very late, Nuria received us, showed us our room and shared good info about a local restaurant. The room was clean and tidy, same as bathroom.
Location was perfect for us as it is close to the subway (5 min walk) and was very quite.
I would definitely recommend Nuria as host if you are in Barcelona.

Hola, pues yo y mis amigas pasamos en casa de Nuria 4 noches. El piso es igual como en las fotos y la localidad es perfecta. Nuria es muy amabe y no tuvimos ningunos problemas. Hay que tener en cuenta que en piso no se puede utilizar la cocina pero los invitantes tienen la nevera propia y un pequeňo microondas, si se puede llamar así. El resto es muy cómodo, nos lo pasamos muy bien, gracias Nuria :)

I stayed in the double room for two days and one night with two friends. The lodging was as described and we had a room with three beds inside. We chose this place for its price and location. It was pretty close to a metro station and walking distance to quite a few shops. Would recommend if you're passing through the city and need a place to stay overnight.

La habitación y el baño son como se ven en las fotos. Bien situado, al lado del metro. Casa pintoresca con pasillos un poco estrechos. Hacía frío, sobre todo por la noche, pero nos proporcionó una estufa. Nuria muy agradable, aunque no hablamos mucho con ella.

La visita a Barcelona ha sido de relámpago. Pero cuando estas comodo y calentito simpre se agradece. La casa de Nuria ha cumplido las expectativas,  mas de lo esperado. Muy comodo para los 3, el baño muy grande y calentito.
Incluso nos ha dejado 3 tazas para tomar el te;)
Muchas gracias Nuria.

호스트는 정말 친절하다. 
우리가 지켜야 할 예의를 친절하게 설명해주었다.
정말 좋은 호스트이다. 좋은 위치에 집이 있다.
나는 그녀 덕분에 바르셀로나에 다시 한번 가고 싶다.

Room was as described, we were received by the host on the first day and she was very nice and welcoming. Room and bathroom were clean and tidy, and we were given the use of a microwave and fridge. All very good for the price.

Really friendly and awesome host and the location was great! Right next to the Lesseps Metro station that is only a few stops away from all the major plazas and hot spots of Barcelona. The apartment itself is also awesome with a really great view and lots of space in the room for a group of friends to split to save costs. Definitely recommend!
This was a nice place in a great neighbourhood. The beds were a bit hard but other than that it was fine.

Por la calidez en su recibimiento.
El hospedaje es cómodo e higiénico. 
La localidad del barrio es tranquila, segura y un poco cerca. 
La descripción del alojamiento cumple con la descripción del anuncio.

The room for two or three people is cosy and suitable for travelers of short duration. There's a microwave and a fridge, but no table or anyhting similar in the room and no cleaning products for the kitchen utensils. A part from that everything is clean, the bathroom flawless and Nuria is very friendly. To be recommended :-)
Nice place.Very kind host!I suggest this flat everyone.
Nuria's place was just as she described it, it is right near a  salon she owns, "La Groc". She was very nice, and even offered to pick us up from the airport. Good experience.

Communication was good and Nuria worked around our lack of a mobile phone to email us information. Be careful getting directions as the exact address Nuria sent us took us 9.4km away to a crematorium (using a 2015 Renault factory GPS)?? 

The location of the apartment is very good and the precinct is fun and lively at night. Nuria's place is a bit more like a hostel than a home, with multiple guests sharing a hallway and bathroom and lot of rules about what can and can't be done or used.

The apartment is very cluttered but our room was adequate for our family of 3 and the price was reasonable. Parking outside is near impossible and using the bathroom vanity to get water for coffee and to wash up isn't ideal.

The lift to the top attic level is a great addition to the quirky building and we enjoyed seeing a little of Barcelona from this location.

Nuria was very nice when welcoming us and told us everything we needed to know about staying there. The room was comfortable, well lit, and stayed cool at night. The room was separate from the rest of the rooms in the house, which was good for privacy as well. We enjoyed our stay!
Núria is very nice, available and flexible. The room is quiet and clean and the bedding is good. Good experience !
The flat was well conected to the centre, supermarkets very near, Nuria was helpful :-) the only bad thing was sharing bathroom with lots of people so sometimes there were fights :-D

Núria was very kind from start to finish. We had trouble finding where she was picking us up but still greeted us with a smile and pointed out helpful particulars (like the metro stop) along the way back to the apartment. We found plenty of places in the neighborhood just walking to our destinations, although you might want to search online beforehand so you know where you're going exactly, especially at night. Pleasant walks to Park Güell and Sagrada Familia. We got to the Cathedral via metro no problem, and my friend and I are no experts at public transportation. If we can figure it out, anyone can. The wifi didn't work for us but we didn't really need it for such a short stay and it was no problem, we didn't even mention it (we think it might have been our phones). We stayed for 2 whole days and 3 nights, and we saw everything we wanted to see. Would recommend for a short trip where you don't mind feeling like you're at sleep away camp with your bunkmates. Núria also gave us a ride to and from the airport and that was a good experience as well.

Everything was perfect. Nuria is very nice, the room is exactly like the pictures, very well located housing. The neighborhood is nice and quiet, good restaurants nearby, metro 5 minutes walk, and it is very easy to walk to guel park (free from 9:30 pm).
Nuria thank you for your hospitality and kindness.

Núria was a very kind host, we really enjoyed staying at her place. The house is located perfectly with two metro stations close by, and the neigbourhood is just lovely! I can definetly recommend staying there
I only met Núria once, but she was very nice. The room looks just like the picture. The neighborhood is very close to the metro station. Would stay there again!

Nuria was very accommodation and kind to us throughout our stay. She was an excellent host. The location was extremely nice and convenient for trips into central Barcelona. It was a little inconvenient to schedule showers in the given time but nothing that was too troublesome or unexpected. Staying here made our trip to Barcelona great and enjoyable!
El piso está tal y como aparece, Nuria es una chica muy agradable y puedes dejar las maletas sin problema en la casa a pesar de la hora de salida.
Hey Nuria, thanks!
Nuria was very nice even if we lost our presents but we should talk about that before! Thank you.
The room was exactly as we expected, simple and homey. Thank you for opening your home to us, Nuria!
Nuria was a great host: avaible and kind. The room has all the confort for few days. The position of the house is perfect, not so far from the centre but well connected even when the metro is closed

Nuria is a very kind person and a great host. She provided utensils and dishes and the room itself was exactly what we expected. the apartment is nearby the metro station so the connection to the centre is very good. Although we didn't obey the house rules (showering hours 7-22) as we came and left the apartment almost in the middle of the night due to our flights, we didn't hear any complaints. Thank you Nuria!

Nuria is very nice and helpful, the apartment is like on the photos and calm. The district "Gracia" is super. We advice Nuria's rooms for your travel in Barcelone. 

Julie.

I highly recommend staying with Nuria. Our experience was pleasant, she provided clear instructions on what she expected. 
Location really close to public transportation. Getting around wasn't a hassle.
Núria is really friendly and helpful.
Muy buen lugar, se agradece la confianza. Tiene todo lo que se necesita para una estancia corta. Excelente trato.

accueil pas très chaleureux.
Attention stationnement interdit pour les non résidents.
Dommage que des chiens aboient la nuit...tant pour l'hôte que pour les résidents.

Ich würde die Unterkunft jedem weiter empfehlen! Das Zimmer entspricht genau den Bildern und der Beschreibung auf der Website. Núria hat sich sehr viel Mühe gegeben, als der Kühlschrank vor dem Zimmer kaputt ging, wurde er sofort am nächsten Tag ersetzt und zwischendurch hat sie unser Essen mit Kühlakkus kühl gehalten.  Auch dass wir später abends ankamen war kein Problem. Am Abfahrtstag sind wir erst mittags gefahren und durften wir unser Gepäck im Gang stehen lassen. Und zu guter letzt: die Lage ist super!

The room was what we expected. Clean with three beds and in a good location. There was a small fridge where we could keep some food, but limited kitchen utensils. Since we spent almost all of our time out that wasn't a problem.
Great location not far from the train to get into Barcelona. Cute town with cafes, shops and laundry near by. Beds were comfy and Nuria was a sweet, flexible host!

Séjour très agréable chez Nuria, qui est une personne très souriante, disponible et arrangeante !

Logement dans un quartier calme, très facile d'accès.

Très bon séjour à Barcelone, chez Nuria. L’appartement est très bien situé, proche du métro mais sans aucun bruit de circulation. Nous avons aussi apprécié pouvoir nous rendre au parc Guell à pied en moins de 10min ! Nous avons peu vu notre hôte, mais elle était très accueillante et serviable! Le logement était conforme à l'annonce. Juste à noter que la porte de la chambre était impossible à fermer.

The location was really strategic. About a 10 mins walk from the Lesseps metro station which connect to all the other touristy places ie. Passeig Da Gracia and La Rambla. And Nuria was really friendly as well.

Nous avons été bien accueillis pas Nuria. L'appartement est très bien situé et pratique d'accès. La chambre de 3 personnes était un peu petite pour nous qui sommes de grands gabarits ... Nous avions la salle de bains pour nous seuls. Pour prendre le petit déjeuner sur place, ce n'est pas très pratique.

Notre séjour chez Nuria s'est bien passé. Recherchant une chambre toute simple (puisque très peu dedans sinon pour y dormir), bon marché et située dans un quartier sympa, cela convenait tout à fait. Draps et serviettes de bain fournis. Salle de bain correcte. Lieu calme la nuit. Pas évident de prendre le petit déjeuner sur place (ce que nous ne recherchions pas de toutes façons puisque voulant profiter au maximum de la ville !). La chambre se trouve à 1/4 h à pied du Park Guell et on est rapidement sur l'une des nombreuses petites places agréables du quartier populaire de Gracia pour profiter de quelques tapas ou d'un café matinal. Le métro de Lesseps (ligne verte) se trouve à moins de 10 min. à pied. Adresse très pratique donc !

Nuria has been very polite And Kind!The room was good And Not far from The city centre! !
The room Was a little dusty And cold (we went there in february)

地理位址很好,市中心,附近有超市,走路7分鐘到捷運站,桂爾公園徒步15分鐘就到!
廁所算大但馬桶水自行失蹤兩天,我們用水桶自己裝水沖馬桶~洗澡水若不甚滴下一點點樓下就會打電話通知,

房間比預想的大一些,沒有大燈~有兩個小夜燈~其他燈皆是裝飾品~orz
廚房~~~是一個在走道上的微波爐和一個小冰箱(4人共用)~餐具看起來像某人用很久就不甘丟只好留給客人的,
電梯要小心,雙層門兩道都要關緊,不然其他住戶不能用,
房東會講西班牙語,其他聽某

Great location, very close to Parg Guell and cool Verdi street. Núria is very kind, she came for us to the airport in the middle of the night. Room was clean and solid size for three persons. Very good vacation in Barcelona!

Nuria was very sweet and welcoming. If I had any questions about, she was more than happy to answer or lend some help. Also, we weren't far from the metro so getting to the sight seeing area of Barcelona was extremely easy.
We would like to thanks Núria, for her hospitality and her disponibility. A clean room, and an apartement very close to a metro station. Good location ! We will come back for sure !

Our flight was cancelled, so we did not come to Nurias house. But We had a very nice and Kind Konversation per Handy. So, when we start a new trip to Barcelona, we will try to stay at Nurias house, when she is free.

Núria was really Kind and accomodating and the communication was perfect (our flight was late). The appartament is in a perfect position in a lovely area, Gràcia. The room was clean and nice for three people. 
We reccommande!
Gracias Nuria!!!!! Nos sentimos como en casa!!! Súper servicial. Nos ayudó en cada situación y la habitación muy limpia. También el baño. Recomendamos este lugar.

Nuria was a very nice and welcoming host and the room was clean. There are two issues, 1) you can't lock the room, there is no locker or safe and besides Nuria there is another room that is also rented to up to three people. So if you want to leave your valuables you not only have to trust Nuria (which I would) but also all the other guests. You also share the bathroom with the other room, (so up to six people). And there is no kitchen. Just a mini fridge and a microwave (that doesn't work very well in the hall) the location was good and the other guests and Nuria were very nice, we actually stayed an extra night. But don't expect luxury. I feel bad leaving a mediocre review because Nuria was very friendly but the room was bare minimum for us. Ideal for students who just want to come to barcelona and have a cheap place to crash.
Great location and lovely host for a crazy price! Nuria is very helpful and available for questions. We appreciate our stay a lot!

Très bon accueil. La taille de la chambre et de la salle de bain sont très appréciables. La rue est très calme et le quartier très bien placé par rapport au centre. Plusieurs places typiques avec bar à tapas tout prêt. Jardin juste à côté pour les enfants. Parfait! Je recommande!

The room and the bathroom were well prepared, clean and we had everything we needed. The apartment was close to the metro L3 going to the center. We had a very good stay. Sorry again for coming late due to our delayed flight. I used Airbnb many times for my trips but it was new for my partners so I apologize if there was anything annoying you.

Núria was very welcoming and helpful, despite being limited in her English. There is not much to do around the location, but it is very close to the metro L3 so it evens out. I would recommend staying here if you want to be out of the touristy areas. It was a very pleasant stay.
Nuria has nice personality and very helpfull but the house is so dusty and dirty.  If you are sensitve person about Hgiene, you will be unhappy and uncomfortable.

Estuvimos en casa de Nuria del 1 al 4 de junio. La descripción de la casa es tal cual se ve en la publicación. Nuria fue muy amable al recibirnos y siempre se mostró dispuesta a ayudarnos. El barrio está muy bien conectado con medios de transporte (a unas cuadras está el L1 y el L4), cerca de Parc Güell y a solo 25 minutos de caminata de Plaza Catalunya.

Núria was very kind and was waiting for us at the airport even though our flight had a one hour delay. Place is very good situated, close to the underground, everything is easy to reach. Room is little but lovely:)
The place was just as described and was both clean and conveniently located. Nuria was pleasant and helpful throughout our stay. I would happily recommend this accommodation to anyone.
chambres identiques aux descriptions. Mais dommage que nous n'avons pratiquement pas vu Nùria.
Séjour très agréable chez Nuria. Proche des transports en commun et dans le quartier très vivant de Gracia. La chambre est au calme et propre.

Ha sido una experiencia satisfactoria, que ha cumplido a cabalidad con las expectativas, ubicación excelente, muy cerca del Metro, Para Guell y parada del Bus turístico. Nuria ha cumplido bien su rol de anfitrión.
Very nice person, very nice place - i recommend :)

La habitación es muy cómoda, con todo lo necesario para la estadía. Nuria fue muy amable en la bienvenida y siempre estuvo a disposición ante cualquier consulta. Fue agradable quedarnos en el barrio de Gracia, el transporte público está a proximidad y cerca de varias atracciones turísticas como el Parc Güell y la Sagrada Familia. Mi familia y yo recomendamos esta habitación!

The room was comfortable and Big enough for 3 People. The bathroom was clean. Apart from that it was easy to reach the City Center by metro. Near the Appartement you can Find many Restaurants and a Big Supermarkt. We can recommend this accomodation!

El cuarto queda en un lugar muy céntrico y como a 10 minutos caminando de la estación de metro Lesseps, Nuria fue una excelente anfitriona, tiene muy en cuenta las necesidades del viajero, además es sumamente amable y simpática. Éramos 3 chicos de Costa Rica que visitamos Barcelona en Julio 2016. Yo recomiendo muchísimo hospedarse en este lugar.

С хозяйкой общались очень мало, район в котором находится комната недалеко от метро и парка, комната больше похожа на хостел пригодна только для ночлега на короткое время, ужасно маленькие неудобные подушки, чайника нет воду для чая и кофе можно греть только в микроволновке. Вообщем очень не уютное жилье для такой цены. Я бы свои знакомым не порекомендовала его.
Accueil très sympathique. L appartement est bien situé dans Barcelone.
The room was very quiet and in a great location. Nuria was a very nice host :)

Hostitelka vždy ráda poradila, nebyly žádné problémy s komunikací. Okolí je krásné a blízko Parku Gűel, do centra se za 40 minut dá dojít pěšky. Rozhodně doporučuji sejít do jedné z vedlejších uliček, Carrer di Verdi. Učinily jsme tak na radu naší domácí a objevily nepřeberné množství restaurací, kaváren a barů s překrásnou atmosférou typickou pro Barcelonu. Že byla k pokoji k dispozici také lednička a rychlovarná konvice jsme velmi ocenily.

We found the accommodations to be a minimal standard. There was no place for us to put away our clothes away because the closets  were full of her items. We had to share a tiny and not very cold frig with others guests so there was very little room for cold food. The narrow hall was cluttered and dusty. Electric outlets didn't work and there were bizarre decorations that felt creepy. Nuria was very nice to us and picked us up at the airport, on the way back to the airport a taxi cost less than what her fee was. The towels and sheets were old and smelled musty. The location was wonderful for our purposes but I would definitely not recommend staying at her place.

L'accoglienza da parte di Nuria è stata ottima. 
La descrizione dell'annuncio rispecchiava ciò che realmente vi era. 
Il quartiere è molto tranquillo (e anonimo), vicino alla stazione Lesseps ma lontano dalla più rumorosa Barcellona.
The room was well worth the money. Not a crowded area -it felt safe- but quite far from the city center. The only thing I'd say is that the closet was full of stuff so that we couldn't use it...

Alles war soweit in Ordnung. Alles nötige vorhanden: Kühlschrank, Wasserkocher, Mikrowelle und Geschirr im Flur für beide Parteien. Das Bad wurde jeden Tag geputzt. Das Zimmer hatte eine angenehme Größe. Es war nachts sehr ruhig da. Nuria war sehr nett, aber man musste Spanisch mit ihr sprechen. Sie ließ uns all unsere Extrawünache Gewehren! Das viertel war sehr angesagt und cool. Ea gab viele Ess- und Shoppinggelegenheiten. Insgesamt waren wir mit dem Aufenthalt zufrieden.

Nos dió mucha autonomía. Al llegar ella estaba ocupada, pero nos dío las llaves, la contraseña de wifi, me enseñó a cerrar bien la puerta y nos dejó que nos instalemos tranquilas. El barrio lindo para pasear por la noche, muy típico. Para ir a la playa hay que tomar el metro.
estuvo normal , no hubo ningun inconveniente , no tuve la oportunidad de conocerla personalmente , no fue eso un motivo de disconformidad.-

Núria est sympathique et discrète. Nous disposions d'une chambre avec 3 lits et une salle de bain que nous partagions avec la chambre d'a côté. L'appartement est proche de deux stations de métro, situé au 4ieme étages. 
Núria fournit le linge de maison et de toilette et met à notre disposition de la vaisselle un frigo, une bouilloire. Elle a des chats mais nous ne les avons pas vu du séjour. Muchas Gracias para este semana Núria. Manon, Anne-Charlotte et Perrine
Cerca del metro, calle tranquila sin ruido, Nuria muy maja, la única pega es la falta de limpieza.
Núria nagyon kedves házigazda volt, mosolygós és segítőkész. A szállás olyan volt, mint amilyennek gondoltuk, minden rendben volt.
Soluzione ottima per girare la città avendo la metro lesseps a 500 metri. Nuria è' molto gentile e disponibile

Super grateful for Núria's hospitality! It was a really nice location - short walk from both Park Güell and a central metro station. She gave us all the necessary info upfront and we had a great stay.
Great location and the room was clean and had plenty of space. Would stay here again!
Rapport qualité-prix très bien.
La casa queda  a unas cuadras de la estación de metro Lesseps.
Nuria was a brilliant host. She made us feel welcome and helped us in any way she could.
O apartamento tem boa localização, o metro está próximo e em 10min chegam ao centro.

Núria was a great host, if we had any questions she was there to help and provide us with useful information. Her place is located in a quiet neighborhood with lots of great restaurants and bars. Our room was clean and had everything we needed. There is no access to the kitchen but she provides a mini refrigerator, microwave, kettle and utensils. I don't have any complaints and I would definitely stay there again.
Everything ok, clean room, good communication, nice welcoming, perfect for our stay

개인적으로 쓸 수 있는 이불 베개 시트를 줘서 깔끔했어요. 하지만 집이 매우 춥고 우풍이 불어서 힘들었답니다. 구엘공원과는 가까운 위치지만 그외에 까탈루나 광장과는 택시로 15~20분정도 걸리는 먼거리였어요. 커피포트도 청소가 안되어있어서 위생적이진 않았네요. Terrible cordination, dirty stuff, lift didn't work for 3days. But host said just don't know. It's very bad. No safety lock in the room so scared. I don't recommand this place.
We enjoyed our time here.  Excellent location and nice quiet room.
Appartement calme, le métro est a proximité, la literie confortable, pour un prix très intéressant. Prévoir une solution pour le parking car peu de place ou très cher.
Rapport qualité/prix parfait, tout était à notre disposition.
Great
Small room, but serves its purpose. Nuria is very accommodating. Great value.

Todo ha sido óptimo! La habitación triple está muy bien y está junto al baño que está muy limpio, agua caliente perfecta! La ubicación del piso es inmejorable en el hermoso barrio de Graçia, metro Lesseps L3 verde a 3 minutos andando y Joanic L4 amarilla a 7 minuntos; la. Asa es tranquila y se descansa bien, seguramente la próxima vez en Barcelona repetiremos, Gracias Núria x todo
Great Value. A little cluttered but clean. Not a place to party but great place to rest. Great location.
Nice flat in walking distance from La Segrada Familia and other tourist destinations
Good place to stay.

Núria's place is in a great location close to the metro and a convenient grocery store. The room is comfortable and she was very easy to communicate with. Make sure to read the house rules before you book because they are a little strict (though reasonable) compared to other airbnbs.
A comfortable room close to the city.

Núria est sympathique et disponible. Nous avions une chambre avec 3 lits et une salle de bain que nous partagions avec la chambre d'a côté. L'appartement est proche de deux stations de métro, situé au 4ieme étages. Le linge de maison et de toilette est mis à disposition. Il y a également un frigidaire et  une bouilloire qui peuvent être utiles. Muchas gracias para este fin de semana y por su amabilidad. Mélanie, Arnaud et Marin

Núria was really lovely and communicative (we spoke in Spanish), the room was exactly as advertised and comfortable. Most of all the location was perfect for allowing us to see all the main sites of Barcelona being only a short distance from Lesseps metro stop and a large supermarket. ¡Gracias, Núria!

Très bon séjour, 
Appartement idéalement placé pour les transports en commun, mais aussi à 2kms de la Sagrada et du park Guell ! 
Appartement idéal pour un séjour entre amis 
Hôte très serviable !
Una ubicación perfecta para disfrutar de Barcelona! El único pero es la falta de un espacio para poder cocinar lo básico. Muchas gracias por la oportunidad!

Der Aufenthalt bei Nuria war sehr angenehm! Sie ist eine sehr herzliche Person und es war immer eine Freude auf sie zu treffen.
Muchas gracias Núria y quizá hasta pronto..
Julia
Good location. Real place/area, not so touristic as in the center of BCN. Simple room with good value for money.  Fun in the room but when temp. is around 30 can be a bit to hot.

Nuria's place was in a great location! Extremely close to the metro station but also a 20-25 minute walk to Sagrada Familia and city centre! The room itself was clean and spacious and Nuria was great with communication!
We were three and the room was perfect for us. The location is great close to the metro and the parc guell. Good quality price

Nuestra estancia fue muy agradable, la habitación es tal cual se ve en las fotos del anuncio, solo que el frigorífico y el microondas no están dentro de la habitación si no que está en medio del pasillo, y la puerta de la habitación no tenia llave, por todo lo demás  muy bien, Núria nos daba toallas limpias a menudo y el cuarto de baño siempre estaba limpio y ordenado.

Nuria est une hôtesse très agréable, elle est disponible et très discrète. L'appartement est parfaitement situé à 3 minutes à pied d'une ligne de métro importante. Il y a plusieurs commerces très proches de l'appartement et le quartier est très agréable. En revanche, il est impossible de cuisiner dans l'appartement et le fait de partager la salle de bain peut entraîner  quelques désagréments au niveau de la propreté. Nous avons un bon séjour dans l'appartement de Nuria.

Le logement est proche de toutes commodités, juste à côté du Park Guëll. 
Endroit très bien desservi par les transports en commun.
Par contre le réfrigérateur pour une capacité de 5 locataires au total (2 chambres) est bien trop petit.
Il n est pas facile de se faire à manger sur place.
Le changement de locataires airbnb quotidiens dans la seconde chambre en est gênant.
Le partage de la salle de bain aussi mais c est indiqué dans le descriptif.
Un simple ventilateur ne fait que brasser de l air chaud. La chambre notamment à 3 lits est difficilement supportable de part la chaleur. Encore une fois le ventilateur est indiqué dans le descriptif donc on sait à quoi s en tenir.
Nous n avons aperçu Núria que 3 fois en 7 jours. 
Endroit néanmoins très calme.
Bien lire les conditions car n ayant pas tput lu j ai été surprise de devoir en plus 21€ à la fin du séjour (taxe de séjour 1€/jour/personne même pour les 
enfants) et de surcroît en espèces. 
L ayant appris que la veille de partir le soir en soirée, j ai dû trouver un distributeur.

Nuria's place is in a nice location, near a metro station and a supermarket. The neighbourhood is very pleasant as well. The room can get hot on warm days and features an electric fan. The stay was overall pleasant.

Leuke locatie in een Catelaans wijkje. Niet heel druk, maar veel pleintjes waar 's avonds veel locals samen komen om wat te drinken. Het huis is prima voor wat het kost. Het wordt er wel warm.
Núria is erg vriendelijk en reageert snel op berichtjes.
Great value for Barcelona. Cool bars and cafes around the place. Easy transit to the city center.
La zona es un barrio muy animado en cuanto a lugares de cenar y tomarse unas copas, sin embargo la habitación ( triple) tranquila y espaciosa!

Le logement est très bien situé. Nuria est discrète, nous nous sentons chez nous. Il n'y a pas de place pour cuisiner mais un petit réfrigérateur pour mettre de petites choses. La salle de bain commune pour les deux chambres et tenue propre chaque jour c'est agréable. La chambre n'est pas spacieuse mais suffisante pour dormir. Pour mon amie qui est allergique, beaucoup d'acariens... sûrement dans les couvertures qui étaient rangées et qui n'avaient pas du servir depuis un moment. La qualité  est bien pour le prix.
Núria war eine sehr freundliche und jederzeit zu erreichende Frau! Kann die Wohnung nur jedem empfehlen!
bien plaçé  trois couchages ok propreté ok juste réglage difficile de la T°c de l'ean pour la douche avec des enfants et aux installations électriques vétustes
Everything was fine, fair prices. Nice area
convenient location, clean place, nice people, recommanded

Nuria war sehr gastfreundlich, hat unsere Ankunft und die Abfahrt gut organisiert und ist sehr freundlich. Wir haben uns bei ihr wohl gefühlt!
Ein Problem mit einer Glühbirne hat sie sofort gelöst. Wir waren 4 Tage dort und sie hat nach 2 Tagen die Handtücher gewechselt. Die Lage ist gut, der Stadtteil Gracia angenehm wenig touristisch und mit der Metro gut zu erreichen.
Ein gutes Preis-Leistungsverhältnis!
Danke Nuria!
Vše bylo v pořádku, jediná nevýhoda bylo nefunkční topení v pokoji.

Núria est très agréables nous étions 3 jeunes la bas. Le quartier est vivant avec les magasins, bars, boits de nuits, restaurants et métro à proximité . Nous avons vraiment passé un week-end agreable et peut couteux.
Alojamiento como se espera en las fotos, sin demasiadas sorpresas. La anfitriona fue muy educada y simpática.

Óptima ubicación, barrio muy bonito y a 5 min del metro. La habitación es tal y cual a como aparece en las fotos pero no hay cocina por si quereis comprar y cucinar en casa. El baño estaba bien pero sin ventana.
Very good situated place to stay in a very cool neighborhood. We were three and the room was perfect for us, comfortable beds. Good quality price.
The stay at Nurias was very nice
Puede mejorar mucho el alojamiento, pero dependiendo de tu presupuesto esta bien.

The room was as it was in the pictures. The location is excellent! Really close to the metro starion Lesseps and wakable distance to Parque Güell, and pretty much anything you need (e.g. Casa Batlló about 30 mins walking!)! 
All in all, I recommend it.

We were really satisfied with everything. Nuria was very nice and helpful, a flat has very good location and price is really appripriate.

Thank you for everything.

We are recommending this accomodation for 100%.

I would never rent this place again. Nuria was nice but this place is way lower standard than the price. She didn't even made beds.she mentioned that I don't do that. bed sheets were like a rag comfortes were also smelling bed.she had a tiny fridge n microwave in the hallway which you share with others.if you use any utensils you wash them in the bathroom sink (which was really disgusting). She has high rules and extra charge like occupancy tax but in return no facility.
Me gustó el hospedaje, la relación precio-servicios es buena.

Le quartier est tranquille, à 10mn à pied de la station de metro la plus proche Lesseps et 15mn du pac guëll ,nombreux commerces autour.Nurìa est discrete et tres reactive quand on a des questions , je recommande.
The host provided all the basic needs.
Excelente ubicación, cerca del Metro y otros puntos turisticos de interés, Nuría muy amable.
Everything was Perfect at Nurias place. Recommend!
Minden rendben volt...
A great place to stay.
Our stay was relatively pleasant, except that we had to pay 1euro per person per day separately.
The location was good, near to Park Guell and metro station. But we can’t lock our room.

Nuria is a very friendly and warm host! The place is located in close proximity to shops, eateries and supermarkets! However,  do note that strict shower time rules are enforced ( 7.00am-10.00pm ) as you may want to consider this when planning your day.
Appartement idéalement placé dans le quartier de gracia. Parfait pour découvrir Barcelone . Simple, propre et fonctionnel. Très bon rapport qualité prix .

Todo bien, sólo una lastima que la persiana del dormitorio estuviese estropeada durante nuestra estancia. Nuria nos explicó que ya había avisado pero que no vinieron a arreglarla a tiempo. Lo solucionamos poniendo unas toallas en los cristales la segunda noche. Nuria es muy amable y destacar que nos esperó hasta altísimas horas la primera noche. Eso no lo hace todo el mundo. Agradecerle de nuevo su hospitalidad y dedicación. Se nota su toque personal en el alojamiento y que lo hace con ganas. Los cambios de toallas en el servicio y limpieza en el baño son muy destacable y se nota esa dedicación que lo e Nuria. Desde luego que repetiría.
It was a place with communications and close to the city.  Accomodation were good but it would have been better with AC during the hot nights.

The Pros :
Location, peaceful , clean bedroom, and nice host 
The Cons :
1 bathroom/toilet for 5 people, "kitchen" very limited (only microwave/small shared fridge/no place to eat), we had to prepare the bed ourselves
Very spacious room with all the equipment needed, emplacement very good 10min if walk from the closest subway. Nuira is very nice and here if you need something. I recommend this room.
The room was small but totally satisfactory. Núria is a wonderful host, very nice and helpful. We had a really good time at her place!! Thank you very much :)

This airbnb is totally recommendable. It's close to the buses and the metro station which helped us a lot. The thing we liked the most is that it is not in the city center, so you stay away from big crowds. At the same time the area is lively and you can always find a place to eat and hang out. The triple room is very cozy with love to the detail. Be careful to make sure that you have enough (small) water bottles on hot days because the room can get very hot without air-conditioning. The fan is often not enough and the fridge is quite small. Although the friendliness and hospitality of Nuria made us connive the small downsides. She was always available per message and ready to help.
Très bien placé, hôte très agréable. La chambre est séparée du reste de l'appartement et collée à une autre chambre rbnb.

Accommodations are simple, but very clean and exactly what my friends and I were looking for. The location in a peaceful neighborhood very close to the metro is also an easy walking distance to Parc Güel and during the month of August (when I went) was conveniently near the street parties throughout Gracia. Nuria herself was very friendly and asked several times if there was anything we needed.
très satisfaite de cette première expérience "Airbnb", Nuria est très discrète, son logement est bien situé, la chambre est fonctionnelle

Nuria es muy amable , no tuvimos problemas con ella, pero el lugar no era lo que esperabamos, las toallas eran viejas, la casa muy calurosa y oscura, el refrigerador compartido es diminuto , no entra casi nada. Es incomodo tener horarios para poder bañarse.
Chambre partagé à proximité du parc Guell et du quartier de Gracià.

The room was small and clean (as in the pictures), does not have keys. Núria is very nice and friendly host. She comumunicated immediately and helped us with everything what we needed. Good location. I highly recommend!

Great place to stay in Barcelona 
Nuria is very kind host 
5 of 5! Recommend
It is really a good choice to live here. She is nice and kind. The room is lovely and quite in the night. Not far from the grill park is an advantage.

Great location, but the room is not that good. It’s pretty dusty (if you have some kind of allergy of dust, be careful), and we also had problems with little bugs in one bed at the first day. The room is hot and the fan is really old and noisy, almost impossible to keep it on at night. They have a microwave and mini freeze, but this comum area is set on a really small corredor, right outside the room’s door, and not comfortable to use. Good thing: The bathroom is big and clean.
Nuria is very warm and helpful person.  Everything was ok. Thank you! :)

The place is near to metro and bus, and takes only 10 minutes to get to the central Barcelona. We have everything we need and very dedicated host. The place is a good value of money for a short trip to Barcelona.
Pour une entrée de gamme à Barcelone, c’est l’idéal. L’emplacement est parfait mais il ne faut pas trop attendre sur la qualité du logement
Good
Everything was great, room is small but cute and enough for three persons. Location is also great and so is the host. She was very helpful and available whenever we needed something.
Muy buena atención de parte de la anfitriona!
Emplacement super !
Unterkunft war praktisch und sauber.

Núria is so sweet! She responded to our request quickly. We were able to meet up easily to get the key and all the info about the room (speaking in Spanish). Our stay in this location was primarily due to a family visit, but it is in a nice location. And a perfect place for sleeping (there are no common areas except the shared bathroom). 
FYI, there are quiet hours, and during our stay you couldn’t shower after 10pm or before 7am, (so plan accordingly!).  
It suited our needs and budget. And we would definitely stay here again!
Very good location, helpful and friendly host, cozy and private room! Perfect for travelers spending most of the time wondering the city.

The room is very clean. Nuria responds very quickly to the message.
The room is very well placed, a few minutes walk from Parc Guell, metro nearby and about 30 minutes walk from La Rambla.
The stay was well. There is a slight smell to the place but the host is very accommodating and responds very quickly.

One of the good things is that the place has a strategic location, metro station, pharmacy and supermarket are near by. It’s location made our stay better. Another good thing is that the host was very responsive. 
On the downside, even with a heater the place was very cold. Also, the place is shared, that was something we found out until we got to the place. Oh and there is an additional tax fee that is not included in the price.
tranquillité, quartier très agréable et bien situé pour visiter la ville
Cerca del centro, buen trato y habitación cómoda y espaciosa

name: Apart-hotel w/ Wonderful Ocean View - 2 bedrooms!!
summary: It's the perfect spot in Rio! A 2 bedroom aptm. in front of Barra da Tijuca´s beach, fully equipped and with excellent facilities in the building. * Ocean front balcony with hammock and breakfast table; * Bedroom suite with ocean view; * Great beds and shower; * Security and Reception 24 hrs; * Supermarket under the building; * Close to bars and restaurants * Easy access to the rest of the city; * Swimming pool with sea view and bar service; *Buffet restaurant; * Parking;
space: You can sleep to the sound of the waves from any of the bedrooms. It is a fully equiped apartament, ready to host a family or up to 5 friends travelling together. It is a cozy and confortable place perfect for holidays! The building itself is one "apart-hotel", so you can find locals who live there and also tourists from Brazil and abroad. Reception and security  are 24/7. The building has 2 swimming pools (1 for children),  2 restaurants and 1 supermarket (please go have breakfast there and eat their pizza. its really good, no kidding), gym, beauty salon... Cozy like home, prepared like a hotel!
description: It's the perfect spot in Rio! A 2 bedroom aptm. in front of Barra da Tijuca´s beach, fully equipped and with excellent facilities in the building. * Ocean front balcony with hammock and breakfast table; * Bedroom suite with ocean view; * Great beds and shower; * Security and Reception 24 hrs; * Supermarket under the building; * Close to bars and restaurants * Easy access to the rest of the city; * Swimming pool with sea view and bar service; *Buffet restaurant; * Parking; You can sleep to the sound of the waves from any of the bedrooms. It is a fully equiped apartament, ready to host a family or up to 5 friends travelling together. It is a cozy and confortable place perfect for holidays! The building itself is one "apart-hotel", so you can find locals who live there and also tourists from Brazil and abroad. Reception and security  are 24/7. The building has 2 swimming pools (1 for children),  2 restaurants and 1 supermarket (please go have breakfast there and eat their pizza. its reall
neighborhood_overview: Barra da Tijuca is probably the most modern neighborhood in Rio de Janeiro. Barra will host most of the olimpic´s games in 2016 and is ready for tourists from all over the world. The beach is ideal for swimming, surfing, kite surfing or just sun bathing. There is a great gastronomy, bar options and nightlife so you don´t really need to leave the area if you don´t want, but of course if you want to visit the rest of the city you can easily reach "Zona Sul" (where Ipanema, Copacabana, Leblon, Sugar Loaf and Christ the Redeemer are) by bus or by cab.
transit: As long as you avoid traffic time, going in and out of Barra da Tijuca is very simple.
access: Reception and security  are 24/7.
interaction: I speak english, french, spanish and italian and will be happy to assist you with anything you might need.
house_rules: Smoking is allowed only in the balconies. Please use the bathers entrance to wash your feet and remove the sand before entering in the apartment. Additional guests are not allowed.

host.host_about:
Hello there!

I´m Aline, and I was borned and raised in Rio de Janeiro. Excepting some periods of my life ( education and working abroad  for a couple of years and a sabatical round the world trip) I have spent all my life in this beautiful city that I´m so proud of belonging to. Please be welcome to my place!  

I enjoy eating, reading, surfing, eating again and for sure...travelling. My time abroad have gave me not only languages skills but also one understanding of how life can be enjoyed diferently, according to each reality. I hope you will have a taste of how shinny and beutiful life can be in Brazil!

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments:
My stay at Alines apartment has been absolutely fabulous. I was alone, working for the TeamNl Paralympics, so a lot of going in and out. Every time that I could come back to the apartment it was a safe haven with beautiful views, nice balconies for my cup of tea, clean, light, perfect bed, super nice deli style supermarket downstairs with good take away and cold beer. Aline is a great lovely host that really wants to make the best Rio time for you as a visitor.  I can really recommend the apartment, location, Rio and host Aline!
Thank you so much. I'll come back with my family.

Aline estuvo siempre disponible y muy atenta. La ubicación es buena, justo frente a la playa. El supermercado de abajo es una gran ventaja. Si bien no es muy variado es de súper ayuda. 
El departamento es tal como en las fotos. Muy acogedor. Éramos dos mayores y un bebé y nos reaultó cómodo.
El vecindario es un poco ruidoso, pero es por su cercanía a la avenida que une toda Barra.
Los servicios del condominio no son del todo buenos, salvo a la pileta dónde se puede pasar un buen rato.
El departamento es para tenerlo en cuenta y volver.
Todo exelente como dice el aviso

Apto otimo , td limpinho e otima localizaçao.
Bem familiar

Obrigada por tudo Aline. Você e sua família nos deram a atenção esperada. O apartamento é ótimo, muito bem localizado e arejado. Agradecemos pela bela estadia e pelos mimos que nos aguardavam na chegada. Abs
Maria do Carmo
O apartamento é ideal e a vista é maravilhosa! Localização ótima incrível disponibilidade da anfitriã! Foi tudo impecável.
Aline é uma excelente anfitriã, está de parabéns, muito atenciosa, gostamos muito, o apartamento é ótimo com uma vista incrível, certamente voltaremos em breve. Um abraço

El departamento de Aline es excelente! Una vista increíble, el lugar súper cómodo y super equipado! Nos recibieron como los dueños de casa y Aline nos preparó una recepción para toda la familia...
Sólo palabras de agradecimiento por prestarnos su lugar por estos días!! Realmente un lugar para disfrutar y descansar... las fotos sólo muestran parte de lo lindo que es todo.
Fuimos con nuestros tres hijos y se cansaron de disfrutar... playa, pileta, juegos... todo de lujo!
Super recomendable!!!
La verdad que todo expectacular, la ubicacion, la seguridad del complejo, los servicios, el departamento muy bueno y sobre todo la atencion de ailin la dueña

Recomiendo 100% este lugar, es excelente. El depto es hermoso, la vista al mar es algo impresionante. La zona de la playa es maravillosa. El condominio es fabuloso, mucha seguridad. La zona de pileta es hermosa con todas las comodidades. Y lo mas practico es que tenes un super enorme abajo que esta abierto horario corrido. Volveria sin dudarlo.
Nos encantó el departamento...Superó las espectadoras.....

O apartamento corresponde à descrição no Airbnb, muito bem localizado, com garagem, bom Wi-Fi, bons chuveiros e camas. Aline foi uma anfitriã atenciosa e prestativa. Tivemos ótimas férias nas duas semanas que ali passamos. ✌

Muy contentos...Excelente ubicación y departamento...Vista inmejorable... Y respecto de Aline, la anfitriona, muy atenta y presente en cada ocasión...Sin duda q voy a volver...Las mejores recomendaciones!!!

Recomendo com certeza!!!
Apartamento perfeito, localização privilegiada, a vista mar sem comentários linda, restaurante no prédio com uma comida maravilhosa, piscina ótima, funcionários super educados, e o principal a anfitriã Aline super atenciosa é compreensiva, fomos recebidos em grande estilo. Um grande abraço Aline.

Staying at Alines place was absolutely wonderful. The apartment was clean and comfortable with an incredible view and location. It is close to wonderful shops and services and a gorgeous Beach. Excellent for surfers! But best of all was probably Aline; she was hospitable, easy to communicate with and accommodating of our needs!

Excelente todo muy bien . Aline fue muy atenta .estaba todo preparado para recibirnos . el departamento es igual al que  describe en la publicación y la ubicación es inmejorable para una familia con nenes chiquitos . gracias !!!!! Aline.
Linda vista ...bem localizado...

Excellent place in a beautiful location. Aline made check in very easy, the place was very clean with a welcome bottle of champagne, fruit and chocolates. 

I would definitely stay here again. It's right on the beach with a nice cafe and grocery store on the first floor. You can't beat it.

It seemed that the house was not cleaned before my arrival.Both of the bathrooms were not cleaned- the sink had a lot of hair/dirt, the shower had some dead bugs in them and hair, the soap/toothbrush holder which was filled with crust of dirt and toothpaste which was disgusting.In the closet there were underwear, and shirts left over from previous guests.The kitchen was filled with ants in the cabinets, near the sink, microwave, kitchen door everywhere!The refrigerator was not cleaned before my arrival it was filled with food stains and water all over it since the refrigerator leaks which causes the food to be all wet.In general the house was filled with dust.I was very disappointed in the fact that the apartment did not have a drying machine like it was stated in the listing.The appliances were old and did not work properly, the AC was there for decoration since it did not work.The hair dryer was also useless since it was made for an American outlet and there were no American outlets in the house.The host did not give enough information about check-in.I had to contact her about it and there was minimal information given.There were a total of three entrances to the building and since there was no explanation to which way to enter I went in a random one, and it turned out to be the wrong entrance for new guests to check in.During the check in process it was pretty long I had no clue that myself and all my guests needed to share our driver license numbers, make a copy of our IDs, home addresses, take a picture of ourselves in order to be able to check in.I communicated with the host that I was going to use the parking spot that she offered and that the doormen were asking for her to allow for that to happen so I could get a tag so the car could get in, well I NEVER got a response from the host so everyday once I wanted to park the car in the parking lot I had to talk to the doorman and it was a headache and it took a long time to get into the building.I stayed a total of eleven days in the apartment and I expected for there to be some basic cleaning which it was lacking.There was a lot of noise in the apartment from the cars that was unbearable at night.The building was old.Very overpriced for the lack of cleaning and for the lack of comfort that the apartment (URL HIDDEN) sofa bed had a strong scent of body odor and in general the apartment looked better in the pictures, the furniture were beaten up and old.It was great that it was a water front property but the only downside was the fact that next door there were prostitutes once it got dark.I contacted the host with some issues about that apartment but she answered only the questions she wanted to answer.

El departamento de Aline es excelente. Tiene vistas privilegiadas de la playa de Barra, en un complejo con seguridad y un supermercado al lado que es salvador. Las comodidades del departamento son muy buenas para 4 personas. Y Aline siempre amable y disponible, además la gente de recepción atentos por si hace falta algo urgente. Volveremos pronto!
Nossa viagem foi maravilhosa! O apartamento é perfeito! Limpo, organizado e com uma localização espetacular! Muito obrigada pela acolhida!
Muito boa a localização e as instalações do apartamento...
La ubicación, servicios y comodidad, son perfectos. El en dto tenes todo lo necesario.  Muy bueno!

O apartamento é localizado em um apart hotel , é espaçoso e bem localizado dentro da Barra da Tijuca. A vista é maravilhosa e para chegar na praia é só atravessar a rua. Tem um mercado embaixo que facilita bastante a vida inclusive para café da manhã. A piscina é muito boa! O restaurante anexo oferece um buffet mediano no almoço. O apartamento necessita de uma melhor manutenção na geladeira e aquecedor de água, no restante é confortável.

Espectacular estadía. El departamento tal cual como se ve en las fotos. La vista excelente. Aline muy atenta, brindo respuestas ante todo.
Volvería a ir siempre.
100% recomendable.
Muchisimas gracias Aline y flia!!

Lugar expectacular
Atencion muy buenaa
Volveria

Todo lo q se espera del Dpto se logra.
Excelente ubicación para lo q buscamos...supermercado debajo del edificio abierto 24 HS.. .ya q nos facilitó muchísimo pprque fuimos con niños. 
Hermosa playa...limpia
El departamento es tal cual lo que se observa en las fotos.  La ubicación inmejorable. Aline súper atenta. Y el tener el supermercado abajo es una gran ventaja. Realmente recomendable.

O apartamento, a vista frontal para o mar e o condomínio são fantásticos e adorámos a estadia. Voltaremos certamente. A Aline também foi excelente pois ajudou-nos com uma questão prática e que foi fundamental para nós.
De maneira geral, o apartamento é  funcional e de bom gosto
Un apartamento muy bien ubicado, con todas las condiciones para el confort y pasar unas excelentes vacaciones!
Apartamento excelente, em ótima localização, com funcionários atenciosos, tive uma boa comunicação com a anfitriã sempre que necessário e com certeza retornarei.
Muy buena ubicacion. Excelente vista al mar. Departamento muy confortable
Gracias

name: DOUBLE ROOM for 1 or 2 ppl
summary: 10m2 with interior balkony kitchen, bathroom small but clean and modern metro in front of the building 7min walk to Sagrada Familia, 2min walk TO amazing Gaudi Hospital Sant Pau SAME PRICE FOR 1 OR 2 PPL-15E All flat for your use, terrace, huge TV.
description: 10m2 with interior balkony kitchen, bathroom small but clean and modern metro in front of the building 7min walk to Sagrada Familia, 2min walk TO amazing Gaudi Hospital Sant Pau SAME PRICE FOR 1 OR 2 PPL-15E All flat for your use, terrace, huge TV.

name: Bright Inner West Terrace Value+
space: Come and stay in wonderful Petersham! This amazing and large terrace house is located only minutes from the train and buses that will have you in the heart of the city within 15 minutes.  The room is a large and sunny double room, located on the first floor of a renovated terrace overlooking the garden. You will have a private and relaxed stay. The room is perfect for a couple or single and is easily accessible to the shared bathroom. We are very close to public transport (and even a pub next door) but it is quiet and relaxed so no need to worry about noisy trains waking you up at night!). We are a short walk away from Leichhardt which is Sydney's amazing Italian dinning and entertainment precinct. On the other side of the railway line is Petersham's famous Portuguese dining strip. Glebe, Balmain and Rozelle markets are a short bus trip away. This is a lovely and safe area to walk around at any time of day or night. The streets are quintessentially Sydney with a real mix of architectur

This amazing and large terrace house is located only minutes from the train and buses that will have you in the heart of the city within 15 minutes.
