Glebe, Balmain and Rozelle markets are a short bus trip away. This is a lovely and safe area to walk around at any time of day or night. The streets are quintessentially Sydney with a real mix of architectur

host.host_about: I love traveling and exploring the world with all its amazing adventures. I live in and love sunny Sydney and find the inner city to be one of the most exciting and interesting places to live. I run my own business so am out and about most of the time - but more then happy to lend a helping hand when it comes to local information on what to see and do!

reviews.comments:
After 10 days in such a fantastic terrace, I can say that Natasa is simply the perfect host, and even better person! Friendly, funny and flexible, she is always ready to help, to have a conversation and she makes you feel like at home as you enter the house. The house is clean and tidy, and the kitchen and living room are spacious and with all you may need. The room itself, with double bed, is a perfect and very comfortable place to relax as at home. The house is perfectly located 1 minute (or even less) form Petersham train station, from where you get to the city in a 10 minutes ride. There is also a supermarket and shops nearby, which make it easy to get provisions. Of course, the house has Wifi connection, which is fast and reliable.
This has been the first time I book a room through Airbnb and it has been such a fantastic experience that I will definitely consider Airbnb for further stays, and if in Sydney, at Natasa’s place for sure!

Natasa is an incredibly lovely person and an amazing host! She was so friendly and helpful, always up for a chat or willing to help us with directions. The house is in an unbeatable location, right near Petersham station! It is a super short walk to the station, and just a few stops into the city center. Even though the station is so close, you can't hear the trains from the room, so a good night's sleep is guaranteed. The room itself is very big and gorgeous! Natasa really has an eye for decorating and designed the room to be not only beautiful but very functional! There is tons of storage space, including two locking bedside cabinets. The kitchen is also wonderful and Natasa was kind enough to let us use a shelf in the pantry and another in the fridge. We loved staying here so much and were so sad to leave! Natasa, thank you again for all of your kindness and generosity - you're the best!

A lovely host with great communication.

An excellent inner city location. Close to everything including great restaurants within walking distance.

 Highly recommended.

Natasa was a friendly and communicative host. She was always very busy but took her time to provide us with useful information about places to go, things to see and how to get there. We had chosen her place to organize the further months of our stay in Sydney and booked the accommodation before our arrival in Australia. The house is located in a side road to Petersham rail station - a perfect location to get into the heard of Sydney quick and easy. The room, bathroom and kitchen were equipped with everything you need. We enjoyed stayting at Natasas home!

Had been a great time! I love the room and the possibility to use the free wi-fi in that room. The train station is so near, you can spit to it.
Natasa had been very friendly and helpfully ... even when I get a 'flu she surprised me with some medicals to get better.
Sydney in spring is a good place ... Petersham with Natasas room in Sydney in spring close to perfection.

Natasa is a very amazing and lovely host. She was very warmful and helpful, always up for giving advice or to chat. The house is very well located : close to Petersham station so very easy to go to the center (but without any noise from the room). The room is spacious and nice!  And the kitchen (we enjoyed the terrace ;-)  and the bathroom are very well furnished and you have enough space to put all your personal stuff. 
We had a very great stay so thank you again Natasa !!!

No other place to feel like you're at home : comfy, clean, with all that you may need in your bedroom (from the adptators to the tissues), the bathroom, in the kitchendo or to your laundry, watch TV or relax in the beautiful cozy garden.
As for the host, Natasa is an amazing woman. If you like your independance, no problem either; But you'll miss something by not having a nice and funny chat with your hostess, a multi-talented woman with a viral happinness ;) As mentionned before, don't miss a slice of Natasa's exquisite pizzas or fresh salad.
This all could sound as an ad, yet it's all the result of a so very nice stay in this inner west terrace of Sydney.
More than highly recommended !

Had a brilliant stay with Natasa. A beautiful person and SO easy to get along with. Has made my 1 month stay absolutely memorable and always had time to help out with even the smallest things and kick back and have a laugh over wine. The house location is easily commutable to the CBD and grocery stores are within 5-10 minute walk. Highly recommend staying with Natasa, she will make you feel right at home.

Location, room, security, comfort etc are all great. Natasa as a host is what makes this more that a place to just crash. She is a very sweet woman who gave us some great insights into the city. She even showed us the best (and secret) place to get front row for the NYE fireworks overlooking the bridge and harbour. 

With this being the first Air bnb experience for us we were a little anxious, but as soon as we arrived, we were sure we had made the best decision.

Travellers may want to consider a rail card if choosing this location as it saves lots of money for those staying a few days or more.

This place is awesome! Me and my wife stayed here for nearly 2 weeks and we felt so comfortable and welcome. Natasa is such an amazing person, so friendly, easy-going, helpful, open-minded and funny. It is so easy to talk to Natasa. She gave us a lot of advices and very good ideas during our stay in Sydney. The location is great if you want to explore Sydney. The train station is very close and it makes it so easy to reach all the places. Natasa's home is very clean and so cozy. Our room was fantastic and very comfortable. We felt like home at Natasa's place and we would stay there again. We highly recommend this place!

I have so many great things to say about my 4 week stay with Natasa that I don't know where to start!  Natasa is very welcoming, and she made me feel right at home from the moment I got there.  She is generous and flexible--and one of the happiest people to be around.  Natasa always had the perfect suggestion of where to go, what to do or the best way to get there.  She knows the city really well, and is always happy to give suggestions (or show you herself!).  Natasa will talk with you as much or as little as you want, but we had a great time hanging out downstairs--I never felt like I needed to be in my room.  She even invited me to her famous pizza night with her friends--yum!

As for the house/room--it was great.  The location is amazing--so close to both the Petersham train station and a short walk to all of the Parramatta Rd buses.  Everything you need will be close by or short walk away.  The house is great--clean, homely and has everything you need! The green room was perfect--great hard wood floors, comfortable bed, plenty of space for my things--as advertised.  Even with 3 or 4 of us in the house, I never had to wait for the bathroom--everyone had such different schedules that it always seemed to work out.  I did laundry quite a few times while I was there, which was no problem at all--there is a dryer or clothes line.  

I would not hesitate for a second to book this house again!  It made my time working away from home so much better by being around lovely people in a very nice home.  I loved it and I hope I get the chance to visit Natasa in Petersham again soon!
Staying with Natasa was great, lovely house and lovely host. Would definitely stay here again.

Great neighbourhood close to transport and easy to walk to places too. 
Room was nice and very clean, with character. 
Natasa wasn't around much and neither was I but she was lovely and helpful.
Super helpful, super nice! Have had an exceptionally great time at her place! Thanks for everything.

Our stay with Natasa has been great! She goes out of her way to make us feel comfortable. We have shared many lovely meals together (including her famous pizza!). Her house is clean, cosy and has everything we could possibly need. Natasa has been extremely accommodating and friendly. Would recommend everyone to stay here. Fantastic friendship! The location is great too! Very handy to catch the train or bus (412) to the city or (444/445) to Balmain East Wharf. The local towns Petersham and Leichhardt have everything you need, shopping, restaurants, ATM etc. all less than 5 minute walk away.

While appreciative of last minute availability and sincere efforts of host in transit, my first ever airbnb stay wasn't particularly encouraging. A working key safe is a priority. I put my work colleague under inconvenience in the 3 trips to home it took to get access.

I really loved to stay in Natasa's house. I arrived after 24 hour travel and she huged me very nice.
The room is so beautiful. It loos like at the pictures. The house is great I love her furniture and it's just next to a train station.
The bed is so comfy I loved it.
She gave me very exactly descreption of how to get there. On christmas eve we went out in a restaurant and she gave me some sweet so I really felt like home. If you want to somewhere really good, go to her house.
It was very clean and everything was just great.

Natasa est une hotesse charmante et souriante, prete a vous aider.
La maison est grande, propre et la chambre identique a la photo avec un lit tres confortable.
Nous avons apprecié le quartier de Petersham prêt du centre avec le train.l'accueil

I had a lovely 4 weeks in Natasa's place. She's super helpful and knowledgeable about the area and shows you everything you need. She even took me to the shops on day one!  The house is fabulously close to the station.. about 2 minutes and well looked after. The room was bright, spacious and exactly what I was after.  The kitchen is tidy and super well equipped. Even though we had a full house at times, I never had any issues getting access to the bathroom or washing machines. I thoroughly enjoyed my stay with Natasa and can only highly recommend her place if you are looking for that balance between having your independence ( I was working so many night were spend on marking..) and socialising; we had some pleasant evenings catching up with all house mates and a beautiful glass of wine! Thanks Natasa for making me feel so welcome and being such a great host... I'll be back that's for sure!

Natasa was a fantastic host who was both kind, friendly and made me feel very welcomed on my return back to Sydney. As this was my first time using airbnb, I had my apprehensions.. However, it immediately disappeared upon meeting her and the other housemates. I would highly recommend staying here if you find yourself needing a place to stay here in Sydney. It cannot get any better!

Welcoming dinner was greatly appreciated
Easy to access out of hours, clean and comfortable 
Thanks

Natasa is very welcoming, friendly and lots of fun.
I spent a busy few days in her great terrace and enjoyed one of her delish curries with drinks on the leafy terrace.
I’m not surprised she always has so many guests.
Thanks Natasa

I headed directly here from the Airport by train, and it was very easy to find! It's literally beside the Petersham train station. When I got to the home, it was nice and quiet in the surroundings and I liked that very much. The room is as in photos, the bed was comfortable, there's a writing table which was helpful for me. Natasa was really really nice and whipped up dinner for me when I was starving the first night. You'll enjoy your stay here! :)

I stayed with Natasa for around four months starting when I moved over from the UK in April. I was looking for somewhere chilled out to stay while I settled into my new job and Natasa's was perfect. Natasa is s great host, she is welcoming and friendly but at the same time gives you privacy. She knows so much about Sydney and will give lots of advice from anything from restaurants to transportation. I really enjoyed my time staying at Natasa's and definitely recommend for a great base for exploring Sydney.

My daughter and I enjoyed our stay at Natasa´s house very much. Everything was like in the description. The house was very charming and the central of the City as well as the Airport was easily to reach by train, which stopped just around the Corner. Besides that we had good luck that Natasa was at home. So we could talk with her  several times, which was just so nice and much fun. She also gave us helpful ideas about restaurants or where to spend New Year´s Eve and so on. We would like to stay there again any time.

I booked the room from my account for one of my friends and this is his view: 
Actually, I was lucky that I spent my first days in Sydney in Natasa' lovely house. I spent more than two weeks there. As other people here mentioned, you feel that you are in your own house and have freedom for yourself. Alot of movies are provided in living room that you can select among them and watch. Also you can enjoy the lovely kitchen and the terrace. Being completely close to trian station, it is perfect for new arrivals like me. Also, the area is completely close to city center. When Natasa is at home you can enjoy talking with her. Unfortunately, we could not see each other so much since most of that time she was on a business trip. However among afew talks that we had, I enjoyed her manner and kindness. Beside your room, there are two other bedrooms in the first floor that you should share bathroom with them. It was ok and we had no problem. Also because the weather at most time was mild, the lack of airconditioning did not cause a problem. 
Finally, thanks again Natasa

I couldn't have dreamed of a better place for my stay in Sydney. The room is exactly as described, spacious and clean. The shared space is also clean and convenient. The kitchen is very well equiped and there is a charming terrace to chill out. Natasa, the host, is a wonderful person: kind, always helpful and very funny. I had a great stay in this place! Thanks Natasa and see you soon.

Natasa was a perfect host! From the moment I arrived at the airport she gave me clear instructions as to how to locate her place via the train. The room was amazing - spacious and clean. The location was great too as I was commuting each day and would only have to leave 5 minutes before to catch the train into the city which would only take 15 minutes. Natasa was always willing to offer advice on places to go and eat too and made me feel really welcome. I would fully recommend staying at Natasa's place and cannot wait to stay again next time I visit Sydney!!! Thanks again for everything :)

Wonderful host! Natasa was warm and welcoming and kindly organised Uber transport to get us to a show on time within half an hour of arrival!! Perfect location for inner city venues. The room was excellent- clean, comfortable and with lovely homely touches. Highly recommended stay. We will be back when back in Sydney.

Natasa is extremely welcoming and helpful. Her home is very conveniently located beside the Petersham station; very quiet at night though there is also a convenient pub on the corner. Everything was clean and comfortable.

Natasha was a great host. 
Arrangements were made in case I arrived when she wasn't home but in the end they weren't need. 

Natasha was very welcoming and the house was well presented. Them room was also very nice.

Natasa was a great host. All arrangements  to arrive and access the property  were d xcellent. We sat and chatted, she made me  feel  very welcome.  Petersham is a good area with transport and  restaurants  nearby.

Natasa was very friendly I felt like a visited friends house.
The room was clean and bed was confutable and house is close to the city.
I'll be back again
Thank you,Natasa!! yum

Great location - pub literally 20 metres away.  Petersham station a further 20 metres.  Lovely clean room, great shared facilities, very quiet house.  Nat was very accommodating with being there to let me in and show me around. 3 or 4 people live here but you would hardly know it.

Natasa is an amazing host! Super lovely, friendly, kind and thoughtful. She is very happy all the time, easy going and always go above and beyond for your needs. I felt like I've gained a friend after this. The house is cozy, everyone are very kind, polite and respectful of your space and privacy. Literally ONE minute away from train station which takes you to the city within 15 minutes. Highly recommend! Thanks Natasa once again ☺️

Lovely room with cute and super friendly Natasa, which made me had a very good time in Sydney. Like her so much, and the location of the house was super close to the train station. Hopefully can see her again. Thanks a lot!

Natasa was a delight to deal with -always responded quickly to messages and made the whole process a breeze. The room was lovely and the house in an excellent location (train station and pub nearby!). I would definitely recommend a stay here.

One of the best experiences I've had using AirBnB.  Natasa is a gem of a host.  Her place is very well organised and she is super friendly.  Location is right next to station too, which is convenient.  I would highly recommend staying here.
Natasa was a wonderful host! I felt so welcomed. The room was lovely and bright and its a sweet neighbourhood, close to trains, cafes and pubs. Would recommend.

Natasa is a super lovely and nice host:D The room is all the same as the pictures shown on this page, and all the things are clean! Only 2 minutes walk to train station and bus stops, easy to travel anywhere!

Our stay with Natasa was really wonderful. She welcomed us with such warmth and made us feel at home. She would readily help you with all your queries and also offers great tips about the local sightseeing. 

The room was as good as depicted in the pictures and you can use all the amenities right from the kitchen to laundry. The bathroom was also clean  with good standards of hygiene. The house is really close to petersham metro station and has easy accessibility from the airport. It's also not too far from the city that saves a lot of commuting time. There are a lot of breakfast options available and you can also cook food if you like.  

It was a pleasure meeting Natasa. Cheerful and kind hearted that she is she made our stay really worthwhile.

I didn't meet Natasa but she sent me comprehensive messages about her house & how to access it, my room and the other guests.  As a result my stay went smoothly and comfortably.

The guest room in which I stayed was large & comfortable, with a large window that made the room bright & airy.  There was some aircraft noise but not sufficient to disturb me.

The other rooms of the house that I used, the bathroom & kitchen, were also comfortable with appliances working smoothly.

The house is conveniently located close to the railway station, with a pub opposite & a good cafe 5 minutes walk around the block.

I would heartily recommend Natasa's house.

We had a great stay with Natasa for 28 days. She is a really friendly and helpfully host. The house and bedroom were spacious and the house is really close to the train station for getting around Sydney easily.

It was a pleasure staying with Natasa! Even if she's a really busy person, she made everything possible, that my stay at her place was very enjoyable and comfortable. The place is great and very well located.Petersham Train station just 100meter from house, Sydney International Airport just 15-20 minutes, we using Uber as per suggested by Natasa and costly around 20 Aud from airport to Natasa House,I'd definitely go there again when I come back to Sydney. Thank you!
Another awesome stay with Natasa at what i feel is already my home in Sydney :)
The location is so nice, very near the train station, it takes 10 minutes to go to city. The room is clean and nice. Natasa is very warm and friendly.

Natasa's house is just by the train station, which is very convenient. We asked her opinions on where to go for new years's eve and she and her friend provided lots of very useful suggestions. She's the best host ever!

Totally unsuitable for older people, dingy, messy garden, description does not say there were 5 people sharing one bathroom - the other shower is downstairs and reached by going outside! There is a cat not mentioned in description. Natasha gave someone our beer which she replaced. it may be cheap to Sydney and convenient for the station but it was very disappointing. Had it not been convenient for our family nearby we would have left on day one. towels not changed on a 10 day visit and we had to request bedding change. It was very hot despite a fan in the room. security is poor with only one locked gate protecting us and no locks on bedroom doors. Not recommended even for backpackers.
Natasa is a welcoming and friendly host

Quite enjoyed my stay at Nataša's. The room was nice, the bathroom large and well stocked, and the overall hospitality was excellent.

The house happens to be a short walk from a strip of great brunch and coffee places. The closest establishment, West Village -a gastropub, for a lack of a better term- is 100 metres away from the house. (It's great for lunch and I instantly fell in love with it for its aesthetic, food offerings, and tap list.)

Nataša was a helpful and fun host. We ended up running into each other at pizzeria (Gigi) one evening and enjoying schooners at a brewery (Batch) on another evening. Our casual chats were delightful and full of insight.

Not a single complaint.

Natasa's place was a great place to stay for me. The house / room is very clean and comfortable and privacy is very good. The house is close to transport, both bus and train are a very short walk. It is a very nice walk to explore the length of Norton St Leichhardt. I would be happy to stay again and recommend the place to anyone.

Fiquei hospedada nessa casa por 14 dias juntamente com minha mãe e tudo foi muito bom! Casa limpa, toalhas e lençóis limpos e à disposição. Quando tivemos alga dúvida ou problema foi logo resolvido pela querida Natasa! Localização excelente perto da estação de metrô e a uma caminhada não muito longa dos ônibus e supermercados. Indico essa casa para quem quiser ficar em Sydney por um valor bom e localização boa.

Natasa's place is very comfortable with a nice big room and great share bathroom. Natasa is very friendly and helpful and I enjoyed my stay very much, over 3 weeks! Very handy to transport, both trains and bus and conveniently between Petersham's Portuguese and Leichhardt's Italian restaurants. Fabulous place to stay!

Great location, right next to Petersham train station - so easy access to the CBD.
Room was cosy and ticked all the boxes for us. 
Natasa was a lovely host, and looks out for all your needs. 
If you are looking for a place that is good value then this is the place for you.
Perfect Stay. Just what i needed, inner west, next to train station and the host Natasa is the best
Super Zimmer und Haus, nur 1 Minute von der U-Bahn entfernt. Sehr freundliche Kommunikation mit Natasa. Alles sauber und angenehm. Würde wieder hier wohnen wollen! Danke!

My mum stayed at Natasa's during two weeks and she loved her stay. She enjoyed very much the cozy room and the friendly atmosphere. Natasa is a very good host, full of energy and always ready for a good laugh. The house is very conveniently located as it is only 5 minutes walking from Petersham train station. My mum will be happy to stay at Natasa's again next time she will be in Sydney. Highly recommend the place. Thank you Natasa :-)
It is a nice place with every necessities. Close to the train station, only 2 minutes walk. Easy to get to the city, only 10-15 min. Fully-equipped kitchen. Everything is clean and tidy.

Natasa was absolutely lovely. She described how to get to her place in great detail and even helped me put with my Uber on the last day.
Her place was cosy and she even took me out around Sydney!
Her place is literally next to the train station which works great if you don't drive in Sydney.
She had a dozen types of teas for me to select from and also gave me recommendations for things to visit.
I felt very welcomed and at home - as though I had been living there for months!
Would definitely stay there again and hang out with Natasa. :)

I selected this airbnb on the basis of its proximity to my son's place.  Although I didn't meet tge host There was very good communication sbout getting into the premises and other facilities. I had a very comfortable night's sleep. My room was very large and the shared facilities were fine. Close to Petersham eailway station which is a plus.

From the moment I arrived at Natasa's I felt at home. She insisted on carrying my massive suitcase up the stairs for me, while explaining the layout of her home. She even suggested a wonderful spot for brunch for my friend and I. (I should actually say even before I arrived since she was extremely flexible and allowed me to alter my stay to a couple days later). My entire stay was extremely comfortable. Natasa gives the perfect balance of privacy and companionship to her guests. She never once disturbed me, but was always willing to have a chat on the rare occasion that we crossed paths (we both were in and out of the house quite often). Any time I was unsure of something she was available by text and always had a quick response. The location is also extremely convenient as it is only about a block from the Petersham station where I was able to catch either the bus or train to wherever I needed to go. You can take the bus to a grocery store, but Norton Plaza has 2 grocers as well as other little shops, and is only about a 10min walk. My only regret is that I did not book Natasa's place for my entire trip! If I return to Sydney I will definitely be booking her home again, and would highly recommend it to anyone looking for a comfortable and convenient location, hosted by an extremely friendly and hospitable individual.
Friendly
Nataša is a perfect host offering a cozy, clean and comfortable place to stay.
Great host, great house, comfortable room. Perfect stay!

Very good Host and very very great location : 1min to the train and 15 min to central station !
Thank you Natasa!

Natasa's place is conveniently located a minute away from Petersham station which makes it super easy to get around Sydney. Her house is quite cosy although it can be a bit cold during winter, but the blankets in the room are definitely enough to keep you warm at night. I only met Natasa on the last day of my trip as she was away but she was lovely, as were her housemates. Would definitely recommend!

I had a great time with Natasa and other guests. She is so kind and funny.
All amenities are there so It was really convinience.
Thank you for your kindness.

Amazing place! If it's your date is available, just book it! I love her place. Cozy and right next to the station. I extended my stay from 1 week to 10 days. Highly recommended. Will come back next time.
My second stay with Natasha. If the place is available on your dates, just book it.
Natasa’s place is lovely and cozy and so is the room. But the. Eat part of the stay is ofcourse natasa whose one of the loveliest people you’ll come across!
Natasa is one of the nicest people you’ll come across! Her home is lovely and cozy and close to public transport stops

Natasa's place is PERFECT!  Pictures are accurate and the place is super clean!
She also offerred great range of coffee and tea which make my morning freshened. Just 1 min walk from station but never felt noisy. Homie and comfort stay:)
Natasa’s Place was comfortable and cosy, we shared a wine and had a good chat, perfect place for my work trip.

We love Natasa’s place. It felt like home away from home. It has all the amenities and very close to train station for transport. Cafes and pub nearby. Natasa is very accommodating host, always up for a chat and easy to live with. Would stay again :)

Conveniently located - Train station just around the corner + the airport within 25 mins by taxi/ car. 

Clean and cosy room + necessary amenities in the house available. 

Thoroughly enjoyed my stay.

We had a very good stay at Natasa's home. Her house is lovely, the bedroom is spacious and very clean. Natasa is a perfect host, she welcomed us very well and she is very generous. The house is very well located, next to public transport, we were 20 minutes from the city centre. So, it's a perfect location to stay in Sydney, thanks again !
Great and accurate communication, friendly host, good sized room and comfortable bed.  The location is amazing, right next to Petersham train station, and an easy walk to Leichhardt's Norton Street.
It was a very nice visit to Natasa’s place and definetely recommend it to everyone.
Design house too many painting, super nice owner super super super nice,  clean place, everything t (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) good!

Olá!
Quero começar falando da facilidade de comunicação com Natasa. Sempre que precisei ela foi rápida em responder e esclareceu todas as dúvidas.
Localização: A casa fica ao lado da estação de Trem, literalmente, o que facilita muito os deslocamentos. Fica também relativamente próxima ao aeroporto, inclusive vale a pena usar o Uber se estiver com malas maiores ou em mais de uma pessoa, porque o Trem partindo do Aeroporto tem uma preço diferenciado e pode acabar não valendo a pena.
Quarto: Amplo, limpo, tem ar-condicionado, guarda roupas, cômoda, além disso colchão e roupa de cama são bons! 
Banheiro: Grande, chuveiro bom. É compartilhado com mais dois quartos (que quando fui estavam ocupados) mas não tivemos problemas. Sempre limpo nos dias que estive aqui. 
Cozinha: Bem equipada e pode ser usada sempre que necessário. 
Anfitriã: Natasa foi uma excelente anfitriã! Atenciosa, comunicativa, sempre disposta a ajudar no que for necessário. Faz você se sentir em casa! 
Sem dúvidas ficaria hospedado novamente e recomendo para quem procura um lugar para passar alguns dias em Sydney.

Natasa is a very good host, she keeps her house very clean and everything is in order. The location is great and it's convenient for me to go to every part of the city by train. I've been enjoying a very good stay in her house!

Natasa was nice and she responded message quickly! Her place was cute and cozy! Sometimes it’s a bit hot during the daytime in summer. But she gave us a really nice fan! You could find almost any kitchenware you want in the kitchen and made yourself a nice dinner! The location was good as well since it was located just 3-5mins walk to Petersham train station!
Great place to stay, fantastic value for money, very homely, great facilities, great location, fabulous host! Couldn't have been happier with Natasa's home.

name: Designer's Historical Apartment
summary: This tastefully functional Istanbul apartment with a great soul is in the heart of the city. Offers lot's  of sunlight during the day and quiet sleeps at night. Enjoy the historical neighborhood with antique stores, galleries, and coffee shops.
space: Fully renovated by an artist/ designer this architecturally distinct 1 bedroom historical Istanbul apartment is in the heart of the city. 1 minute walk to Istiklal Street, 5 minutes walk to the Taksim Square. Bars, pubs, restaurants, art galleries, yoga studios, movie theaters and all the other attractions that the city offers are within short walking distance. The neighborhood is very close to the historical peninsula (Hagia Sophia, Blue Mosque, Topkapi Palace etc.), Galata Tower, and the other tourist attractions. All the public transport (metro, buses, ferries, Tunnel tram) are nearby.  The apartment is equipped with appliances, there is also a great juice maker. It is a strictly vegetarian household, so we kindly ask you not to bring any meat and poultry to  the house. It is a great space to relax, meditate, practice yoga, write, and create art. *The bedroom is separate from the living room and it is furnished with custom made furnitures and orthopedic queen size bed. The room's la
description: This tastefully functional Istanbul apartment with a great soul is in the heart of the city. Offers lot's  of sunlight during the day and quiet sleeps at night. Enjoy the historical neighborhood with antique stores, galleries, and coffee shops. Fully renovated by an artist/ designer this architecturally distinct 1 bedroom historical Istanbul apartment is in the heart of the city. 1 minute walk to Istiklal Street, 5 minutes walk to the Taksim Square. Bars, pubs, restaurants, art galleries, yoga studios, movie theaters and all the other attractions that the city offers are within short walking distance. The neighborhood is very close to the historical peninsula (Hagia Sophia, Blue Mosque, Topkapi Palace etc.), Galata Tower, and the other tourist attractions. All the public transport (metro, buses, ferries, Tunnel tram) are nearby.  The apartment is equipped with appliances, there is also a great juice maker. It is a strictly vegetarian household, so we kindly ask you not to bring any mea
neighborhood_overview: What you will see: The crowds flowing from Taksim Square tend to sweep visitors onto İstiklâl Caddesi; the cars and kebab shops that line the top of Sıraselviler Caddesi, one street to the left of the famous pedestrian thoroughfare. Just out of sight is one of the most attractive parts of Istanbul. After a couple of minutes’ walk from Taksim, its arrival is heralded by a great old-fashioned Istanbul patisserie, Savoy. Across the street and down the stairs is Otto, a fashionable café/bar in a shady tree-filled courtyard. A little further along is Pilot, a pioneering contemporary art space housed in a converted 1970s nightclub. Opposite is a square with the pastel-green Firuz Ağa Mosque and a few cafés that are always busy, including two where you strictly drink tea, lovingly known to the locals as the Cihangir çay bahçesi. Also try Firuz and Kardeşler Kebap. Opposite these, you’ll find a branch of Selim Usta’s Tarihi Sultanahmet Köftecisi, an Old City institution. But for the indigenous
transit: all the public transport (tram, bus, minibus, feries, metro) are within walking distance.
access: Entire apartment, amenities and the food.
interaction: An interaction before arrival to arrange the guest's access to the apartment, during the stay to be sure if everything is OK, and before the departure.
house_rules: - No smoking allowed in the bedroom. - Please keep the main entrance of the building locked after 10pm and be sure that the door is closed at all times.

host.host_about: Born and raised in Europe, educated in California. I am an artist and international school teacher, currently work/live in SE Asia. I practice yoga, surf, and lead a conscious and healthy lifestyle.

reviews.comments:
Staying at Pia's was very nice. Pia was most helpful and hospitable. She gave us detailed instructions upfront, met us at Taksim and explained a lot about the neighborhoud. Her apartment is newly and nicely refurbished, with all appliances you might need. The bedrom is quiet with sun and sound of birds in the morning. The apartment is well situated between the lively Istiklal and a net of peaceful small streets with shops, restaurants and galleries. We enjoyed walking around, all the way down to the Bosphorus. We are grateful for experiencing Istanbul. 

Branimir and Marina

Pia was a great host, took time to describe the neighborhood to us, and helped us settle in. The place is clean, and in a great location tucked away from the crowds. Lots of great places to eat nearby, and quiet at night.

Just an amazing apartment! So clean, luminous and comfortably spacious. I spent wonderful 2 days in this calm, cozy and modern decorated apartment in a historical building. Besides being SO much cheaper than a hotel, there is a very comfortable bed and artistically designed sitting room.  Clean furniture, towels and bed linens. It is also possible to prepare something to eat as there is a kitchen. 
 
Just 5 minutes by waking to Taksim Square and Istiklal. But still in a very special historic quiet street full of vintage, art and antique shop. Nice neighborhood with homemade food restaurants and small authentic cafeterias. There are also bakeries that you can find freshly-baked bread and other Turkish specialties. Metro and tramway is in walking distance. I just felt like an inhabitant of the quarter.
Owner is so kind and friendly!

The flat had a calm, relaxing feel. I enjoyed hanging out there when I wasn't being a tourist. It is stylish and well designed. The furniture, which I liked, is made by the owner. 
It has a good location too. Cihangir is a cool neighbourhood in its own right but also centrally located. The flat is near cafes for the morning, as well as interesting restaurants and good bars for the evening.
The shops in the area are very individual too.
The flat is just a walk and short tram ride from the main tourist sites such as Topkapi Palace and Haghia.
I had a great time and can really recommend staying here.
Richard

I found this Apartment through a friend where I work at the University of California , and was thoroughly disarmed   by the quality accommodations that I found upon-my  arrival.
Pia was the consummate host and went out of her way to ease my arrival into Istanbul which was for my first time ever In Turkey.She even met me at my air bus  in Taksim square and personally walked me to her place which is only a few blocks away.This beautiful flat in a storybook location, is situated on a street that one would swear is from the the back lot set of Goldwyn Studios in Hollywood. The neighborhood is truly in the fashion of a Bohemian San Francisco with steep winding streets and many excellent restaurants, flea markets,and designer shops all near by.
The best surprise of all was the the fantastic roof patio where one can sit and see the beautiful views of the Golden Horn and the Blue Mosque in the distance.
The rooms are airy and light with tall ceilings, and her personally designed cabinets and interior ,had such a simple elegant feel.
The separate bedroom is extremely cool in the summer and relaxing ,which has a view to the back over a tree covered 400 year old Hamam .The combined call to prayer and  the sound of many birds is positively magic. 
I highly recommend this Flat
Michael Schmitt 
Santa Barbara California

Truly, it was very hard to leave this beautiful apartment in the most wonderful area of the most wonderful city. Pia was an excellent host, staying up until the wee hours to greet us after we arrived on a very late flight and got stuck in traffic for hours. She provided lots of useful advice on what to do, where to eat and what to see; and not just for Istanbul, Pia was very obliging in offering us tips for one of our future destinations (India). The apartment itself is serene, peaceful, spotlessly clean and beautifully furnished making it hard to resist the temptation to simply stay in and relax! We wouldn't hesitate for a moment on recommending Pia's apartment. Thank you Pia for a wonderful stay, Michael & Kieran.

Pia's home is very comfortable and she is a great hostess. It is very conveniently located. 

The house was very clean and very relaxing. I would definitely recommend it and would stay there again.
Pia was a very kind host, her appartment is beautiful. She even took my to Yoga classes and we had dinner together. Thanks Pia!

We spent five days and nights in Istanbul and were happy to stay at Pias appartment. We very much enjoyed our stay. The appartment is perfectly located in Beyoglu where you have many shops, restaurants and bars. The neighbourhood is very lively and sometimes loud at night but the appartment is in a quiet street which is perfect. Unfortunatelly for some reason there was no possibility to use the roof terrasse that is shown on the pictures as I was told by Pias friend who showed me the appartment when arriving. So if you attach importance to a terrasse, better check this out.

Location is simply great: few steps away from nice evening-out places, the main shopping street, about 10min to get to the tram, etc. At the same time the flat and the bedroom was quiet and had everything we needed. 

Pia is very nice person and very good host.

First of all, Pia was a very kind host, she waited for us while we arrived with a very late flight, checked if everything was ok during the stay, kept our luggages in the appartment the day we left & called us a cab to return to the airport.
The appartment is perfectly located, in modern Istanbul, 2mn from Istikal street, but at the same time is very quiet. There is no noise at night, while there are plenty of nice coffees and restaurant very close. There is also a tram station to get to old Istanbul (Sulthnamet) walking distance,15mn walk down the hill. 
The appartment itself is very nicely decorated, very clean and confortable. Only you should know, if you do not come in the summer, that there is no central heating, only one portative heater that you can move one room to another. In March, we were quite cold. So we would recommand with no hesitation the place, but preferably with summer weather.

Pia's place was fantastic. Located minutes from the bustling IIstiklal Street and Taksim Square, the apartment is clean and cozy.

Shops selling great food are nearby. And if you need the metro, it's also walking distance.

Pia was very helpful and even though I arrived late at night, she waited for me and spoke to the taxi driver to give him instructions.

And Pia even made the effort to take us around despite her busy schedule. What a host!

This is an ideal place if you want peace and quiet, and yet want to be at a central location.

Amazing apartment in the best area! We had a lovely time in Pia's apartment and we couldn't have wished for a better location. It is in the middle of all the cool shops and new trendy local restaurants. She was a lovely host and we can definitely recommend this place.

Pia was a very affectionate and helpful host. The appartement was exactly as described: Very clean, great style, quiet and situated at the best location you could wish in Istanbul. There are various nice cafés, bars and restaurants nearby and the narrow streets are very peaceful and picturesque. We are thankful for the great recommendations Pia gave us to make our holidays in Istanbul special and unforgettable. We would definitely recommend staying at her appartement!
The reservation was canceled 5 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Great experience! Very beautiful area, beautiful place!
The host canceled this reservation 107 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

name: Nişantaşı, safe, quality area.Very close to metro.
summary: Richest and safest place of Turkey. U can walk to the best restaurants and world brands for shopping. Free Concierge, Free Airport Transfer and Free Unused Towel Set.We are located at Nişantaşı which is the safest area in the center of Istanbul, famous for best shops, coffees, restaurants, bars and clubs.Abdi Ipekci Street where Louis Vuitton, Rolex, Prada, Armani is only 3 minutes by walking.City`s Shopping Center, American Hospital and Macka Park and Metro are only 5 minutes by walking.55m².

reviews.comments: Nice apartment in probably the best neighbourhood with a lot if restaurants and shopping possibilities close by. It's of advantage (or even necessary) to speak Turkish for communicating with the host at the location! Problems like no wifi or electricity are common

the host always try their best to fulfill our request and are very quick to supply them like vacuum cleaner, ironing board etc, the very next day. Good location , few groceries stores and a mall near by, also a playground for children to play
It was a nice experience to stay there .. good location

I booked three apartments and they were nice and clean, some things were missing but they provided them once we asked.  The host (Enis) was great too. 

The location is excellent!
The area is nice and owners provide timely help when needed. The place is clean and decent.
We rented this place to be closer to family and downtown Nisanrasi. It was an amazing spot very convenient. Clean and new apartment. Highligh suggested.

name: Renovated Classic Design Studio with Sun Room
summary: Take in the regal elegance of this classic design studio set in a renovated former piano academy and factory. Discover a downtown getaway featuring original ornate finishes, custom made furniture, colorful decor, and a sun room.
space: Experience the historic charm and romance of the 1900’s combined with modern amenities of today in this magnificent apartment. Meticulously renovated in 2016 and decorated with great taste by a renowned Interior Designer and Architect.l All the furniture has been costume made with the time period in mind allowing for the perfect combination of new and old. Ornate stucco ceilings created by artisans and restored preserving their originality. The spacious apartment features a renovated bathroom with shower, enclosed balcony, closet and spacious dining/living room with plush carpeting. The bedroom is equipped with a safe box, the modern kitchen is equipped with all basic appliances: Fridge, oven, microwave, Toaster, Nespresso Machine, Tea Kettle, ceramic cooktop, cooking and serving utensils, fine crystal and cutlery for your self-catering. Super comfortable mattress and soft designer bedding. Lacoste towels, slippers and amenities are provided for your enjoyment.
description: Take in the regal elegance of this classic design studio set in a renovated former piano academy and factory. Discover a downtown getaway featuring original ornate finishes, custom made furniture, colorful decor, and a sun room.
neighborhood_overview: The area is home to historic sites, theaters, entertainment venues, bars, restaurants, and cafes.
notes: The apartment is located in one of the most trendy but quite and family oriented areas in Porto, near the Faculty of Belas Artes, The avenue is lined by beautiful small palaces and exotic gardens, designed by internationally renowned architects, where the elite and wealthy lived during the early 18th century. This studio offers recent customizations, beautiful new wood flooring, modern bathroom fixtures, and restored high ceilings displaying antique chandeliers. It is only a few minutes from the main tourist attractions. This spacious apartment (46 m2) features a very comfortable bed (Size: 150 cm width x 190 cm length) and a memory foam mattress Sofa bed suitable for 1: Size 158 cm width x 160 cm length)
transit: The neighborhood is very typical with plenty of history between the University of Fine Arts (Faculdade de belas artes), S. Lazaro Garden (Jardim de São Lázaro) the oldest in the city, the Municipal Library (Biblioteca Municipal). Parking space is easy just front door (paid) or we can provide underground park for 7.5€ per day. Various transport links nearby.  The closest  are: São Bento Train Station (0.9 km) Sao Bento Metro Station (1 km) , Heroismo Metro Station (0.5 km), Bolhão Metro Station (0.8 km),  18 minutes drive to the Airport, Campo 24 de Agosto Metro Station is 400 meters away. Campanhã train station it is 1.1km away. Shopping malls, commercial areas and amazing nightlife spots such as Galerias Paris which is the main one.  Historical and popular landmarks like Oporto Coliseum "Coliseu do Porto" (0.6 km), Luis I Bridge (01.1 km), Church of Santo Ildefonso (0.7 km), Bolhão City Market  (0.8 km) and the the iconic Clerigos Tower, Lellos Bookstore are easy walking distance. If
access: Guests can access the front entrance of the building from the calm and safe chestnut tree lined street, with their own keys, secured with Video intercom/buzzer. The apartment is in the first floor. You are free to use everything: Smart led tv (Netflix,YouTube,etc)  Free Wireless Internet Microwave Stove Fridge Hair Dryer Safety Deposit Box Nespresso or Coffee machine USB chargers Induction oven Bread Toaster Tea Kettle Cooking utensils Serving utensils  Crystal glasses Iron Anything is possible on request
interaction: Your hosts are available 24/7 at you convenience for any assistance and help over the phone, email, chat or text message. We will greet you at arrival at the door and  will be more than happy to help you with information and tips to discover the best of Porto and surroundings.
house_rules: - Check in is at 3 pm. There is a $30 fee for late check out (when available). - Please keep documents and valuable items in the safety box located in the closet. - The house is not responsible for lost valuable items left outside the Safety Deposit box. - 85 Euros fee in case Keys are lost, in cash, at check out. - Please close all doors and windows every time you go out. - A First Aid Kit is provided, located under the Bathroom sink. - Hair blow dryer is located under the bathroom sink. - Please dispose of garbage in plastic bags at the public garbage bins located in the street around the corner to the left when exiting the building.  - Please make sure all small electrical appliances and water fixtures are turned off every time you exit the apartment. - Check in time is at 15:00pm (3:00 pm) Check out time is at: 12:00 midday.  For early check in or late check out cost is 30 Euro (when available) and must be paid before check out. If the apartment is available check in/out time is fl

host.host_about:
I worked for an international airline for many years, where I learned about customer satisfaction while traveling all over the world.
Over the last few years I have been renovating, decorating and equipping historic and modern homes in different countries.  I am very attentive to detail. With care and passion, the apartments are based on my experience as a landlord, host and traveler and they have everything you will need to feel at home.

reviews.comments: Very warm welcome from Hector. Took the time to tell us about things to do and about the city. The appartment has recently been beautifully renovated, absolutely stunning! We even pondered staying there an additionnal day just for the wonderful appartment. High end towels and ameneties. Close to a metro station, quiet neighborhood, simply perfect. Hector even took the time to order us a taxi for our early departure. Would ABSOLUTELY RETURN OR RECOMMEND!!
Genial la estancia. Todo perfecto.
I would highly recommend this flat for a long or short stay in Porto. It is well located and it is really tastefully decorated! Hugo was also really helpful and gave us loads of info on the city.

Todo era perfecto.  El apartamento es precioso, coincide con las fotos.  Hugo, quién nos recibió, nos ofreció todo tipo de información y su predisposición para que en nuestra estancia no nos faltara de nada fue total.
Amazing decorated apartment! Well situated. The owner gave us incredible and tasty addresses to enjoy our trip in Porto! I would highly recommend this apartment without any hesitations

Very nice & clean flat , with available and helpful hosts. 
I highly recommend this apartment for a citytrip in Porto !
We absolutely loved our stay in Porto. Our host Hugo was very welcoming and helpful . The apartment was very clean and comfortable and felt like home. Thank you so much for a fantastic stay.
Very pleasant stay. Close parking nearby, modern comfortable place, easy walk to the tourist center but far enough away to be separate from the crowds. Thank you!

O apartamento é muito confortável e acolhedor: 5*
Está muito bem localizado, junto a restaurantes, supermercados e transportes públicos.
Apesar de estar numa zona calma e agradável, fica a poucos minutos, a pé, do centro histórico.
Beautiful apartment in a great location. Quiet safe neighborhood yet still very close to most of the major sites.
Great location and easy to park nearby. The apartment is just as you see in the pictures. Highly recommended.

La propreté  agencement avec goût idéal pour un couple
Géographique  proche des 2 gares et du métro proche de la veille ville  le soir si fatigue
Un restaurant sur la place a 150 mètres super

El apartamento es muy bonito en un edificio antiguo manteniendo su esencia, pero perfectamente reformado y muy acogedor. Tiene muchos detalles (amenities de baño, cafetera y cápsulas nescafe, barra de sonido para poner tu música con el móvil y Netflix) y está en muy buena zona. Aunque en el anuncio ponga que tiene aparcamiento, no es así, pero por la zona se aparca muy bien, eso sí, de lunes a viernes es zona de pago.

Beautifully designed flat in a quiet residential area but so easy to walk to the main attractions. Paid parking is easy to find just right outside the building and free on the weekend which is a plus. I didn't get to meet Maribel but she was extremely responsive with her communication. On the day of check in, Boris was so kind and he ensured we were able to find the flat and even waited outside the building for us (as the Airbnb direction was incorrect- please be sure to use the address provided by your host). Boris provided suggestions on where to go and places to eat. While there is no washer in the unit, overall a wonderful stay in magical Porto. Btw, there is a really delicious sandwich shop around the neighborhood that serves up cheap but yummy pork sandwiches right by the park. You won't miss it as there's always a long line.
Very nice and quiet place to stay in Porto. Very convenient location to visit the center and also move further with the metro 4 mm walk from the flat! I recommend.

Great place with lots of room - felt so luxurious. Wonderful bed, plenty of hangers & closet space & outstanding bathroom really added to comfort. Great value & host very responsive.
I recommend Casa de Tortas a few blocks away as a really great breakfast spot, with yummy food & wifi.

The host was very nice and helpful. The apartment was nice and clean. But I think it's to expensive for what it offers. The size is not as big as it looks on the pics and the real location of the apartment is about 4 blocks more far away form the city center. The apartment doesn't have a laundry (I could see it on the pictures of the listing). You have to use and external laundry which costs 7.- Euro each time. Long story short: It's nice but too expensive for what it really offers.

O apartamento é de muito bom gosto nos mínimos detalhes, roupas de cama e banho impecáveis . É muito confortável e tem todos os itens necessários e até o que não pensei, 2 guarda chuvas para o caso de frio. Maribel foi muito atenciosa durante a nossa estadia.  O local é bem silencioso para uma boa noite de sono. Tem transporte público e todas as comodidades necessárias.  Super Recomendo.
Importante q os faciliten la dirección por correo con anterioridad. Yo tarde un ratito en encontrarlo

El alojamiento tiene muy buen nivel. Muy bien equipado, con detalles y con gusto. La acogida es muy cálida. La disponibilidad de los anfitriones es máxima, se esfuerzan en ayudarte, lo pudimos comprobar. La zona es tranquila pero es que además dentro de la casa no se oye nada del exterior. Muy recomendable.

Maribel is a great host! Helped with everything and really kind!
The apartment is awesome, very well equipped, central and close to everything you need in Porto

We stayed a month on Maribels place. Her hospitality is great and she helpful and available for everything.
Thanks a lot
Um espaço muito estiloso e vários toques de bom gosto

Great apartment - very stylish and in a trendy central location. Unfortunately there is lots of construction going on in the block next door meaning we had to move properties half way into our stay on Monday morning. However the hosts were exceptionally accommodating at letting us move with a full refund. Despite this, would definitely stay again!!

Très bel appartement, avec une delicieuse boulangerie à 1 min à pieds.
Metro assez proche
Appartement sympa, très propre et tres
Espaço maravilhoso, decoração de extremo bom gosto, bem equipado, muito bem localizado e de fácil acesso.

Lage: 1. OG, sehr zentral, alles was man braucht ist fußläufig, zum Hinterhof gelegen, ruhig, Rohbaustelle direkt nebenan (leider etwas Lärm morgens, ist aber nur temporär)
Wohnung: genau wie beschrieben, üppige Ausstattung, für nicht mehr als zwei Leute zu empfehlen, gemütliches Bett, geräumig, sehr gute Klimaanlage 
Bad: sehr sauber, klein aber fein, Regendusche, sehr warmes Duschen möglich
Check-in: unkompliziert, Abholservice vom Flughafen, zuvorkommender Gastgeber
Ein echter Superhost! Danke für den tollen Aufenthalt.

The apartment is beautiful and comfortable, location is nice. The owner of the apartment is a amazing, caring and pleasant. There are everything you might need during your staying. We were pleasantly surprised by the fact that there are even such trifles as umbrella, first aid set, all stuff that is needed for cooking, coffee and milk for the coffee machine. Highly recommend!
Great little apartment close to everything in Porto.only down side was the noise from the renovations next door.

The apartment is very clean, comfortable and Maribel thinks on every detail. It’s very near the subway and there is buses a short walk. We can buy food near and there is a place you could eat too. I surely recommend.

Maribel’s apartment is really beautiful and very well located! It is in a walking distance to every place of interest, extremely clean, beautifully decorated and very well equipped. Boris welcomed me personally and gave me so many recommendations of places to visit. I would definitely recommend it and would love to start here again. Thank you!!

name: HUGE Bedroom in Lower East Side
summary: Exciting and trendy neighborhood! Tons of restaurants, bars, coffee shops, art galleries, and shopping. Walking distance:Soho, East Village, Lolita, Little Italy, Chinatown, and one subway stop from Brooklyn. 3 blocks from 4 major subway lines.
description: Exciting and trendy neighborhood! Tons of restaurants, bars, coffee shops, art galleries, and shopping. Walking distance:Soho, East Village, Lolita, Little Italy, Chinatown, and one subway stop from Brooklyn. 3 blocks from 4 major subway lines.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States

name: BALAT
space: Müstakil olan evimiz İstanbul Balat'ta bulunmaktadır. 130 yaşında, müstakil bir evdir. 2 farklı odada toplam 3 kişi kalabilme imkanı bulunmaktadır.

host.host_about:
I am married, we live in old city in istanbul. 

We love travel, meeting new people, explore new flavors, much like navigating the streets of foreign countries.

We love to dance, laugh, love, smiling, intelligent people, wine, beer, good pasta, delicious desserts, adventure, everything that tastes good, loving-kindness,  explore, get lost in the sea, sun, Istanbul, amsterdam, london, beirut, bangkok ...

name: City View Apartment
summary: This apartment is located on the up floor (1st floor) It looks across to the street and the park includes comfortable home environment. 1+1 bedroom + living room + full equipment kitchen and bathroom. 59.m This apartment is up to 2+2 people.
description: This apartment is located on the up floor (1st floor) It looks across to the street and the park includes comfortable home environment. 1+1 bedroom + living room + full equipment kitchen and bathroom. 59.m This apartment is up to 2+2 people.
house_rules: if you stay with us...  Will try to make you comfort. In this city we want to spend extra effort for your comfort. (information and etc) Our aim is to be your home in Istanbul. Because we give many things for help.  (All is free)    *Transportation card. *Telephone SIM card. *We will give you the main informations about the city in English. *We will give you City map. *Baby strolle. *The Residence, within walking distance in all transportation.

host.host_about: Hello we are running a family business. We have suits in Istanbul to rent. We are happy to host you.

reviews.comments: Location is great- very Central but tucked in a quiet street. Very attentive staff. Very clean and comfortable.

name: Trendy apartment in BCN centre
space: This is a brand new apartment that was completly refurbished. Is located in the very centre of Barcelona (L'eixample district).  The area is very quiet, safe and perfect for a holiday break, because even when you can reach the luxury Avenue Passeig the Gracia within 3 metro stops, you´ll be still experiencing the real Barcelona style life. The Paseig the Gràcia area offers all it's modernist architecture, the tàpies foundation, and luxury shops, restaurants and cafes. A few minutes away from it, you'll be in Plaza Catalunya, the neuralgic nerve of Barcelona. The apartment is sorrounded by all sort of shops such as supers, pharmacies, coffe stores and restaurants. It has a huge terrace with amazing views of the city. The kitchen is fully equiped and linen and towels are provided. This is a great option for families and couples. It's also equiped with high speed wi fi and TV For further info don't hesitate in asking! ;) Check-in after 21:00 has an extra fee of 30€.

The area is very quiet, safe and perfect for a holiday break, because even when you can reach the luxury Avenue Passeig the Gracia within 3 metro stops, you´ll be still experiencing the real Barcelona style life. house_rules: - Check in/out time is flexible if there are no guests checking in/out the same day. Check-in after 21:00 has an extra fee of 30€. - It is not allowed to smoke inside the apartment. You can do it in the balcony!  - The use of the property in a careless, unruly manner or by having more people than the number allowed will result in the immediate termination of the rental agreement.  - Guests must return the property in the same clean conditions in which it was presented upon arrival.  - No loud noise after 10pm on weekdays and after midnight on weekends.

host.host_about:
Miguel and I live in Barcelona. 
We are a happy couple, friendly and easy to get along with. 
We like to make new friends.  
We always treat our guests friendly and respectfully, and we expect the same in return. 
Miguel is an architect and I'm a graphic designer/ilustrator. 
We are both freelance.

reviews.comments: Un appartement en parfait état, le métro à proximité, nous avons passé un agréable séjour.

L'appartement est très agréable, calme, lumineux, entièrement refait à neuf avec gout.
très grande terrasse sans vis à vis coté cour.
Je vous le conseille.

That Place is awesome, the rooftop!!!! Thats one  of our favorite things, you have such a nice view, so many space.... its huge!

Besides that Gabriela is an excellent host, who takes care all the time. Our flight was late so Gabriela have to wait for us, but she managed that very sweet to. All is in perfect condition inside, it looks even more beautiful with your own eyes!!! 

So don't wait book your flights to bcn, and try to stay in that amazing apartment!!!

BCN is always right!!!
We had really great experience staying at Cabriela and Miguel's place. New and fully equipped apartment with amazing rooftop! It is close to metro and train stations. Highly recommended!
Apartment well situated and comfortable, everything is new. The hosts are very welcoming.
Muy buena la experiencia , los chicos muy buena onda, el depto es muy lindo y cómodo .. Buena ubicación .. Vale la pena regresas ..

Gabriela has a great apartment. Everything is very new and super clean and it looks exactly as on the pictures. The rooftop is awesome! The area might not be too interesting, but you´ll find everything you need (supermarket, bakery...) around the block and the subway is right on the corner. 
Gabriela is a nice host. Communiation was very easy, and she made sure that even the little extras we asked for are all taken care of. If we ever get back to Barcelona we will try to stay here!

Lille men hyggelig lejlighed der ligger tæt på mindre ikke central metro. Vi var 5 personer, men der var kun 3 glas, 1 lille gryde og 1 lille stegepande i køkkenet. Der er  senge til 3 og så en gammel dårlig sovesofa til 2 personer (måtte ligge 5 cm tyk og dårlig madras på gulvet)
Ligger på toppen af lejlighedskompleks med stor terrasse med fin udsigt. Dog er der ikke nogen havemøbler, men vi fandt dog 3 gamle plaststole i et vaskeskur.
Virker lidt som en hurtig indtægtskilde, dog med fin service når man henvender sig ( bl.a. med en defekt aircondition der lækker vand på hele gulvet. Tydeligt en gammel skade med gamle skjolde på væg).
Udlejer kendte ikke til P-huse og priser i nærheden. Der ligger dog et ca. 30 meter rundt om hjørnet, der for øvrigt er til at forhandle pris med.
Vil klart anbefale at man er max 3 personer i denne lejlighed !

We slept 3 nights in this flat and we a really nice time ! It is just similar to the pictures, the terrace is amazing, the flat is well furnished, the beds are comfortable. The area is great, you can find a supermarket a few meters away and the metro is almost down the building. We would definitely go there again.

We were welcomed by Miguel. The apartment is beautifully decorated, spacious, and well located. Miguel was always ready to suggest things to do in the city. Gabriela always gave us timely responses to our requests. Excellent experience and excellent option for your stay in Barcelona!
This apartment was just right to feel the spirit of Barcelona! Touristic attractions were reachable but also far enough to feel home in the wonderful city.

This apartment was super!  Clean, compact, safe location.  Steps away from the metro which gets you to anywhere in the city.  Quite neighborhood and building which is really nice for active travelers who need to rejuvenate after long days and nights of sightseeing.  The kitchen had the basics for quick meal prep if you eat in a couple of times.  Clean new bathroom with a large shower.  Great large patio which does get hot during the day.  Gabriela and Miquel were accommodating and get back to you very quickly with answers to any questions you may have.  I was new to the airbnb experience and it could not have gone better being quests of these two hosts. Our family of four did well in the bed situation. One double bed in a small bedroom, a twin in a smaller bedroom and a double pull out couch.  Internet was strange a couple of times but it could just have needed a siesta! If we every have an opportunity to come back to Barcelona, I will be contacting Gabriela and Miquel!
Excelente apartamento, muy cómodo, limpio, super bien localizado,de volver a Barcelona no dudaría en quedarme allí otra vez.Super moderno, bien equipado, hermosa terraza.
We had a delightful stay in a great apartment. We felt very much welcome and found everything we needed.
Very nice, clean and cozy place, centrally located. The subway station is 3 min walk from the appartment. Would definitely stay again next time we're in Barcelona

Great apartment with a wonderful roof terrace! Great view over the city and still a very relaxing place! I would go there again, for three people it is a great place to stay. With the metro station quite close, it easy to visit all of Barcelona.

Tenía que acudir a un evento científico en el Hospital Clinic de Barcelona. Me alojé en el apartamento de Gabriela pues queda muy cerca del mismo (5-7 minutos paseando). 

¿Cómo son las habitaciones?:
La habitación principal da a un patio interior de la comunidad, es muy tranquila, se oye un poco la maquinaria del ascensor por el día porque está cerca, pero por la noche es silenciosa ya que el edificio es de ambiente familiar, acogedor y se respeta el descanso nocturno. De cualquier modo la zona es tranquila, y de noche mucho más. No hay ruido de tráfico ni nada por el estilo. Yo descansé muy bien.
La habitación pequeña en realidad es un espacio semiabierto que se comunica con el salón. Y da a la terraza principal. Suuuuper tranquila.

Positivos:
- El apartamento es un sobreático así que no hay vecinos en esa planta, sólo tú. La terraza es increíble, vistas maravillosas sobre los tejados y colinas al atardecer. En mi caso era casi octubre y ya refrescaba por la noche pero me imaginé que en verano se estaría muy bien cenando allí mismo. 
- El Aire Acondicionado funciona perfectamente, de maravilla. Y lo hay en todas las estancias. ¡De lujo!
- WIFI disponible.
- El piso está nuevo y muy limpio. Las fotos se corresponden con la realidad. No hay sorpresas. Decorado sin artificios. Básico pero funcional.
- Farmacia y supermercado en la misma calle, así como papelería y varios bares y cafeterías. 
- Boca de metro a escasos metros.

Posibles Negativos (según necesidades del viajero):
- El agua caliente de la ducha se agota de allí a un tiempo (calentador) y hay que esperar a que el tanque esté nuevamente caliente. Para mi que viajaba sola, era más que suficiente para una agradable y larga ducha. Para más personas supongo habría que tenerlo en cuenta y programarse. O ser breve (ecofriendly!) De cualquier modo es un aspecto menor.
- El ascensor llega hasta el ático. Para llegar al sobreático hay que subir un pequeño tramo de escaleras. Para mi no supuso ningún problema, ni lo supondrá para cualquier viajero joven y en forma. Pero está bien saberlo en caso de personas con problemas de movilidad o para quienes lleven equipajes muy pesados.

Realmente no son aspectos negativos sino simplemente a tener en cuenta! Mi estancia fue muy agradable y sin incidencias con una perfecta comunicación con mi anfitrión. Así que recomiendo este apartamento sin dudarlo.

Gracias Gabriela!

We arrived very late in the evening and miguel was so nice and waited for us in the appartment. The appartment looks like the same as it is shown on the pictures. It was very clean and tidy. We loved the view on the terace! I would definitely recommend this appartment and I'm sure that I will come again ;-) Cheers Hale

My husband and I had a fantastic stay in Barcelona. The apartment went a long way in making our visit so successful.   Miguel met us on arrival. He was very welcoming and immediately began to assist us with our luggage etc. The apartment looks just like the photos. It was very clean, comfortable and the terrace was awesome. We spent several nights overlooking the city while we enjoyed wine and cava! The metro was about 2 minutes away making travel around the city easy. We used the local supermarket and fresh fruit stands for some basic supplies. We ate at a local restaurant and shared a pitcher of sangria. The waitress went out of her way to help us! Everything was really nice. Prior to our trip, Gabriela answered all my emails very promptly. I would definitely rent this apartment again!
Estuvimos muy a gusto en el apartamento. Muy céntrico y perfecto para lo que necesitábamos. Terraza perfecta.

Obrigado Gabriela pela excelente estadia que nos proporcionou, a casa estava optima e com tudo o que precisavamos para termos uns dias fantasticos numa cidade maravilhosa.

Gracias

Schöne Wohnung, grandiose Aussicht, tolle Stadt, sehr nette Vermieter!!!
Wir haben uns sehr wohl gefühlt - gerne wieder!

Liebste Grüße aus Hamburg

Nous avons passe un agréable séjour à Barcelone dans l appart de Gabriela et Miguel L appartement est très bien situé dans un quartier tranquille et très proche ( 1 minute à pied) d une station de métro ce qui nous a permis de nous déplacer sans difficulté! Des notre arrivée nous avons été chaleureusement accueillis par Miguel qui nous a fait visiter l'appartement . L appartement est confortable, bien équipé, et en plus bénéficie d une vue panoramique de Barcelone grâce à la spacieuse terrasse!!!! 
En résumé nous avons été entièrement satisfait de notre séjour!

Comfortable flat on the top with a big terrace!
Great wifi.
Very near metro to reach all.
Our highest recommendation!

Thank You Gabriel & Miguel, we enjoyed a lot.

Appartement très propre, confortable et conforme aux photos. 
Situé dans un quartier calme et proche de la station de métro. 
L'hôte Miguel a été très accueillant à notre arrivée. 
Grande terrasse et bon wi-fi. 
Petits bémols concernant : le canapé lit qui n'était pas très confortable, le bruit de l'ascenseur, et l'eau chaude qui manquait parfois. 
Nous avons passé un agréable séjour et nous recommandons cet appartement. 

Merci Gabriela et Miguel !

L'appartement est très propre, agréable et bien situé. C'était un séjour très agréable!
Merci encore de votre accueil.

L'appartement est situé dans un quartier calme, tout près du métro.
L'appartement correspond bien à la description. Il est assez grand et lumineux ; les lits sont confortables. La salle de bain est assez petite, mais la douche est grande et agréable. Le wifi marche très bien. 
Seul petit bémol, on entend le bruit du mécanisme de l'ascenseur quand il est utilisé. Mais sinon l'appartement est très calme et on n'entend ni les voisins ni la rue.
La terrasse est très grande avec une très belle vue sur la ville et il n'y a pas de vis-à-vis direct.
Nous vous conseillons donc vivement cet appartement.

Si vous voulez aller grignoter en arrivant le 1er soir, nous vous conseillons d'aller au "mercado provenzal",) à l'angle de la rue de Rocafort et de l'avenue de Rome (2 min de l'appart) : c'est simple, bon et pas cher.

Great apartment! Clean, cosy. Full of sun, but with good air condition. Very close to center, Sants and Placa de Espanya. Top of the world with a great view! 
I've been in this appartment twice and would be glad to stay here again. Gabriela and Muigel are very easygoing and good hosts. 
I definitely reccomend to spend several days (weeks...) in this apartment!

Miguel received us with a lot of hospitality.
The apartment was very well.
The district was very quiet with the subway nearby.

The apartment is perfect! Great location, just 2 mins away from the metro station. Quite residential area, city centre is easily reachable by metro. Clean, high quality, big enough for 3 people. Great terrace for having a cava drink and enjoying the view on the city. Thanks Gabriela!
Ev sahibi çok kibar vede işini bilen biri, semt olarak muhteşem bir lokasyonda

We had a great experience... super clean apartment, straightforward; it was nice to be in a quiet neighborhood, close to the Metro. Awesome to have laundry (!) and the whole big roof deck. Everything worked well. ( : Miguel, Gabriela's husband, was very nice and helpful, and prompt.

El apartamento es tal y como se ve en las fotos, genial. Muy bien situado, muy muy limpio. No podría ponerle ninguna pega. La terraza increible aunque nosotros no pudimos disfrutarla. Sin duda volvería a el si volviera a Barcelona.

This apartment was amazing and even better than expected. It is in a quiet, safe neighborhood and is a 2 minute walk from a metro station, where you can quickly and easily get downtown. Having two separate bedrooms was awesome for our group and we really liked the renovated kitchen, bathroom, private laundry, and living space. The private rooftop patio was a pleasant surprise and was one of the highlights of our trip to Europe. Both Miguel and Gabriela were super friendly and accommodating to our needs. I cannot recommend this apartment enough!

I had a great time at Gabriela's. The apartment is brand new, very nice with a lot of light coming in and the terrace is just huge. And a very nice couple too : my plane was delayed but they waited for me. Viva España !

We had an absolutely lovely stay in Gabriela and Manuel's apartment. The location was great in terms of amenities, access to metro and ability to walk to a number of tourist attractions. The terrace is a great place to spend time. I will happily book this apartment the next time I travel to Barcelona.
The only drawback is there are no loungers on the terrace, we bought cheap yoga mats at a shop around the corner though and these were a fair substitute.
El anfitrión muy amable y el apartamento superó mis expectativas.

Gabriela and her husband Miguel were fantastic hosts. The apartment was very clean and newly renovated. 
This was my parents first experience with airbnb and we were all a little nervous but between the apartment and the hosts everything went really well and they're now very excited by the airbnb idea and wish we'd used it more during our trip. 
Gabriela and Miguel were very helpful with everything and even brought us a kettle when we requested one. 
Highly recommend them to anyone who's staying in Barcelona.
El legar tiene instalaciones modernas y eficientes. Es cómodo y está situado en un barrio bonito, con muy buena comunicación, y cerca de los lugares de interés de Barcelona.

Gabriela and her husband were very gracious hosts! Our flight was even delayed about an hour and it was no problem for them. They were very responsive and helpful as well. The apartment itself is amazing just as it looks in the photos, and the neighborhood is very quiet and safe to walk around at night.
Piso increíble, anfitriones geniales. Sin duda repetiremos. Gracias por todo

The apartment is even better in person. I was in contact more with Gabriela´s husband Miguel. He was such great help and accomodating as we had issues meeting our friends in Barcelona. The location is perfect,it is close to a metro and its minutes from Las Ramblas via walking or by bus but it is not crowded. there are a lot of little cafes and close to a supermarket. There were 5 of us and we were all very comfortable in the space. Highly recommended and I will definitely book this apartment again when I return to Barcelona. GRACIAS!!!

Appartement conforme aux descriptions. La terrasse est un vrai plus.
Au septième, le ciel n'est pas loin (sobre atico). Accueil parfait avant pendant le séjour. Quartier calme et reposant. Métro commerces très proche et pratique pour une famille avec enfants.

We had a great stay! the apartment is really nice, modern, CLEAN, central, next to the metro - everything was absolutely fine! as soon as we come back to barcelona, we will stay at this apartment for sure!
Gabriela and Miguel were great hosts. The apartment was absolutely perfect. I strongly recommend people who plan to visit Barcelona to stay at Gabriela and Miguel's apartment.

Wonderful host! Amazing location, and the flat is better then the pictures and description. The rooftop terrace is just stunning and it is so close to the train stations. 

I absolutely recommend this airbnb rental to anyone visiting Barcelona who wants to feel like they are just at home in the city. 

Really fabulous stay! Just a perfect and easy experience.

This apartment is just perfect for a stay in Barcelona, no matter if it is just for a couple of days or the whole holiday. Gabriela and Miguel are great hosts and everything from booking the apartment via the check-in, the stay to the check-out went absolutely uncomplicated. Even though my plane was delayed and I was more than one hour late, Miguel came to the apartment to hand over the keys. The flat itself is very clean and lovely furnished and it has all the comforts you need for your stay.
