house_rules: Please, No Smoking and no pets but apart from that, please treat the house as if it was your own.  It's our family home and we want you to enjoy it as much as we do. Max 2 cars parking at front of house and guests to park at top of driveway as the private drive needs to accommodate neighbours cars also. Thanks.

reviews.comments: We stayed at Aquila House over Xmas and NY in 2013 and had a spectacular time.  The house is stylish and simple, with impressive water views and only a short walk to the beach.  It managed to take 2 adults + 2 children + various other family members and friends with kids for BBQs without seeming crowded.  My sons were amazed to hear kookaburras and have a couple of parakeets come down to join us on the terrace at breakfast.  Susie the owner was very straightforward to deal with and added some really thoughtful touches to welcome us (Xmas tree, hamper, list of best cafés and restaurants in the village).  Just be aware that you should rent a car to get around, same need if you stay anywhere  outside of the very centre of Sydney to be honest.  I highly recommend Aquila House for a genuine summer break.

A very welcoming host as we were greeted with a much appreciated hamper of food and Christmas crackers when we arrived and the use of the car was very useful! A lovely area of welcoming neighbours and a selection of good shops/cafes, just a steep walk to the beach unfortunately which wasn't a problem for us, but perhaps the more elderly or young would have issues with. The house was as described and in a beautiful location on the northern beaches with the morning sun on the terrace for breakfast! Overall we had a fantastic family holiday here and would come again.
A modern, well equipped, spacious house with amazing views. It was family friendly and very comfortable. Susie was very organised and hospitable.

name: Quarto de Casal em Ipanema
summary: Ideal para hóspedes do mundo todo que buscam um lugar para poderem descansar e se socializarem depois de um longo dia na Cidade Maravilhosa.
space: Um lugar calmo e descontraído, onde você poderá interagir com outras pessoas e compartilhar a experiência de estar visitando o Rio. O apartamento fica na principal rua de Ipanema, a poucos passos da incrível Praia de Ipanema e próximo às famosas Praias de Copacabana e do Leblon.  Ele fica na zona de comércio do bairro, entre a Rua Farme de Amoedo e a Rua Texeira de Melo, onde também há grande variedade de bares e restaurantes nos arredores. Tudo acessível a pé.  Características do quarto Casadinho: ºCama de casal queen-size ºArmário ºAr Condicionado ºWIFI ºTV º Varanda

neighborhood_overview: Ipanema é um dos lugares mais especiais do Rio de Janeiro. Um paraíso, que mistura a vida urbana e belezas naturais. É cercado por praia e possui os melhores restaurantes e bares.
transit: O apartamento fica a menos de uma quadra da estação de metrô General Osório e fica em frente a um ponto de ônibus. Táxis e carros do Uber e outros aplicativos são acessíveis à nossa porta. Uma dica é se registrar no aplicativo BikeRio, por meio do qual você poderá utilizar as "city bikes" para se locomover para onde quiser. O carioca é adepto ao uso da bicicleta, uma forma saudável e rápida de locomoção na cidade.
access: A sala e a cozinha estão inteiramente à disposição do hóspede. Os banheiros da casa são compartilhados. Contamos com a colaboração de todos para mantê-los limpos e organizados entre períodos de faxina.
interaction: Estou sempre à disposição para responder qualquer dúvida e oferecer suporte.
house_rules: Não é permitido fumar dentro dos quartos/apartamento, fumar apenas na área da varanda. Is not allowed to smoke inside of the apartment, it is allowed to smoke only in the balcony. É fundamental respeitar os demais hóspedes, nenhuma forma de discriminação será tolerada. It is essential to respect the other guests, discrimination will not be tolerated. Não nos responsabilizamos por nenhuma perda de quaisquer objetos de valor.  We are not responsible for any loss of any valuables. Disponibilizamos a chave do quarto e do apartamento, que devem ser entregues no final da reserva.  We provide the room's and the apartment's Keys. You must return them at the end of the reservation. Não é permitido a entrada de qualquer pessoa que não faça parte da reserva ou que não esteja autorizada.  The entry of any person who is not part of the reservation or is not authorized by the hosts is not allowed.

The room I stayed in was spacious, neat and with affordable price. Would definitely recommend this place to other tourists who are looking to enjoy a good time in the wonderful city of Rio De Janeiro!

host.host_about:
每次旅行都是一种到达别人家做客的体验｡自己有好几处单位,住不了那么多,多半出租,我是位非常好客的人,也是很喜欢旅行!不管你是商务出差还是旅游度假,来我家住吧,很高兴能和你成为好朋友!给你们的旅行一个安全干净舒适实惠的居住环境｡
P.S:如你订好,请留个言给我~O(∩_∩)O谢谢~(Complete payment, please leave a message ~)
During the period of stay: if you are not Chinese, please leave a message directly to me, you need to, immediately to make arrangements for your service

)ID: (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)

address.street: 铜锣湾, 香港岛, Hong Kong

reviews.comments:
Pro:
-great location & value
-quick response from the host and very adaptable 

Cons:
-hair and dust in bed
-pictures don't represent the actual apartment layout
-unstable Internet

地點離地鐵站很近,周邊的商圈非常熱鬧｡
集結所有交通條件｡真的是十分便利｡
住宿環境在這交通樞紐銅鑼灣市中心,是安靜的｡
安全性也很不錯,

房東也很熱情,服務不錯｡
彭先生是个很好沟通的房东,第一次到香港,不知道香港的房源这么小的｡总体还可以｡

please check careful who the true owner is. they always have different owner with the one they use in airbnb. even phone number, i had a bad experience about finding the owner about 30mins, no one take my phone until i found out they actually have different owner with different phone number.
算便宜啦
没有烧开水的壶 还是楼下大爷那里灌的
好!就是空调有点老化｡有点杂音
房间位于铜锣湾,一个房间隔出一个独立卫生间,麻雀虽小 五脏俱全,卫生也挺好的,洗脸台没有热水,房间空调噪音比较大,其他都很好
内地来的客户建议可以 (Hidden by Airbnb) 导航,更精准一些｡
与描述相符吧,和爸妈孩子去的,香港寸土寸金这样的不错了,我们是一家人去的地方小点相互克服下,一个淋浴间,全家就只有我洗漱需要比较久的时间所以还好不会赶,如果是朋友去玩的话建议两个两人间的可能会好点｡
整体还算不错的,还挺干净
房東人很好,很願意幫助房課解決問題;但在實際入住時遇到給錯地址,寄物規範資訊與airbnb上描述不同等問題,需再改善
他们屋里有点臭,而且并不能见到房东

不差钱的请绕行,其实房源不是民居,属于家庭旅馆,和屋主只有电话联系,负责的是手下一名菲佣,给老板打电话,张口就是boss(¯へ¯)｡交通便利,离铜锣湾地铁E口1分钟,属于商业区,没有热闹的夜市,但地铁站上方的SOGO有特别棒的大超市,shopping可以,体验香港风情就算了｡房间小的要命,相当于国内如家的标间放了两张大床,大行李箱打开几乎就没地方站人了,主要是经济,毕竟这里寸土寸金嘛,适合出门有地方住就好,不挑的人｡PS,网站预留的电话不是屋主BOSS的,是个深圳的电话,感觉像中介｡
太差了,小的不能再小了,噪音太大,第一天入住,热水器嗡嗡的声音响了一宿,第二天换了一个地方,屋里面的味道呛死人,一宿没睡,住的地方还有狗,还比不上北京的快捷酒店,总之是太差了,很失望的一次旅行

name: Private Entrance - Backyard Summer Dining - Enjoy
summary: If you appreciate the natives in the outer boroughs, we appreciate you as guest.  Brooklyn has become very popular among Brooklynites and new comers.  While visiting NYC, if you are looking for crowds, museums and shopping, visit Manhattan.  Welcome!
space: TRANSPORTATION IS SO IMPORTANT -  APARTMENT IS LOCATED TO EASY AND CONVENIENT TRAVELS -  WHILE STAYING AT THIS: Spacious and comfortable guest suite (Website hidden by Airbnb) Bathroom, open kitchen/entertaining area.     - Access to the garden for summer days and evenings.   The host will interact with the guest, if needed because we respect your privacy and vacation time.
description: If you appreciate the natives in the outer boroughs, we appreciate you as guest.  Brooklyn has become very popular among Brooklynites and new comers.  While visiting NYC, if you are looking for crowds, museums and shopping, visit Manhattan.  Welcome! TRANSPORTATION IS SO IMPORTANT -  APARTMENT IS LOCATED TO EASY AND CONVENIENT TRAVELS -  WHILE STAYING AT THIS: Spacious and comfortable guest suite (Website hidden by Airbnb) Bathroom, open kitchen/entertaining area.     - Access to the garden for summer days and evenings.   The host will interact with the guest, if needed because we respect your privacy and vacation time. Backyard access. Due to construction in the area, the yard has been compromised therefore esthetically not pleasing to the eye but still can be used. We respect your privacy so will not interfere with your visit. We are not offering a hotel experience, yet a friendly and family environment.  (Please do not bring people to hang out, party or sleepovers - each additional
neighborhood_overview: Neighborhood is a diverse culture/eclectic with townhouses, apartment buildings, places for eating, bars, banking, and supermarket. There is major construction around the neighborhood and new construction next door.  Unfortunately, due to construction with digging/breaking ground, we have unfriendly critters (rodents) popping up in the late hours in the streets/subways.  We Brooklynites can't wait till beautifying the neighborhood, especially on our block is completed.  This is just an FYI.
notes: IMPORTAN (Website hidden by Airbnb) The Queen Size bed is a Select Comfort Bed - The mattress is controlled (by remote) for a soft or hard feel "your choice comfort", every guest choice is personal.  -     The neighborhood is quiet at night, much traffic during the day which could be noisy due to buses and delivery trucks (not totally distracting unless you are super noise sensitive, there are earplugs).  Presently, there is construction on the block from homes being renovated or built so construction crew starts to work as early as 8 a.m.  -    Just an FYI...     --   Please note the nightly booking rate is for two people.  If a confirmed booking is for one person, any additional person checking in after confirmed booking will have to pay a nightly rate per person upon request.   -    Airconditioner is in the apartment (utilized summer dates June 1 until Sept 30) unless extremely hot, want to make you comfortable, controlled by remote. Please turn off AC and lights when out for the da
transit: Transportation is EXCELLENT! Easy access to Manhattan.
access: Backyard access. Due to construction in the area, the yard has been compromised therefore esthetically not pleasing to the eye but still can be used.
interaction: We respect your privacy so will not interfere with your visit. We are not offering a hotel experience, yet a friendly and family environment.  (Please do not bring people to hang out, party or sleepovers - each additional person will be charged a nightly rate whether visiting or staying).
house_rules: No smoking, No pets.  Sanitary napkins, Tampons and Bounty napkins must be placed in the trash, NOT IN TOILET BOWL.  PLEASE DO NOT use hair dye/color.  Turn off lights, air conditioner and television when out enjoying the day.  Be sure doors and gates in front and back are locked when out of the house. Throw out trash and place in recycle bins.  Leaving the apartment untidy or dirty will incur a cleaning fee.  PLEASE RESPECT THE HOME AS IF IT WAS YOUR HOME WITH CLEANLINESS AND CARE OF BELONGINGS!  ALSO, NOTIFY HOST WITH YOUR DEPARTURE TIME - PLEASE DO NOT LEAVE WITHOUT NOTICE.  Departing after check out time (noon) will incur the daily rate.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: Easy, breezy and enjoy having fun with friends and great people.  Appreciate a comfortable, clean home.  Favorite past time is reading or a good movie.  Family and my time, most important.

reviews.comments: Michelle was a very considerate, responsive host. The apartment is lovely and very comfortable and was furnished with everything we needed. We had a great stay.

Séjour merveilleux chez Michelle qui est une hôte adorable, le logement etait vraiment super... très propre, , fonctionnel,petit plus le rez de jardin ou l on peux manger et profiter des petits oiseaux car nous sommes à new york , mais vraiment au calme,station de metro à deux (Website hidden by Airbnb) recommande vraiment cette adresse, nous sommes venus avec nos deux enfants...
Merci michelle de nous avoir permis de passer un si bon voyage,!

I booked Michelle's private Brooklyn home for my retired parents, who were visiting me in LA from overseas and wanted to travel to New York for a few days. My parents returned from New York raving about Michelle, her graciousness and her beautiful home including a private outside patio! The apartment was attractively decorated and very clean with all the key amenities including coffeemaker, TV, internet, and even fresh fruit! The supermarket was conveniently around the corner, and my dad said he chatted with locals as he walked to the bakery to get bread each morning. My parents said it was like home away from home. They highly recommend Michelle as a host, and I can't wait to visit myself. Michelle, thank you for making my parents' New York trip so special. You and your family are welcome to visit us in Long Beach, CA anytime. 

Michelle, ist eine wunderbare und nette Gastgeberin.
Bei fragen und Tipps stets zur stelle und unglaublich hilfsbereit.
Das Appartement ist sehr geräumig und voll ausgestattet.
Die Lage ist erstklassig, U-Bahn und Supermarkt nicht mehr als 150 Meter entfernt.
Wir habe uns sehr wohl gefühlt und können uns nicht beklagen. Es ist jedem zu empfehlen der New York als Stadt erkunden will.
Jederzeit wieder!!

Very nice and big enough basement apartment with two rooms. Clean and nicely furnished with a good wide bed in one room and a sofa in kitchen, with all necessary dishes and coffee machine (Michelle even provided us with coffee for it) That was much more than enough for two persons. Also we used bbq in the court which also was great. Michelle was hospitable enough to meet us in the middle of the night!  We didn`t have any problems at all living in such kind of apartment. Should notice that the connection to Mahattan is a little complicated given the G metro line which is not very frequent. But in general the enviroment is quite ok with nice dominican dely on the corner of the street (highly recomended!)
Michelle was a nice person and really easy to communicate. We had a great time in this big apartment and no problem with to get into the city.

Very nice place!
Michelle is very friendly, helpfull and a nice person to chat with.
The place is very clean, homy feeling. The Subway is less than 100 yards away (about 1/2 hour ride from midtown Manhattan) which is VERY convenient. Neighbourhood ok. At the end of the day is much nicer to come to instead of a "cold" hotel room! The back yard is great for morning / evening coffe or even BBQ (the grill is already there).
Thank you Michelle  :-)
תודה רבה (Hebrew)

Michelle is a fantastic host, she made us  feel very welcome.
The place was clean and perfectly organized,  quiet at night, 4 very comfortable sleeping places, safe neighborhood, we had everything we needed. the subway is literally 1minute walk from the apartment, you get to Manhattan in 20 minutes. There are also buses that take you in no time to down town Brooklyn and Williamsburg. Supermarket is around the corner. Bakery for great breakfasts and deliciuos donuts place at 2 minutes walk from home.
The back garden is also very nice, we were too busy walking all day long, but it gave us a sense of big space, on a nice day you could spend time outside and enjoy a private corner of open air.
If I have the chance to go to New York again, I will surely go back to Michelle!
Everything was great in your apartment. Nice place, nice neighborhood with a subway station very close to the apartment. Thank you Michelle ! :-)

Notre expérience à l'appartement de Michelle fut merveilleuse! J'y suis aller avec mes parents, qui n'avaient jamais mis les pieds à Brooklyn, et ils furent enchantés par la proximité du métro, de l'épicerie, par la grandeur de l'appartement et ses facilités. Je recommande fortement l'appartement de Michelle, et j'y retournerai assurément à mon prochain séjour à New York!
-----
Our experience at Michelle's apartment was wonderful! I'm going with my parents, who had never been to Brooklyn, and they were delighted with the nearby subway, grocery, the size of the apartment and its facilities. I highly recommend the Michelle's apartment, and I certainly return on my next trip to New York!
Yol
Yol

Io e la mia famiglia siamo stati 20 giorni nell'appartamento di Michelle e siamo stati benissimo. Appartamento con ingresso indipendente, pulito, ben tenuto e con tutto il necessario per 4 persone. I letti sono veramente comodi (non si trovano facilmente nelle case per vacanze). Vicinissimo alla metropolitana, si raggiunge Manhattan in poco tempo, e vicino ad alcuni market, per cui fare la spesa è stato facile. La zona è abbastanza tranquilla, si rientrava anche a sera tardi ma non abbiamo avuto nessun problema. Michelle è una persona molto simpatica, molto disponibile e molto discreta. consiglierei sicuramente di passare una vacanza nel suo appartamento. Grazie ancora Michelle ...e speriamo arrivederci!! I love NY

Michelle was great host for my parents and very helpful in arranging taxi, showing shops and answering questions about New York. Her flat located just next to the metro station, which made it easy to get to the downtown. Had some minor problems with the radiator but Michelle took care of that so were no bigger issues. Recommended!

This was my first time to use the Airbnb and I'm glad I chose Michelle and her house. 
The house is as it's seen on the pictures. It is pretty good size for three people. My parents slept on the bed and I slept on the couch. I am 180 cm (5' 11'') and fit on the couch and it was pretty comfortable.
When we arrived Michelle's house she greeted us right away, took her time to explain how to commute, where to eat and what to do in the city. 
The location of house is pretty good. It takes 20-30 min with metro to Manhattan downtown, depends on which line you use. You can also take the metro from JFK, otherwise the cab costs  around $50. In the house everything was clean and neat. She also provided us towels for shower etc. Besides that, whenever I texted to Michelle she responded in timely manner, which made everything easier.
Honestly, our overall experience was much better than I expected.  Me and my family had a very good time in Michelle's house and NY. If one day I go back to NY, I know where I should stay.
We spent a wonderful week at Michelle's place. She was very nice and took care of what ever we needed. The apartment is just 2 min from the subway which helped us get to Manhattan quickly.

Michelle is really nice and her place is very cozy. This was my first airbnb experience and I enjoyed it a lot. Her service is much better than anything you would get at a hotel for a much better price. She gave us a recommendation on where to get breakfast that turned out great. The place is very clean and neatly decorated. It's literally right off the subway station, so that's a huge plus. We also met her mother, who is a fascinating woman. I highly recommend her place, if you are looking to visit the area.  
-- Later Edit:
I should mention that her internet is very fast. I don't know what ISP she uses, but it was a joy to go back to a temporary accommodation and know that you are well connected while traveling. I'm not sure of the exact setup, but it appeared that we had a separate modem and router just for us. This was a huge relief. Michelle had the SSID and password printed and ready for guests, so even if you forget to ask, you would still find them in the apartment. Overall, things were very well thought out before hand and Michelle was very proactive with tiny details like this that make all the difference. This was very surprising to me knowing that I'm dealing with an individual and not a company.
Michelle was very nice and her flat is very confortable, well located with the subway at the end of the street. I recommend her. Thanks a lot Michelle and see you later.
Michelle was an outstanding host and very helpful, apartment clean and convenient.

Amazing 4 day stay with Michelle in Brooklyn! We arrived a little early but she was still able to find time to accommodate us...arriving with fresh fruit and water for us. The apartment is amazing, plenty of room with all the comforts you could ask for (small kitchen/TV with cable/wifi). Easy access to trains and transportation, with many restaurants near by. After this stay, I don't think I'll be booking a traditional hotel in NYC again. Highly recommended!! Thanks again Michelle!

Très joli appartement dans Brooklyn! J'ai été agréablement surprise :) ! Nous y avons passé 4 nuits, et l'appart est parfait pour accommoder de 2 à 4 personnes. Très sympa de pouvoir rentrer pour prendre un verre ou déjeuner "à la maison". 
Le quartier n'est pas le plus trendy de brooklyn mais le métro est littéralement à 1 minute à pied! Michelle était charmante et tout était parfait! Et en plus, aucun problème pour stationner la voiture dans la rue, devant la maison! Merci!!!

Hermoso lugar, muy limpio. Michelle nos ayudó en todo momento y nos ofreció dejar las valijas gratuitamente unas horas aún cuando ya había pasado el tiempo del check out, el lugar es más lindo que en las fotos, y a muy pocas estaciones del downtown de Manhattan, 100% recomendable!
A pesar de que había nieve no se sentía nada de frío, excelente calefacción. El patio trasero era muy bonito y se veían ardillas!
Hay supermercado y KFC muy cerca, y es cómodo que esté a metros del subte.

Michelle is a great  hostess, she helped us with everything and even oferred to keep our lugagge some hours after the check out. 
The place is perfect, there are groceries, KFC, subway station, and it´s 20-30 mins from downtown Manhattan! 
Beautiful place, very comfy and cozy, everything was clean. We couldn´t enjoy the backyard because the chill, but it was awesome! and there were some lovely squirrels! We want to come back some year, and sure will recommend it to our friends

Nous rentrons d'un séjour de 8 jours à NYC où nous avons séjourn (Website hidden by Airbnb) Adultes et 2 ados) chez Michelle début mars. nous en sommes ravis malgré des températures froides.
==)positifs: 
Bon compromis rapport qualité / prix. La proximité avec une station de métro est un plus ainsi que celle de l'épicerie permettant de faire les petites courses pour les repas pris au gite. Michelle est extrêmement accueillante et serviable. 
l'appartement est simple et très propres. 4 vrai lits confortables. 
==)négatifs:
bien que situé dans un quartier + calme, la chambre donne sur la rue, et les nuits peuvent être difficiles pour les oreilles sensibles. le métro qui passe dessous est audible, tout comme les avions. mais à New York , il est difficile de trouver une endroit très calme. NEW YORK reste un environnement urbain et donc globalement bruyant, autant en avoir conscience. 
Pour une famille de 4, les lits enfants sont dans la pièce qui sert de coin jour. Une table et chaises pliantes nécessitent d'être pliés  pour installer le 4ième lit et inversement, plier le lit pour prendre les repas. Pour les français que nous sommes, la table est aussi importante que le lit. ça peut être un problème. 
Peu de vaisselle ( verres en plastique) ce qui est un peu dommage mais ça reste un détail.
Mais quand on vient à New York, ce n'est pas pour une ballade gastronomique. Nous recommandons vraiment cette adresse. Très bon compromis.
La cours arrière sera appréciable pour les périodes + douces.

English comments:
Just returned from NYC where we stayed with our 2 teenagers in Michelle's appartement. We are really delighted .

==)positives:
Good compromise quality / price ratio . Proximity to a metro station is a must as well as with the grocery store allowing some errands for meals at the appartement. really practical, opened until 21h. Michelle is extremely friendly and helpful.
the appartment is simple but  very clean with 4 real comfortable beds.

==)negatives:
Although located in a quiet neighborhood, the parent room is overlooking the street, and the nights can be difficult for sensitive ears. Subway is audible,as well as cars & trucks in the street. But to moderate this aspect,  in New York, it's difficult to find a quiet place because it remains a generally noisy urban environment as knowledge.
For a family of 4, children beds are in the main room. A table and chairs need to be folded to open beds and vice versa, folding bed for meals. it could be a problem.
Very few dishes ( plastic glasses ) which could be improved but it's still a detail.

But when we come to visit New York, it is not for gastronomic ballad, and it's important  to find a confortable & clean area. The backyard could be pleasant when the weather allows to use it. Unfortunatelly for us it's was too cold begining of march.
We really recommend this address.
Many thanks to Michelle.

Pascale et Yann.
Very nice apartment, comfortable beds, and felt very safe in the neighborhood. We had a very positive experience. Great amenities close by.

Ein super schönes Appartement mit ein sehr freundlichen Vermieterin. Wir haben uns sofort richtig wohl gefühlt. Es war sauber und gemütlich. Alles notwendige war vorhanden.
Leider mussten wir wegen eines Streiks unserer Airline früher abreisen als geplant. Michelle war sehr verständnisvoll und eine schnelle Abreise war überhaupt kein Problem. Ich würde jeder Zeit wieder meinen New York Aufenthalt dort verbringen.
Vielen Dank!

Great place, great host. We really enjoyed our stay with Michelle. Her place is neat and clean and had everything we needed. Michelle is easy to communicate with and she let us check in a little early so we could drop off our luggage. Would definitely stay here again!

Michelle is a super friendly and helpful host. The apartment was just like what we had expected. It was clean, warm and cosy when arrived. It is very close to the Metro Station, which made it easy to go to Manhatten even with our children Age 2, 5 and 7. Thank you, Michelle, we'd love to come back.

Mes enfants et moi avons bien apprécié notre séjour chez Michelle. L'appartement est propre; le lieu est fidèle aux photos. L'accueil de Michelle est chaleureux. La cuisine est bien équipée pour cuisiner. L'accès à la cour arrière est aussi un avantage pratique. Le quartier ne présente aucun intérêt touristique mais la proximité du métro fait tout l'intérêt de cette adresse, pour un coût nettement plus raisonnable qu'à l'hôtel ! Très bon rapport qualité-prix.

We had a fantastic time in New York in the apartment of Michelle. She was a great host and very helpful. The apartment is very close to the subway, very comfortable and nicely decorated.
We would definitively come back.
Agréable séjour chez Michelle, très bien accueillis. Le métro est très proche. Super souvenirs de New York.

Our stay at Michelle's place was perfect! She is really caring, generous and was always here for us! The appartment is great, it is really close to the subway station and you can be in Manhattan in less than 30mins! It is very easy to get there from the airport. I would stay there again for sure and highly recommend Michelle! Thank you for everything!
Claire

Wonderful place to stay!  Michelle was more than accommodating and my husband , my grown son and I were very comfortable staying there for 6 days together.  The suite was very clean, attractive and inviting. There are not many places to eat or shop in this neighbourhood which makes the proximity of the subway such a plus. It's only 1/2 block away!  Thanks to Michelle for providing our home base for our New York trip.

We stayed 3 nights in Michelle's flat and had a wonderful time. The location is great, just 2 minutes walking to the metro and the neighbourhood is fine too as everything you need is close by. We received a warm welcome from Michelle and were provided with many tips and great instructions. The flat itself is absolutely perfect, beautiful wooden floors, big comfortable bed, fully equipped kitchen and even a pretty garden. We would very much recommend this apartment!

Michelle was a great host and always available for questions. We have no complaints  about the room and there was plenty of space in the backyard. The neighborhood was okay with good connections to the subway. We had a very nice holiday with the four of us.
We had a couple of days in NY and need a place to stay. Michelle was a wonderful and comprehensive host. Thank you for your kindness.

Michelle est une hôte attentionnée et disponible même lorsque l'arrivée est tardive.
L'appartement correspond bien aux photos, il est grand, très propre et suffisamment équipé pour 4 adultes. Le fait de ne pas avoir à apporter de linge de toilette et draps est vraiment appréciable, surtout quand on vient de loin.
Le jardin est sympathique et permet des soirées barbecue conviviales ou des petits déjeuners au frais.
Comme souvent aux Etats Unis, la chambre ne comporte pas de volets pour la lumière et les cloisons sont fines donc pour ceux qui ont un sommeil fragile je préconiserai de prendre un masque de nuit et des bouchons d'oreilles, mais le logement se situant à Brooklyn, l'environnement est bien moins bruyant que Manhattan.
Nous y avons passé 4 jours et avons été très satisfait du logement, que nous recommandons.

Michelle is an attentive host, she's available even when the guest arrival is late. 
The apartment matches the photos, it's large, clean and sufficiently equiped for 4 adults. Bring towels and sheets is not usefull she provides it and it is really great especially when you're coming from far away.
The garden is nice and allows friendly barbecue evenings and breakfasts. 
As often in the USA, the room has no shutter and the walls are thin so for those who need silence and darkness to sleep I will advice to take a sleeping mask and earplugs, but the accommodation is located in Brooklyn, the environment is much less noisy than Manhattan. 
We stayed for 4 nights and were very satisfied with the accommodation. We recommend it.

Nous avons passé 5 nuits avec nos 2 enfants.Tout a été parfait !
logement tres agreable ( très propre, literie confortable,jolie déco ),un jardin où nous avons pris le petit dejeuner chaque matin et super sympa - trop bien - , accès à Manhattan très bien - metro a coté - accès à Williamsburg facile aussi - et on vous recommande d'y aller, super quartier - .
 Michelle est discrète et chaleureuse , disponible pour toute question , vraiment très sympathique . Merci encore de votre accueil .
Des endroits où diner juste à coté de l'appart et chouettes  ( testez le pub où l'ambiance est sympa et d'excellentes salades ).
excellent séjour chez Michelle . On recommande cette adresse .

Our stay in Michelles's place was great. The apartment is clean and organize. It's very close to the subway and there is a good market at the same block. Michelle was always ready to help when we needed. Thanks Michelle! I definitely give two thumbs up!

FABULOUS!!!
We were great received by Michelle! What a fantastic fun, nice woman and what a great apartment and cosy garden.
We enjoyed every minute and this is a perfect location in a nice neighborhood. Everything was very clean and tidy.
Lovely bed and shower and a good range of TV channels. Everything you could wish for during your holiday is present. We would love to come here again!

Nous avons été tres bien recus par Michelle, et je l a remercie encore d avoir patienter 3 heures de plus à notre arrivée car notre avion avait du retard. Merci également d avoir gardé nos bagages le dernier jour. Michelle est une personne très agréable et disponible. Le logement est très bien situé metro a 3 mn commerce à 10 mn. L appartement est propre, la terrasse est appréciable pour prendre les repas. La literie est de bonne qualité. Il est agréable de ne pas avoir  à amener draps et serviettes de bain. Notre séjour a duré 10 jours pour bien visiter New York il faut compter 6 - 7 jours.
Je recommanderai ce logement à mes amis
 Merci Michelle

logement conforme à l'annonce qui est situé dans un quartier calme et bien situé pour visiter New York car proche du métro. Le logement est fonctionnel et très propre et parfait pour une famille de 4 personnes. Notre hote est discrète et serviable.

Très bel appartement et accueil fort sympatique de Michelle.
Nous étions en famille : 2 adultes et une adolescente. Grand espace : 1 chambre avec lit double (très propre et confortable) et une grande cuisine avec un canapé-lit (2 couchages). Tout était très propre et fonctionnel (cuisine en bon état et complète; salle de bain petite mais entrès bon état. Un jardin (cour intérieure) est accessible. Entrée individuelle et séparée des autres logements du petit immeuble.
Très bon rapport qualité-prix .
Situation : à Brooklyn, dans le quartier de Bedford-Stuyvesant. Pas très touristique et un peu déglingué, mais très sûr et calme ; avec des petits commerces à proximité. Et l'appart de Michelle (situé à l'entresol d'un Brownston typique) est tout proche (200m env) d'une bouche de métro : la G , qui va au nord vers le Queens (arrêt proche Metropolitan Ave : quartier Bobo de Bedford-Williamsburg, très sympa) et au sud vers les quartiers animés de Brooklyn (ex. arrêt Bergen str. : Cobben Hill et Carroll garden). Enfin la ligne G permet la correspondance aves la ligne A, qui va à l'est vers JFK-airport et vers l'ouest : à Manhattan -ligne "express".
Merci beaucoup à Michelle pour sa gentillesse et son bel appartement, où nous avons passé 8 jours superbes fin août 2014 !!

Michelle made  us feel at home she was so nice to my family and i  we could not have ask for more we were welcome  in a very nice atmosphere  full of love  friendly  neighborhood  every thing was at our finger tips buses and the train station  very easy to go to my daughter in Queens and back that was the ideal place  and we are hoping we can get it next year same time thank you so much for every thing.

Michelle was a great host. Responded to my queries leading up to the stay promptly. Was kind enough to accept my packages resume my arrival. Very welcoming and responded to requests during my stay. Apartment is exactly as described and shown in photos. Bathroom is a tight squeeze but I think it's common in NYC. Didn't end up using kitchen facilities so can't comment. Location is good. Markets are close by. Train into Manhattan does take a bit of time due Having to change train lines.

Michelle was very friendly and had a lovely, clean garden apt.
Near the G Line it made for a great getaway.

Vi have et rigtig dejligt ophold i Michelles lejlighed i Brooklyn. Vi er 2 voksne og tre store børn. Lejligheden var ren og pæn, med alle de ting en familie har brug for. Godt lille køkken, hvor vi hver dag kunne lave morgenmad, kaffe og te. Dertil en rigtig hyggelig gårdhave, hvor man kan slappe af efter en hektisk dag på Manhattan. Kvarteret hvor lejligheden ligger i er et beboelseskvarter, med masser af butikker, restauranter, skoler og kirker. Et levende område, men meget trygt og vi følte os meget sikre når vi gik rundt. Vi var glade for, at vi valgte at bo i Brooklyn, for der er meget at se og opleve i området. Michelles lejlighed ligger kun 30 meter fra en subway, og det er enkelt at finde til Manhattan eller andre steder på Brooklyn. Vores fly var forsinket, og vi ankom først kl. 01 til lejligheden, men Michelle var meget omtænksom og havde lagt vand og juice i køleskabet, og sørget for at der var kaffe. Så kunne vi lige klare os til næste morgen, hvor vi handlede ind i supermarkedet - tak for det Michelle.

I det hele taget gjorde Michelle det nemt at være turist i New York. Hun var tilgængelig for vores spørgsmål og da vi skulle hjem, bestilte hun en taxa til os. Lejligheden, området og Michelle gav vores efterårsferie til en særlig oplevelse for os alle fem, og vi vil varmt anbefale andre at bo hos Michelle.

Michelle was very welcoming. We got there an hour before check-in, but since the place was ready, she received us very kindly. The place was impeccable, and the kitchen is well-equipped. We didn't need to contact her with questions or concerns during our four-day stay, she covered everything when we got there. She told us where the subway was (on the corner, as easy as it gets) and where to buy groceries, etc. It is a working class  mixed neighborhood, and we felt safe walking around.
I will stay there again, and I have no negative feedback whatsoever.

Michelle was a wonderful host and the apartment was everything we expected. Lovely and spacious and comfortable. The subway station was less than a minutes walk and there were shops and cafes very close by. I would definitely stay here again. Thanks Michelle.

We did feel welcome and there was a nice note with some good tips on things close and help getting around. That being said, DO NOT turn the water just to hot to wash your hands, you will get burnt. Our flight got in late at night and when we arrived, it smelled like a bug bomb was let off in the apartment. We aired it out every day and it took almost 3 days for the odor to dissipate. Michelle said it was cleaners, I am still unsure. My wife and I both got a headache from the fumes the first night.  The bed in the photo is a misrepresentation, the mattress was a sleep number set to the hardest setting with no remote to adjust it, we slept on the couch/daybed. The pillows were cheap and nearly unusable, bring your own. The sheets were also cheap, hospital quality. There are 14 signs in the apartment and on the door to the back telling you what you are and aren't allowed to do. We had to call to have the heat turned on when it was about 40 degrees in the space and then the radiators are quite noisy and right near the bed.

45 minute commute on the subway to get to mid-town Manhattan. I would not stay there again, we never felt really comfortable.

Me sentí EXCELENTE en la casa de Michelle. Le daria un 10/10. Me gusto muchisimo el apartamento y es cierto lo que dicen algunos comentarios anteriores: el lugar es mucho mas lindo en la vida real que en fotos! Es muy limpio, bonito, espacioso y full equipado con todo ( inlcuso secador de  pelo, spray de cabello, toallas, platos, cubiertos, libros, dos televisores LCD, guias de NYC, un jardin hermoso, TODO!) se tiene privacidad y el vecindario es muy bonito, aunque recomiendo tener cuidado y no llegar a media noche para prevenir cualquier incidente, ya que un taxista nos dijo que a media noche podrúa no ser tan seguro) 
El Subway esta en la esquina de la cuadra y  toma media hora para llegar a Lower Manhattan y 40 minutos a el Midtown, ademas el precio me parece justo. Por otro lado, aunque no conocí a Michelle en persona es muy amable, atenta, responde muy rapido por msjs de texto y da recomendaciones si las pides. YO LO SUPER RECOMIENDO y VOLVERIA!!
Lo único que le sugeriría a Michelle es dar el numero del apartamento a su próximo huésped para que sepa llegar exactamente al lugar.

Thank you Michelle for the awsome time in NYC! We had a great time during our 4-day-trip. The apartment is very cosy and we liked it a lot. It's also very quite during night time which we enjoyed very much. The subway station is very close by and it is easy to catch a connecting train to Manhattan. 
Michelle is a great host. She provides you with the information you need. She gives information on near by supermarkets and other useful hints.
All in all we had a good time in her apartment and would definitely come back here again.
Michelle's place was great, really cosy and warm. Very close to the subway to get into Manhattan. Michelle is a lovely person and was very helpful. Would recommend staying here!

We really enjoyed our 9 nights in this cosy apartment, and Michelle is a warm, friendly and considerate hostess. She had stocked the fridge with essentials like juice, eggs, butter and jam, and the cupboards also had a lot of basics like tea, coffee, pasta etc. Likewise there was plenty of soap, toilet paper, shampoo and body wash in the bathroom, none of which we had ever seen in previous Air BnB apartments. Little touches like this really make a difference if you've ever forgotten your own, or if you don't have a lot of time to spend shopping.

For a couple, the apartment is spacious, warm, comfortable and extremely close to a subway station with supermarkets and delicatessens in easy walking distance. It's very easy to get into Manhattan within about 40 minutes.

Michelle was extremely accommodating, had lots of good tips about the local area and the rest of NYC, and the next time we are in NYC, I wouldn't hesitate to stay here again. It definitely felt like our home away from home in New York! Thanks, Michelle - we really enjoyed our stay with you :0)

Michelle is a warm and friendly host. She welcomed my family and explained everything thoroughly - all the amenities, how the heating works, street parking rules and what is to be found in the neighbourhood. 
The unit itself is cozy and beautifully decorated. Main bed is comfortable and sofa bed with pull out trundle is also comfy. Michelle also has a baby's portable cot so the unit can easily accommodate 2 adults and 2 small children. 
Heating is great which is important in the brutal NY winter. 
Kitchen amenities are also good if you want to prepare your own meals. Kitchen is fully equipped with fridge, cooktop, microwave, coffee maker, kettle, pots and pans etc. Closest supermarket is a couple of minutes walk away. It is small but stocks a great variety of produce and organic food options (good for us vegans). 
Neighbourhood feels safe enough and not noisy. Subway is also a minute away and the train ride to Manhattan takes roughly 15-20 minutes with a change of trains. 
Other things to mention: shower is nice - good stream; good wi-fi; cable tv; glass doors to separate bedroom from living area;  which contains the pull-out sofa; well baby-proofed. 
Overall, no complaints. We are very happy customers and highly recommend Michelle and her lovely unit. Would happily stay here again. Thank you Michelle x

Michelle was extremely warm and welcoming. She meet us at the entrance and explained to us everything about the apartment. The apartment was toasty once we arrived, and set up just like the photos. Extremely clean and well stocked. I stayed with three friends for 6 nights and though the apartment is small in square footage, it is very spacious because of the way the apartment is set. We were able to have the table with the four chairs up the whole time we were there and managed to move around freely. We definitely took advantage of the kitchen, we cooked every morning. The apartment is located half a block down from the G line which was great since we took the train everywhere. She gave us a list of recommendations, make sure you go to the Black Swan. They have great food and beers. The apartment has central heating so make sure to take a tank top because it is warm at night. We all overpacked because we thought the apartment might of been too cold because of the snow but it was nice and toasty. We did see snow fall down and it was nice to have the patio in the back to make snow angels. Michelle is extremely attentive and if you really want to enjoy New York, stay out in Brooklyn. Definitely give this place a chance, it's worth it.

First, great location for us as it was close to family, subway, and parking was doable (we didn't move the car much). The place was comfortable, Michelle was a great host. Yes, there are signs with rules but nothing outside of common courtesy/sense. There was also a list of nearby supermarkets, attractions, etc. The kitchen was fully equipped, we just didn't take advantage. We were there during bitter cold but the heat was nice and toasty, but controlled so it wasn't too hot overnight. The bed and fold out were quite comfortable. Would definitely stay again.

propriétaire très agréable, j'ai eu un autre logement que celui mentionné à cause d'un problème de fuite, il était bien, mais au 3ème étage au lieu du rez-de-chaussée. Quartier pas très propre. le Métro à proximité représente un atout.
Had an excellent time at Michelle's place. Warm, clean, and oh so very cozy. Michelle was a great host and made sure we had everything we needed. Definitely recommend it.

Michelle's communication was great right from the start. She always responded immediately and with really useful information about things like location and weather.
Getting to the apartment from JFK by train and subway was straightforward and took about an hour and a quarter. It's literally a couple of minutes to the apartment from the station. 
As Michelle lives upstairs she was able to welcome us straight away into her very warm and cosy home - greatly appreciated in a freezing cold March. Everything's just as described and all the local information we needed was provided for us. A great coffee shop nearby for breakfast, and one of the best doughnuts we've ever tasted from a bakery!
As we were spending most of our time in Manhattan, ease of transport was important. No problem. It only took about half an hour to get downtown.
So, all in all a great stay. One small criticism (which we did talk to Michelle about) is the heating. It's an old system and when it's on it was really hot and a bit noisy. Any adjustments Michelle has to make from her part of the house, which she was always happy to do but did mean messaging or phoning. 
Thanks Michelle!

Wir haben uns in der Wohnung sehr wohl gefühlt. Sie ist genauso wie in der Anzeige beschrieben. Die Ausstattung der Wohnung ist gut. Michelle und ihre Mutter waren sehr nett und hilfsbereit. Die U-Bahn ist nur wenige Minuten entfernt und es gibt einige Möglichkeiten zum  Einkaufen in der Nähe.
Alles in allem empfehlenswert!

It was great to stay at Michelle's basement apartment. Close to the subway station, we found a clean, comfortable apartment. Michelle welcomed us and showed us around and when I needed something - like how the TV worked, I sent her a text and I would a an immediate response. The bed and pillows were very comfortable. I slept lik a rock. The day bed was of good quality as well. Michelle is friendly and always willing to help you out with information. My granddaughter and i had a great time in NYC and were glad to be in Brooklyn to leave all the hassle and bustle of NYC behind us and be in a quiet and safe area.
We can recommend Michelle's apartment when you are looking for a place close to everything and yet 'apart' from it.

All the best Michelle, I hope life will be good to you.

Helen and Evelyn
all wonderfull, very clean, nice space. subway is right there. and michelle is extremelly nice!!! 5 stars!!!

Michelle welcomed us warmly and we had a lovely stay! We had everything we needed and the apartment met our expectations. The place was clean and lovely, the subway station was really close and the neighborhood felt safe. Michelle gave us some good advice on where we can find things within the neighborhood and it was easy to keep contact with her. Thank you, Michelle!

Les contacts avant la location ont été précis.
Les indications étaient correctes, et nous avons trouvé l'appartement sans problème.
Notre hôte nous a vu a l'arrivée et au départ.
L' appartement été sombre, mais cela n'a pas eu trop d'incidence sur notre séjour car nous partions à New York. 
Nous sommes satisfaits de cette location.
We totally enjoyed our stay. Loved the amazing cafes and Eternal Summer sandwich shop nearby too. Convenience with the close subway stop was perfect.

Michelle's B&B was as nice as it looked on the website. It is literally 3 minutes from the subway. We would stay there again. 

Unfortunately, our plane was delayed and we arrived at 3 am in the morning during a rain storm. We could not open the lock box, nor could we contact Michelle. We ended up staying in a hotel.

Accueil chaleureux de Michelle qui nous a présenté l'appartement que nous avons trouvé encore mieux que sur les photos du site.
Celui-ci convient parfaitement à 3 personnes et est très bien entretenu. 
Bien situé car station de métro très proche. 
Quartier calme et proche de boutiques d'alimentation.
It was a nice experience. Michelle is really helpfull nd kind person. House is clean, comfy, good for even 4pax nd really close to subway station. Overall we can recommend to everyone.

L'appartamento di Michelle si é rivelato all'altezza delle aspettative, esattamente come descritto!
Abbiamo soggiornato per 6 notti, l'appartamento é pulito, confortevole e dotato di tutti i confort necessari.
Come da descrizione è un pó decentrato dalla big city, ma la linea G della metropolitana è a 3 minuti di cammino e raggiungere i punti di maggiore interesse diventa poi facile!
Nessun problema nemmeno a rincasare alla notte, tragitto metro/appartamento tranquillo e sicuro.
La zona é ampiamente servita da ristoranti, fast food e supermercati alcuni di essi aperti 24 ore!

Great place, very clean and located 3min walk from the metro. All the services are in short walking distance (supermarket, laundromat, bank...)
Michelle was very welcoming and extremely mindful during our stay. 
The apartment is ideally located and the garden adds a very pleasant touch to the holidays.
Next time, I'll definitely book again.
Thanks for everything Michelle but too bad we couldn't meet!!

We were so happy to stay in this safe and nice neighbourhood. Michelle is easy to communice with and she is so a nice person. We enjoyed the little graden very much and we will recommand this place to everyone. Hope to come back some day

Très bon séjour chez Michelle. Appartement spacieux, petit jardin bienvenu après les heures de marche, accueil chaleureux et grande disponibilité de Michelle. Très bien situé dans Brooklyn, à proximité du métro. A conseiller, juste à côté de l'appartement, la boutique "Doug" qui vend les meilleurs Donuts de NY... Merci.

Hemos pasado unas geniales vacaciones en lo de Michelle. Ella estuvo siempre a nuestra disposición solucionando cada inquietud desde el primer día hasta el último. El departamento es súper cómodo, limpio, muy cercano al subterraneo. El patio trasero es hermoso. El barrio es muy tranquilo y seguro.
Muchas gracias Michelle!!!

First day we had a very warm welcome and flat features were as described on the website. Clean, nice, cosy apartment...Subway location is main advantage of Michelle`s apartment. In the surrounding area there is everything you need: KFC, Donkin` Donuts and a supermarket...Whenever we come to New York together with my family, i will definitely stay there. Thanks Michelle.

Excelente lugar para pasar unos días en NY. El apartamento esta bastante bien y es cómodo. El patio es muy agradable para barbacoa y estar relajado Tienes todo lo que puedes necesitar para esos días. El barrio tranquilo y muy bien situado . El metro al lado de casa. Y Michelle una excelente anfitriona que hace aún más agradable tu estancia. 
No dudaría en repetir

Empfehlenswerte Unterkunft, Brooklyn ist toll mit trendy und coolen Vierteln. 
Die Wohnung entspricht den Fotos, sie ist sehr sauber, Küche gut ausgestattet, der Garten ist gemütlich. Michelle ist freundlich und hilfsbereit. Wir haben sie nur bei der Ankunft und Abfahrt gesehen, sie war jedoch per SMS gut erreichbar. Es bestand wenig Kontakt, dafür war die Privatsphäre gewährleistet. Die Lage der Unterkunft ist praktisch, da ÖV In der Nähe. Sämtliche Sehenswürdigkeiten sind mit der Subway gut erreichbar.
Bei einem erneuten NY-Besuch würde ich als Ausgangspunkt immer wieder Brooklyn wählen. Nach hektischem und ereignisreichem Sightseeing in Manhattan, war es jeweils erholsam wieder in eine ruhigere Gegend "nach Hause" zu fahren. Zudem gibt es dort trendy Shops, gemütliche Kaffees, freundliche, hilfsbereite und multikulturelle Bevölkerung usw.

We want to thank Michelle for the great stay the past week. We had a very nice welcome which started with instructions how to get from the airport to the apartment (metro or taxi). When we arrived early, Michelle was waiting and showed us around the house and garden, explaining the house rules etc. She also had a nice folder with food menu's and things to do in the area.

Location and area were great, first of all it's really only a two minute walk to the nearest metro station, which gets you into Manhattan/Times Square within 25 minutes. The rest of the area is very convenient and pretty cool as well. There is a Dunkin Donut on the corner, as well as a KFC for breakfast lunch or dinner. For groceries there is a little supermarket also just around the corner.

We actually walked from the apartment to Manhattan over the Brooklyn Bridge, all the way through Brooklyn which we found a great experience. Another great stop from the apartment is Coney Island, also in Brooklyn, which has one of the oldest/longest boardwalks in the country. Great atmosphere and amazing food!

The apartment itself was very stylish with a lot of personal touches and Michelle made it feel like a home from home with towels, toilet paper and other pleasant surprises. The kitchen is fully stocked with crockery, pots, pans and cutlery  and there is cable and WiFi! The garden is also great, very private and relaxing if you like to sit outside.

All in all we highly recommend this apartment.

Michelle did a great job to make us feel welcome, and explained all practical matters in a nice and comprehensive way. The apartment was as described and it worked perfectly as the hub for my parents and I during our four day stay in New York. The apartment is located close to the metro, which will get you downtown in approximately 30 minutes.

Overall, a very pleasent stay at Michelle's apartement. We couldn't have asked for more. Thanks.

- Morten

Good feel place. Michelle is a nice lady and was always available when we had questions. Neighbourhood was what we were looking for, quiet, not so hectic as Manhattan and with subwaystation around the corner. Also CitiBikes available nearby, about 5 minutes walk. Thanks Michelle for a great stay!

Le séjour dans l'appartement de Michelle s'est très bien passé, nous étions 3 et l'appartement est assez grand, correspond à la description. À noter également le jardin, parfait lorsqu'il fait beau. Michelle est très accueillante et nous a donné toutes les indications nécessaires

We had a very good time in Michelle´s flat in Bushwick. Everything was clean and nice and worked as described. 
Michelle was very helpful and gave us  directions on how to get to/from the apartment. Will deffinatly recommend!

Michelle propose un logement fonctionnel et bien situé en termes de transport. Michelle s'est montrée disponible et heureuse de nous transmettre les indications utiles pour profiter au mieux de notre séjour !! Merci !!!

Michelle is a wonderful host! My husband, my mom and I stayed for 3 weeks and had a wonderful time. We loved that the subway is only 1/2 a block away from the apartment, making it super easy to explore the city.

Michelle is very friendly and truly cares about her guests' comfort. As mentioned in other reviews, though it can sometimes get a bit too hot/cold in the apartment, if/when that happened, all we had to do was text Michelle and she would adjust the thermostat as soon as she could.

Michelle provided plenty of towels & bedding for our 3 week stay. When the batteries were low for the TV remote, all we had to do was mention it and she gave us fresh ones. When we needed scissors, she lent us a pair. Like I said, Michelle is great! We would certainly consider staying here again the next time we go to NYC.

Thanks so much Michelle!

This is a lovely living unit / apartment completely private with all the main facilities, A large double bed a a sofa that opens into two full large single beds, a fully equipped kitchen, bathroom, TV's etc. The place has a great home vibe about it. Its not a chrome IKEA  kind of place, but a place that was lovingly restored and maintained by Michelle, with everything looking very nice and feels like returning home.
A major advantage, get out of the apartment take a left and 300 feet later you are riding the G subway to Manhattan.
Major disadvantage, less then half a mile away a great doughnut  place that will add some pounds on your waist.... 
All basic facilities are nearby, grocery, laundromat etc.

One thing was missing - don't forget to bring a USB hub or phone chargers, (we forgot to mention to Michelle) otherwise we had a great time and enjoyed very much. Thank you Michelle !!!

Michelle è sempre stata gentile e disponibile, già dalle prime email. L'appartamento è molto carino ed accogliente; la metro G è a pochissimi minuti. Si raggiunge comodamente sia Manatthan (30/40minuti) che le altre zone di Brooklyn!

Michelle fue muy amable y cordial. El departamento es tal cual se ve en las fotografías. Es cómodo y está completamente equipado. El barrio está muy bien, hay un supermercado a menos de 100 metros y una entrada de subte en cada esquina. Fue muy buena nuestra estadía en la casa de Michelle.

La casa era excelente, como en las fotos o incluso mejor, ya que es mucho más completa de lo que se puede apreciar en éstas. Completa, ordenada y limpia, contaba con todas las comodidades necesarias. Llegar a la casa luego de una jornada agotadora recorriendo Nueva York con muy bajas temperaturas (fuimos en invierno) y encontrar una cama tan cómoda en un ambiente tan cálido era la mejor manera de terminar el día. Michelle fue una gran anfitriona que nos dió nuestro espacio para poder sentirnos como en casa en Brooklyn. El barrio resultó ser muy tranquilo tanto de día como de noche, con acceso al Metro prácticamente en la puerta de casa las 24hs del día, con más de un mercado y otras opciones de comida cerca, y a pocas estaciones de todo lo que el borough tiene para ofrecer. Ya queremos volver!

Very close to the subway station and some quaint eating places, there is a coffee place that makes fresh doughnuts daily, good breakfast to go spot.
Quiet street and we had the whole basement to ourselves!

Michelle is a wonderful host! We flew in late but she waited and greeted us with great warmth. The apartment was cozy and spacious, description accurate. It also has a well-equipped kitchen. We made dinner one night, which made the place even more home-like. There's a donut place nearby called "dough" and it was a fantastic plus - we went there for breakfast every morning when we stayed at Michelle's. Overall, it was a great experience.

Michelle was a superb host.  She was accommodating, helpful, and friendly.  The apartment was immaculately clean and tidy.  Not much else to say... it was a terrific experience and we are so glad we found Michelle for our vacation.

I stayed at Michelle's for a week with my boyfriend and a friend of ours. The apartment was impecable clean and it had everything we needed (great heating, comfortable beds, fresh towels, extra blankets, complete bathroom, very equiped kitchen). What we enjoyed the most about the apartment was that it worked as a little house where all of us could have our own space and every corner felt like home. It was clear to us that Michelle takes good care of the place in a personal way and that makes it very cozy.
As a host, Michelle was kind, clear, organised, helpful and flexible, and payed attention to our needs along all our stay.
The neighbourhood was safe, well connected (the G subway line takes you everywhere in Brooklyn and makes it easy to go to Manhattan; there are two stations less than 100 meters away) and has small shops, restaurants and supermarkets. 
We loved Brooklyn and strongly recommend visitors to take the time to see it. It has a lot to offer and let you have a rest from crowded Manhattan.
Michelle's apartment was not only a place to have a good night sleep, but also a place where we enjoyed spending time. We would definitely come back!

Die Unterkunft entspricht der Beschreibung. Netter Kontakt und gute Kommunikation. Wurde bei der Ankunft persönlich empfangen und eingewiesen. Wohnung liegt ca. 100 Meter von der nächsten U-Bahnstation entfernt. Fahrzeit nach Manhattan ca. 45 bis 60 Minuten . Gerne wieder. Grüße Heiko

My boyfriend and I took a trip to Brooklyn for our birthdays. The apartment was just as beautiful in real life just like the photos. We met Michelle upon our arrival, she was beyond warm and welcoming. The apartment was close to the subway and made it super convenient for our stay and us traveling around the city. I definitely recommend for this place to be top choice to stay! Thank you so much for the warmth and comfort!

Michell muchas gracias por toda la atención.
El lugar hermoso. Cómodo y súper practico. Un hermoso barrio. La anfitriona un lujo. Súper recomendable. Un placer la estadía allá.

Michelle gave us a warm welcome and she is very flexible, it is a perfect apartment, with everything you need. Even a big garden, nice for spring and summer. A nice neighbourhood and not far from Manhattan. I definitely recommend this apartment, and if we go another time to NY we wil book this again. Thank you for everything Michelle!

Michelle was an AMAZING host! She welcomed me graciously even though I was an hour and a half late to check-in. Her home was immaculate and her tour was very detailed. She went above and beyond and even got me a card for my graduation. Thanks Michelle!!!

Michelle is a friendly host and offered us a very warm welcome during our check-in. She always responded quickly and prepared sufficient information for your stay in her handbook in the house. The house is conveniently located near the subway station and is well kept and clean. We especially liked the garden and spent quite some time enjoying the nice weather there.

Michelle was a brilliant host, and her apartment was just perfect
We stayed for three nights and the location was spot on, close to two subway stops and close to some really nice places to eat too and so easy to get in and out of Manhattan 
The apartment was clean and had everything we needed and Michelle was always on hand if we needed to ask questions etc...
Michelle is a professional host (and friendly)!! You will be hosted friendly

Michelle kept in touch from the moment we booked to time of arrival, she was really organised and was at the apartment to welcome us, after a tour of the apartment and a run down of the area, we were left to complete privacy although when needed Michelle was always available (Website hidden by Airbnb) The apartment was even better than described it was so comfortable spotlessly clean, & extremely well equipt there wasnt much we could have asked for it was our home away from home (Website hidden by Airbnb) The location was good most things are very close walking distance  Brooklyn is a friendly neighbourhood  with convenience stores restaurants & weekend markets during summer,  the parks and around Brooklyn bridge are really nice so hiring a bike is also a popular thing to do,  the Metro station is a 2 min walk & once on the Metro 25 min to NY (Website hidden by Airbnb) We were so glad we chose the Brooklyn area and we fell in love with the apartment so much that we hope we will get to stay again sometime.

Michelle was on premises to welcome me and provide me with the keys and all required information.  She has been a great host, easy to reach and very responsive (she lives upstairs).  At the time of departure she was there as well and allowed me to leave my luggage in her hall so that I could freely enjoy my last hours in town before my late flight at JFK.
The appartment is cosy and well furnished.  It isn't very big (hey, this is NYC) but 4 guests are at ease and there is a garden (with table, chairs, arbor,...) which doubles the available surface!
Three drawbacks, though:
- there is no microwave anymore in the kitchen;
- there is no window nor ventilation in the bathroom, thus the towels never really dry if left there;
- the master bed is in the frontroom of the house (read next).
The house is located in a 2 lanes avenue, which means that it is quite noisy due to cars (sometimes with loud music), trucks, buses and even the subway running beneath.
But the location is perfect if you need access to public transportation, as there is an entrance to the subway at each end of the block as well as a couple of bus lines : travel to Brooklyn, Manhattan, Queens and even JFK is easy.
There are several restaurants, supermarkets, delis, laundries, banks... and the neighborhood is safe.
Overall, it's a great urban spot with an excellent host !

Michelle is an excellent and warm hostess. Since first time we reached her to make our reservation (10 months before our trip) she was always disposed to answer any doubts and questions right away. 
We stayed 14 days in between july and august. The department is exactly like is shown in pictures, its perfect for three, its clean and it has all you may need. And besides it has a big beautiful backyard, which is a bonus (it was our special place where we'd sit at the end of the day, after longs days of walk and drink some beer). 
The neighborhood is nice and safe and there are plenty groceries nearby where you can buy food or any stuff you need. Plus, you have the G subway line just in the corner, thats unbeatable. 
Thank you for everything, Michelle, hope come back soon!
Ivan, Sofia & Marina
Had a nice stay. Michelle was a really nice host, always available and extremely pleasant. There were minor issues but Michelle was always there to help. Thank you Michelle!

fantastico soggiorno a Brooklyn in questo appartamento! Michelle è davvero una persona gentile, disponibile, affabile e attenta a tutte le necessità e richieste dei propri ospiti.sempre reperibile! ha anche provveduto a chiamare un taxi per portarci in aeroporto. appartamento molto bello, spazioso, pulito con un fantastico giardino sul retro dove si può fare colazione o cenare in completa privacy. appartamento fornito di tutto ciò che serve e letti comodi! a soli tre minuti dalla fermata della metro. insomma tutto perfetto! thanks a lot Michelle we will never forget you!

We had a wonderful 4 nights at Michelle's place! The location is great for exploring Brooklyn and it's very easy to get to Manhattan by train. The apartment is lovely and spacious, clean and cool (which you need in the August heat!) We absolutely loved having the garden too, the fairy lights were a lovely touch. Thanks Michelle for making us feel right at home and replying very promptly to any (Hidden by Airbnb) queries!

Michelle is a very friendly and lovely Host. The Appartment looks like on the pictures and is equipped with everything you need. We especially enjoyed the garden for our breakfast. The Metro Station and a Supermarket are just a few minutes away and the rides to Manhattan and Williamsburg are uncplicated, so Michelle's Appartment is the perfect place to explore New York. We will definitely stay there again!
Everything was perfect. Thank you very much, Mishelle.

Michelle is an amazing host and was very helpful. We stayed here for a week and the location is perfect! We were 3 guests staying here and there was plenty of space for all of us to sleep comfortably. The apartment was clean and inviting.

There are also cafes/supermarkets/places to eat within walking distance.

Will definitely be staying here again when I come back to NYC!

Wie hatten wirklich eine tolle Zeit in NY. Die Unterkunft von Michelle ist wirklich super süß eingerichtet, sehr detailreich und sie hat an viele Kleinigkeiten gedacht (wir kamen z.B. abends an, sodass sie uns für den kommenden Tag Getränke und Bagels bereitstellte). Es fehlte an nichts in dem Apartment, sie war jederzeit erreichbar, wenn wir eine Frage hatten und super nett und hilfsbereit. Einziges kleines Manko ist die laute Ubahn, die man vor allem nachts unter der Wohnung fahren hört, aber wir hatten damit nicht so ein großes Problem. Im Gegenteil: die gute Anbindung hat uns sehr viel Zeit gespart und wir konnten alles extrem gut und recht schnell erreichen (Metro ist nur 2Min zu Fuß entfernt von dem Apartment). Wir entschieden uns für Brooklyn, weil wir Manhattan schlichtweg nicht bezahlen "wollten", aber auch Brooklyn hat seinen eigenen Charme, den wir extrem cool fanden! Wer also eine Unterkunft sucht, die von der Lage her gut, sehr sauber ist und Wert auf einen netten Gastgeber legt, ist bei Michelle genau richtig aufgehoben! Sehr zu empfehlen.

Michelle is a lovely accommodating host.  She reached out to us  twice during our stay to make sure everything was going well for us.  She also allowed us to check in earlier than was indicated on the listing.  She keeps her apartment impeccably clean. Additionally,  the neighborhood has a supermarket around the corner, a nice coffee shop and a few good neighborhood restaurants within easy walking distance.  And, the metro is one block away.

Close to Metro station and local stores. Very secure and feels like living in someone's home- not a sterile apartment. Great folder of suggestions on things to do. Michelle even had fresh flowers and lots of plants. Communications were almost instantly responded to and she is really sweet. Wish we could have stayed longer. It's very "local" so be prepared for some scruffy houses nearby but everyone was really friendly. Black Swan cafe is great too.

Michelle nos hizo sentir bienvenidas desde el inicio y con las primeras comunicaciones mantenidas. Muy disponible para ayudarnos y complacernos durante nuestra estadia. Muy atenta y pendiente de nuestras solicitudes. El aviso coincide perfectamente con lo encontrado y el barrio nos parecio tranquilo y sobre todo tiene muy buena locomocion con la parada del subte en la esquina.
Was great. Michelle is a kind person. The place was clean and the same of the photos. was good.

A nossa estadia na casa da Michelle foi ótima, ela foi solicita permitindo que fizéssemos check-in antecipado e nos ajudou a ativar o meu número de telefone. A casa é confortável e está bem próxima ao metrô. A NYC Marathon passou a poucos metros da casa.

Stayed here for three nights with family. Had great communication with Michelle. When we arrived, Michelle gave us a great tour of the flat and stayed to have a bit of a chat which was nice. She gave us some good sugestions for places to go out and eat in the area and was in genereal super friendly.
The flat location is good for exploring Brooklyn and is right next to a subway station. Inside the flat is well decorated and the beds are very comfy, the garden out back is also very nice.
I would reccomend staying here.

Host was very friendly and easily available for any questions.  Bed was amazing, as was the porch swing.  Location is very close to G subway line in Brooklyn.    Host also provided bottled water and snacks in fridge which was a nice touch.  Very friendly and accommodating.

Michelle was just as wonderful of a host as all her reviews say! The apartment is very well-appointed and provides all the comforts of a hotel room and more. She gave us a very welcome primer on the neighborhood and getting around the area in general. There are plenty of nearby coffee shops (Stone Fruit was a great one), pubs, and a grocery store for necessities, not to mention the quick access to the G train in the same block.  It was a wonderful and relaxing place to come back to after the chaos of the city.

Michelle was a very friendly and welcoming host! We found the folder on the bedroom dresser to be extremely helpful during our stay; there were many great recommendations for places to visit, etc. She gave us the privacy we needed, but was there to help at any time if we had questions. The apartment itself is conveniently located (subways, food, etc.), well kept, and gives off an at home feel. We would definitely stay here again!

Michelle's home was suitable for sightseeing. There was a station near house and we could easily get to downtown NYC. The room was comfortable as reviews show. Thanks to her frequent contact, it was easy to arrive there. She offered us to keep our luggage at her house when we leave from there. We all appreciate her hospitality! That was perfect Christmas holidays. Thanks Michelle!!

Michelle's place is definitely one of the nicer places that I've had a chance to stay at using Airbnb. Her place is perfect! She was very accommodating and responsive when we needed anything. We even had a suprise guest and the there was more than enough room. It was my second time staying in New York and I would definitely look her up as a potential place to stay when I decide to go back!

Michelle is a perfect host, she ' s friendly and easy to communicate with. 
Her place is perfect for a couple in holliday thank ' s for everthing!

Michelle was wonderful and made our booking, arrival and check-out process very easy and seamless. 
The flat itself in very close to the Subway, so easy access to Brooklyn and therefore Manhattan. The bed was cozy and the kitchen well-equipped.

We loved our stay at Michelle's place. She's a helpful and thoughtful host who provides all you need for a comfortable stay. Everything works, products are provided in the bathroom, the space is very clean and well equipped, cable TV and wifi are great. There are a few cool cafes, bars and restaurants in the area, and you're very close to the G train and various buses. Highly recommended! The backyard would be amazing in summer!
Great place and host!
Michelle's place was perfect for my boyfriend and I. We had a short stay but Michelle was very kind and easily accessible if needed. Thank you again!

We loved staying at Michelle's, she is so lovely, a great host and always ensures we were well and provided us with many very helpful tips. The apartment was perfect for us, i stayed with my mom while visiting my sister who lives in the neighborhood. The apartment is very clean, provides all necessities. Subway is really close. We didn't hear noise so we could sleep well. Bed is very comfy. I would stay there in a heartbeat. Thanks again Michelle!!!

appartement fonctionnel et confortable, idéal pour 3 à 4 personnes, commerces a proximité, propriétaire a l'écoute, discrète et sympathique.
quartier tranquille qui change du brouhaha de Manhattan
métro a proximité (20 mn de times square)

Well equipped, clean apartment hosted by the lovely Michelle, who responded quickly whenever we had questions for her, with the intention to help out as well as possible. Definitely a great addition to the Airbnb community.

The apartment is situated near a subway station in the Bedford-Stuyvesant neighbourhood, of which it does become apparent quickly enough that it has had a rocky past, but me and my girlfriend haven't felt unsafe for a single second.

Some practical things that could be handy to know...

* If you're used to silence when you go to sleep, you may experience some difficulties here. We haven't heard any construction going on during our week in New York City, but traffic does go on until pretty late, and you'll hear it a bit when a subway train is passing by. Luckily the ear plugs Michelle has provided help well, and the bed is very comfortable.

* Unrelated to the apartment, but still something I'd like to share for possible future guests to keep into consideration; Brooklyn doesn't have an awful lot of Walmart like supermarkets. There are plenty of delis, but those usually don't have a wide array of products, especially when you prefer to eat healthy. So you'll basically have to be in Manhattan for the higher end supermarkets, and those tend to be very pricey, and you're more or less scr*wed if you're a vegetarian/vegan. Guess you'll have to visit specialty shops for that.

* When it's warm enough, do use that garden. :)

To our opinion Michelle fulfills the vision of Airbnb of bringing people together.
The moment you walk in and meet her you feel home, reliability, caring and tons of good will. Michelle helped us, shared information and her generosity shows all over.
We were invited to use food that waited for us in the fridge and in the kitchen. Plenty of towels, blankets and all the other stuff. All our requests were fully filled with a big smile.
The name of the apparent is correctly describing: great transportation- a two minute walk to the subway station and the garden which adds space, blue sky and the possibility to relax, eat or just stay in and out at the same time.

My daughter and I stayed at Michelle's place in Brooklyn and she is a wonderful host. The apartment was very spacious, clean, nicely decorated and had everything that we needed. She was very easy to communicate with, and very accommodating to our schedule and our needs. When I texted, she responded very quickly. We had plenty of room to spread out for a few days and each had privacy when we needed it. We cooked one night and appreciated that she had the pots and dishes that we needed. She really had everything that we could have needed during our stay. The location is very convenient. It is just a half a block from the G train. We got takeout from a few of the local restaurants nearby. My daughter is a student at Pratt and it was about a 15 minute walk from the campus (Dough Donuts was on the way) :) I even had to make a quick trip to Home Depot and it was a short 2 block walk away. Michelle is a lovely person and I really enjoyed chatting with her. I would definitely stay at Michelle's place again next time we are in Brooklyn!

Michelle was such o lovely host, very approachable and very keen for my stay to be as comfortable as possible. Even when there was a slight leak due to too much rain( in may-June??) everything was sorted with minimum fuss and maximum urgency. I would recommend this apartment to all. Chris

Michelle's place was lovely and clean. She keeps it pristine and is a great host. She offered advice and tips on how to get places and was only upstairs if we needed anything. There was nothing missing from the apartment everything we needed was there like iron, towels, shampoo etc.

For anyone that would like to get the real Brooklyn New York experience and be also 30-40 minutes from Manhattan this place is great. Thanks Michelle!

Michelle was a very pleasant and helpful host who did everything possible to make our stay very comfortable. We especially enjoyed sitting in the outside courtyard in the evenings. We are so glad we stayed in Brooklyn as the accommodation was much more affordable then Manhattan and discovered some great places to explore. Fond memories - thanks Michelle

Michelle is an excellent host. She checked us in promptly and communicated before and during our stay to make sure everything was ok. The apartment was well appointed, very close to the train and restaurants. Michelle is an excellent host, we really enjoyed the patio too!

Michelle is the Best Host Ever ! She took care of such loving details before our arrival. ( like leaving a bike for my 3 year old, some toys and a crib for my 10 month old). She was always available for doubts and to give us tips.
