Sam was extremely helpful and communicative, both before my trip and during it. The building is in a safe and convenient location, very close to the famous night market, shopping centers, museums, and the harbor. I would definitely stay here again.

Good place to stay and sleep. The location of this house is great. It is easy to approach everywhere even airport. You can just go out and 1min walk, you can take all kinds of transportation. Moreover the host "sam" he is such a great host. Trying to help me for travelling in HongKong all the time.
乾淨,離地鐵站近,樓下有7-11,很方便

If you're checking the comments right now to decide whether you should stay at Sam's. Just give it a shot, the location is great, the room despite not being the biggest, but then again it's HongKong, got everything you need and Sam himself is delivering a superb service. He will take care of all your questions and make sure you are days before prepared to arrive at the apartment. Like most people, who stayed with Sam, I will definitely choose Sam as my host again.

A modern room close to the subway. The area is pretty busy and 1 or 2 stops away from the big market street. Lots of food and other shops around too. Check in was very easy- just receive the code which is sent by the host beforehand, and use that to unlock the doors. Host is good at responding to messages and answering questions. Can fit one person, maybe 2 if you don't mind sleeping close. Cleaned daily by housekeeping. Good wifi.
房東對事前交通的資訊解釋的非常清楚,房間整體都很乾淨理想,交通也很方便,整體很滿意

I recommend staying with Sam because his guesthouse is clean, comfortable, modern, and well-located and he is committed to providing a smooth experience for his guests.  Sam got in touch with me several days before my reservation to provide detailed instructions for reaching the guesthouse from the airport, including photographs and a video of how to operate the keypad entry system for self-check-in.  Very helpful!

Unfortunately, there was a rather serious hiccup, beyond Sam's control, the morning I was scheduled to arrive.  Sam messaged me to say there was a problem with the plumbing in my room and while I would could drop my bags off, he would need a few extra hours to bring in the right technicians to fix the situation.  Although I was disappointed that I couldn't use the room right away, Sam remained in constant communication throughout the repair process and guaranteed me I would have a place to sleep that night.  Ultimately, Sam was not able to get the plumbing fixed that day, but he arranged for me to stay in a different, bigger room, and all was well.  I understand these things happen, and Sam handled the situation as well as one could be expected to.

Again, I recommend staying with Sam for the reasons given above, but I do want to note that the room, and the bathroom in particular, is strikingly small.  I expected that in Hong Kong for this price, and it wasn't a problem, but don't expect otherwise.  That said, the modern design make the room comfortable and functional, and the location in the heart of the action just off Nathan Road in Kowloon cannot be beat.

I would definitely recommend staying at Sam's listing. The location seriously can't be beat - the subway is right around the corner and so is the bus that you catch to and from the airport. A number of the top recommended attractions are within walking distance, and there's a seven eleven basically right next to the building. 

The room is small, but I was travelling by myself, so it was perfect for me. There was hot water every day, the door lock is digital so you don't have to carry keys around or stress about losing them (the digital door lock has an additional manual lock on the inside), and I can't stress how great it was to come home to a functioning AC after a long day of sightseeing - Hong Kong is HUMID.

On top of all the aforementioned, Sam is an awesome host. He's one of the most helpful and thorough hosts I've had so far. He contacted me a couple of days before my trip with very detailed instructions on how to get to the listing and operate the digital door lock - he even included several pictures and a video. On my second day there, I dropped my phone out on Lantau Island and completely trashed the screen. When I got back to the room, I contacted Sam and he gave me detailed instructions on where to get it fixed. He even made sure to tell me to visit several shops before committing to a price - which because of the set-up of the location, proved to be indispensable advice.

As a female travelling alone, I couldn’t have had a better host. Definitely staying there again when I go back.

개인실 좋아하는 분들에겐 좋을거같습니다
리모델링 한 곳이라 깔끔하고 매일 청소해줍니다 평일에 가서 그런지 원래 호스트를 만날일은 없는거 같긴한데 우연찮게 호스트 두명 다 만나게 되었는데 아주 친절했습니다 역이랑 가깝고 괜춘합니다
또 메신저로 연락이 잘 되어서 질문하면 잘 답해줍니다

Sam is so friendly~ n good provide service~~  bad is  just weather!!  (ToT)

Great location and close to the Jordan MTR (train station). Location is in Kowloon and the train station is only a few mins away. HK subway system is amazing and efficient so larger luggage can be brought with ease. The building where this room is located has an elevator so no worries about bringing your bags up flights of stairs. Room was small but clean. Shower didn't really have any hot water. Overall it was a good place to stay for less than 24 hours or if you're in town for some quick business. Sam was also great and very detailed with his directions on how to get to and get in to the room! He included suggestions on best transportation methods to get from airport to the airbnb building in Kowloon. If you arrice after midnight, you'll have to take overnight buses. For MTR routing apps, download "Moovit". SAM communicates very well and I recommend to stay here if his room is ever available.
It's been great!

Sam was a great host and was amazing with communicating any details with me. The apartment was in a perfect location next to the MTR and 7/11. If you're coming to Hong Kong I would 100% suggest staying here if you're out on the town!

Clean and cozy room!!
Quite near the Jordan station!!
Plus great hospitality!!

Sam was a great host!  I definitely recommend staying here.  The apartment is very conveniently located next to the Jordan MTR station which gives you easy access to anywhere that you want to go in Hong Kong. Sam even went through the trouble of showing me step by step (with pictures) how to get from the airport to the airbnb.  He was very helpful and checked in every once in awhile to make sure I was doing ok.
would recommend to friends.

Sam is a great host. He was super helpful with everything before I arrived- showing me exactly where it was located on the map, how to get there from the airport, how to find the building and get into the room. He was available on (Hidden by Airbnb) to answer any of my questions related to the airbnb itself or just generation questions about HK. Although the room is tiny, it was perfect for what I needed. Room was very clean and there was a housekeeping service that came every day to keep it nice for your return at the end of the day. For an affordable spot in a great location, you can't go wrong with Sam's place.

Sam's place is perfect for a single traveler. The room was tiny, but it is acceptable considering this is Hong Kong, and had everything I needed. Sam was very nice and gave clear instructions as to how to get to the place from the airport and everything. The only thing that comes to my mind that was disappointing about this place is that it had no fridge. But overall it was a very satisfactory stay!
非常好,位置在市中心的鬧區｡
It's so friendly and sam, I was so kindly told me all the necessary parts first. Of course, so clean and perfect position. I'll use when just a store in Hong Kong again.
would recommend to friends.

What a lovely and quaint place! The room has a very cosy and relaxing vibe to it- lot's of personality.  The toilet is a little too tiny but it that dosn't bother you then this room is perfect! It was easy getting to the location with the help of Sam's instructions. The helper comes in and cleans the place so it's alwayw clean. Sam's place is in the heart of Jordan and walking distance to some of the best food in HK and really central to most places by MTR. What a great host too, always checking in if I've got everything. Thank you Sam, will definitely stay here again if I come back!
너무너무너무너무너무 좋아요

I super love how detailed Sam was in making sure I knew exactly how to get to his building and into my room with the least hassle. And coming to think of it, it's the most relaxing, stress-free commute I've ever experienced in all my stays in Hong Kong. The location is fabulous, truly a minute's walk to Jordan MTR and 4 minutes to the free airport express shuttle. I basically MTR-ed everywhere from there :) Sam's photo instructions via (Hidden by Airbnb) was clear, concise and made it really easy. There was a 7-11, banks and everything was close by. Perfect place to explore the city from. The room was clean and digital locks meant no key hassles, water was nice and hot, I even got a personalised welcome note with clear communication and wifi instructions. My only regret was I didn't have much time to get to know Sam & Andy, but I'll be back next trip! Oh and I was traveling alone, so it's a pretty safe area too :) highly recommended - just nice for one pax - thanks Sam & Andy!
Sam的房间虽然不大  但是一个人住很够 房间离佐敦道地铁两分钟路 步行3分钟可以去澳洲牛奶公司､义顺牛奶公司 唯一的不方便是卫生间水槽真的好小  洗脸总会把水溅身上

Sam was a friendly and supportive host that provided me everything I needed for a comfortable stay in his sweet and centrally located guest house. Everything just worked, from check-in to wif, to checking out. Sam followed to ensure I had everything I needed for my trip, which was very thoughtful. 

The Pros: 
* Super economical 
* Central location to public transport and local markets
* Working wifi
* Quiet, considering how much activity is in the center of town (Recommendation: Bring ear plugs in any case. I regularly use them in my travels and they have served me well.)
* Self-service: You can arrive anytime at the place as Sam has electronic door locks that allow you to let yourself in with the code he provides.

Cons: 
* There's nothing negative to report about Sam's place. It's an awesome clean and well-appointed place that I hope to use again the next time I visit HK.
Clear instruction!
非常感谢房东给的入住指引及远程服务,房间地段好,出行很方便,非常好的房东,以后去还会选择｡
房間臨近捷運站,交通非常方便,入住也相當容易,且空間不會太小,床也很舒服,整體而言性價比很高,下次再訪香港仍會優先考慮!

My mother was very happy staying at Sams place as it was clean, safe and close to the MTR. 
I was very happy with his communication and kind service. We would come back anytime! Thank you and Cheers!
This is excellent place

Sam's guest house offers small rooms with bathrooms for solo travelers. The location is perfect, right off Jordan Station and minutes away from main areas. Communication with Sam was easy and he was always on top of everything. Note that despite of the rooms being on the small side, there should be enough space for someone looking to explore the city, and they're freshened up daily. Would definitely recommend to others.

这里位置超级好,离地铁站只有100米左右,到香港各个地方都很近｡晚上12点之后附近还有佐敦夜市,累了饿了还能吃顿夜宵｡虽然是单人房间,但Sam还有其他的房间在同一个位置,所以跟朋友出来也可以有私人空间｡重点是Sam人很热情,会很及时的告诉你重要信息!
Sam's apartment is at a good location in Hong Kong and very nearby Jordan Station. You can go everywhere just less 25mins. After a long day, You also could go to Jordan night fair to eat seafood and local dessert. There are 5 single rooms to book, so Your friend and You could live here in a private way. The most important thing is Sam is the best host who I never met before!
Great room close by most things. Jordan MTR is right there. Airport bus is close by. If you're looking for a private bedroom and bathroom in Kowloon, this is your place!
Everything was fine! It is located near MTR station. Good communication, nice place to rest in HK.
Great neat and self contained little place is good central location. Jordan on your doorstep. Next to Nathan road but quietens at night. Walkable to tst and out to prince Edward

Sam在入住前一周联系我
告诉我详细的地址
最便捷的方式到达那里
告诉我应该入住应该自备的和旅馆能提供的东西
如何开门的视频演示
……
真的非常的细致,特别容易就找到了,丝毫不费力呢

在市中心,离庙街非常近呢 交通也非常便利
住了3天,每次出门回来原本被我弄的乱糟糟的房间都会被收拾的非常干净
非常愉快的一次入住体验,回来就推荐给了朋友们呢
非常謝謝Sam的用心,第一次airbnb的體驗非常好,不管是住宿前的提醒和交通方式,住宿後還會關心是否有什麼問題:)下次來香港一定會再選擇這裡!!!
非常舒适的一次旅行,Sam人很好入住前给予了很多帮助,非常热心的一位房主｡

Sam is a great host. Quick to respond to inquiries and messages. The place is as it looks like in the photos. Clean and comfy. The security locks are great. Body wash, shampoo, travel adapters all provided. Awesome location. MTR, Temple Street and yummy local restaurants within walking distance.
Very good experience to live I. sam's house
Good location & good facility. Best place for single travelers.

I have really enjoyed my stay. the room is clean and big enough for one person. it is very well located to discover Hongkong. A lot of good and convenient Restaurants in that area. Sam is a very good host, who keeps in contact with you and gives you useful information about Hongkong.
Location very convenient, easy to go anywhere of HK, room very clean and security with password lock to get in property, next time will live same place.
역과도 가까웠고 활동하는데 좋았습니다. 호스트의 친절하고빠른 대응 덕분에 무사히 지내다 왔습니다.

The location is great convenience wise. But it is in an extremely busy area with a lot of traffic flow. The room is really small. The electronic lock is very convenient. Sam had great communication and clarity.
一次很不错的体验,房东Sam也是一个非常细心的男孩子,在确认订单之后Sam会告诉你详细的地址,包括最近的交通,房屋所在的大厦样子以及如何check in的细节｡旅店就在市中心,去哪里都很方便,澳洲牛奶公司和庙街也都在附近,Anyway,很棒的位置,很棒的房东,推荐大家尝试哦:)

재작년 홍콩여행 때 친구랑 더블룸 예약했었는데 위치, 시설, 호스트 다 마음에 들어서 이번에 또 예약했어요. 혼자 간거라 싱글룸 예약했고 호스트인 Sam과 (Hidden by Airbnb) 으로 연락 주고 받았습니다. 공항에서 A22 타고 40~45분 가면 건물 근처 정류장에서 도보 2분 걸리는 것 같아요. 침사추이역에서도 도보 10~15분이면 가능하고 센트럴에서도 이동 가능한 버스 노선이 많습니다. 몽콕역까지도 걸어갈 수 있어서 위치는 정말 좋아요. 여자 혼자 지내도 가는 길 외지지 않고, 바로 옆 건물 1층에 세븐일레븐 있어서 편합니다. 그 A22 내리는 정거장에 스타벅스도 있고 동네 서점도 있어요. 재작년 더블룸 썼을 때는 방은 뭐 홍콩 건물 특성상 좁긴해도 화장실이 넓었는데 싱글룸은 화장실이 정말 좁았어요. 그래도 큰 문제는 없었고 수건 매일 갈아줍니다. 기준 체크인 시간보다 일찍 도착했는데 도착하자마자 체크인 할 수 있게 도와주었고, 출국 비행기가 다음 날 새벽이어서 짐 보관 여부를 물었더니 어차피 다음 날 게스트 없다고 늦게 체크아웃해도 된다고 배려해주어서 정말 고마웠어요. 헤어드라이기는 따로 요청하면 빌려주고, 포트는 있어요. 방 소음 생각보다 크지 않고 안전하게 지내다 왔어요. 추천합니다~
很近很方便
此次到港入住非常愉快,房源就在佐敦地铁站附近,出入便捷,到尖沙咀,油麻地,九龙此次都选择了步行,几分钟路程｡由于是单间,面积不大但足够一个人住,装修风格是偏宜家muji风,简约清爽｡最让我感到愉悦的是,房东Sam的热情,会事无巨细的和你讲解路线,推荐去处｡总之,此行感受体验很好,是很好的选择｡
Its a great people very nice and friendly , welcome to join Sam place!
阿Sam是非常棒的房主,很詳細的告訴我交通方式,幫助我很快的找到住處｡這裡交通方便,距離佐敦站非常近｡房間很乾淨,枕頭甚至有香味｡很愉快的旅行,謝謝!
入住方便,房间干净,周围交通便利｡
Cosy room and convenient location. Friendly and approachable host..
交通便利,离佐敦站B1口很近;附近有7-11;房东Sam很热心,回复及时

佐敦駅から1分もかからない好立地です｡部屋もｽｰﾂｹｰｽを広げるｽﾍﾟｰｽがあり満足｡清潔で過ごしやすかったです｡ただ清掃の際に､使いかけの化粧水､乳液､ﾍｱｸﾘｯﾌﾟが捨てられていました｡ｺﾞﾐと間違えたのかな､と思っていますが念の為ｺﾞﾐじゃないものはﾎﾟｰﾁの中やｽｰﾂｹｰｽにしまう事をｵｽｽﾒします｡ Samさんはとても親切で､色々助けてくださいますよ｡

Great location, clean and comfy room:)
Sam is always willing to help us so just ask him if you have any questions. 
I definitely recommend this room!

혼자 여행한다면 더할나위없이 좋아요 ! 
지하철역과도 가까워서 이동하는데 불편함이 없고 무엇보다 호스트가 넘나 친절하세요 
Good!
很干净舒服,房东帅小伙很热情,和图片描述的一样,有机会还会光顾的!
Sam家的房源超級棒  性價比十分合適  步行或者公交幾站就到了the one SOGO  以及香港太空館  維多利亞港  適合單身獨行遊客來居住!附近商店與餐廳都很多  北角利強記雞蛋仔就在附近哦!而且Sam人很好  從確認到溝通效率很高  住宿安全舒適  房間裡有淡淡的香氣   喜歡和這樣爽快明白的房東打交道~下次訪港會再來的

방이 아늑하고 좋았어요♡베리굿!
그치만,,마지막 전날 옆방에서 외국인들 너무 시끄러워서 잠을 조금 못잤어요..그것빼곤 다괜찮구 물론 호스트 sam의 무한한 친절과 배려때문이겠죠^^Thank you sam

Sam was a nice host. He gave me very clear instruction to find the place and check in. So it was easy to find the place and checked in even at night time. Thank you so much for the lovely room. Very good location.
ོsam 人很好~房间很干净~价格很优惠~交通很方便~

强烈安利!!!!!!!!!真的是来香港住的最方便的地方!!!!!每天逛到累成狗的时候,下了地铁走2分钟就到了!!!!!走路到尖沙咀或旺角只需要十分钟!!!!周围还有庙街!澳洲牛奶公司!翠华!楼下就是7-11!!真的超级方便!!!只要找到弥顿道就绝对不会迷路!!
最主要房间特别干净整洁!!!我住的是单人间,大小刚刚好!本以为住在闹市区会很吵,但是关上窗真的就像是与外面的车水马龙隔绝了一样!我睡觉超级轻,但是去住的第一个晚上竟然一觉睡到了10点多
总之吃我这一剂安利!!!绝对不会让你失望!!!
Sam是一位非常熱情溫馨的房東,時時給予關心並協助人生地不熟的我,房間乾淨雅緻,住得很舒適,地理位置極佳,就在地鐵佐敦站旁,去哪裡都很方便,樓下即有小7及餐廳,CP值高,非常適合一個人旅行的休憇站｡下次來香港肯定會再光顧｡

Sam was a wonderful host! 

Prior to my stay in HK, I had a few last minute changes in my trip plan that came up while I was in another country in South East Asia without much means for communication. Sam was so flexible, accommodating, and timely in responses that he took the stress out of everything! 

The room is lovely--perfect for a solo traveler who doesn't need much more than a clean and comfortable bed, a warm shower, and wifi.  

I was a fan of the self-check-in using door codes and found that to be extremely convenient.
it's very convenient to have meal or going somewhere else.my friend is from Philippine,she said is so easy to go around from Jordan.She is having a wonderful time in HongKong.

入住:大厦地址很好找｡房门都是密码锁,check in很方便

房间:和图片一致!有张单人铺,一张桌子,椅子｡值得一提的是房间内备有转换插头,很赞!非常适合一个人住｡

地点:离地铁站很近,附近也有很多巴士站可以去到很多地方｡

楼下就是便利店｡大厦在主街道旁侧所以算是一个闹中取静的好地方｡

是独自旅行的绝佳选择｡

Everything is good except the bathroom is not big enough for a big person;-)
Great location.
위치도 적당하고 깨끗하고 좋았어요.

特别特别满意!一,安全,不像其他大厦人员混杂,电梯等半天｡美明大厦比较小,上下只有一部电梯,住的这几天,每次都是我一人上下,所在楼层就两户,隔壁是一个牙医馆｡二,方便,出门走一分钟就是佐敦B1出口｡佐敦是个很好的区域,不像尖沙咀和铜锣湾那么吵那么游客,但周边又有很多超好吃的餐厅,包括有名的澳洲牛奶公司就在对面｡三,干净!特别干净!屋内从被套床垫到洗漱用品应该都是无印良品的,每天都会有人来打扫,隔音也挺好,我都没听到什么噪音｡房间虽小,却有一面墙的窗户,光线通透｡四,Sam人很热情,细致,周全,沟通全程靠 (Hidden by Airbnb) ,有什么问题都是及时回复的｡我觉得今后来港就锁定这里了
Sam人非常好,房子位置也很不错｡很棒的体验｡
A good functional room in a great location in Kowloon (as Sam describes, literally around the corner from Jordan Station). I'd recommend for short stays.

저도 다른 한국분들 후기 보고 처음 에어비앤비를 통해 숙소를 예약하고 가게 되었습니다

일단 숙소는 혼자지내기 적당한 크기(홍콩의 사정을 고려하면) 입니다.
청소상태는 보통이고 수건과 타월을 매일 하나씩 교체해주어서 매우 좋았습니다.
위치는 어딜가나 가까운 편이라 생각되구요
조단역과 가까워 편리합니다.

특히나 호스트인 샘이 (Hidden by Airbnb) 으로 차편이라던지 세세한 정보들을 친절하게 알려주어서 매우 좋았습니다. 혼자 여행하시는 분들께 추천드립니다 : )
Great in almost all respects. Only issue was lack of hot water, but apart from that - fantastic.

Pros

The best thing is that You don't have to wait someone or make appointment with the host. You can just check-in anytime you want.

Sam was so nice. I found that I booked the wrong date just five days before I check-in and he approved to change the date without any penalty. And he could speak English so communication was really easy.

Very clean!! And also interior was tidy
第一次用Airbnb预订酒店,没想到房东Sam非常热情､细心指导路线,门锁都是密码锁,很安全!房间里面明亮干净､很舒适的枕头和床垫,空调､热水､及其他设施都很好!晚上也很安静,因为没有房了,就只住了两晚,本来还希望能多住几天｡非常感谢房东Sam和做清洁的Anthony!下次有机会还会选择入住哦!thank you for everything!

A guesthouse that's just nice with everything you need for a trip in Hong Kong. Room is clean and Sam is easy to communicate. The self check in and check out is very convenient. Location is great, next to MTR station and in the center of the city.

Sam's place was just what I needed for my stay in HK. Clean, comfortable enough, safe and super convenient location. The bus stop from the airport is right down the road, the train going to Central or anywhere in HK is right down the road. Sam was helpful and precise in our communication, the self check-in and check-out absolutely worked for me. Everything was exactly as described in the ad. Thanks again!

평소에 다른 어플로 숙소를많이 잡았는데요 처음으로 후기만보고 에어앤비에서 잡은것인데 만족합니다 지하철역과 버스정류장이랑 가깝고 침사추이랑 가까워서 저는 걸어다녔습니다 템플스트리도가깝고 저는 몽콕까지걸어갔어요 뚜버기분들에게는 매력적인거리 아래 편의점이있어서 좋았어요 따로슬리퍼 치약.칫솔은 가져가셔야되고요 냉장고있고 전자레인지없습니다 주인이 매우친절했어요 방도 깨끗하고요 에어컨이좀더러워서 ㅠ저는좀신경이많이쓰였습니다 한가지아쉬운점은 무인시스템이라 여분의수건이라던지 다른점을요구하려면 따로 사람이없어서 그게한가지아쉬운점이었어요 저는 묵을동안 너무조용하고 편하게지내서 다음에도 가라면 갈것같아요 개인욕실화장실 이라 정말편했습니다

Arguably one of the best hosts I've come across in Airbnb. Sam sent me video instructions on how to check in, gave me advice on the best way to get to the guest house as I arrived past midnight. He thoughtfully checks to see if all is well during my stay. The room is very close MTR and good food, clean and accurate to the picture. Highly recommended host!
The phrase boutique hostel is a pretty good description. Well situated, basic but nicely organised with some fashion finishes....Sam was really friendly, helpful and quick to respond.

공항버스 A22랑 엄청 가깝습니다. 금방 도착하고 조던역 근처라 교통이 편리합니다. 걷는거 좋아하시는 분은 센트럴 갈 때 빼고 대중교통 이용할 일 거의 없으실거예요! 몽콕야시장이랑 침사추이쪽도 다 걸어다님 ㅇㅇ 또 편의점이 바로 아래라 좋았습니다. 제 숙소는 10층이엿는데 건물 주인 (?)아져씨가 1층에서 지키고 계시고 10층올라오면 문을 열고 또 한번 열어야되서 굉장히 안전한 느낌이였습니다. 그리고 메인스트리트에서 얼마 들어가지 않은 곳에 있기때문에 혼자 여행하는 여자 분이시면 굉장히 좋을 것 같습니다 . 숙소도 깔끔하고 와이파이, 에어컨 잘되고 수압도 좋았습니다. 근데 뼌끼수압은뼐로에오 똥싸따까 막힐까빠 꺽쩡했음. 나머지는 최고입니다. 청소도 매일 해주시구요..! 그리고 무엇보다도 호스트가 친절합니다. 물어보면 바로바로 답장해주세요!!!!!

Sam was very responsive and had given very easy to follow instructions on how to find the place and accessing the room! Only a 3-5 min walk from the MTR making it very convenient to explore other nearby areas! Although there isn't much in the area, Jordan is located on the red line of the MTR, only 10 mins away from Lan Kwai Fong :) This was my first solo trip and I did not feel unsafe walking to and from the location, even late at night. Thanks Sam! :)
Great location, small but efficient in serving single travellers

The place was amazing and everything you could expect for this price in HK. It's easy to hope on the bus to get to the airport and the train to the anywhere else in HK. Was a great place to stay and would recommend for any of my friends.

Everything's great! :D 1. Instructions were clearly given on how to locate the area. 2. Limited food choices for the picky ones  but overall the location is spot on as it is near MTR station and Bus station.  There are also shops nearby in which you can find almost all basic things that you might need. 3. Very easy and hassle free self check in/out . 4. Sam was really accommodating and even let me leave my things before and after check in/out. 5. Square area of the room is just right for a solo traveler. 6. The room was also clean (Kudos to the lady cleaner). 7. Bed was really comfortable, I don't usually sleep with one pillow but well I had a really comfortable sleep! 8. Safety? No questions. Guarded with cctv cameras and pin-locked doors. 9. Towels, water heater, hair dryers, shampoo and body wash are all provided and of course I wouldn't miss to mention the the fast wifi connection! 10. Lastly, overall stay was really good value for money!
地理位置好,性价比很高
离地铁站近,交通方便
地理位置非常方便,就在佐敦站附近｡房间很整洁,是我喜欢的风格,安全性也比较好,房东很友好提前 (Hidden by Airbnb) 告知了入住方法,自助check in很方便｡总得来说还是很满意,但卫生间出的热水温度稍微有点低,入住时可以跟房东确认一下｡
房间和照片完全一致,干净整洁,重点是大厦出去十米不到就是弥敦道,去之前一天Sam就告知了入住方式｡屋子每天有人打扫｡满分好评,谢谢Sam以后有机会还会入住!
Kleines, nett eingerichtetes und sauberes Zimmer mit eigenem Badezimmer. Check in hat super geklappt, Metro gleich um die Ecke und super central gelegen. War top!
Very nice and suitable for solo travel...and toilet bit small but still (Website hidden by Airbnb) is that small...value for money...sam is nice host and helpful all the time...

I had a great stay at the guesthouse. Sam is very friendly and responds very quickly. The location is great in a busy area with many options to eat and other essential shops. It is 1 min away from the Jordan station which is very centrally located. The room is a bit small (like everywhere in HK) but has everything you need for a single traveler. There was an area I could conveniently put my suitcase and clothes. The room is also very clean and every day the cleaning lady comes by with clean towels. Overall great stay.
Perfect for single travellers..and safe. Bus stop and mtr is just a minute walk. Everything is close by restaurant etc. Highly recommended.

Actually, this is my first time to choose the accommodation on the Airbnb, and I feel quite content with this experience. Sam is so warm-hearted. He offers me a lot of help. The room is a little bit small, but wonderfully comfortable. I really enjoyed a good night. Highly recommend this room.

This place is very cozy and clean compared to the other guest homes you find on Airbnb. Room is a bit small to move around if you have big luggage but the room itself is nice with modern facilities. Recommending this place to all solo travelers out there.
Sam is really good host, the place is really convenient , it is pretty close to the subway station. And around the place there are a lot good food to go! Recommend place!

호스트가 친절해서 좋았어요 숙소 위치도 괜찮았어요 주위에 편의점도 많고 맥도날드도 있었어요 나름 번화가인거 같더라고여 침사추이랑 한정거장 되는 거리라 여기저기 다니기 편했어요 물론 숙소위치가 침사추이에 있었으면 더 편했겠지만! 숙소는 좁지만 아늑했고 안에 화장실이 딸려있어서 편했어요 가격이 싼편은 아니라고 생각하지만 홍콩 물가 생각해서 이만하면 괜찮은거같아요 제가 한국인인걸 알고있어서 그런지 한국 어댑터까지 끼워놓으셨더라구요! 근데 마지막날 쑤껀을 안쭈쎴어여..끄럐써 머리 말린다고 꼬썡햿어여... 하지만 숙소에 드라이기가 있어서 그걸로 말렸어여...! 혼자 여행오시는 분들께 정말 괜찮은 숙소인거 같아요! 홍콩에 다시 오게된다면 또 여기에서 자도 괜찮을거 같아요 Thank you Sam
很近佐敦地铁站,方便!房间如香港风格很小,住的3号房,面向马路,睡觉有点嘈杂,睡眠敏感的要考虑下｡

After traveling 24 hours, it was a relief to have my own private space to wash up and organize my stuff. This place is exactly that on top of being clean, neat and with everything you need. Its a simple space but its very functional including lots of shelf space and outlets, hangers and hooks, kettle, and big windows that let in a lot of light. It's in a central location with the Temple Night market being a block away and makes for great people watching. The bathroom is a bit tight and the shower is an open layout, so everything gets wet. Otherwise it's fine and has hot water, though i would recommend bringing flip flops.

Sam was amazing and super communicative. I was busy up until my trip and didn't have much time to plan for it. So a few days before leaving I bombarded Sam with questions about everything. He was very kind and patient and answered every question in a timely manner. Thanks Sam for being such a great host. Australia dairy company was a great suggestion and the eggs were so good!
Great place for a short visit to HK. Very professional and helpfull host. Great location and access to MTR/bus, in all aspects very convenient!

Sam is very warm and helpful host! Although I did not have chance to see him i person but he was always very supportive through messenger. He even called a store that I wanted to go and checked their business time so that I won't waste my time. His guest room is not just a airbnb room but also  a cetified guesthouse so I felt it very secure and clean. The room is very sunny. The location is perfect. Very close from both of airport bus and subway, easy to access both of Kowloon and Hongkong island. Only 15 min walk from China ferry terminal that you can go to Macau. Definitely to book again!
위치 좋고, 호스트 정말 친절합니다. 청결상태 유지에 힘쓰는 흔적이 많이 보입니다. 홍콩 건물 특성상 그건물에서 깨끗하기 힘들것 같은데 괜찮았습니다. 창문이 커서 밝고 환기가 잘 되어 좋았습니다. 큰 기대를 하지 않고 가면 만족 할 수준 입니다. 호텔 수준은 당연히 기대하지 말아야합니다. 가격대비 위치 좋고 괜찮습니다.

짱 예쁘고 좋음
식당가도 근처에 있고 쪼음
第二次住Sam的房间了!佐敦跟尖沙咀的房间一样都很棒!
超级赞哦!在香港这样寸土寸金的地方有这样的房间入住真的不错,房间设计简直完美,再合理不过了,简介漂亮,完全方便也安全,大厦不是那种旅馆特别的集中的地方,人不挤,安全性也好｡旁边不远就是庙街夜市,宵夜真是棒极了,去地铁,机场都方便,总之,五星好评,期待下次入住呢!

It’s a must stay! Sam was very helpful and accommodating during my stay. He’s also very efficient and quick in his responses. The location was super convenient and easy to locate. I had a great stay at Sam’s!
几好呀 五脏虽小 麻雀俱全
Location is superb! 3 mins to Airport express and Jordan MTR. The host is very attentive!

Location:非常靠近公共交通!稍微走几分钟就到尖沙咀､海港城,晚上逛街非常方便
Safety:两道锁很安全,但女生一个人住还是建议带阻门器,多一道保障哈
Room:有独卫的小房间,算是体验香港local生活｡热水器要提前打开,水箱比较小,刚刚够快速洗个澡｡配套非常齐,麻雀虽小五脏俱全~二月初晚上稍微有点冷,可以加一床被
Service:房主Sam人很好,有求必应回复快速,短住体验超赞
超好评五颗星!

Stay was perfect. It's right around the corner from MRT station. The room is small, clean, and has been modernized. I really loved the bed, super comfortable. Great pressure and hot water for the shower. Quiet. All good. Exactly what I was looking for. Would recommend.

Communication with Sam and check-in/check-out were super easy. He touches base before the trip and provides clear instructions, the lock operates by code so there is no need to meet to key swap, Sam responds to texts immediately. Suggested a great cafe for coffee and breakfast.

Note: There is a switch to turn on the hot water (don't forget), and the toilet and shower are in the same "shower/toilet room" -- I think this is a typical arrangement but this was my first time in HK and I hadn't seen this kind of setup before.
房东人非常热情,沟通也很好,很愉快的入住,下次去还会选择

Sam의 숙소는 조던역에 위치해 교통이 편리하고 주변에 다양한 볼 거리와 먹을 곳이 많아서 좋았습니다 :) 질문에 대해서는 빠르고 친절하게 답을 해줘서 정말 편하고 행복한 시간을 보낼 수 있었습니다! 날씨가 약간 쌀쌀했는데 따듯한 물이 잘 나오지 않고 히터가 작동하지 않아서 조금 추웠던 것 빼고는 정말 완벽한 숙소였습니다! 내가 나중에 홍콩을 또 혼자 방문하게 된다면 제일 먼저 Sam의 숙소를 다시 찾을 것 입니다!! 혼자 여행하는 사람들에게 정말 최적의 숙소라고 생각합니다
民宿離佐敦地鐵站非常近,房東的指引非常明確｡房間是無印良品風格,整理得很乾淨,基本用品也很齊全｡
Convenient location and cosy room for a solo traveller.
房间在大厦10层,非常干净整洁,每天有人来打扫｡地理位置很好,出门就是地铁｡走到加沙咀､旺角､油麻地不超过15分钟｡Sam在我出发前,给了非常详细的checkin教程,自助checkin对晚班飞机到达的我真是非常方便｡
不错
刚进屋的时候惊呆了,从来没见过这么小的房间,大概只有我家卫生间大｡可是干净整洁,位置也是非常好,楼下就是庙街夜市,交通方便,设施齐全｡sam也很热心｡很好的房间,适合一个人旅行入住｡
特别好的房东,比我自己记得时间还准,刚入住时便关心我住的如何,给的入住信息也特别简单明了,住了两天,还有打扫卫生,特别好~房间虽小,五脏俱全,下次再有机会,还会住sam的房间~
공항버스 내리는데에서도 엄청 가깝고 조던역이랑도 2분거리라 위치는 매우 좋습니당 호스트도 친절하고 방 깔끔해서 좋은데 변기 수압이 약하고 3일 묵었는데 수건을 한번도 안 갈아줬어요 그거말곤 다 좋았습니다
숙소위치가 침사추이랑 센트럴 등 볼거리가 많은 지역과 가까워 너무 좋았습니다! 또 Sam이 친절하게 숙소위치와 배려있게 대답해주어 첫 혼자 여행임에도 무사히 잘 다녀올 수 있었고 다시 또 홍콩을 여행할 기회가 온다면 다음번에도 숙소는 Sam의 숙소를 방문할 것입니다!!^^
호스트인 샘이 엄청 친절하고 관심가져주셔서 감사했고 위치가 정말 좋았다
지하철과 진짜 가까워서 이동하기에 정말 좋습니다! 약간 숙소가 습하고 화장실에서 하수구냄새가 조금나는건 아쉬웠네요!
The location is perfect. It only takes a min to walk to the mtr.
이것저것 매우 꼼꼼하게 잘 챙겨주십니다! 덕분에 잘 쉬다 가네요~
너무 좋았어요! 다음에또 홍콩온다면 다시 올게요!!

Sam’s place was amazing. I needed a place for the night and it was just perfect for a single traveller like myself. 

The space was small, as expected for Hong Kong standards, but extremely cosy and sufficient. There was just enough room for my wheeled baggage on the floor and a little more room at the foot of my bed for an additional duffel and shopping. 

Personally, clean en-suite toilets are my priority when looking for accommodation and Sam has made sure of that. Just one tip to my fellow travellers, make sure you put away the toilet roll and bin before you take a shower! 

When I arrived earlier than check-in time, Sam readily offered me an area for my bags so I didn’t have to worry about lugging them
around. He also suggested I store my bags at the guesthouse if I was staying around after checking out.

Sam is uber responsive and ensures you have all the information necessary for a wonderful stay. 

Thank you Sam! (:

下次入住的首選 
真的很棒
Good location, host fast respond, affordable ! It was a pleasant stay in Sam ‘ s air bnb!!! Keep it up!!!

전체적으로 너무 좋았습니다
호스투거 세심한것 까지 신경써줘서 편안하게 생활할 수 있었습니다
숙소 위치도 역과 가까워서 여행하는데 교통때문에 불편한 것은 없었습니다.
똰 숙소도 전체적으로 깨끗하고 호스트분이 매일 청소를 해주셔서 위생적으로도 괜찮았습니다
距離地鐵站非常近,附近有很多餐廳,深夜也不怕沒有東西吃｡對於一人入住房間算是挺大的打開兩個行李箱都行,房東人很好回覆快速提供很詳細的入住內容也會關心入住是否住的舒適,期待來香港再次入住

一人で旅行して部屋は寝るだけという方に､最適だと思います｡写真でみるより狭いですが､必要なものはそろっています(記載の通りに冷蔵庫はありません)｡ﾊﾞｽと地下鉄の駅が近く｡ﾛｹｰｼｮﾝは問題ないです｡ただ､ﾄｲﾚとｼｬﾜｰが同じ場所で､ｼｬﾜｰを使うとﾄｲﾚがﾋﾞｼｮﾋﾞｼｮになります｡気になる方は気になると思います｡私は特に気になりませんでした｡

This accommodation is very functional for sole trip. Good location, enough environment for sleep. If you just need the shower and bed, this place is very matched.
房间在佐敦地铁站附近,地理位置非常好,楼下就有建行的atm和711｡另外老板人真的超好｡哈哈哈下次会继续来住｡
房间虽小,设施俱全,很干净舒适,也很安静,旅店地段很好,房东Sam人也很好,总体来说非常不错,以后来香港会再来入住!
精華地段,cp值高,值得推薦

Clean & safety room, Good locaton, near the Nathan Street & MTR station.
When I go to HongKong, I want to stay this room again.
Sam is very kind good host. 
He told me how to use the room in detail before leaving Japan.
I had no problem about Unattended check-in.
Thank you Sam!

Sam was a great, courteous and responsive host who answered questions thoughtfully and quickly. Its central location makes it a very easy place to travel everywhere via the subway. Overall a solid place for sleeping and unwinding for the night.
정말 좋았어요 몽콕이나 침사추이나 직선보도를 이용해서 찾기도 쉽구요  전철역이 바로 앞이라 매우 유용합니다  정말 짱이에요 따듯한 물도 잘나와요 저는 혼자여행갔었기에 너무 편하고 잘 사용했습니다!

Sam continued to be an excellent host on my second booking with this airbnb. Very easy time getting in and out of the place and it is a very central location in Hong Kong. I recommend this airbnb for a solid stay for rest and relaxation.

수건이 두장뿐이라 오래 머무는 분들은 불편할 수도 있지만 말려서 쓰면 괜찮아요ㅎㅎ
위치는 근처에 버스정류장도 있고 편의점도 있어서 좋아요! 조던역이랑 2분거리라서 편하기도 했어요. 방음이 잘 안되기는 하지만 대체로 괜찮았답니다~
地理位置,比较安全,一个人出行也完全me没问题,有什么疑问房东都会及时回复
房间很干净,交通很便利｡
非常推薦
nice
房东人好,房间还是比较小的
满意,干净整洁,地理位置佳,推荐推荐
地方很好找,两道门感觉很安全｡因为是香港,所以房间肯定比别的地方小很多,都是这样没办法啦｡但是房间很干净,床也很舒服,每天会有阿姨过来收拾房间｡房东很nice,下次来香港还会考虑住这里~
It was good
good location
혼자 자기 너무좋음 조단역 바로앞이고 편의점도 가깝습니다.
性价比非常高的住宿,但可能不太适合容易惊醒怕吵的人｡地理位置非常好,逛累了搭地铁回来几步路就到｡房间虽小五脏俱全,但因卫浴是合并的,建议卫生纸平时可以放在外面,或者配一个封闭性更好的盒子放置｡Sam真诚热情友好,解决问题响应速度很快｡

I had stayed in Sam's places,located TST,for several times. This is my first time to stay in Jordan's. Everything is like as TST's one. 
Cozy and well located. Subway and restaurant are just around the corner. 
However,the wifi was unavailable sometimes,especially in the morning. Except that,everything is fine. 
Recommend it!
離佐敦站很近,交通便利,適合一個人旅人
很不错的位置 Sam也非常热情 提前把入住信息告知的非常完整｡Nice trip!

Perfect communication, perfect location as your close to everything! 
Shower is above the toilet so everything gets wet when taking a shower. And sometimes bad smell comes out of the water from toiletwater. There is a little hole in the bathroom floor and sometimes water comes out of there, no idea why. Maybe this causes the bad smell. But its nice to have your private little bathroom. 
As there are other people in the apartment- even though you have your very private space - you can sometimes hear them talking in the evening. Make sure to bring earplugs and a sleeping mask if you're a light sleeper. Otherwise good place to stay for a few days. The location is great!

Sam is a really good host! The room is central, close to the MTR and bus
station. Everything was nice and clean.
조던역 바로 옆이라 침사추이로 걸어가는것도 편했고 공항버스 타면 바로 앞에서 내려줘서 좋았어요 호스트인 Sam도 친절하고 응답이 아주 빨랐습니다! 숙소도 깨끗하고 따뜻한 물도 잘나와요 숙소 밑에 세븐일레븐 있어서 좋았어욤 다음에 홍콩 갈 때 또 갈거같아용
교통이 편리하고 혼자 여행하시는 분에게 좋습니다.
地理位置很好,去哪里都方便｡Sam很周到,交流很愉快｡
good location and place was pretty clean
great, easy check in, good location
낮에 보는 위치는 좋지만 밤에는 길이 어두운 편 홍콩이라 어쩔 수 없지만 방에 습기가 많은 편

Sam's place is super close to the MTR station and bus stop from the airport. Amenities such as towel, kettle, and hair dryer are provided. Sam is very quick to respond to message. He provides very clear instruction on how to get from the airport to his place and how to check in. The whole process was super quick and easy.
有求必应的房东
Sam is very helpful and friendly. The room is small, but clean and comfortable. The location is convenient. It's close to the bus stop and MTR station.

Great centrally located spot (basically right on top of Jordan MTR) for the solo traveler that plans to be out exploring.  The space is a licensed guest house, so don't expect this to be a spare bedroom in someone's flat.  That being said, you can expect it to be clean, with all of your needs taken care of, and it's super easy to access. Private shower is great!  Overall I enjoyed this spot and recommend for solo travelers.

혼자 숙박했는데 좋았어요!!!!! 사실 다른곳을 안가봐서 가성비가 좋은지 비교할 수는 없지만!!! 땅값 비싼 홍콩에서 혼자 여행하시는 분에게 딱일것 같아요:-) 밑에 화장실 수압이 약하다는 댓글이 있어서 걱정했는데 문제 없었습니다! 다만 뜨건무리 나오다 옴총빨뤼 나오디안슴 니당 히히 못씨슬정도노노 Sam도 매우매우 친절하시고 (Hidden by Airbnb) 으로 답장도 빨리 해주세요!!!!! 옆방 소리가 들리긴 했는데 운이 좋았던 건지 잠 못잘 정도로 크지 않았어요! 체크인아웃 전후로 짐도 맡겨주십니다! 침사추이랑 몽콕 사이에 있어서 걸어다니기도 편해요! 숙소 주변 큰 길로 해서 맞은편에 '타이거슈가' 라고 흑설탕밀크티? 파는곳 있는데 단 거 좋아하시면 꼭 드세요ㅠㅠㅠ 존맛탱!!!!! 다들 즐거운 여행 되세요~~~:-)
真的真的是非常好的体验!在Jordanstation旁边走路只需2分钟! 两道门也让人感觉非常安全! 最重要的是我有次出门忘记关门了结果清理人员还留纸条提醒我门没有关! 真的是非常贴心的服务! 房间干净整洁一个人完全不会挤! 下次去香港还是会订这家的呢! Sam也是非常热情的人呢!
I enjoyed my stay at Sam's place. It's right next to MTR station so transportation become very easy. Sam was very quick in replying to any questions I had.
Detailed responses, pretty good overall
Sam先生的房间性价比非常高,地理位置非常便捷好找｡所有的酒店都大同小异,但旅行中各有不同的民宿会深深留在心里,是旅行中不可或缺的回忆｡如果有缘再来香港一定首选Sam先生的房间,感谢Sam先生及时热情的回复｡
Perfect location, well renovated with all necessary facilities for a short trip, even with a desk and chair. This room I stayed has a full window which was very nice.
Does the job easy to get into good location
숙소 위치 내부도 청결하고 다 좋았어요! 호스트분도 연락도 잘되구 되게 친절하시구 다만 체크인한날 인터넷이 퉈쥐쥐 않와숴 굉좡휘 불안했주ㅏ만 다음날 바로 고쳐주셨습니다 만족!
Sam非常热情周到｡地点特别好,去任何地方都十分方便｡唯一不便的是洗手间有些小,淋浴没有隔开,不是特别舒服｡其他服务都不错,性价比很高｡一个人旅行香港可以订房间~ 不必担心安全问题｡
位置很好很方便,从地铁出口出来后离大厦入口只有几十米的距离,楼下就有家7-11便利店,离弥敦道非常近,但是关上窗户后非常安静,完全听不到路上车辆的引擎声｡只是浴室有点小,热水器的存水量有些少,但是烧水的速度非常快｡总之是一间很不错的房间,非常感谢Sam,希望以后能再次入住!
非常好的体验!房间一进来布置地很整洁 房东很热情好客 入住前退房前都会友善提醒 就是位置稍稍有点偏 出去玩不是很方便 但如果你是一个人来玩的话 是很好的选择

位置方便,离地铁口步行几分钟的距离,楼下也有711,吃饭出行都方便｡
房东sam很热情周到,会事先告知路线,回复及时,很棒!
地理位置是真的挺好,所以性价比来说很不错了｡房间虽小,不过大部分用品也都有了,单人住也差不多够了｡房东很热情,有问必回,也提供不少建议｡
Nice location. Room was small but enough for a solo traveler. Sam was very hospitable. The toilet flush was broken on the third day so it did hamper the whole experience.
位置很好,从深圳宝安机场坐大巴100元直接在佐敦下,下车后转弯就是南京街,过街不远就是庙街,离油麻地和尖沙咀都很近,出门就是地铁站,交通非常便利!房间有点小但是非常干净,唯一不足就是要提前按热水开关烧热水,洗澡必须要非常快,其它各方面都很好!不错的房东非常热情!
地铁站很近很方便
我觉得在香港这个寸土寸金的地方,这样的民宿实在是性价比很高的地方,一个人住也没有问题!周边交通也十分方便,下次来会“回购”的地方!

name: Super location - Walk to the City!
space: Stay for a long weekend, a week or the whole month!! Come and live in my beautiful Art deco 1 bedroom apartment. Furnished with an adorable mix of retro and modern furniture. It is fully equipped and ready to move in for short or long stays.  The apartment has a very clever layout with great use of space. There is a separate bedoom with double bed & ensuite bathroom with shower over bath. A Walk-in-robe keeps all your clothes and suitcases out of sight!  An L-shaped living area wraps around a separate kitchen. The lounge room has a 3 seater lounge and armchair and a LCD TV with good TV reception. Cute dining space seats 4 and is a comfy spot to sit with your laptop.  Kitchen has a bar fridge with freezer, 2 burner cooktop and combined microwave and convection oven (it grills, it bakes and it microwaves!). Its also equipped with crockery, cutlery, pots and pans.  Its a lower ground floor apartment on a sloping block looking into an internal shared courtyard and walkway. Surprisingly qui
description: Stay for a long weekend, a week or the whole month!! Come and live in my beautiful Art deco 1 bedroom apartment. Furnished with an adorable mix of retro and modern furniture. It is fully equipped and ready to move in for short or long stays.  The apartment has a very clever layout with great use of space. There is a separate bedoom with double bed & ensuite bathroom with shower over bath. A Walk-in-robe keeps all your clothes and suitcases out of sight!  An L-shaped living area wraps around a separate kitchen. The lounge room has a 3 seater lounge and armchair and a LCD TV with good TV reception. Cute dining space seats 4 and is a comfy spot to sit with your laptop.  Kitchen has a bar fridge with freezer, 2 burner cooktop and combined microwave and convection oven (it grills, it bakes and it microwaves!). Its also equipped with crockery, cutlery, pots and pans.  Its a lower ground floor apartment on a sloping block looking into an internal shared courtyard and walkway. Surprisingly qui
house_rules: Make yourself at home. Please leave the apartment clean and tidy though. No parties. The walls are thick so you don't hear much from next door neighbours but no loud music etc  -please be cosiderate of the neighbours Max of 2 people to stay in apartment - couch is for sitting and maybe a midday nap but not for an extra guest  Electricty and water are included.  No internet or Wifi provided Free to Air TV - Foxtel is available for longer stays if you want to connect it at your cost Bedding, towels etc provided Tea and cofee and a Small breakfast hamper provided to start off your stay I try to be as flexible as possible with checkins and checkouts - however I do need to work around other bookings and also my work.  Checkout by 11am - unless I dont have anyone booked for the following night.

host.host_about:
Im an HR Professional currently working for a large not-for-profit organisation. 

We love living in the inner city and the convenience to the city as I tend to meet friends in town to catch up over a drink (cocktail for me) or try a new reataurant. 

In 2011, I started lindy-hop dancing (1930's-40s style) which I absolutely love and now do weekly. The community is great and I love dancing so a much easier way to get some excercise in. 

I also love the beach so do try to stop at the beach or pool on the way home in summer for a swim.

I love travelling and seeing new things - Ive seen a lot of eastern Australia and slowly getting through my large bucket list of things to see overseas.

reviews.comments: We stayed at this little quaintly situated sweetheart of an apartment for 3 nights in June and would return. Fits 2 people no problems, and the decorations surround you with a glow of warmth and style. If Location to some of Sydney's great lifestyle treats is an important point for your visit, then this place is well worth considering. See you again Serena!

I stayed at Serena's flat for two weeks in July, it's a cosy little place, perfectly located to discover the city and the thriving night life around Kings Cross and Surry Hills. Getting around from here is also quite easy - the train station of Kings Cross is just across Williams St and you have buses all around you. The flat is in the basement so no views and it can be a bit dark in winter, but in summer it won't get so hot. The kitchen has all the basic facilities you would need for a holiday stay, the bathroom is neat and everything was tidy.
Contact and Check-in/Check-out was easy and prompt, with complementary fruit, bread rolls, jam and milk to start off my stay. There is an ATM right next to the entrance and a bakery across the street, so all very handy.

Serena's apartment is tidy, comfy, attractively decorated and perfectly located just steps from bars, pubs and restaurants. She left us gift basket of jam, fruit, oatmeal and buns that was much appreciated. We could hear music from a nearby club or bar so would advise earplugs but we slept well. Great hot shower! We would definitely recommend it to others. Thanks!

Serena's place is superbly located, pretty much across the road from King's Cross, a short walk into the CBD with easy access to public transport. We stayed for a weekend, and were lucky enough to be able to check in on the Friday morning, as there hadn't been anyone staying in the apartment the night before. Serena greeted us, gave us advice about the area, and had even made us a breakfast hamper complete with home made jam!

The apartment had everything we needed, and was very nicely decorated. The only down side was a fair bit of nighttime noise, as it is located in quite a happening area and we were there over the weekend. Luckily we're not particularly light sleepers so we were still able to sleep.

Overall it was a great weekend, and we would definitely stay there again.

Serena's apartment is centrally-located and near a lot of great restaurants and bars. The coffee shop next door was really nice. Serena was a great host and greeted us with a tasty breakfast basket. The apartment itself was nice and clean although somewhat dark and the main window faced a lightly frequented alleyway so we generally kept the blinds shut. That said, it was a good place for the price and I would recommend it.

Had a really great stay at Serena's apartment.  The location was great - we arrived at Sydney airport at 9pm, by 9.30, we were meeting Serena at the apartment and by 10pm we were meeting friends at the Kings Cross Hotel down the street.  Very convenient!

The apartment was thoughtfully decorated, the breakfast was simple and nice, the bed was comfy, the bathroom clean.  No complaints!  Surprisingly quiet for the middle of the city.  Would definitely recommend!

My wife, daughter and I had an amazing time in Sydney and staying at Serena's place. 

The location is great, it is walking distance from most tourist attractions in the city (if you love a bit of walking like we do - about 25 mins walking to Opera house, Darling Harbour).  Supermarket is just around the corner. And if you are a Muslim looking for halal food, there are a couple of halal restaurants about 5 mins walk from the apartment. 

Serena's apartment is nice and cozy, the kitchen is well equipped for cooking a simple meal. 

Oh and Serena is very flexible with check-ins and check-outs; which is super helpful when travelling with a toddler. 

All in all, it is a great place to stay if you are travelling as a couple or with a small child.
I´ve been in Serena´s Place for a bit more than two weeks with my 15-year-old daughter. Everything was nice and clean and very well equipped and organized. We loved staying there. Thanks to Serena.

We had a fantastic mini break at Serena's apartment. It's a great location, very secure, nicely decorated, clean and very comfortable. Serena (and her mum, who kindly checked us in) was a very welcoming host, who was extremely responsive to any queries before and during our stay. It's right near kings cross, and we were there on the weekend, but no problems with noise, and we slept really well.

name: enjoy nature in Istanbul
summary: 5 minutes to seaside where you can swim, and 5 minutes to the woods, this two floors single house contains a cultivated garden with fruit trees, two large bedrooms and a big living room with a large sea view.
space: Five minutes to seaside where you can swim and five minutes to the woods where you can make long walks. A large garden full with fruit trees and a large living room with a large sea view.
description: 5 minutes to seaside where you can swim, and 5 minutes to the woods, this two floors single house contains a cultivated garden with fruit trees, two large bedrooms and a big living room with a large sea view. Five minutes to seaside where you can swim and five minutes to the woods where you can make long walks. A large garden full with fruit trees and a large living room with a large sea view. Guests are allowed to use any part of the house. I will do my best to help you to enjoy your stay. Respect the silence and the peacefulness of the nature :)
notes: Respect the silence and the peacefulness of the nature :)
access: Guests are allowed to use any part of the house.
interaction: I will do my best to help you to enjoy your stay.

host.host_about: I've been working as an actor in Istanbul State Theatre and also giving acting lessons in a university.  I am also acting in movies. I enjoy my house very much but need additional money from time to time and also this house very big for one person, so that's why I wanted to share my house with other friends.

reviews.comments: Sakinlik arayanlar için güzel bir seçenek.Evde ihtiyacınız olabilecek her şey var.Deniz manzaralı geniş pencereli salonuna diyecek bir laf yok zaten.
Çok sakin, huzurlu, doğanın içinde bir ev. Her şeyiyle cok güzeldi. Salonunun manzarası gece ayrı, gündüz ayrı güzel. Kafa dinlemek için çok uygun... Evin içinde ihtiyaç duyulabilecek her şey mevcut.

Son zamanlarda gerçekleştirdiğim en sakin ve huzurlu hafta sonuydu. Lokasyon olarak semt ve park alanının tam ortasında bulunuyor. İsterseniz piknik alanına, isterseniz merkeze aynı sürede gidebilirsiniz.
Özellikle, eve girince ve üst kata çıkınca, karşınıza inanılmaz bir manzara çıkıyor. Evin dekorasyonu sebebiyle müthiş huzur verici bir görüntü ile karşılaşıyorsunuz. Doğanın içerisinde olmasından dolayı da kuş sesleri insanı mutlu ediyor. 
Şehrin kirli gürültüsüne ara vermek için mükemmel bir yer. 
Sanem Hanım'ın bizi karşılama şekli de inanılmazdı. Yardımseverliği ile sanki uzun süredir yaşadığınız bir yermiş gibi hissettiriyor. Teşekkürler :)

Sakin ve huzurlu bir tatil için Büyükada'daki en doğru tercih. İki dakikalık yürüme mesafesiyle ormana ve denize ulaşabildiğiniz gibi, evin kendi bahçesi ve balkonunda zaman geçirip, salonun muhteşem manzarasından da evden çıkmadan kendinizi doğada hissedebilirsiniz. Evde ihtiyacınız olan herşey mevcut. Ev sahibi de sorularınızı her dakika cevaplamaya hazır ve çok yardımcı.
evin salonu çok güzel, muhteşem bir manzarası var ve güzel döşenmiş... bahçesi biraz bakımsız ve ama yine de oturulabilecek masa-sandalye olsa, adanın tadını çıkarmak için ideal bir mekan.
The host canceled this reservation 8 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

It was a wonderful week-end we spent at Sanem's house. Sanem was so welcoming, sincere and nice host, available at any moment...
We enjoyed so much the living-room with its beautiful see-view, rooms & bathroom are clean and very comfortable.
The house is situated a little bit further in the nature in Büyükada, which was perfect to enjoy calm and to rest, to walk in the wood or go to the sea. 
We highly recommend to anyone Sanem's house, which can create idyllic trip...
thanks sanem ;)

This is the most beautiful place I've stayed on AirBnb. It's set back in a quiet part of the island, a short walk from the water and parks, and has a beautiful garden with fruit trees and a wide porch on the ground floor. A perfect spot to just relax and listen to the birds and complete privacy from the street. The view of the sea from the living room on the top floor is amazing. The house is well-kept and has a lot of character and space. Sanem was also an amazing host, extremely gracious is welcoming us in person, and then available throughout our stay by text for any questions. Five-start experience all around. Thank you and we'll definitely be back.

I have used Airbnb in four different countries, and Sanem´s place was my best experience ever. The spatial arrangement of the house, which I speculate would have been built in the 50s or 60s, is great: two bedrooms are in the first floor, luminous but protected from direct exposure to sunlight, excellent for peaceful sleep. A spacious and nicely decorated living room upstairs boasts a commanding view of the garden, the sea, and the neighboring island (Heybeliada). The living room connects to a kitchen and a balcony overlooking the garden where we enjoyed our meals. The garden was my favorite spot. It is not for those who love neatly arranged, engineered, and regularly maintained gardens. Sanem´s is an essentially picturesque garden with wild plants that look like being there for ages. There are regularized pockets where Sanem has planted tomatoes, cucumbers, and green peppers. I loved watering them. She graciously let us taste mulberries and plums. Four different plum trees, two different mulberry trees, a cherry tree, a sour cherry tree, fig tree, vines, roses, loquat, and of course the sublime pine tree partly covered by a delightful bougainvillea... Yes, this is still considered to be Istanbul. The notorious phaeton noises and manure smells of Büyükada stay away from this house. We only smelt flowers and post-rain soil, and heard beautiful seagulls whose concert sabotaged occasionally by gangs of crows plotting to take plums and mulberries away... Despite all its peacefulness, the house is not completely isolated: there are two small groceries and a restaurant just about fifty meters down the street. Sanem is a lovely person. She met us at the check-in, made sure we had a pleasant stay, and encouraged us to contact her anytime should there be any inconvenience, which never happened. Great house, dream garden.
Great host. Very helpful and welcoming. Nice and quiet place further from the center. Very nice beach not much further on the other side of the mountain where the apartment is.

Haftasonu 2 gun dinlenmek icin Sanemin evini tercih ettik.Fotograflarda goruldugu gibi temiz ,rahat ,sessiz sakin bir ev kendinizi cok rahat hissedebilirsiniz.Sanem eve gelisimizden cikis yapmamiza kadar devamli bizimle. ilgilendi fazlasiyla yrdimci oldu ozellikle tesekkur ederim.Buyukada merkezinden cok kolay bir sekilde ulasabilirsiniz.5 dk yurume mesafesinde gunluk yeme icme ihiyacinizi karsilayabileceginiz restorant ve bufe bulunuyor bufe kucuk gorunsede icinde bircok sey satiliyor kahvaltinizi evde yapmak isterseniz bu bufe temel seyleri temin edebilirsiniz.Sanemin evinde komsular veya evde herhangi birseyin eksikligi gibi bir sorun yasamadik .Hersey icin tesekkur ederiz .
Ev cok keyifli,ev sahibi tatlı ve ilgili

Sanem's charming two floor house on Princess Island is perfect for big families and couples who like to feel closer to the Mediterranean nature. Very quiet street, where the noisy tourist groups aren't heard off and still close enough to beaches, restaurants and bars. We had great time on the balcony and we were astounded by the nice panorama on the sea. No problem whatsoever occur during our stay and Sanem helped us immediately when we had questions or needed some advice. Highly recommended place!
Bonne expérience, maison charmante, bien située.

Sanem is very attentive and helpful. Finding the place was a bit difficult. But the house and garden are amazing, the location very nice and the island really lovely and relaxing. All in all highly recommended!

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: I'm a great gal just cool and easy going

reviews.comments: It was a pleasant stay an the host was very helpful an nice throughout my entire stay, I would recommend to anyone who needs a room..
Great place, very clean and comfortable. About 20 minutes to the train station. host can help with you anything you need. :)

The room was comfortable and clean and  it was quite easy to get around on public transport,. 
It is a family home and I found it friendly and welcoming
The room was as advertised. Transition to the accomodation was smooth. Karlene is very helpful and hospitable. I had no issues whatsoever. 100% recommend.
Loved this place.  Karlene and her family where very welcoming and helpful.  Communication was awesome from Karlene.  The room was exactly as described.  Bed was lovely and very comfortable.

Karlene was very Accomodating.  Although i did not stay that much in the house, but karlene was SUPERBE!  I think i would stay there again
I would recommend anyone going to NY to try out Karlene's Place!  You will be happy
Thanks Karlene

Karlene made me feel extremely welcomed! As a first time AirBnB user, I was a bit nervous about the process, but she made me comfortable by timely answering any questions I had prior to booking. Beautiful home and exactly as pictured. Would definently recommend!

Karlene was very friendly and helpful. The place was clean and comfortable and it was easy to get around by public transport. Futhermore she organized a pick up at a cost from the airport for me. I enjoyed my stay and can highly recommend  this place to stay.

Although my flight came in pretty late, Karlene was waiting for my arrival in her home. She was very accommodating and kind. Her home was in a nice quiet neighborhood, clean, comfortable. She even arranged for my pickup to take me to the airport early the following morning.  All in all it was a pleasant stay.

Karlene was very helpful, friendly and accommodating to our strange travel itinerary in regards to our checking in and out needs. The location was great for JFK, clean and comfortable for a good nights sleep. $15 in a uber to JFK - Thanks again!
Great experience! The neighborhood is very safe and bedroom was comfortable. I also enjoyed watching First Presidential Debate together!

Great 1st Time Experience 
Thx Karlene

Even though the location of the place is a bit remote, it is a great room if you need to stay close to JFK. The house is clean, the bed comfortable and the area is safe.
Karlene is a great host, very kind and willing to help. I felt great staying with her.
Excellent, was very communicative and helpful when my flight arrived very late at 3am.
I booked the place for my friend who just landed in NY and Karlene was very helpful by communicating well and assisting with transportation.
Good place to stay.  Close to airport, which is where I was working while there.

When there was a small SNAFU with the original room due to a burst pipe, Karlene was quick to find me an alternative location at a nearby room in her mother's home.  This was tremendously appreciated since I was in the air over the Atlantic when her misfortune occurred and I would have had a challenge finding new accommodation on such short notice.  This was the second time I've stayed with Karlene and I am quite appreciative.  Even helpful finding transportation to the airport. All was fine.

Clean and tidy room. Communication was very easy. We booked only a day before our arrival because our flight to Orlando got cancelled because of the hurricane. Karlene and her family are very nice. Thank you for the spontaneous stay!
Karlene is so nice that she waited for us very midnight. It's very close to JFK airport. Everything is good.
Place is nice though communication is a little time consuming. you need to take bus then subway to go to manhattan. otherwise place is really nice.

I had really couple of good experiences traveling and staying at Airbnb but this one was terrible. I drove 10 hours to get to the location and once i got there around 3am the host was sleeping. Anyways i called her sister and told her the situation and she said I can come to her house and stay there until her sister wakes up which was fine because it was freezing in NYC. Got to our Airbnb around 8am and the host said nobody told her we booked a room so she gave us a smaller room because the other one was occupied with different guest. Anyways, I booked the original room for 3 days but I left in 2. Everything not professional and I do not recommend this to anyone.

name: Holoholo Inn: Rain Forest (Priv-2)
summary: Very quiet hostel in the the rain forest in Volcano Village. Located 1 mile from Hawaii Volcanoes National Park. We offer a private room with private bath accommodating up to 2 adults.
space: In Hawaiian, "holo holo" means "leisurely journey", and this is the spirit reflected in the atmosphere of our casual hostel next to our home. Our hope is to provide the Holo Holo In as a mix of convenient location, a comfortable base and serene surroundings. We have been operating as a hostel since 1988.
description: Very quiet hostel in the the rain forest in Volcano Village. Located 1 mile from Hawaii Volcanoes National Park. We offer a private room with private bath accommodating up to 2 adults. In Hawaiian, "holo holo" means "leisurely journey", and this is the spirit reflected in the atmosphere of our casual hostel next to our home. Our hope is to provide the Holo Holo In as a mix of convenient location, a comfortable base and serene surroundings. We have been operating as a hostel since (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)  Guest access to: Common Room with TV; Full Kitchen; Free WiFi. Host greeting and interaction on check-in, between 4:30pm and 9:00pm. Located in a quiet village setting in the rain forest. Volcano Village offers a variety of cafes, restaurants, grocery, and Farmer's Market (Sunday). It is located 1 mile from the Hawaiian Volcanoes National Park entrance. Limited public transportation. Daily bus except Sunday. (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)

reviews.comments: Satoshi is a wonderful and gracious host!  This quiet little hostel is tucked away in a jungle paradise, but was perfectly located close to the volcano and only a short drive from Hilo.  The place was so warm and inviting with clean rooms and bathrooms, a huge kitchen common area, and tons of foliage surrounding it.  Couldn't have asked for a better place to stay!  I hope to visit again soon.

The neighborhood is great, there is ample parking. the rooms are very clean and there is a common kitchen one can use. Satoshi was not the most welcoming of hosts and did not communicate very well on our arrival. We didn't mind, though,   since his accommodation was affordable in a super pricey town and it well suited to our needs. I would go again.

We rented a private room with bathroom, stayed there with our toddler son.  Room was very large and comfortable. The entire hostel is very clean and spacious.  Great location for exploring the volcano. If you get a chance, talk to Satoshi - super interesting and well-travelled guy.

Our stay at Satochi's place was truly wonderfull. What you see is what you get and you can clearly see that it is a longrunning business. For the price you pay you get everything you expect. The place is actually more a hostel then a privately run airbnb. The room we had had it's own bathroom so all fine. Location is truly perfect at the entrance of the national volcano parc. I can only highly recommend this place for your stay.

Satoshi San wasn't there during our short 1 night stay, but Mei Ho, the Inn Keeper helped to make sure we find everything we need. The clean community kitchen where I enjoyed my poke and seaweed. Mei Ho also share with us her farming experience in the volcano area ...a small vegetables farm that I saw from our private room.
The private room with the bath is clean and surely keep us out from the cold. Dave thought it is even warmer than he would expect.
Everything exceed our expectations, friendly host and a very clean Inn!
Quite and peaceful. Great location, kind host.
Warm greeting from Satoshi.  Accomidations as described.  Nice quiet neighborhood.
Great place. Comfortable and nice.

Is was very good place to stay.
I was in jungle that is also very good.
Mahalo

Satoshi is a great guy, talked with him for a while. The hostel is clean and has a great kitchen. Once you do the check in you can access the place anytime with a key pad. It's on a dirt road in the middle of the village, very slow pace here but a great get away.
Nice wooden house. If you want to visit volcano national park, I recommend here.
We enjoyed staying here and Satoshi was very nice and accommodating!

We had a great time staying here. Room was nice and clean. It was too bad we couldn't have a key to our room as we were only staying for one night. We had our own private bathroom in the room. Nice and quite. The hostel is in the jungle, very dark at night, so I recommend checking in earlier while it's still light out.

If you are visiting Hawaii Volcanoes National Park, this is the best place to stay. You are less than 2 miles from the park entrance. The kitchen is big and would accommodate many guests. We had a private bedroom with private bath that was clean and comfortable. This is a place to stay if you are interested in interacting with other guests and getting out to see the outdoors!
Great and beautiful location!  It was reminiscent of staying in an old Japanese farmhouse!  Basic but comfortable.

Our stay was fantastic overall - the location is a five-minute drive from Volcanoes National Park with a gas station on the way, the rooms were very comfy and clean, the wooden panelling inside is quite nice, the common area had some interesting books and maps to look at, and Satoshi was very accommodating and responsive.

Wonderfully located just a few minutes away from Volcanoes National Park. Tucked away in a beautiful forested area. Plenty of parking next door. The hosts responded very quickly to our same day request and made us feel very welcomed, even offering us dinner.
A very good base to visit the volcano park.
Warmhearted hostel with great proximity to Volcanoes National Park and an unbeatable ratio of quality to cost. I would definitely try to stay here again on a return trip.

Great for visiting the volcano national park. You can watch the lava in the evening without the need to drive far way after that. The communication was quick and we managed to secure an extra day of stay on the same day.

What an awesome spot to stay! The hostel feels like a large house - it is super well maintained and beautiful. Squeaky clean, a very short drive from the Volcanoes National Park and Satoshi is really helpful. I would recommend this to anyone and definitely be back again!
Stayed in the private room. Was very clean and quiet. Not far from Volcano National Park. Green and lush natural surroundings. Good restaurants nearby. Satoshi is a nice and helpful host.
Nice and very clean Room, nice people...just a bit hard to find at night.

Great location near the Volcano National Park. Did not interact much with the hosts. It's an Inn so there are other rooms available and the room is being cleaned every day which is nice. I would totally recommend the place to anyone looking for a place near the volcanoes. There is also a great restaurant in the Kilauea lodge in the Volcano village which we enjoyed a lot.
Great place to stay, 3 miles away from Volcano N. Park. This was our 2nd times visit. My wife and I liked it for the quiet, clean, and rain forest scene of the neighborhood.
Satoshi is a super friendly guy with a great place in Volcano.  I spent all day hiking in a cold rain and was so glad to come back to a clean room and a hot shower.
Awesome location! We were just a few minutes from the Volcano National Park. The unit is well maintained.

We enjoyed our night here. Great peaceful jungle area. We enjoyed the sounds of the birds. Welcoming and a nice hostel environment.  The place has a slight musty smell (maybe because it's in the jungle), but our private room was pristine.
Thanks to Mr. Satoshi hospitality lovely place so clean and lovely wood house
Good location for the Volcano National park. Basic and clean room.
Rustic, clean, comfortable hostel near Volcano National Park.  Get groceries in Hilo; local ones poorly stocked and way overpriced.

My husband and I spent 2 nights at Holoholo Inn and we really enjoyed our stay at Satoshi’s place. I love everything about our room and the inn: its wooden wall, its wooden floor, the lush greenery around the house. The inn doesn’t have much (extravagant and unnecessary) furniture and decors. Rather it’s simple, knit and clean. It’s also very close to the entrance of the Volcano national park, less than 10 minute drive, which is so important if you want to go out to see the lava at midnight like we did. I will definitely stay at Holoholo inn again next time I come back to Big Island!

This place is Perfect for visiting volcano national park:) Nice rooms with private showers or dorms with shared bathrooms. Both very good and clean. Kitchen has everything you need and a few restaurants are around as well. We had a very nice stay and would come again.
Super neat room, and close to the park. Great host and kitchen got everything you need.
Check in Problemlos, durch Türen mit Zahlencode. keine lässtigen Schlüssel. Sauber, Freundlich, gut eingerichtet.
Nice quiet and safe place.
We very much enjoyed our stay in Volcano with Satoshi. We look forward to staying there again. Everything was spotless! Very friendly and welcoming.
Nice, clean place with use of kitchen and close to Volcano National Park. Satoshi was responsive and provided great service.
Great location if you are planning to spend more than one day at volcano national park.

Everything was as described.   My wife and I stayed in a private room which was quiet, peaceful, and clean.  The morning coffee was very good and appreciated.  Holoholo Inn is very close to the National Park with a couple of nice restaurants on the way.  Great value and would definitely recommend.
Satoshi's place was clean and charming, and conveniently located close to volcano national park.

The location was hidden but a great spot to find peace and quietness. 
Very clean and perfect amount of space

La maison de Satoshi est parfaitement située si vous prévoyez une visite de Volcano Park. Tout est parfaitement propre. La cuisine est très bien équipée, les parties communes sont agréables. Parking à côté de la maison. Vraiment très bien !

The Holo Holo In is truly excellent. It is comfortable, clean, affordable and full of character. The kitchen and common areas are well appointed. Furthermore, the host Satoshi is brimming with local (and global) knowledge that is certain to enhance your visit to Volcano and Its environs.

name: Brooklyn Artist Loft / Fun Location
summary: Private room can sleep 2, shared bathroom. Nice and quiet, private room in the back of the home. Great to have an extra bed for friends and family that may want to visit you for a nice week end). Table by window with two chairs and two dressers a comfortable chair and a big closet. This great for internships, actors and college grads. It has been used by nurses, actors, opera singers, med school interns. Plenty of privacy and good vibes. Long term private room rental with Wifi .
space: This is a great accommodation for Medical students and doctors doing a rotation. 10 minute walk to NYU Lutheran Hospital. Great for Students and Engineers. Comfortable Private  Bedroom, with a full bed and twin on top bunk beds, that can sleep two. Big Fat Pillows and a Thick Mattress, will keep you comfortable after a busy day on the town. Closet and desk and two big windows overlooking a tree line block. High Speed internet and use of the fully equipped kitchen.

neighborhood_overview: Bay Ridge Brooklyn, Is a nice, safe, little, neighborhood, located by the Bay surrounded by Great Restaurants from all over the world. Very Quick commute to Midtown, Times Square
notes: Empire State Building, Statue of Liberty, Saint Patrick Cathedral. Saks Fifth Avenue, Walk Over Brooklyn Bridge, Coney Island. Times Square, Central Park. Soho, Union Square. Museums.
transit: Subway is 2 blocks away. R train and the Express N train. Walking distance to Hospitals, Colleges, There is now a ferry that will take you in style into the city. Getting around is very easy and there are plenty of sites to take in.
access: WiFi and use of the fully equipped kitchen. Free Subway Maps and Postcards and directions to all the Hot Spots. I can provide you with Directions to see 5 to 6 destinations in one day. Like 5th Avenue Museums, Rockefeller Center, Times Square, Empire State Building, Free Ferry to Staten Island and get up and close to the Statue of Liberty, Walk over the Brooklyn Bridge and up threw China Town and Soho and N.Y.U and Union Square.
interaction: Big private room with high speed wifi and use of kitchen. Plenty of privacy. Nice clean and safe neighborhood with tons of restaurants and cafes along 3rd avenue. 25 minutes to Times Square on the Subway and the subway is 2 blks from the house.  Close to Lutheran NYU Hospital. Close to Times Square. Central park. Prospect park. Union Square, Soho. Noho. Coney Island.
house_rules: Have fun and enjoy yourself and help yourself to any home cooked meals I make. If you have a late flight you can leave your bags in the hallway by 11 am and return later to get them. Thank You and Happy Day.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: I enjoy meeting new people, I am very easy going and love to cook Italian food.  I welcome all my guests w a home cooked meal. I make really nice lasagna !  I work as a stand up comic and actor. I have few commercials on youtube. Love the Big Crunch and Joey Guacamole. My home is very colorful and full of good vibes. All my beds are comfortable with plenty of pillows. I give out subway maps and keys and explain to you how to get around the city. I will explain to you how to do 5 to 6 main attractions per day. This way you can really enjoy yourselves and take in the sites. A lot of free fun things to do. like walking over the Brooklyn Bridge,  and walking up into Chinatown and Little Italy.  Taking the free ferry to Staten Island, which takes you right by the Statue of Liberty ! Central Park and Times Square ! Museums and much much more. Fun and exciting. Pack your bags and welcome to my home. Happy Day !

reviews.comments: Joseph is an energetic, interactive and very solicitous host. When we arrived he had pizza, soup and dessert for us.  His home is very eclectic with many pictures of his family. On our second morning he fixed breakfast for us.  After finishing some dental work he allowed us to stay later than the usual checkout time.  He was very helpful with finding things, providing maps for us and recommendations for restaurants.

We had a great time at Joe's apartment:)
Joe was very helpful and make our journey easy.He took his time to give his advice and directions to places we like to go 
The room was comfy, food delicious, Joe thank you again for a great time :)))
Joe is the best host !!!!
Joseph was a great host! Had food ready when I arrived, gave tips about the area and what to see and do, made it easy and very welcoming. I would stay here again.

Joseph was a fantastic host! He offered to prepare dinner and breakfast, took me to the location of a half-marathon I was running nearby and stayed around until the end to cheer me on! I could not ask for a nicer host. Nothing to point out about the accommodations: cozy and tidy, everything was as described. I would certainly stay again with Joseph should I return to the area.
Joe's a great host. Makes food, tells stories, and keeps things running smoothly.

Joseph's home is BRIGHT and CHEERY and full of LIFE!  Everything is clean and placed well.  Joseph was very communicative, and went out of his way to meet me outside the building to help me when I first arrived.  He went beyond expectations to prepare a full dinner my first night, and was very patient with my ever-changing business trip requirements.

My business trip requirements changed, and Joseph was gracious enough to accommodate me to rent the room for an additional night, even though this placed him at some inconvenience with his own plans, and I definitely appreciate his flexibility and hospitality.

In all of NYC, I wound up having the best host. I am certain of it. I came to his wonderful apartment jet lagged & exhausted from a 36 hours of flight & travel time. He personally greeted me warmly with a comforting plate of Italian pasta with kidney beans and smoked cheese. It was quite good. He gave me all the subway info I needed easily, and all his info was accurate. As if this guy hadn't done more than enough already, he ended up giving me a pair of tennis shoes bc my luggage didn't make it and I had no shoes suitable for walking the streets of NY. This place is awesome. You should consider yourself lucky if he has an opening for you.

Joe is a nice host. We really enjoy our first airbnb stay with him. Clean room, tasty breakfasts, and even sweet gifts. Moreover, Joe is always willing to communicating and giving good tips for your travel in NYC. Highly recommend.
Excellent host, great human being, a lot of food and laughs shared.  Highest recommendations for AirBNB stays in NYC.

Joseph is an awesome host. He always had breakfast and clean towels. He's a trip & makes you laugh and helps you find anything that you need. It was well worth the stay, well worth the pay and I feel like I made a friend. I can't wait to go back to the city and stay with Joseph again.

I cannot say enough about Joseph as a host. His apartment is AMAZING, he provided wonderful food and he was so friendly. We spent some time together and had a blast. I am looking forward to a return visit. I highly recommend Joe as a host!

Handsome Joe Hanley is not only a gracious host with a nice place, but a great cook, a funny stand-up comic, and a wonderful guide for bay ridge and beyond. Truly one of the kindest people I've ever stayed with, he put up with me for a whole month and was truly above and beyond the whole time! Thanks for the good food and good memories!

name: East Village Sanctuary
summary: Walking distance to NYU. Large one bedroom with full kitchen and living room. In the hustle and bustle of the east village night, hide away in this green oasis to recharge and reset. Right next to the L, 4, 5, 6, N,R, W and F lines this apartment is the perfect central location for anywhere you want to go in NYC as well as just walking a block or two for a cheap amazing meal.
space: It's an all green emerald city of sorts. I had a lot of fun decorating it and I hope you take the time to spin a record and really enjoy it.
