We very much enjoyed our stay in Judy's beautiful appartment. It was very clean, comfortable and spacious.
Judy was very helpful and gave us "Insider" tipps for our stay. We very much appreciated that she accommodated us on short notice (after our original host Ronnie cancelled on us 27 hours prior to our arrival in NY)

The apartment was clean and brightly lit! Plenty of space to spread out a bit since I was here for a week. (Definitely waaay more room than a hotel.) Neighborhood is walkable with plenty of restaurant options. Easy to get to the subway too.

Judy and Alex were great hosts and we were very happy with the place. We're former Brooklyn residents who moved abroad and were home visiting for the holidays. We stayed at Judy & Alex's place for eight nights and we couldn't have been happier. Well-equipped kitchen, comfortable bed, lots of space, great taste/style in decorating, good location and friendly, available hosts. Couldn't be happier!
Great

Judy's place is as great, or better, than we had hoped. The little extras Judy provided was excellent - there was coffee, yes and even milk for our son, was very appreciated. We loved having a washer and dryer. It is located very close to several subway stations, making it easy to travel into Manhattan and all over Brooklyn. The building is a quaint brownstone, so there is creaky floors, but we enjoyed its addition to the quaintness of the place. Very close to Brooklyn Tabernacle as well. 
Couldn't recommend Judy's place high enough.
Wonderful apartment, very well located, and very comfortable !

Beautiful space, wonderful home in a very convenient spot in Brooklyn. Spacious (which is rare in New York), great natural light, super clean. Has everything you'd need, french press, kettle, nice kitchen, big dining room, comfy couch and comfy bed. Nicely decorated and thoughtful too, with all the necessities and plenty of hangers/drawer space. Easy walk to the Barclays, surrounded by markets, coffee shops, stores, and delicious restaurants. Highly recommended, would stay here again if I'm ever in Brooklyn for work again.  It's one of the best I've ever stayed in--and I probably book an AirBnB at least once a month!

Judy was easy to get in touch with and quick to respond. A+++

This apartment is a gem, coming from two people who have lived in the neighborhood for years! The location, the apartment and the communication exceeded our expectations! We would highly recommend this place.

I highly recommend this place for one or two people.  There is also an additional room if you have an additional person or couple.  It is a great location, the hosts are super great, and it has everything you need.  Clean, secure, not too much more you could ask for!
Great location, very accommodating and helpful! Located in a very metro area and just a beautiful apartment overall.

Judy's place was amazing! Great location, great restaurants! Judy went above what we had expected. We arrived to milk, cereal, bread, jam, and eggs in the kitchen.  She also has a notebook full of info about restaurants they like so the neighborhood and other info about the neighborhood   Our flight was delayed and Judy was quick to get back to me about a later check in. Our son lives 2 1/2 blocks from her place and we will definetly rent again
Fabulous apartment.  Fantastic location.
perfectamente recomendable especialmente si vas a visitar a un familiar en Brooklyn como fue nuestro caso..fue muy cómodo llegar a pocas cuadras del departamento de nuestro hijo...

The open floor plan was great. We managed to put two kids in the bedroom with us and it worked well to close the French doors at night. The kitchen has a great dishwasher and the laundry was a big help. Excellent location close to many trains and coffee shops.
Charming apartment, exactly as described. Great location and amenities. Judy and her husband were wonderful and very helpful hosts. Thanks for a great stay.
Our stay was very enjoyable.  The apartment was very clean and well designed for our needs.

Judy's home was wonderful - just as described, in the perfect location in Brooklyn to get into the city easily, and close to lots of great restaurants and not too far from Prospect park. The apartment itself is lovely, open and airy, very clean and well decorated, super comfy bed, incredibly quiet (the bedroom is on the street side and you can't hear a thing through the noise canceling windows. I stayed with my four month old daughter and it was the perfect space for us for a week. Judy was a top notch host, she was super accommodating from the beginning and was flexible on check out time with us. I would definitely recommend Judy's home if you're visiting the city.
Judy's place was clean and conveniently located near the subway. Nicely decorated and comfortable bed.

Wir haben uns sehr wohl gefühlt bei Judy. Alles war wie beschrieben. Judy war für uns super erreichbar, persönlich getroffen haben wir sie jedoch nicht. Der extra Raum ist klein, aber ordentlich. Wir würden jederzeit wieder Judys Unterkunft wählen.

Lovely flat in one of NYC's best neighbourhoods. Judy made it easy to check in and out and gave us great tips for eating and drinking. We revisited lots of old favourites in the area, but also discovered new places thanks to their guide book.

Judy's place was perfect for our stay. It is close to almost every subway line and offers easy access to the LIRR. It was very convenient. Her place was very clean and newly renovated. She was extremely accommodating and even helped us with bags into the place. The washing machine and dryer were a BIG plus for us since we have an active toddler in the summer heat. There are numerous restaurants nearby with very good food. We even participated in restaurant week at a restaurant two blocks away!
great apartment in very good location.  Close to subway, shops and coffee shops.  A great place to stay.

Bright. Cheerful. Clean. Updated. Comfortable. Convenient. Quiet.  All words that I would use to describe Judy's lovely apartment in Boreum Hill.  It was just the perfect place to begin and end my days during my recent visit with my daughter in Brooklyn.  The neighborhood is awesome with everything you need within three blocks walking distance from great pizza to coffee and pastries to organic groceries to public transportation. Judy was super helpful and answered all questions that I could think of. Im already looking forward to my next visit,  I will definitely be back!
Judy is a great hostess. Easy to communicate with. The apartment is very comfortable. Lot of light came inside. The neighborhood is charming. Definitely we'll stay here again.

Wir würden dieses Appartment rundum empfehlen. Es war sehr sauber, geräumig, perfekt ausgestattet und die Lage ist unschlagbar. Viel ruhiger als Manhatten aber trotzdem fußläufig zu vielen interessanten Cafes, Restaurants und Shops. Sehr gute Anbindung zu allen wichtigen UBahn Stationen (zwei davon keine 5min zu Fuß) und zur LondIslandRailway.

Judy war für uns immer erreichbar und hat uns viele wertvolle Tipps und Hinweise gegeben.

Wir würden jederzeit wieder buchen!
Highly recommended. The apartment is located in downtown Brooklyn, convenient to supermarket and subways. Judy is reachable and responds quickly. Me and my family had a great time in Judy's place.

Highly recommend Judy's pad!  The location near to several subway lines allows for access to Manhattan and provides for a peaceful, local retreat at night.  The apartment is clean, extra quiet and very secure. Judy leaves lots of great recommendations to take advantage of the best of the local area. Would definitely stay here again.

Our daughter lives in Cobble Hill, only 4 blocks away from this apartment.  We came to visit her and our son from Phoenix also joined us.  We hadn't been all together in years.  This apartment was stylish, roomy, well-stocked, and in a hip area of Brooklyn.  We felt so welcomed there. You could tell that it was set up and maintained by people who care.  We cooked Italian in the kitchen and had everything we needed as far as utensils, pots, pans, dinnerware, etc.  There were plenty of towels in the bathroom and a wonderful washer and dryer that we put to good use.  The guidebook was so informative, we didn't have to ask for any further information or suggestions for restaurants, grocery stores and other kinds of shops.  The day before we left we received a message from Judy that the cleaning person would get there later and we could checkout later,too,  if we'd like.  We really hated to leave, but hopefully will get to use it again.

Great location, very close to all subway lines, nice shops and restaurant.
Easy checkin/out.
Thanks for all Judy !
Highly recommend. The apartment was easily accessible by public transportation and we loved exploring the neighborhood for brunch spots. Easy check-in/check-out process. Thanks for having us Judy!

Everything about Judy’s apartment surpassed all of our expectations. There are too many good things to write about so you will just have to see for yourself. The neighborhood especially is one we have never explored before and it was so wonderful. Can’t wait to come back and do it again!
2nd time in Judy’s place and 2nd time happy with our stay. I will definitely come back and I highly recommend it.

Ho soggiornato da Judy con mia moglie e mia figlia una settimana. Appartamento perfetto , molto ben organizzato,spazioso e dotato di tutti i comforts. Judy e suo marito abitano al piano superiore, sono molto comunicativi, disponibili e gentili; ci hanno fornito parecchi consigli utili su ristoranti, supermercati e sono stati molto carini e flessibili nel check out permettendoci di lasciare le valigie fino a tardo pomeriggio .  Il quartiere è molto tranquillo, vicino a  negozi , supermercati, ristoranti e  varie linee della metropolitana. Consigliamo questo appartamento e speriamo vivamente di poterci ritornare.Thanks Judy. We hope to see You soon. Stefano Daniela e Giulia

We loved our stay at Judy's place.  It was everything we were looking for and more on our visit to NYC.  The flat is spacious and bright.  My fiance and I were really able to stretch out and relax.  We really felt at home on our short stay, having our tea in the mornings and even making dinner one night when we were too pooped to go out.  We were surprised how quiet it was, as well; Judy's husband mentioned that they had super insulating windows.  The neighborhood  is lovely, as well, with numerous neat independant shops and cafes within walking distance.  Close to subways, too, which made it convenient to get to and from the city.
We would definitely want to stay here again next time we visit.

Magnifique appartement, spacieux, très confortable, et avec une décoration raffinée. La situation est idéale avec de nombreux commerces, et proche de Manhattan avec plusieurs lignes de métro. Hôtes discrets et disponibles. Nous y reviendrons avec plaisir. Cordialement,  Sandrine et Dominique

Ottima sistemazione per famiglie in zona tranquilla e completa di tutti i servizi, a pochi minuti di metro da downtown Manhattan e a 15 minuti a piedi dal ponte di Brooklyn. Judy è gentilissima e la casa rispecchia fedelmente la descrizione. Consigliatissima!

Judy's place was fantastic. It is located very close to numerous transit options, and there is a ton of good food nearby. The space itself is cozy, and Judy did a fantastic job with furnishing a very comfortable apartment. It really felt like I was in my own home (or more accurately, a nicer version of it), transported to NYC. Judy was also very accommodating both with early check-in's and late check-outs. I would recommend Judy's home to anyone!

Cet appartement est charmant , d'une taille et d'une disposition remarquable, très bien équipé et remarquablement situé (commerces, métro, lieux de promenade). Judy est une hôtesse prévenante, conviviale, disposée à vous rendre le séjour agréable et sans soucis. Clairement, pour un prochain séjour à Brooklyn, nous y reviendrons.

Judy’s spacious lovely apartment was great for visiting our daughter in Brooklyn. Great location with access to everything we needed. Check in was very low stress. We would definitely consider staying here for future visits.
Awesome location and great host!  Even tipped us off to a local happening (although we were too tired to make it out)!
Great apartment for two. Nicely appointed. Great location. Calm, welcoming place to stay in the heart of it all.

Well located spacious apartment with a very comfortable bed. Good appliances including dishwasher, washer and drier. Although in a busy area, there was very little noise in the apartment. Communication with Judy was easy and check in and out went smoothly. Very convenient for Atlantic Avenue and the Boerum Hill neighbourhood with its local shops and restaurants, as well as for several subway lines into Manhattan.

Judy's place is clean, comfortable and spacious with a well equipped kitchen and bathroom. Located in a great neighbourhood that is centrally located and convenient to abundant grocery, shopping and restaurant options, all within easy walking distance. The closest subway station is a two minute walk away and gets you into Manhattan quickly and easily. Overall the apartment surpassed our expectations and we hope to return again soon.

Heerlijk appartement in Brooklyn, met veel extra voorzieningen. Perfecte ligging, metro om de hoek, heerlijk restaurants, rustig qua geluid. Een rustpunt na een dag in drukte van Manhattan. Voelde als thuis zijn! Aanrader!
Absolutely the best AirBnB ever.
Judy’s place was even more beautiful than it looked in the pictures — she was super helpful at every step and we would definitely return! Highly recommend.
Great place to stay!
Roomy apartment,  nicely appointed.  Easy walk to lots of subway lines make getting around easy.
Judy’s apartment was a beautiful and quiet space. It is a baby/toddler friendly apartment. We will definitely look into this space the next time we travel to NYC.

Idéal pour découvrir NY. L’appartement de Judy est spacieux et calme. Brooklyn est un quartier calme avec plein de restaurants. Proche du métro, c’est idéal pour découvrir Manhattan... Merci Judy pour sa disponibilité et son accueil.

Very nice spatious appartment. Very quiet on a side street of a busy Avenue (Atlantic). Windows on the front side with double glazing isolate very well from the noise. The back side is on a garden witch is very quiet. Judy is great. She is very helpful. Helped us kindly when we needed an adaptor. Fixed a problem with a smoke detector immediately. Gave us some good tips. Our daughter slept in the small bedroom next to the appartment. It was very convenient. The appartment is well equipped and clean. The big bed was very comfortable. Metro to Manhattan is not far away, about 20 min walk. The area of the appartment in Brooklyn is nice. Lots of shops and some restaurants.
Great place very accessible. Just very friendly. Loved the late check out.

Fantastic apartment! Spacious, high ceilings, comfortable, nice furnishings, comfortable bed, well appointed, bright, clean, and cheerful. It was an all around wonderful experience. Communication with Judy was perfect. It's located so close to everything, yet still very quiet thanks to the double windows on the street side. And in the evenings you can open up windows in the front and the back and get a great breeze through the apartment. It was 90 degrees when we visited, and we didn't even need to turn on the AC. (And Judy was even so kind as to check in on us and make sure the apartment was comfortably cool on the hottest days - much appreciated!).
And a HUGE bonus to have a washer and dryer in the unit! We hope to be back again!
Judy was quick to respond and offer assistance. I booked the place for my parents visiting town for a week and they had an incredible time. Judy space is clean and convenient. Would recommend!
Excellent location! Very comfortable bed, clean space and great communication.

The apartment at 82 Bond was just right for us-  and exactly as advertised. Excellent location near Atlantic Ave in the heart of Boerum Hill.  The place was roomy for NY and easily accommodated us for 4 nights.   It was nice to have the extra small bedroom to use as a luggage storer, and extra crash pad when my son showed up.  The building is quiet and the apartment itself was well furnished and clean.  It was a super hot weekend in NYC, so the A/C wa working overtime, but Sasha brought down a dehumidifier to help.   Kitchen and bathroom were spacious and had all the essentials.    Judy was so nice to provide us some local tips, and restaurants nearby.   Building on Bond is a great place for coffee a block away, and the Brooklyn Fare market is right around the corner- very good selections of everything.    We would stay again for sure. Thank you !

Great place to stay at and would definitely come back. Great location close to  restaurants and subways but still quiet _ Bed was very comfortable and the shower was great.  Judy is an exceptional host who was really helpful with advice on local places, best way to get to airport and even where to watch the World Cup!   Strongly recommended

Nice space, Great location, close to all subway lines.  Very helpful owners. No coffee pot only a french press! Coffee houses close by. Cooking pots and pans and utensils need upgrading. But if you don't plan on eating in this unit is great. Very quiet and AC is a plus.

The apartment is great; clean and comfortable. There is an airco and ceiling ventilator which was really necessary during the hot days in July. The beds were good and comfortable. Enough towels and in the kitchen all kinds of basics, like oil, tea, sucre etc. It was like coming home after a long day in the city. Area is quiet and enough restaurants, shops and take a ways in case you do not want to go to the "big city" in the evening. We loved our stay!

This place is amazing! The space is beautiful and super close to everything. The subway is right around the corner. We ended up using the city bikes that were down the street almost everyday! Super clean and bright space. Will be back!

We stayed here for a few nights while visiting relative, who also live in Brooklyn. The place is great, although up a flight of stairs. Check in was easy, communication with our hosts was smooth. Easy few minute walk to a couple of nearby subway stops, stores, restaurants. I’d recommend it.

We stayed at Judy's place for 6 nights to attend our niece's wedding in August.  The  weather was in the 90s and the window air-condioning unit  was not working well.  We tried to stay away as much as possible to avoid the heat, but nights were miserable.  Judy kindly went out and bought a fan for which helped a little.  Apartment was generally acceptable otherwise, but not outstanding.

Geat stay! Judy's and Alex's apartment was the best (as far as I'm concerned) because of: location (subway, stores, dinners, ...), design, appliancy, ...
Judy and Alex were charming and attentive hosts.
It was the second time we'd been staying at Judy's and Alex's place. In French we say: " Jamais deux sans trois".....
Lovely apartment and great location. Loved re-discovering NYC from Brooklyn!
Judy’s apartment is beautiful and comfortable, and she was very gracious and helpful.

The Boerum Hill flat was exactly what I needed for a week in Brooklyn. The space was EXTREMELY clean and the location could not be beat. The neighborhood is darling and very central to multiple subway lines and citibike docking stations. The flat was much better value than a hotel room for the same price. Judy was super helpful with questions I had, along with fast communication. Thank you!

This apartment is in a great friendly location in Brooklyn with good transport links to Manhattan.
The property was clean, with a comfy bed, fully equipped a great shower.
We will definitely book again.
C and J Chichester England

I would not recommend staying here. The neighborhood is a bit hurting, and the restaurants are not appealing.  The place is spacious and clean, but the decor could use an upgrade.  It is close to the subway, which is good....because quite frankly, you won’t be wanting to spend any time in Boerum Hill
Impecable para estar en brooklyn

We stayed at Judy’s place over the thanksgiving holiday and hosted thanksgiving dinner for 6 adults and 2 children while there.   The apartment is very comfortable, great bed, updated bathroom with great shower/tub and updated kitchen.   Located in a wonderful neighborhood in Brooklyn with easy access to lots of restaurants and shops.   And while the bedroom faces the street the windows were doubled for soundproof and we found it very quiet for New York.  We highly recommend the Judy’s place.

Great place.  I travel very often for work and love this place.  Comfy bed and couch,  clean apartment with lots of space.  Hosts are lovely and there if you need anything but are respectful if you want your space. Everything was accurate to it's description. Highly recommend.

We had a fantastic stay at Judy’s apartment. The apartment is well furnished, cosy and warm. Check in was easy and Judy had some great advice for local places to eat which are only a short walk away. There is also a small grocery store nearby which had everything we needed. Easy access to subway. Would love to stay here again.
Absolutely as described: perfectly equipped apartment, great bed, fabulous location. Quick and easy communication and check-in. Definitely would stay there again

What a great time in Brooklyn! The apt is located in a beautiful and extremely quite neighborhood with grocery stores, restaurants, subway, etc all nearby (Downtown Manhattan just 10 minutes via subway).

Judy & Alex are great hosts!

Would love to stay at their apt again some time.
Thanks for hosting us! We had a great time and really enjoyed the location.

We had an excellent stay at Judy's place. She is very responsive and had great recommendations for neighborhood joints. The apartment itself is very comfortable and just a short walk from the A & C lines. We would not hesitate to stay here again and recommend it to others.
Amazing place loved it, and with all the facilities needed
Great place in a great location.

Judy's place is in a great location, just off Atlantic Ave near downtown Brooklyn and a few minutes walk from a ton of subway lines. The bed was super comfy, the kitchen extra nice, and the whole process very simple and uncomplicated. Thanks Judy!

summary: We're a couple of spanish people and we want to share our beautiful apartment with nice people visiting the incredible Barcelona. The apartment is quiet even being in the heart of this plenty of life quarter.
space: We're friendly pleople, who loves to travel and like to meet travellers and different cultures. The apartment is very confortable, nice and quiet.
description: We're a couple of spanish people and we want to share our beautiful apartment with nice people visiting the incredible Barcelona. The apartment is quiet even being in the heart of this plenty of life quarter. We're friendly pleople, who loves to travel and like to meet travellers and different cultures. The apartment is very confortable, nice and quiet. 1 bathroom The kitchen is not available (it's only for private use) We´ll be available in case you need any advice about visiting Barcelona, we can help to plan your visits if you want to. Gracia is one of the most young, colorful and alive quarters in Barcelona. Plenty of restaurants, small local shops, nice (Website hidden by Airbnb) the same time, this place still maintain the taste of a village inside the big city.  We live in the most important and beautiful street in Gracia, Verdi, one minute walking from the emblematic Cines Verdi Our flat is 5 minutes to Fontana L3 and 5 minutes to Joanic L4, 10 minutes walking to Passeig de Gra
neighborhood_overview: Gracia is one of the most young, colorful and alive quarters in Barcelona. Plenty of restaurants, small local shops, nice (Website hidden by Airbnb) the same time, this place still maintain the taste of a village inside the big city.  We live in the most important and beautiful street in Gracia, Verdi, one minute walking from the emblematic Cines Verdi
notes: We speak español, english, français, catalá, euskera and a little bit of Indonesian :)
transit: Our flat is 5 minutes to Fontana L3 and 5 minutes to Joanic L4, 10 minutes walking to Passeig de Gracia, 15 min. walking to Sagrada Familia, and 15 minutes walking to Park Güell.
access: 1 bathroom The kitchen is not available (it's only for private use)
interaction: We´ll be available in case you need any advice about visiting Barcelona, we can help to plan your visits if you want to.
house_rules: We look for calm and respectful people, frienly and clean.

name: 2 Bdrm/2 Bath  Family Suite Ocean View
summary: This breathtaking 180 degree view of Waikiki is one of a kind. You will never forget staying in this family suite. Ideal for families, wedding parties, and large groups. Very large family suite with 1300 sf, 2 private balconies, 2 bedrooms, 2 full baths, dining room, living room, TV, free Wi-Fi,  free parking and full kitchen.  Great views of Waikiki Beach and the sunsets.  Watch the dolphins and whales from your balcony.  Watch the Friday night fireworks from lanai  7:45 PM by Hilton Village.
space: NOTICE DATED JAN. 4, 2019 - EFFECTIVE FEB 4 TO JUNE 30, 2019 THE POOL DECK WILL BE CLOSED for resurfacing. This condo  is in the middle of Waikiki, 1 block from the ocean and within walking distance of all your Waikiki Activities and sites to visit.  This is a large (1295 sf)  2-bedroom, 2-bath condo  facing directly at the ocean. Two large and separate balconies allow for outside dining and serenity.  This suite features a full-size kitchen, dining room, large living room with flat screen TV, wifi, sofa bed, free parking, 3 AC's and more. Bedroom #1 has 1 king size bed with a private balcony, Bedroom #2 has 1 queen size bed and 2 sofa-beds in the living room. Sleeps 8 in comfort with 2 full baths. The building features many amenities, including a pool and more.  The beach is 1 short block away. The condo is on busy Kuhio Ave where the bus and shuttles stop in front of the building, so a car is not necessary.  You can walk to the nearby shopping centers (Royal Hawaiian and Internationa
description: This breathtaking 180 degree view of Waikiki is one of a kind. You will never forget staying in this family suite. Ideal for families, wedding parties, and large groups. Very large family suite with (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) sf, 2 private balconies, 2 bedrooms, 2 full baths, dining room, living room, TV, free Wi-Fi,  free parking and full kitchen.  Great views of Waikiki Beach and the sunsets.  Watch the dolphins and whales from your balcony.  Watch the Friday night fireworks from lanai  7:45 PM by Hilton Village.
