The place is exactly as advertised. A tiny but comfortable place to stay in a great part of town. It's super close to Tsim Sha Tsui Station/East Tsim Sha Tsui Station, which gets you anywhere else you want to go.
hk房间都很小,这次住的算大的了｡房东每天都会来做卫生,房间干净整理的宜家风格｡住处离地铁站很近,两分钟就到｡周边步行就可以购物了｡房东人很nice,那天到的时候hk很热,房东已经先把房间的空调打开了｡还准备了零食水果｡离开的时候,还为我们准备了水｡
龙小姐人超级好,到巴士站接我们去公寓,而且还贴心的准备了纯净水小食还有水果｡公寓小巧而干净,地理位置非常好,走路几分钟就是尖东尖沙咀地铁站｡走的时候还送了小熊饼干作为礼物,下次来HK还会选择入住,多谢
Chic but clean. Water, snacks prepared. Max two ppl. Very near to MRT.

Michelle was an awesome host. She was easy to communicate with and always replied to messages promptly. She was there to meet us both times that we stayed with her and went above and beyond to make our stays comfortable. The apartment is smallish but is to be expected in HK. Plus with so much to do in HK, you'll hardly be home anyway! The location is great and close to East TST and TST MTR stations, making it easy to get around to other areas. It is close to the heart of TST with great food and shopping options within walking distance. I would definitely recommend Michelle's apartment!
Michelle人超级好,特别幸运可以连着两天都选到这个房子!房子地理位置很好,就在尖沙咀地铁站对面,市中心的位置｡房子很棒的就是干净又舒适,各种设备都很齐全,而且Michelle为我们准备了水果还有一些零食｡很棒的一次住宿,如果有机会,下次还要选这里!
Small but cozy apartment:) the host is so nice!! She prepared fruits and tidbits for us which makes us feel like at home:) location is also great! 1min walk to TST MTR with a lot good food nearby.
Michelle的回覆很快速,我們抵達時找不到地方,她馬上過來接我們,很親切｡到了房間,她已經將冷氣打開,冰箱也準備了飲料｡雖然我們中間有一天去其他地方玩,沒有住在她那裡,但她把鑰匙交給我們,還讓我們把行李放在房內,隔天回來冰箱裡有好吃的櫻桃,感覺很窩心｡房間靠近地鐵站,很方便｡

I traveled with my family, 3 adults and a toddler. Our stay with Michelle & May was enjoyable and hassle-free. Michelle assisted us in every way, from fetching us from Hyatt Regency Hotel (since we took the free ride from Airport Express), printing out vouchers, answering all our requests and queries and providing us complimentary fruits and drinks. She also gave my 3-year old daughter Mrs. Fields cookies as an advanced birthday gift! The location is accessible to TST MTR, 7 eleven, restos and shopping centers. We will definitely go back! 
❤
We had a wonderful stay and Michelle was a great host!
因为看BigBang演唱会所以有缘住进姐姐的房子 虽然只住了一晚但是感觉很温馨 房子虽小 但是五脏俱全 姐姐非常贴心 来地铁口接我们 又教我们怎么坐车去亚洲博览馆 还为我们准备了饮料和水果 房子很干净 床也很舒服 下次来香港旅游还会住姐姐的房子哈

It was a really great experience staying with Michelle and May! May came down to pick us up even though it was really late at night and brought us to the apartment. And gave us a brief introduction of the room and where certain items can be found. Room is small (as is all HK apartments) but that's fine cause it's pretty cosy for two. The toilet is cramp (again, because HK) but you would have everything you need inside. They also prepared for us drinks and fruits which was a great surprise and well appreciated gesture. There were cutleries, plates, cups, etc. Really weren't lacking in anything during our stay. Definitely no regrets staying at Michelle and May's.

Michelle was so great to us : she has wait until midnight because we had a late flight! 
The apartment is great. Very very small (only for 2 people) but perfect if you want to visit the city. The neighborhood is very central near to the subway station. 
The AC is working perfectly and the flat is clean and comfort. Actually it's a room but very smart accommodation. Don't hesitate !!

Michelle&May are very kind.
I arrived at 2:30A.M but she waited us.  They prepare drinks,chocolate and fruit. The room is near station. It 's very prefect and near K11, seven eleven. They are very fantastic. I had some problem I asked them They answered very fast. May first time, the room is small but here is HK. Location is good. I thank you Michelle & May~ 
Here is near Harbour  city and ferry station, pizzaExpress and Jenny Bakery. If you buy many things You can go home~ It's good. Shopping is very tired.  And Micelle&May live near maybe? If you want to them you can meet them They change towels everyday.
방은 좀 작지만 그것도 홍콩의 매력인 것 같아요.위치가 지하철 근처라 이동이 매우 쉽고 짐이 많으면 집에 가서 놔두고 갔다올수 있고 근처에 많은 가게와 공원 선착장이 있어서 좋습니다 호스트도 친절하고 가까이에 있어서 필요할때 금새 오는 것도좋습니다. 수건도 매일 바꿔줘요 집에 하루에 한번씩 와서 쓰레기랑 수건을 갈아주고 가요~ 

Lovely Micelle &May I hope to meet again!!!!
michelle人超级好,告诉我们怎么去她家还来车站接我们,把所有细节都交代的很清楚,香港真的是寸土寸金,房间很小但真的什么都准备的很齐全,而且很干净很漂亮,冰箱里还准备了水果和饮料,地段非常好,去哪里都很方便,我们是晚上的飞机还帮我们寄存了一下行李,真的很赞
位置很好,坐车,地铁还有机场快线都很方便,房主人很好很耐心｡
房东善良热情,回复十分及时｡房间如图所示,干净整洁,麻雀虽小五脏俱全,沙发可以铺下来变成沙发床,冰箱里有水果和饮料,还备了零食｡房间的地理位置相当好,离地铁很近,周边有许多美食｡

여자 세 명이서 4박5일 지냈습니다.
사이즈나 공간을 봤을땐, 2인이 사용하기에 적당합니다.
셋이서 사용하기엔 너무 작습니다.
셋이 모여서 맥주 한 잔 하기 힘듭니다.
탁자가 없습니다.
결국, 접이식 침대 펼쳐놓고 앉아서 맥주 마셨네요.
해어드라이기,우산,멀티어댑터,TV 있어요.
화장실 매우 작아요.
아파트의 위치 좋아요.
방음 안돼요.
에어컨끄면 옆방 소리 다 들리고요.(물 내리는 소리까지 다 들림)
차라리 에어컨키고 실외기 돌아가는 소리가 났다 싶어서 에어컨 늘 키고 잤어요.
wifi 있으나 굉장히 느려서 안썼습니다.
호스트가 하루에 한 번씩 수건 놓고 가고, 쓰레기통만 비워 줍니다.(수건 1인당 1개) 
청소 안해줍니다.
접이식 침대가 하나 있었으나 너무 불편했어요. 허리랑 어깨 너무 아파요...
침대 시트지에 음식물 묻었는데 이건 안갈아줍니다.

가격대비 괜찮은 것 같아요.
에어비엔비 처음 사용후기였습니다!

Michelle was fantastic in coming to pick us up at the subway station and guiding us to the apartment. The place is small (as to be expected in HK) but cosy and is very comfortable for two. The area was very convenient to travel anywhere in HK and not at all loud at night.

It was my first trip to hong kong with my friend and both of us are girls so we had some concerns if the area is safe or not if going back home late night . But everything was fine and i couldn't be any happier . It was so convenient for us to get around and the room is exactly how Michelle described it. And there is a halal kebab restaurant just few roads away so its very convenient for muslim traveller .7-11,supermarket,jennys bakery and money changer(good rates at chungking house) are all near by . Michelle was also very kind for offering to change towels and clean the room . I highly recommend this place

Michelle contacted me every single time very instantly, which made my arrangment effective. Besides, she's very kind and flexible. Thanks to her apartment, my trip was very successful and wonderful in HK.

The place was clean and the host is very nice. She gave us clear directions to find the room and went to fetch us at the bus stop, making the check in very easy. She was always very quick to answer our questions. The room was tiny but well arranged and we had everything we needed. We had a great stay in Kowloon.

Michelle was a great host. Met me at the metro station and personally showed me to the unit. She was very quick to respond to questions via e-mail. The unit is perfect for a short stay. Thanks to Michelle!!

Two thumbs up for the host Michelle very accommodating and will go out of her way to assist you.  will definitely booked with her again. The area is very accessible to transportation and shopping area.
Very nice
很好的体验
Very convenient place, and warm welcome host, great memory.

交通相当便捷,出了地铁口走一条街就是了｡地段很好,附近有很多餐馆,距离龙城大药房和珍妮小熊曲奇店也很近,走到维港也只要十几分钟｡房间很干净,设施齐全,有吹风机,牙刷牙膏,香波和沐浴乳,毛巾｡冰箱内还有水果和饮料｡热水器加热很快,空调制冷也够给力｡但是电视的信号有点差,不知道是什么原因一晚上也只能翻到两三个台,由于都是粤语,所以看得不是很懂｡(ฅฅ*)但是,网速真的够给力~无线网络万岁\(≧▽≦)/
地理位置非常棒,Michelle非常好,房间很干净

Michelle was very helpful.  She waited for us at the bus stop and show us the way.  The room is tiny but it got everything you need. The room is only 1 min away from MTR station and plenty of restaurants at the corner.
The place looks exactly the same as the photos, the location is fantastic, very easy to find and there are few shopping malls nearby!

Communication is not a problem since day one. She's very responsive and attentive to our needs. The place is nice and well. It is 2 minutes walk to the station. She allowed us to check in early. And check out late. She even  helped us with our needs. 

The place is exactly as described. Clean, comfortable and relaxing. The fridge was stocked with something to drink and eat. 

All in all, we had a great time during our short stay in HK. Great host shes amazing and generous!
负责任的好房东!当天赶上尖沙咀水管爆裂,整栋楼停水,房东一直在楼下等我们带我们去宾馆洗澡,为房东的负责点个赞,另外房间在香港来说算大的了,这个价格真不贵

Apartment was just as described, it's small but perfect for a short stay and in a very good neighbourhood for exploring the city. It was clean and had everything I needed.

Michelle was very accomodating and picked me up at the bus stop and helped me with check in although I arrived early in the morning.
The room was clean, Michelle is very helpful and the communication was good. The local is very good, safe, near shoppings, restaurants, good stores, metro station, bus station. Recommended!
謝謝房東帶給我的便利,讓我在香港度過了完美的一天,下次再來還會住這裡｡房子很乾淨,細節部分也非常好,房東是個很用心的人｡交通便利,樓下就是地鐵站,買東西也很方便｡完美^_^
Michelle was definitely a great host. She made sure that we got all that we needed and she made us very comfortable with the entire time we were in HK. The apt was clean and secured.  Two thumbs up!
地理位置十分方便,房间确实不大,但是很干净｡
Small but very functional. Accessible to MTR, grocery, etc. Michelle is a great and thoughtful host!
干净整洁,房间虽小,但非常齐全｡楼下对面就是地铁和7-11,K11,超级方便｡走路到维港,重庆大厦都很近,15-20分钟左右｡Michelle很nice,很耐心回复快,虽然没见到面,但是感觉很好｡因为出发前的小插曲,晚到一天,浪费了一天住宿,Michelle非常理解的给了优惠,感谢!
Perfect location for tourist, a bit tinny like any others properties in HK but it's pretty good size for couple like us, host is extremely responsible and friendly, will definitely come back!
地段地段地段,重要的事说三遍｡房间本身不大,适合最多两位住,但是出门就是地铁站,非常方便｡房主有问必答,很好沟通,不悔的选择

May met us outside our apartment for check in so we had no trouble finding the place, she was friendly and responded quickly to any questions. A great host.

The place is functional, nothing special but it is clean and has everything you need within a good central location. Everything we needed was within walking distance.

AC works well, bed is slightly hard but not too bad.

Would recommend staying here.
離地鐵很近 房間小而美

Michelles apartement was very small, but nevertheless perfect for two people for a few nights. Everything we needed was there and the bed felt comfy. Very good for an Asian city apartement. Location and communication with Michelle was just perfect!!
房東人很好,房間交通便利,上下樓梯經常遇到一些南亞裔人,有些害怕!房間隔音有點差,鄰居開關門都能聽見!床上用品有些污渍,這個價格來說,性價比已經很好了!

The location is really good as its close to MTR and easy walk to many shopping districts and restaurants. 

This apt is really really small so its only suitable for 2 people who don't mind changing in the presence of each other. The bathroom is really tiny and there's no partition between shower and toilet area so the bathroom floor gets wet and makes changing in it impossible. Wouldn't recommend if one is of a bigger size. 

Other than the size, I can't fault this place. Its clean and has most of the things we need for our 3 day stay.

Michelle is really quick in responding to our queries and very helpful.

地哩位置真的超棒!凌晨一点多也有大巴可以坐过来,出门就是热闹的尖沙咀,离买买买的龙城大药房也只有一公里左右,吃的逛的一应俱全,旁边还有兰芳园丝袜奶茶分店,推荐超好喝口感浓郁!最重要的是房东姐姐人超好诶,我们飞机很晚到凌晨三点才check in,她很nice的不辞辛苦等我们来带我们check in!非常感谢这样的好房东!房间也是一级棒和图片描述一模一样~麻雀虽小五脏俱全,住的两天非常舒服开心,性价比无敌!下次去香港一定还会订的,强烈推荐哦

Apartment is conveniently located at East Tsim Sha Tsui. It was small but very clean and with nice interior. Just 2minutes walk to MTR if you want to explore the city. From the airport, you can take the A21 bus to Mody Road or take the airport express train to Kowloon and catch the free shuttle bus to Hyatt Hotel. It was just 3minutes walk to Michelle's place. Highly recommended. Thank you again Michelle for being so accommodating :)
This is the second time I have lived here. I'm very glad that Michelle still remember me, and prepared the fruit for me, so sweet. I like to live here,warm,clean and tidy room.

We've been in Hong Kong for several times already and by far, Michelle's place is the best we've stayed at. Everything we needed was right there, we even had some extra special treats from Michelle. Communication was superb and easy. The location is in a quiet place and near the MTR station, malls, groceries and restaurants. The description and photos on this listing is totally accurate. I look forward to staying here again. I 101% will recommend Michelle's place to anyone visiting Hong Kong, short term or long term and you'll have the best, hassle-free vacation/trip.

Sehr schöne Unterkunft direkt in der Innenstadt. Sieht alles genau so aus wie auf den Fotos in der Beschreibung. Jedoch wurde uns erst vor Ort so richtig bewusst, wie eng die Lebensräume und Wohnungen in Hong Kong sind. Für uns als paar war das Bett zu klein und kurz, weshalb wir das Sofa zusätzlich ausgezogen haben.
Zwei Minuten Fußweg entfernt ist eine U-Bahnstation. Vom Flughafen kommt man problemlos mit dem Bus zur Unterkunft. Michelle hat uns von der Haltestelle abgeholt. 
In näherer Umgebung gibt es mehrere Supermärkte und Shopping Center sowie Restaurants.
Michelle ist sehr nett und antwortet sehr schnell auf Nachrichten.
Wir fanden es sehr schön und können die Unterkunft weiterempfehlen.
Nice stay.
房子位置很好,房东人很热情!下次去香港还会住这里!
Very helpful host, super convenient to where you need to go and easily accessible to shops around you.

非常感谢提供这么棒的居住体验,地处繁华地带,交通非常方便,步行可以把半岛逛遍,吃喝玩乐就近完成｡地铁就在楼下,真心感到便捷｡
房间小巧玲珑,五脏俱全,非常精致,期待下次再来入住｡

The place was very clean and tidy, and everything was as advertised. May and Michelle were very quick with inquiries and were very helpful. The only drawbacks were the bed was too hard the neighbours were a bit too noisy.

Great host and good location, close to subway

Bed is too firm for our liking and neighboring apartments can be noisy into the night
X

Michelle is very responsive since the first time I communicated with her. Her apartment is clean and perfectly located in the middle of Tsim sha tsui. It only takes about 1 minutes to Tsim sha tsui MTR exit N1 or P3 and the garden of stars is only about 2 min walks across the street.
Michelle was also very helpful as when we had problem in the room, she immediately came to help us.
She also provided us with some snacks and fruits upon arrival. There were also some bathroom amenities ready.
I would definately suggest it to anyone coming to Hong Kong. Thanks Michelle and May.
位置很好,适合我这种路痴,到现在我依然没有搞清楚方向,但是房东姐姐的一句“如果找不到路就从地铁里走很容易找到”这句话真是受益匪浅,接下来的日子用地铁通道四通八达 (Hidden by Airbnb) 都不会错｡房东姐姐的特别棒,她讲的每一句话都有用,使我的旅行生活得到很多益处｡姐姐对我的帮助一句两句都讲不完｡感谢老天爷让我遇到这个家｡

Michelle's apartment is as described.  Location is great!  Close to MTR station and 7Eleven across the street.  It's small so good for one, maximum two people. Michelle is very responsive and accommodating with the check in time.

We stayed here for  2 nights, then for another 3 nights one week later. We met  May  on our 2nd visit. Both girls  were very helpful with great  communication.  The apartment is  tiny, and as my husband is  a large man, he had trouble  squeezing into the  bathroom. The shower is right in front of the  toilet, so the whole  bathroom  gets wet when showering.  Apartment is very close to N1 and P3 MTR exits of Tsim Sha Tsui station. 7 eleven, shopping and restaurants  all within walking distance. Good WiFi. The bed is very hard, but not as hard as some others in China.
The house was very near to East TST station exit n1. Compared to other expensive 3or 4 star hotels, I strongly recommend this place. The host can use good English and welcomes visitors very kindly.
Lovely apartment with everything you need and very well located. Exactly as described. Hosts are also very helpful if assistance needed from them
Michelle's apartment is very nice, clean, tidy. Great location with walking distance to Metro, shopping and everything. Highly recommend.
Their place is nearby mrt

Highly recommend! Very comfortable and great stay! We had a great stay in May's accommodation! Near train station, just few minutes walk, dotondori and shinsaibashi also in walking distance 10-20mins. Surely will come back again!!

This was a great apartment to be walking distance to everything in HK. We liked the idea of "living like a local" and going around Kowloon area. The host messaged immediately, so we are glad she was so helpful for our stay. Even though it was small (which is normal for HK), it felt very comfortable and all we needed for a short stay. Highly recommend for being downtown!
Clean & cozy, fit perfectly for budgeted travellers. The host is kind & very friendly :) Plenty choices of restaurants, cafés, bars, & bakeries nearby :) very close to MRT station
Clean & cozy, fit perfectly for budgeted travellers. Plenty choices of restaurants, cafés, bakeries, & bistros. Located very near to MRT station :)
房屋地点就在K11隔壁,离尖东N1跟P3出口都很近,从机场乘坐A21基本在1小时内能到达,附近的赫德道上面都是酒吧,晚上很热闹,还有华记小食､发记甜品!总的来说入住体验很好,交通便利,吃饭便利!

Very nice place in Kowloon, perfect size for two people, very well-stocked, and convenient location a short walk from both Tsim Sha Tsui MTR stations. Michelle was very helpful and communicative during the check-in process and accommodated my request for a slightly earlier check-in time. Would love to stay here again next time.
离主要购物区都很近,旁边就是k11｡体验了香港百姓的居住环境｡房东人很好,当晚飞机延误一直在等我们来…
离地铁很近,房子安静整洁,房东也很好,值得再去
位置很好,房间干净,房东人很nice,很耐心的告诉我们路线,还帮我们寄存行李,性价比很高的房子,感谢｡

I decided to leave the place upon check in and find a hotel instead. It was worth the 100% fee. The place is extremely small and the amenities are not in good condition. The aircon is too noisy and the shower so small you have to sit on the toilet chair to shower. The location is great close to Tsim Tsa Sui.  Michelle is friendly but the place was not what I expected. It was cheep though although I didn't stay there.
位置离尖沙咀繁华地带属于可以步行到达,房间基本就是照片的大小,厕所只容一人出入｡房东超好,服务周到,联系方便｡厨房不适合做饭开火｡
房东姐姐人非常的好 还给我门准备了好吃的和水 房间卫生很干净 地理位置也很方便
非常棒的公寓~姐姐人超好还给我们推荐了好吃的!如果有机会再来还会住!地理位置非常好!
房东人很好说话,回复也非常及时,下次还会来的
Michelle is very nice and friendly,the apartment is close to K11 and other market. It's a good choose to order it.
房东超级好｡我们飞机晚点 她一直等到我们凌晨两点｡跟我们交接 住宿空间虽然小 但是东西齐全 适合小情侣入住
整体来说还是很好的,靠近地铁站,附近也有便利店,比较满意的一次住宿

非常非常棒的入住体验｡从住宿位置来说,是绝对方便的,靠近尖东站,靠近海港城,还有很多大商场｡不过附近那个龙城大药房感觉也没传说中便宜和物品齐全｡啊言归正传,从入住体验来说,房东绝对是我见过最nice的了,因为不小心打算了花盆,她也没有跟我们计较｡并且很热情的指路,帮我们保管行李,真的特别特别感谢!房间里面的设施也是相当齐全的,可以说麻雀虽小五脏俱全,而且都是牌子货呢!总之,真的住的真的很开心啦,以后到香港还会再来住的!
房东阿姨人又漂亮又nice 来的时候下大雨 她还来接我们去住的地方 感动 第一天洗澡的下水道堵了第二天师傅就来修好啦 还有哦 住的地方离地铁站只有一分钟都不到的路程 附近还有7-11 翠华和一兰拉面 这些都是来香港必打卡的地方啊!再过去一点是k11大型购物中心 这么繁华的地段在香港这样寸土寸金的大城市只要这些住宿费 真的超值啊!!!!我爱这个房子我也爱房东阿姨 下次来香港我一定还会住这里的!
房东人很好 给了我们很多帮助 在房间准备了零食和水果 而且住的地方交通很方便 下楼就是地铁口 床很舒服 房间也很安静
房东超级好,给我们买了樱桃,水和牛奶,房间虽然小,但是来之前已经做好心理准备,所以感觉还不错!地理位置超方便,路痴也能轻松找到路!除了空调和热水器,其他都特别好!还会再来!
房东姐姐人很热情,准备了水果,房子地理位置也很方便,离地铁站很近｡房子虽然比较小,但是东西都很齐全｡点赞噢棒棒
great host! will surely stay at her place for the 3rd time :)
The location is pretty nice and okay clean. However, the room isnt so spacey(can't complain since it's hk). Recommended for one person to live in, two would be kinda crowded

The apartment is in a fantastic location, handy to the subway, near lots of restaurants, and not far from the sea. The hosts were really friendly and extremely helpful. The apartment, whilst tiny, had everything I needed except for one thing......... a suitable bed. The bed is not good for a normal-size adult Westerner – it’s too short (I had to sleep diagonally) and it’s rock hard. But apart from that it’s an excellent place to stay.
超级nice的房东 下次来还要住啦!多次因为自己的失误而麻烦房东也是够不好意思的了不过房东姐姐超级好 很耐心 很开心这次入住

Michelle is very responsive on every queries that I have. She is very helpful. She even welcomes us with fruits and drinks. 

The place is nice with the decoration. Although the comfort room is small and the shower and toilet are placed in one. The floor is wet because of that. Probably it is the layout of the apartment.

But nonetheless, the location of the apartment is very accessible to shops and mtr. Well to almost everything. Walk away :) 

Thank you again. We will recommend this to our friends and relatives :)
房间设施很齐全,住了两晚很喜欢｡要不是之后的时间已经被其他游客提前预定了的话会一直住在这里｡May和Michelle人都特别特别好,刚好遇到台风又遇到退房各种不方便,他们给了我们很多帮助真的是很感谢!
房源很好,性价比很高,离海港城,海边,崇光非常近,离地铁站也只有一分钟的路程｡住宿体验也非常棒｡房东很热情,不仅仅是在住宿方面,问房东一些关于香港天气什么的都会热情帮我们解答｡我想如果下次来香港,还是会首选Michelle的房子
Michelle是个非常热心的房东,每次发她信息总能得到及时的回复｡入住期间得到了很好的照顾,衣服纽扣松了借了针线,身体不舒服时又借了体温计｡房间地理位置特别好,走路去弥敦道差不多5分钟,就在尖沙咀中心地带,吃饭购物都非常方便｡下次去香港还会住这里,强烈推荐这间民宿哦~
房间清洁不错,交通也爽爆了~性价比很高,房东太太很好人~

A great place to live like a local in the heart of Hong Kong.
Maybe a little small but worth it.
房东姐姐超客气的,送了水和水果｡不会告诉你,我就是因为看评论说有送才心动过来住住看的｡房间很好｡三把钥匙安全措施｡哈哈哈哈｡转化插头什么的,不需要带,房间里有一个｡
房间虽不大,不过很干净,而且房东人很好,还给留了水果和饮料
房间就在地铁口外面,周围商场便利店应有尽有,房东人很好｡

We has a good time staying at Michelle and May's place in HKG - Michelle was extremely cooperative when I announced that we had to go back to Europe due to emergency hence I wanted to stay in the flat more hours than expected - wiating for our evening plane.
Now, the place is small - like really small - which it seems to be standard in HKG and it is fine then but it is still small.
The bed was a nightmare for me as it is super hard but again it is as per gues taste here I supposed so cannot improve anything on this one.

very noisy flat but again in HKG everything is so closed to each other that this is probably a normal standard here.
Flat was super clean and very nice decorated - cosy and light 

Thanks Ladies

Marie and Peter
房东非常nice!我们的航班抵达香港已经比较晚了,房东一直等待我们到达住处｡房间干净整洁,设施齐全,位置也很棒,距离重庆大厦很近,出门就有尖沙咀地铁站｡因为只是在香港中转,所以仅仅住了一个晚上,希望有机会再一次来到这里
房东姐姐超级好,有几次半夜咨询消息也是超及时回复的｡然后房间干净整洁,但是稍微有点小,｡不过地段是很不错的,就在尖沙咀站附近,出去游玩很方便｡对面还有7-11和一个超市,买泡面很方便啦!
美好的旅行,感谢房东的热心帮助,还有赠送水果!
非常满意~地理位置特别好,出行都很方便,周围很多餐厅,卓悦sasa重庆大厦海港城都很近｡房东给的建议都很有用~房间温馨,创非常舒服!以后到香港还住这里~
地段真的很棒,就在尖沙咀地铁站N1口,交通､购物非常方便,到晚上楼下吃的也很多｡房间很小,尤其是洗手间,仅容一人通过那种,水槽也超迷你,但是很干净,抽风系统很给力,洗澡的水气一晚上就干了｡房东非常nice,在房间里准备了饮用水､零食､拖鞋､衣架､洗浴用品,并且总是能及时回复信息,交接､指示､寄存行李,都给了最好的帮助｡
很好的房东,很好的房子｡
性价比很高的房子,不管大小还是舒适度都 very nice,地理位置也很棒,出门走5分钟就是尖沙咀地铁口,走一分钟就是尖东地铁口｡房东姐姐特别贴心,告诉我们许多安全小贴士｡

I was due to arrive around 10 AM and due to an engine failure during my incoming flight. I had to call Michelle at around 3 AM the day after to give me the keys. She was quick to arrive, nice and took the time to explain what i needed to know. Very nice host. The appartment is very well located close to MTR with grocery stores very close. I would just recommend a thicker matress because the bed can be hard. The water heater did not always produce hot water... But for the rest this is a fine placeront stay for max 2 with not many luggage.
地理位置好,房间虽然小但是设备还比较齐全,房东很负责
房东很热情,有问题都会马上及时解决,房子地理位置好,出门就是购物中心,地铁站,良心推荐
房东人很好,房间位置靠近地铁n1出口,对面就有7-11,而且离k11很近,出门右转过马路就到了,房东回信很快,有啥需要也尽可能满足,很不错
很好的一次住宿体验,房东很热情的告诉我们周围环境和路线,准备了饮料和水果

The place is what it really looks like in the picture and also the place is really clean. Good place to stay because there's a lot of shop to see just outside the building. MTR station is near. Everything is accessible

Michelle&May's place can never be better. It's smack near to the mtr's station. Even though the space is tiny and tight like all other spaces in hk, the layout of furnitures etc were well thought and everything you need will be provided for. Michelle was really accommodating and fetch me at the bus station and even gave me an hour late check out when time is tight on her side. Everything went on smoothly and I enjoyed my stay there and truly recommend this place for other visitors. Thanks once again :)
Michelle already provide everything
Stedet mindre enn forventet. Greit for 1 person
房子虽小,但比起其他家庭旅馆就算不错了,有家的感觉,门的隔音有点弱,外面开关门说话都听得很清楚,房东确实如别的评论一样准备了水果及小零食,但沟通的过程我感受不到别的评论讲到的热情,感觉特像香港的售货员,下次不会选择入住
很棒的房间 may很热情 谢谢!
It’s a miracle location! Very very convenient. Nice cafe and restaurant near by. It’s easy to access to 2 MTR stations. Hope I can stay there if I have a next chance to come to HK too.
房间比图片看起来小,但是很安静也很干净,就在尖沙咀地铁旁边,非常近,附近逛街购物都很方便,房东也很热情,唯一不好的是当时天气挺冷的,只有十多度,但是房东备的是薄被,我们晚上都没有脱衣服睡觉,紧紧地裹着薄薄的小被子｡
地理位置+性价比超级合适,出门地铁吃饭购物天星码头星光大道历史博物馆等人文景观也都可以步行到达｡房子很棒麻雀虽小 五脏俱全,设施齐全,房间干净整洁,可能是赶上圣诞节邻居都是半夜回来有些噪音,房主超级nice,回复都很及时走的时候还送了礼物,退房时又想起要去楼下买个东西结果耽误了1小时也然后我们继续将行李寄存真的很好｡会推荐其他人来港的时候选择入住这家~
房主人很nice,房间也很舒服,还贴心为我们准备了巧克力,很适合两个人住

Michelle and May are great hosts. They would meet you in person when you come to the place and show you where things are in the house. They are also very responsive to message. I forgot my usb wall adaptor during my visit, and they kindly let me borrow theirs. The place is small but as expected since it's HK. Great location. Walkable to MTR, shopping malls, and restaurants.
非常靠近地鐵站,31號倒數步行到維港也只需5-10分鐘｡房間雖然小,但需要的東西都有｡下次再去香港也會再住
交通很方便
Suberb location and host.. Very convenient place for staying in hk.. Will definitely book again ..

I had the best stay.
Very clean and clean room.
Small but everything was complete.
There were all the things of hope nearby.
It was close to the station and it was very easy to spend.

I will also choose here.
I also recommend it to my friends.

Thank you very much!
Mae and michelle are generous and a great host too. They're very accomodating. Nice room. Very clean and comfortable. Thanks again!
Very close to both 2 MTR stations in TST, very convenient transportation and good shopping and dining place! The host is very kind and the place is like home, clean and tidy! Love it very much!

온수 조절이 쉽지않고, 온수와 관련 보일러 시설 이외의 보일러 시설은 없습니다. 또 전자레인지가 청결하지 못했습니다. 침대가 조금 딱딱합니다.
하지만 호스트가 매우 친절해서 지내는 동안 안심이 되었습니다.
Good communication, many thanks for lending us your space!
房间还挺不错的,虽然稍微有点小,但日常用品全都有,房东还提供了好多小点心,非常贴心｡晚上也不会吵｡总之是一次不错的体验
帮妹妹订的,她说一切都很好
离地铁口很近,房东回复信息很迅速,感谢!
房东很热情,询问一些问题及时回答,很贴心的准备了水果还有水,环境很棒,很喜欢,楼下食物还有购物很方便,靠近地铁站,下次有机会来旅游还会作为首选

This place is on a very good location, close to all amenities at Kowloon side. There is a nice patisserie across the street. The bathroom is quite small but if you’re spending couple of days in HK and looking for a good location, this place is good.

Good spot, bigger bed and bathroom,
Nice hot shower

a) Host - Extremely helpful & response to messages was also very prompt!
She also gave excellent directions from airport to apartment & even recommended some "tea-houses" that only the locals know about.

b) Location - Situated in TST, with the nearest MTR Stn (TST East) just 1min away.

c) Room - Clean, with a small fridge, microwave & chest of drawers.
Bed is a double-bed & can fit 2 adults.
Air-con in room was working well & blasts ice-cold air! 
Host also brought in a brand-new sofa-bed, after knowing that my travel companion (my sister) feel uncomfortable sharing a same bed. This was very thoughtful of the host.

d) Room size - As expected in land scarce HK, it is small. However there is enough space within to put 2~3 suitcases & although space tight,.... 2 adults can easily manoeuvre within the room.

Overall - A clean room with strong air-con & is conveniently located in TST.
住:第一感觉干净干净干净!第二感觉贴心贴心贴心,体重秤､吹风机､棉签什么都有!行:地处尖沙咀,交通方便,马路对面地铁站､机场大巴A21,步行可达海港城､美丽华､重庆大厦等｡吃:一兰､稻香､冰室､日料､街头小吃眼花缭乱｡

Wonderful place, cozy and feels like home. There is a 7-11 and supermarket just across the street, perfect places to get snacks for supper at home. Short walking distance to the MTR, east tsim sha shui. On top of that, the host, Michelle, is a very friendly person. She looked for us and guided us to the accommodation without us requesting. Would come back again in future.

This place is in a great location with everything you need though the hot water heater was tricky and we couldn't make it work.  The hosts are super responsive and made check in very easy.  It's a great value for the price!
很好
This place is very close to transit and easy to get around. The apartment was exactly as described. Michelle was kind enough to accommodate our check-in and out needs. Highly recommended this place!

This is a great location.

I was met at the MTR station and showed to the place. They are very friendly. They always responded to any questions I had in under 15 minutes.

Pretty quiet at night despite being right in the centre of TST.
很方便,房东也很热情

Michelle  & May's place was very clean and tidy. It was easy to find and Michelle was very quick to respond to all of my questions. I mean in less than 15 minutes has a response even before I even booked my room with her.  She went out of her way to get an induction cooker for me and even went out to buy some body wash when she realised that there wasn't any in the bathroom. She has thoughtful touches such as drinks in the fridge and things that you may need such as chargers, hair dryer etc.  You have everything that you need for short stay in Hong Kong here. The only thing that I would mention is that the building is a bit noisy at night. If you're a very light sleeper like me then you might find difficult to sleep. However, this is completely out of the host's hands. Whatever Michelle could do to help me she did. She even allowed me to store my luggage after I checked out which was a massive help to me. I wholeheartedly recommend Michelle as a host!
谢谢May,在香港的四晚有一个比较温馨的小家可以休息｡地理位置很棒,去哪里､想做什么都很方便｡只有一点是隔音不强,因为就在繁华地带,夜晚可能有些声响｡谢谢
舒服干净舒适,地理位置好!
入住前有些小问题,都很好的帮忙解决了｡地理位置非常好,房间也不错,是一次愉快的旅程!
Very responsive and accommodating. Thanks!
Nice host!
Very kind hosts with a space in a great location
干净整洁,房东人很好,还准备了水果在冰箱
地理位置绝佳,尖东站p3出口一分钟内到达,逛街也非常方便,海港城等周边商业区步行可达,房间虽然不大,不过两人住还是可以的｡也谢谢房东的耐心回答和准备的零食｡总之,是下回来香港的第一选择,
特别喜欢,房东好客,名宿位置交通便利,房间干净舒服,下次来还住这
地理位置很好｡住的很舒服~很棒哦!

If I come back to HK, I will very likely stay here again. We were hesitant about staying in Kowloon because it is considered less fashionable than HK Island by some, but there were designer stores just 3 minutes walking away, a metro by the same distance, and we never felt unsafe. The only complaint I have is that it was at times noisy, so you might want to bring earplugs for sleeping. The space is small, but it seemed typical of HK apartment sizes and standards. It was a tight fit but a fit nonetheless. Michelle and May were really helpful with checkin and giving us recommendations and directions. The bakery across the street is delicious and there is a 7-Eleven up the street for snacks. There are lots of restaurants around, too. Definitely recommend!
房东特别热情周到,回复很快,房间也很干净整齐,地理位置优越,周围逛街很方便,交通也便利｡
很好的住所,周边有很多商场,两个人居住很舒服
Very nice and cozy room, had a comfortable stay there. They have plug converters, hair dryers and everything, very handy
Great place to stay and the hosts are awesome. Worth the money
房东人很好,还给我们准备了水和水果,房间非常干净,地理位置也很好,推荐入住
숙소 찾는게 좀 헷갈렸지만 그래도 너무 편하게 묵고 갑니다. 침대 수건 모두 청결했구요 . 에어컨도 시원하게 잘 사용하다 갑니다!!

The place is so near from garden of star n we can walk,, the toilet is so good bcoz there is tap in the closet even in the hotel is there is no tap so amazing bcoz i love clean ,, and the fasilities is complet , microwave can use good, refrigetator too.. So recommended n the most important is the host very wellcome n humble..
第一次用这个软件订房,房东很热情,每次询问都会在第一时间做出回答,房间很干净,位置也不错,交通很便捷,比较满意
The host canceled this reservation 104 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Very comfortable and convenient location. Also very helpful with any questions we had. Would definitely recommend to anyone visiting Hong Kong.
洗澡的地方能大一点

This place has a great location right in the thick of things. Checking in and communication was fast. I would say that the place is a bit small for two people or a long stay. The bed  can only accommodate up yo 6 feet. Also, couldn’t figure out how to get hot water in the shower. Overall, it is a decent economy option in the expensive hong kong, If location is your priority.
房间很可爱,有很多小细节,就像回家一样
非常感谢Michelle,非常贴心并且回复迅速,给大家几点小建议吧:1.注意同一栋大厦有几个入口,走错门就不对啦 2.床的长度差不多适合1米7左右的朋友,如果太高就只能弯腿睡啦,因为床一侧直接是墙壁~

Excellent location- just a 2-3 minute walk from the Tsim Sha Tsui station which easily connects to other lines if needed. Lots of places to eat and shop just steps away. Less than 10 mins walk to the Harbor. The apartment is small but very clean and perfect for 1-2 people, especially if you plan to be busy and explore a lot. 
May and Michelle were very quick to respond to messages and so sweet and helpful.
房間十分的乾淨舒適,位置也很方便,一出門就有地鐵出口,對面也有7-11跟惠康(23點才關門喔)附近更有很多餐廳跟酒吧,從早到宵夜都不怕沒東西可以吃,加上房價便宜,十分推薦大家來香港的時候可以居住這邊喔

Convenient location in TST and easy checkin process.

Note that the apartment is small and Hong Kong sized.

Suited for 2 people max and even then you will be bumping into each other. Standard for Hong Kong apartments.

Great place! Small but was expected due to reviews. Asked about possible early check-in, (and obviously only possible if previous guests also checked out early) and was pleasantly accommodated! Felt homey and was in a great location! 
Just a heads up, in order to save space, the shower does not have a separate tub or door. There is a curtain that separates the sink from the shower head and toilet. In other words, the toilet will get wet and the entire washroom floor will also get wet. It wasn't a bother for me though, just a notice.

Michelle & May were excellent hosts. Their communication was quick plus they let us check in earlier than normal. The flat was spotless when we arrived and had all the expected amenities, including nice little touches like snacks and fruit and bottles of water in the fridge.

The flat felt secure and was also in a superb location, really close to the MTR and right in the heart of Tsim Sha Tsui. 

I would recommend!
离地铁口很近很近,附近交通便利,楼下还有便利店,去玩购物都很方便

Michelle & May respond are really fast. The place that we've stay is really comfy and nice. They got everything that we need. The place really close to Tsim Sha Tsui MTR station make it easier to move around. Plus its near to mall and its easy to get food. Very recommend. It was a very pleasant experience.
It was great staying at MM’s. Always easy to communicate and reply right away :) good location with great vibe !

This place was as described and pictured.  It was very close to MTR (metro) which made getting around super easy.  Restaurants and shops near by and Nathan Road and harbor was just up the road.  Place was very quiet and clean.  We scheduled a half-day tour one day and it was also an easy walk to a near by hotel for pickup.  We enjoyed staying right in the city center and close to everything.  We would stay here again.
简单干净,交通方便｡
Nice cozy place at heart of HK
性价比很高,交通很便利,房东很贴心,住宿体验很棒
离地铁口非常近~附近走一走就到了海港城,特别好逛,隔壁街很有特色~华嫂冰室,龙城,金英也很近;乱逛就看到了,很惊喜~房间很干净,晚餐时间会有饭香从窗户飘进来哈哈哈哈哈哈~厕所应该是算挺大的了~

Michelle’s place was perfect for two. It’s spacious and has heaps of amenities. Location was a minute away from East Tsim Sha Tsui station and 7 eleven. Also very close with some bar with great vibes. Would love to stay in this place again if i go back to Hong Kong.

We had a great stay at Michelle and May's place. It was cosy but had everything needed for a weekend in Hong Kong. Michelle was really responsive and quick to reply to all messages, and provided great instructions for check-in and other details about the accommodation. They even had a couple of universal adaptors ready for use - helpful when you have multiple devices to charge. The location was great - really close to the Promenade and other tourist attractions in Tsim Sha Tsui. We'll stay again next time we're in Hong Kong.

We stayed here following the great reviews however there were some discomforts we experienced that I wanted to share to anyone else in staying here. To start off, the location, cleanliness inside of the apt, and of course the price are all great. However, there was little to no hot water and when visiting in January, was on its own not worth the cheap price. You have to turn on the heater to heat to water for at least 10 minutes but even then, the hot water is not that hot and it runs out after a few minutes leaving you showering in freezing water for half of your shower. We were also only given 2 towels and for a 3 night stay for 2, this was not really enough. And the wifi connection is very weak, can't really watch videos without buffering. And finally, while the inside of the apartment is clean, the apartment building itself is very run down and I wouldn't consider the apartment itself new (like the title of the listing suggests).

it is exactly how the picture is.everything was set before we arrived. Michelle always responded to our msgs in minutes. water and chocolates were left in the frige for us which is greatly appreciated. location was very convenient,its just across chelsea hotel.would book here again next time. thank you again Michelle :)

Very good location and clean, unit a bit small but here is Hong Kong which I think is acceptable, especially as this rate, nothing to complain. Take airport bus from airport (A20 or 21 $33 ) stop at east Tsim Sha Tsui is the best way to access. Bus stop to unit only take 5min, 7-11 food store is around the corner , very convenient. Thanks to Michelle and May provide this unit, and thanks to prompt reply
出门交通便捷,购物方便｡
地理位置很好,房东很棒,回复也很快,床的大小两个一米七的人差不多,总体很干净,位置真的很棒!
Nothing to say just excellent all. Host, Location, Room, Complimentary i was happy when stay there.
房間位置很便利,出門就有便利店,往左手邊是公交站,離龍城大藥房不遠｡出門右手邊有吃飯的地方和地鐵站,其實出門便利店邊上就有一個地鐵口地面廳,趕上下雨沒帶傘從這裏下去剛剛好~房主回復信息間較快很全面(๑>؂<๑)
房东非常非常热情❤️地理位置超方便噢

親愛的旅客們好,我的名字叫東成,歡迎來到香港,希望你們有個愉快和舒適的旅程,按我的名字能查看所有不同類型的房間

reviews.comments: 房间很干净,新装修,设施齐全,地理位置好｡

This place is located in Jordan, convenient to the train and walkable to very good restaurants. The room is located on the 9th floor - for obvious reasons, you will get a lot of construction / traffic noise. To compensate,  hospitality and response times to any inquiry is quick. The room is as pictured, small, but definitely kept up to standards.
Prompt reply
Small but clean and very convenient. Nice TV.

The room was just as described. Before this room I went to another Hotel at TST, but there I had a dust mite allergy. Here everything was really clean and non-humid and I slept really good, thank you!

host is welcome. the building number is a bit small, but the direction from host is good. his phone number cannot be reach, no answer.
The room is clean, small, minimalist design. 
So far it is quite, not noisy from the street.
The bed is big single bed. not queen size. 
Toiletry is provided. Good location.
mtr and airport bus A22 are very nearby ( in the front of the building)

Great place. Super small, but very functional and everything seemed brand new and well maintained. The bathroom is the most fun part, it's tiny but all the fittings are brand new and the host water is great.

Getting in and out was super easy, and the area is awesome

Tungshing has been really helpful in providing us the information on how to get to his place from the airport. Going to his place is so easy and without much hassle. Once you reach the B1 exit of Jordan MTR station, the building is just 3 steps in front of you. A very convenient place to stay and get around. A number of attractions and good food around too.
Small but good place! Everything is new and nice!
Tungshing was very helpful.. messaged clear instructions and answered every question. Everything is new.. very clean.. great stay!

Even if the room was a little tight, we felt comfortable there. Everything was clean and working well. It was very central and literally next to the MTR, so we could get everywhere quickly. I would definitely stay there again.

exactly as described, very clean &modern, it was a great place to stay in HK! 

The host came by as I had problem charging my electronic device, very nice. He was always reachable by w'app. very easy stay
Hey, your place is great, especially that you have many photos and it is like it is on the photos. Top modern room and secure. Thank you
Nice place in a very convenient location. Clean and tidy! It is literally 3 steps away from the subway station. Room is a bit small though. Suit for single traveller.
I loved my stay here in Jordan! It was clean and the host was very flexible! He even allowed to check in earlier and checked out later! The host was also responsive to queries.

The host was very welcoming, providing all information through airbnb message. The instructions were easy to follow and the location was really convenient since it is right outside of the jodran B1 MTR exit. The place provided everything it mentioned on the description.
Everything was excellent from location in Kowloon (5 meters from Jordan MRT exit), room, optimization of space and also process. Would definitely come here again !
房間雖然有點小 但是睡一晚這樣就足夠  密碼鎖好方便  地理位置真的超級!無敵!非常!好!!!樓下就是港鐵站!房東很好!!預定的時候出了點小問題不停問房東 他都超級耐心!!

The building isn't much to look at from the outside, nor are the corridors leading to the room, but the room itself is very modern and clean. 
It is very small, with barely enough room to leave luggage on the floor next to the bed. However, the biggest selling point is the location. It is right beside Jordan MTR Station, making it very easy to get everywhere around Hong Kong. I enjoyed my stay here, and would recommend this room to any single travellers.
The house is clean and tidy though quite small, bed is so soft that I can hardly get up early everyday Anyway I highly recommend it
位置很棒 一出佐敦站就是!房东人超好 超耐心 还有转换插头真的很贴心!虽然房间有点小但是很干净 下次来香港还会选择这里!

The room is a bit small, do take that into consideration. 

The building is very "traditional Hong Kong", and the surrounding area is a bit older. 

Overall, we had a positive experience, and the host was extremely responsive. 

Thanks!

Pros: 
1) very very CONVENIENT LOCATION, few steps away from Jordan MTR station.  Also has 7-11 and Circle K stores below the bldg.  A22 bus stop was nearby so it was very convenient going to/from airport.  It was also near Temple St, Australia Dairy Company, Mak's Noodle. 

2) CLEAN.  The room looks new. (Although the bldg itself looks old.)

3) has own bathroom, tv (no remote), hot shower, water heater, slippers, shampoo, body wash, dental kit, adaptor

4) AFFORDABLE

5) owner was quick to answer our queries through airbnb messenger

Cons: 
1) we experienced 1 day without toilet flush, the tank was not refilling water-- owner said it was bldg pipes problem.  So we just put the shower head into the toilet tank to use the flush.  It was back the next day.


Minor comments:
Really small space, although we knew that when we booked this place.  Only 1 person can pass through the space beside the bed.  Bathroom is tight too, shower is almost on top of the toilet.  A little challenging turning around inside the bathroom.

All in all, we liked our stay.  :)
Great location, right next to Jordan Station for the MTR. Clean rooms and very smooth check-in! Would definitely recommend.

Tungshing was an excellent host. The booking process was easy, and the room is clean and secure. Very convenient location in Kowloon, and good for one traveler including extended stays. Would stay here again!

This a nice place for an short stop! The house is really close to the metro. If you are hungry, you just walk down, and there are many restaurants and shopping mall nearby. However, there still is some problems. For example, The wall's sound insulation is not very good. And the cup and towel are not very clean. Anyway, it is still a nice house for visitors to live! It costs low!
就在佐敦地铁站出口 非常好找｡密码锁也很方便｡房间不大 但是很干净｡就是隔音不太好
Very centrally located in Jordan, basic "bed and a bathroom" type room. Clean and convenient. Might be tight for 2 people, but is as described. Would stay again.

Perfect room , very clean , comfortable bed , easy communication with the host and the building is right in front of jordan station . I recommend
very accessible to all public transport

I was able to check in before the time stated. Managed to leave my luggage first so that was so convenient! Second time staying here in the exact same room. Love the distance between this house from the MTR Jordan station. The place is clean and descriptions stated by the host were accurate. However, was a bit disappointed with the price as it was peak period.

Description of the unit itself is accurate, and it was clean and felt very secure.  While space is tiny, I gather, all space is tight and expensive in Kowloon.  We were happy to have workable accomodations at this price point!  The building itself, however, is very dilapidated (elevators to 9th floor slow and at times not in service) and unclean.  Reminded me of my teenage years of near poverty in Manhatten in the late 60s--grateful for a safe place to sleep the night!  Wonderful, exciting neighborhoods and the amazing and beautiful Kowloon Park very nearby!

I have stayed with Tungshing before and my overnight was typical of my stays here. Location is great as it is right at the entrance of the MTR exit and the rooms are clean. So long as your expectations for Hong Kong are at the right level, the space and the other guests won't bother you. Keep in mind noise can be a concern as guests are returning at all hours of the night and if I were planning for more than an overnight I would consider an alternate location.
Nice location and cozy room!
在香港这个价钱已经很划算了 虽然房间小 但住起来真的很舒服 床很软 房东也很好 给我们寄存了行李 房间麻雀虽小 但五脏俱全 下次来还会来住的 位置也相当好找 出了地铁口就能找到 玩得很开心 住得很开心

The photos are very representative of the size of the room and it was very clean. The shower however is in the same space as the toilet bowl which can get some using to at first. When getting there don't be fooled or discouraged by the look of the lobby or of the building, it's almost as if the room belongs in a different building since it's pretty much newer looking and way cleaner.
The building is located right in front of a train station which is practical to get around and there's even some things to see in the area (Kowloon park, the markets, etc.), so all in all I had a great stay!!!

The location of your place was great and the room was tidy, comfortable, and very nice !

One thing, I was a little disappointed was toilet lid.
It closes by itself unless I hold it, so it would be perfect if it gets fixed :)

Other than that everything was awesome and am pretty sure I'll be staying here again !!

Once again, thank you so much for making my stay amazing :)
地理位置方便,就在地铁站的出口,附近商铺比较多｡房间浴室有点漏水,房间内没有转换插头｡其他的都还好｡床挺舒服的,值得推荐｡
交通很方便,地铁站出来就是｡公交也很近｡房间稍微小一点点,其他都很不错

Всё нормально. Но есть два момента, которые стоит на мой взгляд знать путешественнику, который никогда не был в Гонконге. Первое - комната расположена в Гонконгском жилом небоскрёбе, рядом с метро в оживлённом районе города. Это значит - найти легко, добраться отсюда можно легко и удобно в любую точку города, но подъезд и само здание будут грязные, днём запахи китайской еды из окна и под вашей комнатой будут вечно шататься какие-то типы. В комнате и холле чисто, есть чайник, полотенца, фен, тапочки. Душевой шланг висит в туалете. Фото соответствует действительности. В общем неплохо. Для очень бюджетных путешественников.

I have stayed in other similar establishments in Hong Kong before like Sincere House in Mong Kok and this was by far a terrible stay. The apartment itself was accurately described. However, the power went out in the apartment for a few hours during 1 of my days. I noticed a note left by the utility company saying that the tenant was late on a bill and they had cut off power. It took me about 1-2 hours before host showed up to address the problem. He said it was a mistake of the utility company but I saw him take a screw driver to the electrical meter in the stairwell. Speaking of the stairwell, you'll have to use it to get up and down the building otherwise you'll wait 10-15 minutes to use the elevator as there are tons of people waiting to use the single elevator for the building. On more than one occasion, I saw rats and roaches running freely and people smoking cigarettes in the stairwells.

When I showed up the apartment, I ran into a guy who stayed in the room/apartment the day before I arrived. He was just loitering in the hallway of the apartment and he told he was flying out of HK tomorrow. He ended up staying the entire night in the hallway on the floor using the apartment Wifi. The guy has the code to the room, which was unsettling.

Last thing, the electronic door lock to my room was broken. My room was never locked as a result.

Good luck.
great location
Great stay. Small room but got all you need. Old building but modern room. Really close to public transportation and MTR. Price is good for HK

住了两个晚上

房间虽小但很干净无异味,有风筒､转换插头､沐浴露和洗发水,可惜没有热水壶｡

总体感觉还不错 下次有机会再入住｡

Coming many times to HK i can say it's 5 stars room for the price. All is new and working, a lot of lights and plug. Tungshings place was great compared to the price. Really good location right next to the metro.

Good points : access to the flat from the airport is really simple (just have to take one single bus) 

Great location: easy to go to the metro station. 

Shops are very close so it's easy to find places to eat and have breakfast. 

The owner provides good services (tooth paste, hairdryer, and the international adaptor), the the instructions are very detailed. 

Bad points: The building is very old (but the room is very new). It is dirty, especially the stairs that you have to use all the time because there are always a lot of people waiting for the elevator.
We stayed two nights at the apartment and I believe it is among the best you can find for the price around this location.
