Good enough for budget trip
Great location, quick response. Good for single traveller.

位置特别好找,一出地铁口就找到,很方便,附近好多可以逛,吃的都很方便,房间很干净,吹风筒电视热水应有尽有,特别强调一下床跟枕头太舒服了,目测应该是乳胶枕头和乳胶床垫,真的很舒服,每天去逛街逛累了回来一躺床上很快就睡着了,这是我睡过的床最好之一,这一点房东想的很周到很贴心,谢谢房东,房间是有点小,不过真的很干净｡瘦的妹子可以住两人,太胖就会有点挤,反正我们去香港一般白天都是逛逛逛买买买｡只有晚上才会呆在房间,所以对房间的大小没什么要求,只要能住就行了,所以住这个房间最合适,在香港在这么旺的地理位置这个价钱能住到这个房间已经很好了,干净又实惠,下次来港还会再来住

Tungshing is a great host. The room is self check-in and does not have much room for luggage. But most rooms are small in HK. The building is located right by the enterance/exit in Jordan MTR. It’s a nice place. The bathroom is small so bigger person might have an issue with that. For the price and the location, it’s a great deal. It’s close to shopping places, food restaurants, and the Temple street night market.
方便
Great place to stay if you are traveling light. Conveniently located to Temple street. Also enjoyed the security measures taken.
房东回复很及时,有一些疑问都会很热心的解答｡房间靠近地铁口,交通很方便
交通方便,屋内环境很好｡房东也很热情,值得推荐
很干净的房间, 放东西的小柜看得出来是很细心的设计｡房间的保安设施也很不错,也很有时代感｡最主要的就是, 地点好, 楼下就是地铁站,左边不远处有两家便利店, 非常方便｡
住宿位置很好找;地处中心位置去哪里都很方便也很近;空调效果很好;热水洗起来很舒服;干净卫生｡
交通方便,还算干净,但是隔音特别差
ﾛｹｰｼｮﾝが良く使いやすかったです
房间非常干净,床垫枕头十分舒服!!!!!!房东十分热情,处理问题的速度也十分快,下电梯就可以看见地铁站路口,十分方便,总体体验绝佳!!!!十分推荐!

Good communication.
Good room.

第一,地理位置真的好找,地铁也很近,周边也有一些美食店,床也软硬适中,非常舒服,但是整个房间的设计太差了,连个吃东西的地方都没,还有卫生间靠近床,异味感真的太重了,毛巾黄黄的,卫生间超级超级小,除了一个马桶,只能容得下一个瘦的人在里面了,怎么洗澡,真是奇葩,还有建议大家订酒店的时候要多了解一下退订首则,跟房东态度很好的提前两天做了沟通,死活不同意退房,只愿意退百分之五十的费用,真是呵呵了,总结建议,国内同胞建议住贵多一点的,环境好点的,不然真的酒店住宿就影响心情了,对了,酒店只能放得下小的20寸行李箱,大的放不下,太小了
很可爱的小房间,一进门就看到装修风格非常干净!位置极佳,出地铁站真的五米就是大厦入口,而且私密性很好,两道门也十分安全,下次来一定还会住!
房间虽小啥都有,位置很方便
感觉房间不错,也挺干净的,位置特别方便,一出来就是了,就是有一点点闷,总体满意的｡
It was a nice stay!
不錯的
The location is good, only 1mins to the subway station. The building is a bit old and busy. The room is a bit small but it’s clean.
房间比较小,卫生间洗澡不是很方便｡交通便利,就在地铁口,根据房东的指示挺好找的!
距離地鐵站很近 相當方便
交通很便利,就在地铁口边上,装修风格也可以,房间和厕所较小,不过理解
麻雀虽小 五脏俱全

位置很方便,就在地铁口旁边
房子虽然小但还算干净
不过冷气机有点吵
隔音也有点差
不过性价比还是可以的
麻雀虽小五脏俱全
Very clean and quiet space.
房少 但乾淨

위치가 정말 좋아서 몽콕과 침사추이 둘다 걸어서 다녔습니다.
생각보다 정말 좁았지만 혼자 이용하기에는 문제 없었습니다.
房间小到压抑!真的有监牢单间的感觉｡大家慎重!
Situato in un ottima posizione strategica dove si può raggiungere tutto , anche se piccolino è molto pulito ed ha tutto ciò di cui si ha bisogno . Infine ottima comunicazione .

The description of the room was spot on.
The location of the building (related to MTR - Jordan) was excellent. Literally 2 sec from MTR exit to the building. 
Great place to stay overnight for a quick visit to HK.
地理位置方便

Great communication with the seller and really good location, right in front of Jordan Station. Room is quite small and can get a little claustrophobic when you're with 2, but we knew this beforehand so nothing bad to say about that. Regardless, very pleasant stay and definitely good value for the price! The owner allowed us to check the place out before we booked it, which was also very pleasant as we stayed in a different hostel the day before that was very dirty and we wanted to make sure. Definitely recommended for a short trip to Hong Kong!

The room is suitable for single traveller with light luggage.  Although the building is right next to busy street, you can't really hear the noise from the street.  Can't have a good night sleep on the first night due to the noise created by the next door's guests.  They talked loudly and smoked at the corridor right outside/near my door. 

The host is very responsive, like on service 24/7. A small hiccup is that one of the power points is not working, so have to make do with the remaining one.  I only realized the TV remote control is missing on my last night stay but I don't think you really need one if you already so tired after a long day visiting/shopping : )
Great
In a fantastic location for the airport, shops, restaurants and general wandering. Only thing is that the place is incredibly small. As long as you are only there to sleep it's fine.
房间有点小,床边过道处有些拥挤,但是离购物的地方很近,交通很方便
房间整体来说都还可以,离佐敦站也非常近,房主给的提示也非常贴心｡
予想以上の小ささでしたが､値段と立地の良さでｶﾊﾞｰされているかな｡

Host did nothing to change entrance passcode when another guests walked in to our room at the middle of the night and scared us in our sleep, they were also scared by our screaming in a weird language Lol, But slow responses and never-present host was the worst.

Value for money and good location, avoid if possible
Very convenient place. Cosy and comfortable. Value for money

name: Home, Sweet, Harlem. Welcome!
summary: Welcome! Upgrades Added as of January 2018 This listing is located in the Spanish Harlem Section of Manhattan. I offer a cozy apartment that has great transportation in and out the city! The area has a lot of ethnic restaurants and a lot of local, active residents. This residence is great for a quick, inexpensive stay in New York whether its for business, travel, or personal purposes. I am glad to welcome all guests!
space: This residence is within the East Harlem/Spanish Harlem section of Manhattan. Built in the Pre-war times, this apartment offers a cozy, 1 Bedroom apartment with Living, Kitchen, and Bathroom areas.
description: Welcome! Upgrades Added as of January 2018 This listing is located in the Spanish Harlem Section of Manhattan. I offer a cozy apartment that has great transportation in and out the city! The area has a lot of ethnic restaurants and a lot of local, active residents. This residence is great for a quick, inexpensive stay in New York whether its for business, travel, or personal purposes. I am glad to welcome all guests! This residence is within the East Harlem/Spanish Harlem section of Manhattan. Built in the Pre-war times, this apartment offers a cozy, 1 Bedroom apartment with Living, Kitchen, and Bathroom areas. The Guest has total access of the property. I am great with communicating with my guest and making sure everyone is comfortable as possible. The apartment is yours to use but I am only a phone call away! The neighborhood is in East Harlem with a heavy Hispanic/Latino/African-American presence. Local residents are always out and about as there are a lot of ethic restaurants and m
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is in East Harlem with a heavy Hispanic/Latino/African-American presence. Local residents are always out and about as there are a lot of ethic restaurants and mom and pop stores in the area. Great for late night food as there are 24 hour restaurants and stores within the area.
notes: Public Transportation Great 24 Hour Food Spots Latino & Hispanic Culture FDR Drive Central Park
transit: Public transportation is the best way to get around Manhattan. The subway is a 3-4 minute walk away
access: The Guest has total access of the property.
interaction: I am great with communicating with my guest and making sure everyone is comfortable as possible. The apartment is yours to use but I am only a phone call away!
house_rules: I take time and effort to maintain the household with the utmost cleanliness and hospitality. It is filled with the essentials needed to enjoy your stay.  I do ask to kindly respect the household as if it was yours. Please be courteous.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about:
Welcome Everyone! Thank you for stopping by. 

I was born and raised in Manhattan and I am here to help  share the New York City Experience with others through Airbnb!  I am easy to connect with and very reachable and always willing to interact with people. 

I am big on cleanliness and hospitality. I strive on making Guests feel as comfortable as possible. 

I hope you would like to get a chance to visit my location and enjoy the hosting I provide. If you have any questions/ comments, feel free to contact me.

reviews.comments: Kevin was very welcoming and thorough with all information. The description of the property was accurate. It's also near the MTA if you want to get to another part of the city. Kevin got in touch before I arrived, and his brother was there to meet me and show me where everything was, which was great. Last but not least, he had provided a great information on the local area with recommendations for places to eat, etc., which I found really useful.

Kevin was nice. And he was very responsive via text, which I appreciate. The listing is in East Harlem, which isn't for everyone. The area is not very posh, but, for me, it feels like home, so I tend to stay there whenever I go to New York. The listing description was accurate enough, with respect to the way the apartment looks. If you can't deal with noise at night, however, this might not be the place for you. The neighbors were surprisingly noisy in the wee hours of the night and virtually silent during the day. This apartment is close to the subway, which was very useful.
Kevin was very helpful and communicative during the whole time. The apartment is very nice, and within walking distance to the subway. Would definitely stay there again.

I had a wonderful stay at Kevin's apartment. The apartment is very close to the six train line. Everything in the apartment was spotless clean. I definitely recommend this apartment to others. Thank you Kevin for hosting me!

Kevin fue excelente anfitrión. Se mantuvo en contacto con nosotros y fue muy comprensivo aún cuando llegamos más tarde de la hora acordada para el check in porque nos perdimos en el subway. También fue muy comprensivo para acordar el check out de acuerdo a la hora que fue más conveniente para nosotros, aún cuando también se nos hizo tarde. Nos proveyó de un matress de aire para nuestra amiga que vino de M.A. y se quedó una noche con nosotros. El barrio nos pareció bien, no tuvimos ningún incidente. Muchos puertoriqueños y Dominicanos, así que nos sentimos como en casa. Todo fue muy cómodo y limpio. Los vecinos hicieron mucho ruido en las noches, pero no fue problema para nosotros. Una sugerencia sería poner un espejo de cuerpo completo en alguna parte del apartento. En resumen, el apartamento fue perfecto para nosotros, nos volveríamos a quedar y claro que lo recomendaría! Muchas Gracias Kevin por tu ayuda!
Kevin was really thoughtful about everything. He gave me all information needed while staying on his house. The house was very clean.

Kevin is a really nice host, flexible and very responsive. The apartment is a 4th-floor walk up, well-maintained and exactly as advertised in the listing. The apartment has all the basic things--it's especially nice to have a kitchen and comfy sofa. There's no TV and wifi, but you probably don't need it anyway since you are here to see New York city! It is just a short 5-min walk from the subway station, so very convenient. Street noise is not a problem although you can hear the neighbors at times (the kids next door can be noisy). East Harlem is a bustling Latino neighborhood with many local eateries and shops. The food selection is supposed to be great (too bad we didn't get to try any). There is a grocery store right outside the building. There're always locals hanging out in front but we were never bothered. All and all, a good choice if you are looking to stay in this part of the city.

Kevin was an excellent host. Everything was absolutely as described. The apartment is lovely and very clean. There are numerous windows in every room and there is plenty of light! Would definitely stay again!
Great experience, we enjoyed ourselves for the night we stayed, only issue really were the neighbors being loud all night made it hard to sleep.

Kevin's place is exactly as other reviewers describe it:  nice and clean, spacious and very convenient as a base to explore and enjoy NYC. 

The Neighborhood is definitely classic East Harlem.  Very real NYC vibe. Not a tourist area.  

The neighbors are noisy sometimes, so if you are a light sleeper, that could be a problem. But I didn't have any trouble. 

It would have been nice to have wireless, but I didn't come to NYC to play online, so I didn't mind that too much.  

Kevin was a very nice, responsive host!
Kevin made my friend and I feel really welcomed. The apartment was very clean!

Me and my husband stayed in the apartment this was our first time using this site and Kevin made us feel like we are regulars. We stayed one night and it was wonderful. Kevin contacted us right away and was really good with getting us whatever we need to stay there. The area is the only bad thing but when we went in the apartment you really forget about the outside.

Kevin is easy to get in touch with and waited for us to arrive Even if it was already late in the evening. He even asked if everything was fine during our stay.
The appartment is perfectly situated to visit Manhattan island. Just note the neighbours are noisy if it is important to you.

Kevin was absolutely wonderful. He was very responsive and communicative and I could tell he takes great pride in being an exceptional host. His place was exactly as described, as shown in the pictures and also very clean. The neighborhood is great and the room is a great price for someone looking to stay in the city and explore. It's right next to the trains, neighborhood gems but also commonly known stores for anyone who isn't familiar with the area.
everything was correct , very good condition to this price

This is my first time using Airbnb. Kevin responded quickly to my inquiry about booking his apartment. Once booked he was very easy to reach via phone or text if I needed to. His one bedroom apartment was very clean and nicely furnished. It is central to a lot of restaurants and neighborhood shopping should you need something and a couple blocks from the subway and buses. Kevin was a great host. He was there to greet me, show me around the apartment and tell me a bit about the area. He also has maps and booklets about what to visit while in New York City. There is wifi in the apartment which is great. Kevin checked in with me just to make sure everything was ok during my trip. I had a wonderful stay at his apartment and would book it again!

Kevin was a phenomenal host, he was very accommodating about arrival and check out times and provided me with a ton of useful information to navigate the area and make my stay as pleasant as possible. The apartment is two blocks from the subway and easy to navigate from. I would definitely recommend staying at Kevin's for all those considering a trip to New York.

The apartment is as described. Kevin is very pleasant and was kind to helped me bring my belongings to the apartment. The apartment is cozy in a great location. I will definitely be using this apartment again

Kevin's a great guy, but if you're looking for a hotel-like experience, this is NOT it... This however, IS a genuine NYC experience. Noisy & inconsiderate neighbors, dirty streets, dangerous vibes... All in all your safe, and anyone you actually talk to will be cool... Kevin was also very considerate and did everything he could to add comfort to my stay, he even warned me of the noisy neighbors in advance... This place is good for people who already know NYC, and need an affordable, SHORT-TERM (like 1-2days), place to crash uptown...
This place was cozy, comfortable and very clean. The AC was very helpful during the heat waves. Good shower and great WiFi connection as well.

When I arrived to the apartment I was met by Kevin with a big welcome and smile. He carried my suitcase up without my even asking. The apartment was what I expected. Very comfortable, clean and spacious for a NYC apt. Kevin was always within text or phone and answered all questions I had. He made sure I had enough wifi by actively calling cable to boost the signal which I thought was really great. He checked in with me regularly to make sure my stay was great. The neighborhood has many resturants and stores near by for convenience. Thanks Kevin I had a great stay.

My friend and I stayed at Kevin's apartment during the Panorama Music Festival on Randall's Island. The apartment is extremely accessible to Randall's Island - easy walk. Kevin was very responsive before and during our stay. The apartment was clean and perfectly comfortable - photos were accurate. Bonus points for the powerful air conditioning unit - a must during July in NYC. Harlem is a great neighborhood and it was nice to get away from some of the tourist traps downtown. I highly recommend and would stay again in the future.
Kévin est un hôte très sympathique et accueillant.  L appartement est propre et fonctionnel et très proche du métro.

Kevin was really helpful and responsive. He answered all my questions that I had about the location. The place was clean and decorated like the photos. This listing is perfect for a weekend's stay only.

The host was very nice and answer any questions I had before and after my arrival to New york. His apartment was fine if you planning on staying for a couple days. I didnt like that his items was still left in the closet because we really didnt have anywhere to put our things. Also i didn't like the fact in the closet it was 7 roaches on a trap that made me think he have roaches in the house and this made me to keep all my luggage close until my stay ended but overall we had a pleasant stay. This apartment doesn't have TV but it does have WiFi but you don't really need a TV if you visit New York because so much to do there. Also his apartment is located in urban neighborhood which fill with different Ethnic group mostly Latino and Blacks. His apartment  is located on 4th floor of the building no elevator only stairs so just be prepared to walk a lot stairs.  The hallway are dirty and I saw people smoking and drinking which I didn't like as well. Also people hang out in from of the building but no way said or did anything to us. Next door neighbor who is deaf with kids are very loud and stay up and make noise all night so be prepared to listen to noise neighbors
Overall I had a wonderful time and new York despite the little mishap on arrival but the host himself is a very nice person but I probably won't be staying at this location anymore just because the building, loudness and the neighbors.

Kevin is an excellent host, the apartment is very clean and match the pictures. Kevin was very helpful and provided all the info we needed
The price is great for a one bedroom apartment in NYC
Great clean place. Convenient location. Great deal.

Staying here was amazing. The apartment was immaculate, everything was functional, and there was even air conditioning (which is a God-send in this New York heat). Despite the occasionally leaking air conditioner that had to be emptied (which we were notified about earlier), I really have no complaints on my stay in Kevin's apartment. He was very friendly and helpful. He even offered clear directions on how to get to his place as well as maps in order to get around. My only advice for people staying here in the future is that although Kevin's place is nice and well-kept, the location is still in East Harlem and it can get a little sketchy and dangerous (especially at night). This location is right opposite the projects (it is important to note that it is not the safest area). However, the overall experience was a great one, Kevin was awesome, and we were able to accomplish everything we set out to do.
Everything was perfect
Kevin is an excellent host. He waited for us without any problem later than the check in hour. The day we left he was very nice and he let us leave the luggage in the place till late afternoon.

Kevin behaved like a friend : he was really available to answer to all my questions, he asked me if I needed his help for my discovery of New York, he cared about a lot of things.

The appartment was perfectly clean, pleasant. The neighborhood is full of life, neighbours were just kind and really welcoming towards me. 

Subway and buses are really close to the house.

Second Airbnb, second time I really satisfied !
Thank you for evverything dear Kevin !
I love the neighbored so lively and so many juice spots! I loved it :) My Host Kevin was awesome and definitely informative when it came to my health needs in the city :)
Andrew was a great host! Clean home. Close to trains and lots of food. I would recommend staying here.

Kevin was awesome! It was our first time traveling and staying In the city and he made it feel like home! He was super sweet brought our luggage up and he helped us bring it out! He was available to answer any questions we had especially when it came to traveling around! The apartment was cozy and extremely clean!! Such a great stay and plan on returning!
Kevin was a great host and terrifically accommodating. The place was clean and exactly as expected. I would definitely recommend.
Kevin was awesome and very accommodating. Place was clean and perfect. Would def recommend and stay again!
He was very polite. He worked with us with both check in and check out.
Kevin was a great host. very helpful and responsive when needed.
Kevin is super nice and was really flexible in accommodating my check in/check out time. His place is a good crash-pad for weekend or short-term stays and is close to the 6 train and M116 bus.

Kevin was really awesome. 
The place was clean and cozy. I do recommend it.
Kevin's apartment was very comfortable, clean and easy to find. The communication was great, and the privacy was great as well. I would definitely recommend Kevin's place to others.
Kevin was incredibly helpful and communicated promptly. The place was clean too. The neighbourhood is ok, but a little noisy sometime.

Kevin was extremely helpful and communicative throughout the booking process and check-in times. The apartment itself is exactly as described, spotlessly clean and with good facilities in East Harlem providing a taste of real New York City life!
Taking the Subway was very easy and Central Park is just a 10 minute walk away - the apartment is well located for exploring all over New York. Would recommend and thanks again Kevin for a great stay!
We had a great stay at Kevin's place. Everything was as advertised. He was really laid back and made the process as seamless as possible.

The place is absolutely great and located ideally within East Harlem close to the 6. The apartment was clean and as described. Kevin is super friendly and helpful.

Unfortunately, we had one of our worst experiences with AirBnB so far due to the neighbors - first, we had a deaf couple with three children fighting, screaming, crying, yelling, stomping etc until 2am(!). Then, there was a party (granted - it was Halloween weekend) with lots of yelling, running, stomping, dancing etc till 9am(!) with repeated interruptions from angry neighbors shouting obscenities at the party at times like 6am. And obviously the kids an parents were up and running again at 10am. I know that it is outside of Kevin's reach and that sometimes such things can happen, but considering the noisy surroundings this place is not ideal to sleep off a jetlag from an intercontinental flight...
Overall nice apt and Kevin was a good easy host. On the other hand, building and area weren't the greatest. Make sure to lock your doors folks.
I had an awesome stay in Spanish Harlem and it was a very convenient location to the subway

The apartment is perfect for any stay in the city and in addition to being just minutes to the park and subway it is immaculately clean and very cozy. We will definitely look to come back and stay again.

Kevin's place was just as described. I really appreciated that he checked in with us during our stay. The accommodations were just what we needed. WiFi is an added bonus. The proximity to the subway is one of the biggest selling points. We would really consider staying here again..

I had a great stay at Kevin's. I arrived pretty late and Kevin waited for me for check in. He was friendly and helpful. The apartment was clean and well-equipped. Super close to subway. Kevin also let me check out pretty late.
If you are looking for a really quiet spot though, this is not it, as the neighbors can be loud, at least when I was there. But most of us come to NYC to explore the city so it really isn't much of a problem.
Great stay as always!!

Kevin was a perfect host! He was so nice and accommodating to my flight changes. He waited for me to check in and assured I had everything I needed for the duration of my trip. He is an awesome person overall! The apartment itself is a fabulous find! Super clean, comfortable, and convenient! I loved my stay and I'll be sure to return!

Kevin was an excellent host! His place was very clean and he made sure everything  was above and beyond satisfactory to ensure I was comfortable during my stay. Will definitely be staying there again when back in town!
Kevin was very courteous and helpful and even waited for me to check-in after midnight.

Kevin was amazing and welcoming. Place was super clean and smelled great. He provided us with linen, towel, extra blanket and pillows. Five minutes walk to subway, very convenient. Neighbor with tons of Mexican shops and restaurants, for those who are into it, is heaven.

This place was perfect for 3 days in Manhattan. 
Kevin was very polite and he make it easy for us to feel welcome. 
I can recommend this place for people who want to explore the city. The subway is pretty near to Manhattan and easy to find it.

Kevin's place was wonderful. It is located close to the subway and in a lively family neighborhood. The bed was comfy, the bathroom good, and the couch great as well. Kevin was great with communication, and he gave us a very kind welcome. The place was very clean. It was overall a fantastic value for a stay in New York, near to the subway which makes it easy to get around town. We would recommend that you bring earplugs if you're noise-sensitive. I'm a heavy sleeper and was fine, but my wife is a light sleeper and the neighbors' kids intermittently woke her up with noise. Again, though, a really great experience overall. We would definitely recommend Kevin's place.

Kevin was a great host. Check in was fast and easy. I was able to find parking close by and didn't have to pay a fee. The children next door are loud from running around their apartment but Kevin was upfront about it. Great place to rest your head at night. I would stay here again.
Great place to stay, highly recommended!
Kevin accommodated us with all of the essentials and was great with communication through the booking process/ stay.
Thanks Kevin for being such a wonderful host, and making sure that all our needs were met. Will be back perfect location for us with less luggage.
Kevin was very nice and his place is clean and close to the subway.

Place was clean, simple, and comfortable place to stay. Neighborhood is a litty iffy and the neighbor's kids were loud but Kevin warned us about that. We just needed a place to crash for the night and it did the job well. Kevin was very thoughtful about checking in and making sure we had everything we needed.
This place was very comfortable and close to the subway. The neighborhood gives you an amazing feel and experience of what everyday life in New York looks like.

Kevin is a very responsive and accommodating host, and his apartment was clean as cozy, as described.  The building was close to public transportation and we were able to find parking right out front, which made travel both within the city and our exit from it very easy. Unfortunately, the night we stayed, we were awoken multiple times by repeated and sustained noises from Kevin's next-door neighbors, making made sleeping extremely difficult for us; this is not Kevin's fault, just something to be aware of if you are a light sleeper.
Kevin was a great host. I had a late arrival and he waited for me patiently. He helped me with my heavy bags when I arrived and even checked up on me while I was there to make sure all was well.

Thank you so much for everything Kevin! It was exactly how you described and very easy to travel around the city especially if you were looking to commute as I was. Kevin checked on me throughout my stay and was where he said he would be right when he said he would be there. I'm big on food so I'd suggest Amy Ruth's for breakfast. The chicken and waffles are incredible and you can walk there if you want to take in Harlem no problem or get driven there by a ride share for 5 bucks. It's great if you are going to explore the city and just want somewhere to hang your head. So very clean also. Thank you so much Kevin!

Kevin was a wonderful host!  I am not supposed to lift heavy because of breast implant due to cancer and he not only brought my bags up, but offered to come back the next morning when my shuttle came to take me to the airport and help bring my bags down.  The place is simple and did the trick for the one night that I stayed.  I'm familiar with the neighborhood but didn't realize shops close a bit early for being in Manhattan, (Duane Reade closed at 9:00 but found a Rite Aid 2 blocks up) but you can walk 10-15 south to the Upper East Side and you've got everything you need.
Great place. Was very close to the subway. Was there for a very short time. Kevin was more than courteous. Enjoyed my stay!...:-)

The neighbors are loud, but Kevin warns you. I just wish I had brought my ear plugs since they didn't quiet down until later. Otherwise, the lamb was perfect for me and very convenient from LaGuardia. I'd stay here again
Everything was perfect Kevin was very understanding about everything..
Kevin was a great host and made my first trip to NY that much easier. Highly recommended !
Had a great (Email hidden by Airbnb) munication was easy and place was well kept. Location was close to transportation. Would recommend.
Kevin was great, he let me know the things I needed to before hand, also he was very generous and the house comes with everything you might need

Kevin was very nice and checked on us via text throughout the weekend.  He warned us when we arrived about the neighbors being loud, which they were, so this is not the place for light sleepers.  The neighborhood is good and conveniently located near many of the things we wanted to do and see in Harlem.
Kevin was a great host. Very clean place and close to public transit
Thanks!

This is a cute little apartment that was just perfect for the two of us! It was my boyfriend's first trip to the city and it was nice to have a place to come back to that felt more like a home than any hotel. It was super close to the subway and very easy to navigate. We didn't have any problems thankfully, but Kevin still checked up on us on the day we didn't see him. We had a great time and loved the apartment. It helped get a little more authentic taste of the city.
The place was great.  The location was awesome.  Kevin is a wonderful host.

Communication with Kevin was perfect. The apartment is clean and neat. There are many stores and restaurants in the neighborhood. I also liked the easy access to public transportation. Overall, I enjoyed my stay.

This was the first time we've ever stayed in the city and everything was incredible. The location is great for finding food and Kevin was super accomodating with check in and check out. The neighbors are loud but we were all exhausted and it didn't bother us. My friends and I have already discussed a return trip.

Kevin was a great host. I had a late flight into NYC and he stayed and waited, even beyond my anticipated time of arrival. Kevin checked on me my entire stay in NYC. That's a first and classic! My only issue was the noise from neighbors. It was unbearable for me.

The apartment was just as it looked in pictures. Clean, cute and comfortable. Kevin was a great host. He provided everything I needed for my trip and then some. The neighborhood is lively and within walking distance of tons of shops and restaurants. It's right off of the train which makes it super convenient to get around. I would definitely stay here on my next visit.
Clean and comfortable place. Excellent location, only a 5 min walk to subway. Restaurants pharmacies and convenience stores all within a few blocks.

Comfy and clean apartment, perfect for a short visit and very close to major attractions in New York. Neighbourhood looks a bit rough around the edges but very friendly people and good eats if you know where to look. Kevin himself was a great host and always kept in touch, was there to welcome me in despite arriving late.
The place was great..kevin was really helpful and i had a nice stay

Great stay at Kevin's. We were warned (by Kevin) that the building could be a little noisy, but it was actually one of the quietest places I've ever stayed in NYC. Neighborhood is easy to reach via 6 train.
Great place good value!!!!!

No tv in apartment but if you plan on being out and about this might not be an issue. Place could use some more attention cleaning wise. Kevin was great in letting us book we were coming in late and he wouldn't be in till late so the booking worked out. The noise wasn't bad at all really. The flights up weren't an inconvenience the neighborhood is great plenty of authentic restaurants and places to look at.
Kevin's place was just as described. Loved the colorful walls and how close the place was to the train.
Kevin was super responsive, the place was very clean, had all of the amenities in description and was close to the subway.
Kevin was a great host, his apartment was as described and clean. I had a good stay.
Kevin was diligent in responding and I enjoyed my stay.
The host canceled this reservation 8 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Nice location, close to the subway and just as stated on the ad. Kevin worked with us during check-in and check-out, nice guy. We got exacting what we needed. Highly recommended!

Kevin is a communicative and wonderful host. Apartment has the essentials and I was able to park my rental car via street parking (exception on Mon and Thur 9:30am-11am) see street signs in the area.

Overall, my girlfriend and I enjoyed our stay, and the neighborhood is fine.
Kevin was awesome. I felt comfortable staying in his home and he was available for me to check in on the same day I booked the reservation. I would recommend this place to anyone.

Kevin's place was in a great location in Harlem. The subway is right next to his place so it was easy to get to where we were going. Kevin's place was exactly as pictured and he made sure we had everything we needed. He was excellent with communication and even checked in on us the next day. One thing is I didn't realize there wasn't a TV so if you like to relax with a TV at the end of the day I would suggest bringing your laptop! Overall, my boyfriend and I had a great weekend in New York and in Kevin's place. Thank you Kevin!

Kevin was awesome host, anytime I had issue he was only text away. I've never been to a huge city like New York. But Kevin made the trip and experience an amazing one. Kevin off the bat let me know that neighbors were going to be a little noisy given the fact they were deaf family. But everything was awesome, he waited passed the check-in listed just to make sure I made there. And check-out was just as smooth. Thank you Kevin for being a awesome host.

Kevin's place was exactly as described- clean, cozy, and close to transportation. He was super responsive and ready & waiting with the keys when I arrived.  Will definitely be back when I'm back in the city.
It's the same as the pictures and clean. Just make sure you know what the neighborhood is like and that you're comfortable with it. Overall a nice stay.

Kevin was a great host. The place was clean and the place looked as in the pictures. The place was near a lot of public transportation which was really great. The only thing were the neighbors that are a deaf family which Kevin warned us about them making loud noises during the night so if you're a light sleeper just know that. But overall we had a lovely stay and thank Kevin for letting us stay at his home.
Simple cheap space in East Harlem.

Kevin was a very accomodating host and communication was excellent. Not realising his apartment was on the 4th floor he helped me getting my luggage up. Keep that in mind if you have a large suitcase. The location is close to the subway and Central Park which made getting around easy
Kevin made himself very available and was a great host for our first Airbnb stay!! Location is super close to a subway station, which made getting all over town a breeze.

My husband and I traveled to NY to celebrate his birthday. We enjoyed our 4 day stay in Kevin's home. The location is very convenient to the subway which made it possible for us to get everywhere we needed to go. Kevin was very flexible and accomodated our early arrival and late check out. The air-conditioning was AWESOME. The location is very  close to 125th St which is historic Harlem and near the Apollo Theatre. We were able to take in a play at the National Black Theatre and hear live music at one of the local bars. The loud children are no longer there so we were able to sleep well with no disturbance. We were often returning late at night and felt safe in the neighborhood. If I'm travelling to that area again I would choose to stay in Kevin's home again. Thank you Kevin for opening up your home and allowing us to have a great experience in NYC!
Kevin's place was nice and accommodating, his place was a very central location, clean, with nearby transit. He'd check in to make sure everything was running smoothly
I love Kevin's place! I stayed here before. I would definitely recommend it to anyone that's new to town.
Great overall stay

Its my first stay in Harlem.
I was impressed with the flat and the nice reception by Kevin.
I find the flat is a perfect and cost effective base to explore NY from.
And as it was quite warm the ac was nice to come home to.

Was great & convenient. 
Had 0  issues. Thanks
Nice place

Kevin's place is very close to great restaurants and coffee shops in East Harlem. It's very easy to access public transportation, and he's a great, accommodating host. He's great about checking in if you need anything and is very helpful. This is a great place to explore and enjoy Spanish Harlem from.

Kevin is a great host and was very nice and responsive during the stay. He let us check-in a little early and was available if we needed anything. The location and price are good if you are looking to stay in Spanish Harlem. The subway is close and there are lots of restaurants nearby. The apartment itself is pretty barebones, but gets the job done as somewhere to crash for the night. The neighbors were pretty noisy though.
Kevin's place is top class. Very clean, located in a safe neighbourhood and superb value.

Location and neighborhood are quite nice, we actually landed right in the middle of El Festival del Barrio all along 116th which added a great option for walking and eating. The apartment itself is reasonably spacious, well equipped with pretty much everything you want, and overall very pleasing.  The bed could use an upgrade, it's low end and plasticky, but functional.  The air conditioner is fairly loud, so if you have issues with noise make sure to bring ear plugs if you'll want the air on at night.  The apartment is actually quite quiet otherwise, surprisingly, but we got pretty unlucky our second night: one of the neighbors had a very loud group of guests or party making noises well into the early morning. Again, make sure you have ear plugs, but that's always a good idea for cities.  Overall we had an excellent stay, marred just by the neighbors being noisy on one particular night.

My stay at Kevin's place was great. He reached out to me the day before to confirm. The apartment is way to find and really close to plenty of places. The express bus is right at the corner and the crosstown bus is a block away. Target and Old Navy is about a 5-10 min walk. There's a grocery store right down the street as well. Plenty of good food in the area. The apartment is very simple, just what I needed. The minor things is it's a 4th floor walk up and there's no TV but I was fine with those things. I recommend!
Kevin is a great host..was very helpful during my stay. The apartment is as described. Good location, close to public trans and plenty restaurants. Cool place to stay for a few days.

What a great location! If you love being in neighborhoods that's deep rooted in culture, this is it. East harlem-Spanish Harlem, it's a gem. So many great food places and walkable to all of them. His place is very clean and minimal, allows you to be more in the moment with the person you're starting with and enjoy simplicity. Kevin was so communicative, it felt like texting a friend. Loved it here, definitely recommend.

Kevin is an excellent host - place is exactly as described, clean, location was in the heart of Harlem and near to the metro and he was one of the better communicators I've had as a host. He checked in on our stay and accommodated us with special requests. The a/c in the bedroom was a lifesaver (and in NY, it's rare to find places with any a/c even in restaurants). Only downside was that wifi didn't work during our stay - it would work maybe a few minutes then we'd have to reboot to get another few minutes. It apparently was an issue with the internet provider and wasn't a huge deal since we didn't spend that much time in the apt. Overall, would recommend.

Overall great place to stay, wifi is a bit finicky, and if you plan on bringing food to make or heating up leftovers you should bring your own pan, other than that it was a five minute walk to the 6 train which was super convenient, it was really clean and smelled great when we got there, lots of food is around and check out was super smoooth!
Kevin was an amazing host. He was extremely accommodating for our early check in. Nothing else I could ask for

Had an awesome stay here, my girlfriend and I needed it for a short stay in the city for a music festival and the apartment was very close to where we needed to be and it was also very close to 6 train and many restaurants. The apartment was very clean and well kept. Kevin was very generous and made sure everything was perfect though out our whole stay. Highly recommended
Kevin was a great host. Very responsive.
Kevin was really kind with us. The house was nice and clean. Harlem is not really close to turistic attractions but in 30 minutes it is possible to reach them by using the subway.

The apartment is in the heart of El Barrio, and a short walk from the subway which means you are a half hour from the East Village and 45 minutes from Brooklyn. Kevin is a great host and a great communicator when it comes to arriving, leaving, and even connected during our stay to make sure things were going well. If I am in NYC again, I will definitely stay at Kevin's apartment. The apartment itself is spacious (by NYC standards), and a great AC-unit that helps keep the space cool. Plenty of natural light and the place is clean and orderly. Highly Recommend.

Kevin was an excellent host. He was very accommodating and helpful during our stay. Allowing us to check in in early. The apartment is simple and in a good location. Very close to public transportation. Would definitely recommend.
Kevin is an awesome host and completely accommodating. Also the apt is so perfectly located to great and easy transit.
My stay was great! The location was really convenient for me, it is close to everything and Kevin was an excellent host!
Kevin was a great host - very accommodating and checked in with me several times to make sure I was having a great stay.
Great place
The location and the apartment are great. I will definitely come back and recommend it to friends.
Nice place!
Kevin communicated with me great, help me with with an early check in and provided great tips on local transportation. Great spot if you're tryna find somewhere authentic to stay in NY.

I️ stayed at Kevin’s place last weekend and even though I️ had a short stay, his home is in a perfect place, if you are looking for a real New York experience. Although I️ go to NY a lot, he made sure to recommend nearby food places along with things to do. This area is recognized as Spanish Harlem and you can find whatever you need in each street. Thank you Kevin!

Kevin was a great host! He was so kind, he made sure communication was quick and easy, and the description of his apartment was extremely accurate. Everything was clean and organized. I will definitely there if I'm in the area again!
Great value for being so close to midtown manhattan.
Great hospitality clean place

This is my second time staying at Kevin's place...I may become a regular! Haha! It's a very basic place but has all the things I needed. Super close to the express bus (which can take you to the subway) and there are plenty of restaurants that you can walk to. He's very quick to respond if you have any questions. I recommend!
Beware of no air conditioning and the area safety. The area is in upper Manhattan so not the safest

Kevin's a friendly host and his simple pad is a good bargain in a fun neighborhood. It could have been cleaner, and unfortunately wasn't a very comfortable bed and pillows - but it definitely did the job for a short stay.

The spot is definitely as is pictured, it is a small one bedroom. Basic accommodations but comfortable, no television/radio, wifi is strong, apartment is in building a walk up building to the 4th floor (short walk up). Water gets very hot, apartment is quiet for most part, bed is comfortable, and living room is very peaceful to sit in.

I booked same day at the last minute to save money on hotels. Kevin was at work when I tried to book so communication was slow. When we did meet at the apartment, he was very hospitable and kind. The apartment is in a good location, close to many restaurants and a vibrant city day/night life. I'd stay in this apartment again, great location and was cool for what I needed it for at the time.

No high expectations of this apartment but if you're just dropping your bags and hitting the streets then this is just what you need. Hang out Uptown or in other Boroughs then come back and crash in a easy and relaxed space. I'd stay here again when visiting NYC.

Kevin's place was just what we needed. Super clean and spacious. It's in a good location, nearby the subway and a lot of food. Communication was super easy and Kevin responds very quickly. Would absolutely stay again!
Kevin a été un hôte très accueillant et à l’écoute quand j’avais un problème il etait vite résolut et l’appartement était clean

Kevin was easy to book with, courteous, and thorough. The apartment was accurate to the listing, convenient location, comfortable, and clean. My only issue with the stay was that the neighbors were noisy and but I appreciated that Kevin did warn about this ahead of time. I would suggest bringing earplugs just in case.

The thing to remember about anything in life, is that you get what you pay for. Kevin's place is more than affordable for a stay in NYC. His home is very humble, but it was clean and tidy and Kevin was a very attentive and gracious host. 

It is important to note that the walls are very thin in the apartment so you will hear *everything,* and Kevin has a disabled neighbor who is active late at night. Just take earplugs if you're a light sleeper. 

Overall, it was a pleasant stay, thank you Kevin!
Kevin's place is a great place for a short stay. Its clean, comfortable, and has lots of food options in the area.

Kevin’s apartment was a small very well kept space. Kitchen area was open and clean but with all the food accessible nearby there wasn’t a need for cooking. This is a decent spot if you know what you are doing in the city and just coming here to sleep. If you are not use to a noisy residential, I will say that the neighbors were very noisy unfortunately. I wish there was coffee available to make in the morning but there was a Dunkin close by. Kevin was communicative and helpful to me at all times.
Great host! Great place! Highly recommended - absolutely spotless!
Nice place for a quick stay in New York lost of food options in the area parking was decent complete privacy & comfy
Kevin is a great host and very insightful about places in the community...New York is my second home and when I come visit...I will definitely reach out for your services again...

Pros: Kevin was a nice host, willing to provide guidance as to where to travel/ sightsee and how to go about it. Lot of restaurants to eat nearby. 

Cons: Would like to note that the bed is actually an air mattress as opposed to a “real” bed. Also, there were individuals visibly smoking marijuana within the building and right next to our door, so this made me feel uncomfortable.
Kevin was a great host.  He was easy to communicate with and was very accommodating.  It was the perfect place to stay in Manhattan, on a budget.
Perfect spot in Harlem.
Kevin was very responsive to questions both before and during my stay. The place was clean and very close to lots of restaurants.
Kevin is amazing! Customer satisfaction is definitely guaranteed !!!!
Good place , communication was great . Worth it
Nice cozy place for a Manhattan escapade; in East Harlem, close to subway, easy accessible, and comfy place for a couple who wants to explore the city.

It had what I needed. WiFi TV & Kitchen. I recommend.
Be aware of the neighbors next door they are quite noisy
Kevin's apartment is cute and clean. You do get a workout from those steps though which is good because you will eat a lot in NY.
Nice place but extremely noisy neighbors.

Kevin’s place was perfect!!! Very very very clean. I felt very comfortable there.  Public Transportation was simple, lyft found us with no problem, the bus drops you off a couple blocks up and the train station is right around the corner. Lots of restaurants and corner stores for great food and late night snacks. Overall I would recommend Kevin’s place if you are looking for clean, comfortable, speedy response and flexible check in. Kevin even text to see how things were going during our stay and he was very understanding and flexible with my check in.
Kevin was a great host. I booked last second and accommodated us and worked around my schedule during check in.
Just as pictured.
Awesome place, super easy check in. Highly recommend.

Kevin's place was perfect for our night in the city. Great neighborhood, very accessible to subway. Check-in was smooth and Kevin was very personable. The bed/pillows were a bit uncomfortable however, not an overall detractor. We really enjoyed our night in Harlem!

Kevin was an excellent host and his place is just as described. Good location close to the subway which makes getting into Times Square easy and a quick Uber ride away to upper east side and Harlem for a night out. Kevin was great with communicating and working with me during a last minute booking and check in process. .
Great place and a great host

Simple, organized and convenient.  No complaints here.  I reserved the spot for my friend from California and she loved it as well.  Mere walking distance from the train station. Kevin stayed in touch throughout my stay.  I highly recommend it.

Kevin's East Harlem place is a cool 1 bedroom with bathroom, living room and kitchen. It is a 4 flight walk up to the apartment The amenities are good and you have use of the kitchen. 
He has Amazon Firestick instead of cable with use of the WiFi. AC and a standard box fan. The place is colorful and relaxing. Everything is working fashion. Fairly quiet and has a good selection of local and commercial foodie spots. 
Kevin was easy to communicate with prior to check in. He's a cool dude! 
Nice clean place for relaxing.
Cozy space in a great location for a city trip. Host is extremely reliable and kind.
Walkable distance from Randall's island, and subway stops. The apartment was clean and cozy, and neighborhood stores had everything I needed. Thank you Kevin for being a great host!
It was a great place that my sister and I stayed at, hope to be able to return in the future!
Clean apartment, nice use of space.

Kevin communicated with us in timely manner and was flexible to fit our needs. Location is a few blocks away from subway. The building for Kevin's place is a little older so expect to walk up a couple flights of stairs.
Had a great stay! Kevin was very nice. Street parking isn’t reserved, and there’s cleanings so be sure not to get towed!!!

Kevin's place was awesome! He met us inside to hand off the key and give a run through of the cozy apartment. We felt very at home with his stockedI'm bookshelf, record player, and he even had a candle lit on the coffee table. The door was self lock so check out was merely leaving the key on the counter. We felt safe and extremely comfortable. Definitely recommend!
Kevin’s place was in a great location and we got around very easily.
Good location, apartment not that great

I traveled alone to NYC and didn’t have a clue where to start but Kevin had great hospitality andIntroduced me to the neighborhood and some great spots in the city. 

His spot was clean and had everything you would need. Very close to some night life and local eats. Staying in Harlem was cool and very Cultured. I’d definitely book with him again on my next visit to the city.
The host canceled this reservation 2 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Kevin is very prompt and answers your questions right away. He was very hospitable and the apartment was clean and comfortable. The location is very convenient to catching the subway or train too.

I have always loved this part of East Harlem because I am a big fan of the food and the vibe here. Kevin was super cool and nice, being clear with how we would meet up and how to get into the building. This is a NYC apartment and the building is what it is but I grew part of my childhood in the Bronx, so it was like any other building I knew as a kid. The space is big for a one bedroom. It has enough space for 1-2 people and it got the job done for me. I wanted a place near my work and that was easy to get to from where I work. And Kevin was super cool.
Kevin is a wonderful host greeted me when I got there and its about 20-25 minutes to Manhattan ...had a lovely time  will stay here again
clean and cozy. great location if you love spanish Harlem❤ very nice feel in the apartment.
I chose this place for easy access to the subway and great price, and I love exploring local neighborhoods. This place met all of those things.
The place was at a great location. Very close to the bus stop and the subway. The host was great and responded promptly to my messages. He also checked up on me via messages during my stay.
Great stay! Authentic NYC spanish Harlem experience. Very comfortable apartment, felt like I was house sitting for a best friend or family member
Super clean and comfortable. Walls are a little thin so you can near the neighbors sometimes if they’re loud enough or blasting music but Kevin’s place was very nice.
Very good location, but very noisy, loud neighbors. Kevin is a great host.
Place just as described- clean, cozy, comfortable, convenient to transportation. Kevin was very flexible and accommodating. A great host!

Kevin was great with the check in process. Apartment appeared the same as in the pictures. But my biggest issue was the inability to control the heater in the apartment. Apparently heat is controlled by the building. The apartment was unbearably hot, I had windows open in December and it was still terrible. I was unable to sleep because of the heat and lack of air movement. The walls are also very thin and some of the neighbors were very loud, setting off alarms in the middle of the night.

Kevin is an amazing host. Very accommodating and communicative. His place is great and has everything you need. It’s also very close to the subway, so the location is perfect. Would just recommend packing some earplugs if you’re a light sleeper as the walls are thin and the neighbors do play music at night, but really has nothing to do with the quality of this airbnb. The neighborhood has so much culture and great food so if you value getting a true, non-touristy experience of NYC, this is the place to be.

Kevin is a good host. Clean apartment and fast response time. He was flexible on check-in & check-out times which helped us with our flight times. The neighbors are a little loud, otherwise no complaints.

Kevin & his brother Gregory were the best! Very friendly & helpful. The place is HOT but the windows open & there is an AC unit. Also they have a fan. The neighbors are loud but not unbearable. Also the place was very clean.

Everything about this place is great. Even Kevin is so great and super friendly! 
Only thing that is really concerning is the noise. The neighbors were incredibly loud until 5 in the morning.

Kevin's place is adequate for a one night stay - and is probably more appropriate for HEAVY sleepers and young people. Neither of which I am. I came for an overnight stay on a business trip  - also the description says it is appropriate for business travelers, and it IS NOT. There are no business style amenities besides WiFi.  There are no desks or even night stands to put and charge your phone. There were also a lof of personal items still visible. 

It was very clean, but had a lot of perfume smells, so if you are sensitive, beware. 

The main issue with this place is the noise. When I arrived Kevin told me that it was just "New York apartment noise and that his neighbors are deaf so they can be a little loud to communicate with each other." This was a FAR cry from the truth. The neighbors  are OUT OF CONTROL LOUD!!! And have waaaay more issues than being deaf.  I got in at 7 p.m. and almost immediately there were what sounded like physical flights, banging on the doors and walls both inside and in the hallways, shouting, screaming, loud music, running up and down the stairs until 7 a.m.!!!! It was like I was in the middle of a wrestling ring all night long! The walls are super thin and you can hear everything! It was like they were in the apartment. 

It was singularly the most horrible HORRIFIC sleeping experience of my life. You cannot get away from the noise, and it is VIOLENT and ABUSIVE. 

Only stay here if you can sleep like a baby on an airplane runway.

Kevin was a great host. Quick responses. Allowed flexibility for check-in/check-out times. Apartment was as described. Short walk to the subway; lots of local late-night food options. The only downsides were trouble unlocking the door and no control over the heat in the apartment. Would stay here again.

Great stay, super
Clean and great neighbors

name: Convenient & Cozy Private Rm@Jordan
summary: Centrally located guesthouse, just 1 minute from MTR Jordan station. Single bed room + private bathroom. Free WiFi and amenities, equipped with air conditioner. Digital doorlock offering very flexible self check in and check out process.
description: Centrally located guesthouse, just 1 minute from MTR Jordan station. Single bed room + private bathroom. Free WiFi and amenities, equipped with air conditioner. Digital doorlock offering very flexible self check in and check out process.

host.host_about: I'm a travel lover living in Hong Kong. I always find it a wonderful experience meeting people from different culture. I have met some fabulous people and hosts who made my traveling experience especially memorable and sweet, and I would love to offer the same to those who visiting Hong Kong :)

address.street: 九龍, 九龍, Hong Kong

reviews.comments: 非常棒,房主热情且贴心!设施新,且被子舒适｡

Sam was a great host who was very informative of fun things to do around Hong Kong.  He also gave awesome instruction on how to get to his Airbnb which made it very easy to find.  The location of the Airbnb is almost perfect as well because it is pretty much right next to one of the major metro stations in Hong Kong.  The room itself was very quaint and small but great for what I needed which was just a place to stay.  The bathroom is Korean style where the shower is basically part of the bathroom as a whole and not separate but definitely worth while as it's your own private bathroom.  
Would definitely suggest is to anyone looking for a great cheap place to stay for the weekend and just exploring the city.

地段相當好､位於繁華的彌敦道和佐敦道附近､機場巴士30分鐘左右就可到､
房門密碼鎖進出很方便｡
Very Nice Place, very Central and cosy. The bathroom is really small, but regular for hk. Nice host

Host was very friendly and helpful. The room listing was pretty accurate. Room was clean and just nice for budget travelers. Wifi went down for a few days and host was helpful enough to purchase a sim card for me to use the data on it.
I will recommend them to whoever is looking for a nice and decent room to stay in Hong Kong on a budget which comes with good services.
小房间特别舒心,像自己家一样｡位置也超好,出门就是地铁站｡

Sam is very hospitable and humane, kindly and attentive. The room looks the same as at pictures, it`s quite cozy and bright, very clean, neat, good either for one person or for a couple, that was a great fun to stay there, to wander around Hong Kong streets and sightseeings and to know that you have such a cozy and warm shelter in the citycenter. Bathroom was very tidy and all necessary you can find inside it. Accomodation is perfect, the metro station is from a minute of walk, a huge variety of cafe and 7eleven shop just downstairs with hot coffee, salads and all necessary stuff. 15-20 minutes to electronic markets on Mongkok, the same to Tsim Tsa Tsui station, where you can find Star Ferry, Harbour City and Kowloon Park nearby. I recommend it to anyone who wants to take a rest in HK or have a business trip. Very convenient, very cozy and price is good for all the stuff you receive from your journey.
The check in was well communicated over (Hidden by Airbnb) and the room itself was clean. Rooms are small on HK and this one was no exception, but it was more than good enough for my one night in HK!
Cosy, clean and functional space for great price! Sam is extremely helpful and quick to communicate about anything!

The two guys are very nice, the room was on the 10 floor, it's not amazing but it's livable, it's a Korea style bathroom. 

Bad things, the wifi was the slowest I ever came acrossed, I tested it 0.33 mbits, the hot water only lasted a few minutes before it went to cold, the TV only worked on one channel, it said they made up the room everyday, but no one came, it's said they changed the towels every two days, but they were not changed even though they are soaking wet. I contacted them and they offered me a free night in another floor they told me they had recently refurbished, the give you a code for the door lock, I was surprised when iIfound its the same code as the week before, how safe could this be? Anyway they messaged me twice to ask if I'm coming, iItold them Yes, but I was outside with some customers, who were also attending the exhibition, eventually after a very long day I arrived at the room at 1am, code did not work cannot get in, tried to call and message them, no answer left and a few minutes later they send me another code, so return to the place, new code won't work either, so it's now 1:30 in the morning and I need to find a new hotel, cost 2000HKD, so I'm sorry even though the people seemed very nice, I would not recommend this place!
Sam和拍档Anthony都很nice,有什么不会的他们都会很有耐心都回答~住处离佐敦地铁站很近,楼下就有7仔,隔一条街就有翠华餐厅,很方便  到旺角或者尖沙咀也很近

一個人香港的微旅行,感謝阿鋒從訂房起一直提供訊息､保持聯繫,雖然住宿的環境小小的,但麻雀雖小五臟俱全~房間如照片所見,有對外窗､一張很夠一個人休息的舒適床,周邊環境更讓我喜愛,就住在彌敦道上,樓下就有小7,附近就有許多好吃､好逛的店,更重要的是走路至佐敦站僅1~2分鐘,真的是太太太方便了,大樓晩間總有親切的大哥和妳打招呼,感覺進出更安心了些,當天入住剛好遇到Sam在清理我住宿的房間,也及時的提供我轉換接頭,避免了無電可充的狀況,也感謝阿鋒提供住宿附近店家資訊,讓自己更快熟悉在香港的生活,能每天分享聊著在香港的一切,這是一次美好的住宿體驗,下回來香港我還是會選擇這的,相信我我一定很快又會來到香港的~~在這還是由衷的感謝阿鋒和sam~~謝謝你們給予我的一切幫助,來台灣記得留一些時間來找我玩呦~Good Living ~
Fantastic stay!! Host was approachable and friendly.
I had a fantastic 4 day stay with Sam, very helpful, and in a very central location.  Couldn't ask for anything better.

这里的交通实在是太太太便利啦!3分钟的地铁站,提前买了八达通,想 (Hidden by Airbnb) 都可以,最后离开去机场,也有小巴可以直达,而且价钱很便宜｡密码管理觉得很方便｡在入住的过程中见到了Anthony,非常热情的男生!Sam和Anthony都很热情帮我解答交通和美食的问题｡特别是这次是第一次一个人旅行,所以还有点不敢到处乱晃,不过他们积极的推荐和问候让我觉得很温暖,谢谢你们哦!推荐给其他人:)
The stay was amazing! Very cozy room is a great location, a 2 min walk from Jordan Station and next door to 7 eleven. Sam is a great host and made me feel welcome
房子的地理位置也很棒 离地铁站很近 去哪里都非常方便  房间的布置也很棒 非常喜欢 第一次去香港 所以很多地方不清楚 但是房东Sam都会告诉我 也会给我一些合理的建议 最后一天电梯坏了 Sam还帮我提下楼 非常的感谢

1.地址:距离地铁站佐敦B1出口2分钟左右可到达,客房采用密码锁自助入住服务,无前台,提供行李暂存服务｡但凡有任何服务问题可及时 (Hidden by Airbnb) 联系房东,Sam响应很快,值得称赞｡
2.房间:床品干净舒适,床单及洗浴用品选用无印良品,清洁阿姨会每天打扫一次房间,房间整体舒适度高｡
周边环境:佐敦是一个美食集中的老街区,庙街､澳洲牛奶公司､翠华餐厅､麦文记面家､蛇王恩､点点心点心专门店(很好吃的一家传统粤式店)､太平馆(百年老店)等热门餐厅均在附近,莎莎､卓悦以及万宁药房购物方便,搭乘港铁至尖沙咀一站,步行也可｡
3.提示:房间无电视,香港经常下雨,所以出门前一定记得关窗!
4.最后,Sam他是一个很关注住户感受的房东,有任何需求都会予以耐心解释,在旅途之中让人倍感温暖｡阳光,事无巨细,啰嗦的房东,都是他的标签｡
三个晚上,很棒的住宿:) sam在我到香港之前就给我提供了很多的到达信息,很全面｡住的地方有窗户,打开窗很舒服｡洗浴用品除了洗面奶｡都很齐全地方下去不到两分钟就到了地铁站,旁边隔几个小巷子就是庙街,地段很好(*¯¯*)总之是很棒的体验啦,谢谢sam(^_^)
房间离地铁站很近,方便出行,干净整洁和描述相符,Sam很热情也很有耐心,出发前就一直保持联系,整个过程很愉快,能改进洗手池的话住宿体验将会更好:)
很好的住宿体验 选这里一定没错｡房间整体风格简约舒适,卫生干净｡密码锁出入方便｡距离佐敦地铁站一分钟的路程｡地理位置非常方便,离自己想去的地方都很近｡基本步行都可以到达｡入住前Sam发了一套资料,旅馆具体位置显而易见｡完全不用有找不到的顾虑｡很满意的一次旅行｡
Sam is a wonderful host, give me all the information I need! The room is quite tiny, but it's cozy enough to make me feel like home. Next time I visit HK again, I definitely choose here!
Sam是很热心的房东｡在入住前会将入住信息仔细交代｡房间位置也很好,佐敦附近有很多著名的美食,离尖沙咀等购物中心也近｡房间干净整洁,每天房东会询问你入住情况并及时提供帮助｡是一次很愉快的入住经历｡

Sam was a great host. He messaged me a couple of days before I arrived to give me the entire rundown of how to get to the Airbnb from the airport and everything. Even though I did not see him during the stay, he was a very accommodating host. He provided information on nearby restaurants and was overall a friendly guy. I would definitely recommend Sam to any of my friends if they are going to Hong Kong and need an affordable, yet cozy place to stay.

He also offered to let me keep my luggage in the area past my checkout time, which was very convenient for me as my flight was later on at night.

The neighborhood is very close to Tsim Sha Tsui so you don't need to go to many other places.  It's also right off the b1 exit of Jordan station so you won't have a hard time finding it.  Like most HK apartments, its quite small but the natural lighting is quite comforting and I stayed in my room half the time, just relaxing.  Sam was very receptive to communication and flexible with my situation.  I'd recommend this place!
Sam的旅舍地理位置很方便!衛生也很乾淨!但是最令人喜歡的是Sam把房間的細節做得好好!沐浴露系列用的是MUJI的,衛浴用品也看得出是嚴選的大品牌!最難忘的是洗被子Sam還精心挑選了高級香氣的清洗用品!很多人去租這個價位的旅舍就只是晚上睡覺用的,頗亂老舊的房間真的很不堪,但是往往就是這些小細節一對比,就可以看出Sam在旅舍為了讓旅客有愉悅的入住環境花了很多背後看不到的心思!

很棒的体验!

地理位置很棒 交通方便 地铁口 闹中取静吧 房间小了点 但是比较干净 入住和退房都比较方便

Sam's communication is top notch. Chatting with me via (Hidden by Airbnb) a week before I arrived he provided advice and instructions on how to find the room from the airport (including photos and videos of the entry points). The room itself is small with the en-suite sharing the overall floorspace but that is to be expected in mainland HK.
房东sam是一个超级贴心的人,从一开始就沟通很顺畅,很热心｡会关心你的行程问题,告诉你入住指南,注意问题等等｡总之感觉和一个朋友在相处,很棒｡

it was amazing experience and SAM is very much sincere to take care of guest and he is very nice person also . i really recommended to stay here, of course room is tidy but small and very airy that feel very good . usually HK room are small in size but not airy like SAM's room.

開心能入住這舒適溫馨客房｡
Sam :『 間房真係好掂,好鍾意
位置就在佐敦站旁边,楼下10米有711,从机场到房间只要一趟超便宜的巴士(如果想坐地铁也很方便,就是贵一点),下车之后100米便到公寓,房间很干净,有独卫,空调､吹风机､热水壶,浴巾､洗发液､沐浴乳､衣架等;房东人很好,特别热情,入住前给足了图文信息,路线､路标很清楚,全程快速响应｡赞!

I had a Great experience at Sam's place in Hong Kong. Is exactly how he described it. The room was very clean  and comfortable. And every day the room would be cleaned with new towels just like a hotel. Slept very comfortably. Definitely will return the next time I am in Hong Kong. You cannot beat the price, service, cleanliness and location. Thank you very much Sam for being a wonderful host!
Both hosts were nice and helpful. The place is just a minu te walk from Jordan station and the room is clean and cozy. great living experience!
The room is modern and clean. Very close to the MTR and airport bus. Sam has very helpful with everything. Very pleasant stay.

The room is small but comfortable. Pretty close to a subway station and bus stop (including airport-bus). The host is friendly and supportive, answered messages immediately, send me all the instructions how to get to the room and gave some cool advices to make the stay better. Sam even let me stay 5 hours more for free because it was too early to go to the airport at check-out time. The one disadvantage was a toilet pipe, which clogged at the 2nd day of my stay but I guess that will be solved.

Sam is an amazing five stars host. He is really nice, sweet and on top of everything. He texted me a few days before my check in and walked me through step by step from public transportation (how to get to the airbnb from airport) to self checked in. Sam was very patient to answer every single question. When I arrived Hong Kong, he even texted me and make sure I got to the place ok.

The room was slightly smaller than I thought, however, it's perfectly for one. And come on, it is Hong Kong, everywhere is tiny in there. The room has everything I needed including comfy bed, blackout curtains, ac, shampoo, body wash, hair dryer, adapters, etc. I have requested for extra pillow and Sam has delivered. Room is very clean and there is a housekeeper to clean each room everyday. As a clean freak, his room is totally meet my standard with thumbs up. The only thing I wish about hot water situation could last more than 5mins. Every night I have to rush trough during shower because of hot water doesn't last. It could be the weather has dropped while I was visiting HK and I'm sure it's perfectly fine from spring to fall. 

Location is safe, only couple mins walk from mtr (subway). It takes you anywhere you need to go in HK. 7-11 is right next to the building. Jordan area is extremely convenient and has so much good food around. I would definitely return on my next visit. 

Thank you so much Sam!! Keep up all the amazing work!! =)
地址位于市中心地段,靠近地铁,十分方便｡房东Sam非常热情有耐心,提供了很多贴心的建议和帮助｡房间有阿姨打扫,整洁干净｡有机会来香港还会选择Sam的名宿｡

호스트가 영어도 엄청 잘 하고 매일 청소도 해줍니다 이틀에 한번 수건 갈아준다는데 저는 미리 얘기해서 매일 갈아달라고 했더니 정말 해주더라구요 이불도 개줍니다 ㅋㅋㅋ 가기 전에 (Hidden by Airbnb) 으로 숙소에 오는 길 숙소에서 공항 가는 길 등등 알려줍니다 그은데에 약간 조옵은 편이긴 합니다 솔짘히 당화앙했습니다 약간 특히 화장실이 개쩔어요 하하.. 괜히 호슷흐가 번역해서 볼까바..미안헤서... 깨끗하긴 합니다 방에서 신발신는 곳이라 슬리퍼 가져가심 좋아요
房间非常好,下次去还会住｡完美的是一人间还有fancy的独立卫生间,装置也好看且实用｡重要的是sam热心,认真,负责,详细告知路线,遇到问题第一时间解决｡感谢!

Let me start with commending the host. He was very helpful, friendly, and easy to reach. The self check in process was so convenient; not having to carry keys was too. The place is located not too far from the famous night market in Kowloon. There are also rooftop bars in hotels near the place where you could sip a drink and take in the HK view. There's a 7-eleven downstairs which is nice. Not to forget to mention that Jordan station is so close and so is the stop for the airport bus. The size is expected for the price I paid. I didn't like was how the blanket felt my first night. I communicated it with the host and he looked into it. Not sure if it changed but I was tired the second night anyway. Also, the sink was insanely small. Even smaller than other small hotels I've stayed in before. Nonetheless, the place is pretty new and conveniently located. Would recommend.
房东Sam非常热情,出发前多次沟通,很详细的告知如何到住的地方,图文并茂,很容易就找到｡最后一天看错了以为可以下午2点退房,和Sam沟通后,Sam很友好的帮忙解决｡元旦Sam坐飞机出行有段时间会联系不上,提前告知有事可以找其他的小伙伴,非常细致｡屋子楼下就是地铁佐敦站,到旺角,尖沙咀都是步行几分钟的距离,非常好｡房间稍微小一点,但很干净,性价比很高｡

I had a very nice stay at Sam's apartment. Everything was nice and clean and the flat is very well located so you can get around easily. Also Sam is a very helpful guy. He responded fast to all my questions and could always help me.

I spent a great time in Sam's house. The room is clear, enough for one person and near public transports and restaurants. Sam is really nice, it was easy to communicate with him.

Great access to the Jordan station! Superb communication/directions, clean room/bathroom. Compact space, but was expected being in HK. Great location if you want to spend some time in both Kowloon and HK island.
very clean and best location!
Sam非常贴心细致､提前一周就告知了入住详细信息､交通非常便利､走路即可到旺角和尖沙咀海港城､房间很干净整洁､非常棒的住宿!

I would highly recommend this room for a single traveler, especially because Sam is very responsive & accommodating. I looked at a lot of Airbnbs online and I also saw two others that my friends stayed at. I made the right choice :) 

This is a good room and Sam is a great host. Sam was easy to get in touch with and went the extra mile to make sure check-in was straightforward and simple. He stayed in touch to make sure everything was good, and he was responsive to messages and requests to get a towel, leave my luggage in the room after check-in, and answer questions about bus routes. 

The room itself is as small as the picture suggests, but it is well-lit during the day, all the furniture is nice, the room is well decorated, and because it's on the 10th floor, it's relatively quiet (for Hong Kong). It is on a main road, but the window faces a quieter street. You will, however, hear your neighbors come and go (but this is probably unavoidable at this budget). The cleaners come in the afternoons. The bed is comfortable and the A/C is adjustable and quiet as well. 

If you are travelling with others, perhaps request multiple rooms on this floor, if possible. From the elevator, there is a hall with a door that leads to a small "lobby", which acts as a hall to about four or five other similar rooms. My friends stayed at Airbnbs that were very close and had a little more square footage, but they didn't have the nice atmosphere that this room had. The Muji decor is a nice touch. 

Also, there is Starbucks, Saint's Ape (boba shop), and 7-Eleven all on the same block. Great local food within blocks. And the A22 bus (to and from the airport) is also very convenient.

완벽한 숙소였어요 접근성이 매우좋아요 바로옆이 편의점이고 지하철도 가깝고 cctv도 있어서 걱정없었습니다 무엇보다도 sam이 매우 친절합니다 청킹맨션이나 미라도맨션처럼 좁고 (어딜가나 좁습니다) 지저분한 싼곳가서 후회하지마시고 여기에서 머무시길  추천합니다 신발신고 들어가야하니 슬리퍼챙기면 편합니다 에어컨도 잘나오고 온수도 잘나와서 여행내내 편하게 쉴수있었습니다

I enjoyed my time here very much. First off, the location is fantastic! It's extremely close to Jordan Station for public transport, Temple Street Market, great restaurants, ATMs, a 24 hour 7-11 and a lot more. The host Sam was very helpful and communicative. 謝謝sam,讓我此行香港有非常棒的體驗｡房間位置距離港鐵佐敦站很近,並且在熱鬧街區轉角的安靜街巷｡同樓層有一間醫館,淡淡的藥香讓人很有安定感,進門的單元門上貼著執業賓館的拍照,十分放心(相信我,如果你體驗過糟糕的放養型的民宿,你就不會再對體驗本地尋常生活有興趣)｡房間里設施用品齊全,乾淨整潔,且風格簡單舒服,完全超乎照片呈現的樣貌,sam細緻周到,會詢問是否入住舒適等細節問題,如沐春風的感覺,下回來香港還是會選擇sam的房間,誠意推薦!

I would definitely return for a short stay!

The place is exactly same as the pictures. and place is perfect. It's so close to the station. You can go out easily using various transportation. 

Above all, Sam is a perfect host. Before arriving, I got detailed information about almost everything, even some good tips.

Great little place, walking distance to Tsim Sha Tsui and so many other places. Sam gave super clear directions and great suggestions. 
The room with adjoining private bathroom is small but has everything a single traveller needs. 
I was super happy with the place and Sam's communications were just brilliant.

Esta fue mi primera visita a Hong Kong, así como también la primera vez que utilizaba Airbnb, y debo decir que por lo mismo estaba un poco nervioso de cómo resultaría la experiencia.  Sin embargo, desde el primer momento que contacté a Sam para solventar unas dudas antes de reservar, la atención fue de primer nivel.  Las respuestas llegaban rápido y con toda la información necesaria.  Luego después de reservar, Sam estuvo en constante comunicación conmigo, dándome indicaciones muy útiles sobre cómo llegar al alojamiento y cómo hospedarme, así como también recomendaciones sobre la ciudad.  La habitación, es lo típico en espacio que uno podría esperar en Hong Kong, área sumamente reducida, sin embargo todo está muy bien distribuido y limpio.  Sam también te provee de adaptadores para conectar tus aparatos eléctricos, y lo que muestran las fotografías de la habitación es exacto lo que encontrarás en ellas.  La veracidad es altamente apreciada. La ubicación del alojamiento también es excelente, puesto que está en el centro de Kowloon, a pocos pasos de estaciones de metro y varias rutas de autobús.  También se puede llegar caminando a los muelles.  Para aquellos quienes vayan a hospedarse por primera vez, les aconsejo que no se dejen intimidar por el exterior del edificio, cuya fachada no es la más "elegante", ya que adentro de las habitaciones el ambiente es mucho mejor.
The location is very convenient and Sam is very helpful

Sam是一个超细心的大哥哥

Very suited to single traveller. Clean and thoughtful design. 2 mins from the MTR station. Host very responsive. Recommend.
amazing place, responsive host. no complaints whatsoever.

It's a great little room, both bedding & chair have got nice textures and very comfortable. Location is excellent with Temple street nearby, you'll never run out of supper options. Sam的房间位置非常好,在佐敦地铁旁边,走路五分钟之内就是白加士街和庙街,交通和游玩都非常方便｡同时房间位置闹中取静,虽然毗邻城市主要街道,但建筑位于一条小巷内,晚上睡觉不会很吵｡房东非常热情专业,出发前一周就提供了非常详细的房间位置和到达方法,并且在我咨询非相关的路线的时候仍然提供了快速､有效的帮助｡在香港只停留了短短的两天,Sam的房间给我的旅行带来了便捷和意外的惊喜｡

가기 전에 호스트인 Sam이 도착 시간과 숙소 위치를 굉장히 자세히 설명해줍니다. 숙소 안도 깨끗하고 모던한 디자인의 방이였으면 혼자 2박하는 저에게 맞춤이였습니다. 근처가 번화가이고 도보여행하기도 좋은 위치였습니다. 덕분에 좋은 여행이였습니다.Sam thank you

The location is perfect, central to almost everything and very near MTR. Sam has been very responsive to any issues and meticulous in his instructions. Room is clean and comfy enough for one person :)
perfect place, excellent location, fluid communication with sam, easy and direct access to and from the airport. I recommend this room is fair and accurate. thank you very much sam. see you soon
Hugely helpful, quick responses, lots of tips and suggestions, easy access to transport, particularly great if your just sleeping there and out for the most of the day.
地點很好鄰近佐敦站,房間會每日清潔很棒｡浴室偏小,有時候會有點不方便｡不過最大的缺點是WiFi很難連線,不穩定｡這點對遊客滿重要｡希望可以改善!

Sam is a fantastic host and his guest house definitely proves he makes sure his guests have everything they need. The room was perfectly clean and offers with its great location also comfort and relaxation. Communication with Sam was outstanding, since I hardly had to wait 5 minutes for him to reply. I had a great trip in HK and can warmly recommend a stay here. 

Lukas
房间虽小但很整洁,吹风机毛巾Wi-Fi设备都齐全｡密码锁超方便,适合我这种出门旅行怕丢卡丢钥匙的人｡Sam很热心,提前就告知了地点和注意事项｡一路过去很方便,也很好找｡去尖沙咀和旺角都超方便的,因为香港太热了还是坐地铁,但是一两站路很便宜也超速度!下次来港还会来住!

I had a wonderful stay at Sams place he responds very fast and gives excellent detail. He also accommodated a late check out and saved me so much stress. The place was exactly as pictured and he made use of the space very well. I would definitely reccomend his place to anyone.

Sam is such an amazing host, super helpful and extremely nice. The room is nothing less than what I had expected, very clean and newly furnished. The place is well located, within the walkable distance to multiple metro stations. Definitely recommend!
Sam是我遇到过最负责的房东了没有之一!住的地方温馨舒适,真的很难在香港找到这样方便的民宿｡房间也十分干净,下次去的话还会选择Sam这里｡

要打100颗星 真的超级无敌推荐 Sam人真的好好 提前抵达香港 还托收拾的阿姨帮忙提前收拾好房间 让我提前入住 信息都会非常及时的回复｡房间位置很好 机场巴士直达 离地铁1分钟的路程 就在主街道旁 哪怕一个女孩子半夜回来也会灯火通明 完全不用担心害怕 房间的一影设施都很全 临走还可以暂时寄存行李｡给我的感觉不是民宿 而有家的温暖 真的好喜欢好喜欢 下次再来香港也一定要住在这里 临走真的很不舍 再次感谢Sam 还有每天帮忙收拾房间的阿姨 感恩
great stay. location is excellent, next to subway station. Place matches description. thank you!
