petite chambre fonctionnelle, bien décorée et vraiment très bien située !  Sam est très réactif sur (Hidden by Airbnb) à la moindre question. rien à redire, c'était un séjour parfait.

This is one room in a boarding house. Note that there is no kitchen and the shower sits above the toilet in the bathroom. The location is perfect if you just need a bed to sleep on but the entire room is less than 100sq ft. Sam is a great communicator and easy to reach.
Great communication and overall positive experience. Would recommend.

A great little place in an absolutely excellent location, one street from the MTR (underground), near more restaurants than I'd thought possible, clean, simple and well priced. I was there for more than three weeks with work and would definitely stay again!
非常感謝sam協助我完成這次旅行,入住方便快捷,周邊設施齊全,房間位於市中心｡

一个人来香港住到这么好的民宿真是超级赚啦!首先位置很好离尖沙咀就一个地铁站,离旺角也是,没事可以走路就去逛逛啦｡还有离庙街夜市也超级近,美食完全不用担心｡房间内部也很整洁,虽然不是那么大,但是很干净,睡着很舒服｡唯一一点可能会有点吵,但是带上耳塞就好了｡虽然没有见到Sam,一直通过邮箱 (Hidden by Airbnb) 也在聊,很耐心很热情,问得问题都及时回答｡总体来说超级满意,个人旅行强烈推荐这里啦!!
首先房东Sam非常热心,会很细致地介绍如何入住,并且对于其他问题也会快速解答｡房间虽然不大但是一个人住的话也足够舒心了｡交通出行非常便利,附近吃的东西也很多｡总之是一次比较愉快舒适的入住体验｡

조던역 근처로 교통이 아주편리했고,
호스트 샘은 정말 친절하고 쉽게 설명해주었다. 깨끗하게 관리되어 있었고, 화장실이 작았지만 내가 사용하기에 불편함은 없었다. 
밤늦게까지 차량 소리가 나지만 번화가라 어쩔수 없는것 같다.

후기들이 전부 좋았고 사진상 룸의 깔끔함을 전적으로 봤으나 체크인 당일 화장실 변기에는 내려가지 않은 휴지가 그대로 있었으며 화장실 에 전체적으로 곰팡이가 심했고 세면대 아래는 특히 심해서 세수를 하기에 거북했다 누워서 쉬는 침대 옆과 아래 벽지가 깨끗하지 못하며 청결함을 기대하고 갔지만 더 이상 그곳에서 머물서 없어 남은 1박을 환불 요청하고 다른 숙소를 급하게 구했다 환불에 대한 피드백과 체크인 전 안내는 너무 친절했으나 다음 머물 숙소자를 위해 룸의 청결까지 더욱 신경써주셨으면 한다.
位置很好,地方也很好找,房间确实略小,厕所也略小,但是毕竟单人间够用了,28寸的箱子放着就只能上床啦~楼下公交站 有点吵,戴副耳塞比较好,房间装修挺新,也很干净,比同伴的民宿好很多了,谢谢Sam!
位置非常非常好,坐落佐敦站四通八达｡房东人也非常热情,虽然这两天我没有看见他人,但通过短信交流可以看出房东真的很热情好客
地理位置方便,距离佐敦地铁B口步行不到5分钟,周边公交很多,步行去海港城也很近,房间很迷你,卫生间非常小,但一个人短期入住也是可以的,卫生很干净,通风也好,房东很热心,可以中文沟通,答复迅速和详细,香港之行很满意!

It is nice place to stay.  Clear and comfortable.  
Very convenient, just 2 mins to Jordan MTR station.
Sam is very helpful.
Highly recommend!
Great location, tiny but cozy, plus Sam is super friendly and replies fast! Will return if I go to HK again.
Few steps walk from MTR, The room is very clean and tidy but a bit small (well, this is Hong Kong) Sam is a vey kind host!

name: Amazing NEW Food Lover Balcony, close to FIRA, MWC
summary: Set in a prized area for tapas and vermouth, you'll get the best of Barcelona and sunset views in your very own Poble Sec pad. Enjoy the cool local vibe nestled below Montjuïc and fast transport connections to beach (10 mins) and airport (30 mins). Perfectly located, close to Mobile World Congress
space: Welcome to your fully renovated and stunning BRAND SPANKING NEW 55m2 Barcelona home. Ideal for couples, groups or families; the light modern interior mixes character with clean lines, while the little balcony is furnished for breakfast or drinks at sunset. All of Barcelona’s favourites are easy to reach on foot or by metro. The lounge area has a comfortable sofa, flatscreen SMART TV, and dining area. There are 2 double bedrooms. One has a 140x200cm bed and the other is 135x190cm. The kitchen is equipped for cooking, including fridge freezer, oven, vitro-ceramic stovetop, Nespresso coffee maker, toaster, kettle. The bathroom is full size with a WC and shower. It is complete with towels, shower gel, shampoo, hairdryer.   THE APT. INCLUDES:  Hot/cold AC, Samsung Smart TV with USB ports/HDMI cable, WIFI internet, Bosch washing machine, ironing equipment. neighborhood_overview: Poble Sec is is the best kept secret in Barcelona. Foodies will delight in the tapas and vermut scene here, highlighted on Calle Blai just around the corner, which is buzzing with Pintxo bars. Fine dining includes Xemei (with 1 Michelin Star) and Tickets restaurant of Ferran “El Bulli” fame. Cross Av.Parallel into Sant Antoni to the new brunch mecca with cafés, bodegas (old wine cellars) and super trendy local hangouts (Rekons, Taranno, Federal, Lando, El Dinamic to name just a few).  One of Barcelona’s must-sees is Montjuïc. A short walk uphill will take you to some of the citys best and lesser known attractions, such as: A multitude of lush, winding gardens with panoramic views to the city and the sea, the Olympic swimming pools, the Joan Miró gallery, summer open-air cinema at the castle wall, the Grec theatre festival, the enjoyable Magic Fountains and the Fira tradeshow arena at the foot of the MNAC (National art palace museum). Be sure to pack a picnic!  Nightlife around Poble Se
notes: We are LEGAL operators, with a tourist license. To comply with licensing requirements we will collect personal data at time of booking, to register your stay with local authorities (MOSSOS). - Please send your airport/arrival information when you book so that we may estimate your arrival time.  - Private apartment for 4 persons maximum; the final price includes both VAT and applicable touristic taxes. - The damage deposit is fully refundable on your departure provided there are no claims for damages, smoking inside the apartment or community complaints such as excessive noise or misconduct. - By booking you acknowledge: MUST CLIMB four flights of stairs. - Guests are LIABLE for all costs associated with noise complaints that generate an OFFICIAL 092 OR MOSSOS Complaint. This can include the costs of any fines for the noise complain or the manner in which the Host responds to the noise complaint (Guest responsible for any sanctions for unsatisfactory response or failure to respond). Gue
transit: The nearest metro station “Parallel” services both the purple line for Sagrada Familia or the green line to Plaça Catalunya, Camp Nou stadium, Passeig de Gracia for Gaudí and artsy Gracia district with Güell Park at its crest. On Av. Parallel you can catch bus No.57, 157 or 64 direct to Barceloneta beach (10 mins) or No.46 to both terminals at Barcelona airport (30 mins). Taxis are readily available on Av.Parallel and you are recommended to rent bikes as a fun way of exploring Barcelona.
access: The space is an independent and private apartment in a building with other residents. Guests have key access to the entrance of the building and their apartment. By booking you acknowledge: MUST CLIMB four flights of stairs.
interaction: We enjoy playing tourist just as much as you, and are available by Whatspp to help you make smart restaurant choices and organize day tripping.
house_rules: NO PARTIES. NO SMOKING INSIDE. NO PETS. Respect the neighbors and keep quiet on the stairways. No extra guests; parties are not permitted. Please clean up after yourself. You may smoke on the balcony but not inside the apartment, or in the building stairway.  Check-in time is 3pm. Alternative check-in times can be arranged by mutual agreement. If you plan to arrive after 8pm you should discuss arrival PRIOR to making the INSTANT BOOKING reservation. Check-in after 22.00h has a 30€ surcharge. Check-ins after 2400 have a surcharge of 50 euros. PRIOR to check-in, all guests MUST provide the host with valid Government issued Identification Numbers, Full Names, and Birth Dates. To help us comply with local licensing regulations. We can enter the property without notification in the event of Emergency,  or during events threatening to risk damage to the property. Storing bicycles inside the flat not permitted We reserve the right to refuse adding additional guests to an existing reservation.

host.host_about:
Hi,

We are a very small company that is using Airbnb to share our lovely apartments with travelers and adventurers heading to Barcelona. Our  company's journey began in 2013, when we carefully selected and purchased these apartments in barrio PobleSec. Each apartment has been renovated with our own hands, with careful attention to preserving some of the original features that make Barcelona architecture, and style famous. These apartments and the PobleSec barrio will make for a perfect base, for your own Barcelona adventure. 

Barcelona is a fantastic city with a dazzling combination of beach, culture, fascinating people, architecture, unique cuisine and artisans. This is a very rewarding place to live and an exciting city to visit. There is so much to see, taste and experience.  We are excited to host your stay in Barcelona, provide recommendations and help you to have the best experience this great city has to offer!


Safe travels :)

reviews.comments: Thank you very much, Jon, for your great job, warm welcome of my co-workers Amichai and Daniel! Your apartment is situated in a comfortable place, it took them not for a long time to get Fira Gran Via . I advise this apartment especially with such good owner to everybody!

We stayed here 9 nights in April. Oscar  (the host) was great. He helped us carry our luggage to the apartment  (4th floor) and gave us plenty of Tipps and suggestions what to do during our stay. The apartment itself was nice, clean and very new. Unfortunately the recent renovation caused some inconvenience. The hallways had a strong chemical smell due to the fresh paint. Also you could still hear some construction going 0 in other parts of the building. These initial problems are likely to be sorted out soon, but as of now i can only give it 4 star. Overall we had a great time in Barcelona.
We loved our stay at John and Oscars apartment. The apartment was very clean, modern and had a great location. We would stay again if returning to Barcelona.
Parfait. Bien situé, très propre, refait a neuf. Si je retourne à Barcelone je louerai à nouveau cet appartement!

Jon's apartment is situated in a location where attractions are at a walkable distance, and lots of eateries nearby. The place is bright and comfortable, and his recommendations are totally spot on! I also appreciate that he allowed us to check out at a later timing due to our late flight. I totally would recommend this apartment :)

First of all, we have to say that Jon is a very friendly host. We had a late check-in and he waited for our appearance late at night. He gave us a lot of interesting and worth seeing tips for locations, bars and restaurants to visit. We could change our check-out in the last day of our stay without problems. Jon arranged this in an uncomplicated manner.

The flat is very nice and functional furnished. All equipment is very new. The beds have comfortable mattresses in which we could sleep very well. In striking distance you will find bars and shops frequented by residents. Even the view from the small balcony over the roofs of Barcelona is a visit worth. A breath-taking view in Barcelona’s real life!

We recommend this apartment without retention and will rent it again for our next stay in this unique town. Thanks, Jon, for making our stay in Barcelona unforgettable!

Kindest regards from Switzerland
Ivan & Nadine

Nice apartment in good area, apartment is at the back of the block so no street noise and the balcony off the living gets sun late afternoon/early evening.
Easy check in and check out.

Nice place in The center of Barcelona. Mira mar is less than 3 mins walk and you can see the best view of The city.
Good flat and Jon is a fantastic person,
Thank you

Great communication from the start - and host made us feel very welcome on arrival. Local points of interest, restaurants and bars where all pointed out. The place was exactly as it appears in the listing - very clean and new fittings, which kept noise out too. Location is as good as expected. We had a great stay and the host was brilliant.

Great apartment, nice location (close to the old city but away from the busy streets!)  and most importantly great recommendations for very good places to eat (Jon provided a list of recommendations and we loved every single one we went to!). We had a great long weekend break!

We had a great time in Barcelona. The place is extremely nice and comfortable and Jon made us feel really welcome. He was always available when we had a problem (one morning we broke a plug and blew a fuse...). We can fully recommend staying there!
Ditte and Nathalie

The apartment is lovely and in a great location; it was easy to get to/from everywhere we wanted and close to some excellent pinchos bars. Jon's recommendations were spot on, especially for paella. He was such a great host and always got back to us straight away. Thanks Jon! We'd love to come back again.
We stay one week in this apartment and everything was exactely how you can see in the pictures. Nice location and nice furnitures. Jon is very kind and always available!
Clean and modern place. Easy communication. Convenient location. Recommended.

The flat is lovely - very clean, spacious and tastefully decorated. The location is convenient - within walking distance to a number of great restaurants and bars, and about a 15 minute walk from the airport shuttle bus. Jon and his niece Olivia were fantastic hosts, very welcoming and helpful, and Jon's recommendations for places to go in the area (particularly for paella, tapas and vermouth) were great. We had a lovely time staying in the flat, and would highly recommend to others looking to have a holiday in Barcelona. Thank you!

We had a fantastic stay at the apartment. Nice and simply renovated with everything you need to have a comfortable stay. Jon gave a great detailed map and restaurant suggestions, which was a big help. Highly recommend the "Pinchos" on Carrer de Blai (La Tasqueta de Blai) and also Agust which is on Carrer del Parlament, all in easy walking distance. Be aware there is no lift and 4 flights of stairs, but this didn't bother us as we needed the exercise

Olivia - Jon's niece - was there to welcome us as Jon was away and was very warm, friendly and helpful.  She even carried my case up 4 flights of stairs as I had a knee injury.  Lots of local information and maps were provided.   The flat was just like the photographs - bright , clean and comfortable. Although small, it was well designed and felt spacious. The air con worked efficiently - much appreciated in the hot weather. It is in a fantastic friendly neighbourhood with lots of restaurants and small supermarkets - the cafe across the street was great for brunch and dinner.  We were able to walk easily to main sights or take the nearby metro. Olivia also gave us good tips and was easy to contact. we would definitely recommend Kerrisdale holdings and would stay there again if visiting Barcelona.  The stairs can feel a bit  tough at the end of the day -  but we didn't mind the exercise.
Had all the necessities, plus great location and air conditioning!! Jon was great, giving us a rundown of information on the apartment and places to go in this amazing city!

Great location & to die for apartment, everything was spot on. Jon a friendly & welcoming host, balcony is great for sipping wine & enjoying the last tantalising rays of sunshine! You cannot help but relax here. 5 star, highly recommended, we'll be back soon!!!?!
We had a great stay here! The apartment was clean and Jon is a lovely host. You can walk to everything and the airport is only 15 minutes with the cab.

Very nice stay in Barcelona, quiet nice neighbourhood. Everything you need in the appartment and a very cosy terrace. The host is very helpful and comes with great tips for restaurants and stuff to do.

Great location, tucked back in a traditional Spanish area, minutes away from everything. Plenty of local cafes, bakeries and tapas restaurants just on the doorstep! The apartment was lovely and the host both accommodating and very helpful, from helping us with a late checkout to always being available to make recommendations.

房東很好人, 主動聯絡及提供協助｡
房間也很乾淨, 實際與照片描述一致｡
地點方便, 5分鍾路程便可達METRO｡

I have been a frequent visitor to Barcelona since one of my best friends moved there seven years ago, and this is one of the nicest apartments I have stayed in. Poole Sec is a fantastic neighbourhood to be based in to make the most of the city - lots of great local restaurants and bars but much more chilled than the old town, with Montjuic and all that has to offer on the doorstep. This apartment was beautifully decorated and had more than enough space for my little family which made for a really luxurious stay. The beds were super comfy and the little balcony a great spot to relax. Communication was spot on in advance of our visit and made our arrival easy and stress free. All in all the perfect weekend break - we will be back!

Its the second time I stayed with Kerrisdale Holding. What can I say: it was the best choice again!!! Jon is a great host - friendly, super responsive and helpful. The appartement was exactly as on the pictures. Perfect for our stay, wonderful furbished up, clean and quiet (which is a rarity in Barcelona ;). We felt like home and we didnt missed anything. Jon gaves us great insight and information for our stay in Barcelona and I would definitely come back and choose him again.
Great spot!  Just a short walk down the street to las ramblas!  Everything was in working order and very clean.  I would most certainly stay here again!

This is a great apartment. We were a group of 2 couples and the space worked really well for us. We really liked the neighbourhood - lots of good bars and restaurants close by and easily walkable to the gothic quarter etc. The flat was really clean and we had a lovely welcome on arrival. I would happily recommend this as a good spot to locate yourself to explore Barcelona for a few days. The host Jon was also very communicative - thanks Jon!

We loved our stay at this apartment! Jon was an excellent communicator & easy to coordinate with! There is a fantastic little info packet in the apartment for tips on spots to check out in the neighborhood. The neighborhood is fantastic!
One word to the wise - there is 4 flights of stairs to be climbed. Manageable but somewhat dreadful ;)
Jon is a wonderful host! Gave us so many good advices. The apartment is beautiful, clean and in a great location. Can't wait to go back...
Lovely flat with a lovely little balcony. Would stay there again..only issue was the stairs(!) but this seems quite normal for apartments in Spain

We had a great time staying in this apartment. The host was excellent, it was nice to speak English to someone:) The apartment was in a great location. It was close to a bunch of cheap bars and restaurants and was fairly close to the metro. Our host also mentioned taking a walk a few blocks away from the apartment to get a great view of the entire city. We wouldn't have known about this otherwise. I also liked that this area wasn't very touristy. It was refreshing to have some quiet.
This place is fantastic - perfect location, really clean and beautifully decorated. Jon is a fantastic host, would highly recommend.
Really great location ! Quiet and secure. We've enjoyed a lot our stay. Flat was clean and nice.

This is a great apartment in a fantastic location, a lovely neighbourhood away from the tourist areas (which are an easy walk away) and so close to restaurants and bars and transport. Jon and Ana were fantastic hosts with plenty of great suggestions to discover Barcelona. The apartment itself was very comfortable, bright and airy, with lovely views. Highly recommended!

The apartment is really beautiful .. totally as you see in the pictures...well located..lovely little terrace for breakfast in the morning. .
All you need...bed is very comfortable. .and it's quiet..even with the window open at night...
Will be back soon....
Nice clean place with great sun through the balcony. Very convenient to metro, restaurants and in a quiet location. I would recommend it.
Check in und out war sehr unkompliziert. Für Fragen um alles konnten wir uns immer melden. Es war sehr freundlich. Die Lage der Wohnung ist super. Es war sehr sauber . Würden wieder gehen.

This is a wonderful apartment tucked away in a very authentic neighbourhood with so many great local tapas bars nearby. 
The apartment was exceptionally clean, and the little balcony was just perfect for sunsets. 
Would definetly recommend!!
I will be back!! I loved staying at this place. : )

Great location in poble sec, comfy bed and couch homy. Miro paintings inspired as to visit museum close by. Anna restaurant recommendations great. Quimet y quimet a must try tapas place in poble sec. Accomodated extra hr for late check out. U get a sense of city life in bcn. Markets close by.

Note room a little small but comfy. 
Note stairs steep esp if you have lots of luggage. Electric stove not easy with large frying pan.

Our place was on new la rambla which is quite quiet though everything was about 15 or 20 minutes away. A beautiful brand new flat though it's on the 4th floor so be prepared to climb 71 stairs daily. If you left the doors open the air con cools the rooms down well. Ana was amazing lovely and genuine and her recommendations were fantastic. Thanks for a great stay!

Apt. was as described; FANTASTIC location to experience Barcelona outside of the touristy areas.  Easy access to subway and to walk everywhere you'd want with tapas nirvana steps away!  Host also provides a nespresso machine that is much appreciated; would def stay here again if given the chance.  Great apt.!

The place was just as pictured, clean with plenty of space. Ana was incredibly helpful, communicative and flexible with check-in time. We were even provided with an extensive list of recommendations for the neighborhood and city. Wonderful stay, will be back!

My friend and I absolutely fell in love with this place. Wish we could stay forever!
The apartment was clean, well furnished, well kept up, modern, but also in such an idilic place We loved the position of the apartment; sitting on the balcony was our favourite bit watching all the lives go by. 
Great communication by lovely Ana too!
Metro, supermarkets, tapas restaurants all close by.
We'll be back!

The apartment is exactly as described, newly refurbished, comfortable beds, fully equipped kitchen and high spec. shower room and TV.  Everything you need is provided for you as though you are (Email hidden by Airbnb) munication from the host is very well, they would be in touch every step of the way.  Questions were answered almost immediately through (Hidden by Airbnb) .

I made a mistake by leaving the keys inside the keyhole when I left the flat but the problem was fixed without issue by the host.

This is by far one of the best Airbnb experiences I've had.  Highly recommend to anyone who visit Barcelona, the apartment is big enough for 4 people with 2 rooms.

One point to note, it's a 4th floor apartment , stairs would be slight steep for some people but I had no issue.

Thanks for the lovely experience to the host Jon and Ana.
Central location wonderful contact from the begining to the end.  Thanks one more time
Flat is ok. Nothing special, but quite comfortable. Not too clean. But it is near the street were in the evening a lot of pubs do work. It is good. And not far from rambla - 1,2 km
The apartment was really great ! We enjoyed it (it corresponds to all points in the description and the images). Ana was also great and we had all informations we need. THANKS AGAIN ! :)
Apartment was clean, in a great neighborhood, and as advertised. The four flights of stairs were a bit of a trek, but that is nitpicking - we really enjoyed our stay.
Clean and comfortable. Close to many restaurants, Montjuic, and Parallel Metro and bus service. Ana was friendly and very helpful.

Great place to stay, highly recommend it!
Very easy communication with the host and very helpful host,  clean and comfortable, nothing bad to say!

We had wonderful 5 nights in this beautiful and very cozy apartment. 
The description is 100% correct.
The communication was perfect and very helpful. 
We totally recommend this place!

The staying was perfect! 
Ana who meat us was very friendly and helpful. She gave us a map and explained where we can go, what we should visit and etc. 
The flat is rather small but very clean and bright. All that is needed was inside including Nespresso coffee machine!!!
The location is perfect: very close to the street with different cafes and restaurants, 5 minutes walk to the metro station Paral-Lel.

We really enjoyed staying

Ana has been a perfect host for us. She guided us to best places in the surroundings. Apartment is new and fresh. It was very nice in the morning to have our breakfast on the terrace while the city is waking up. Great experience!
Lovely apartment, lovely host, amazing city!! We hope to return sometime soon. Some great recommendations from the host.

Loved the location. The neighborhood was a great home base with great restaurants and bars nearby, and only a 10-15 minute walk from the center. The host also provides an awesome list of recommendations throughout the city.
Great view, perfect location, incredible city!

The apartment is so stylish and a calm refuge in the city. The host (Ana) was amazing, preparing a list of recommendations and always on hand by (Hidden by Airbnb) to give further tips. There are some incredible places to eat and drink within just a few minutes walk, and a Metro station close by for trips to the more touristy sights. We got to feel like we were locals, not just visitors. 

A few details that might be useful to future guests: there are no locks on any bedroom/bathroom doors in the apartment; the walls are fairly thin so you can hear people coming and going in the stairwell in the building; and when we stayed there were sheets not duvets on the beds - but it was plenty warm enough. None of this bothered us and we really appreciated this classy space for a slow start every morning and to come back to and enjoy every night. 

I wish we'd stayed longer!

Ana was great at checking us in and showing us around. The listing is small but functional and cozy, the decor was nice and everything was clean. The location was great and we enjoyed walking around to all the more popular areas. Would stay again!

Great unit in an awesome area. The unit was super clean and had all of the amenities you need. 

Ana made checkin a breeze and had great recommendmations for the neighborhood. 

Would highly recommend for 2-4 people.  It is noted in description but there are 4 flights with narrow steps to get up. Not an issue but helpful for luggage considerations.

tres jolie appartement bien rénové , tres bien situé , Calme , propre
hôte agréable
à relouer si  nouveau séjour sur Barcelone
3e 4e etage sans ascenseur
super sejour à Barcelone
Buchung und Kontakt waren unkompliziert, die Wohnung liegt sehr ruhig, und zentral und ist wirklich schön und gepflegt eingerichtet. Wir haben uns dort sehr wohlgefühlt.

The apartment was great - very clean and stylish. It was also in a great location - just round the corner were the best cafes were you could eat pintxos (a must) and most attractions were walking distance or a very short train ride away. The only con was the noise - I would make sure you take some earplugs (which we luckily had) as the people upstairs were very noisy and also the stairwell can be too. I would still stay here again though!

Apartment was as pretty what I imagined from the photos: very bright, clean, well designed. Cool residential neighborhood with lots of new restaurants. May not be central but subway is easy as is even walking or biking the city as we did. Our host had excellent food tips and made checkin and out smooth.

Nous sommes venus 4 jours pour découvrir Barcelone.
L'appartement est très bien situé. 
Les photos décrivent précisément ce que nous avons découvert.
L'appartement est fonctionnel, très très bien équipé et extrêmement propre.
De nombreux détails sont une véritable plus value : liste des différents restaurants recommandés, ...
La communication avec Ana a été très efficace.
Nous recommandons ce logement.
Nice, authentic residential building very near Montjuic for walking and near the Parallel subway station.  Updated interior.  Excellent host communication and written suggestions upon arrival.

The flat is very quiet as it overlooks internal courtyards and comfortable. The finish is of good quality. The location is ideal for sightseeing and night life in the city and close to bus and metro stations.
The bed and sofa are very comfortable and the kitchen is well equipped.
The interaction and communication with the host was excellent!
I would recommend staying there.

Diese Unterkunft ist hinsichtlich vieler Punkte nahezu perfekt: tolle Lage, sichere Nachbarschaft, Sauberkeit, sehr ruhig, hell und viele Ausgeh- und Einkaufsmöglichkeiten um die Ecke! Letzteres ist insbesondere von Vorteil, wenn man nach einem langen Tag nicht mehr durch die ganze Stadt möchte, um ein gutes Restaurant oder ähnliches zu erreichen. Die Wohnung liegt super - zum einen direkt am Montjuïc, zum anderen nahe Hafen und Strand, also auch ein hervorragender Ausgangspunkt für Läufer, die jeden Morgen eine Laufstrecke suchen! Der Checkin und die Kommunikation rundherum kann man als perfekt bezeichnen - Ana hat uns sehr nett empfangen. Wir kommen auf jeden Fall wieder! :)

The apt was fantastic, clean, and bigger than expected from the pictures. The two bedrooms were spacious with full/queen size beds that were comfortable. The bedrooms were not next to each other as I thought but instead were across the hall/living room from each other.  Ana, the host, was great with check-in and check-out. She also provided a comprehensive list of recommendations for sightseeing, restaurants, bars, hangouts etc that were cross referenced to a map.  The map was very helpful.
The apartment was clean, biright, comfortable, and in a convenient location. The neighborhood is off the tourist track, it is close to the metro, and walking distance to many sites.

I would highly recommend this apartment if you want to experience Barcelona as a local. The neighbourhood of El Poble Sec has a great vibe and some of the best eating places in the city, and it is only a short walk to the bus and Metro which will take you quickly to any part of the city. Ana provided excellent food recommendations, some literally a few steps from the apartment. She also provided a warm welcome and kept me up to date on things to do and places to visit. The apartment itself has a contemporary feel and was exceptionally clean and had all the necessary items to make for a great stay. Thank you!
Great location and flat. Host communicated very well and gave us great tips on how to best enjoy our stay in Barcelona. We'll be back for sure.
good option for an easy stay and decent money.nice located close by main attractions.recommended

This place is clean, nice and central. The host is very nice, and she gave us all The information that we needed, and more.
We like to go back there.

Very clean apartment with plenty of space for my sister and I. Ana was very helpful with giving us information on the city and being in communication through out our stay. Also love the location, we would definitely recommend this flat to anyone looking to stay in Barcelona.

We had a wonderful stay. Anna was incredibly helpful and made everything very easy. The location is wonderful, very local but within walking distance of everything. Around the corner is a street lined with good tapas bars. Glad we chose to stay here.

Awesome apartment. Great area, it was just great to stay there.
The communication was so easy and so friendly.
I come back, definitely!

Lägenheten är rymlig, mysig och välutrustad för att vara i Spanien. Badrummet är fräscht och utrustad med både stor vattentank (annars vanligt att behöva duscha kallt i Spanien) och tvättmaskin! 
I köket finns en espresso-bryggare vilket jag som svensk uppskattar oerhört då det spanska kaffet är allt annat än starkt. Att börja morgonen med en espresso på balkongen var ljuvligt! 
Sovrummen har sköna sängar och kuddar och vetter inte ut mot gatan vilket gör det ganska tyst (förutom att de spanska husen har lite klena väggar men det kan man knappast lasta ägaren för). Det fanns också en karta med trevliga restauranger och barer i området. Vi provade några och det visade sig vara toppen!
Utöver detta var värden oerhört gullig och erbjöd sig att komma med medicin när jag blev sjuk! Summeringen är att detta är ett så mysigt boende och jag skulle lätt kunna boka igen om jag återvänder till Barcelona. <3

The apt was very clean and was located in a quiet area, which was nice. Montjüic is very close, a pretty hard 30 minute walk, but is well worth it.

Ana was great at check in and with recommendations. 

I had an issue with the host as I sent a message regarding an early check in and an extra guest a few weeks before my check in to which they never responded.

When I was finally able to get WiFi prior to my check in, I had several messages from airbnb support stating I was late for my check in, when I wasn’t because it was not yet 3pm-the time stated as regular check in on the host’s page. 

Then after check in, I received another message from airbnb support stating as I had discussed with and agreed to with Jon, I would pay $25 additionally for my guest. This conversation never happened. 

Instead of communicating directly with the guest, the host chose to keep going through support. The headache was an annoying side note on my otherwise great vacation. 

Nice place to stay, just be prepared.

Clean, comfortable apartment with small patio perfect for reading, coffee or a glass of wine. Ana was incredible, attentive from our arrival to when we left, even setting up a taxi to get us to the airport on our departure day. She had great recommendations on where to go, especially some good restaurants we never would have found otherwise. Would stay here again.
Perfect AirBnb in a wonderful neighborhood. Check in was very easy and plenty of local tips made our visit extremely easy and very enjoyable. Thank you!

The Apartment is only 20 minutes walk away from Las Ramblas und some more to the port. The subway and the bus is 5 minutes walk and there are a lot of small restaurants just 1 minute away from the Apartment for tasty Pinxos! Ana was really friendly and helped us with a lot of tips for Barcelona.
super komfortable wohnung für zwei freunde die zeit miteinander verbringenu wollen (2 einzelne schlafzimmer !)!! um die ecke findet man viele tolle cafes und restaurants!!

We have a very pleasant stay at Ana's property. Everything is brand new and very clean. The metro station is in a short walking distance. The communication was excellent, while we had a little emergency at the apartment Ana had come straight away and helped us.
We were recommended many local spots, we have tried a few and they all were excellent! Thank you Ana for the great local experience at Barcelona!

한국어 후기가 없기때문에 한국어로 작성할게요. 출발 전부터 John과 Ana가 계속해서 피드백을 주기때문에 도착해서도 어려움 없이 체크인이 가능했어요. 첫 에어비앤비라 걱정 많이 했는데 깨끗하고 안전하고 편안하게 지냈습니다. 그릇,냄비,식기 모도 준비되어 있고 욕실이나 세탁시설도 잘 되어 있어서 좋았어요. 2베드를 선택한건 정말 잘했던 선택이었고요. 5박을 지내면서 불편했던게 하나도 없어요. 다만 엘리베이터가 없다는 것만 체크하시면 될거 같아요. 세심하게 신경써준 Ana에게 고마워요.
Erg aardige host, veel goede tips en een perfecte startplek voor een heerlijk lang weekend weg. Lekker dichtbij de metro maar genoeg te zien op loopafstand.
Very nice place and thoughtful host

This is a wonderful flat in an ideal location and a great value! The neighborhood has fantastic dining----many great Tapas places right on the same street.--- and is only a 5 to 10 min walk to the metro which will take you anywhere in the city! Download the "moovit" App for public transportation. It's much more useful than the Maps App if you want to use the metro (which I recommend)  You are also walking distance to Montjuic Castle  and park which is very fun! The Tram that takes you to the beach is also located in that area. You can also walk to  Las Ramblas or take the metro one stop. Super convenient location. The Flat was very clean, comfortable spacious and quiet. The pictures featured are accurate.  It is on the 4th floor w/ no lift----so keep that in mind if you have any physical problems getting around. But if you're in normal good health it's no problem at all!!  The Flat has everything you need for an easy stay. Full Kitchen w/ basics like salt pepper oil coffee etc.  Washer , Hair dryer Shampoo soap towels etc. The Terrace is very nice to enjoy a cup of coffee or glass of wine. Anna was prompt and easy to communicate with---she even called us a cab for our final trip to the Airport! She also provided a detailed map and an extensive travel guide w/ a  list of restaurants, bars, shopping, tourist attractions and a break down of the various neighborhoods!! We referred to her guide many times during our stay!  All in all this is a fantastic place to explore Barcelona from! I highly recommend!!

Super great place, very clean, quiet and within easy walking distance to the centre and beach.

Ana the host was lovely and recommended lots of places for us to go to. Highly recommend going to restaurant palo cortao just around the corner.

Overall a lovely place to stay.
Great place, great view, good situation. I recommand !

The apartment is gorgeous, comfortable & spotlessly clean- would definitely recommend staying here. Walkable distance to the centre plus lots of cute cafes & restaurants nearby (the flat itself was nice and quiet though). We really enjoyed drinking coffees on the sunny balcony!

Communication was easy and friendly- Ana took the time to talk us through the local area which was really helpful.   

Things to consider: Plenty of space for 2 people, might be a bit cosy with 4 adults! Also it's up 3 flights of steep-ish steps (was fine for us but something to be aware of).

집은 깨끗하고 좋았어요
5층ㄹㄹㄹ인데 엘리베이텈ㅋㅋ가 없어서 너무 힘들었어요 ㅠㅠ
근처에 식당이 많아 식사하신 ㅁ 좋아요
We had a nice stay in this apartment. Many thanks to Ana who made everything easier.

Location was outstanding.  A quiet, local neighborhood away from the chaos, yet close to everything.  Very close to what became our favorite restaurant - Boca Oreja, and we enjoyed walking through the El Raval neighborhood on our way home, discovering great little watering holes.  Although we didn't meet Anna, she was amazing and everything everyone says - joyful, responsive and very helpful.  She left us in great hands.  5 stars all the way around.

Very nice unit with a ton of added amenities. The area is diverse and full of great food options. 
Communication was excellent and check-in was a breeze even with a delayed flight. 
I would highly recommend. Be aware the unit is several floors up.

The Apartment is perfect for a trip to Barcelona. Location is close to a lot of destinations and the surrounding bars, cafes are all you need. Ana did our check in, which was just perfect and she was always available if you have questions or need a good recommendation (all very good).We will definitely come back. 

Thank you very much

The place was nice, clean and homey. It had the essentials which is what we needed since we spent most of our time out and about. The hosts were there to greet us and walk us through local areas and restaurants, they were also super useful when we had questions and responded very quickly. Would stay here again

Amazing location!  In a quiet, residential area but walking distance to everything (or a quick metro ride). One of the highlights was a pedestrian street right beside the condo full of amazing restaurants and cafes, there must have been 30 or more restaurants within a 5 minute walk!  Comfortable beds, good black out curtains and good air conditioning.  I'd say the only small negative is due to the fact it's an older building, you can hear the neighbours above walking around and when the bedroom doors are fully closed, the rooms can get warm.  But the easy solution is leave the bedroom doors open to access the AC.  Hosts were very friendly!   A nice little balcony  to sit and enjoy a drink.  Just remember, it is on the fourth floor with no elevator.  We managed with carrying our baby and stroller up each time, so it wasn't an issue.  I highly recommend staying here and would stay again!

We had a great stay in Barcelona this passed week. We were greeted by Ana who was a pleasure. Very friendly, on time and helpful with plenty of tips for food and entertainment etc.. She also responded to our requests/questions immediately. Our only issue was the lock on the main door! its stiff and pretty hard to use but its very solid and made us feel very safe inside.
Great experience all in all.

We really liked the apartment, everything nice and clean. Great location - lot's of tapas places nearby. The place is also very close to city center and Rambla. Just a small note - it's on the fourth floor without elevator (as mentioned in the description) - just keep in mind if you have lots of luggage.

We had an amazing trip to Barcelona. The apartment was in a perfect location, close to the best tapas restaurants in Barcelona. The place was very clean and had everything we needed to stay comfortably. Ana went above and beyond to make sure that our visit was filled with the best food and experiences. We feel very lucky to have had such welcoming hosts and a beautiful place to call home for our stay in Barcelona.

We really enjoyed our time at this apartment. It is in a great location with lots of restaurants, a five-minute walk to the metro, and grocery stores relatively close by. It was also nice to stay in a little residential neighborhood where you feel like you are a part of the city. 
Our favorite part was the neat little balcony where we could sip some wine in the evening and relax.
The apartment was nice and neat with a working air conditioning. The hike up all of the stairs was a bit tiring but good exercise.
Ana was very helpful and provided a list of recommended restaurants and shops in the neighborhood along with a map.

Appartement très agréable et lumineux dans un quartier populaire avec de nombreux restaurants de tapas peu chères la journée et bars assez vivants à partir de minuit.
Je recommande Tacos Tacos et leur mezcal ;)

Plage à 15min en bus,
Attention quelques escaliers.

Nos hôtes Ana et Ximena étaient agréables et réactives, bonne adresse
Super appartement et hôte très gentil.
Was perfect for what we where looking for. Great access to taxis
Es un buen apartamento bien ubicado limpio. Ana es una super anfitriona que te ayuda bastante en la ciudad. No hay ascensor pero eso no es mayor impedimento.

Very good place
Thanks
I recommand
Very nice, clean place. Had a good time staying there and would come back again.
Everything here was perfect. Probably the best tips on local places we’ve ever had, and the apartment is perfectly located. I wouldn’t want to stay anywhere else!

A great little apartment - clean, stylish and a window into Barcelona's local life. The hosts were extremely friendly, welcoming and professional - in particular the first day welcome meeting and the rapid communications whenever wanted, were hallmarks of their great service. Definitely recommended.

Lovely welcome by Ana. Greeted with warmth and recommendations for things to do in the area. 
Apartment was of a high standard and very clean. Overall a brilliant Air Bnb and highly recommended.
Thanks so much :-)
No elevators, apt on 4 Th floor.  Very hard to carry suitcases..  limited toilet paper unlike other places. AC doesn’t work well at all.  Very small balcony, chair uncomfortable.
Very nice location and appartement. Great host and hospitality. Very professional.

Great space! The location was within walking distance to everything we could have needed-metro, restaurants, supermarket etc. The flat was very modern, a little tiring to get to it being a walk up, a lot of stairs! But worth the journey!  We were given a very detailed list of local spots and the ones we did go to did not disappoint! Very nice touch and it was very appreciated! We had an excellent stay and would highly recommend as long as you’re willing to climb quite a few stairs! Thanks for being our home away from home in the beautiful Barcelona!
The location of this apartment is so outstanding. It’s the perfect size for two single people and a great spot to have a drink on the balcony after a long day of exploring.

Great Location and a very nice flat! Communication was fast ne very friendly! 
We would recommend the place
Très propre.  Manque selon nous un peu de cachet.  Chambre et couchages excellents!  Ana, notre contact, est très efficace.  Réponds à tous nos messages dans la minute!
New apartment in a convenient location and very nice host. Thank you for a wonderful stay in Barcelona!

This apt is a gem! Great location, lots of wonderful restaurants nearby, sparkling clean, great amenities and fabulous hospitality from the hosts.  Ana greeted us and spent time showing us where things are in the apt, reviewing a list of great places to consider during our stay (prepared maps and info for us!!) and answering our questions.  She and Jon were both very responsive and easy to communicate with.  The AC works well (although we didn't need it much in Oct).  The location was a quick 5 min walk to the metro and about 10-15 to Las Ramblas.  Great neighborhood, felt very safe.  I highly recommend you book this apt if it's available!  I guarantee you will love it.

Had a great stay in Barcelona at this apartment! Ana was very accommodating and made great recommendations on local places to explore. She was very flexible with our check in and check out times and kept an open line of communication during our stay. This location was close to lines of public transportation to all the tourist attractions but still had a neighborhood feel. We were walking distance from some great tapas places. I would highly recommend staying here if you’re visiting Barcelona!

Great location in a vibrant neighborhood with lots of small bars and restaurants. The apartment is small yet feels spacious with comfortable beds. Hosts Ana and Jon were very responsive. Thanks guys will stay here again when in Barcelona!

Good place, really clean and good assistent from host. Livingroom a little small. Balcony facing backyard, no sun in late november and so on. Smelly stairway. BUT over all a good place for the price! Next time we will try El Born :).
Cute place in a good location. We walked almost everywhere. Plenty to do and eat. Quiet beautiful neighborhood.

Good value for a place that could sleep 4. Balcony is cute and there was no noise issues. The location is great because it's a quick walk to a metro stop but the neighborhood is a great up and coming area with a large pedestrian street full of great tapas and bars. Kitchen is small but would work for small meals. A lot of steps!
This place is very nice and flawless clean. The netflix on TV is prefect for  guest to enjoy an awesome night at home. They prepared detailed local guides and we definitely found it very helpful.
Great place in an upcoming neighbourhood. Ideal for families, 2 good (Email hidden by Airbnb) fortable, with some nice touches. Good choice !

5 flight of stairs really difficult to have luggage. water problems in the walls creating a mold smell problem. Also, be aware as they will ask you for a photograph of your passport that the host keeps in his private cell phone. It is better to check in at a hotel. Save yourself the headache.

This apartment was amazing for our week long stay in Barcelona. It was well connected, but a little bit away from the hustle and bustle so it was a nice place to rest. It was very clean, and had anything we could possibly need. Jon and Ximena were very responsive and the guides to the neighborhood and Barcelona that were provided were very helpful. The best part of this Bnb was that two streets down was an incredible street great for drinks and cheap delicious bites to eat.
Estuvimos muy agusto. El apartamento como lo esperamos, la zona de los pintxos que estaba alado, muy recomendable. Ximena fue muy atenta y nos ayudó en todo lo que necesitamos.

This was one of the most positive AirBnB experiences I've ever had, from check-in to check out. We were met during check-in and the host showed us around the apartment and gave us our key, the apartment was extremely clean and VERY cute! We had complimentary coffee and cookies, towels, access to a washer, and super comfortable beds. On top of all that, the location was amazing. There was not a single place on our itinerary that was more than a 15-20 minute walk away. Lastly, the host was so kind and quick to respond to any of our questions. I'll definitely be looking to stay here again during my next trip to Barcelona!

name: Nice Decorated Studio in Central

space: 24 hours Security and reception in the apartment.

The House was Designed by Sarkis Balyan in (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) , the Akaretler Row Houses were built by Sultan Abdulaziz to accommodate the most prominent and high-ranking officials of Dolmabahce Palace. N 24 hours Security and reception in the apartment. There is 24 hour security and reception in the house I am always available on (Hidden by Airbnb) and calls AKARETLER ROW HOUSES Designed by Sarkis Balyan in (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) , the Akaretler Row Houses were built by Sultan Abdulaziz to accommodate the most prominent and high-ranking officials of Dolmabahce Palace.
