neighborhood_overview: AKARETLER ROW HOUSES Designed by Sarkis Balyan in 1875, the Akaretler Row Houses were built by Sultan Abdulaziz to accommodate the most prominent and high-ranking officials of Dolmabahce Palace. After careful research into their cultural and historical significance and structure, the Row Houses were authentically restored in Akaretler, one of the most important districts of Istanbul where the city’s deep historical legacy feels tangible. Upon the completion of restoration work that highlights the area’s architectural and visual grace, this historical district has been re-introduced to modern city life. At the completion of this restoration process that emphasized the region’s architectural and visual elegance, this historical district entered an exciting new phase, becoming a thriving part of contemporary urban life.    The Row Houses project enriches the fabric of the city and each of the venues and galleries that are opening one after another include historically conscious artistic t
access: There is 24 hour security and reception in the house
interaction: I am always available on (Hidden by Airbnb) and calls
house_rules: Please don't change the places of furniture, Read manuals before using electronic devices such as fruit juicer, projector, TV, modem and reciever.

host.host_about:
I am new in Airbnb and I am exited to host people. My full name is Enes Kutluca, you can always find me on social media @eneskutluca and have more idea about me.

I am young entrepreneur trying to change our world for a better place. I do own my own business "Biopipe" which is a waste water treatment pipe. 

I like creating, thinking differently and designing new things. 

I believe in sharing culture and I am here to offer my best in the town.

name: MONTJUIC FOUNTAINS APARTMENT
summary: Excellent apartment situated opposite Barcelona Fair and Conference Centre complex.
space: Recently renovated, beautiful apartment in an elegant building which was built in the sixties. It faces the Barcelona Convention and Exhibition Centre, and has wonderful views of Barcelona. It has two double bedrooms, two single bedrooms (all with single beds), two bathrooms with a shower, a fully-equipped separate kitchen, and a living room. The building has a lift. It is perfect for companies which want to be based near to all the conventions. The apartment is decorated in a very functional, minimalist style. You will find a wide range of services and entertainment close at hand. You can take a stroll along Paralelo Avenue, the Barcelona street famous for its shows, visit Plaça Espanya Square, see the Fountains of Montjuic, or climb to the top of the hill where you can visit the castle, and enjoy a view of the city and port which you will never forget. To see the route from the nearest METRO, click here Tourist registration code: HUTB001670
description: Excellent apartment situated opposite Barcelona Fair and Conference Centre complex. Recently renovated, beautiful apartment in an elegant building which was built in the sixties. It faces the Barcelona Convention and Exhibition Centre, and has wonderful views of Barcelona. It has two double bedrooms, two single bedrooms (all with single beds), two bathrooms with a shower, a fully-equipped separate kitchen, and a living room. The building has a lift. It is perfect for companies which want to be based near to all the conventions. The apartment is decorated in a very functional, minimalist style. You will find a wide range of services and entertainment close at hand. You can take a stroll along Paralelo Avenue, the Barcelona street famous for its shows, visit Plaça Espanya Square, see the Fountains of Montjuic, or climb to the top of the hill where you can visit the castle, and enjoy a view of the city and port which you will never forget. To see the route from the nearest METRO, click he
notes: - Barcelona Bedroom es una pequeña empresa familiar con más de 50 apartamentos en Barcelona. - Nuestros apartamentos están equipados con todo lo necesario para realizar la estancia. La cocina dispone de menaje, cubiertos, vajilla, cafetera y pequeño electrodoméstico aunque no encontrarás productos básicos de cocina como aceite, azúcar o sal. - Hay ropa de cama y toallas para todos los ocupantes. - Hacemos un cambio de ropa de cama y toallas en estancias superiores a 7 noches. - Disponemos de wifi por un pequeño coste extra. ***Tasa turística no incluida: 2,48€ por noche y persona***
interaction: .INFORMATION TO THE GUESTS:  - An 24/7 emergency phone number will be provided at your arrival for anything what could happen during your stay  - According to the Barcelona law we are committed to register all occupants information, so you will receive an email with a form that you will need to fill in with all the occupants data  - We remind you that you will need to call 30 minutes prior your arrival at the apartment to the check-in phone numb (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) -If you don't call the check-in phone number nobody will be waiting for youat the apartment
house_rules: .GUESTS REGISTRATION:  - The registration of all occupants data is an obligation by Barcelona law. You will receive an E-mail enabling you to supply us with these details online  - The guest assumes responsibility to return the apartment and all its furniture and equipment in good condition on the day of departure. The apartment and sets of keys should be handed back in the same conditions as that of the arrival date  - The guest agrees to respect the residents of neighbouring apartments and to not cause excessive noise at any time of day. The failure to complete with the above conditions may result in immediate eviction from the Terrallar S.L. property without receiving any refund.  - The client assumes the responsibility of the apartment as well as the furniture and utensils, having to leave it in the same conditions as on arrival, the day of departure. Leaving in the apartment as many sets of keys as received on the day of arrival.  - Each set of missing keys will be charged € 30 /

host.host_about:
Barcelona Bedroom es una pequeña empresa familiar con más de 50 apartamentos propios repartidos por toda la cuidad de Barcelona.
Estaremos encantados de recibirte y ayudarte en todo lo necesario para que que tengas una agradable estancia. No dudes en contactar con nosotros. Gracias y esperamos verte pronto.


Un saludo!

reviews.comments: We were 4 people on business travel and the place was absolutely perfect! Clean, quiet (nothing if you want to party), central and a fantastic view and surrounding.

Very bright and clean apartment in front of the Fira Center and next to the Crown Plaza it can't be more convenient for a business trip. The view is very nice and all rooms and bedrooms are very practical.

Hola,

El apartamento está en general muy bien. En nuestra opinión se nota que es una empresa de apartamentos y no una casa de un particular. Muy mal que para un apartamentos de 6 personas sólo den un juego de llaves! 
Estaría bien que hubieran dejado los mínimo: Papel higiénico suficiente, agua, café.

Great apartment set in the heart of Barcelona and just a stone's throw from Espana Plaza. Apartment is spacious with everything we needed. Clean, great views of the city and close to transport links. Host was fantastic at allowing us to extend our stay by a day and have lots of great tips on how to explore the city. Barcelona was amazing and will definitely come back - would stay here again in a heartbeat.

L'appartement est très bien situé, bien desservi par les transports en commun.
Il est bien entretenu, et propre.Il offre une belle vue à toutes les fenêtres ( fontaines de Montjuic, centre de Barcelone). L'ascenceur est pratique pour l'appartement qui est au 6ème étage. Il y a tous les commerces nécessaires à proximité.

Par contre, l'isolation par les fenêtres et à revoir car on entend beaucoup les bruits de circulation de la rue qui est passagère y compris la nuit. On ne peut pas remonter les volets jusqu'en haut sinon, ils se coincent. Dans une des salles de bains, il y a toujours une odeur d'égout.

всем привет) отличное месторасположение!заселили раньше чем указано,не пришлось где то сидеть и ждать с чемоданами-спасибо!))) кому нужен тихий сон,данный вариант не подойдёт! остекление очень тонкое, окна на проезжую часть,ночью шумно от машин!будет проблема,если вы приедите , как мы большой компанией 5 человек, установлен маленький бойлер для  воды, приходилось ждать , когда вода нагреется! хороший сигнал интернета! прекрасные живописные виды из окон! 10-15 минут пешком до старого города!   в общем данный вариант оставил положительное впечатление! спасибо))))

This apartment and the surrounding area were great and very comfortable.  We were greeted well when we arrived and the host is very professional.  Also, the area was easy to make daily excursions around Barcelona from.    I was surprised to find that the kitchen didn't have an oven though.

Firstly the accomadation is in a really fantastic location with special views of the city - if you dont mind being a little bit out of the downtown. Easy walk to metro in 5mins. The instructions on how to get to accomodation and the process is super clear and professional. Call as soon as you land as taxi only takes max 20 mins. Appeared that host is not the actual home owner but rather part of a management company - not relevant for appartment. Kitchen had all utensils required but no basics such as sugar,salt etc. Good space in the appartment for a group and a great sitting room. Take note of late arrival charges - they are communicated in listing. Panorama view of Tibidabo hill is fantastic and location again great if you dont need to be ultra central.

Excellent communication and very easy to find. Clean and spacious apartment with great views. Maybe one or two chairs and one sharp knife would be nice but everything else is OK and we would definitely come here again.
This apartment was a wonderful place for our stay, the apartment was very clean, space full and perfectly situated.

Not much contact with the host, but when needed was eay to get hold of. The Neighbor hood is very nice, with a few Supermarkets & Cafe's around. 

Relatively easy to get a Taxi as they wait beside the hotel down the road. Place was clean and tidy and I would definitely recommend.

We were phones on the day we we travelling to confirm our arrival time. We were met at the door as we turned up. The flat was ready and we were quickly checked. Efficient, proactive and friendly service - I couldn't fault it
The host was very kind and helpful. The apartment is really good located for those who come to sight see Barcelona

This is a great apartment in an amazing location. The stay is overall very comfortable and I would stay there again. Having said that, there were a few things to note for improvement, but not deal breakers for me: 

1. we stayed a week and ran out of toilet paper on day 3. we were informed that we need to supply our toilet paper. not an expensive buy, but the inconvenience of having to worry about that was not pleasant.
2. the smell of cigarette smoking from other apartments in the building kept coming in through the heating vents, i had to open the windows to air the rooms every few hours. This was certainly unpleasant, but i guess it could happen anywhere.
3. as others mentioned, sometimes smells were noticed in the bathrooms - it happened randomly through the day. i guess the building;s vent systems are not great.

again, these were minor things. we felt very comfortable otherwise. we also really appreciated the view and the location. the beds were comfortable too.
Perfect location at 5 min walk from Plaça Espagna, beautiful view, clean rooms, a very good experience!
Casa amplia y cómoda con excelente ubicación

Ne cherchez pas le 1 de la rue, c'est au 1 bis. retard de l'hôte et accueil assez glacial. Il ne répond aux appels que par textos. Assez bruyant et des améliorations sont à apporter dans l'ensemble. Odeurs désagréables dans les salles de bain. Cependant, l'appartement est bien situé et nous a permis de passer un séjour agréable. Idéal pour un très court séjour. A recommander pour le feu d'artifice du 31 décembre, vous y avez accès depuis les chambres comme s'il était tiré spécialement pour vous.
This apartment is beautiful and spacious, its the perfect size for a larger group of people. Beautiful view of Barcelona. We really enjoyed our stay
Meticulously clean, perfectly located, and a large comfortable apartment. It was perfect for us.

Great apartment, excellent location near Plaça Espanya, just a few steps from the Magic Fountains and the Museu Nacional d'Art de Catalunya.  Everything was as expected, very clean, very comfortable, nice view from the kitchen window.  Check-in process was fast and smooth.  It is located on a SIXTH floor, but the building has an elevator for 3 people.  Shower cabin in one of the bathrooms is very small, if you are a medium sized man, you will have some troubles.  But anyway, this is one of the few things you have to live with when you travel.  If I return to Barcelona, I would definitely consider this apartment again.

This is not someone's home, it is run by a company and found that on checking in I had signed a contract, which I feel uncomfortable about. However, it is a spacious apartment in a convenient area a few metro/bus stops from the centre of Barcelona. It is also very close to the 'Magic fountains' of Montjuic. The air conditioning is also very welcome. There is nothing provided in the kitchen. So you need to buy/ bring with you salt, pepper, oil, T towels, toilet paper etc.

Clean place but a/c keeps the place too cold at night. Nice location - near touristy sites and taxi stand is downstairs. Wifi is super slow - cannot stream video. Costs about the same as hotel after you add wifi and tourist tax on arrival.
Excellent location!
Het appartement heeft nog enkel glas waardoor er zeer veel lawaai is 's nachts van de drukke baan . Voor de rest is het een aangenaam appartement met genoeg voorzieningen .

The location is very good, 5 minutes by foot to reach plaza de Espanya, with metro and autobus for the city center and the airport. The apartment is quite big and very clean, bathrooms included. The oven is just a small microwave, but the rest of the equipment in the kitchen is ok. We had to set the heating quite high to have a comfort heating but after that the apartment was comfortable enough. The host is very professional and comunication has been good when necessary, with prompt response.
Very nice apartment. Clean & comfortable. Location is great, taxis are found right outside of the apartment and it is minutes from other public transportation.

The apartment is located very conveniently close to Plaza Espana and walking distance from several bars, supermarkets and attractions. The rooms in the apartment are clean and tidy, the views are great and our host was there to welcome us at the agreed time and provided us with good recommendations about Barcelona. The apartment is a professionally run place, not a private apartment which was apparent from the lack of personal items and few stuff in the kitchen (salt, pepper, oil and other basic cooking ingredients we had to get ourself). Having said that, we had a great time and I can recommend the place for anyone looking for a place to stay for a long weekend with 6 people together.

Check in and communication was very good. The apartment is perfectly for families or groups up to 6 people. It's got 4 bedrooms ( 2 double and 2 single). It is on the 6th floor and there is beautiful view over Barcelona. It is very well located, just a few minutes walk to Plaza España and public transport there. We enjoyed the stay a lot and would recommend the apartment.
Great area to stay and convenient location for conference centre and airport shuttle bus. Overall a good quality and well kept apartment.
Wonderful apartment in a great location, close to the bus and subway. We appreciated the views from the living room and the kitchen. Wifi was strong throughout the apartment.

Nice spaceuous appartment, kinda noisy but great. The kitchen is complete and the bathrooms are clean and splendid. The location is kinda out of the centre, but with cabs / uber it is easy to go to the centre.

The apartment is 5minutes distance to the green line and so very advantage in a easy part of the city. Clean, graceful and very clean. there is an exclusive living room to stay all together also because the apartment is very big, there are 4 bedroom for 6 beds. 
all was ok.
Estancia agradable, el apartamento es tal y como se ve en las imágenes.
Really lovely views over Barcelona. Super confy sofas and beds. Great to have option of all single beds and some single rooms. Great kit hen ans friendly helpful host
Great place with four bedrooms and a convenient location.

This is a nice apartment located very close to the Magic Fountain of Montjuïc which has an cool evening light show.  Air conditioner couldn't keep up with the heat Barcelona was having that week (but in all fairness, it was a record breaking heat wave Barcelona was experiencing.). Apartment managed by a corporate property management company.
Barcelona Bedrooms place an excellent alternative, I recommend it

the elevator m8 be not working. wich will suck if you stay at the upper floors. the bathrooms and rooms dont have locks. house is clean. no extra sheets or pillows. taxi stand is very close. close by small supermarkets and restaurants. wifi is not very strong and in some rooms doest work at all.
Siisti ja tilava asunto kuudennessa kerroksessa. Näkymät olivat huikeat!
Good flat. Easy to check in and out. The flat is fully equiped with towels and other necessery things. I recommend it.

Nos hicieron un gran favor, ya que mi grupo llego a las 11 y nos permitieron dejar las maletas mientras hacían la limpieza e hicimos el check in en ese momento, por lo que estuvimos libres todo el día. El lugar estaba realmente limpio y aunque teníamos 2 personas que suelen sufrir de alergia severa, pudieron disfrutar la estancia sin ninguna incidencia. Toda la estancia ha sido perfecta y no puedo destacar nada negativo~ además siempre resolvieron nuestras dudas al instante, aún cuando hemos contactado con ellos bastante tarde. Esperamos poder repetir~

L’appartamento è molto carino e pulitissimo. Situato a dieci minuti a piedi da piazza d’España gode di una bellissima vista sulla città. I letti sono molto confortevoli. Il  ragazzo che ci ha fatto il check in stato gentilissimo, simpatico e molto preciso nelle istruzioni. Ottimo appartamento.
Appartamento ampio e ben servito con una vista spettacolare, in zona tranquilla e ben servita

name: DOUBLE ROOM IN THE HEART OF BCN
summary: Lit room with balcony. The apartment is in the center, just meters from the Palau de la Musica Catalana. Well connected, a few minutes from Las Ramblas and the Born. Very close to the beach and Ciutadella Park
space: The fact of belonging to an old building of the emblematic old part of the city gives to the apartment a charm and a warmth that many love us. Although one of the busiest areas, the house is on a quiet street away from traffic noise. But, without doubt, the best virtue is its location. You can walk everywhere.
description: Lit room with balcony. The apartment is in the center, just meters from the Palau de la Musica Catalana. Well connected, a few minutes from Las Ramblas and the Born. Very close to the beach and Ciutadella Park The fact of belonging to an old building of the emblematic old part of the city gives to the apartment a charm and a warmth that many love us. Although one of the busiest areas, the house is on a quiet street away from traffic noise. But, without doubt, the best virtue is its location. You can walk everywhere. The neighborhood is part of the historic center of the city. There are plenty of bars, restaurants, museums, interesting buildings, shops ... It is a perfect location to get around Barcelona Being in the heart of the city, most of the time you will be walking, and in case you want to go to other points of interest of Barcelona farther from the center, you will not have any problem with the transport. You have very close Plaza de Cataluña, with metro, trains and buses; The U
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is part of the historic center of the city. There are plenty of bars, restaurants, museums, interesting buildings, shops ... It is a perfect location to get around Barcelona
notes: Remember that we are in the old town of Barcelona. My building, like the vast majority here, does not have an elevator.
transit: Being in the heart of the city, most of the time you will be walking, and in case you want to go to other points of interest of Barcelona farther from the center, you will not have any problem with the transport. You have very close Plaza de Cataluña, with metro, trains and buses; The Urquinaona metro station is still closer and, to take a taxi, in one minute, Via Laietana.
access: Tengo una amplia cocina que puedes utilizar. Recuerda recoger y limpiar después de su uso. El baño es pequeñito, pero perfectamente equipado.
interaction: Te proporcionaré sábanas y toallas, para que no te preocupes de traerlas tú.
house_rules: -Mantener el espacio limpio y recogido. -No está permitido invitar a gente al apartamento. -Respetar el descanso de los vecinos. -No hacer ruido en la escalera. Apelo al sentido común de los inquilinos para una convivencia relajada y fluída. No hay normas en la casa más allá de las que dicte el sentido común.

host.host_about:
Mi nombre es Isabel, pero me llamo Isa. Nací en Vigo (Galicia). Con 20 años me fuí a vivir a Madrid con intención de ser actriz; ahora resido en Barcelona desde los 28. Soy una joven de 43 años, cantante de Jazz. Me gusta salir, pero también quedarme en casa a leer o ver alguna buena película.
He compartido piso muchos años, pero estas serán mis primeras experiencias como anfitriona.

¡Sed bienvenidos!

address.government_area: Sant Pere, Santa Caterina i la Ribera

reviews.comments: Una instancia muy céntrica en uno de estos edificios antiguos del Barri Gotic. No es poco haber conseguido estar en el centro de Barcelona en la misma semana del Mobile World Congress. Isabel es un encanto de anfitrión.
The host canceled this reservation 2 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Chambre très bien située et hôtesse très sympathique. Merci encore Isabel pour l'accueil !

Sheets weren't clean... Shower has very low water pressure. Room is only good for sleeping. It's in a good location but that's about it. Isabel could've provided more information about what's around the house during check in... Overall just decent enough to sleep

Isabel est accueillante. L'appartement est charmant, correspond aux images. Très bien situé, à côté de Palau de la musica, dans un vieil immeuble plein de charme un peu désuet. Amateurs de confort et décor "tendance" s'abstenir. Chez Isabel on se trouve dans une authentique ambiance d'artiste. Merci beaucoup, je garderai le souvenir de cet accueil lié aux souvenirs de Barcelone.

Es un piso con mucho encanto, muy tranquilo y en un lugar inmejorable. La anfitriona, Isabel, es amable y facilitadora. El piso es una construcción antigua, lo que le da un ambiente genial pero también hace que el agua de la ducha salga con poquísima presión y sea un poco incómodo a veces. A parte de esto, si tuviese que poner alguna queja sería la hora del chekout, ya que las diez de la mañana me parece un poco pronto. 
En conjunto tuvimos una muy buena experiencia y repetiríamos sin duda.

Isabel was a wonderful host even if she was not there. She was in touch with me by mobile constantly. Thank you so much!
The house it's nice and was very clean and quite in the night.Perfect location. All you need for few days in Barcelona!
Isabel's place was perfect. It was cozy, clean and quiet. She was a very gracious host and was always there to answer my questions about getting around Barcelona.
Great room with lots of sunlight in a charming apartment. Fantastic location.
Isa was a kind and gracious host with a lovely appartment in a centric and vibrant area. We loved our stay and surely will visit again.
SUPER cute place with lots of charm!! Perfect for my first trip to Barcelona:) Amazing location! Gracias Isabel for helping me find last minute accommodations!

Isabel was a great host. She met me at the local bar where she worked and took me to her home a street away. The flight of stairs up to here place was a bit daunting but I can see why she lives up there.. It was beautiful! The room and whole place was clean, tidy and very welcoming. I saw Isabel twice, when I arrived and when I left, but it was perfect. 

The facilities were great. The pressure in the shower was weak but it didn't bother me one bit. It is a bit noisy being in the heart of the city, but I can imagine it would be anywhere in this area. It was lovely to have a balcony, and the location was very convenient. Thanks.x
Isabel was good host. Location is perfect.

Super piso, super barrio! 
The guest welcomed us well.
It was really nice to stay at Isabels place. She is very uncomplicated and nice and the flat is super located for exploring bcn. For me it was perfect!:)

IT was the perfect stay to Discover the city-a super location with sometimes noisy tourists (even we we're tourists but hopefully not so noisy) but that's part of the location i guess :-). We loved the colourful house and we Will Be go back for a next stay. thank you!

Isa is a very lovely, sensitive, artistic and gorgeous person. She is respectful of one's privacy but always ready to give support when asked upon. Be it in spoken or written form I always got my answers from her within no times. She also proofed to be very flexible in terms of arrival and departure times which I appreciated a great deal. If you are a fan of jazz music (like I am), make sure to double check ahead of time about her current concert dates so as not to miss your hostess on stage like I did (grumble ;-)).

The room I occupied was the smaller one of two that Isabel rents out. So if her flat is fully rented out there can be a maximum of 4 guests plus your hostess in the flat, which can cause some bathroom jam, especially during the hot and humid summer times, when the need for a cool shower is inherent to everyone's desire. 
My room was as depicted. If you plan on using it for double occupancy, I recommend taking Isa's larger room (unless the two of you are very much in love and want to cuddle up close ;-)). Also, if you need a table for writing, ask for the larger room as well, which comes along with one.
The flat itself is absolutely enchanting and furnished with love and an artistic eye to details. It's location is a dream for touristic explorations with anything within walking distance. 
Therefore, I can easily recommend both Isabel and her flat to anyone wishing to immerge himself into the local customs and get a good doze of what it is like "to live like a true Barcelonian".  

Querida Isa, muchas gracias por tu hospedalid génial! Volveré a ciencia cierta!
Saludos y besos
Liliana

The apartment is very centrally located, in the heart of the gothic part of the city and a couple of blocks from the Placa de Catalunya which makes transportation and sightseeing very easy. It's a 20 minute walk from the beach which is a plus. It's located in a very old building on the top floor, so it is rather stuffy and warm in the apartment. The room overlooks a very narrow street/alley so it's rather dark and it's easy to hear the noise coming from the street and the neighboring apartments. There are a few other rooms in the house that are being rented out, so other people will be staying in the house which makes it a necessity to lock the room when you leave the apartment. 

It's important to note that this place has a very strict check out time. On our last day, we had an evening flight but had to check out in the morning. When we asked if we could check out late, Isa told us to take our stuff to the train station and use the lockers there, but the train station does not have lockers. We ended up renting a locker  at a place called "Barcelona lockers". That, I would say changed all the plans for the last day.

I was happy to experience Isabels home as described here. It was spacious, bright and original, with lovely colours and beautiful artwork surrounding me in every room. Isabel is a creative, sensitive and respectful person, with an open mind- yet she has the necessary boundaries that are required to organize an environment where so many different people are going to stay and hopefully enjoy. 
The street itself is very lively, but the noises didn't bother me at all as i could easily block them out with earplugs. The location could not have been more sentral, still it's on "the right side" of the Rambla, where you can find more independent shops, restaurants, cafes and bars compared to the same leveled streets towards Raval. It is an old and very charming building, so if you want an minimalistic experience with cold, stainless steel and elevators this is not the place for you! And perhaps you are not the right person for this place either ;) I had to leave earlier due to illness, and was so sorry i couldn't stay throughout the whole month as planned. Hope to be seeing Isabel and her welcoming surroundings again one day

Isabel was an amazing host. She is incredible and super considerate. The apartment was by no means the best location in Barcelona, I walked everywhere and never needed a map or a taxi. Arriving late at night was always fine and there was never any disturbing street noise. The block is super cute with awesome little shops that are open during the day. Best neighborhood to be in and incredible city ! Muchísima gracias Isabel, estas invitada a visitar Los Ángeles, todo fue increíble !❤️

We had a lovely stay in Barcelona, the apartment was beautiful and the location was ideal! Isabel was friendly and helpful but left us to our own devices to experience the city for ourselves. Can be a little noisy because of the location, however, Isabel was kind enough to leave each of us ear plugs which worked perfectly. Would definitely recommend to friends and family.
Isabel's place is lovely, cozy and colourful. The location is great! I walked everywhere I wanted to go. The balcony is also a nice little addition. Will definitely stay again, for sure.
The apartment is very charming and very well located, in the heart of Barcelona. Isabel was very friendly during our stay.

Un appartemment authenthique avec beaucoup de cachet, beaucoup de "soul". J'ai pu me rendre à pied partout où je le désirais (ou presque). Isabel était très gentille et met tout ce dont ses invités ont besoin à disposition.

3 choses à considérer: la rue est assez bruyante, certaines fois pendant la nuit, et le matelas est plutôt rudimentaire, mais ce n'est pas un hôtel non plus... 
Aussi il faut savoir qu'il y a deux chambres à louer dans l'appartement, vous ne risquez pas d'avoir l'endroit à vous seul en l'absence de l'hôtesse. 

Cela dit,
je recommande sans hésiter. 
Merci pour tout Isabel!!

Gab
Isabel was a wonderful host and we had a lovely stay in Barcelona! Her apartment is very nice, located in a great neighborhood close to the metro.
Isa is really friendly, very responsive with communication, and the space is a really cool location and apartment. Wear the ear plugs Isa graciously provides.
We had a perfect holiday, Isabel was very welcoming, the flat was really cozy and beautiful, and the location couldn't be better! Highly recommended :)

Isabel's place is very nice. I stayed for 9 nights. What a great value. It is located at the heart of Barcelona. It is very close the El born and the Gothic neighborhood. In fact, i walked to my favorite tapa restaurant in just 6 minutes. Everything is within walking distance. If u want to have a local experience, this is a great place to be. The flat is nice and clean and very cozy. Isabel is very helpful if you have any question. Thank you Isabel. I had a wonderful times in Barcelona. I will definitely come back.
Emplacement parfait et dans un quartier absolument magnifique! Je recommande fortement!
Very good location for your trip.
Isabel was very welcoming and friendly. Location was great. Had a great time in BCN

Very nice place with super location. Close to Gothic Area and all attractions  are within 15min walk. And there are also couples of good restaurants nearby for brunch and dinner. Last but not least Isabel is super good and nice host.

It's great to be in the middle of the center. Weekend end up to be a bit noisy since Barcelona has a great night life ;-)
Enjoy
Good location, but poor furniture and bathroom

I have spent 4 days at Isabel's place and it has been a pleasure. The location is excellent, the apartment is very clean and spacious and the communication and interaction with Isabel was really pleasant.
Excelente ubicación ¡! Isabel es muy atenta y siempre bien dispuesta ante cualquier consulta o necesidad. Volveré...

We enjoyed our stay. Perfect location on the edge of the old town. Nice flat with typical Barcelona feeling. Isabel is a nice person too. Only thing to criticize: the tap pressure in the shower is really low
the flat is very well located. Isabel is a perfect host. i suggest the room for a single in a one-week holiday.
If you search for a simple room with a special price  this could be it. Good communication with Isabel.

Small, but very clean. If you don't need like a huge bathroom and stuff it is a very good Place to Stay. Perfect if you are out in The City for Most of The Time. Location was a huge plus we've Done almost everything by foot. Host was very friendly. All in all we've been very Content with The flat.

A great, clean and comfy flat with an artistic, colorful vibe, right in the center of Barcelona! There are many places to eat and drink nearby and the Cathedral is a stone's throw away! The check-in went very smoothly and right on time. Isabel is very nice and readily available, and the entire stay was very enjoyable!
O

The apartment is very well located to a busy part of the city, but the street itself is pretty quiet. The room was clean and spacious and had a nice balcony. Isabel was friendly and easy to communicate with. Would definitely stay again!
Isabelle was a fabulous host. Great communication, the please was well located and exactly as advertised. I would happily stay here again.

Отдыхала в Барселоне 8 дней, с 21 по 28 мая. Комната маленькая, но все необходимое есть. Отличное месторасположение - 8 минут пешком до площади Каталония. Отличный вариант для тех, кто забегает в дом переодеться и переночевать.

Stayed at Isabel's place for a week and it was wonderful! Bed was comfy and the room was clean. Lovely little balcony too and in an incredible location. Isabel was a great host and came to meet us to give us the keys, she also helped us with directions to the apartment. She has a beautiful home and was very welcoming to us. Would love to visit her again and I cannot recommend her any higher!

Isabel was a super cool host. Communicative and kind.
The apartment is beautiful and centrally located to a lot of sights. The room was big and had nice terrace. 
Would definitely stay again.
Isabel is a great host with a beautiful and clean apartment. The location is very central and close to the metro, super market and restaurants. I would definitely recoment Isabel's place.
Isabel is a friendly and informative host; her place is very well located and very pleasant and great to get into the wonderful that is Barcelona

Isabel is  very nice and funny ! the check it went smoothly  and we felt at home immediately . the apartment  is very artistic and inspiring , the location is super comfortable and everything was very easy going ! 
thank you for your lovely home that added  more beauty & culture to our trip to bcn ! 
nufi & ziv :)

Lovely place in the okd town, nice and central. Walking distance from the bus station. Walkkng disance from the beach. Lovely nightlife and local shops in the area. Isabels flat is very homely and the decor is amazing. She provided a list of recommended restaurants and was happy to give information when asked.

Isabel's place is perfectly located in the centre of the city and in walking distance from the beach. Close to many restaurants and shops, but still in a relatively quiet street. The apartment is beautifully decorated, and the room I stayed in was comfortable and clean. Isabel was a nice and responsive host - overall, definitely recommended! :)

Isabel's appartement is very well located. 
She greeted me warmly and living with her was a charm,  very accommodating! 
I was traveling during hot summer of Barcelona; the room can get pretty hot! She also has 2 rooms to rent in the flat. Old building, 3rd (5th??) floor, I guess this is also what is charming about old Barcelona ! I would recommend her place !!

Isabel's place is adorable! The neighborhood is cute and the location is unbeatable for its proximity to the sights. Isabel even left a list of recommended restaurants to help get me started on my food adventure!

This place was perfect for me..  Right in the heart of Barcelona and so close to the metro and the bus .. and all the nice restaurants and cafes and places to see .. And the Beach . 
And such an Amazing apartment and enjoyed every minute of my time at Isabel's place ..would recommend to anyone looking for a Central location and a good place for a City Break
Nice central location near Catalunya Square/ metro. Clean apartment and friendly host.

The place is beautiful and the location is great. Also isabel has experience in hosting- she left us a list of restaurants and had an organized room ready. It should be noted,however, the place is "on the third floor" but really you have to walk up 5 floors, about 70-80 steps. Also, there is no air conditioning (there is a fan). Also, there is only one shower and bathroom for 5 people (isabel and 4 guests). Also, the water pressure is extremely low in the shower. The combination of the long climb up, no AC, and weird shower is pretty difficult in the summer. Otherwise there was no issue.
Beautiful home and honestly couldn't be in a better location, nice quiet little side-street but within touching distance of some of the best parts of the city :-)
Very nice apartment and room, like the host. Everything very near by foot, which is lovely. The perfect place when you want to experience the real Barcelona flair :) Muchas gracias Isabel!
Great location
Si te gustan las casas antiguas como a mí, éste es tu sitio. Yo estuve sólo una noche pero estuve muy a gusto , todo estaba muy limpio e Isabel fue muy agradable.

It's a great place by nicely located in the middle of Barcelona. Very convenient to get to the metro or walk to a lot of nearby sightseeing spots and restaurants. 

It is secluded, which I liked. It's on a small alley way that doesn't get much, if any car traffic. It's quiet at night, but during the day you can hear pedestrian commotion from off the street, and from neighbors in the stairwell, but it didn't bother me, and it was not an issue at night. 

All in all, I would definitely recommend.

Isabel is super friendly, useful and answered all questions I had. She gave me a document with some interest spots throughout the city. Although I didn't use it much (did my homework before traveling), it could be pretty useful if you do not know what to do. The flat is located in the heart of the city. It is close to everything. As an example, I walked all the time.
Excellent location in the heart of Barcelona.

El departamento está muy bien ubicado, muy cerca de la avenida principal que conecta con todas las vías. Cabe resaltar que sí es muy pequeño, el baño y la habitación, tomar en cuenta que hay que subir muchas escaleras.

El apartamento tiene una ubicación inmejorable, en pleno centro. Isabel fue una excelente anfitriona. La habitación es amplia, el balcón está sobre la calle pero es muy silenciosa por las noches. Volvería a alojarme allí.

As others have pointed out, this place could be chosen just for the location. It's a 10 minute walk from Plaza Catalunya Bus station and all the places can be seen by walk. The building is an old architectural piece, while it has good amenities. It's a steep climb to the top, hence would recommend for those with light luggage or people who love to do some steps. Isabel is nice and friendly.
Perfect location for seeing Barcelona! Very central, we were able to walk to all the attractions we wanted to see and the beach is near enough too.

L'appartement d'Isabel est très bien situé - la rue est tranquille, un peu bruyante du à l'écho (petites rues étroites!) mais avec des bouchons j'ai dormi sur mes deux oreilles. Petite chambre très mignonne. Je recommande grandement cette chambre (ou l'autre chambre car Isabel en loue deux) si vous désirez vivre dans un authentique building durant votre séjour. Isabel est très accessible et tout s'est bien déroulé.
We had a great stay at Isabel’s, the location is brilliant close to restaurants, the main areas (gotic and v close to placa catalunya), and Isabel was easy to communicate with and friendly. Thanks!

Wir hatten ein paar sehr schöne Tage in Isabells super gemütlichen Wohnung. Alles war wie beschrieben und sehr ordentlich und sauber. Die Lage ist unübertrefflich! Isabel ist eine super Gastgeberin und hat uns herzlich empfangen. Wir fühlten uns rund um wohl bei ihr. Kommen gerne wieder!
Really cool apartment in the center of the city. Isabel was very flexible when I needed to change my arrival time at the last minute.
Un bel appartement au coeur de Barcelone. Merci Isabel.

Isabel es muy amable y simpática. Por su carisma y la del piso uno se siente super bien acogido. No hay nada que envidiarle a un hotel, teniendo todas las comodidades necesarias y una ubicación inmejorable en el Centro de la ciudad. El Piso esta a metros del hermoso Palau de la Música y para los que están pensando en que quisas es muy ruidoso, se equivocan, pues se duerme muy bien incluso a pesar de que las habitaciones dan hacia la calle. Totalmente recomendable...

Miejsce idealne 
blisko centrum,metra..max 15 min spacerem od Barcelonety.

Mila i pomocna właścicielka

Isabel's home is the perfect and central place to stay in Barcelona. I was so close to the Gothic Quarter, El Born, Casa Batllo and so much more. I visited La Sagrada Familia, Park Guell, Barceloneta and walked a lot through the streets of Barcelona. I walked to all of those places from Isabel's house and it was all doable! Isabel is so friendly and very quick with responses. She also gave some great recommendations on local spots to eat/drink. Her apartment is so unique and such a lovely place, also very clean! At night it was not too nosy and I never felt unsafe. Thank you for a great stay and I will definitely be staying here again if I visit Barcelona again!
Great location

Overall, I would say our experience was ok. Not hugely disappointed, not super happy. Location is amazing, space is well decorated , there were lovely Lillies in the kitchen. But although response to messages were always prompt, never that extra, friendly, caring touch. 

When I choose accommodation where I share space with the host, I choose mostly by whether I’d like to get to know this person or not. Isabel sounded very interesting, so I was looking forward to meeting her. As it turns out, she seemed pretty reluctant to interact. It felt like we were intruding on her space for the most part. For example, when she emerged from her room at 12pm, I asked her “how are you today?” Her response was “I don’t know yet.” End of conversation. Which is fine. Again, she was never rude. Just a little closed. 

Bed was comfortable. Not really enough space to put things away. 
A little grimy. Place needs a good deep clean. 

In the end, she seemed to connect a little with my adult daughter who stayed with me which I was glad for. 

I am reluctant to recommend this place based on my experience. Yours might be different. You’ll love the location I’m sure. Although it comes up for a cheap price on Airbnb, in the end because she charges extra for a second person and the cleaning fee is high , it was $130 cdn a night. Which is too much for this place.
Centrale locatie zonder geluidsoverlast s nachts. Alles op loopafstand! Kamer is wat klein en t bed wat laag, maar dat nam ik voor lief gezien de positieve kanten :)

Impecable el trato, la dedicación y comunicación con Isabel.
Desde que llegue hasta que me fui. Me hizo sentir muy cómodo y a gusto. La recomiendo 100%
Fantastic apartment and super host! My wife and I had a lovely time staying at Isabel's charming apartment. Easy check-in/check-out and a truly perfect location. Couldn't ask for more!

I thought Isabela home was very nice and very very clean. The room was very nice and we had all the amenities needed 
The location was the BEST very close to all major interest

Good central location, close to a metro station.
Simple room, but just what you need if you want somewhere to store your luggage and sleep at night, after exploring Barcelona.
Isabel was friendly and very quick to respond to my request and any messages. She was much better than other hosts in this regard.

Viene con todo lo que dice en la descripción del hogar, la ubicación está en un vecindario muy central y cercas de muchas de las atracciones, y Isabel fue muy amable con nosotros! Lo único que le faltaba al cuarto era una cortina en la ventana para tener más privacidad (por eso de la construcción) pero en sí el cuarto es muy espacioso y la cama cómoda. Gracias Isabel!

A lovely apartment in a great location. Take in consideration there are more than 70 stairs to climb (which was pretty hard after long walks and charring suitcases). The balcony was taken off due to building renovations, which was pretty surprising as the workers could step into the room with no problem and mornings where noisy. When I complained about my privacy and security (I had to drees in the hallway and lock the balcony door - with no A/C), Isabel illustrated a curtain to the balcony door.

L’appartement est idéalement situé au début du quartier gothique et à deux pas de la Casa Musica. L’appartement possède une ambiance singulière : pas de meuble IKEA... c’est très agréable ! Cependant chambre reste très sommaire : un matelas posé sur des palettes. Pas de bureau. Pas assez de prises de courant. Les toilettes et la salle de bain sont très petits et partagés. La ruelle est très bruyante, ne pas oublier les bouchons d’oreille !
Freundlich, schöne Wohnung, allerdings fehlt ein funktionierender Ventilator und Gemeinschaftsräume leider nicht nutzbar. Der Rest war toll, sauberes Bad und sehr gute Kommunikation.

Die Wohnung liegt in einer Toplage. Als ich ankam gab es leider ein Problem mit der Telefonnummer, der ich geantwortet habe und so konnte ich Isabel bei meiner Ankunft nicht erreichen. Ich konnte erst 5 Stunden später in die Unterkunft. Habe daraus gelernt, nur noch über die App zu kommunizieren. Das Bad ist für eine Person über 1,80 eventuell zu klein. Und im Sommer kann es recht heiß und stickig werden, trotz des schönen alten Steinbodens und der hohen Decken. Die Wohnung ist sehr schön und sehr authentisch eingerichtet. Es gibt keinen Aufzug und man muss das Gepäck in den 3 Stock eine schmale Treppe hochtragen. Es war eine schöne Zeit - dank an Isabel und ihren Freund, beide wohnen in der Wohnung .

Isabel’s place was delightful. Her home is incredibly decorative and has a home-like sense to it. The location is great, it’s very close and walkable to the center and Las Ramblas but the street itself is not very noisy which was perfect! She is an incredible kind and understanding host and I appreciated her hospitality much.
Friendly hostess and apartment is in a good location.

Isabel is a great host.
Place is located in the center so it's near almost every touristic places.
Room is pretty spacious and cosy. 
But I was there in august, the weather was hot and in room was awfully stuffy  — blower didn't help at all. And there were workers outside the window on the scaffolding.
Great apartment right in the center of Barcelona. Walking distance from the metro and from many attractions. I had a great time. Thanks.

This place was great. I had to reduce the amount of nights I was staying and Isabel immediately gave me a response and a refund for the night I could not stay. Thank you so much again for this. Great place and private space.
Para unos cálidos y lindos días en Barcelona . Ubicación óptima
Expect easy and breezy life at Isabel's and to be happy and chill !

Allgemein zu teuer.. auf den Fotos sieht es ordentlich und sauber aus, nicht aber in Wirklichkeit. Das Zimmer eindeutig zu klein, unpraktisch Sachen zu verstauen, Balkontür lässt sich aufgrund des fix angebrachten Tuches nicht richtig öffnen... Harte Matratze auf Paletten, extrem einfach möbliert. Türe mit Spalt zu anderem Gästezimmer, dadurch kaum Intimsphäre..
Isabel gab einem das Gefühl nicht als Gast Willkommen zu sein.. suchte lange die Einganstüre.. dabei hätte sie aufmachen können, da sie wusste, dass ich im Gang war. Isabel ist wohl offenherzig abhängig von der Sympathie gegenüber dem Gast. Sie hat jedoch volles Vertrauen all ihre privaten coolen alten Sachen stehen zu lassen. 
Lage ist prima. Dusche klein, jedoch alles mit unsauberen Sachen überstellt. 
Alles wäre etwas anders akzeptabel bei einem herzlichen Willkommen.

I had such s relaxing time with Isabel! She is friendly, funny and helpful. Most importantly, super easy to interact with. We were joking about all kinds of things when sharing a cup of tea in the morning and exchanging our travel photos after that. 

Her place is also very stylish, unique and the building is really really cool. The Location? Can’t be better!
Great location!
Great location! Easily walkable to many places and some great tourist spots and restaurants close by.
You can expect not to be let in, if the act of doing that would cause an inconvenience to Isabel. That is, if your experience is like mine was.

It’s a perfect place for a vacation or a longer stay. It’s in the center of Barcelona which means it’s close to wherever you wanna go.
Apart from that, Isabel was really helpful and easygoing. She would provide everything needed. It made me feel at home.
Great value for money, great location, Isabel is a very nice host. I traveled with my mom and the only bad thing is the amount of stairs. But anyway, we had a great stay.

If you are a budget traveler in town for leisure visit, this might be good place to stay. It’s very centrally located, close to plenty of shops and restaurant and metro. I was in town for a conference, and unfortunately, the first two nights, there were some rowdy people in the street late, late at night and I woke up several times. So for a work trip, the location is not so great (I stayed in a different, more quiet neighborhood last time).  The other nights were just fine.

There are two bedrooms for rent, and I recommend the second one. The one I rented was right by the door and hallway and you can hear everything, and everyone walking up and down. (Thin walls are common to Barcelona). I think the other bedroom may be more insulated. That said, I am a light sleeper and was there for work, so I had to go to bed at a decent time. 

The rest of the apartment is nicely decorated.

Isabel is a really nice and friendly host. The room is at a great location down right in the middle of the city center. The room is quite small though and more suitable for a solo traveler looking for a place for one or two nights, than for a couple.

Really enjoyed my time at Isabel’s! Right in the heart of the gothic quarter and easy walking distance to everything else in Barcelona. 

Definitely try Casa Lolea and Nomad coffee just up the street.
Isabel was a great host and the house was lovely. It was ideally located for people wanting to explore the sights of Barcelona.

We stayed there 5 days and we were satisfied. Our room has bigsized bad, balcony and commode. Flat is very good situated very close to Catalunya square arc the Triomf and many others popular places. Urquinaona metro station is over one minute walk. Access to flat is from blind street (no cars) so at night is as quiet as usual. Isabel is very kind person and she was ready to help us with all our issues. Bathroom has big boiler with enough hot water for two and more people. If you are looking for quiet accommodation with good position you just find it :)

This is a great location. it's very close to everything, buses are just around the corner and very easy to used. The Gothic square us within walking distance. I had a great time. Isabel is very nice and is always in communication with you.

name: Spacious and quiet duplex apartment in Poble Sec
summary: Spacious apartment in a peculiar building in the central neighbourhood of Poble Sec, with patio and terrace, ideal for families with children or groups. Walking distance from center, Montjuïc, Plaza España, Fira Montjuïc/Gran Vía, Sant Antoni, Raval.
space: Spacious and quiet duplex apartment in the heart of the colourful Poble Sec neighbourhood, with entrance from a peculiar and protected archway. Equipped for 6-7 guests. 3 double rooms, 2 bathrooms, 1 patio, 1 terrace and 1 balcony. First floor: entrance, living-dining room with open kitchen giving onto the patio, chill out corner and a bathroom with shower. Second floor: hall, complete bathroom, 3 bedrooms (2 with double bed, 1 with bunk beds), balcony and terrace. Ideal for families with children and groups. Smoking is not permitted inside the apartment, but it is allowed in the terrace and the patio. Basic rate intended for 4 guests. Children up to 12 years are not calculated as extra guests during low season. Wi-Fi/wired connection (100Mb), washing machine, smart TV, DVD, Nespresso. Kitchen basics.
description: Spacious apartment in a peculiar building in the central neighbourhood of Poble Sec, with patio and terrace, ideal for families with children or groups. Walking distance from center, Montjuïc, Plaza España, Fira Montjuïc/Gran Vía, Sant Antoni, Raval. Spacious and quiet duplex apartment in the heart of the colourful Poble Sec neighbourhood, with entrance from a peculiar and protected archway. Equipped for 6-7 guests. 3 double rooms, 2 bathrooms, 1 patio, 1 terrace and 1 balcony. First floor: entrance, living-dining room with open kitchen giving onto the patio, chill out corner and a bathroom with shower. Second floor: hall, complete bathroom, 3 bedrooms (2 with double bed, 1 with bunk beds), balcony and terrace. Ideal for families with children and groups. Smoking is not permitted inside the apartment, but it is allowed in the terrace and the patio. Basic rate intended for 4 guests. neighborhood_overview: Poble Sec is located just next the mountain of Montjuic, not to be missed for its several museums (Miró Foundation, MNAC, Caixafòrum, Ethnological Museum, Archaeology Museum, etc.), the Olympic Ring, the Castle and the cableway, its wonderful views of Barcelona and for being a green escape to the bustle of the city (and to heat in summer). The area is very well supplied: supermarket right in front of the apartment, the best artisan bakery in the neighbourhood just next door, two butchers (one of them organic), fish shop, drugstore, banks and playground for children, all just within a 100 meters radius (more facilities a bit farther). The neighbourhood is a lively and trendy one, with plenty of cafés, bars, restaurants, theatres and concert halls to enjoy the city from breakfast to evening, either alone, in couple, with friends or with kids.
notes: Licence number: HUTB-007120
transit: Excellent location: subway at walking distance (3-5 minutes away to Poble Sec stop, green line (L3), which takes directly to the city centre – 4 stops to Plaza Cataluña - the Sants rail station - 3 stops - and to the Camp Nou Stadium), Plaza España/Fira de Montjuic/Aerobús stop to the airport at 10-15 minutes walking or 1 subway stop away; walking distance to the Ramblas, Raval, Sant Antoni market and Colón/Drassanes. Bike rental at 10 minutes walking from the apartment. Beach at 10-15 minutes from the apartment by bike!
interaction: Yamila lives in the neighborhood. Should you need it she will be near! Before your arrival, you might interact by e-mail either with Yamila or with me (Cristina, the apartment's owner).
house_rules: RIGHT AFTER RESERVATION: 1. Send us your e-mail address so that we can send you a PDF file with all the info. 2. Send us by e-mail the following personal data FOR ALL GUESTS (children included), for the compulsory tourist registration with the local authorities: ID number*  Type of document (national ID or passport)* Date of issue (if visible)* Family name*  First name*   M/F* Birth date*  Nationality*  Date of arrival* Personal address  Phone number  Expected days of stay BEFORE YOUR ARRIVAL: 1. Make sure you provide us your arrival's details (time of arrival and mean of transportation) and a phone number so that we can contact you in case of need. 2. Let us know your preferences regarding the beds according to your group's composition: ex. if you are a family of 2 parents + 2 kids we will prepare the main room and the bulk beds; if you are 2 couples we will prepare the main room and the other double bed room; if there is a child we will prepare the baby bed or the little bed, etc.  3

host.host_about:
(ES) Soy mujer, mamá y traductora. Me gusta tener tiempo para pensar, viajar, jugar con mis hijas y descubrir algo nuevo cada día. A veces por trabajo tengo que viajar, y entonces mi amiga Yamila, gran mujer y fantástica anfitriona, amante del campo y fotógrafa de profesión, me ayuda con los huéspedes.

(EN) I am a woman, a mother and a translator. I like having time to think, to travel, to play with my daughters and to discover something new every day. Sometimes I have to travel because of my job: in those occasions my friend Yamila, great woman and fantastic host, outdoor lover and photographer, helps me out with guests.

reviews.comments:
Yamila appartement was just perfect for us!
The location in Poble sec is very close to BCN city center and the neighborhood is so quiet without any traffic like everywhere else in the city
The appartement is very clean, well equipped with very recent furniture, 2 bathrooms, 3 bedrooms, 2 balconies, 1 terrace, large kitchen and lounge.
Yamila was a perfect host with us also.
I fully recommend this appartment
El piso esta muy guay, en una zona muy bien comunicada y con muchos restaurantes y bares cerca. Lo hemos pasado muy bien en este piso y volveriamos a alquilarlo.

Awesome accommodations! Huge apartment that was obviously recently renovated and well maintained. The building is in a residential (read: non-touristy) part of Spain so if you are looking for a real taste of local culture this is the place to stay. 2 blocks from the subway and we were downtown in just a couple stops. The apartment is in building with a common courtyard (common for the style). The other people that live in the building were very friendly and helpful answering any questions we had. My son was even able to play with the other children (despite the language barrier). Awesome experience -- would definietly rent again.
Experiencia bastante agradable, puntuales, el piso muy limpio, ordenado y esta genial, muy bien situado, muy recomendable.

The apartment is exactly as pictured. Very spacious, comfortable, and clean with a well equipped kitchen and nice terraces on both levels. The neighborhood is well situated - it is not at all touristy but close to transportation at Plaza España and Poble Sec metro stops so you can easily get to all the places you want to visit. We stayed here for 3 nights with our two children and found it perfect. We were able to walk or take the metro everywhere we wanted to go, but have a quieter place to sleep and relax. There is a park down the street and a supermarket directly across. Xavi met us on arrival and was very nice and helpful throughout our stay. When my husband accidentally left a few things in the apartment, Xavi collected them and met us upon our return to Barcelona a few days later to return them. Thanks, Xavi! It was a great stay in Barcelona and I would definitely recommend the apartment to anyone looking for space and comfort in a close but quieter neighborhood.
Great flat in a very good location, very close from subway which brings you to wherever you want in a few minutes. Xabi has been really nice and we didn't miss anything in the flat. Thank you

Yamila is a great hostess, the apartment is very comfortable.
Very close to the metro. And a convenient store. A tv was missed, otherwise everything was great.
Appartement conforme aux indications, très propre. Le quartier est calme mais tout de même assez proche de tout (2 stations de métro de la rambla et des plages...). Super Bon séjour !
Una estancia perfecta, el piso es muy grande y muy bien equipado. La descripción corresponde perfectamente a la casa. 100% recomendable.
Super apartement, clean, spacios, great located and pretty quiet. Yamila is very nice, polite and helpful. I strongly can recommend the apartement.

A very nice place and a great host!
The apartment is exactly as you can see in the pictures, everthing is clean and Yamila is just a call (or e-mail) away if you need help.
EVERYTHING WAS GREAT. Yamila is very hospitable, very helpful. You can find everything you need at home.We will rent this House again barcelona 2015 Marathon.

Cristina and her friend Yamilia did a wonderful job of making us feel at home and were also very helpful with other miscellaneous necessities (calling us a taxi to take us to the airport on departure).  The duplex was very nice and spacious, clean, charming, outfitted with everything we needed, with comfortable beds and a very nice kitchen (with an induction cooktop!).  The property is older and there was some remodeling noise for a few hours from the neighboring apartment, which we could hear through what seemed to be a shared skylight, but it was very brief and not a concern (unless noise privacy is a very high priority, which it wasn't for us).  We didn't even use the third bedroom with bunk beds, but it would be ideal for a family.  The metro was close enough, and the bakery just downstairs, together with the grocery store literally across the street, were a wonderful convenience.  We went nearly everywhere by metro, and the location was central enough that at the end of the day, if we were too tired to make our way back by metro, an easy cab ride back to the apartment never exceeded 8 euros (which would've been the cost of the metro for all four of us anyway).  Overall, the apartment was a nice, comfortable bargain for family travel - not the most modern, but charming and fully met our needs.

Appartement trés agréable et trés bien situé à 2 pas d'une station de métro et de la place d'Espagne.
Toutes les pièces sont très agréables et les terrasses aussi.
Supermarché en face et excellente boulangerie au pied de l'immeuble.
Immeuble très calme.
Pas de cafetière électrique ni d'essoreuse à salade mais l'électroménager est top.
Déco soignée.
Merci, nous avons passé une excellente semaine !

We stayed at Christina´s place for two weeks and were happy with the flat. The location is good: close to metro, and also bakery, convenience store etc is near.
Excellent restaurants also nearby.

Magnifique appartement, très calme dans un quartier sympathique. Boulangerie juste à côté, idéale le matin. Les enfants ont adoré!  Cristina et Yamila toujours à l'écoute par mail ou par tel. Nous gardons un excellent souvenir de ces vacances en famille à Barcelone. Un grand merci à nos hôtes. 
Marie-Pierre, Arnaud, Pierre et Benjamin

Espectacular!
El piso era grande, confortable, limpio, y muy bien equipado, sobre todo en la cocina. Es un piso luminoso con terracitas perfectas para comer fuera, y un silencia muy apreciable durante la noche, una maravilla.
El piso está super bien situado, hay un supermercado en frente y una panadería muy buena justo al lado, la acogida fue perfecta y la logística (entrega y recogida de la llave...) muy sencilla. Muy recomendable.
Réactive et bon contact téléphonique.

The Hous is great. It´s a super cosy place in a nice neighborhood. You find evrerything you need in the House, plus you got two terraces and a padio.
It is super located, everything you need is close, Supermarket, Bakery and Restaurants just in front of the Door. Metro station around the corner also the placa espanya Montjuïc a few minutes walk away.
Yamila (friend of Christina) is a great host, she was super nice and open for every question we had. She also called us a taxi to take us to the airport at 5! in the morning.
We will for sure come back and book that place again.
Would totally recommend that House for a great stay in Barcelona.
Thank you.

GREAT!!! Christina and Yamila are very hospitable and very helpful. 
The flat was very nice and spacious, clean and outfitted with everything we needed. The flat is super located (metro station, supermarket, bakery, ...).

We will come back : )
Thank you!
Trivelig nabolag , eksotisk . Leiligheten var kul og anderledes

Lovely, rather bohemian apartment. Clean, comfortable and well equipped. A working electric kettle would have been useful. Very well positioned to walk to Rambla, beach/harbours/ Mont Juic. Clear instructions how to get there. Parking available in the street which is free in the month of August. Otherwise it is approx Euro 2.5 per hr, max 2hrs on the street. There is private, secure parking at Euro 40 per 24hrs or you can park for free at the university and metro back to Poble Sec.

Appartement très spacieux et agréable!
Merci pour cet accueil
À la prochaine

Yes we were welcomed nicely by Yamila.  Other than how to work the stove top, her information was very good. The space suited us very  well. Enough beds  for all 4 of us. Other than the top of the staircase being very dangerous, we were very comfortable   The neighbourhood was fine.  A convenience store right across the street is fabulous. We found several good restaurants nearby as well. We used the hop on hop off system for our 2 day stay rather than the metro and with a couple of cab rides to pick- up points , we managed very well & really liked being above ground to see the sights rather than in a subway.

We had a great time -were met as planned and information was very accurate. The apartment was very clean and we'll equipped with close links to metro and local shops ideal. Yamila was superb and was a great asset to us when we required medical help

Lieben Dank für die angenehme Zeit in der Wohnung.
Wunderbar ausgestattet, zwei Terassen  -ruhig gelegen in einem Hinterhof.
Eine aussergewöhnlich gute Bäckerei nebenan.Lebensmittelmärkte gegenüber. Viele gute Möglichkeiten essen zu gehen und wirklich hervorragende Restaurantempfehlungen von Yamila.
Aloha Ansgar

Herzliche Leute!
Wunderschöne Wohnung!
Ruhige schöne Lage weg vom Massentourismus!
Einfach eine Perle!
Danke, wir kommen wieder 
C&B&R&M

We were 6 friends for a long week-end in Barcelona. We were welcomed by the host on the time of our arrival and she explained all the necessary about the apartment. Sheets and towels were provided. Everything was clean. Wi-fi works good.
One of the 3 rooms doesn’t have curtains and the light wakes you up early in the morning.
The apartment is located close to the metro Poble Sec (150m), so it is easy to get to the center or the train station quite fast (10-15 min). You can also get to the center by foot (25-30 min). You can find some restaurants in the neighbourhood that are clearly cheaper than in the center.
There is also a supermarket just across the street and a bakery not far.
A really nice, spacious and quiet place to stay for a visit of the town. Not too far from the center and the proximity of the metro is really convenient.
Hosts are really nice and accommodating. Thank you !

Famille avec 2 ados, nous avons adoré notre première expérience dans un appartement loué par Airbnb. L'appartement est très propre, bien équipé (avec WiFi) et situé dans un quartier sympa. Boulangerie, magasins et station de métro tout proche. Et un accueil très sympa par Yamila qui a pris le temps de nous donner des conseils pratiques (adresses de restos dans le quartier). On ne peut que recommander ce logement, idéal pour explorer la ville!

L'appartement est très agréable, bien placé, assez central mais au calme, ce qui est appréciable quand on sillonne la ville toute la journée !
Nous avons été très bien accueillis, et nous nous y sommes tout de suite sentis à l'aise.
Super Apartment! War das 7. Mal in Barcelona und hab mich noch nie so zuhause gefühlt wie dort! Vielen Dank!
These accommodations were comfortable and met all of our needs.

Nous avons passé une superbe fin d'année 2014 et début d'année 2015 dans l'appartement. Celui-ci est grand, bien placé, au calme, avec un accueil et un départ bien organisé. Et puis la boulangerie de bons pains juste en dessous, c'est simplement génial. Tous les commerces à proximité, c'est très bien aussi. Tout comme la station de métro. Excellent séjour.
Pasamos un maravilloso fin de año 2014 y principios de 2015 en el apartamento. Esto es genial, bien situado, tranquilo, con una bienvenida y salida bien organizado. Y luego se hornea pan bueno justo debajo, es simplemente genial. Todas las tiendas cercanas, eso también está bien. Al igual que la estación de metro. Excelente estancia.
We spent a wonderful year-end 2014 and early 2015 in the apartment. This is great, well placed, quiet, with a welcome and well organized departure. And then baked good bread just below, it's just great. All shops nearby, that's fine too. Like the subway station. Excellent stay.

Appartamento  esattamente come da foto e descrizione in un quartiere un po' popolare ma tranquillo e ben servito a 20 min a piedi dalla Ramblas e da Barcelloneta.
Lo avevamo scelto per la vicinanza a Plaza de Espanya visto che tutti e 4 correvamo la maratona ed è stata una scelta azzeccata.
Appartamento  pulito, luminoso e spazioso, fornito di tutto il necessario per un soggiorno confortevole.
Yamila che ci ha accolto è stata gentilissima e ci ha dato anche dei consigli sulla città e sui posti da vedere.
Lo consigliamo assolutamente.

We loved the apartment! Nice and clean and centrally placed with all the equipment we needed - even for the baby we had with us. Very close to supermarket, bakery and fish market, and playground. Nice area, 600 meters from Font Magica/Montjuic. Christina was very helpful before arrival, and Xavi was most friendly and helpful while we were there. He even managed to get back a wallet we lost in a taxi. Highly recommended!

Cristina's duplex is really nice and well located in Barcelona. We were 7 friends and we really enjoyed our stay there for a long week-end. Check-in and check-out were well organized and we found everything we needed in the apartment.

L'appartement est exactement comme décrit, parfaitement équipé et fonctionnel.
Il est situé dans un quartier populaire, avec commerces et métro à proximité. 
Le contact a été facile, les instructions claires, et Yamila est à proximité si besoin
Tout s'est parfaitement déroulé, nous sommes ravis de notre séjour!

Wir waren zu dritt in Cristinas Wohnung und hatten eine schöne Zeit dort. Yamila, die uns in Empfang genommen hat, ist sehr sympathisch und hilfreich. Der Austausch mit Cristina und Yamila im Vorfeld verlief schnell und reibungslos. 
Die Wohnung ist mit allem ausgestattet, bis auf eine Spülmaschine.
Sitzen im Patio oder auf der Terrasse im 1. Stock mit einem schönen Glas Wein oder morgens zum Frühstück ist klasse.
Wenn wir erneut nach Barcelona fahren, kommen wir gern wieder.
Das Viertel ist sehr angenehm und alle Einkaufsmöglichkeiten schnell zu erreichen. V.a. lokaler Bäcker im Nachbarhaus und Metzger einige Häuser weiter sind zu empfehlen.
Auch die Nachbarn sind sehr freundlich. Einige von ihnen feiern gern bis spät in die Nacht. Bei offenen Fenstern lässt sich dann nur mit Stöpseln schlafen. Aber die Wohnung ist sicher eine der ruhigeren Unterkünfte in Barcelona.
Unserer Meinung nach ist die Wohnung ideal für 3-4 Personen oder eine Familie mit Kindern. Es gibt einen Raum mit einem KingSize Bett, ein Kinderzimmer für 2. Der dritte Raum ist für eine Person gut geeignet, ist zur Treppe in der Wohnung nur mit einem Vorhang getrennt und hat ein Dachfenster.
Herzlichen Dank nochmal an die lieben Gastgeber

Nous avons séjourné dans cet appartement en avril 2015. Couple avec des enfants en bas âge (1.5 et 3.5 ans) + la grand-mère, nous avons adoré cette première expérience airbnb ! L'appartement été vraiment idéal pour nous : propre, spacieux et super bien équipé ! Pour les enfants, tout était là pour leur petit confort : lit bébé, chaise haute, jouets, planche pour les WC, bcp d'espace et un coin lecture qu'ils ont vraiment adoré. 
L'appartement et bien situé et au calme. Les petits plus : la boulangerie et le supermarché sont à 2 pas de l'appartement ainsi que le métro. Nous avons été accueilli par Yamila qui nous attendait à l'arrivée avec un grand sourire. Un tout grand merci pour tout ! Tatjana & co
Great apartment and location. Beds are good, well equipt and clean house. Bakery and supermarket as neighbours. Yamila was really niet and helpfull.

L'appartement est très bien agencé
Bien placé, dans une petite ruelle calme, près du métro, près des sites à visiter, près des ruelles avec bars à Tapas
Yamila est très sympa

Accoglienza perfetta da parte di Yamila, che ci ha indicato alcuni ristoranti non turistici doeve andare a mangiare (due li abbiamo provati, veramente fantastici!)
La casa è in un quartiere popolare, ma molto tranquillo e collegato benissimo sia con l'aeroporto che con il centro città.
La casa era come descritta nell'annuncio, unico neo, per noi, il patio che pensavamo più carino e raccolto (invece era un mini terrazzino incassato fra le case e scoperto).
Se posso dare un consiglio, lo imbellirei un pochino e magari metterei qualche pianta. 
Per il resto siamo state benissimo, gli spazi erano comodi e la casa ordinata e pulita.
Yamila ci ha  anche cortesemente permesso di lasciare i bagagli a casa e fare il check out nel pomeriggio del giorno di partenza. 
Disponibilità, gentilezza e cortesia. Ottimo.

We had a wonderful visit and stay at Cristina's place in Poble Sec. My husband and I and our two girls, aged 6 and 7, stayed for a month. We couldn't have found a better place. Yamila let us into the apartment and answered any questions we had. The apartment is perfectly situated near a metro stop with easy access to anything you would want to see or do in Barcelona. There are great places to eat nearby and a small supemarket, pastry shop, butcher, fresh fish place, and a general store sort of place all on the same street. There are some great and friendly neighbors as well. There is a nice outdoor eating place off the kitchen. All the basics are covered and we were able to make meals in the apartment without any issues. Took us a minute to figure out the stovetop but after finding the instructions in English online we realized if it was blinking at us there wasn't enough weight and we needed to move the pot or pan to a smaller eye. We had a problem with the washing machine and called Xavi who was accommodating and over within an hour to check it out. He also collected the keys our last day and was as easy and wonderful to work with as Yamila. We even had some family members come visit in the extra bedroom, which did not have an AC unit but was fine with a fan - at least for the month of June when we were there. Having the second bathroom when we had guests was nice too. I would highly recommend this place for anyone. I appreciated that what you see is what you get. The pictures are exactly what you will see and have in the apartment. No surprises.

We had an excellent stay! Thanks To all 3 of you for the great hospitality! 
The apartment was very well equipped with everything you needed,  towels, dishwasher... even water on arrival and this was much appreciated as we were hot and thirsty. The apartment is very well located within walking distance of the metro and in a pleasant area. 
The flat is as described and spacious.
Agréable appartement, très bien situé, et très calme la nuit. Commerces à proximité. Merci.

Unsere Gastgeberin war in Urlaub, hat aber im Vorfeld (über Mail- und Telefeonkontakt) für einen Ansprechpartner gesorgt. Die Schlüsselübergabe erfolgte problemlos.
Die Wohnung liegt im sog. Arbeiterviertel in der Nähe der Metrostation "Poble Sec". Die eingestellten Fotos entsprachen der Realität. Die Wohnung befindet sich mit etwa 40 anderen Wohnungen in einem sog. Hinterhof. Die Nachbarn waren sympathisch und nett. Gegenüber der Wohnung befindet sich ein Supermarkt. Fußläufig gibt es noch andere Einkaufsmöglichkeiten wie z.B. ein Bäcker oder Restaurants.

Nous étions 2 couples et avons passé une très belle semaine dans ce logement , rien de négatif à dire. Épicerie, boulangerie, poissonnerie et fruiterie tout est à moins de 1 minute a pied. Pour les attraits touristique si vous aimez marcher c'est l'endroit idéal . Si vous ne voulez pas marcher c'est parfait aussi car il y a le métro tout près . Xavi qui nous a reçu était très gentil . Je conseille fortement cet endroit très spacieux.

Logement très agréable, conforme aux photos, très pratique (commerces à deux pas  : boulangerie, supermarché, et métro à 2 min).
Logement spacieux, nous n étions que 3 mais il peut facilement accueillir 6 personnes. 
Nous avons été très bien guidé par Cristina puis accueilli par Yamila et Xaviera. 
Je conseille cette location. 
Merci à Cristina, Yamila et Xavi
Apartamento muito agradável, no centro da cidade, fácil acesso de transportes públicos, supermercado em frente!

Le logement est bien situé, dans un quartier paisible et agréable, à proximité des transports en commun et de tout. Ces points, importants, font en sorte que la location est acceptable. Cependant, les photos donnent une impression plus positive de l'appartement que la réalité; une des deux chambres manquent complètement d'intimité, ce qui pourrait être réglé en faisant transférant cette chambre dans une pièce quasi de rangement qui est inutilisée; l,appartement est vieillot, ce qui pourrait être acceptable, si des efforts étaient consentis pour remplacer tout ce qui est désuet et demande des réparations, somme toute, mineures: rideau de douche à quelques euros, changé de couleur et pas du tout invitant, cafetière à expresso qui a 100 ans...pleins de petits éléments brisés ou pas adéquats: lumière dans l,escalier, bout de plancher brisé, barure de porte brisée. Bref, il y a des limites à vouloir faire de l'argent: quelques centaines d'euros investis rendrait ce logement beaucoup plus acceptable. La dame qui nous a accueillie n'est pas en cause; elle est aimable et l'appartement avait été bien nettoyé, mais reste douteux quand les épouses refusent de prendre une douche parce que le rideau est blanc-brun...Finalement, je crois que AIRBNB n'est pas assez présent dans le rapport avec le locateur: il n'y a pas de standards suffisants pour garantir l'acceptabilité du service.
