Disons que c'était passable à acceptable, mais d'un point de vue affaire, le service peut être bien amélioré

Christina's place was perfect.  Spotlessly clean, and plenty of room for 5-6 people.   Great location with lots of cafes, bars and restaurants nearby. Steps to the metro.   Christina responded very quickly to questions, etc. Would stay again.

Appartement conforme à l'annonce : propre, spacieux, calme. Nous étions 5 et très à l'aise grâce la disposition en duplex.
A 5 min de la place d'Espagne, au pied de la colline de Monjuic, à 2 pas du métro Poble Sec et une vingtaine de minutes à pieds des Ramblas ou du port, l'emplacement est excellent pour un séjour touristique. La prise de contact et l'accueil de Yamila a été sympathique et chaleureux. Une bonne adresse à Barcelone.

The apartment is very spacious and nice. Kitchen is very well equipped and beds are comfy. The area is awesome. Excellent bars and restaurants just around the corner and a good supermarket right in front of the door. Bus/metro stops are very close too. Wifi is great and the apartment is very nicely decorated. Kids (and grandmom) loved the chill out corner downstairs. Communication with Cristina and Yamila was better than I ever would have expected. Great week.
Perfect apartment and neighborhood in Poble Sec. A lot of space and close to the metro, the city and the beautiful mont juic.

Cristina´s apartment si spacy, clean and very well located, just a couple of minutes walk from plaza Espanya. Yamila was a very friendly host, always on time and with a smile on her face. We enjoyed our stay a lot.

Wir waren absolut begeistert von der Wohnung. Alles sehr sauber und gut ausgestattet.  Die Wohnung liegt zentral in der Stadt,  aber trotzdem absolut ruhig. Yamilla hat uns sehr freundlich empfangen und war immer gut zu erreichen. Vielen Dank für die gute Zeit  in dieser tollen Stadt.

The apartment is very spacious and nice decorated. We were 3 couple and our staying was very comfortable . The metro / bus station is so close to the apartment. You can also find anything you want to this neighborhood.. Yamila was a great host ! We had a great week in Barcelona.

Cristina's home worked perfectly for us. Although it is a relatively small space it felt spacious for the five of us. 

The entrance is through quite a dark courtyard and arriving late at night it did give us pause. But during the day you realize it's an inner courtyard accessed by several apartments, full mostly with families from what we could see.

The kitchen had everything we needed for simple meals, the bathrooms worked perfectly, the little reading nook was a favorite space, and the air conditioning in the two primary bedrooms was appreciated as it was a hot week when we stayed. The middle room with the couch that turns into a bed didn't have air conditioning and it took some thinking to get air flowing through that space.

We liked the neighborhood as it feels like it is full of locals, not tourists. There are restaurants all around as well as markets and shops, making it very simple to keep everyone happy with food. The metro and bus stops are within a few blocks and very convenient. Both my sister and I used the bus to go to the airport (40 mins or so), though a taxi from the airport was only about 25 Euro.

Noise does travel easily from apartment to apartment in the courtyard but I was impressed by how well everyone stuck to the quiet hours. From around 11 at night until around 10 in the morning there was very little noise. 

I would happily stay at Cristina's again, both for the comfort of the apartment and the authenticity of the neighborhood.

Una casa con mucho encanto, cómoda, tranquila y en un barrio con todo lo necesario a un paso de casa. Sin duda para repetir y recomendar.
No coincidimos con Cristina pero en su lugar Yamila nos recibió y estuvo pendiente de lo que pudiéramos necesitar.

Muchas gracias a ambas!!
Great place with all amenities nearby.
A family-friendly apartment in a great location vis a vis public transport. The local contacts were really responsive whenever we had issues or questions. I would definitely stay here again!
Appartement agréable, bien équipé et bien situé.
Great place, great location - everything as described and Xavi was very helpful both on arrival and departure, Michael

we were so happy with our stay. they flat was very clean spacious the kitchen and the whole flat was well stocked even with water and kitchen roll - very good with kids! we had a great time there really liked the area and the friendly communication leading up and during our stay. The outdoor space is overlooked by many other apt which is fine but maybe something to note if you have small loud kids! thank you for having us!

We had a fabulous time in Barcelona. Staying at Cristina’s house was the perfect place to explore the city and surrounding area. 

Yamila gave very good directions prior to arriving at the house, and additional advice on arriving by public transport to the house. 
The Poble Sec metro station is only 5 minutes away from the house that connects to the airport via the train or you can catch the Eurobus to Espanya. It is only a 10-15 minutes walk away. All very easy.

The house was beautiful & everything described in their advert.
It was situated in a secure gated community with other residents which felt very safe. 
It was clean and easily accommodated 6 adults with plenty of space to sit & relax, both in the house or outside on the downstairs patio or upstairs on the 2 balconies. 

It was a great base for to discover the city, with all the main shopping areas, museums and cafes in easy access either by walking or by Metro. We tended to walk into the city, and catch the metro back.

There was a small supermarket across the road, plus many local shops nearby including butchers, fishmongers, bakery and a 24-hour shop.

We had no issues during our stay, but Yamila was easy to communicate with, and responded quickly to confirm our leaving plans. 

We would fully recommend staying at Cristina’s house.
Hemos estado cinco días muy agusto. Nos han tratado muy bien y el piso ha cumplido las espectativas.

Nous avons reçu plusieurs courriels avant notre arrivée. L'accueil a été très chaleureux. L'hôte a été très empressée de répondre à nos questions et à nos besoins que ce soit pour imprimer des billets pour des visites touristiques ou encore pour nous donner des références en raison d'un problème médical. 
L'appartement est très bien situé, à proximité d'une station de métro, d'une boulangerie, poissonnerie, boucherie, épicerie et pharmacie.
L'appartement est spacieux et les deux salles de bain dont l'une avec bain et l'autre avec douche sont très pratiques. Nous sommes enchantés de notre séjour. Nous n'avons aucune hésitation à recommander cet appartement. Un gros merci!

Logement très bien équipé, très agréable, aménagé avec goût, adapté à une famille jusqu'à 4 enfants. L'espace lecture / jeu très apprécié des enfants. Les 2 belles terrasses et le balcon permettent de profiter d'une situation au calme, en fond de cour. Facilité à proximité : supermarché en face, boulangerie à côté, métro à 2 mn à pied.

our trip was wonderfall and cristina house was even more.
we couldn't ask for more.
the house was spacious,clean,comfortable and really domestic.
the location was also great and  we used the bakery and the supermarket(5 meter away!) every morning.
 at our next trip to barcelona we absolutely gonna check the possibility to rent again cristina, home and also recommend friends that looking for place at barcelona (: 
thank you and yamilia very much!

Tout est conforme à l'annonce!! Très bien accueillis à notre arrivée! Seul bémol, la voiture!! Législation barcelonaise compliquée, couleurs autorisées ou non, du coup atterrissage à la fourrière...Donc pensez à suivre les indications du loueur pour rejoindre un parking "officiel"!!
RAS concernant l'appart, pour pinailler: la 2ème chambre double manque d'intimité car ouverte sur les escaliers donc pas d'isolation phonique possible.
Nous remercions Christina mais surtout Yamila qui s'est occupée de nous sur place!

Lovely place. The description is really good and we couldn't be happier with the apartment and everything else.
Highly recommend.

The apartment was very well located with easy access to lots of good places to visit. The area itself was not at all touristy and had a very authentic local feel. There was a supermarket across the road and a fab bakery right next door! The apartment was very comfortable with lots of homely touches which made it feel like a home away from home.

Une semaine à Barcelone formidable, dans un logement super bien équipé, calme, à proximité de commerces et proche d'une station de métro, c'est ce qu'il faut pour un séjour réussi. Tout correspondait à la description faite sur le site. L'accueil de Yamila est super sympa. Merci pour toutes ses explications et sa gentillesse. Une adresse à recommander vivement. Merci à Cristina et Yamila
Todo excelente! Gerne wieder!

The apartment is everything we expected and what you see is what you get. The pictures tell the story, it was clean, it has a lot of space, the little terrace in the backyard is just perfect to relax on after a long day walk.

The metro station is indeed super close to the apartment and in 2 stops you are on Rambla and Columb's Monument is in plain sight. There's a shop right across the street and a larger one around the corner. There is even a pizza place next to it.

It took us about 45 minutes to get there from the airport, but it's a simple route.

Overall, the apartment is great, the hosts are lovely people and very helpful. We had a blast in Barcelona and we just hope we'll be back soon.

Thank you for everything :)
Great location and values!
Very spacious, bright, clean, and well laid out two story apartment. All facilities in order (kitchen, internet, bathrooms...). Great for a family.
Barrio cómodo, bien comunicado. La casa está muy bien. Tiene terraza, y tiene encanto.

Lovely two floor mezzainein poble sec. There is a very nice open plan living room, dining room and kitchen. There are also 3 bedrooms which suited our group of 5 friends. There is s lovely terrace and two balconies. It was great that basics such as coffee were supplied. It is a quiet area but with a bakery opposite and lots of bars/ restaurants near by. You are only 5 minutes walk from the metro and 20 from las ramblas
地段不错,就是还要提供护照什么的

What a wonderful place!! My family and I (a group of 4) stayed here for a full week in June. At the time, Barcelona was having an unusual heat wave, so Cristina's place ended up being a true oasis for us! Poble Sec is a great neighborhood and allows for easy access to many of the main attractions in Barcelona. We would regularly walk a couple short blocks to the main road, Paral Lel, and easily catch a taxi to the beach or to Oldtown for sightseeing etc. It's possible to walk to many sights, but during the heat wave we had to rely on rides!
The house itself was lovely, fully equipped kitchen, two bathrooms and a very comfortable living room. The downstairs patio magically stays cooler than anywhere else outside so we sat there often. Everything was clean and easy to use!
There is a wonderful bakery next door that we went to every morning. Two great plazas in either direction a block away for coffees, sandwiches, tapas and drinks. And, there is a market directly across the street so you always have access to necessities. Carrer Blai is a lively street very close by that is buzzing at night with great people watching. This is a fantastic place for pinxtos, with every option you can imagine. This is a great street for lounging with drinks in outdoor seating and seems to be filled with locals and tourists alike.
Cristina was fast with communication and gave lots of information about the house and area. Yamilla helped us check in and out, and was so kind and helpful!! We loved our stay and absolutely recommend staying here while you are in Barcelona!!

Amazing flat in a great location! Everything ran smoothly with the owner and flat is very well equipped. 
Highly recommended!

Of the three cities we visited on our family trip Europe - BCN was the absolute best and this amazing apt. in Pablo-Sec helped make our experience perfect.  Our host was a total delight - really good at her job!  She met us at the exact appointed times, and I knew that I could count on her if anything went awry.  She was great at providing us with so many useful details about the area and for giving me all the instructions that I needed to cook and do laundry. (I guess I can't get away from that - even on vacation!!!)  
The house was super comfortable for me, my husband, and our two teen boys. It was also VERY clean and tidy.  Everyone had their own space - which was a welcome departure from what we experienced in London and Paris.   We did rely on the air conditioning at night. It was pretty hot for us - as we come from Oregon and are not so used to it!  We made good use of the patio, that's for sure!  (Actually, there are three outdoor patios in this home, but the one on the bottom floor, off the kitchen, got the most use by us.)  
The baths were great - just fine.  We are a very tall family (all the men are over 6'5") so it was good to use a shower that they could stand up in!  
The kitchen was really great to use and provided everything we needed!  I was so grateful for how thoughtfully everything was provided to us as guests.  
The location is ideal - it's just two blocks from the Metro and the neighborhood has all the shops you need for local shopping - a bakery, a butcher, a Super Mercado and tons of cafes.  It's not a touristy location at all - which we loved.   My boys went down to the beach almost every day we were there - to swim, drink beer (and look at the awesome women !!) and my husband and I explored the beautiful streets and art and culture of Barcelona - all within easy reach.  
We hope to come back!  We would love to book again and certainly recommend this very nice Pablo-sec apt to friends and family... and anyone reading this review!
Denise Slattery and Steve Michener
Lake Oswego, Oregon

Wonderful apartment in a great location. Really close to the metro, buses and places to walk to.
Supermarket opposite made life very easy. Lots of space in the apartment for family to spread out or be together.
Would recommend!
房子很大,很宽敞｡设施很齐全,甚至连孩子的便盆都有｡楼下就是超市,离地铁站也很近,生活很便利｡

Appartement très bien équipé, proche des commerces (un supermarché en face) et des sites touristiques (Ramblas à 10 min à pied et Fontaine de Montjuic à 5 min) avec un parking municipal proche où il est possible de prendre un abonnement à la semaine. L'accueil de Xavi a été parfait, c'est une personne chaleureuse, professionnelle  et très ponctuelle! L'appartement a beaucoup de qualité, très bien équipé, grand et propre. Un seul bémol est la pièce principale qui est un peu sombre et sans climatisation, il fait un peu chaud l'été! Cependant les chambres sont climatisées et cela permet de bien dormir, de plus cet appartement est très calme ! Excellent séjour !

Cristina's apartment is great, wonderfull. It's wide, spacious, quiet, delightful. Perfect for a family. The apartment isn't far to the city center (15/20min by walk) and within walking distance to the main public transport, metro and bus. For those arriving in Barcelona by car, near the apartment (3 minuts by walk) there is a municipal parking named "Aparcament Municipal Rius and Taulet". With special rates for 3/5/7 days, during this time you have the opportunity to use the same ticket to park the car in several municipal parking located around the city and close to several turistic attractions: Sagrada Familia, Parc Guell, Barceloneta, etc... Barcelona is great! like its people! Last but not least, Cristina and her assistants are perfect hosts. They are always fast to reply at your  questions and very helpful. Thank you again Cristina.
Great location, everything went as expected.

Cristina and her team were fantastic communicators from the start to the check out time. The house was clean and had all the household items you needed for a weeks stay. I appreciated Xavi's availability, recommendations and his kind personality. Location is a bit off the beaten track and it felt really nice to be in a more neighborhood-like location of the city instead of right in the center of all the tourists. Easy access to the metro as well as several bars, restaurants and supermercats. I would definitely recommend Cristina's flat to others visiting Barcelona!
The apartment was exactly as it was in photos. Cosy, well equiped and close to metro station. Although we haven't met Cristina on person, she aranged everything that was needed.

Our holiday in Barcelona is wonderful because of Cristina's house and all help from her assistant Yamila! It's warm, beautiful, quiet, comfortable and fully equipped. It's within 10 minutes walking distance from the subway station and supermarkets are around the house.
Thanks to the help from Cristina and her assistant Yamila, looking forward to returning to this beautiful city and returning to the same house that like home!
我们在巴塞罗那的假期,因为Cristina的房子还有她助手Yamila的全程帮助而完美｡温馨美丽,安静舒适,设施齐全,距离地铁站步行距离都在10分钟内,好几家超市就在附近｡
感谢Cristina和她的助手Yamila对我们的帮助,期待再回到这座美丽的城市旅行,再回到这个家一样的房子~

All the information was sent to us ahead of time. Before we arrive, we knew exactly who to contact, what to do, how to reach the apt and all needed info. That was really great.
When we reached the place, the entrance  of the building was a bit old and unexpected but we got used to it. The apt is completely renovated from the inside and totally clean. 
The person we were supposed to meet was very helpful, answered all the questions and gave us some advises for the area.
A supermarket is just across the main door and many restaurants are just around.  We felt safe and secure.
I would recommend this place.

Tout comme les locataires précédents, nous avons été conquis par cet appartement propre, fonctionnel et bien équipé. 
Le quartier, populaire, rempli de petits commerces et la proximité de la station de métro ont grandement facilité notre séjour avec notre petit garçon de 3 ans.
Les contacts par mails avec Cristina ont toujours été précis et l'accueil de Yamila a été chaleureux. Nous avons réussi à nous comprendre malgré nos lacunes en espagnol et en anglais.
Nous avons senti qu'elles avaient à coeur de choyer leurs hôtes. 
C'était notre première expérience en airbnb et nous en sommes ravis !
Et Barcelone, c'est GENIAL !!
Appartement très propre, bien équipé, parfait pour une famille de 5. Chauffage nickel, et très calme malgré la localisation.
Our stay was short but we really enjoyed the place with a very nice living room and terrasse.

Beautiful, stylish and cozy apartment with everything you need. Great neighborhood close to sights, public transport and awesome restaurants/ cafes. An amazing hosts who truly cares about her guests. We loved it.

Cristian's Place in Poble Sec was the PERFECT place for us! We used it as our base for the Barcelona Marathon and the location was ideal. Only a couple of blocks away from the Start and Finish, it was also a quick walk to the Metro which meant  we had the opportunity to see our runners multiple times over the race. The apartment was very comfortable with every imaginable amenity, loads of fresh air balconies, comfortable beds, and terrific restaurant recommendations from Cristina. Yamila was a great communicator and met us with keys and all kinds of helpful information. We would highly recommend Cristina's place to families and running groups alike!

Ruim apartement, goede ligging, vlakbij openbaar vervoer,  veel supermarkten en winkels in de buurt. We hebben een heel fijn verblijf gehad. Cristina en Yamila reageren snel en zijn erg behulpzaam. We raden dit apartment zeker aan.

Very nice and spacious apartment right in the middle of a fantastic neighborhood. Great apartment for travelling with kids! All the facilities you could ever need, and a superb base for exploring Barcelona. Highly recommendable!

This apartment shines for the location: a lovely bakery next door, supermarket across the street, restaurants not far away, and a metro station at a two minute walk. 

The apartment itself is very comfortable and well-appointed. Explore the kitchen cupboards before you shop, as there are quite a few basic items already available! The beds are easy to sleep in and there is plenty of storage place for clothes. The whole apartment is well-kept and scrupulously clean. 

One thing to be aware of is that the walls between houses aren’t very sound-proof, and windows in the neighbourhood are generally kept open, so you will hear some of what’s going on next door. However the whole neighbourhood becomes very quiet in the evening and we had no trouble sleeping. 

Overall, a real gem and thoroughly recommended.

Cristina's place was very nice and the location was good. Metro stop is just around the corner, so transportation was super easy. We had a 5 person group staying there for three nights. Communication with the host was really fast and punctual.
Unfortunately, i book this apartment on behalf of other people, but i think they love the house. I just hope that the guys were good with the owner.

Nous avons passé une agréable semaine dans l'appartement de Cristina avec un couple d'ami et leurs deux enfants. L'appartement est très agréable, très bien placé (2 min du métro, supérette en face, boulangerie à côté) et bien équipé. La deuxième chambre double est peut être un peu petite mais nous n'étions pas à Barcelone pour rester dans les chambres. Son emplacement en arrière cour en fait un lieu calme, agréable après une journée à courir les rues. L'accueil a été très sympathique et souple, les contacts réguliers pendant la semaine répondant à nos questions, cherchant des solutions de transport pour se rendre à l'aéroport.

We stayed at Cristina’s place for four nights ( a couple ). House is as described and even better, in a very nice neighberhood, less crouded with nice places to eat and deink. Metro station is 2-3 minutes walk and very convenient to use for sight seeing.
The house is fully equiped and clear instructions for everythring are provided. 
Communication with Yamilla was perfect and she was very friendly and willing to assist if needed ( although everything was perfect). The whole approach was very professional and friendly at the same time.  although our flight was delayed, Yamilla was available and waiting for us, very polite and friendly
Highly recommended place, would defenitely choose again!
Appartement très agréable. Équipements très complets. Proche du métro, des commerces mais aussi d’une rue piétonne avec restos à tapas.

Excellent value,  4 min to Metro Subway,  many convenience stores and small supermarkets within a few minutes of walk and some open really late.  Bakery open early right next to front entrance of the complex.  Unit can sleep 6 with 2 bathrooms.  However , only one fully functional shower and space is tight. Otherwise tones of space everywhere with excellent kitchen.  Extra tall ceiling and bright.

Nous avons loger pendant 5 jours chez Cristina entre copines. Nous étions 5 et nous avons eu de la place pour chacune. L'appartement est vraiment ultra équipé, n'emmenez rien, Cristina et son amie Yamila ont pensé à tout! L'emplacement dans Barcelone est extra, un 3mn du métro. Le quartier est calme, il y a des commerçants juste devant la porte pour les courses. La cours intérieure est typique et adorable, un mix entre la beauté de l'ancien et la simplicité du contemporain. Bref nous avons adoré l'appartement et nous avons été chouchoutée par Yamila et Cristina. Deplus nous avons pu très rapidement rajouter une nuit ( problème avion) car Cristina est ultra réactive. Si je retourne à Barcelone un jour, c'est certain j'irai chez Cristina!

I really cannot fault this apartment. It is in a great location, there is a grocery shop and bakery literally just outside the door. We had 2 teenagers with us and to have 3 bedrooms was just a luxury. The apartment is spacious, stylish and quirky and it was equipped with everything you could need, we all loved it! Check in was brilliant, despite us arriving late due to a delayed flight and check out was also seamless and they even arranged a taxi for us. I highly recomend.

Stay was great in Christina's place. It is located in a nice area, new developing neibourhood, 20 minutes walk or short metro from la ramblas. The house is fully equipped with everything u need to cook and dine. Balconies are nice too.
很舒服的住宅小区,安静,便利,门口的超市很方便,超市旁边有水果店,便宜又好吃｡出行既有公交巴士又有地铁非常便利｡而且周遭属于比较安全的小区环境,门口前面有个社区广场,非常多的孩子们在这里上学习班,感觉很安心｡房东们也很负责｡

The location, surroundings, facilities and service were perfect. The area is well connected, splendid for several days trip in Barcelona. I totally recommend it and hopefully we’ll stay again next year. The communication with Yamila was always fluid and really friendly. Top choice!!

We absolutely loved staying here. It is a true living in a community feeling. The neighbors were lovely. The apartment was clean and felt like a home. The location is perfect. Yamila and Christina were fabulous hosts. We miss it already. Thank you very much. Kind regards Carmen.
great house and value!
Very, very nice appartement in a local neightborhood, it's to be recommended.

Nous venons de passer une semaine chez Cristina avec nos 2 enfants et nous garderons un très bon souvenir de ce nid douillet.
 Cet appartement possède de très nombreuses qualités : 
-l'emplacement est exceptionnel, à 150m d'une station de métro , au calme absolu, dans une rue tranquille.
-il possède la clim, et c'est indispensable à Barcelone en Juillet.
-il est spacieux, (beaucoup plus qu'il n'y paraît sur les photos), haut de plafond.Tout est très propre, et l'équipement est complet ( vaisselle cuisine, toaster, bouilloire, nespresso, sèche-cheveux, machine à laver etc...)
-rien ne manque, on se sent tout de suite comme chez soi, et nous avons pris tous nos petits déjeuners sur le patio.
-la literie est très bonne pour tous les lits (et je suis généralement très exigeante sur ce point).
-le quartier est populaire ,familial, sympathique et la rue de Blai qui se trouve à 5min de marche vous offre de nombreux bars à tapas!
- il y a une supérette juste en face de l'appartement. Aussi une boulangerie, un marchand de fruits et légumes.
-l'organisation arrivée/départ est parfaitement bien rodée , nous remercions Javier pour son extrême gentillesse et sa grande disponibilité! 
Aucun défaut, allez-y les yeux fermés ! Barcelone est une ville dynamique, culturelle, festive et les barcelonais sont tous très accueillants et ont le sens du service !
Quel dommage d'avoir du repartir ce matin...
Super séjour

Our group of six really enjoyed staying at this place. There were all the necessary items needed and the location was ideal. Nice bakeries and butcher shops nearby and walking distance to most attractions one would want to see in Barcelona.

Great location, very clean and wide apartment. Perfect for families with kids.
The host communicated very clearly and was very helpful.
The only thing that can be a problem is the amount of light that comes in in the morning on the extra room.

We (2 couples) stayed at Cristina's place in Poble Sec for a week in Sept. 2018.  We loved the location.  Local coffee shop on the corner.  Tapas restaurants in the square.  Grocery store across the street.  The apartment was well equipped and sparkling clean.  Yamila was responsive to all our texts, inquiries and went out of her way to ensure we had a great stay.

großzügige Wohnung wie auf den Fotos, gute Ausstattung, leider durch die dichte Bebauung recht dunkel, kaum Sonne. Nachbarn teils etwas lästig (geruch, gemecker, laute Unterhaltung bis Mitternacht).
über öffentliche Verkehrsmittel gut zu erreichen, recht zentral, nahe belebter Strassen Aber trotzdem kein Verkehrslärm.
Bäcker gleich nebenan und kleiner Supermarkt sowie obst Händler.
Apartamento com ótima localização, próximo ao metrô e com supermercado e frutaria exatamente na porta.

Christina and Yamila's place is lovely, cozy, and spacious. It's conveniently located right outside of the city center. You can get anywhere in a very short amount of time and then come home to a nice quiet neighborhood.

Bel appartement, bien décoré, très bien placé dans un quartier calme. Bien équipé, avec les transports et plusieurs commerces et restaurants à proximité, et accueil très sympathique. 

Nice apartment, well decorated, very well placed in a quiet area. Well equipped, with transport and several shops and restaurants nearby, and very friendly welcome.
Gracias por todo, departamento muy bien umbicado y la atención de Yamile fue super! Ojalá nos vemos en el proximo año. Saludos desde Brasil

Grocery store across the street, 5 minutes from metro, easy to get to main attractions. House has thin walls and neighborhood isn’t especially quiet, we felt like we had to whisper. Ear plugs were an easy fix for me at night but my husband had a hard time sleeping. Overall nice place to stay though.

Everything went smoothly with the reservation, the keys and the check out. Cristina is easy going and uncomplicated. We had an excellent time in her cozy apartment, well-located, 20 mn by feet to down town. Supermarket and bakery very close, same street. We definitely recommend this place!
位置好,生活便利,设施和用品齐全,很舒服,就是有一间房没有对外的窗

Good place, however there is no proper noise isolation between neighbours walls and whenever they talked or put music on, you could hear everything. Cristina and Yamila were great hosts though, attentive to our issues. The location is great
Beautiful Appartement in a very nice neighbourhood. We really enjoyed the time there. And we had a super and very helpful host. Muchas gracias:))

name: Double Room
summary: Literally just across the street is the world famous Cagaloglu Hammam featured in 1,000 Places to See Before You Die by Patricia Schultz. The hotel is tucked away on a quiet street and is just a few minutes walk to some of the world’s famous sites,
description: Literally just across the street is the world famous Cagaloglu Hammam featured in 1,000 Places to See Before You Die by Patricia Schultz. The hotel is tucked away on a quiet street and is just a few minutes walk to some of the world’s famous sites,

host.host_about:
Hello, my name is Bugra. It will be pleasure to meet you while travelling to Istanbul where is the capital city of three successive Empires. 

On behalf of the staff and management, we would like to extend a warm welcome to you and congratulate you for choosing us. 

Warm smiles and friendly service is our policy everyday for every guest.  Our staff truly cares about all your travel needs making your visit comfortable and memorable.

name: Charming apartment in Santa Teresa
summary: Recently refurbished 3 bedroom apartment in the bohemian neighbourhood of Santa Teresa in Rio de Janeiro. This airy and light apartment is close to many trendy bars, restaurants and cafes and has a supermarket 5 minutes walk away.
space: This flat has been recently refurbished and furnished with beautiful new  furniture. Big windows , sunlight all through the day. Very well ventilated . Beautiful views.
description: Recently refurbished 3 bedroom apartment in the bohemian neighbourhood of Santa Teresa in Rio de Janeiro. This airy and light apartment is close to many trendy bars, restaurants and cafes and has a supermarket 5 minutes walk away. This flat has been recently refurbished and furnished with beautiful new  furniture. Big windows , sunlight all through the day. Very well ventilated . Beautiful views. Guests will have access to all the areas of the apartment. I'll be contactable through Airbnb at any time if you have any questions though please note I am based in the UK. It is a very bohemian area with great cafes, bars with live music, a supermarket within a 10 minute walk, a street market with fruits, vegetables, fish, flowers, etc. The flat is very near the last stop of the Bondinho (street car of Santa Teresa). Public transport opposite the building. The flat is very near the last stop of the Bondinho (street car of Santa Teresa). Public transport opposite the (Website hidden by Airbnb)
neighborhood_overview: It is a very bohemian area with great cafes, bars with live music, a supermarket within a 10 minute walk, a street market with fruits, vegetables, fish, flowers, etc. The flat is very near the last stop of the Bondinho (street car of Santa Teresa). Public transport opposite the building.
notes: KEYS The gate at pavement level isn't locked. Up the steps to the front door, only the lower of the 2 locks is used. This is the key with blue paint on it. The 2 keys to Apt 302 have red paint on them and are both deadlocks, not latch locks - you cant slam them to lock the door. When you get in you have to lock again from the inside. If you use the lower of the two locks you can leave that key in the lock, and people outside can still get in using their own key. RUBBISH. Branca generally leaves small bags inside the public litter (colour orange) bin on the lamppost near the front door. I am not sure that this is kosher but they seem to disappear. The days when rubbish is collected are Tuesdays, Thursdays and Saturdays. The rubbish can be left in front of a light pole in front of the building. Please make sure the bags are well  closed. GAS The supply to the cooker and to the water heater in the bathroom comes via a pipe with a yellow tap. This has to be in line with the pipe for the ga
transit: The flat is very near the last stop of the Bondinho (street car of Santa Teresa). Public transport opposite the (Website hidden by Airbnb) can take the bus 014 to the center of Rio and then take the metro to Copacabana , Ipanema and Barra.
access: Guests will have access to all the areas of the apartment.
interaction: I'll be contactable through Airbnb at any time if you have any questions though please note I am based in the UK.
house_rules: No pets. No smoking.

host.host_about: I am a Brazilian/Italian national who has lived in London for the last 30 years. I speak English, Portuguese, Italian and Spanish fluently and like the rest of the world, I love travelling and meeting people from different parts of the world. Other interests include foreign film, reading, astrology and working out (pilates and yoga).

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments: El departamento es muy acogedor, su decoración es cálida y bonita. Cuenta con 4 dormitorios y  camas para 5 personas, tiene una buena pieza de cocina y artefactos  para preparar comidas (aunque sólo tomamos desayuno ahí) , un baño bueno y un medio baño (WC) que es un apoyo, pero requiere cierta ventilación directa, que hoy día no tiene.

Fantastic, spacious, warm, comfortable and centrally located apartment.  With excellent bars and cafes just around the corner, we loved the location.  A short easy stroll to the main restaurant area and tourist shops. We didn't use the local supermarket as purchased stuff down by the metro and took a taxi up the hill.  The photos are very good and show just what the apartment is like.  Branca and Tereza were very helpful and responsive to questions.  Would definitely stay again if we ever get the chance.  Thank you.

Eu amei muito a estadia no apartamento de Branca! Super lindo, a decoração maravilhosa, super limpo e com uma vista maravilhosa! Branca foi uma ótima anfitriã, sua amiga Tereza também, que nos deu um ótimo suporte, dicas de passeios e nos tratou super bem. Recomendo muito e espero voltar outras vezes.

Branca's flat is great! It's in a wonderful around up in the Bohemian neighborhood of Santa Teresa. We were there during carnival- it had great proximity to the blocos without being right in them. The flat had plenty of space and Branca and Wanderley made sure we had everything we needed at all times. Would recommend 100%!!

Branca's apartment is very well located in charming Santa Teresa, with incredible views of the city. Everything is very clean and well-organized. Wanderley, the apartment manager, is super friendly and responsive. He sat down with me at check-in and helped orient me on the map. We had a lovely time here and would certainly come back!
El mejor apartamento en el mejor barrio administrados por los mejores anfitriones. Todo 10 puntos!

El apartamento es un sueño:  ambientes amplios, exquisita decoración y preciosa vista a la ciudad, gracias a su ubicación en el mejor barrio de Río: Santa Teresa! Banca y Wanderley fueron excelentes anfitriones y respondieron a todas nuestras inquietudes e hicieron nuestra estadía allí perfecta. Muchas gracias por todo!

name: 1 or 2 rooms with private terrace in shared flat
summary: Room located in the Eixample district in central Barcelona, only 5 minutes walk from Plaza Spain where you find public transport to the airport, other cities etc. It is a penthouse with two terraces on, and lots of light. Private terrace and possibility to receive a third person in another room.
space: The flat is situated on the last floor so offers very nice view and lot of privacy. Two big terraces :one is private and especially used by the guest and the other one is commun. One room has a king size bed (2*2m) and the other one has a normal bed (1,5*2m). It is possible for you to cook and to have a great breakfast on the terrace. I hope you will have a great time there.
description: Room located in the Eixample district in central Barcelona, only 5 minutes walk from Plaza Spain where you find public transport to the airport, other cities etc. It is a penthouse with two terraces on, and lots of light. Private terrace and possibility to receive a third person in another room. The flat is situated on the last floor so offers very nice view and lot of privacy. Two big terraces :one is private and especially used by the guest and the other one is commun. One room has a king size bed (2*2m) and the other one has a normal bed (1,5*2m). It is possible for you to cook and to have a great breakfast on the terrace. I hope you will have a great time there. It is possible to have access to the kitchen, the bathroom and the two terraces. You can reach me by phone, whatspp, email. This is a very quiet area and very safe. I do everything walking or by bicycle. From the airport, I recommend you to take the aerobus. This is s blue bus, you can not miss it. Then you have to stop at
neighborhood_overview: This is a very quiet area and very safe. I do everything walking or by bicycle.
transit: From the airport, I recommend you to take the aerobus. This is s blue bus, you can not miss it. Then you have to stop at plaza España and walk 5 minutes through Gran Via in direction of the center. When you reach Rocafort street, my home is located at number 91. You have to ring at SA located on the left interphone. When you enter into the building, you have to take the elevator in the left NOT the one straight. Then in the elevator please press SA.
access: It is possible to have access to the kitchen, the bathroom and the two terraces.
interaction: You can reach me by phone, whatspp, email.
house_rules: It is not possible to bring guest and no possibility to organize parties. I do not accept children

host.host_about:
Hello I am Christophe, I am French and live in Barcelona since 8 years now. I know a reasonably well the city and I will be happy to advise you on places to visit, restaurant or where to have a nice drink. 

I work in sales and travel also a lot so I know the meaning of "feel like at home" when you travel somewhere.

I really hope you will enjoy your stay in Barcelona.

reviews.comments:
I had a marvellous time staying in Barcelona and felt very at home x the apartment is fab with two roof terraces and the hospitality is even better.
Capitaine checked I was ok regularly on my way to the apartment and gave transport, restaurant, general advice all the time I was there. I now have flat envy!!

My stay here was great. Just like the listing shows, the apartment is very tidy and has two amazing rooftop patios. Its close to a lot of tourist attractions and right next to the subway. The neighborhood is calm and quiet.

Die Unterkunft bei Christoph war großartig! Alles so, wie auf den Fotos dargestellt. Meine Tochter und ich haben uns so wohlgefühlt, dass wir gar nicht wieder nach Hamburg zurück fliegen wollten. Christoph war total nett, zuverlässig und ein hilfsbereiter Gastgeber bei allem, was uns am Herzen lag. Wir werden gerne wiederkommen, Barcelona muss man einfach öfter erleben!

It was my first time in Spain and first time using airbnb and everything went amazing! Pretty good area for a lot of tourist attractions and the place itself is so clean and nice (his balconies have good views and are very pretty). My friends loved this place as well. Also, Capitaine is an amazing host, always asked me if I needed anything, offered a lot of stuff and even suggested me bars I can go. I would definitely want to stay here again if I visit Barcelona again :)

We had a great time staying in Christophe´s apartment. Christophe is a really nice and fun guy and was always extremely helpful and caring. The apartment is great, especially the two huge terraces. The room is perfect for 2 and has its own access to one of the terraces. There is no wardrobe in the room but we could use one in an other room which was fine. The apartment is located right next to a metro station and the airport bus stop is nearby too which is really convenient. The city center and areas with nice restaurants and bars are in walking distance which was perfect for us. We really enjoyed our stay and would definitely come again!
Die Unterkunft war sehr toll, vorallem die Terrassen waren wunderschön. Christoph war sehr freundlich und hilfsbereit, ich würde sofort wieder buchen.
First, I will start by saying how accommodating he was. Second, the flat is as pictured. The views, the views, THE VIEWS. Great location, seconds from the metro and all in all a good stay!

The best things of this house are amazing terrace and location. There are two terraces. One is common area which is very spacious and cozy. The other one is only for guest and we loved this place. Sunrise and sunset from terrace were unforgettable. The metro station is on same block, so very convenient. You can go to Katalunya station directly.(only 3 stops). Cristophe is nice guy and helpful! He is always willing to help us. 
I can't say the house is perfectly clean. A cleaness is ok but it can be improved.

Première expérience avec Airbnb, dans un appartement idéalement placé à Barcelone  ( place d'Espagne ) proche du métro, des bus desservant l'aéroport. ...L'appartement et surtout les 2 terrasses dont une privative mérite le détour. Christophe est un hôte très accueillant aux petits soins pour nous. Ravie de ce week end.

Truly one of the best Airbnb locations I have stayed at. Christophe is so warm and accommodating, and the flat can't be beat for its amazing patio spaces, comfort and ideal location. I only wish I would have been able to spend more evenings there on the patio enjoying the sunset.

We couldn't have had more a lovely stay. Our host made sure our space was impeccable and not only that he wanted our trip to be a fulfilled one, he had tips for us that even after we left we still followed. If only we could've stayed longer.

Capitaine is a lovely young man who was always available when needed without being intrusive during our stay. Our private room & terrace was lovely. Great views over Barcelona. We had the whole flat mainly to ourselves as Capitaine is a very busy young man on a project of constant improvement. Thanks for a lovely holiday. Anita & Al

Espectacular experiencia en el Centro de Barcelona, donde logramos sentirnos en un barrio típico de esa ciudad.  La cercanía con la estación de Rocafort es genial además de la gran cantidad de cafés, restaurantes, pastelerías, supermercados, etc.  La atención de Christophe muy amable y servicial, muy acogedora, siempre atento a nuestras necesidades y consultas.

Cristoph es un excelente anfitrión. Siempre estuvo disponible y atento para cualquier cosa que necesitáramos.  Las fotos reflejan el departamento tal cual es. Muy cómodo y luminoso al igual que su cocina. Las terrazas un verdadero placer!! y la cama muy cómoda. La zona donde está es muy práctica para desplazarse ya sea en metro como en bus. Tambien se puede ir caminando hasta la estación de tren. es una opción muy recomendable.
Fantastic place and great host, extremely welcoming and caring

Christophe is a very nice person. We left the keys inside the house and he was in France at the moment, but he called his friends to open the door for us! The house is close to a metro station of L1. And 5 min walk to Spain square!

Christophe is a great host and really made me feel at home. The communication was really smooth and he helped me with every question I had. I really enjoyed staying at Christophe's nice apartment. I appreciated the comfortable bed, the silence and that he offered water, tea and coffee. He was even letting me cook und use from his own food so I hadn't got to rush out on the first evening and organize something. 
The apartment is nicely furnished and the two terrasses are really amazing. Wished I had had more time to enjoy the wonderful terrasse. 
And although I haven't seen hin much I enjoyed the few conversations we had. Christophe is a very friendly person, charming and willing to help make your stay a great experience. 
Thanks for everything, Christophe! Staying at your place was definitely a great airbnb experience!

Christophe is very friendly and proactively asking for possible requests one might have. We had a good time living in his beautiful apartment. Our room and bed was in great condition and the highlight are the two specious Terraces, especially also for guests who like plants and flowers.
Thank you again Christophe, for having been such an excellent host.
I would definitely recommend this place!

Christophe is a wonderful host. His apartment was perfect for my stay in Barcelona--clean, comfortable, and gorgeous rooftop space. He left a large bottle of water, tea, and coffee in my room. I enjoyed spending time with Christophe and his friends. He is friendly, accommodating, and knowledgeable about Barcelona. I highly recommend his flat !! :)

I defiantly recommend this place. The apartment is charming, the room is very private and nice, the two balconies are just amazing and Christoph is such a good guy. The location is great and very easy to get to where ever you like in no time by the metro. you can also walk to most of the touristic places. don't hesitate, book it
Christophe est un hôte super sympa, disponible, prêt à rendre service. Christophe m'a fait partager une soirée avec ses amis, excellent souvenir ! très bon séjour. merci

Pleasant air bnb experience - from the host, the room was great specially the balcony overlooking Barcelona neighborhood. Location was more than perfect, a stone throw away from the Metro. Highly recommended stay!

Really nice apartment in a great location , underground station less than 2 min away .
I really liked the neighbourhood friendly locals and some authentic Spanish food to be had. 
Host was great gave me some recommendations for good restaurants and even a club nearby. 
Overall a great experience
It's a great spacious apartment with a huge terrace , lots of light and many plants. Everything is clean and in a good condition. The host is super friendly, easy going and helpful!

One of the best places to find in Barcelona! Christophe is a fantastic host, super helpful and reliable. He welcomed us with coffee and gave us great recommendations for our sightseeing and dinner plans. You can feel that he really wants to make sure his guests have the best time in the city of his choice.
The room was tidy and clean, has AC and comes with a private rooftop terrace overlooking the city. What else could you ask for?

Such a cool place, I'm sure that Il Capitaine is equally cool!  We had a great time here - dreamy long evenings out on the terrace and cool lie-ins to recover from Barcelona's many temptations. Recommended.

Such a wonderful appartement! Wonderful appartement! Christophe is a very kind and flexible host. He offered us coffee and provided us with infos about the city. And it was sooo relaxing sitting on our private terrasse looking at the Barcelona. skyline. We definitely want to come back soon! :)

Well deserved Super Host! Christophe was friendly, reliable and funny.
It was a really nice stay in such a beautiful Appartment. Our room was clean and cozy and we had our own Terrasse. Recommendable!

Love the place! It's clean and tastefully done. A huge living space and two balconies one next to our bedroom and the other from the living room with lots of plants and a stunning view of the city.  Plenty of natural light that just made it a happy sunny place for us. Definitely visiting again. Cheers!
위치가 좋고 에어컨이 빵빵하게 잘 나옵니다. 그것만으로도 완벽한 숙소였습니다. 테라스도 좋았으나 별로 사용할 일은 없었습니드.

One of the best locations and hosts in Barcelona. After hearing a lot of not-so-great reviews about lodging throughout Barcelona from friends and fellow travelers, I was worried about the trip. Capitaine's personality and apartment completely proved me wrong! He was always available to help, sitting down with us to show us some great spots to eat and visit, and even offered us a bottle of wine one night when we forgot to stop and grab one. 

The room was clean, the air conditioner was cold (and welcomed!), and the views are unbeatable. Location is in a quiet neighborhood that makes you feel like a local. HIGHLY recommend!

We couldn't rate Christophe's place highly enough, amazing views from our private terrace, bed was so comfy, not like a cheap hotel bed, a proper king size amazing mattress .. great location, close to everything but on a totally quiet and beautiful street.....Can't wait to go back..

Cristophe was an excellent host, very accommodating and easy to get along with, but respectful of our personal space. His apartment is beautiful and in a really great location for transport and local resturants/shops. I would highly recommend staying here.
Christophe was a great host! The location was fairly walkable to most of the main tourist attractions in Barcelona.

Tres bel Appartement , belle chambre et sa terrasse privative est tres Belle.
Christophe est a l écoute, flexible et discret.
L appartement est situé a proximite de commerces, restaurants, bar, 24/24h. 
La rue est au calme donc vous pouvez faire la grasse matinée sans problème.
Vous pouvez vous rendre a pied a la place d Espagne, Cataluyna et meme aller jusqu'au Ramblas a pied. 
Il y a un arret de metro en bas de la rue, il y a des bus.
Lorsque vous arrivez de l aéroport, le bus Aerobus vous laisse a 5 min de l appart, place d Espagne. Et il y a un grand centre commercial.
Tres bon sejour et hôte. Allez y les yeux fermés

Wir hatten einen tollen Aufenthalt bei Christophe!
Seine Wohnung ist schön eingerichtet (besonders die Dachterassen und die offene Küche) und gut gelegen (kurzer Weg zu Metro, schönes Viertel mit wenigen Touristen). 
Christophe ist sehr hilfsbereit, gut erreichbar und hat gute Tipps zu Essen und Ausflügen. 
Klare Empfehlung!
Fantastic apartment and great central location. Thank you Christopher so much for all advises
Capitaine是一位很棒的房东,帅气而贴心｡他的英语水平很棒,人也很友善｡他很乐意回答你的问题并力所能及的帮助你解决问题｡整个房间有两个大天台,一个在公共区一个在客房里,可以看到巴塞全景｡他关于美食的建议也很令人心喜｡总之,在他的帮助下我们开心的在巴塞度过了假期｡
跟房东一起住,房东人很好!房子地理位置也不错,离景点都还可以,周围也很便利,吃东西买东西都方便,

Merci à Christophe pour sa gentillesse sa disponibilité et ses super conseils pour découvrir Barcelone. Que dire de l'appartement avec sa terrasse privative à part Waouh !Super séjour ! ! appartement genial propre, très bien placé avec un métro au bout de la rue. merci encore pour tout et à très bientôt ! !
这是一个完美的家和安静,温暖的房子,当我到达得很晚时他是很有耐心的等待｡非常好的房东,非常热情!交通便利,靠近餐馆和超市,非常感谢,享受住在他家,因为有一个大阳台,主卧室还有小阳台,我可以看到巴塞罗那整个城市!完美的旅程､感谢房东!

Everything was perfect! Christophe is an amazing host. I started the trip by booking the night before I arrived and he did a fantastic job accommodating me. The flat is in the perfect location, the bed is so comfy and the two outdoor spaces are quite special. I really felt like it was home for the week and would definitely stay here again. Thank you!
This flat is a great place to stay at while visiting Barcelona. Chris made us feel at home and I would definitely stay here again. Aside from the beautiful view, the bed is super comfortable.
The host canceled this reservation 5 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

This apartment is amazing!! The terraces are absolutely incredible and perfect for chilling with food, drinks and sunbathing. Furthermore the apartment was clean with a good atmosphere. Capitaine is a very friendly and funny host. Both him and his friend Orione, who helped us with the check in, were so helpful. We got some really good tips regarding places to eat and go out for drinks. We felt really fortunate to stay at such a nice apartment and we would absolutely recommend staying there.
Alojamiento adecuado y terraza espectacular. El trato cordial y agradable.

We really enjoyed trip to Barcelona . Excellent apartment with some amazing views and stylish modern interior. The room is very comfortable, beautiful, clean and you can enjoy with your private terrace. Location was perfect for getting around the city, near the metro station and also you can go on foot from this location to the center. 
I would highly recommended this place!

Wir waren 3uhr nachts erst da, check in war ohne Probleme. Location wie erwartet sehr praktisch und einfach zu erreichen, auch nachts, supermarkt ist auch um die Ecke; Wir hatten Glück, dass wir die ganze Wohnung gehabt haben, was für 4 Personen sehr bequem war. Besonders Frühstück auf der Terrasse. Klimaanlagen funktionierte, alles wie geschrieben. Die einzige Überraschung war extra Reinigungsgebühr, was am Ende der gefragt wurde. All in all, we enjoyd our stay and hope You to get more good guest in your house, Capitaine. Thank You.

Ich mag diese Unterkunft sehr. Der Blick morgens aus dem Bett auf die Dächer von Barcelona. Einen Cafe auf der Terrasse trinken oder Yoga am Morgen und unten rauscht die Stadt. Auch, dass es nur ein Badezimmer gab, war kein Problem, weil Capitaine ein Schnell- und Frühduscher ist. Die Wohnung ist gemütlich, hat Dielenboden - eher selten in Spanien, die Atmosphäre ist nett und besonders. Die Anbindung an die U-Bahn ist gut, sehr nette Cafes in Laufnähe, die Kommunikation lief easy und alles fein. Sollten wir mal wieder eine Wohnung in Barcelona brauchen, wird das die Wohnung unserer Wahl sein.

Die Unterkunft ist großartig, besonders die schöne Dachterasse und die tolle Lage. Die nächste U-Bahn Station ist noch in der selben Straße, genau wie nette Cafés und Supermärkte. Viele Restaurants und Einkaufsmöglichkeiten sind in Laufnähe. Christoph ist ein sehr netter und hilfsbereiter Gastgeber. Klare Empfehlung!
big apartment with 2 nice terraces and all facilities that one would need. close to metro, aerobus station and all other public means. very helpful and friendly host.

Appartement magnifique avec deux belles terrasses et jolie vues sur Barcelone. Impeccable pour la localisation, propreté confort. Christophe est présent, réactif, et sympathique. Parfaite place pour séjourner à Barcelone, c est sûr.

In general, many thanks for this wonderful place. Awesome terrace. Cozy. We spent these days with joy and comfort.  Wonderful apartment.
Many thanks to Christoph for the flexibility in check out deadlines.

For future tourists who are going to prepare their own food.
If you leave the house, turn left, cross the street to the other side and walk a little higher through the intersection - you will see on the right an excellent supermarket, where they sell almost everything at normal city prices. Called Mercado it seems.
Metro in 3-minute availability.
Careful with parking on the street: free ones are engaged in an instant, the rest are either for residents who live nearby (you may not understand), or for people with disabilities (pictures are often erased and barely visible)), or for employees if there is an office building nearby. Better to leave on special underground parking, they are cheaper than fines
Un fantástico apartamento para una escapada en el centro de Barcelona.
Excellent séjour. L’appartement est très agréable avec sa terrasse privée. Juste à côté du métro. Et en plus, très bon accueil de notre hôte

The place is really cool, especially the rooftop terrace. It is well connected to public transport. The house is nice. You will have to buy your own water since tap water is not good. The owner was good in giving us tips on things to do. Overall a very nice stay in Barcelona

name: Burgazada da çarşıya yakın daire
summary: Yeşillikler ve tipik ada evleri arasında yürüyüş yapmak, bisiklete binmek, yüzmek, S.F.Abasıyanık Müzesini gezmek, İstanbul un en güzel gün batımına şahit Kalpazankaya da yemek yemek, baharda mimoza toplamak, Marta yı anlamak koyunda yüzerken
space: Bahçe diğer 3 daire ile ortak ve sulama yapabilirseniz iyi olur.
description: Yeşillikler ve tipik ada evleri arasında yürüyüş yapmak, bisiklete binmek, yüzmek, S.F.Abasıyanık Müzesini gezmek, İstanbul un en güzel gün batımına şahit Kalpazankaya da yemek yemek, baharda mimoza toplamak, Marta yı anlamak koyunda yüzerken Bahçe diğer 3 daire ile ortak ve sulama yapabilirseniz iyi olur. Tüm daireyi balkonlarla birlikte kullanabilirsiniz. Misafirlerin konaklamaları boyunca Kadıköy İstanbul da isem, onlara her konuda yardımcı olabilirim. Bu ara Eskişehir' de yaşıyoruz ve telefonla ulaşılabilirsiniz. Adanın bir çok sahilinden denize girmek mümkün, en uzağı 20 dak. en yakını 2-3 dak. yürüme mesafesinde. Akşamları sahildeki içkili lokantalar, gündüz mütevazı çay bahçeleri, dondurmacı adayı renkli kılıyor. 24 saat 112 acil servis ve 2 eczanemiz mevcut. Adaya şehir hatları vapurları, deniz otobüsleri ve motorlar ile ulaşım kolay, tarife yaza kışa göre değişiyor. Ayrıca deniz taksi de var. Adada bisiklet kiralamak, faytona binmek de mümkün. Bulaşık ve çamaşır makineleri var
neighborhood_overview: Adanın bir çok sahilinden denize girmek mümkün, en uzağı 20 dak. en yakını 2-3 dak. yürüme mesafesinde. Akşamları sahildeki içkili lokantalar, gündüz mütevazı çay bahçeleri, dondurmacı adayı renkli kılıyor. 24 saat 112 acil servis ve 2 eczanemiz mevcut.
notes: Bulaşık ve çamaşır makineleri var. İhtiyaç olunacak yorgan, yastık, yastık yüzü, çarşaf, havluyu çıkarıyorum, dolapların acil durumlar hariç karıştırılmasını istemiyorum. Kırılan, dökülenlerin yerine konulmasını beklerim. Açık tavada kızartma yapılmasını istemiyorum.
transit: Adaya şehir hatları vapurları, deniz otobüsleri ve motorlar ile ulaşım kolay, tarife yaza kışa göre değişiyor. Ayrıca deniz taksi de var. Adada bisiklet kiralamak, faytona binmek de mümkün.
access: Tüm daireyi balkonlarla birlikte kullanabilirsiniz.
interaction: Misafirlerin konaklamaları boyunca Kadıköy İstanbul da isem, onlara her konuda yardımcı olabilirim. Bu ara Eskişehir' de yaşıyoruz ve telefonla ulaşılabilirsiniz.
house_rules: Eve ayakkabıyla girilmiyor, dilerseniz kendi terliklerinizi getirebilirsiniz  Tuvalet kağıtlarını çöp kutusuna atın lütfen, aksi durumda wc tıkanıyor. Kızartma yapılmamasını tercih ederim, bronş hassaslığım var, kokulardan çok rahatsız oluyorum. Kombiyi geceleri kısabilirseniz harika olur, Kırılan dökülen (kaza olabilir) olursa lütfen ne olduğunu söyleyin. Bu benim ve sizden sonrakilerinin kullanımında sorun yaşanmaması için önemli.

reviews.comments: Eser hanım harika bir ev sahibi.. Çok ilgili. Evinin yeri de harika. 3 kişi oldukça keyifli zaman geçirdik. Bizim için havlularımıza kadar her şeyi düşündü. Kendisine tekrar tekrar teşekkürler ve çok sevgiler..
The host canceled this reservation 74 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Eser Hanım, bize evi teslim ederken her ayrıntıyı açıkladı ve çok yardımcı oldu. Evin konumu çarşıya 3-4 dakika. Herşey çok güzeldi. Balkonda kahvaltı gerçekten çok (Website hidden by Airbnb) evde 2 çift kaldık. Yatak odasındaki yatakta hiçbir sorun yoktu fakat salondaki çekyatta kalan arkadaşlar,çekyatın eğiminden dolayı pek rahat uyuyamadıklarını söylediler. Eser hanım ilerde çekyatı değiştirmeyi düşünebilir.Onun haricinde herkese tavsiye ederim.

Konum olarak çok uygun bir yerde. Ev temiz ve (Website hidden by Airbnb) 2 çift kaldık bize kurada çekyat düştü :) çok rahat olmasada pek sorun olmadı.Ev sahibi de her konuda çok yardımcı. (Bu arada ağaçtan da bir kaç tane erik yedik :) )

Burgazadaya ilk defa gitmiştim ve sanirim şansliydim eser hanim çok ince zarif nezaketi ile bizimle çok ilgilendi birde ev çok hoş keyifliydi , tatil keyfi yaşamak için burgazada ve esere misafir olmak harikaydi sadece evde bir eksik vardi internet yoktu ama diblenmeye gelenler için internetsiz dünya daha güzel oluyormuş
Harika bir ev. Birebir resimlerde olduğu gibi. Adanin merkezine çok yakin.
Eser Hanım, çok hoş, duyarlı ve düşünceli biri. Evinin zevkle döşenmiş olduğunu ve lokasyonun da hem sakinlik hem de merkezi olma açısından avantajını belirtmek isterim.
The apartment was lovely, nicely arranged and in a great location near the pier. Perfect for a quiet peaceful time with nature on the islands. Eser is a lovely host as well.
Eser Hanım gayet misafir perver, ev fotoğraflarda görüldüğü gibi, küçük bir ada tatili için kesinlikle konaklanılabilir, Teşekkürler Eser Hanım...
Adanın güzel bir köşesinde, yeşillikler içinde bir ev. İhtiyacınız olan her şeyi bulacaksınız. Balkonda oturmak da ayrıca keyifli. Eser Hanım çok yardımsever ve iyi bir ev sahibi.
Kendisinden memnun kaldik.Bazi ufak aksilikler yasasak ta elinden geldigince bize yardimci olmaya calisti.

Yılbaşını geçirmek için eser hanımın evinde kaldık. Havanın soğuk olması ve evin doğal olarak geç ısınması dışında çok güzeldi. Eser hanım da sağolsun sabahtan kombiyi yakıp evin soğuğunu kırmıştı. Gerçekten çok iyi niyetli bir ev sahibi, teşekkürler.
Eser hanım anlayışlı, ilgili ve samimi. Ev merkeze çok yakın. Sayesinde keyifli bir ada tatili geçirdik. Teşekkür ederiz!

Eser Hanım çok nazik ve yardımsever. Ada hakkında müthiş şeyler anlattı, sayesinde gezdiğimiz yerlerin hikayesini bilerek gezdik. Evin yeri de kendisi çok güzel, ayrıca ev çok temiz. Balkon çok keyifli, biz en kısa zamanda tekrar gelmeyi düşünüyoruz :)

Eser's place was absolutely perfect. Hidden away but with easy access to all amenities. The place is fully furnished and feels completely like home. Eser was by far one of the best hosts ever - she stayed late on the island to make sure she could  welcome us, and made sure we had absolutely everything we needed. Of course the island itself was also so lovely. Definitely recommended.
location is very good and it was joyful to spend time at flats nice balconies
Konumu güzel tavsiye ederim
Eser Hanım oldukça iyi ve ilgili bir ev sahibiydi. Evin konumu çok güzeldi ve ev 4 kişinin konaklaması için gayet uygundu. Her şey için teşekkür ederiz :)
Konumu ve Eser Hanımın bizi adayla ilgili bilgilendirmesi güzeldi. Ev çok temiz değildi. Adada olmasından dolayı tabi ki bazı böcek sinek vardı. Fakat yerler fazla tozluydu. Genel olarak iyiydi

Dört arkadaş iki gece kaldık Eser Hanım'ın evinde ve çok memnun kaldık. Ev fotoğraflarda göründüğünden daha güzel, daha tatlı bir yer ve konumu da çok iyi. Her şey tertemizdi. Eser Hanım bize adayla ilgili ihtiyacımız olan bütün bilgileri verdi, güzel önerilerde bulundu. Burgaz'da tatil yapacak olanlara tavsiye ederim.

Eve giriste bizi karşıladığından,  sohbet etme imkanı bulduğumuz Eser Hanım cok kibar ve özenli biri. Evin konumu merkeze cok yakın. Guzel balkonunda da keyifli vakit gecirebilirsiniz. Burgazada’da konaklama fırsatım olursa tekrar ziyaret edeceğim kendisini.
Eser was great. Communicated well and kept us informed also helpful with local information and tips. Nice apartment. well located on a lovely island.

name: Clean room in quiet area
summary: We have one room available in a new building in Po Lam, Hong Kong.  The room has a bed and closet. In the apartment you have access to a full kitchen/fridge/washer as well as a full bathroom with shower and tub. 7 minutes walk from Po Lam MTR station.  We are looking for long-term tenants of 30+ days.
description: We have one room available in a new building in Po Lam, Hong Kong.  The room has a bed and closet. In the apartment you have access to a full kitchen/fridge/washer as well as a full bathroom with shower and tub. 7 minutes walk from Po Lam MTR station.  We are looking for long-term tenants of 30+ days.

host.host_about: We are an American couple living in Hong Kong.  Fluent in English and Cantonese. Please say hello to our pet rabbit during your stay.  His name is Boss and he is very friendly!

address.street: Sai Kung District, New Territories, Hong Kong

reviews.comments: Tim夫妇很好 很和善 离地铁站五六分钟交通比较便利 家里还有一只可爱的大兔子 下次在来到香港 会继续选择
The host canceled this reservation 6 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
非常好的房东,还帮着提箱子｡房间干净安静,住一个人刚好｡

The room was as described, quiet and simple and also the distance between the MTR and the listing was extremely easy and close to navigate to and furthermore it is very convenient area as there is convenient stores, restaurants, and shopping centres all below in walking distances.

The room is exactly as described clean and quiet and the area is vibrantly green with lots of parks and walking trails. Tim and Chrissy are excellent hosts offering plenty of privacy and their pet rabbit Boss is just adorable. All in all I had a very pleasant stay in their home and I would certainly be back again.
its a good experience and the host is so friendly!
Tim夫妇真的非常nice,房间虽小但足够一个人住,用了他们的厨房,洗衣机｡地理位置也不错,离宝琳地铁站很近,香港不大的,所以住他们家去哪里都可以｡实际上住了7个晚上,太喜欢香港啦｡
Everything is good! Quite and clean, good for 1 people for living.
great

Tim is awesome! He gave me a house tour even before I decided to stay at his place. The location is golden, as it is just 5 min walk from Po Lam MTR station. The room is clean and cozy. Given these and the cheap price, this is really a great deal! I definitely would like to stay here again when visiting Hong Kong next time.

Insgesamt war alles ok und die Woche die ich dort verbracht habe auch schön. Das Zimmer und die Wohnung insgesamt sind sauber und so wie in der Anzeige. Allerdings habe ich auch einen negativen Punkt, der das Verhalten des Vermieters anbelangt. Ich hatte mit dem Vermieter einen Zeitpunkt ausgemacht an dem ich bei ihm sein würde. Ich war um ziemlich genau diese Zeit auch da und habe geklingelt, allerdings hat mir niemand aufgemacht und es hat ungefähr eine halbe Stunde und die Hilfe netter Nachbarn bedurft, bis ich ihn erreicht habe und er mir dann doch aufgemacht hat. Dieser erste negative Eindruck konnte sich leider auch nicht mehr verflüchtigen, da er sich dafür nicht entschuldigt hat oder wenigstens erklärt, warum er nicht aufgemacht hat. Das war  aber ja nur ein negativer Punkt und sonst war alles wirklich gut.
干净温馨的房间,交通出行都很方便,附近设施很完整,离香港科技大学很近,距离宝琳地铁站5分钟路程｡房东人很好,很棒的住宿体验!
地址位置可能不在中心位置,可地铁站和巴士站相对方便｡入住体验,对这个价位而言｡还不错｡
Everything is present on what is shown on the page. A lot of privacy was given and the place is very secure and close to the shops and the MRT.

Host was very gracious and accommodating. Was there to meet me at the place when i arrived and texted to ask if any help was needed during my stay in HK. 

Place was nice, clean, comfortable and affordable. Location is accessible by MTR and airport bus.

Only issue that i had was finding the place, since the "Get Directions" i got from the listing was wrong. Address posted was even incomplete "Po Hong Road Block 4, 28H". Correct address is "Serenity Place, 88 Po Hong Road, Block 4, Room Number 28H" This was a problem because i had no internet access when i went to HK and had to find my way based on the listing information. Was walking around for an hour with all my stuff, before i found the place. This was exhausting! Apart from this glitch though, i did have a wonderful time at the place.
Great host, Great location and very cozy room with very low price. Definitely recommend it
房东人很和善,晚上两点才到很有耐心去楼下接的 一直在和的士司机确认地址等等:).  小区周围很安静 ,距离宝琳地铁站很近(将军澳线始发站),步行大概两三分钟,距离西贡很近 时间充足可以去野生公园溜达, 白天如果去中环逛完 晚上回去就到了城市外面也挺好｡

Tim was available when I called him up at the gate. As it says, it is clean room in a quiet area. It is residential area where Po Lam station is very close and the neighborhood looked very safe. Regardless of your flight schedule, you can take city bus, night bus, or MTR to get to the airport very easily from the place. Hence, I would recommend this place to anyone who's looking for clean room in quiet area with easy access to anywhere around Hong Kong.

Tim is very helpful even I was so busy and couldn't reply him on time. 
He gave me extra bracket when the temperature suddenly dropped. 
Thanks Tim. I will visit you again.
房屋乾淨整潔,浴室乾淨清潔,鄰近區域生活機能方便,大廈管理安全性高｡
Thank you Tim provided very nice and clean living place in quiet town, convenient and easy to access major transports, the rabbit boss was very friendly too.
Friendly host, with minimal fuss on your activities. Clean apartment. Close to public transport. Value for money if you don't mind living a little out from central Hong Kong.
Good place, especially for those who are working/studying at HKUST. Close to the subway station 'Po Lam' (5min). 30-40min from central station. Modern building for Hong Kong.

Tim's place is a superb location being so close to the MTR and shopping mall which is the hub of shops and restaurants. Security of the compound is great for you need to use a smart card to open every gate for walking into the apartment. The unit itself is very clean and tidy. Tim is very friendly and responded immediately to every question I asked. I give a big LIKE to this place

It's difficult to recommend this place. 
It's reasonable value for money because HK is an expensive place but I'd never stay there again because
1) The host is abrupt and shows no sign of being friendly and welcoming.  
2) Essentials such as towels and soap were listed in the advert but I was told towels aren't provided so I had to request one and I had to go out to buy soap as soon as I arrived
3) There's a blind elderly rabbit which is no problem but it has a fairly unpleasant odor which fills the flat
4) The host thinks it's ok to take paying guests then keep them awake by talking loudly until 1:30am. It isn't ok. Do one or the other, not both. Show some consideration, especially as you completely ignored my booking rule in my profile by accepting my booking. 
5) High buildings are common in HK but be aware this is on the 28th floor. Avoid if you don't like heights. There's no mention of the floor level in the advert.
6) Worst of all, there appears to be someone with either mental health problems or operating some type of industrial activity in the room directly above, as there were regular loud banging and scraping noises until after midnight. Very very unpleasant.
It’s a good stay. Tim awaited for me till late night for my late arrival... sorry for that!

Tim is extremely nice people who helps a lot during my trip in Hong Kong.
房东非常的友善,尽可能满足了所有要求并愿意提供帮助,在香港的一周非常受他照顾,非常感激.地理位置很好离车站和购物中心都很近,非常物有所值

name: A cosy room for female student
summary: Just for erasmus student !!! The flat is only 5 minutes walking distance from Osmanbey Metro Station, close to Taksim, Nişantaşı and Bilgi Unıversity. The flat is on the first floor in a quiet and very safe neighbourhood.
space: Location is the best
description: Just for erasmus student !!! The flat is only 5 minutes walking distance from Osmanbey Metro Station, close to Taksim, Nişantaşı and Bilgi Unıversity. The flat is on the first floor in a quiet and very safe neighbourhood.
transit: Just for 2-3 minutes

reviews.comments:
Büçkün is an amazing host. She is friendly, open-minded and very helpful. Her house is comfortable and very central. The metro station is 3 minutes far by foot and taksim square only 15 minutes (by foot too). The bedroom is small but very cozy with everything you need. 
In general, I enjoyed my stay at Büçkün's house and, most of all, I feel lucky to met her!

Büçkün's place has a great location. It's close to public transport, shops, supermarkets... and only one metro stop away from Taksim square. Easy to get to and to get around. On a quiet street and in a friendly neighbourhood. The flat has eveything you might need during your stay and the bedroom is just as you see in the photos. Having said that, the one thing I'm taking with me from my stay at Büçkün's is her amazing hospitality. At your arrival she'll greet you as a kind and welcoming host. If you're lucky enough you'll leave with one the best friends you could ever wish for.

neighborhood_overview: Its location will allow you to accede easily to the most emblematic points of the city by walk. You will be 8 minutes by walk from Paseo de Gracia, 4 minutes by walk from Rambla Catalunya and 15 minutes by walk from Plaza Catalunya. The neighborhood of the left Eixample is some of the nicest zones of Barcelona where you will find some of the restaurants, as well as also, agreeable terraces and very singular and prestigious shops of clothes and decoration.
interaction: We have 24 hours service, in case you have a problem or doubt during your stay, you can contact us any time. We are your contact in Barcelona!

Note that is housed in a building where families live and need quiet and rest. The problems caused by this reason may involve the loss of the bond given 2.They are forbidden to have parties, play music at high volume, shout or make any noise that might disturb the neighbors. The problems caused by this reason involve the expulsion of the apartment inmediately and the loss of the bond given and we dont return any money 3. Stay in the apartment more people registered and unreported to the entrance of the apartment, will entail the eviction of the same and the loss of all amounts paid 4.The landlord has an apartment insurance does not cover the personal property of tenants 5. host.host_about: I'm 39 years old living inBarcelona. My mother and I live right near Blue Barcelona condos that we rent out all year. We take pride in our properties and are responsive to any of our renters needs. Since we are local, we deal with our guests directly – from key exchanges, to cleaning, to repairs, and anything in between. All of our properties are fully furnished and have all the amenities of home!

reviews.comments: Very large house, cozy and bright. Celia is helpful and friendly, the house is not very far removed from the Metro to the bus stop, about 10 minutes walk.

name: Cozy Chinatown studio apartment
summary: Neighborhood feels like old New York, the last authentic part of Manhattan. Our cozy studio apartment comfortably fits 2 ppl. 10 minute walk to LES, SoHo, TriBeca, South street seaport and great restaurants and bars nearby. Very close to B,D,F trains. A,C,E,4,5,6 also walking distance.
space: Chinatown studio apartment is small in size but cozy and conveniently located to downtown restaurants, galleries and bars. 4th floor walk up. The space is currently lived in, but we will make enough space for guests to comfortably store their belongings.
description: Neighborhood feels like old New York, the last authentic part of Manhattan. Our cozy studio apartment comfortably fits 2 ppl. 10 minute walk to LES, SoHo, TriBeca, South street seaport and great restaurants and bars nearby. Very close to B,D,F trains. A,C,E,4,5,6 also walking distance. Chinatown studio apartment is small in size but cozy and conveniently located to downtown restaurants, galleries and bars. 4th floor walk up. The space is currently lived in, but we will make enough space for guests to comfortably store their belongings. Internet wifi I'm available by phone call, texts or airbnb messages during your entire stay. This part of Chinatown is quite special, it will feel like you are in a very authentic area - the last frontier of Manhattan that is not yet completely gentrified. BDF Trains are very close, a short 5 minute walk away. ACE456 trains are also at walking distance. You can hear the slight rumble of the train nearby. notes: You can hear the slight rumble of the train nearby. The heating system is old and makes a clanging sound when turned on.
