house_rules: Please be mindful of downstairs neighbors, they are sometimes sensitive to noise. Please keep the volume down past midnight.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States

reviews.comments: Maia's description of her studio flat is perfectly accurate. It is very cozy, well-located and is really in such a vibrant area of NYC and the last part of Manhattan that hasn't been gentrified - offering a truly unique and authentic experience. The flat is a good sized studio (the pictures make it look smaller than it is) and is well-equipped. Maia was a fantastic host - leaving a bag of wonderful coffee, excellent local recommendations and responding promptly to all of our queries. The flat is great and I recommend it to all. I stayed there with a close friend and it was easy to share the space and it served us well.

Awesome gem in a great neighborhood. Really cute and tidy place - has everything you want, including a small kitchen. Perfect for a couple wanting to be close to the city but in a unique neighborhood. F train is super close. Highly recommended - would stay there again!
Great place

The location was absolutely perfect and very central. Maia and her husband were very gracious and helpful whether that be suggesting a nice restaurant to offering to let me store my luggage in their home past checkout time. Would suggest as a nice place for singles/couples who would like to be in a authentic part of town!
The host canceled this reservation 11 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The host canceled this reservation 68 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

This is an amazing place! Much bigger than it looks in the photos. Great New York neighborhood. Clean and open and bright. Maia could not have been a more gracious host. Magical little space. I highly recommend.

This apartment is a gem and Maia was a nice host. I stayed for five nights while in NY for work. It was under 30 minutes to get to my office at Union Square. The apartment was comfortable and was perfect for this trip. I would recommend this for anyone who appreciates a quiet space to retreat to at the end of the day.
This was an incredible value for being right in Lower Manhattan! Great for a young married couple looking for a weekend getaway!
Great studio apartment in china town. Clean, with everything you need and Maia was a perfect host. Would definitely recommend. Thanks for having us! Kat and James

Maia's studio is so cute and cozy.  The apartment is very well designed and even though it is small it does not feel that way!  Everything was super clean and Maia greeted me on the street to show me around right as I got out of the taxi from the airport!

Maia & Peter’s place was a great stay for four nights in Chinatown. The apartment was really cosy and well decorated. They were both excellent hosts, and responded to any messages quickly. Definitely a great place to stay to see ‘real’ New York City! ✨

It’s in a quieter part of town, great studio in NY. Maia had everything we needed. We didn’t want to be in the middle of it all but still easy to get everywhere and that was great. If you don’t mind stairs this is perfect.
The bed is comfy too and she was very communicative when we needed. Also super accommodating to our arrival, as we did have a flight delay. Highly recommend if your looking for a great value and clean place.

Maia’s place is like the pictures and description: light, friendly, and with a comfortable bed. It is close to subway stations, around the corner from Brooklyn bridge and in the middle of Chinatown. Little Italy and Soho are within walking distance. Chinatown, and the rest of the city, are lively and busy so it was nice to come ‘home’ in Maia’s appartement.
You get what you spend.
Great stay! Maia’s appartement is very well located and well furnished.

Everything in Maia’s apartment is very nice. It’s bigger than on the pictures and the subway is very close (F train).
Maia was very helpful and check in was easy. Would definitely recommend.

This is a great apartment to explore the city from. The neighbourhood is such that you have lots of cheap delicious food all around you and beautiful views of the bridge. The F train is close and the neighbourhood that surrounds the apartment is still an authentic part of New York City, including with all its grit and grime. The tall ceilings of the apartment make it feel very airy and spacious and it stays cool even when its warm out because it is in the back of the building. Its a great space to unwind and rest from all the hubbub outside. Not for parties or the heavy footed as neighbours can be sensitive.

This apartment was an excellent place to stay! We stayed here for 5 nights, 6 days. It was very convenient to trains and multiple neighborhoods/attractions. 
Maia was quick with her responses and went out of her way to do what she could to make us feel welcome. 

Great space for couples to utilize!
Maia was a great host! Would definitely stay here again :)

I have had an amazing time in Maia's appartment. It was a little bit bigger than expected, but further everything was similar to the pictures on Airbnb. It was very cozy and neat. The airconditioning was working, which was great, because it was very hot in New York at the time I stayed there. The appartment is situated in/near Chinatown so it is not in the centre of Manhattan, but there are multiple subway stations nearby and it did not take me long to get anywhere in New York. I would definitely recommend this appartment.
Great space, close to subway and great location in Chinatown. Would highly recommend it

We enjoyed our stay at Maia's place. The flat is charming, comfortable and you will find everything you need in it. The location is perfect to discover and live in the city - we liked the area a lot near good restaurants, bars and walking distance to Brooklyn Brudge, Soho, East Village, Union Square etc. Maia's is very nice and was always reachable - super easy communication. We highly recommend it!
Very spacious, clean and comfortable place. Quiet neighborhood, and Maia was a very friendly and helpful host!
Appartement spacieux et bien agencé situé dans quartier typique de Chinatown

I went to NY a few weeks ago and booked this place because it was close to all the sights we wanted to see. As we got there we had to pick up the key from the laundromat across the street, it wasn’t the host who gave us the key. One thing that I totally disliked was that it didn’t not say on the description that this studio is located on the fourth floor and there is no elevator. So if you plan on staying here for vacation I do not recommend it, the last thing you wanna do after a long day in NYC is go up four flights of stairs. Also going up and down with luggage is a pain because the stairs are narrow. Other than that, the place was clean and just how it was on the pictures.

name: Bright, Bohemian, Spacious Apt in Williamsburg
space: Amazing, one-of-a-kind, 718 sq.ft. apartment with a brick wall in the heart of Williamsburg. Very spacious, creative space. Cozy and warm, facing south and gets a lot of sunshine! 2 flight walk-up in a very clean BRAND NEW building with all new appliances. 1 spacious bedroom w/ therapeutic queen-sized mattress, bedside table+lamp, chair, dresser (2 cabinets are yours to use) and some closet space w/ hangers. 21'x9' living room separate kitchen w/ island bar, 2 bar stools large dining table, 2 chairs electric outlets all throughout the apt Central air+heat Large Balcony w/ seating 1 bathroom w/ shower+tub+amenities (you may use what is there) towels+clean bed-sheets provided Access to large, sunny, and clean rooftop, only 1 floor above the apartment! I love living here more than anything. Please keep in mind that I do live in this space, and treat it with respect. I am confident you will enjoy your stay!

Cozy and warm, facing south and gets a lot of sunshine! 2 flight walk-up in a very clean BRAND NEW building with all new appliances. 1 spacious bedroom w/ therapeutic queen-sized mattress, bedside table+lamp, chair, dresser (2 cabinets are yours to use) and some closet space w/ hangers. 21'x9' living room separate kitchen w/ island bar, 2 bar stools large dining table, 2 chairs electric outlets all throughout the apt Central air+heat Large Balcony w/ seating 1 bathroom w/ shower+tub+amenities (you may use what is there) towels+clean bed-sheets provided Access to large, sunny, and clean rooftop, only 1 floor above the apartment! neighborhood_overview: The location of the apartment is considered prime in Williamsburg because of it's close proximity to subway stops (L, J, M, Z, G) as well as all the best things that this part of town has to offer. Within walking distance of the apartment: Music Hall of Williamsburg, Smorgasburg (Williamsburg Flea Market and Food Market), The East River Ferry, Toby's Estate Coffee, Union Pool, Williamsburg Cinemas, Stella Dallas, WHOLE FOODS, a number of large grocery stores, bodega on the corner, numerous laundromats, parks (McCarren Park is a 10 minute walk away), Joe's Pizza, Momofuku Milk Bar, Pates et Traditions, Fette Sau... and countless other restaurants, bars, and cafes.  This is seriously the best location if you want to enjoy this hip part of Brooklyn, and it takes 5 minutes on the L train from Bedford Avenue to get to Union Square in Manhattan which has connections to any train you wish to take in the city. The apartment is also only 3 blocks from the waterfront which is beautiful and has f
notes: INCLUDED, for your enjoyment:  WIFI, Cable, SmartTV (with HBO + Netflix) 55" Flat-screen TV DVDs Washer+Dryer in the basement **You may read the books but PLEASE DO NOT TAKE!!**
transit: Nearby Trains: L, G, J, M, Z The apt is located one stop from 1st Ave in Manhattan.
access: The apt has some of my belongings because I do live there when not renting, so I hope you don't mind. The upside is that the kitchen is fully stocked with anything you might need to cook, as well as all bathroom toiletries. You are free to use anything provided you are respectful. Thanks!
interaction: If you need any recommendations, just ask!
house_rules: Mature guests only! Please be respectful of all furniture and appliances NO parties NO drugs NO smoking inside (there's a balcony)

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: Hey future guest! I'm a young New York native who loves to be creative and travel a lot. Would love to share my cozy space whilst I'm away with anyone looking for a comfortable stay. Feel free to message/email me with any questions!

reviews.comments:
My boyfriend and I stayed at Simona's place for three weeks, and everything was wonderful. The apt is exactly as shown in the pictures, clean and spacious, with a comfortable bed, fully equipped kitchen and tidy bathroom. The house has a nice balcony on a backyard, and it's very quiet. There are washing machine and dryer in the basement. There is also a rooftop with a beautiful view.
The position is very convenient, near Bedford subway stop, and in the heart of Williamsburg, with many nice restaurants nearby.
Simona is a great host, she saved our vacation letting us stay in her apt with a very short notice, after our previous host cancelled our booking. She was quick in answering, very kind, and flexible in check in and check out hours. I totally recommend staying at Simona's place.
The reservation was canceled 5 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The apartment was great- centrally located, safe, bright and spacious. Simona was accommodating and a pleasure to interact with.

Our first ever stay with Airbnb and my sister and I had the best time ever!! 

Simona was fab to communicate with as we felt especially bad as our already late evening flight in from London was delayed by an hour!! But she made sure to hang out and make us feel at home when we got there. Such a fab host- she gave us some brilliant tips on the area which we only ran out of time to be able to do them all!

The apartment is gorgeous, very spacious for the two of us with lovely quirky details and cute styling! Great place to chill out as well as the sofa is super comfy and and living room lovely and light! 

Super comfy bed too with a great mattress, and so so quiet for the area- you're on a lively street with an abundance of things to do but you don't here a thing at night! Very clean apartment with everything we needed :)

Amazing area- so much to do yet a chilled vibe making it the perfect antidote to the hustle of Manhattan! Loved it so much I'll be moving to the area soon :) 

Simona's mom was lovely too, came over to help us check out and had some fab knowledge on the city and area too! Overall such a great experience, thank you Simona!! 

Highly recommend a stay here :)

Everything about our stay was just perfect for us (two parents, one adult son)...nicely sized, fully-equipped apartment in a very safe part of Williamsburg, plenty to read (!), TV if we wanted it for some downtime, clean, easy parking, etc. Simona met us with the keys and was very understanding even though we were late due to traffic, then left us on our own for three days, making herself available if we needed anything.
Easy access to the subway (lesson learned..use Bedford stop, not Grand Ave) and lots of great eats and shopping. Also easy to park our car on the street.

Simona's place is a great example of why Airbnb lets its guests feel like they are living in the neighborhood and not just visiting. Great location, very comfortable accomodation and Simona's amazing record collection has given me a new appreciation for  vinyl!
There is no better way to experience the real Williamsburg that a stay at Simona's.

The description was accurate. The apartment was bright and spacious and in a great location. Cool bars/restaurants/shops on your doorstep and close to Bedford Ave station/East River ferry so travelling to Manhattan was quick and easy.

We really loved this place! Simona has a double bed and then a couch that can be slept on for one. As three adults it was fine. The apartment is in a great location - walking distance to a handy metro line, Whole foods, bars, coffee shops and restaurants. Simona's apartment is well equipped and very clean. Williamsburg is a great suburb and this apartment allowed us to imagine we lived there!

Amazing location at a great price!  One is inspired to create - write, draw & play - in this space.  The size is exceptional and the apartment is fully ready for anyone who wishes to cook, listen to vinyl or read a book from an amazing library.  Simply put, the best Airbnb at which I have ever stayed.

Simona's place is awesome, just as described. You are perfectly located next to the Williamsburg bridge, the apartment is very clean and completely quiet at night.  Would definitively stay there again on our next trip to Brooklyn.

Airbnb so wie es sein sollte!
Die Wohnung ist wirklich ein Traum, viel größer als sie auf den Bildern erscheint. Zudem ist sie mit allem ausgestattet und sehr sauber.
Die Lage ist toll, in einem spannenden Viertel. Zur Subway (Bedford Station) sind es ca. 5 Minuten zu Fuß.
Simona ist eine tolle Gastgeberin, auch wenn ich sie nicht persönlich kennengelernt habe.
Ich kann diese Wohnung zu 100% weiterempfehlen.

Airbnb tel qui doit être!
Un appartement de rêve qui est encore plus grand qu´on l´estime sur les photos. Il est équipé de vraiment tout et très très propre.
Le quartier est super excitant. Il ne faut que 5 minutes à pieds jusqu´au Metro (Bedford Station)
Simona est une hôtesse parfaite, même si je ne faisais pas sa connaissance.
 A 100% à recommandable.

appartement très bien situé proche de toutes les commodités et des transports.
très fonctionnel.
propre
des livres super intéressants!

Simona's apartment is a large, beautiful and cozy place located in one of the best corners in Williamsburg. It is surrounded by plenty of stores, bars and restaurants. There are also three different subway stations in the area, from where it is easy to get to Manhattan and Brooklyn Downtown. Moreover, she has a wonderful book and record collection!

L'appartement de Simona est spacieux et agréable à vivre. Il est situé dans un quartier sympa oú il y a des restos et des boutiques pour tous les goûts et budgets.  Si vous appréciez l'art de rue, vous allez aimer vous y promener.

Simona’s apartment is amazing!
We had a great stay there!
The subway station is 5 min away, 1 stop from Manhattan with the L line.
There is a whole food market 5 min from the apartment and a grocery just across the street.
The only thing is on Saturday and Friday there is a bar under the apartment so it can be noisy but nothing really bad !
Thank you for this apartment !
The host canceled this reservation 8 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

name: 2 Bedroom in The East Village!
summary: I'm renting out my 2 bedroom apartment in the East Village! Very lively area. Great night life! 5-10 minute walk to Union Square! 5 minute walk to the 4,5,6,N,Q,R and L trains. Very old, pre-war building. Perfect for a cheap stay!
description: I'm renting out my 2 bedroom apartment in the East Village! Very lively area. Great night life! 5-10 minute walk to Union Square! 5 minute walk to the 4,5,6,N,Q,R and L trains. Very old, pre-war building. Perfect for a cheap stay!

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States

reviews.comments: It was ideal for what we were looking for, a central location that we could crash at inbetween explorations. Host was easily contactable.
loved the apt and the neighborhood. great location

It didn't feel like the photos were up to date with the decor but the apartment had everything we needed so there weren't any problems. Communication with the hostess was really good and the location was easy to find. Overall, the stay was good.

Gracias por todo Samantha. Mejor no hemos podido estar!
La casa super bien situada cerca de paradas de metro y muy cómoda.
Si volvemos a Nueva York, volveremos aqui sin duda! =)
Great Value!
The Apartment was perfectly located, well prepared and we had everything we needed. Nice Price, too! thanks alot

It was sufficient and a great price for our stay in NY. 4 of us fit comfortably on the queen sized air mattress (sleeps 2) in one room and a twin air mattress and regular twin mattress in the other room.  The living room was decent sized with a couch, chair, coffee table and table/chairs, microwave, sink, fridge, linens, not much else. The hallway to the apartment unfortunately smells very bad of cigarette smoke. The apartment also smells of it but there were many air fresheners and ac to help with the smell. The apartment had the bare essentials. But it was just what you need if you want to spend money on other things to explore NY (amazing location) and to sleep. Our host, Samantha was great! Though we never met her in person she was very responsive, flexible with our check in/check out time and left us bottles of waters in the fridge.
The place had all we needed. Very good spot. Good deal. Would book again.
Everything was good. The apartment's location is great, the place is huge and Samantha answered very quickly to my messages. Great deal for the price : I would go again.
The apartment is in a great location, convenient to many parts of lower Manhattan.  As someone who used to live in New York & who often visits, this space was ideal.
Responsive and attentive host. Apartment was clean and location is perfect for exploring Manhattan and Brooklyn.

This location is relatively convenient to take metro or bus.  The house is a bit old with 2 air beds but we sleep tight on them. There is no internet connection or TV if you need one.  I think it's well-maintained and would love to go back next time if I need to visit NY next May.
The apartment was very roomy and clean and in a great location.   Samantha was great and very quick to answer messages. I would definitely stay here again! Thanks
The apartment was perfect for our needs. Location was great and the price was even better. Samantha made everything so easy to get in and out. I would stay again in a heartbeat.

Samantha made our arrival very easy and accessible.  The apartments and rooms were very clean.  The listing is in a very convenient and central location.  We had a very pleasant, comfortable stay.  Communication with Samantha was fast and very helpful.

Samantha was a very thoughtful host and she made sure that we were comfortable. She also had several great suggestions for local stores. 

The apartment is in a great location, easy walking distance to the East Village and the subway.  Easy to hail a taxi from the front door. Pushcart Coffee, two and half blocks away at the corner of 2nd and @21st, is the perfect way to start the day. (I get no perks for saying that. It's just honest, good coffee with a proper neighborhood feel.) The convenience store/bodega across the street cooks great "egg on a roll" breakfasts, not microwaved.

The building and apartment are a little funky but we would definitely stay there again and we would recommend the place to anyone.

When you open the door , you feel good like home. Short time responding when you ask something and you have some great cafe with a travelling cup ( I think it's cute attention ^^ ) I recommanding this place for every one . If a comeback in N-Y  i guest we retake this appartement !!

Hon skrev en lapp med telefonnr och hälsade oss välkomna, de kändes brax Hon sa också att vi kunde höra av oss om det var något! Lämnade kaffe och vatten! 
Förutom att en säng var trasig var de bra beskrivet, bäddsoffan funkade inte heller att dra ut och den andra sängen var skitig så vi sov dåligt! Lite skitigare än förväntat i allmänt. 
Området var jätte bra, nära till downtown, enkelt att gå eller ta taxi eller Metro. Väldigt lyhört till gatan bör man vara medveten om. Bra om man vill ha ett billigt boende men såhär i efterhand hade jag kunnat lagt 2000 till för ett bättre ställe.

The location was perfect if you want to visit Manhattan but there were some dirts on one bed when we arrived. Besides that I would recommend this apartment for its very good price and location and also because all the needed stuff were there.

name: habitación doble tranquila con luz
summary: piso amplio, tranquilo con mucha luz, balcón para fumadores, ascensor, conexión WIFI, parking gratis abajo del edificio (no es privado sino en la calle), cerca del metro, playa a 20min andando, Sagrada familia a 30min andando o 5min metro. Barrio seguro, con muchos comercios.
description: piso amplio, tranquilo con mucha luz, balcón para fumadores, ascensor, conexión WIFI, parking gratis abajo del edificio (no es privado sino en la calle), cerca del metro, playa a 20min andando, Sagrada familia a 30min andando o 5min metro. Barrio seguro, con muchos comercios. Baño y habitación. No incluye el uso de la cocina. prever de dejar un documento identificativo a cambio de las llaves.
notes: prever de dejar un documento identificativo a cambio de las llaves.
access: Baño y habitación. No incluye el uso de la cocina.

host.host_about: mujer administrativa de 35 años apasionada por los viajes, el deporte y los idiomas.

reviews.comments:
We had a very nice stay at Vanessa. For us it was the first time with airbnb and so far so good. 

All the rooms were clean, the bed and sheets were fresh as well as the towels. Her appartment is only a few min walking to the metro and within 10-15 min you are in the center. There is free parking in that area so ideal when coming by car. Neighbourhood feels safe too.

She does have a little kid and the rooms can be a bit noisy. But thats ok, for example we are now in a 200 euro per night hotel and every time the metro comes we are trembling in bed.
Vanessa y su chico fueron muy amables.
Sie waren sehr freundlich
Excellent rapport qualité prix ! Nous avons été très bien reçu et la proximité (par le métro ) du centre de Barcelone est une vraie aubaine. Simple mais efficace !!
Prix bas pour services minimum il ne faut pas s'attendre à plus ....

Vanessa was a great host. She was friendly, accommodating, and provided great insight to the city, with recommendations on places to visit. Her place is easily accessible from the metro, but is quite far from the main city centre. The room is very basic, but we did not spend much time there, so was fine for just a couple nights. Thanks for having us, Vanessa!

Wir haben für 3 Nächte hier geschlafen und waren sehr zufrieden. Vanessa ist super lieb und hat uns viele Tipps gegeben, war immer hilfsbereit und freundlich! Ich empfehle das Zimmer allen, die viel von der Stadt sehen wollen und nur dort schlafen, die Anbindung ist super!!
Liebe Grüße und bis bald vielleicht!
Logement bien placé, à proximité d'une ligne de métro. Possibilité de se garer gratuitement. Logement ultra propre. Nous avons été bien accueillis.

très bon accueil des hôtes, très bonne communication, très bonne réactivité.
très bonne explication pour aller à leur appartement situé à même pas 5 min d'un métro.
chambre et salle de bain très propre.
Tout était parfait. A recommander. on y reviendra chez vous.

Vanessa est arrangeante, et réactive.  Cependant il n'y a pas de parking privé. Mais un grand parking en bas de l immeuble gratuit,  faire attention à l'heure d 'arrivée car pas forcément de place. De plus prévoir de laisser une pièce d identité à Vanessa en guise de caution pour les clé de l'appartement
Vanessa was really nice and helpful. The room was basic, but very clean and quiet. The perfect place to stay, if you want to get to know the city and are looking for a place to sleep.
Had a great stay with Vanessa. Gave us a key to come in and out whenever, she was really nice and the room was comfy. Great price, close to the train and to Segrada Familia.
A 30 minutos a pie de la playa, estación del metro cerca
Vanessa est très gentille et très réactive lorsque nous avions une question. Il y a un parking gratuit tout proche du logement ce qui est pratique le métro est aussi à quelques pas.

Vanessa est une excellente hôtesse, qui nous a suggérée de bons endroits à visiter . Son logement est idéalement situé pres des transports en commun.Tres bon endroit pour les Francais,communication en français ( petite carte a dispo très utile)
Merci pour tout
La chambre est calme et propre. Bien que l’appartement soit excentré, il est proche du métro. Nous avons passé un très bon séjour.

C'est une chambre parfaite niveaux qualité/prix, disposé juste à coté du métro qui amène partout dans Barcelone. 
Vanessa est très réactive et le lieu est agréable.
Tout était correct donc satisfaisant. Le mari de Vanessa nous a gentiment aidé à redémarrer la voiture suite à une panne surprise!
묶으면서 눈치보여서 비추해요

The host was very kind and informative, offering us a bunch of tips to avoid overly crowded areas. The place is close to the metro, making it easy to get anywhere in just a few minutes. The neighborhood is calm and safe to walk around. Overall a very good experience for just a few days.
Buen sitio, bien comunicado
convivial
Nous avons passé un bon séjour chez Vanessa ! Appartement très proche du métro avec possibilité de se garer gratuitement aux alentours.

name: Lovely room in Caueway Bay!
summary: This is a lovely, bright and spacious room located in the heart of bustling Causeway Bay on Hong Kong island. Only 3min away from Causeway Bay MTR station - and yet, the room overlooks a quiet, bird-filled hill!
description: This is a lovely, bright and spacious room located in the heart of bustling Causeway Bay on Hong Kong island. Only 3min away from Causeway Bay MTR station - and yet, the room overlooks a quiet, bird-filled hill!

description: This unique concept allows guests to luxuriate in the space and privacy of their own beautifully renovated studios, whilst enjoying hotel-style services.  A stunning roof terrace is shared by the two studios. This is separated into two areas and affo

host.host_about: Front Office Chief and Reservation Supervisor at Armada Old City Hotel . We are offering 2 different concept in the heart of historical peninsula; traditional/ottoman style renovated Old House and Studios (Stablesgate) and modern decorated Aparts (Armada Apartments).

name: 2 Bedroom Ipanema-Copacabana
summary: Our apartment is strategically located between the beaches of Copacabana, Ipanema and Arpoador! On a residential street, super well served by trade! Restaurants and traditional pubs in town within walking distance. Subway station in the street.
description: Our apartment is strategically located between the beaches of Copacabana, Ipanema and Arpoador! On a residential street, super well served by trade! Restaurants and traditional pubs in town within walking distance. Subway station in the street.
house_rules: We would appreciate if the guest, as leaving the apartment even for a short period, don't leave any electrical appliances turned on for your own tranquility and security. Neighbours are calm and quiet, so loud noises or music are not allowed after 10 PM No drugs, no parties, no pets allowed.  Guests are responsible for the safekeeping of the keys. Thanks for all.

host.host_about: Somos uma família carioca que gosta de natureza, leitura, teatro, conviver com amigos.

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments: Adoramos ficar no Apto da Zuzu! Ele é gostoso, acolhedor e bem localizado! Proximo de Copacabana, Ipanema, e do metrô, sensacional! Além disso fomos recebidos com um delicioso bolo de aipim, frutas e muita simpatia!

Fomos recebidos muito bem, com muita hospitalidade e cuidado. A localização é ótima, no fim de Copacabana e pretíssimo de Ipanema. O apartamento é ótimo e perfeito para 5 pessoas, espaçoso e com tudo necessário para passar um feriado.

name: 302 Kanai A Nalu Ocean front/view
summary: Welcome to Kana'i A Nalu a quiet resort that sits on the ocean away from the road. This property has the BEST ocean front views of Molokini Crater and Kaho'Olawe Island. There is a resort swimming pool and BBQs next to the ocean. This gorgeous 2 bed 2 bath unit is on the third floor look over the Pacific Ocean with views of Sugar Beach and Mount Haleakalea!  The condo is light and bright with all the creature comforts of home.  The beds are very comfortable.
space: In my opinion this property has the Wow Factor!  If you are looking for a BEAUTIFUL upgraded home that is nicely decorated with comfortable beds look no further this is the place to stay.  The views will take your breath away.  You may never want to leave the condo. This two bedroom two full bath is 952 sq ft.  Enjoy sunsets over the ocean and watch the turtles play in the ocean below right from your lanai. This is a great location year round particularly during the winter months; humpback whales can be seen in abundance. This unit includes window A/C in the living room, 4 ceiling fans, and FREE secure Wi-Fi Internet access for your laptop. This unit is spacious and bright. The kitchen is fully stocked with dishwasher, stove/oven; linens and towels; washer/dryer inside the unit; a telephone for free local calls, cable TV, CD/stereo. The master bedroom has a comfortable pillow top King size bed for your sleeping comfort. The second bedroom has two single beds with pillow tops. This home

neighborhood_overview: This lovely resort sits on Sugar Beach!  You can walk for miles on the soft sandy beach! There are other boating trips that depart from other harbors and Maalaea Harbor is less than a mile from our other beautiful rentals Kanai A Nalu and Island Sands. Many dive/snorkeling excursions and sunset dinner cruises take off from here.  Maalaea Harbor has wonderful dining experiences for all budgets and a variety of cuisine choices to whet the appetite!  There are fun activities for the kids and adults visit Maui Golf and Sports Park.  You can play miniature golf, X-treme trampoline, rock wall climb, and bumper boats.  If you want to venture under water and stay on dry land visit the Maui Ocean Center!  Named one of the Top 25 Best Aquariums in the U.S. by TripAdvisor, the Aquarium features a variety of Hawaii’s sharks, turtles, stingrays and thousands of vibrant tropical fish. The Aquarium is home to the world’s largest collection of live Pacific corals, faithfully replicating thriving marin
notes: The state of Hawaii tax of 14.42% is rolled into the nightly rate quoted you on AirBnB.
transit: Yes there is a bus stop close to the condo. We also have UBER and taxis.  We include a reserved parking spot for your rental car.
access: Entire condo is private for your personal use.
interaction: We will email you PDF check-in letter and documents at least 60 days prior to check-in.
house_rules: MVFA LLC dba Maui Vision Rentals (Agent) Cancellation, Deposit & Booking Policies Rental Rules: Guest agrees to abide by the Rental Rules.  Guest shall cause all members of the rental party and anyone else Guest permits on the property to abide by the following rules at all times while at the property including rules posted at the condominium complex.  By accepting this reservation and paying for the rental, guest enters the condo agreeing to all terms and conditions of this agreement and accepts responsibility for all guests of the property. Guest shall not permit any use of the pool by unsupervised children.  An adult Guest must accompany children and be present at all times. Guest and other invitees shall use the pool at their own risk.  Please respect the posted rules. Mandatory Occupancy Disclosures: You must disclose to us the exact number and names of guests (subject to maximum) who will be occupying the Property during the rental term.  You must immediately notify us, by phone

host.host_about:
I am the owner of Maui Vision Rental. Maui Vision became a reality and a business starting with my personal condo at the Kihei Akahi Resort C618.

Maui Vision is a business I love because I get to share the Aloha Spirit, the beauty of the land, and talk story with people from around the world. It is nice to know that we can contribute to someone’s Hawaiian vacation experience in a positive way. We love to hear back from our happy guests.

I used to live on the island of Oahu with my US Navy family when I was young.  We later moved to Southern California.  I knew one day I would return to Hawaii, the place I fell in love with long ago. I took a leap of faith and purchased my Maui condo June 2002 this was the beginning of fulfilling her prophecy to once again return to Hawaii soil.

I am a tropical expression artist who paints on canvas and etched metal.  My work is inspired by the beauty of the islands and has been displayed in several Maui art galleries over the years.  I am a writer and have my first book on Amazon.  I recently took up hula dancing and love to immerse myself in the culture and grace of this island.

I have over 25 years of business administration and customer service experience working for large corporations and high tech startups.

If you are in need of a caring Realtor here on Maui, please contact Kathy McCartney RS#77317 of La Costa Realty Hawai’i, LLC Brokerage Lic #18349 .

reviews.comments: We were the group of five, each of us was so in love with this place, great view and so peaceful , looking forward to come back soon.
Great place to stay and enjoy the whales view

Everything was great, the waves put us to sleep every night and the deck/porch was very nice and relaxing.  Plenty of amenities for pina coladas and other fun island cocktails to make in the kitchen.  Along with cooking appliances to make some easy meals if you don't want to eat out every night.  Easy walk down to grass field and beach access right there.  Perfect for how many guest we had (5-6). Price was fair especially for the holiday week rates.  Left some extra body boards for future guests to enjoy.  Thank you Kathy for sharing your home.  Aloha
Very clear communications, good sleeping arrangements for (4). Comfortable and clean place to stay.

The condo was PERFECT for 4 people: myself, my husband, my mother and her sister. The view was beautiful, the kitchen was fantastically equipped, the condo community went very quiet at night and the lovely sounds of the ocean waves rocked you to sleep each night. We were there in January and it was quite pleasant all day, but I think during the hotter months the front bedroom could get warmer. All bedrooms had windows that would open and most of time there was a strong breeze blowing through the entire condo. The general location, central Maui, was perfect as well. Just an excellent place to vacation.
Great place! Would definitely book here again!
Book this place.... seriously!

name: Large Duplex in Midtown East with backyard!
summary: Enjoy New York at this comfortable duplex. Only a few blocks from the main subway lines and within 15 mins from Grand Central and Central Park by foot, allowing you to reach major points of interest with ease. Close to the Roosevelt Island Tram, providing beautiful view of the city. Near Central Park and a quick ride to the West Side. Quiet apartment, lively neighborhood with premiere dining and shopping right outside of your door.
space: My duplex can comfortably sleep up to 6 people. Fully equipped for every need with direct access to the backyard to enjoy grilling on sunny days. This 2 bedroom 2 bathroom duplex with hardwood floors, full kitchen and large windows for lots of natural light is sure to leave a good impression. The upper floor has a bedroom with a queen-sized bed and a sofa bed in the living room. The lower floor has a queen sized bed and a single bed and has its own full bathroom. Both floors have direct access to the backyard. Although the neighborhood has lots going on, the apartment is very quiet at night for a very goodnight's sleep. The mattresses are very comfortable as well! The building has a washer and dryer in the basement, so you can wash your laundry easily at your convenience.
description: Enjoy New York at this comfortable duplex. Only a few blocks from the main subway lines and within 15 mins from Grand Central and Central Park by foot, allowing you to reach major points of interest with ease.
