Both floors have direct access to the backyard. Although the neighborhood has lots going on, the
neighborhood_overview: Wether for tourism or business, everything you need is close by. Whole foods is a 10 min walk from the apartment on 57th Street and 2nd Ave and Duane Reade is around the corner on 1st avenue for 24/7 necessities. The Museum of Modern Arts can be reached by foot in 15 mins and Central Park in 20.
transit: A few blocks from 6, E, and M subway lines, less than 15 mins walk to Grand Central Station. From JFK Airport you can take the AirTrain to Jamaica Station from where you can take the E subway line directly to Lexington Av/53 St to reach the apartment in a little over an hour. From Newark airport you can take the Northeast Regional train to Pennsylvania Station where you can take the E subway line from Penn Station/34 St to Lexington Ave and 53 St to reach the apartment in less than 45 minutes.
access: Entire apartment and backyard.
interaction: Guests have my personal contact phone and that of the superintendent of the building.
house_rules: No smoking inside the apartment please - in the backyard is fine. Please keep the noise level down in the backyard after 10pm. Check-out time is flexible if I don't have guests coming for that day. There is a penalty if check-out occurs after the specified time and I cannot grant late check-out.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States

reviews.comments:
The duplex is wonderful - it was better even than the pictures. We were pleasantly surprised to find it quiet considering the busy city, and we slept like babies in comfortable beds. 
Joris helped us over text to get us settled in and find anything we needed; communication was super easy and effective. 
We stayed with our two kids, and it was the perfect size for us. The washer and dryer kept us from having to check any luggage, which is always easier when traveling with tiny monsters. 
We'll be returning next year!

Great apartment and super neighbourhood. Great restaurants! Joris was very helpful and our stay in New York went well.
Clean and well furnished apartment, even a small nice terrace. 
A quiet area which we appreciate much.
I can highly recommend both Joris as a host and his apartment.

Joris was great - friendly and accommodating. The duplex is on a lovely sunny quiet street that is very centrally located. The bright rooms, generous sized 2 bedrooms, and 2 bathrooms made our stay enjoyable, comfortable and easy. A special treat was the direct access to the courtyard and garden. We highly recommend the place, and would like to stay there again during our next visit to NYC.

The Host was nice and very concerned to make us feel welcome and comfortable. The apartment was nice and comfortable, with plenty of light and a private backyard.  Its location is close to the subway station.

Joris was a great host! 
Check in was easy. Boris was very helpful with all our questions.
The neighborhood is beautiful and location is just perfect.
The apartment is pretty but looks better in the pictures. A/C was not working properly, it keeps turning off.
The patio is great!
Thank you Joris for a great stay!

Location above all perfect - quiet street yet walking distance to grand central, Central Park, 5th ave

Well equipped apartment - good quality furniture / beds. Only 1 airco unit on 1st floor, basement room fairly cool at evening yet could need upgrade with airco too

Host punctual and attentive - providing assistance where needed. Recommended for a stay when in NY

I agree with an other guest who wrote that the flat looks much better on the pictures. We were a bit unlucky because of the flooding downstairs (it is not a fault of the host - of course - but I would have been appriciate it if the carpeter would have come just after our leaving).
The location is great! The arriving and the leaving went very well and easy!
My friends and I had a great experience at Joris' place. It was a wonderful base of operations, close to good places to eat and to subway transit. The beds were comfortable and clean as expected.

Everything was as listed. The location of the place is amazing, about a 15 minute walk to times square and we felt very safe as a group of girls. The house was the same as the pictures shown and totally exceeded our expectations. This is a great find and highly recommended!

Thank you Joris, we had a good time in the middle of Manhattan. Everything is great! Clean , quiet  and cozy.  We found and enjoyed the first class Ramen just at the corner! Recommend for big family or friends!

This apartment is in a very good location. 20 minute walk to Times Square. Close to subway. 10 minutes to closest hop on, hop off bus, so really well situated to enjoy the sights of manhattan. May be large by New York standards, but really very small rooms, other than downstairs bedroom. No natural air flow, so very warm for sleeping. Unfortunately hear every footfall of upstairs tenant , which also impacts on sleep. Good outweighs the bad, however.
Very easy to get in.  I was alone so didn't use the downstairs, but it more than met my needs.  Overall, thumbs up,  so not much more to say.  Perfect place for two couples or a family.

Would we stay again: YES!

What we loved: (1) Location (2) Quietness! (3) Comfortable beds

What we didn't: (1) Initially given wrong address. That made arrival stressful. (2) Plumbing issues - that were fixed very quickly after they were reported to Host (3) TV Remote did not work - which was fixed very quickly when reported to host. (4) Initially no curtain on downstairs outside door so morning sun came in. Solved by rigging up a sheet to cover window in door. (5) Lack of aircon downstairs. Fan only. Downstairs bedroom would be too hot in summer.

After our previous AirBnB was cancelled on the day before our trip to NYC, Joris graciously allowed us to book his flat in Midtown East last minute. He was very responsive to any questions our group had; including being extremely accommodating in allowing us to store our luggage as we arrived/departed before/after check in/out. 

The apartment was perfect. Located in Midtown East near the UN, in an unbelievably quiet neighborhood. Train stops were accessible within a few short blocks of walking distance. Its close proximity to 5th Avenue, Central Park, & Times Square allowed us to have access to all the touristy NYC sites without any of the noise. I'd highly recommend the flat to anyone.

On a side note Joris was in no small way, responsible for salvaging a surprise birthday trip for my girlfriend, which I sincerely appreciate. Thanks again!

I visited New York with my parents at the beginning of October. I lived in New York before and I travel to New York quite often, therefore, I am quite familiar with city. 1. Joris is a very nice person. He is always willing to assist you and to accommodate to your requests. He answers almost immediately all your messages. I am quite grateful with him as we could agree on an early check-in and a late check-out. In fact, my parents are in their 80s and I needed to make the trip a comfortable experience for them. 2. Ups (i) The apartment is extremely well located (51st and Second Avenue). It is in midtown and you can enjoy the city just walking. The subway is three blocks away from the apartment. (ii) Even though in midtown, the neighbourhood is tranquil, neat, charming and not noisy. (iii) For New York standards, the apartment is big. Please consider -if you have never been in New York- that places size tend to be quite small in Manhattan. Space is a luxury in the city. (iv) The apartment is on a first floor which is quite helpful as New York's buildings sometimes do not have elevator (you should always ask if there is one if you are renting an apartment). (v) The apartment has one living - dining room, a small kitchen, two bedrooms and two bathrooms. I will not recommend it for more than 4 people. One bedroom is located on the first floor and the second one is located in the basement. (vi) The apartment is cozy. It looks like in the pictures. (vii) The patio is lovely. It is very unusual to find an apartment with its own access to a patio in New York. (vii) The beds are quite comfortable. I travel a lot and stay in several 4-5 stars hotels. The beds were as comfortable as the ones I find in my trips. 3. Matters to be considered: (i) Being the apartment in an old building you can hear the noise of your neighbours, particularly at night, which may cause troubles for having a restful sleep. My parents, who stayed on the first floor, were awaken some nights for the noise coming from the second floor (around midnight, apparently they move furnitures). (ii) The room located in the basement is particularly noisy at nights. It is next to a corridor where the washing machines are located and which also provides access to the patio. As I slept in that room, I needed to wear ear-plugs for not to be awaken at nights. However, one night not even the ear-plugs helped. I heart people walking and talking in the corridor very late that night. I walked up scared as I thought there was actually somebody in my room! (iii) The door in the basement needs curtains. In fact, there is one door which provides access to the patio with a window which allows people in the patio to see...

El apartemento era estupendo, super bien ubicado, limpio y cómodo. Joris fue el perfecto anfitrión, muy atento y nos puso las cosas muy fáciles en cuanto a llegada y a salida (que nos dejó salir más tarde sin problemas ya que nuestro vuelo salía por la tarde). Sin duda repetiríamos!!!

The duplex with ita back yard is lovely. The neigbourhood is great. Joris is a very attentive and helpful host. 
We found the place Ideal for our extended family: grandfather, grandmother, son and daughter -in -law and three grandchildren.
Hope tp come again 
Prof Tamar Sovran
 and family.

O apartamento é muito conveniente, próximo de zonas muito interessantes da cidade (5ª avenida, palácio da ONU e mesmo times square), com estação de metro e de comboio próximas. Restaurantes e lojas próximas e em grande quantidade. É um apartamento grande (nós éramos 5 e estivemos bem, para 7, com 2 a dormir na sala, chega perfeitamente). Recomendo sem dúvida.
Como pontos menos positivos, refiro que é um apartamento antigo, com os problemas que isso pode trazer. Além do mais, é um pouco barulhento, especialmente por causa dos vizinhos.
Foi sempre fácil comunicar com o Joris e ele resolveu de imediato os pequenos problemas que tivemos.
Not super modern, but good location and very spacious. I would certainly stay again.

Great little place in a very convenient location which we were very lucky to find at the last minute ( after  we made a booking on ar B and B which turned  out to be a fake.
Joris was very responsive and helpful and his place cosy and warm ( although a little drafty at times). We really enjoyed our stay in NYC and being in such a great location
The hosts excelent.
Joris is very nice host, with great and large home in a perfect location! I would definitely recommend staying here.

We really loved the location of this apt. Some great restaurants near by like Ethos and Upsiders oh and the best darn donut shop a block away. The apt. Itself was clean and equipped with everything we needed. It's a lovely place to stay. Communication was very good too. Highly recommend it.

Modern apartment in a very good location. Very quiet area and Joris is very friendly. The stay was very cozy, the house had everything super complete! :) We went there in the middle of winter and temperature was perfect! We will definitely stay there when we return! :)
We loved the location, the spaciousness, and the ease of getting to the subway, restaurants and shopping.  It was clean with comfortable beds. It also had a back courtyard.
Clean and functional apartment in central location. Totally suited our family needs and would stay again.
The apartment was in a great location and very comfortable. Joris was fast and easy to communicate with. Would definitely recommend.

Great place to stay in NY. The street is quiet, but right around the corner you find everything you need: Great restaurants, pubs, supermarket, pharmacy. Traveled with our little dog and the backyard was wonderful to hang out.

Joris place was fantastic. It is located in an area that you can be in 10 minutes by walking to Central Park and also very close to the moma. Joris is very helpful when you need something or you have some questions.

The place is near to a lot a great restaurants and shops, and has several subway stations a few blocks away. The apartment is spacious and nice. My only comment would be you can hear every step from the apartment above, even late at night. But aside from that I would definitely recommend it!
Very good location, quiet neighborhood in midtown east. You're a few blocks away from the main attractions so be prepared to walk. Everything is accurate, would recommend and would stay again.

Fantastic space in the middle of Midtown for family or small groups. Patio made the whole difference. The space and amenities were great and location unbeatable specially for someone that is looking to be closer to the United Nations and other landmarks.
Looking forward to stay again!
Great location.  Close to subway downtown areas.

The apartment is roomy by NYC standards and well located. The accommodations are pleasant without being luxurious. The apartment looks just like in the pictures. Check-in was smooth and as expected. Great location.

Note: Being one apartment in a building with other apartments, there was the occasional distraction of footsteps above. Also, there isn't an air conditioner downstairs. In hot weather this could present a challenge, though it was in the 70s when we were there and it was fine.
Lovely

L'appartement de Joris est très bien situé, très central, mais calme. Il y a beaucoup d'options de couchage, idéal pour y séjourner avec des amis ou famille étendue. Et il y a 2 salles de bain, ce qui est très confortable. La cuisine est fonctionnelle et le petit jardin derrière, charmant.
Nous sommes très contents avec notre séjour dans ce logement et nous y retournerions sans hésitation lors d'un prochain voyage.
Joris was responsive to all communication in a timely manner. The place is wonderful. Amazing location! Clean and tidy. Highly recommended!

Joris' apartment is a good one. Center in the Manhattan area and the location is convenient and quite. 
The backyard garden is a shining point. We had garden breakfast and all of us enjoyed very much.
Joris is also a good communicator with quick response.
The stay was a good one!
Thanks!

Décevant; malgré une situation très pratique, centrale, beaucoup de resto et de commerces dans le voisinage. Appartement relativement calme et arrière cour privée, idéale pour petit déjeuner au soleil mais mauvais entretien général; placard défoncé,  chaise cassée, vaisselle incomplète, canapé lit inutilisable car pas de draps,  prises électriques HS dans le salon, fuite d'eau des étages supérieurs sur la climatisation occasionnant un goutte a goutte bruyant toute la nuit, et Joris résolument absent malgre plusieurs message.
Perfect location to stay at in NYC!

Great location and enjoyable place to come home to after working in the city. There's no air conditioning in any rooms than the living room, but the temperature was in the upper 70s so it was quite comfortable throughout. We experienced a fair amount of noise from people walking in adjacent spaces all hours of the night, unfortunately, but enjoyed our visit immensely overall! The outdoor patio is a great amenity, as well.

This is a great place to stay with a nice neighbourhood and easy access to most attractions.  It's quite close to the UN so worth checking if there's a Session on as the roads may be closed to vehicles. The yard is a big plus.
Great size and location. Huge and quiet for NYC with a backyard!!! Will definitely rent again.

The apartment is exactly as you see on the website. We had plenty of space and the two bathrooms is  a great help. It seemed a very safe location to base yourself and easy to go either uptown or downtown.

Apartment was perfect. Just as advertised. Cleaned and had everything we needed. Close to green, blue & orange lines. Check in was so smooth, baggage drop was great too. Looking forward to our next visit to NYC. Would stay again for sure!
Joris was an excellent host.  Super quick with responses to questions.  Everything in the listing and Joris' instructions were spot on!
Awesome location. Perfect t for a family. Great host. Very responsive.

Excellent location! Pictures as described, amenities were great! Tons of space by NYC standards for our group of 7.  Joris was very accommodating and we had a smooth and seamless check-in and check-out. I would definitely stay again!

We had such a nice stay at Joris' place! The neighborhood was quiet and there is an excellent ramen shop and karaoke bar around the corner! The apartment is roomy and stylish, the back patio was a great space to just chill. Joris was friendly and responded to our messages very quickly! We would definitely come back here!

spacious apartment in great NYC location. comfortably slept 5 adults with reasonable (but not overly spacious) living room. Joris was great; very responsive and quick to answer any questions or issues I had. One piece of advice: light sleepers should bring ear plugs as the old building creaks and doesn't absorb/block noise from other units or outside. Not a big deal in the scheme of things and hardly uncommon in NY; just something for future guests to be mindful of.

We enjoyed our stay at Joris’ place. The location was great and surrounded by many bars and restaurants. It was an easy walk to many of the touristy places. We had family who hasn’t stayed in NYC before so they enjoyed walking to Times
square and the tree at Rockefeller center. The only reason this wasn’t 5 out of 5 stars was that there was a huge draft downstairs from the door and non of the space heaters worked. However, i did message Joris about it and he instantly got back to me and apologized that they wouldn’t be able to seal the door until Monday. So unfortunately we froze the first night, but the second night we were able to tuck towels around the door the next night to help significantly. Overall, it’s worth the value, the pictures are true to the rooms, and Joris was accommodating. Would stay again!
Great space in Turtle Bay, very quick walk to public transit. Lyft/Uber all around as well. Host is very communicative and responsive. Great space for families!!
Excelente ubicación! Sobre una calle muy tranquila pero a 1 cuadra de muy buenos bares, restaurantes y puntos de interés, a solo 10min de Rockefeller! Sin duda lo recomiendo!

Posizione perfetta per visitare NY, molto carino e utile il giardino (anche se noi non lo abbiamo utilizzato causa neve) , ottime le dotazioni della casa e della cucina.
Joris ha risposto immediatamente alle nostre richieste ed è stato molto gentile permettendoci di lasciare le valige nel suo appartamento dopo il ceck out.
Perfetti sia il ceck in sia il ceck out.
Consiglio vivamente questa casa nel cuore di Manhattan

It was a great location with easy access to many mid-town attractions within a short walk and subway lines nearby to easily get uptown or downtown quickly. There were lots of restaurants and shop nearby but the block itself was pretty quiet. The apartment was big enough to easily fit all 7 of us. It was nice to have a small kitchen so that we could fix snacks and breakfast. The patio looked great, though it was too cold when we were there to use it. We did have trouble with the hot water, despite trying to take short showers, we only had enough hot water for 4-5 showers (there were 7 of us). I should also note that the host also allowed us to store our bags before check in and after we checked out, which was immensely helpful and made it much easier to take full advantage of our weekend in the city.  Overall, it was a great location and minus the hot water issues met our needs as a home base to explore the city.

Infelizmente eu e minha família tivemos alguns problemas em nossa estadia. O problema começou no check in. Segundo o procedimento padrão do proprietário, me foi fornecido um código de acesso ao prédio e a porta do apartamento estaria destrancada. Ao chegar no local na hora de check in combinada (16:00hs) me deparei com uma pessoa que estava ainda limpando o apartamento. Essa pessoa não sabia fornecer qualquer informação de uso das instalações e foi embora sem deixar a chave do apartamento. Esse foi o primeiro transtorno, pois tive que ficar dentro do apartamento até o dia seguinte às 11:00 am, tendo que cancelar dois compromissos já agendados previamente. No mesmo dia de nossa chegada ao tentar abrir a porta de um armário, a mesma se desprendeu e caiu sobre minha cabeça. No dia seguinte pela manhã, reparamos que haviam cacos de vidro no carpete e minha filha criança quase se cortou. Os incidentes foram imediatamente comunicados ao Joris, mas nada aconteceu, eu mesma tive que limpar o carpete e a porta do armário ficou insegura e nos colocando em risco durante toda a estadia.
O horário de meu voo foi modificado pela companhia aérea para tarde da noite e eu solicitei um check out tardio, para evitar que ficássemos com crianças o dia todo na rua. O meu pedido foi negado, sendo alegado que haveriam hospedes chegando. Foi me dada opção de deixar as malas no corredor do prédio. Considerei um insulto essa opção, pois colocaria em risco a segurança de nossa bagagem. Mesmo tendo perdido quase 24 horas de minha estadia por ter que esperar a chave em nossa chegada, o anfitrião não considerou em nada os transtornos que tivemos. Não conheci pessoalmente o Joris, embora ele tenha respondido a todos meus emails, alguns tardiamente, com educação. O apartamento é bom, os colchões não são confortáveis, a cozinha não é muito bem equipada para pessoas que realmente cozinham. Eramos quatro pessoas e haviam somente 4 copos e 4 cobertores (sentimos frio e não haviam instruções sobre como ajustar o aquecedor central); as panelas velhas e encardidas, o forno de microondas e fogão com restos de alimentos. à noite e pela manhã cedo escutávamos passos e barulhos dos vizinhos de cima e o aquecedor central fazia um barulho a noite toda. A localização do apartamento é excelente. Não tenho certeza se voltaria a me hospedar nesse apartamento outra vez.

This is an excellent, comfortable, reasonably-priced place in a great neighborhood, hosted by a responsive, clear, considerate, and pleasant host. I would absolutely stay here again.  The listing is very accurate, and it is easy to tell that Joris is an experienced and capable host.
Great location and an amazing place to stay!
The location was amazing, and the street was quiet.  So many great restaurant options in the area!
Awesome location with easy access to all locations in Midtown as well as the MTA. Boris is very responsive.
Boris has a great apartment that was close to public transportation. My family and I thoroughly enjoyed our stay!

The apartment is in an excellent area and centrally located for sightseeing in the city. It was ideal for a family of 5 visiting New York for a long weekend.  After one or two issues with the initial cleaning of the property which Boris dealt with, we found that the apartment catered for all of our needs in terms of space and comfort. Check in was straightforward and we enjoyed or stay.
Keskeinen sijainti, erittäin täsmälliset ja toimivat käytännön järjestelyt, pienellä viimeistelyllä majoituskokemuksesta saisi erinomaisen.
Boris was very responsive with communication and hospitality. Location was fantastic!

Boris was extremely helpful during our stay. He was more than accommodating and even assisted with an early drop off of our luggage so we could attend a family event that was held prior to check in. 

Thank you for a great experience, and leisurely stay in NY!

This place was so convenient to restaurants, bars and the subway, I would recommend it just for that.  It’s in a nice quiet neighbourhood.   

The place needs a refresh but overall, we were comfortable.  

The ad says it had two queen beds but it doesn’t.  It has one queen and one double.  The other beds are single beds and there is a pullout sofa.  The beds were all very comfortable though.

The host was very responsive.
Great place to stay in a very nice neighborhood. We had plenty of room and loved coming back to it every night.
great location, responsive owner, but needs a little more loving care.
Nice 2 bedroom with 2 bathrooms, close to stores and pharmacy. Easy access in and out.  We had a good time while we were in New York.

We really enjoyed our stay at Boris’s place. The location is great and we could easily walk to the main midtown attractions or take a short Uber ride around the city. Boris was extremely responsive host and let us store our luggage for couple of hours before check in, which was extremely helpful. We would come back.
公寓位于市中心,步行很方便,也靠近地铁站｡屋里陈设完备｡性价比不错

We had a great stay at Boris' place. Great location, with a larger living space than I anticipated. As others have noted, though it may need an overall refresh, it was clean, acommodating, well located, and an excellent choice for a group. I would definitely stay again! Thank you Boris!
Departamento increíble, Boris es muy buen anfitrión

Appartement très bien situé - à recommander sans hésitation pour quelques jours à New York 
Terrasse extérieure sympa pour boire un verre - appart spacieux

Boris’s place is located in secure and quite part of mid-town close to many attractions including very good restaurants.  It’s spacious, clean and quiet.  Boris himself is also very responsive and accommodated our early check-in with no hassles.  Simply, two thumbs up!!
Ottima posizione, pulizia non accurata.

We were two families with kids and enjoyed the whole aparment pretty much. We used the outdoor area also and it was very nice too.

The apartment itself was very quite if you stay in a hotel in Manhattan you know exactly what i mean.

Everything was there, also in the kitchen. 

Boris answeres very fast and friendly. All our questions were answered and he was helpful all the time.

We can highly recommend staying in his apartment. Thank you
Very convenient to most of the popular locations of NY

Our stay at Boris’s in NYC was great! Boris was extremely communicative, helpful and quick to respond. The location was fantastic, just a few blocks from the subway and on a beautiful and quiet street. The patio was a great addition as well. The door lock was a little tricky and the AC from the apt above leaked but onsite maintenance responded extremely fast and all around a great place to stay especially for a group!
Really nice location and high performance cost ratio.
位置非常好,房东沟通及时
Great location on upper east side near 2nd Avenue, large enough to accommodate the whole family. Older apartment building, 1st floor apartment, needs some upgrading of furnishings.
the apartment is great, the situation is perfect to visit NY and your advice and attendance very kind and usefull, although the apartment needs some minor repairs, repaint and general refreshment.
Excellent value for large groups. Good location. Easy check-in. Would highly recommend.

The apartment is spacious by New York city standards with a wonderful back yard patio. We enjoyed spending evenings in this rare private outdoor space.  Apartment has a window a/c unit that adequately cools the space when needed. Boris is an attentive host and made our stay most enjoyable.
Boris was very accessible during our trip and was a very gracious host.  What an amazing location for a trip to NY
Wonderful location, very clean and home-y! Only trouble we had with the place was with the locks on the front door, the keys get stuck sometimes. But everything else was spectacular!

Great location in turtle bay.  Quiet neighbors and the subway is only about 2 blocks away.  The switch for the hot water is behind the TV (took a bit to find it).  Only streaming TV package, no local / cable.  But you are coming to see the sights anyway. 
Really a great space.  The pictures are accurate.
Amazing location and cozy apartment! Very comfortable for 7 guests.
Awesome place. Great backyard. Would recommend.
位置佳,以曼哈頓區來說性價比較高,可住7-8人
Amazing location. Quiet. Easy metro and airport access. We hope to stay again.

Amazing, convenient location!
Lower level of the apartment is accessed via steep steps, not good for those with mobility issues.  
The apartment was clean and reasonably well stocked.  
Boris was a responsive host.
Great location, comfortable setting, well supplied, safe and QUIET for being in NYC. Great stay!
Boris was an outstanding host, extremely responsive to any questions we might have had. His home was perfect for a getaway weekend in New York and I would recommend it to anyone.
Boris was a great host.  Very responsive.    Location of the apartment is perfect for getting around the city.   Space was perfect for our family of 5.  Would definitely stay here again.

Great location - easy to walk to the city and there is a 24-hr pharmacy right around the corner. Good size for our group of five. We came from Florida so it took a bit to get used to the cold weather and how to use the furnace, but other than that, we enjoyed our home for the weekend. Boris was quick to respond and even allowed us an early check-in. We would definitely stay here again. Thank you Boris!

Boris was an excellent host. Check in and check in was easy. We arrived earlier than expected and were able to leave our luggage and go out with no hassle. The apartment was just as expected and very clean. The kitchen was well stocked and had a full sized refrigerator. The gas stove worked well and we cooked breakfast for 6 each morning before going out. 
The neighborhood was quiet but we were within walking distance of excellent restaurants, drug stores, etc. We absolutely loved the location. This is my first time booking through Airbnb and I could not be more pleased. It was a wonderful experience and completely hassle-free.

This AirBnB is in a NYC central location, and Boris was quick to communicate with us. There are some areas of improvement for this apartment:

1. Bedsheets are stained and the towels are threadbare
2. Baths are moldy where the tub and tile meet
3. AC unit in the window allows the cold air to pour into the unit
4. Electrical plates are missing on outlets
5. Smoke detector is missing downstairs
6. Baseboards throughout the house caked with grit and grime
7. Upstairs chair seat is not connected to the legs - a real hazard
8. Light sockets are missing light bulbs
9. Downstairs drapes are nailed to the wall
10. Hard to sleep with tenant walking upstairs (not sure what you do about that)

My wife wiped the steam from mirror in the basement bathroom because there’s no vent, and the towel was black with dirt. Overall we felt the home needs a real deep clean. At the time we checked we were told that the wash and dryer were temporarily inoperable.

We came with 3 girls between the ages of 8-13 for the holidays. Boris’ place was in an excellent location. The beds were very comfortable. The building was old and historic, but he provided heaters in rooms where winter- time drafts would be an issue. We were very comfortable! If The coffee pot was drip which was fine, but could be updated. Boris was very responsive to our needs! Wonderful trip! If you would like a place close enough to the park and 5th ave, but quiet and away from the crowds, this is perfect!
Very well located, clean and as described. Will definitely stay again if available.
Good price for a great location.

Great location, and a good space to have family together. Boris is very easy to communicate with. The apt could use some basic updating (only one towel bar between both bathrooms, broken hooks in the downstairs bath and missing half of towel bar in upstairs bath; door rail on master closet upstairs is broken, so if you the doors it's a trick to get them to rest flat again). Our stay was in December, cold outside. The downstairs room did not heat up well at all. Very cold at night, especially for the person sleeping on the daybed. Even with the addition of the red blanket from the closet and the gray blanket from the upstairs bed, that bed was cold both nights. Somehow addressing the uneven heating or adding a true comforter to that bed would help. Ate out, so didn't use the kitchen except for drinks. Looks well-stocked. Very easy checkin and checkout, place to store luggage before and after trip.

Boris is an excellent host who is always happy to accomodate your needs. His place was fantastic and it is a great part of town. It is central to everything, great location! We were very appreciative and would definitely recommend staying here.

El departamento está en una súper ubicación, tienes muchos lugares turísticos cerca para caminar y está de muy buen tamaño para 7-8 personas. 
La atención de Boris es excelente y todo está muy bien!
Good location and all the amenities you need with a helpful host.
Great stay! Affordable and great location! Would definitely stay again!

The apartment was in a great place, quiet but close to many amenities, including a CVS, and many restaurants to try out. Was there for a conference and the location was great to where we needed to be. The apartment was clean, and Boris was great with checking in and making sure that everything was all set for check in and through out our stay. With it being cold in NYC the apartment was nice and warm. Would definitely stay there again. Next time hopefully for fun instead of business. Once again, thank you for a great stay.

Boris hosted us in NY, we found the duplex to be in a strategic location for the visit. we were able to walk to most destinations and had plenty of food options in the area.
The apartment was very clean, and we had all of what was needed for our stay.
Amazing location and good size for a group. Boris was very responsive and helpful before and throughout the stay.

Overall, if you're looking for a private, stress-free place for a quiet escape from the city, Boris's apartment is a great location.

The building makes it easy to get around the city and find local offerings. We were able to take a short walk to see some of the sights and get food, and it's convenient for traveling further north and south in the city. 

The apartment itself is roomy and comfortably fit five people. You won't need to worry about the apartment while you're there - you can just drop your bags off and go enjoy the city.

It gets understandably cold in January, but Boris provides plenty of blankets and space heaters to go with the apartment's heating. (Hot water's not an issue.)

We'd stay here again given the chance.

Boris was a GREAT host! She took care of all of our families needs while on our trip to NY. The location of her house was perfect for getting around the city. After we checked out she even allowed us to use her storage space to keep our luggage while we saw the city before our flight that evening. I would definitely recommend and stay at her place again when I come back to NY! Thanks again Boris!

name: Prince Kuhio 315 ocean view steps to the beach
summary: Prince Kuhio Condos are adjacent to Prince Kuhio Park and the ocean located on the sunny South Shore at Poipu Beach in Kauai. Our condo is about 20 yards from the beach. Some of the best snorkeling and surfing on Kauai are right out front at PK's.
description: Prince Kuhio Condos are adjacent to Prince Kuhio Park and the ocean located on the sunny South Shore at Poipu Beach in Kauai. Our condo is about 20 yards from the beach. Some of the best snorkeling and surfing on Kauai are right out front at PK's.

host.host_about: Born on Kauai, the owner of our company Joshua Rudinoff started Kauai Exclusive Management in 2008. Since managing a single property Kauai Exclusive has grown to well over 100 properties island wide and we now have a full time team dedicated to Airbnb.  We love to host our Kauai Exclusive guests with professionalism and aloha. We are always available at 877GOKAUAI (someone is in the office 24/7) and happy to help in any way we can.

reviews.comments: Perfect location in proximity to the surfbreak. The condo was very nice and exceeded expectations- a great value for the price. Had a slight mishap with entering the condo, but Owner/manager was easily reachable.
Very well-stocked and a very nice unit. Very close to the beach and right across the street from the beach house we had a lovely time

Wonderful Airbnb. 
Beautiful view of the ocean from the side of the building. Clean, organized , and very spacious. Easy to enter.
I cook a lot of my own meals and the kitchen had everything I needed and more!

The bathroom was stocked with shampoo, conditioner, soap, and even disposable toothbrushes!

There is an amazing vanity to do your hair and makeup with awesome lighting in the bathroom as well. :)

As for the host, he was kind, attentive, and quick to respond! Being my first time in Kauai, I am highly impressed with this place and will definitely be booking through Joshua on Airbnb again!
No a/c but the place is gorgeous! Great location and it has everything!

name: Mongkok Luxury Studio, New Reno *4A
summary: Lovely walkup studio apartment on the fourth floor with kitchenette in the heart of Mongkok. Minutes away from numerous tourist attractions such as the Ladies Market and shopping malls, this is the perfect unit for any solo traveler. The unit is newly renovated as well!
space: The apartment is a newly renovated studio located in a walkup building. While there is no elevator, we offer a paid service to have people help you with your luggage.
description: Lovely walkup studio apartment on the fourth floor with kitchenette in the heart of Mongkok. Minutes away from numerous tourist attractions such as the Ladies Market and shopping malls, this is the perfect unit for any solo traveler. The unit is newly renovated as well! The apartment is a newly renovated studio located in a walkup building. While there is no elevator, we offer a paid service to have people help you with your luggage. The entire apartment is yours, along with a small kitchenette and a private bathroom. While the check in process is via automated self check in, feel free to call me at anytime with any questions. If you need recommendations or help with anything I am always an email or call away. I also have a document prepared with sights to see and I love helping people with questions about food and sightseeing. The apartment is 2 minute away from the Mongkok MTR station. Check In & Check Out: Check in is anytime after 3PM. If you need the unit before then please let us
notes: Check In & Check Out: Check in is anytime after 3PM. If you need the unit before then please let us know and we will check if there is someone occupying the unit.  Check out is at 11AM daily and a later time can be arranged as long as there are no guests after.
transit: The apartment is 2 minute away from the Mongkok MTR station.
access: The entire apartment is yours, along with a small kitchenette and a private bathroom.
interaction: While the check in process is via automated self check in, feel free to call me at anytime with any questions. If you need recommendations or help with anything I am always an email or call away. I also have a document prepared with sights to see and I love helping people with questions about food and sightseeing.
house_rules: HOUSE RULES: *NO SMOKING allowed within the premises at any time whatsoever. *This apartment can not be used for PARTIES at any time  *If you want to bring a pet please ask first, certain exceptions may apply but for the most part pets are not preferred. If any of the above rules are broken you could lose your security deposit and be charged additional amounts. Please be aware of this.

host.host_about:
Thank you for checking out our listing! To let you know a little bit more about us, we run a service apartment company called Tane Residence. Currently, we operate more than 90 units in Hong Kong and over 20 units in Vietnam. We are rapidly expanding this network, opening between 20 to 30 new properties every year.

Our tastefully decorated apartments blends the best of worlds - homely comforts and modern design to offer a unique stay.  

We value offering our customers outstanding service, excellent experience and great value for money. With a team that works 7 days a week to answer emails and ensure the needs of our guests are taken care of, we are proud to offer top notch customer service support.

reviews.comments: The room is clean and modern looking. Great stay. The foldable bed makes more space during the day.

name: Conveniently located apartment
summary: Located right in the heart of HK, 2 minutes walk from Soho and surrounded by HK's funkiest bars and restaurants. This 2 Bedroom (1 Bed) apartment is perfect for a couple who are looking for somewhere convenient to stay whilst in HK.
space: We love our 1 bedroom home based in Sheung Wan and hope that you will enjoy it as much as we do!
description: Located right in the heart of HK, 2 minutes walk from Soho and surrounded by HK's funkiest bars and restaurants. This 2 Bedroom (1 Bed) apartment is perfect for a couple who are looking for somewhere convenient to stay whilst in HK.  We love our 1 bedroom home based in Sheung Wan and hope that you will enjoy it as much as we do!  Entire apartment Lovely location, surrounded by great restaurants, bars and shops.  Very close to the escalator, buses and MTR.
neighborhood_overview: Lovely location, surrounded by great restaurants, bars and shops.
transit: Very close to the escalator, buses and MTR.
access: Entire apartment
house_rules: We would trust that you would treat our home as you would expect yours to be treated and to leave it in a clean and tidy state. Enjoy your trip to HK!

host.host_about: Originally from South Africa, I have been living in Hong Kong for the past 4 years. My boyfriend is originally from Oz, we love our flat in Sheung Wan and hope that our guests will enjoy staying there as much as we do .

address.street: Hong Kong, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

reviews.comments: The host canceled this reservation 50 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

name: Pineapple Paradise
summary: The pineapple is known  as the symbol of welcoming and warmth. This oceanfront studio conveys just that.  Newly renovated in 2014 you will find all the comforts of home in this 17th floor MOUNTAIN VIEW STUDIO. Come enjoy paradise - Hawaii.
space: The Ilikai Marina is one of the first condominiums built in Honolulu - it can be seen in the original Hawaii Five-0 televisions show and the marina is still used for many movies and tv locations. Since Honolulu is a city, the building may blend in with its surroundings, however, once inside the units you will feel the comforts of home and Aloha. This studio is newly renovated and features all the comforts of home.  Located on the Ala Wai Harbor you are just steps from the beach and some of the best shopping in the world.   The bath features a shower/tub and haidryer. The kitchen is fully equipped to handle take out or to make a nice meal.  Facing the mountain/city, you can relax and watch the sun rise.  Since space is an issue in a studio, our Murphy Bed setup allows you to fold the bed up in the morning and pull it back down during the day.  For a third person there is a twin size Aero bed.  Linens, beach towels, and beach chairs are provided.  A cleaning service will come in on the d
description: The pineapple is known  as the symbol of welcoming and warmth. This oceanfront studio conveys just that.  Newly renovated in 2014 you will find all the comforts of home in this 17th floor MOUNTAIN VIEW STUDIO. Come enjoy paradise - Hawaii. The Ilikai Marina is one of the first condominiums built in Honolulu - it can be seen in the original Hawaii Five-0 televisions show and the marina is still used for many movies and tv locations. Since Honolulu is a city, the building may blend in with its surroundings, however, once inside the units you will feel the comforts of home and Aloha. This studio is newly renovated and features all the comforts of home.  Located on the Ala Wai Harbor you are just steps from the beach and some of the best shopping in the world.   The bath features a shower/tub and haidryer. The kitchen is fully equipped to handle take out or to make a nice meal.  Facing the mountain/city, you can relax and watch the sun rise.  Since space is an issue in a studio, our Murphy
neighborhood_overview: Located at the beginning of Waikiki or as some call it the Quiet end, you have access to all of the beaches and shopping and restaurants, and are away from the hustle and bustle. The Modern Hotel and Hilton Hawaiian Village are right next door. While we don't have a pool, the worlds largest pool is right behind the building - the pacific ocean and all of the beautiful beaches of Hawaii.
notes: Anything you may need is at your fingertips. From a Cuisinart Coffee Maker to a Rice Cooker, a hair dryer or a dvd collection, you shouldn't have to go far to cook in, have a relaxing night at home or grab the beach chairs and head out for the day. We treat this as our "Home away from Home", and hope our guests will feel the same way. Why rent a cold generic hotel room when you can stay in a comfy, homey place instead?
transit: Waikiki is a walkable city.  It gives the guest a chance to see the culture and expore a bit more than with a car. The BUS is the city transit system and it is very efficient and only $2.50 for a ride.   If you choose to rent  car parking is available in the building at the guests expense.  It is 25.00 per day.
access: A quick 5-10 minute walk to the Convention center, beaches, shopping, restaurants and so much more are within your reach.
interaction: While phone calls are always nice, with people in different time zones, sometimes email is the easiest and most efficient way to communicate.  If a guest has an issue, I will respond as soon as I am able after I get the message.  Remember, if I don't hear from you I can't take care of any issues. I try to give you the tools you will need when I am not there via the itinerary sheet as well as a welcome sheet when you arrive.
house_rules: I believe my guests will treat my home with respect and respect the neighbors around them. Smoking is not allowed inside or on the balcony (Hawaii State Law prohibits). Although I love pets, they aren't permitted. In order for you to check in on time,- 3 PM the guest before you has to check out on time 12PM, and not leave a mess for the cleaning lady. (dispose of your trash, place linens and towels in laundry basket, dispose of your food). Please do not jam the door open to keep it open - if damage to the door and the walls are noticed after you check out - you will be charged to fix them. (A photo of the unit will be taken before you arrive and after you check out). Just common courtesies make each stay a little nicer and more memorable.

reviews.comments: Kelly's place is elegant, clean, and extremely well appointed. WIFI works very well. The apartment appears larger than it is because of an entire side in glass with a pretty mountain view. The neighborhood is very nice and safe, close to everything, but quiet.

An amazing rental! Looks exactly like the pictures, even the gorgeous view from the lanai. Kelly has everything needed to prepare a meal, even measuring cups and drink mixers!!! :) I would 100% recommend this place. It was just my husband and I staying there, but we had two other couples over on Christmas Eve and had a seat for all 6 of us. The bed is more comfortable than a futon or day bed but not so cozy you want to stay in it all day - it is Honolulu. But if it happens to rain on your trip, she has cable TV and a good DVD library. Excellent location and very safe as well, the POTUS stopped by at the hotel near by. We walked everywhere so I can't speak on the car situation but there is a parking garage attached to the building

The location was good, right on the harbor and close to both Waikiki and Honolulu. However for the price, I was expecting more than was offered.  The apt isn't facing the ocean, Murphy bed is not the most comfortable and the bathroom could use a serious update, as could the TV. The DVDs player was broken and couldn't be used. The kitchen however is great and has everything needed to cook at home, but all of the glassware was dirty upon arrival, lipstick marks and all. The building is nothing spectacular and doesn't offer many of the amenities others do, such as pool, sauna, etc. however there is a great hotel across the street with an excellent pool (we actually ended up staying our last night of the trip there instead). There is no one around to help out with troubles or offer advice, you are completely on your own....and also asked to do the bulk of the cleaning before leaving. All things considered I probably wouldn't stay here again, for the price I think there are better options.

Kelly was wonderful to work with. All instructions were given instantly upon booking and with quick response time. Her unit is cutely decorated and loved the location. I could walk everywhere. The kitchen is amazing and if you like to make all your meals you will love the fully equipped kitchen. I will stay here again in the future.
Awesome condo right near the marina! Very clean and neat. Don't let the Murphy bed deter you. It was very comfortable! Kelly was very pleasant and easy to work with.

Kelly was great! Detailed information about the place and how to get there was sent immediately upon booking. The building is very well taken care of, was very close to the beach and walking distance to everywhere we wanted to go. The apartment looks just like it does in the pictures, was very comfortable, and very clean. The view was beautiful! I could not have been happier with the kitchen, which was fully stocked with kitchenware (clean plates, glasses, blender, pots, pans, etc.) and perfect for cooking. As we were traveling with a 3 year old, the DVD collection was much appreciated! I would absolutely recommend this place to others!

I booked Kelly's apartment for my mom during our vacation in Hawaii. Because of the cleanliness, spaciousness, and amenities of the apartment, it became a meeting place for my entire family during our trip! Kelly was great with communication and very patient with my mom's numerous inquiries. The nice beach equipment at the apartment was definitely an added bonus! Thanks for sharing your wonderful space with us, Kelly!
Kelly was great and responded quickly. The place looks like advertised and was in a great location. It was very clean. I had no issues. I would recommend this place.
Everything looked like the picture. Kelly was attentive and flexible and got back to me in a timely manner. I would recommend this place to anyone.

Kellys place was wonderful! Located in a great part of Waikiki with everything you could need. Kelly was quick to respond and obtaining the keys to the unit was simple. There were clean pillow cases and beach towels in the closet, as well as a cooler and beach chairs. Her place is very, very clean and organized! Considering the amenities and location, it's a great price. Highly recommend!

We had a lovely stay at Pineapple paradise. The location was excellent with easy walking distance to Ala Moana shopping centre and Waikiki beach. Everything was clean and presented beautifully. The provision of wi-fi was great. We had a great stay here.
Kelly's place was perfect. It was nice to feel at home and not stuffed Ina hotel. The keys were easy to get and everything was there to make it relaxing and fun.
Excellent in all respects...location, cleanliness, amenities. Updated studio with lots of room. The only draw back is that it is not ocean facing.

This was the most welcoming place ever. It was literally a home away from home. Everything that was listed was there and more some. Kitchen, bathroom, and the area in which we stayed was beautiful. You have to see it to believe it. Buses, stores, and beaches were all nearby. 
This condo was truly an amazing place. Hope to come back to Hawaii again someday. 10/10 would recommend.

Kelly's condo in the Ilikai Marina building was clean and comfortable. She provided everything we needed for a great week in Honolulu. Thank you Kelly!

The location is perfect; close to Waikiki without being right in the middle of all the traffic, just a block from Ala Moana, and close to the Kaka'ako neighborhood which has a number shopping attractions and new restaurants.

We really enjoyed staying in Kelly's place and she was a great host for us. The apartment is exactly as described. The place located in a very convenient location, super close to the beach, shopping mall and nice restaurants.

Pineapple Paradise is exactly as described. It is clean, quiet, comfortable and in a good location. There's a coffee machine, all the utensils you might require to cook and everything is in good order. It is super easy to grab food or supplies as it is just a very quick walk to the ABC store and to Food Pantry. It's also right next to a transport hub (at the front of the Ilikai Hotel) so you can catch The Bus or Shuttles to all over town. It's only a few minutes walk to shopping at the Ala Moana centre, and you can walk to Waikiki yet you are away from the frenetic pace of hotels and tourists along the beach strip. Kelly is very efficient, prompt and honest in her communications and her recommendations on where to eat and what to do were great. I would recommend this place for more independent travellers who like to mix up their stay with shopping, eating, the beach, sight seeing and exploring.

Great place and great location. The only thing I want to mention is that it's not facing to the ocean. It doesn't matter for me but the host could change to real pictures. I would stay here if I come back.
The apartment was exactly as described. It is a great location and the parking in the building is very convenient and reasonable. Highly recommended if you are visiting Oahu and want to stay in town.

The listing is in a great location in Honolulu - about 10 minutes walk to the Ala Moana beach and shopping area. It has a number of options for getting around the city. Even though the space is small, it is well organized and doesn't feel small. The room was a little too dark in the evening because the light wasn't working. Some of the dishes provided were dirty and the place could use more cleaning up.

We really enjoyed our 7 night stay at Pineapple Paradise. Kelly's studio apartment was just as the photos show - modern, clean and well presented. It was great to have a fully equipped kitchen, laptop and wi-fi for searching local attractions and The Bus time tables. We loved being able to walk to the Ala Moana Centre and into the heart of Waikiki for shopping and exploring. It didn't worry us that the apartment doesn't face the water as it was a such short walk around the marina to the beach front. Kelly was wonderful at communicating and we were most grateful for her tips and local recommendations.

I had a great time in Hawaii and staying at the Pineapple Paradise made it more so. Though I did not meet Kelly in person, I can see that she is a thoughtful person through all the stuff in her place...all your needs are anticipated. The place is as advertised... clean, good size and has the best location! thank you Kelly. If I go back to waikiki i'll stay at your place again.
Home was exactly as pictured. Very clean and fantastic location. Would stay here again!
Fantastic location.  Handy to everything, shops, beach, restaurants etc.  Kaelly was very prompt with emails and questions that we had.  Made our holiday so easy.

The Pineapple Paradise was amazing ! The location is very convenient , we can easily get in and out of the location. The room looked quite small in the beginning but the way Kelly organized the room it made it feel cozy. The room is provided with anything you can think of, cleaning materials, to ice packs, towels , wash cloths, to even an iron; in case you need to iron any wrinkly clothing & etc! I had a family friend lend me a car for 10 days, I do not suggest parking in the structure for $20=24 hr if you are gone all day ; there is parking along the marina with the cost of $1=1 hr! Kelly is such a great & an amazing host she responds to your message quite fast ! Overall , I had a pleasant stay at The Pineapple Paradise !!

Great place if staying in Honolulu. Within walking distance of restaurants, grocery, and Waikiki beach. Walmart is also close, about a 20 minute walk. The place had everything we needed to make the stay enjoyable. Kelly was extremely responsive with all communications. Everything went very smoothly.

Kelly is very helpful. Her apartment is a great location for shops and restaurants. The apartment is clean, convenient and has a great view on the balcony. You can use Uber to get around Waikiki which can cost about $8-$10. Recommend to try the restaurant downstairs called Red Lobster. Renting a car is just across the street in the Discovery Bay Center. Would highly recommend to friends.

Le studio était parfait. Propre et très bien situé. Il est légèrement éloigné des avenues touristiques ( à distance de marche toutefois) mais ceci est une bonne chose car c'est très reposant. 
J’espère revenir très vite !
The host canceled this reservation 40 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
We were extremely pleased with our accommodations! The location was great, and the details advertised were exactly as stated. A great place to stay. Easily 5 stars!

We had an amazing stay!!! The place was very clean and the view from the balcony was just mind blowing!! This condo has everything you need. The kitchen is fully equipped so you can make your own food. At the same time the condo is so close to everything that we ate out for every meal!!! The beach and marina are just a block away. It was such a great stay, we were very sad to leave on our last day! If this place is available for your vacation YOU NEED TO BOOK IT!!! You will not regret it.

Kelly is a great host. She has this nice apartment studio apartment in waikiki beach which is perfect for my family trip this time! I'm glad that we choose her place. The only thing I would like to mention is that the studio is perfect for two or one persons, but more than two will be a little bit packed. Still I would love to stay her place next time when I visit Honolulu.

This was my first time using Air Bnb, so we were a little nervous when we opened the door to the apartment. But behold! The most absolute PERFECT little studio for our stay in Hawaii! The place looked exactly as it did in photos - clean, modern, and very comfortable. The bathroom was also very clean, modern, and big enough to fit 2 girls doing makeup at the same time (yes, this was a legitimate concern of us). I was worried that it would be too small for our family of 3, but this studio fit us all comfortably. Kelly was always quick to respond (within minutes) of any questions that I had. She has almost everything you can think of at this place for your convenience - paper goods, a hair dryer, cooler for the beach, coffee maker, etc. Parking was $20/day if you paid in advance. We paid for a full week, so it was easy to get in and out of the marina. The location was close to Ala Moana Center and we could walk to the shopping center or beach easily. There was a laundry area downstairs from the apartment, which we used to wash our sandy towels (pay per use). My siblings and I were super happy with our stay here and we cannot wait to come back to Pineapple Paradise! It truly was a home away from home. Thank you Kelly for your amazing place, it definitely surpassed our expectations! Mahalo

We stayed recently for 8 days at the Pineapple Place it was just perfect for our needs as a couple with everything in close proximity to the apartment including buses; beaches ; major shops and convenience stores  and hire cars. The access instructions were easy to follow upon arrival . The kitchen was very well equipped as was the bathroom with all the modern needs and there are ample towels.  The fold out bed was fine . Overall we were extremely  happy with the condition and the amenities in the Pineapple Place and we hope we can visit again sometime in the future .

Once my girlfriend and I walked into this bnb, it felt like home away from home.  Even though we were not able to meet Kelly and knowing she was a phone call or email away, she made sure we had everything we needed.  The room was clean, comfy, and had a pretty nice view of the city.   It was a good amount of space with the Murphy bed up especially compared to some other bnbs my friends got while I was out there.  Location was perfect.  Beach, restaurants, market, and mall were all walking distance. We definitely got great value for the price paid. I would highly recommend this spot for people that want to stay in Waikiki. 

Also,  if you rent a car,  it's $20 a day for parking if you pay in advance.  

Thanks Kelly!

This place was as described and wasn't far from all the shopping and Waikiki beach. The sunrise in the am was amazing and the location was close to all the action, but quiet at night. This was our first experience with Airbnb and we appreciate Kelly's responsiveness to our questions. We loved Hawaii and will be back for sure!

Pineapple Paradise was perfect for our vacation on the island.  Conveniently located to beach, Ala Moana Mall, restaurants, public transportation, and airport.  The apartment included all amenities needed for a relaxing stay on the beach.  We enjoyed viewing a movie at night from the DVD collection provided after a busy day exploring the island.  We definitely would not hesitate to stay here again.

8일동안 3가족이 묵었습니다. 체크인 오퍼레이션이 원활하지 않아 약 1시간 동안 애를 먹었고, 다행히 착하게생긴 흑인 경비언니가 도와주어 무사히 아파트에 들어올 수 있었습니다. 알라모아나 쇼핑센터와 도보 12~15분 거리이고, 숙소에 거의 모든 주방기기가 마련되어 있어, 근처 팔라마/돈키호테 슈퍼에서 재료들을 구입해 직접 조리할 수 있어 여행경비를 아낄 수 있습니다. 3명 취침가능하다고 나와있지만, 실제 침대는 1개(2인용) & 공기넣어 바닥에서 쓰는 매트는 작동되지 않아 사용할 수 없었고, 가능하였다 하더라도 장소가 협소해 설치할 수 없습니다. 하여, 1명은 그냥 바닥에서 홈리스처럼 잠을 자야 했습니다. 침구류는 편했지만, 바닥/카펫/카우치 청소는 하지 않는 것으로 보였습니다. 금연건물이지만, 항상 누군가의 담배냄새가 방안으로 들어와 문을 열고 있지 못해 크게 불편하였고, 건물 1층의 CHART HOUSE/도보 20분의 LOBSTER KING의 음식은 진심 훌륭했습니다. 2명의 장기여행객에게 어울릴만한 작은원룸이고, 가족단위 숙박은 적당하지 않습니다. 호스트는 처음부터 친절하지 않았고, 그녀를 귀잖게 하는 게 두려워(눈치보여) 다른 질문은 하지 못했습니다.
Pineapple paradise was perfect location, walking distance to everything. Kitchen was fully equipped and perfect for couples who need a cozy place to stay and explore the beautiful island.
Muy bien! Buena ubicacion, todo impecable!

My boyfriend and I loved our stay at Kelly's pineapple paradise! It was exactly what we were expecting and had everything we needed for a comfortable stay. We even found ourselves lounging around the apartment more than we intended. The location was great. It was a short walk to the ala moana shopping center and the beach. We frequented the harbor pub downstairs for happy hour and enjoyed walking around the city at night. Kelly was very helpful and quick to answer my (sometimes trivial) questions. Thank you for helping make our stay in Honolulu so memorable Kelly!
Great location. Tucked away from the hustle and bustle, but can be easily accessible. Parking and checkin was smooth. Beautiful and clean apartment. Hope to be back again soon.

Perfect location. It's walking distance to ala moana mall, the Marina, the Hilton Hawaiian Village Hotel and the other side of Waikiki Beach. Kelly's apartment is new, modern and very clean.  We had a great time. Kelly even allowed us to leave our luggages ahead of our check in time. We highly recommend this apartment for a group of 2 or 3.

Great location within walking distance to Ala Moana shopping centre, major pickup point for tours, the beach, ABC store.
Apartment was nicely furnished and matched the photos.  The kitchen is fully equipped.  Lots of towels were provided including 2 x beach towels.  Great internet connection!  Laundry cost $5.50 for both washing and drying and the machines only accept quarters.
Kelly is a great hostess and was prompt at responding to queries.  She even allowed us to check in very early which was a bonus!
We stayed for 10 nights and enjoyed our time at Pineapple Paradise!

Kelly's place is very comfortable and convenient! The view from the room is beautiful and scenic and the condo itself is very cozy. The place was very clean when we arrived and the provided cleaning supplies, extra towels and sheets, laundry room, and trash chute made it easy for us to keep the place clean throughout our long stay. Everything is within walkable distance or can be reached via bus spots just downstairs. There is security on site in the lobby, security cameras in the elevators and hallways, and the parking structure has attendants 24 hours, so we always felt safe coming in and out at night. Kelly also had beach chairs and small coolers which made trips to the beach a breeze! We enjoyed coming to unwind and rest here and would come again.
非常干净整洁的apartment,位置也很方便,去waikiki和ala moana shopping mall都可以步行,房东也很好,可及时沟通,强烈推荐

This condo has the best use of space. While it was small, it had an area for everything we need. I've never had a pull-out wall bed before so that was really cool. The location is perfect, walking distance to everything! The Ala Moana mall is a quick five minute walk so it's really convenient. If you have a rental car, there is a daily fee for parking garage. Our host was responsive so we always appreciate that.
This place is perfect!!! Very clean, very comfortable. In the perfect location! It has everything you'd need. Close to everything!
Extremely well maintained and hospitality oriented accommodations in a convenient location in Waikiki.  I wish Honolulu had more options like this...but it doesn't.
Lovely clean studio. Well equipped kitchen and supplies beach towels, beach equipment etc. Perfect for staying for a few nights. Great location by the marina and the nicer end of the beach.
We really enjoyed our short stay at this Condo. It was a great location, close to the beach, and equipped with everything we needed! Kelly was readily available to answer any questions we had.

The place had everything we needed such as dishware, cleaning supplies, wifi, and so on. And the location is just amazing. You can see the fireworks up close from the building. My girlfriend and I had an amazing stay. Would recommend 100%.

This was a really nice condo. Very clean and with all you need. Good location and a very good host. Kelly gave fast respons to out questions and she helped us when needed. We would like to stay here again!

Great location near the marina. Within walking distance to all the shops and restaurants as well as the beach. 

Place was clean and tidy, with a comfortable bed.  Cost was great compared to some of the hotels we looked at. We hung out at some of the hotel pool bars and spent what we saved on cocktails!

Definitely would come back. Thanks Kelly
Everything as described. Great location in Waikiki and easy to get around on the bus. Will be even better come October 1 when the one day bus pass is introduced.
Very relaxing and clean. I enjoyed the city view a lot at night time everything sparked ❤️✨
Gorgeous home :) Beautiful pineapple setups. BEST VIEW OF THE CITY! Will definitely stay here on my next visit to Oahu. $20/per night parking will be enforced.
Great apartment, super convenient and very comfy including Murphy bed.  Hope to stay again next time!
Location is great, very close to the beach area behind the Hilton. Condo has everything you'll need. The backpack lawn chairs, cooler, and umbrella is a nice touch too.
Kelly's place is really nice, I really liked the huge window with the nice view. There is also a great kitchen.

Great location close to Ala Moana shopping Centre and walkable to Waikiki beach. It was clean, nicely decorated with Pineapple theme, supplied with all the necessities and loved the detailed touch.  Very spacious and we stayed comfortably for 7 nights. 
It was our honeymoon and wedding for our sister, also my first ever accommodation that I booked via Airbnb. Kelly was very helpful and gave quick response.
We enjoyed staying at Pineapple paradise, and had a great memorable trip. Thank you for hosting us.

We stayed here for a week in January and Kelly’s place had all the facilities that we needed. It was a great location and walking distance to everything that Waikiki has to offer. Great communication and check in, would highly recommend for a welcoming and homely stay.

Very nice cosy place. Everything we needed was there :) the apartment is very well furnished. the localisation is perfect, on the quiet part of waikiki, very close to ala moana mall, where you can find a great Foodland. The Lagoon is close by and you can enjoy a safe swim with the kids. you won't regret your stay if you book with Kelly.

Conveniently located near Ala Moana center and the Hilton Hawaiian Village. Within walking distance of the rest of Waikiki. The condo itself had more amenities than we needed, and 24hr parking for $20 near Waikiki is hard to beat. Would stay here again.

Kelly’s place is a great place to stay if you are looking for something centrally located to all the tourist areas and beach. We were able to walk to the beach each day (not even a 2min walk). The security on the main lobby, is soooo nice and helpful as well! There is an ABC convenience store right across the street and has almost anything you could think of you’d need for this trip. And then there is a McDonalds right beside it that has Frappes for 2$ (score haha!). Loved the lay out of the room, very tidy and well kept. Had lots of towels and kitchen supplies. would definitely recommend staying here.
場所が便利で清潔で快適でした｡

My wife and I enjoyed our stay at Kelly’s condo. The condo itself is in an older building on the quieter side of Waikiki, but still completely walkable to all the action - 5 mins to the Ala Moana Shopping Centre, a 3 minute walk to the Hilton Lagoon which is right on the beach and about a 10 minute walk to the heart of Waikiki (we will call that walk to Island Vintage Coffee, which is a must by the way!). Because the condo is on a quieter street, it was an easy pick up point for an Uber, which we took to other attractions rather than paying for tours ($13 USD to Diamond Head, for example). Kelly’s condo was nicely decorated and the perfect size for 2 people. The decor made us feel right at home and the bed was super comfortable as far as Murphy beds go! The view of the city from the condo was amazing and the window with sliding doors is much bigger and brighter than it appears in the photos - it was a nice touch to be able to see the sun rise over the mountain and buildings right from your bed! We would recommend Pineapple Paradise to our friends and family and would definitely stay here again.
Great place, Great location!

Kelly really is a superhost! My wife and I loved our week-long stay at this apartment.

First of all, the location is excellent. We found ourselves within walking distance of the beach, the Ala Moana shopping mall, a beach park with booths for parasailing and snorkeling tour companies, and several grocery stores. I think that being able to walk to a proper grocery store (rather than just an ABC store) was unique for an apartment in Waikiki, and ended up saving us a good amount of money. Of course, all of Waikiki's best stores and restaurants are also a 15 minute walk, or 2 minute bus ride, away. Any tour you book involving a bus ride (we did 3: a luau, kayaking trip, and a pearl harbor tour) will stop next door in front of the Ilikai hotel, which is also very convenient.

What also made this stay great were the thoughtful extra features provided in the apartment, including two indispensable beach chairs and a mini cooler, a keyless door lock, and a very well-equipped kitchen. 

Finally, we really appreciated how easy it was to reach Kelly, and how prompt she was in responding. At one point our internet/phone/tv service in the apartment was interrupted and, even though she was overseas, Kelly was able to get it working again within 20 minutes.

We look forward to staying at this apartment again on our future visits!

This was my first time in Hawaii and I absolutely loved staying at Kelly’s place! Would highly recommend and would absolutely stay here again. This place was centrally located, only steps from the beach which was awesome. Three people were able to comfortable stay here. Having a kitchen was so convenient and it had everything you needed. Would highly recommend!
The place was very clean and conveniently located for our weekend plans.

Great location, very near the beach and Ala Moana Center. Even the room faces the mountain not the ocean, the view still nice. Very well equipment in Kelly’s place. Super-fast WI-FI. However, it needs to be strengthened in the cleaning of the room. (dirty coffee pot, rusty kettle and a ball of hair on the carpet)

Wow! Kelly is as fantastic as her reviews say she is. So thoughtful, she welcomed us with champagne as we came to Waikiki to celebrate our honeymoon. She has so many extra amenities (beach gear, etc). She was also very flexible and allowed us to check out late because of our late departure flight. Her space was cute, cozy and most of all clean!! So close to everything about a 10-15 min walk to the heart of Waikiki. Perfect location, perfect host. We had an amazing time thanks to her.
Kelly has been very quick with response whenever we had questions.  Lovely place to stay,  great location.  Definitely would love to come back!!  I Totally Recommend this place.

This place is ideal if you want to cruise the Waikiki area. It is within walking distance of the Convention Center, the Ala Moana Mall, and Waikiki Beach. The city view was nice and the building was quiet. Inside was beautifully decorated and supplied with everything needed for cooking, cleaning, and beaching. Thanks!

We would absolutly highly recommend Kelly‘s condo. We loved the pineapple-details and the large window! Restaurants, ABC Stores and Waikiki are near around. Kelly‘s flat is the best choice to stay in while exploring the island. Our best Airbnb so far :-)
My girls and I enjoyed staying here! Cozy!

Great place a couple of minutes from the beach. The chairs and umbrella that are available at the room meant we didnt have to spend $40-50 each day we wanted to lay on the beach for the day. 
10 minute walk to the huge shopping centre which has all the shops you could hope for. 
Great places to eat within walking distance. 
We recommend the Noi Thai for dinner above the cheesecake factory. We only had it on the last night but would have had it multiple times if we knew earlier. 
Big fridge and quality cooking facilities meant we didnt have to eat out every day. 
Overall a great experience. Thanks Kelly

Cute place! The location is decent and within walking distance of a lot of places. The pricing is fair and check in was very easy. The hostess has no control over this, but the first day, my ride dropped me off and made the mistake of pulling into the parking structure. We were in the parking structure for less than 5 minutes and were asked to pay the $4. I think if you're just doing a quick drop off, try to do it on the street and save some money! There was one minor issue with the place that has been communicated privately with the hostess. Based on her quick responses in the past, I think she will probably resolve it without any issues. Aloha!

Kelly's place was great! A super convenient location near Ilikai hotel where all the tour buses drop and pick people up. Nearby the Hilton Village which had a beautiful beach with outstanding sunsets. I appreciate the fact that Kelly's apartment had all the little touches; salt and pepper for cooking so you don't have to purchase them, a ton of hangers as 2 of the dryers in the building had broken down and 2 were in use (they had 4 in total) and I could actually hang all my clothes dry, all the kitchen necessities, and instructions all in the guest manual. It was also a short 10 min bus ride to the central waikiki shopping district and so near Ala Moana. There was also an ABC supermart opposite and Red Lobster below the apartment served amazing food. Overall, very happy with the stay.

Pineapple Paradise is conveniently located for going to Ala Moana Mall, Ala Moana Beach Park and Waikiki. The place is quite spacious even when the Murphy bed is down.  Kelly was always available to answer any questions or deal with any issues but there weren't any because everything in her place was so easy and intuitive.  I would definitely love to AirBnb Pineapple Paradise next time I'm back on the island.
Thoroughly enjoyed my visit in this marina-side condo!
Kelly’s place is stylish, clean and has all the amenities you’ll need including full set of cookware, usb charger, extra inflatable bed etc.

The location of Kelly’s apartment is a super. 15-minuet walk to a very big shopping mall. You can find everything in that shopping mall. The kitchen is wonderful too. If you like to cook something instead of eating outside, you have everything you need to cook. There is even a rice cooker. The room is very clean and stylish.  My husband and I had a good stay at Kelly’s apartment. Recommend.
so good
Beautiful place! The location is perfect and since that is likely all you’ll need to have tons of fun and access to the fun on the island you will be super satisfied.
Excellent accommodation in a very convenient location. Had a great stay!

neighborhood_overview: Sai Ying Pun is an area in the northwestern part of Hong Kong Island, part of Central and Western District. Full of life and new restaurants ( High Street) since the opening of the second escalator.  Called the “new soho" as more and more expats are moving to this area to modern and renovated flats/ rooftops in old walkup buildings.
transit: WALK A series of escalators can take pedestrians from First to Third Street via the markets. Making the walk to central and soho via hollywood rd in only 10 min. (Free = Healthy) MTR Only 100 meters away from the new Sai Ying Pun MTR station and 2 stops away form Central on the Island line. TAXI Taxis frequent First, Second and Third Streets. It takes only 3 min to reach Central. (25 HKD = 2,5 Euros) TRAM Trams run along Des Voeux Road West, taking passengers to the east or west of Hong Kong Island. (2,4 HKD = 24 cents Euro) BUS Many bus routes run every 5 min along Des Voeux Road and Queens Road West. (around 9 HKD = 90 cents Euro) Also Is Well conected to Kowloon side as The Western Harbour Tunnel goes from Sai Ying Pun under Victoria Harbour to West Kowloon and is a popular route for cars, trucks and buses.
access: You will have access to TV+Cable TV, Wifi and anything else in the living areas of the flat Kitchen (feel free to cook),Terrace + Bath etc.
interaction: Please enjoy while we are on holidays. Respect neighbors. Enjoy!
house_rules: Please follow, thanks: 1. Smoke only in the terrace. 2. Take ur shoes in the entrance of bedrooms. 3. Keep the house clean and tidy. 4. Enjoy Like at Home!

host.host_about:
Hola,
I am a Spanish Architect Living and working in Asia for the last 6 years. Based in Hong Kong.
Hope you Enjoy your stay and of course anything you need or doubt you have please ask me... Enjoy your Day!

address.street: HK, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

reviews.comments:
Bel appartement propre dans un quartier en devenir à Hong Kong ! 
Jorge fut très accueillant et disponible . L'immeuble et la rue très tranquille. J'y reviens à chaque fois !

I come to Hong Kong quite often, and it was my second stay at Jorge's apartments. Jorge is a really responsive host, he was always online to answer all our questions and very helpful leading up to the trip. 

The flat is clean, has an amazing terrace and really convenient location (my favorite district in HKG). It was awesome stay by all means. I would recommend this place to my friends and will come back for sure.
The host canceled this reservation 30 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
